1a1(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas kyi smod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas slob dponadza dbyangs kyis mdzad pa bzhags
1b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha tsa ri tA ma hA k+Sha byA na
1b2(skyes rabs): ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya nga
2a1(skyes rabs): snyan ngag chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan
2a2(skyes rabs): yon tan tshogs kyis gang // bdag nyid chen po sems can gyi// don mdzad yang dag sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge
2a3(skyes rabs): 'dun la phyag 'tshal// bu ram shing par mthu mnyam bu ram shing pa'i rgyud// thub dka' shAkya rnams la spyod pa rnam
2b1(skyes rabs): dag pa// 'phrog byed zla ba lta bur skye dgu rnams la sdug/ rgyal po zas gtsang zhes pa'i ming can byung bar gyur// dbang po dang mtshungs de yi bdag po ldan ma yin/
2b2(skyes rabs): nus mthu rjes mtshungs gzi brjid lha mo bde sogs dang // pad+mo can 'ang phun sum tshe gos pa sa bzhin brtan// sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya dpe med sgra 'dra byung // mi skyong
2b3(skyes rabs): rgyal po 'di ni de dang thabs cig tu// dga' ba nyer ldan rnam thos sras kyi dpal bzhin rol// de nas yang dag ting 'dzin ldan pa'i rig ma bzhin// sdig bral ma de mngal
2b4(skyes rabs): ni rnam par bzung bar gyur// mngal dang nye bar ldan pa nyid kyi sngon rol tu// de ni gnyid song glang po dbang po dkar po zhig/ rang nyid la ni rab tu zhugs sogs mthong gyur la// de yi mtshan mnyam
3a1(skyes rabs): zag pa yang thob ma yin// lha dang rab tu mtshungs pa de yi lha mo de yi lha mo de// mngal gyi rigs kyi dpal ni rab tu 'dren byed cing // sgyu mngal ba dang ni mya ngan sgra med par// gtsang la nyon mong sa myed pa'i dgon
3a2(skyes rabs): par blo gros mdzad// de ni lum bi zhes bya'i nags mthar gyur pa'i sa// sna tshogs ljon shing sna tshogasde shing rta mngon dga' bar// bsam gtan la bzod dben pa'i nags kyi mtha' bzhed ma// 'gro ba'i ched dang gnas phyir mi skyong la zhus so//
3a3(skyes rabs): de yi chos dang ldan la 'phags pa'i zhe 'dod dag/ rnam par shes nas ya mtshon dga' ba yis gang ste// zhi ba'i grong nas sa yi bdag po gshegs gyur te// de yi dga' ba'i rgyu yin rnam par rgyu phyir min// dpal dang ldan pa'i nags der rgyal po'i
3a4(skyes rabs): bdag ldan ma// rab tu bltams pa'i dus ni yang dag mngon gzigs shing // bla re nye bar phul ba'i gzims mal rab 'thob ste// mi mo stong phrag dag gis mngon par dga' bar byed// de nas skar ma rgyal rab ldan par gyur pa'i tshe// brtu
3a5(skyes rabs): zhugs legs par 'dus byas lha mo de yi ni// rtsibs logs dag nas 'jig rten phan phyir sras bltams te// tshor ba dang ni bral zhing nad dang bral ba nyid// ji ltar brla skyes brla nas rgya chen lag pa nas// dbang po dang mtshungs pa
3a6(skyes rabs): le nu ni spyi bo nas// mtshan ldan nyid kyang lag pa'i cha shas gsang ba nas// rnam pa de ltar de yi skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur// mngal nas mngon par nges par byung ba gzugs mdzes te// nam mkha' dag las 'phos 'dra skye gnas
3b1(skyes rabs): las ma skyes// bskal pa gcig min rnams su bsgom pa'i bdag nyid ni// gang zhig yang dag rab tu shes na skyes gyur blun po min// nyi ma gzhon nu sa la mngon par babs pa bzhin// gsal ba dang ni brtan pas gang
3b2(skyes rabs): zhig mdzes pa ste// de ltar shin tu gsal yang nges par rtog pa na// ri bong gis mtshan ji ltar mig dag phrog par gyur// de ni rang gi lus kyi 'od rab 'bar ba yis// sgron ma'i 'od kyang gsal bar byed pas ltar bcom ste// rin
3b3(skyes rabs): thang chen po 'dzam bu chu gser mdzes pa'i mdog/ phyogs rnams thams cad rnam par snang zhing gsal bar mdzad// 'khrugs pa ma yin yon po'i skyon dag rab bsal zhing // shin tu brtan pa dang ldan rnam par yangs pa'i 'gros/
3b4(skyes rabs): de ltar mi g.yo rab tu brtan pa'i gom pa bdun// drang srong skar ma bdun dang rab mnyam gshegs par gyur// byang chub phyir dang 'gro la phan pa'i phyir skyes shing // 'di ni bdag gi srid pa'i skye ba tha me zhes// seng ge'i 'gros 'dra phyog
3b5(skyes rabs): bzhi ngag tu rnam gzigs nas// snod ldan rnams kyi don byed dag kyang smras par gyur// namakha' dag las rab babs zla ba'i 'od zer dkar// drang drang dro bo'i chu rgyun rnam pa gnyis kyi shugs// lus la yang dag reg pas bde ba
3b6(skyes rabs): bskyed pa'i phyir// mdzes shing yid 'ong de yi spyi bar babs par gyur// dpal ldan bla bre bres par gser gyi 'bar zhing mtshan// bai DUr+ya yi rkang pa'i gzims mal la gzims pa// de la gus phyir gser gyi pad+ma'i phyag
4a1(skyes rabs): mnga' ba'i// gnod sbyin bdag rnams kun nas yongasu bskor nas gnas// mi mngon gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang na mkha' la// gang gi mthu las mgo bo yis ni rab btud cing // kun nas gdung ba skyob
4a2(skyes rabs): pa'i gdugs dkar rnams bzung ste// byang chub cheng du mchog gi bsngags pa dag kyang smras// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par mchod byas pa'i// lto 'phye che rnams khyad 'phags chos la sred pa'i phyir// gang
4a3(skyes rabs): rlung yab kyis g.yab gus pa'i mig gzer cing // man+ta dA ra ba'i me tog rnams kyis yang dag 'thor// de bzhin gshegs pa bltams pa'i yon tan gyis tshim pa'i// gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i rnam dag sems can
4a4(skyes rabs): rnams// sdug bsngal nyid du bying ba'i 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// lha rnams 'dod chags bral ba na yang dga' bar 'gyur// gang gis rab tu bltams tshe ri rgyal phur bu nyid// rlung gis bsnun pa'i gru ltar sa gzhi g.yos gyur
4a5(skyes rabs): cing // tsa na ngan dang bcas ut+pal pad+ma'i snying po yi// char pa dag ni na mkha'i sprin dang bral bas babs// yid 'ong rig na bde ba'i rlung dag byung gyur te// lha yA na bza' dag ni mngon pur 'i byi bas byed cing // ny+tsi m+b+ha de nyid lhag
4a6(skyes rabs): par mngon par gsal ba ste// zhi ba'i 'od zer 'dus ma byas pa'i me 'baro// shar dang byang gi mtshams kyi khang pa'i phyogs gcig ni// bisol ba'i chu yi khron parang byung gyur pa ste// pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor rnams
4b1(skyes rabs): mtshan gyur rnams kyis// gang la bya ba rnams ni stegs bzhin rab tu byas// chos dang ldan pa'i lha dang 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis// de ni blta ba'i don du nags tshal rab gang ste/ rmad byung ngo mtshar gyur pa nyid kyi shing las kyang //
4b2(skyes rabs): me tog rnams ni dus ma yin par nges par bral// 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang de'i tshe// phan tshun dag tu phyin te gnod pa mi byed la// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rtenA dag na nang glang ji skad po// de dag rnams kyang 'bad pa med par de tshe
4b3(skyes rabs): bcom// mkha' 'gro'i byA nI mtho min+da sgra sgrogs ri dgas kyang // chu klung dang ni chu yang zhi bar bab gyur la// phyogs rnams rab snang dge ba'i nam mkha' rab mdzes shing // lha yi rnga rnams mkha' lnga rab tu grags par gyur// rgyud par gyur/
4b4(skyes rabs): la mgon ni nye bar thob nas bzhin// 'jig rten dag kyang mchog tu rab zhi thob gyur lnga// 'jig rten rnams kyi thar pa'i bla ma rab bsgrims tshe// 'dod pa'i lha nyid kho na dga' ba med par gyur// shin tu ngo mtshor sras kyi skye ba mthong gyur
4b5(skyes rabs): nas// mi bdag brtan pa yin yang rnam par 'gyur nas song // rab dga' skyes pa nyid dang yid ma bde skyes te// brtse ba las ni mchi ma rna pa gnyis byung ngo // mi ma yin pa'i sras po nyid kyi nus pa dang // ma yi rang bzhin kyang ni stobs chung
4b6(skyes rabs): nyid kyi phyir// grang dang dro ba'i chu dag 'dres pa'i chu klung bzhin// lha mo 'jigs pa dang ni dga' bas gang bar gyur// lhag ma spangs te 'jigs pa nyid ni shes byas nas// yid 'ong 'dod pa'i ched du rtogs pa ma yin pa'i// bud med namam
5a1(skyes rabs): rnams kyi bde legs gyur byas sh-i // gtsang mar byas te lha rnams dag la phyag 'tshalo// de yo mtshan nyid ngag kyang shos shing thos gyur nas// spyod dang zlos dang tshig la grags thob bram ze rnams// mA m+b+ha
5a2(skyes rabs): zhawA ni yA mtshan dga' ba yid gang ste// dge' dong 'jigs par gyur pa'o ma yi lce la smras// mi dgas lha bu ma gtogs pa'i khyud 'phags pa// gzhan gang cung zad 'dod min zhi ba de yi phyir// khyod kyi sprin ma 'di ni rigs kyi sgron
5a3(skyes rabs): maste// khyod nyid dge' byar mdzod cig dag sngon de lta bgraM// de byor brtan par rnam pyod mi bur dag mdzod dang // rigs ni ngos pa nyid du mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur// 'di ni khyong gro nas skyes par gyur pa ste// 'dzi
5a4(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par bcom pa'i mgon// mchog gyur 'di la mchog gyur gser gyi 'od mnga' zhing // sgron ma'i 'od zer dag gis mchin rnams gang gyur pas// de nyid rdzogs par gyur pa'i thob par 'gyur ba'am/
5a5(skyes rabs): yid nA mi bdug sa stengs 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// sa yi bdag po nyid la gal te dga' 'gyur na// stobs dang chos dag gis ni de'i tshes steng du// rgyal po kun gyi thog tu 'di ni gnas 'gyur te// skar mya'i 'od rnams
5a6(skyes rabs): la ni nyi sa'i 'ang bzhin no// de ni gal ta thar bzhidi nagasu gshegs gyur na// mkhyen dang de nyi hU~M na rje chus sbyi // lugs sun skyil gyis mun nas 'dri na gnas 'gyur to// sa rgyal po bzhin//
5b1(skyes rabs): lcags rnams la ni gser drag mchog yin la// ri rnams la ni ri rab chu bo rnams la mtsho// gza' rnams la nI zla ba dud byed rnams la nyi// de ltar khyod kyi sras ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ gang gi spyan dag mi 'dzum mi gzir rnam par
5b2(skyes rabs): spangs pa ste// brtan zhing shin tu ring la dkar min rdzi ma dang // gzi brjid ldan pa yin yang 'on kyang zhi ba nyid// 'od ni kun nas gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' ci la min// de na gnyis skyes rnams la mi dog gis smras pa// bdag nyid chen po
5b3(skyes rabs): mi skyong snga mas ma mthong ba// mthong zhes khyad 'di gang yin 'di la rgyu mtshan ci// de nas bram ze rnams kyi de nyid la smras pa// blo dang thos pa las dang grags pa rnams la ni// mi skyong sngon dang phyi ma nyid ni tshad ma min// dngos po'i
5b4(skyes rabs): lugs la 'dir ni bya ba rgyu yin la// 'dir yang bdag gis dper brjod dge ni mkhyen par mdzod// gang zhig rgyal po'i bstan bcos shes ldan pa na spong dag/ rig byed drang srong de gnyis kyis ni ma byas pa// de dag gis sras zhi ba pa ba sangs
5b5(skyes rabs): dang ni// phur bu yis ni dus kyi de nyid bskyed par gyur// nyams gyur snga ma rnams kyis ma mthong rig byed gang // dbyangs can ma yi bu yis kyang ni slar smras pa// nus med gnas 'jog gis ni ma byas gyur pa gang // rgyas pa yis ni de ltar
5b6(skyes rabs): rnam pa mang po brjod// 'pho byed drang srong chen pos ma bsdebs gyur pa gang // tshig gi rkang pa grogs mkhar gyis ni dang por bskyed// gso ba gang yang rgyun shes gyis ni ma mthong ba// phyi nas de ni drang srong rgyun shes bu yis byas// gang yang
6a1(skyes rabs): gnyis skyes nyid ni kun shas ma rnyed pa// de ni gting dpogs bu yis rgyal po la thob bo// bu ram shing pas dang por ma bsdams gyur pa gang // rgya mtsho la dug bcas kyis kyang mtshams bzung ngo //
6a2(skyes rabs): slob dpon nyid du bram ze'i rnal 'byor cho ga la// gzhan rnams kyis ma thob pa skyed byed gshegs par gyur// khyab 'jug gis ni grags pa'i las rnams gang yin pa// de rna la ni dnga' bo la soT sto ba med gyur// de phyir lang tsho dang ni rigs dag na
6a3(skyes rabs): ma yin// la la lo lar mchog nyid nyer thob 'jig rten na// rgyal dang drang srong rnams kyi snga mas ma byas pa// de dang de dag rnams ni bu rnams dag gis byas// de ltar gnyis skyes de rnams kyis ni yid ches te// mi skyong
6a4(skyes rabs): dbugs 'byin dang yang mngon par dga' gyur la// mi 'dod the tshom drag ni yid las rnam bsal te// rab tu dga' ba nyid la lhags par 'dzegs par gyur// dga' ba yis ni gnyis skyes dam pa de rnams la//
6a5(skyes rabs): bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i nor rnams rab tu phul te// ji skad smras bzhin 'di ni sa yi bdag por gyur// rgas pa thob nas nags rnams su ni 'gro bar shog/ de nas mtshan ma rnams dang dka' thub stobs las ni// skye
6a6(skyes rabs): ba mthar mdzad bltams pa de ni rtogs gyur nas// dam pa'i chos la gus pa'i shAkya'i dbang phyug gis// gnas su dkar min drang srong chen po gshegs par gyur// tshangs pa'i dpal nyid kyis dang dka' thub dpal gyis ni//
6b1(skyes rabs): 'bar ba'i tshangs rigs rnams kyi tshang rig de la ni// rgyal po'i bla mas gus pa dang ni bkur sti'i phyir// mi dbang po brang du ni rab tu spyan drangs so// de ni sa bdag btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logasu// gzhon nu bltams pa la ni dga' ba'i
6b2(skyes rabs): shugs kyis 'ongs// dka' thub mchog las dang ni rgas pa la bsten nas// brtan pa nags kyi 'du shes kyis ltar rnam par zhugs// de nas thub pa gdan la gnas pa de la mi skyong gis// zhabs bsil mchod yon sngon 'gro yang
6b3(skyes rabs): ngag rab mchod nas// sngon che gnas mchog la ni mtha' can lhas bzhin des// ji ltar nye bar spyod la snyan gsan phab pa'o// bdag gi rigs ni rjesu bzung phyir nor ldan nges// gang zhig bdag la gzigs phyir bcom ldan nyer
6b4(skyes rabs): gshegs la// bka' drin gnang bar mdzod cig zhi ba ci bgyi bgyi// kho bo slob ma lagaso thugs tshes mdzad par rigs// de ltar mi skyong gis ni dngos po thams cad kyis// nye bar gsol btang gyur pa'i thub pa ji lta bzhin
6b5(skyes rabs): rab rgyas yangs pa'i spyan ni ya mtshan dang bcas pas// zab pa dang ni brtan pa'i tshogs rnams smras pa'o// chos 'dod gtong ba dang ldan 'gron la sdug cing 'phangs// bdag nyid chen po khyed la 'thad pa 'di yin la// sems
6b6(skyes rabs): dpa' rjes 'gro ye shes lang tsho rjes mthun pa// khyod kyi blo gros gnyen gang de ltar bdag la yin// de dang de ni gang gis mi skyong drang srong des// phra mo'i chos kyis nor rnams rab tu thob byas nas// rtag par cho ga bzhin du mchod sbyin
7a1(skyes rabs): byas gyur pa// dka' thub rnams kyis phyug cing nor rnams dag gis dbul// bdag gi nye bar 'ongs la dgos pa gang yin pa// bdag gi de ni gson mdzod dga' bar nyer song khyed// byang chub rtogs pa'i chad
7a2(skyes rabs): du khyod kyis sras bltams zhes// lha yi ngag dag bdag gi nyi ma'i lam du thos// ngagra de thos nas dang ni yid la bsgoms nas dang // mtshan ma rnams kyis shes nas de nas nye bar 'ongs// brgya byin gyi ni rgyal mtshan yang dag
7a3(skyes rabs): bsgreng ba bzhin// shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan blta bar 'dod pa yis// zhes pa'i tshig 'di de ltar thos par gyur nas ni// mi dbang rab tu dgal bas kun nas g.yos gyur te// yum gyi pang du son las gzhon nu blangs nas ni/
7a4(skyes rabs): dka' thub nor can la ni yang dag bstan par gyur// de nas drang srong che nges zhabs la 'khor los mtshan// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang // glang po bzhin du 'doms nub smin ma mdzod spur bcas// ya mtshan
7a5(skyes rabs): dang bcas rgyal po sras ni mthong bar gyur// lha mo'i pang na zhugs pa me yi bu bzhin du// ma ma'i pang na bzhugs pa mngon par mthong nas ni// byung gyur rdzi ma'i mtha' ru mchi ma rnams byung ste// dbugs med gyur nas gyen du
7a6(skyes rabs): lta la zhal phyogs gyur// mig dag mchi mas yongs gang dkar min mthong nas ni// bu la brtse ba'i phyir ni mi skyong 'dar gyur te// mchi ma dang ni gre pa kha zhing ldab ldib bcas// thal mo sbyar zhing yan lag btud de
7b1(skyes rabs): dris par gyur// glang gi lus ni lha las bAr na cung zad gcig/ gang gi skye ba ngo mcher mang po'i sgron ma ste/ gang gi don ni mchog tu 'gyur bar smra ba ste// rab tu mthong nas brtan pa gang phyir mchi ma 'ong // bcom ldan gzhon
7b2(skyes rabs): nu brtan pa'i tshe can yin snyam mam// bdag gi mya ngan ched du skyes pa min nam ci// bdag la chu yi snyim pa ci zhig ltar rnyed de// 'di ni dus kyis 'thung phyir nye bar 'ongs ma yin// bdag gi snyan grags gter ni mi zad yin snyam mam// nges
7b3(skyes rabs): par bdag gi rigs kyi lag nor yin snyam ci// bde bar pha rol tu ni rab tu 'gro snyam mam// gnyid par gyur kyang bu ni phye ba'i mig gcig yod// bdag gi rigs kyi myu gu skyes par ma rgyas par// yongasu skams pa'i skal ba can zhig yin snyam
7b4(skyes rabs): mam// khyab bdag myur bar gsungs shig bdag la zhi ba med// gnyen 'dun rnams kyi bu la brtse ba khyed kyi rigs// de ltar mi 'dod blo yis 'khrul pa byung gyur pa// rig nas mi dbang rgyal la thub pa des smras pa// bdag gis smras
7b5(skyes rabs): pa glang de the tshom med pa de// mi skyong khyed kyi blo gros gzhan gang ma gyur cig/ 'di yi gzhan gyur mtshon min bdag gi rnam 'gyur te// 'on kyang rang la slu bar rab mtshon rnam par 'khrugs// skye ba zad pa'i rnyed par bla min rtogs pa po//
7b6(skyes rabs): 'di skyes bdag gi 'gro ba la ni dus yin// rgyal srid rnam par spangs nas yul rnams la mi gnas// 'bad pa drag po rnams kyis de nyid thob byas nas// 'di ni 'gro la gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms phyir// ye shes rang bzhin nyi ma rab tu
8a1(skyes rabs): 'bar bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho nad rnams bkram pa'i lbu pa can// rga ba'i dba' rlabs 'chi ba'i shugs ni drag po las// 'gro ba nyams thag bying bar gyur rnams 'di yis ni// ye shes gru bo chen po yis ni sgrol bar byed/
8a2(skyes rabs): sa rab chu yi shugs la brtan pa'i tshul khrims ngogs// ting nge 'dzin ni bsil ba'i brdul zhugs ngang pa 'phyo// 'di yi mchog gi chos kyi chu bo rab skor la// sred pas nyam thag gson pa'i 'jig rten thung bar byed// sngag bsngal gyis nyam thas dang
8a3(skyes rabs): yul gyis bsgribs rnams dang // 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon 'jigs par gnas pa rnams la ni// lam rab chud zos rnams la lam 'gro rnams bzhin du// 'dis ni rnam par dag pa'i lam dag 'chad par 'gyur// yul gyi bud shing can gyi 'dod//
8a4(skyes rabs): chags me yis ni// 'jig rten skye bo rnam par bseg par gyur pa la// sos ka'i tha mar sprin chen gyi sti char bzhin du// 'di yis chos kyi char gyis rab tu sim byed 'gyur// sred pa'i sgo gtan ma rig mun pa'i sgo glegs can// sgo la skye dgu rnams kyi
8a5(skyes rabs): 'thon pa'i rgyu las ni// 'di yis mchog rab kun nas rnyed par dka' ba yi// dam pa'i chos kyi sgras ni rnam par 'byed par 'gyur// rang gi las kyi zhags pa rnams kyi yongs dkris shing // sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par zil non rten med pa'i// 'jig rten
8a6(skyes rabs): rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub rnyed nas kyang // chos kyi rgyal po 'di sti 'ching ba mthar mdzad 'gyur// rmongs sam 'dod pa'i bde ba yis sam rgyags las rung // 'di yi mthar thug chos gang thos par mi byed pa// mi yi 'jig rten 'dir de mya ngan bya ba'i gam
8b1(skyes rabs): de phyir khyod nyid 'di la mya ngan ma byed cig yon tan rgya mtsho 'dri las 'khrul gyur bdag gi ni// bsam gtan rnams ni thob kyang don byas med nyid de// de yi dam chos ma thos pa la kho bo ni// mtho ris dag na gnas kyang phun tshogs med pa snyam// de ltar
8b2(skyes rabs): don rnaMsaM bshes dang bcas shing btsun mor bcas// yid mi bde ba dor nas mi dbang dgar gyur la// rnam pa de ltar bdag gi bu ni 'di'o zhes// des ni bdag nyid la ni snying po ldan par bsam// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes// /
8b3(skyes rabs): bsam pa'i rnam par bzung bya snying la byas gyur te// nges par 'di ni mi sdug chos kyi phyogs min la// rigs rgyud nyams pa las ni 'on kyang 'jigs pa mthong // de nas bu la rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rgyal po la// bu yi nges pa'i de nyid rig par byas nas
8b4(skyes rabs): gus bcas gyen du gzugs mthong dkar min thub pa ni// rlung gi lam gyis ji ltar 'od sa par gshegs par gyur// blo gros byas pa'i sring mo'i bu yang mthong nasna ni// thub pa'i gsung mnyan pa dang de'i lugs la ni// rnam mang rje su brdo ba yi
8b5(skyes rabs): ni ni legs pa nges// sdug pa bu bzhin du ni sbyor ba byed du bcug/ sras po skyes pas tshim bI mi yi bdag po yang // yul la song ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni rnam spangs te// sras kyi yid 'ong sras po bltams pa'i las dag ni// rigs dang 'dra bar ji lta ba bzhin byed
8b6(skyes rabs): du bcug/ zhag bcu yongasu 'das par gyur pa nyid kyi tshe// mchog gi dgo' ba rab ldan snyoms par gyur pa yis// sras las mchog tu 'gyur phyir lha yi mchod pa ni// bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bkra shis la sogs byas// gzhan yang brgya dang stong
9a1(skyes rabs): phrag yongs su gang ba'i grangs// brtan dang stobs ldan bu rnams gser gyi rwar bcas shing // rgas pa nye bar 'ongs min som ldan pa'i ba// rang gi sras 'phel phyir na gnyis skyes rnams la byin// de nas snyoms pa'i bdag
9a2(skyes rabs): nyid kyis ni rnam mang yul// rang sems tshim par byed pa'i bya ba rnams byas nas// yon tan ldan zhing dge ba'i yud tsam nges pa na// grong khyer rab tu 'jug la dga' bas blo gros mdzad// de nas mche gnyis mche ba las byung rin thang che// dkar po'i me tog
9a3(skyes rabs): gis spras nor bu'i sgron// khri la dge ba'i phyir ni lha mo sras ldan ma// lha rnams la ni rab tu btung nas bsnyen par gyur// de nas gnas brtan skye mo rjes 'brang sras mgon ma// bdag po ldan ma grong la mdun du rab zhugs nas// mchod ldan lha ni lha rnam
9a4(skyes rabs): kyis ni brgya byin bzhin// mi bdag nyid kyang grong pa'i tshogs kyis gshegs par gyur// de nas gdong drug skyes pas yid ches dbang phyug bzhin// shAkya'i rgyal pos grong khyer rnam par khyab mdzad de// zhal ni dga' bas rab gang 'dri dang 'di zhes
9a5(skyes rabs): pa'i// srid 'phel rgyas pa dang ni grags dang snyan pa mdzad// de nas mri ya bdag po'i sras bltams cher skyes pas// ser skya zhes pa'i grong khyer ljongs dang bcas pa de// gnod sbyin grong nu phun tshogs 'dod pa skyes pa na// lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bkram bzhin
9a6(skyes rabs): dga' bar gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan ngag chen po las/ gzhon nu sku bltams pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / skye dang rga ba mthor song bdag skyes bdag pham de'o// skyes pa nas brtsams mi nyid nyi mas rgyal po ste// chu yi shugs rnams
9b1(skyes rabs): kyis ni chu bo sin+d+hu bzhin// nor dang glang po rta dang bshes rnams 'phel bar gyur// nor rnams dang ni rin po dang bzang po'i gser// de dang de ni byas dang ma byas pa nyid kyang // yid la re ba yi rang khur gyur pa// de la gcig tu phan pa'i cha shas
9b2(skyes rabs): gakace rnyed gyur// gang zhig pad+ma dang mtshungs gnyis 'thung rnams kyis kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di la nye bar 'ong bar mi nus pa'i// gang dang ldan po'i glang chen chang gis dregs de rnams// 'bad pa las kyang gzhan du de la nye bar gnas// sna tshogs
9b3(skyes rabs): mtshan mas mtshan zhing gser pa'i gser sgra dang // de bzhin gzhan rnams dag gis brgyan byas rdog ma 'phyang // stobs dang byams pa dang ni nor gyis thob pa yi// 'di yi mgyogs 'gro rnams kyi grong khyer phye mar byas// de bzhin 'di yi yul
9b4(skyes rabs): 'khor du ni tshim dang rgyas// legs la rdul ldan yon tan ldan pa'o mar ldan// rab mchog bai'u rnams dang bcas pa'i ba rnams ni// 'o ma mang po 'jo ba mang po byung bar gyur// 'di yi dgra bo dbus gnas nyid du song gyur pa// dbus gnas gyur/
9b5(skyes rabs): pa mdza' ba shes nyid du rab tu song // khyad par du ni bshes gnyen brtan por seng ba ste// 'di yi phyogs dag gnyis te dgra yang yod ma yin// de bzhin du ni 'di yi 'jam rlung 'brug gi sgra// glog gi 'phreng ba 'khyil bA yis ni brgyan pa'i spyi ni//
9b6(skyes rabs): rdordo ra ra dang ni thog lhung nyes pa rnams kyis gzhan// yul du dus la lha yis char pa phab par gyur// zhing gi las kyi bal dub byed pa nyung ngus kyang // 'bru mi 'bras bu ldan pa dus sbyor bzhin skyes te// de rnams nyid kyang 'di yi sman du byung gyur la//
10a1(skyes rabs): bcungad dang snying po yis kyang mngon par lhag pa nyid// g.yul du rab tu zhugs la kun tu 'jom pa bzhin// lus la the tshom za bar byed pa'i dus na yang // rang bzhin gnas shing bde ba nyid du nad med par// dus kyi
10a2(skyes rabs): dbang gis mi mo rnams ni rab tu btsos// brtul zhugs ldan rnams ma gtogs nor rdzas dman na yang // mi rnams pha rol rnams las don du gnyer mi byed// mngon par don du gnyer la 'phags pa nor 'phra yang // de tshe 'ga' zhig dag
10a3(skyes rabs): ni rgyab kyis phyogs ma gyur// de tshe rgyal po de yi rgyal sring la ni 'ga'// gnyen la zhes med min mi gter ba yang med// brtul zhugs med pa nyid min rdzun med 'tshe med pa// sgra mi bsgrags kyi sras po lta bu byung bar gyur// der yang skyed mos
10a4(skyes rabs): tshul dang lha gnas dka' thub gnas// khron pa rdzing dang dge bcu 'du ba'i gnas rnams kyi// bya ba rnams ni mtho ris bzhin du nyer thob nas// chos 'dod rnams kyi mngon sum du ni rab tu mdzad// mu ge dang ni 'jigs dang nad rnams las grol
10a5(skyes rabs): zhing / dgar gyur skye bo mtho ris gzhan du mngon par dga'// bdag mos bdag po la 'am mo yis bdag por rung // phan tshun log par mngon par spyod pa dag kyang med// dga' ba'i ched du 'dod la 'ga' zhig gis ma bsnyen// 'dod
10a6(skyes rabs): pa'i don du nor ni 'ga' zhig gis ma bsrungs// nor gyi don du chos la 'ga' zhig gis ma spyad// chos kyi ched du 'tshe ba 'ga' zhig gis la byas// rkun po sogs dang dgra yang nyams par rang gnas te// pha rol mya ngan med pa ji lta ba
10b1(skyes rabs): nyid bzhin// rang gi 'khor lo pha rol 'khor lo las grol te// rgyal po de la bde dang lo logs byung bar gyur// de yi tshe na rgyal po de yi rgyal srid la// de skyes pa na nyi ma'i sras po'i yod shes bzhin// dga' bar spyad par gyur la sdig
10b2(skyes rabs): pa rab nyams shing // chos rnams 'bar zhing nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar gyur// gang phyir rnam pa de ltar don kun grub pa dang // rgyal po'i rigs kyi phun sum tshogs pa byung gyur te// de phyir mi skyong gis ni sras po de yi mtshan// don kun
10b3(skyes rabs): grub pa zhes bya 'di ni rab tu mdzad// lha mo sgyu ma yang ni lha yi drang song mtshungs// bu yi nus mthu rnam par spangs pa mthong nas ni// bltams la rab tu dga' mas bzod par ma nus te// de nas gnas pa'i phyed du ltar gshegs par gyur//
10b4(skyes rabs): de nas lha yi mngal dang mtshungs pa'i gzhon nu la// byams pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang khyad par med pa yi// ma yi nu mo mngangs mnyam pa yi rang bzhin la// yang dag skyed btsud bdag las skyes pa lta bur gyur// de nas nyi ma gzhon nu 'char
10b5(skyes rabs): rir gnas 'dra dang // rlung gis rab tu bud par gyur pa'i me bzhin dang // skar ma'i badrag po mun min phyogs la gnas pa ltar// gzhon nu de ni rim gyis yang dag 'phel bar gyur// de nas rin thang chen po'i tsan dan rnams dang ni//
10b6(skyes rabs): rin chen phreng ba sman gyi snying por bcas rnams dang // ri dgas rab tu sbyar ba'i gser gyi shing rta dang // 'di yi ched du gshegs kyi khyim rnams ngag nas blangs// lang 'tsho nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan rnams dang // gser
11a1(skyes rabs): gyi rang bzhin ri dgas glang chen rta rnams dang // gser dang dngul gyis bris pa'i mi chung gzugs rnams dang // shing rta ba glang byung dus yang dag sbyar rnams blangs// de ni lang tsho rjes mthun yul la nye spyod pa// de
11a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyis ni yul la nyer spyad la// dpal dang brtan pa yis dang blo dang dpal gyis kyang // byis pa yin yang byis min rab mtshungs byung bar gyur// lang tshe gzhon nu shin tu 'das nas yang dag par// 'du byed las ni rab tu thob nas
11a3(skyes rabs): dus su ni// lo mang dag gis rtogs bya nyin zhag nyung ngu yis// rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i rig pa rnams ni blangs// drang srong chen po dkar min las ni sngon rol tu// de yis nyes legs don gyi skal ba thos nas ni// nags su
11a4(skyes rabs): gshegs par 'gyur zhes shAkya'i rgyal po yis// 'dod pa rnams la chag pa bskyed du bcug par gyur// brtan pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa spyan gyi rigs de las// ngo tsha dang ni dul ba nyer ldan legs ldan ma// grags 'dzin ma zhes
11a5(skyes rabs): grags pa rnam par yangs pa ma// btsun mor mngon par brjod pa'i dpal mo 'di la blangs// kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang ni rab tu mtshungs pa yis// mchog gi lus kyi snang zhing gsal ba de nyid ni// shAkya'i rgyal po'i mna' ma de dang
11a6(skyes rabs): thabs gcig tu// bde sogs ma dang mig stong ldan bzhin mngon par dga'// yid kyang spyod par byed la cung zhig rab logs pa// gang gi mthong mi 'gyur zhes rjes su bsams byas nas// sa la rab tu spyod min lding khang lto nyid/
11b1(skyes rabs): du// gnas ngag mi skyong gis ni de la rnam par bstan// de nas gzhal med na mkhar sa la spyod pa bzhin// ston ka'i dus kyi chu gter sprin ni dkar po yis// dus sbyor kun tu bde ba'i gzhi yi lding khang la// bud med rnams kyi sil
11b2(skyes rabs): snyan rgya chen rnams kyi rnam par gshegs// gser gyis gdams pa'i rnga shing can gyi rdza rnga'i skad// mi mo'i lag pa'i rtse mos mngon par brdungs pa yi// lha mchog ma yi gar dang mnyam pa'i gar rnams kyis// ti so'i gangs ltar
11b3(skyes rabs): de yi pho brang mdzes par gyur// ngag dang bzo dang rnam 'gyur rnams kyis kyang // rgyags drang rtse dang rgod pa dngar mo rnams kyis dang // smin ma bskyod pa yid dang phyed mig lha rnams kyis// de la der ni mi mo rnams ni dga' bar gyur//
11b4(skyes rabs): de nas de ni 'dod pa brten par mkhas pa yis// dga' bas dregs pa'i bud med rnams kyis bzung gyur la// gzhal med khang no rgyab nas bsod nams lngas can bzhin// gzhal med khang gi rgyab nas sa la ma gshegaso//
11b5(skyes rabs): mi skyong gis kyang de nyid bskyed pa'i ched las ni// de yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis bskul gyur te// sdig pa las ni dga' bral zhi la mngon dga' zhing // legs la skal bar bgos shing dul la bsnyen par gyur// brtan
11b6(skyes rabs): min bzhin du 'dod pa'i bong la ma zhen la// ma rungs bskrad ma la ni yang dag chags ma gyur// brtan pas dbang ba'i rta ni stobs las rnam thul zhing // gnyen dang grong khyer pa rnams yon tan rnams kyis rgyal// gzhan gyi
12a1(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal phyir ni rig pa ma brjod la// ye shes dge ba gang yang de la lhag par brjod// des ni rang gi skye dgu rnams la ji lta bar// de ltar skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i bsngags pa mdzad// skar mu rgyal
12a2(skyes rabs): snang shes ldan sras po lhag pa'i lha// ji lta bar ni de yi tshe ring phyir mchod de// chung min me la bsreg bya rnams ni bsregs gyur lo// gnyis skyes rnams la gser dang ba ling rnams kyang byin// 'gram stegs chab rnams kyis dang ljon tsha
12a3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// gtsang sgra'i ched du lus dang yid la khrus byas te// rig byed du ni nye bar bstan pa'i chang rnams dang // zhi ba bdag skyes snying la zhi ba'i bod la 'thungs// gang zhig don dang mi ldan zhi ba ma smras la// gang zhig dga' ba dang bral de nyid ma brjodade// zhi ba de nyid medapa
12a4(skyes rabs): rtsub pa'i de nyid phyir// ngo tsha ba yis bdag nyid kho na brjod ma nus// don ldan 'dod pa rnams dang mi 'dod pa rnams la// chags pa'i skyon la brten nas rab tu 'thob min te// dge ba'i tha snyad gtsang ma la ni bsnyen gyur la// mchod sbyin la yang ma
12a5(skyes rabs): mos de ltar ji lta bzhin// sred pa dang ldan mngon par 'ongs la de ma thag/ sbyin bya chu 'dra rnams kyi skom pa bcas gyur la// g.yul las ma gtogs ye shes kyi ni sta re yis// dgra bo rnams kyi nga rgyal chen po bcom par 'gyur// gcig ni
12a6(skyes rabs): rnam par dul la des ni bdun bsrungs shing // bdun po nyid ni dor la lnga po dag ni bsrungs// sde mtshan gsum po thob la sde tshan gsum rtogs shing // sde tshan gnyis po shes la sde tshan gnyis po spangs// nyes pa byas kyang rab tu bskyangs nas
12b1(skyes rabs): gzhom bya la// 'tshe bar mi byed khro bas kyang ni gzigs ma yin// de rnams dag la 'bras bu zhi bas bcings gyur la// de rnams dag ni 'dor ba tshul ma yin phyir mthong // drang srong rnams kyi mchog gi brtul zhugs spyad gyur la// yun ring
12b2(skyes rabs): yang dag bzung ba'i sha 'khon zhugs rnams do// yon tan dri ldan snyan ngag rnams ni thob gyur la// dri ma can du byed pa'i rdul rnams rnam par dor// rab tu mi gnas gtor ma'i dpya ni ma blangs la// pha rol dngos po rnams la mngon
12b3(skyes rabs): par rlom ma byas// dgra rnams la ni chos ma yin pa ma smras la// khro ba rnams ni snying gis bzung ba ma yin no// zhi ba'i bdag nyid sems ni rnam par rab dang la// rnal 'byor rab tu ldan pa'i dbang po rnams ci ltar// der ni de ltar sa bas/
12b4(skyes rabs): rab tu sbyar ba can// 'bangs dang grong khyer pa rnams de lha nyid du byas// de nas mdzes pa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan ma// grags 'dzinA ma nI rang gri grags pa 'dzin ma la// zas gtsang sras po'i sras po sgra gcan sgra yi zhal// sgra gcan 'a
12b5(skyes rabs): zhes bya ba dus su skyes par gyur// de nas 'dod pa'i bu mnga' mchog gis yid ches te// rigs rgyud 'phel ba rab mtshon sa sbyong rgyal po ni// ji lta nyid du sras po rab tu skyes la dga'// de lta nyid du sras po'i sras po skyes la dga'// bdag
12b6(skyes rabs): gi bu yi bur gyur pa la brtse ba ni// bdag bzhin gang las yin zhes dga' ba skyes gyur te// dus su des ni cho ga de dang de dmigs shing // bu la dga' ba mtho ris bzhin du 'dzegs par gyur// rgyal po'i khyu mchog grags dang snyan
13a1(skyes rabs): pus mtshan rnams kyis// dang po'i skal ba rnams kyi lam la gnas nas ni// dkar po ma dor dka' thub rnams la dka' thub dang // 'tshe ba dor ba'i mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchod par gyur// rgyal po dpal gyis dang ni ku thub dpal sbyin/
13a2(skyes rabs): bsod nams las can de ni de nas 'bar gyur la// rigs dang blo drang mdzad spyod kyi kya gsal ba ste// gzi brjid stong gi 'od zer bzhin du rab tu 'phro// rang byung las byung mchod byed sngags ni mchod byas nas// sbas nas ched du brtan pa'i dpal
13a3(skyes rabs): gyis bzlas byas shing // dka' thub byed pa'i las rnams byas gyur skye dgu rnams// skyed 'dod skye dgu'i bdag bzhin dang po'i dus su'o// mtshon tshwa spangs shing bstan bcos rnam par shes gyur la// nye bar zhi la bsnyen zhing des la rnam
13a4(skyes rabs): par bzod// dbang ldan bzhin du yul rnams gang la ma bsnyen la// yab mes bzhin du yul rnams kun la gzigs par gyur// des kyang bu yi ched du rgyal srid bzung gyur la// bu ni rigs kyi don du rigs ni grags pa'i phyir// grags/
13a5(skyes rabs): pa mtho ris ched du mtho ris bdag nyid phyir// chos kyi don du bdag nyid gnas la 'dod par 'gyur// de ltar des ni dam pa rnams kyis nges thob pa'i// thos pa las grub chos ni rnam pa sna tshogs byas// gang las bdag gi bus na
13a6(skyes rabs): bu yi ngo mthong nas// nags chel nyid du 'gro mi 'gyur zhes mgon bslangs so// bdag la yang dag gnas pa'i dpal ni bsrung 'dod pa'i// sa skyong rnams kyis sa la bu ni bsrung ba ste// chos ni 'dod pa'i ma yi dbang po de yis kyang
13b1(skyes rabs): yul rnams 'dor ba med par bu ni chos las bsrungs// byang chub sems dpa' yul la bde ba'i ro zhes thams cad kyang // sras bskyed pa na dpe med sems dpa' na gsu gsher gyur te/ de phyir nye bar bsags pa'i las ni rtswanas
13b2(skyes rabs): bskyed pa'i phyir// de ni zhi ba ma thob de srid dga' ba bsnyen par gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba snyan dngags chen po las/ btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas re zhig
13b3(skyes rabs): dus nas 'jam po'i rtsa rnams dang // khu byugs pho ni gyen du skang 'don rkang 'thung rnams// glu rnams dang ni nges ldan skyed mos tshal rnams ni// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan des ni thos par gyur// de nas bud med skye bo
13b4(skyes rabs): rnams ni dga' ba yi// grong khyer skyeng mos tshal gyi yid 'ong dngos thos te// khyim gyi nang du mngon par bkag pa'i glu bzhin du// phyi rol rab tu 'gro ba'i ched du blo mdzad do// de nas sras su mngon brjod yad khong de yi ni//
13b5(skyes rabs): dgongs pa mi skyong gis ni nges par thos gyur nas// brtse ba'i phun sum tshogs pas lang tshor 'ongs pa ru// ltang mo dag la rnam par gshegs par bka' stsal to// gzhon nu shin tu gzhon nu'i sems dang ldan pa ni// yang
13b6(skyes rabs): dag skyo ba'i semasu ma gyur zhes sems shing // nyam thag tha dad skye bo kun nas 'dus pa ni// rgyal po'i lam du phyir la rnam par bzlog pa ste// nying lag dman pa rnams dang dbang po ma tshang rnams// 'khog pa nad pa la sogs
14a1(skyes rabs): bkren rnams phyogs rnams su// de nas mchog tu zhi bas yang dag rab ston nas// rgyal po'i lam rnams drag ni mchog tu mdzes par byas// de nas dpal ldan rgyal po'i lam ni byas pa na// dpal ldan
14a2(skyes rabs): rnam par dul ba rjes 'brang gzhon nu ni// gzhal yas khyab pa'i logs nas dus su mngon babs nas// mngon par rjes gnang byas pa mi skyong la mngon gshegs// de nas mi dbang bu le mchi ma byung gyur to// mgo la nye bar
14a3(skyes rabs): bsgoms te yun ring rnam gzigs nas// song zhig ces ni tshig gi bka' dag bskul gyur la// brtse ba dag las de ni yid kyis ma btang ngo // nga nas nga na yang kyis ma btang // de nas de ni 'jom bu chu gser sgra 'dzin pa'i// legs par
14a4(skyes rabs): bsgribs po'i mgyogs 'gro bzhi yis sbyar ba yi// dbang po ma nyams mkhas shing gtsang la 'od zer 'chang // gser gyi rang bzhin shing rta la ni yang dag 'dzegs// de nas 'bras spos me tog 'bar ba rab bkram shing // phreng ba rnam
14a5(skyes rabs): dbyangs rab tu g.yo ba'i ba dan can// zla ba skar ma dang bcas par snang la bzhin du// 'brang ba rjes 'brang lam ni rab tu thob par gyur// ya mtshan gyur las rab tu rgyas pa'i mig rnams ni// ut+pal sngon po'i phyed 'dra rnams kyis bkram
14a6(skyes rabs): pa ni// rgyal po'i lam la ngal bus gshegs gyur te// grong khyer skye bo rnams kyis kun nas mngon par dga'// kha cig de la zhi ba'i yon tan gyis bstod la// de bzhin gzhan rnams gsal ba nyid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing // kha
14b1(skyes rabs): cig dag ni 'di la mngon du phyogs nas kyang // dpal dang tshe yi rnam par rgyas la shis pa brjod// zhar ba sgur po nad pa mi'u thung rnams kyi// tshogs pa rnams ni rigs chen rnams la nges dran nas// mi mo rnams ni nges par zhugs
14b2(skyes rabs): gnas phra rnams las// lha yi rjes 'gro rgyal mtshan bzhin du rab tu btudo// de nas gzhon nu nges par gshogs zhes gtam dag ni// bsgo bya skye las bud med rnams kyis thos gyur nas// bkur 'os skye bos mngon par rjes gnong byas
14b3(skyes rabs): pa rnams// blta bar 'dod pas lding khang shong du song bar gyur// yon tan ska rags brulnga zhing gegs byas de rnams ni// gnyid log rab tu song bas lta byed 'khrugs pa rnams// gnas lugs gtam gyis rnam par brgyan rnams
14b4(skyes rabs): rnam bzhag ste// ya mtshan gyur pas ngogs med par ni yongasu song // gzhal yas khang gi skad kyi 'og gi sgra rab dang // dril tshung sgra rnams dang ni gdu bu'i sgra rnams kyis// rnam par skrag gyur khyim gyi bya ba'i tshogs rnams ni// phan
14b5(skyes rabs): tshum shugs rnams las kyang yang ngag kun nas gtor// gang zhig 'dir+ya ni yan lag rab mchog ma rnams ni// myur ba rab tu skyes gyur tsam tsam skyes rnams kyi// 'o ma 'dzin rnams rgyas shing skyed smad shing rta ni// yangs pa rnams kyi
14b6(skyes rabs): lci ba nyid phyir 'gro ba bzung // mtha' gcig legs par rab tu sbyar ba'i rgyan rnams ni// rnam par sbas pa rnam par gsal pos ngo tsha bas// sgren por 'gro bar nus pa yin yang gzhan ma yis// 'gro ba nges par bzung ste myur min
15a1(skyes rabs): song bar gyur// phan tshun rab tu gcer bas ril por gyur pa rnams// yang dag drung las bskyod gyur rna lung 'khyil ba can// de dgra rnams kyi de tshe sgra bcas rgyan rnams ni// rlung bgrod skar khung rnams su
15a2(skyes rabs): rab tu zhi bar gyur// rlung bgrod skar khung rnams las rnam par 'thon pa rnams// phan tshun thang ched gyur pa'i rna lung 'khyil ba rnams// bud med rnams kyi 'angam skyes 'dra ba'i 'angam skyes zhal// lding khang rnams su bkod pa rnams ni rnam
15a3(skyes rabs): par mdzes// de nas khang bzang lang tsho ma rnams kyis khyab cing // ya mtshan la nI rab phye skar khung rnams kyis ni// lha mo dang bcas gzhal med rnaMs kyis na mkha' bzhin// dpal dang ldan pa'i grong khyer kun nas mdzes par gyur// skar
15a4(skyes rabs): khung rnams kyi rnam par spangs pa ma yin las// phan tshun 'gram par bkod pa'i rtswa lung can rnams kyi// 'dam skyes pad+ma rnams kyi tshogs rnams bcings pa bzhin// rab myos mchog mi rnams kyi zhal ni mdzes par gyur// gzhon nu de
15a5(skyes rabs): la lam du rnam par lta ba yi// bud med de rnams sa la 'gro 'dod ltar mdzes shing // gyen du gdong phyogs de la rab tu blta ba yi// mi rnams gnam la 'gro bar 'dod bzhin mdzes par gyur// lus dang dpal gyis mchog tu 'a
15a6(skyes rabs): bar gyur pa yi// rgyal po'i sras de mthong nas bud med de rnams ni// nges par dgongs par gzhan min bsam pa dag pa yis// 'di yi chung ma skal pa bzang zhes ngal bus smra// gzugs kyi dngos su me tog tog can dang mtshungs
15b1(skyes rabs): shing // rnam par ring zhing rgyas pa'i dpung pa can 'di ni// dpal nyid dor nas chos la nye bar gshegs zhes te// de la de dag rnams kyi zhes kho na byas// rnam par dul la gtsang zhing brtan pa'i cha lugs can// grong pa rnams kyi de ltar rgyal po'i lam
15b2(skyes rabs): khyab pa// de ni sngon du gzhon nus mthong nas dga' bas te// bdag gi srid pa gzhan ma cung zhig brtags pa 'dra// grong khyer de yang mtho ris bzhin du rab dga' ba// mngon par gzigs nas gtsang mar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis//
15b3(skyes rabs): gzhi skyong ba'i sras po yang dag bskul don du// 'khogs pa'i mi rgan rab tu 'gro bar sprul gyur to// de nas gzhon nu yis ni rga bas zil non zhing // mi rnams las ni tha dad dbyibs can de gzigs nas// g.yo ba med cing de nyid du ni
15b4(skyes rabs): zhugs pa'i spyam// chags par gyur cing kha lo 'dzin pa la smras so// mngon par nyer 'ong mi de su yin 'dren pa kye// skra rnams dkar zhing dbyug pa la ni lag pas brten// smin mas kun nas mig g.yogs 'khogs shing yan lag drung//
15b5(skyes rabs): 'gyur 'di ni tha mal gang 'dod yin na ma ci// de skad ces smra shing rta rab tu 'dren pa po// lha mchog de rnams de rnams nyid kyi blo ni rmongs byas shing // don ni bsrung bya yin yang skyon med mthong gyur te// de yis sa skyong bdag nyid skyes
15b6(skyes rabs): nges par gsol// gzugs kyi gnod byed stobs kyi rnam par zab po// rga ba rnams kyis 'joms byed mya ngan rnams kyis// dran pa rnams kyi nyams byed dbang po rnams kyi dgra// 'di ni rgas pa zhes bya gang gis 'di bcom mo// 'dis
16a1(skyes rabs): kyang byis pa nyid na 'o ma 'thungs gyur cing // dus kyi sa la yongs su gnyid log gyur pa ste// rim gyis lus rab ldan pa'i lang tshor gyur nas kyang // rim gyis de nyid kho nas rku bar nye bar song // de skad ces smras rgyal
16a2(skyes rabs): po'i bdag nyid skyes pa ste// cung zhig 'angar zhing kha lo sgyur la 'di skad skyes// skyon 'di kho bo la yang 'byung ba min nam ci// de bzhin 'di le kha lo sgyur ba yis gsol to// 'di ni na chong rab mchog tshe dang ldan pa'i yang // gdon mi za bar
16a3(skyes rabs): dus kyi dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin rgas pa gzugs kyi rnam par nyams pa por// 'jig rten pa yis shes pa nyid dang mthong ba nyid// de nas sngon gyi bsam pa dag pa'i blo mnga' ba// rnam rgyas bskal par bsags pa'i
16a4(skyes rabs): bsod nams las can de// rdo rje chen po'i sgra la nyesar ba lang bzhin// nus pa thos nas gzhon nu kun nas yi mug gyur// dbugs ni ring du rgyus nas rang gi mgo bsgral zhing // 'khogs pa de la spyan ni rnam par zhugs nas su// rga ba dang
16a5(skyes rabs): bcas skye ba de rnams gzigs gyur nas// sems ni khong du chud pa de yi tshig 'di smras// dran pa dang ni gzugs dang pha rol gnon pa yang // de ltar rgas pas rnam dpyod med par 'joms byas de// 'di lta bur ni mngon sum nyid du mthong
16a6(skyes rabs): yang // 'jig rten pa dag sgro mdo nyer 'gro kho na'o// de ltar seng na 'dren pa rta rnams phyir bzlog la// grong ni khyim nyid du ni sbyin par rab tu // rnas pa'i 'jigs tshe'i sem su gnas pa kho bo la// skyed mis tshal gyi sa la bde bogs 'ang /
16b1(skyes rabs): de nas rgyal po'i sras po de yi bka' lung gis// kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir la bzlog par gyur// de nas gzhon nus pho brang de nyid kho nar ni// bsam pa'i dbang gis stong pa bzhin du rab tu thob// gang gis tshe na der yang bde bA ma rnyed de// rgas pa
16b2(skyes rabs): rgas pa zhes ni rab tu yongasu rtogs// de nas mi dbang gis ni rjes gnang de ni slar// rim gyis de nyid kho nas phyi rol gshegs par gyur// de nas gzhan yang lus la nad dang yongs ldan pa// lha mchog de rnams nyid kyis bskyed cing sprul
16b3(skyes rabs): pa'i mi// zas gtsang rgyal po'i sras po spyan der srong nyid kyis// gzigs nas kha lo sgyur ba de nyid la smras pa// gsus pa sgom zhing dbugs dag spyod pa'i lus po can// lag pa cha shas zha zhing ring la skya bA lus// a ma zhes ni snying rje'i
16b4(skyes rabs): ngag dag smra ba po// gzhan la rten nas gnas pa'i mi de su zhig yin// de nas kha lo sgyur bas smras pa zhi ba kye// 'di yi khams ni rab 'khrugs rab stobs rab tu 'phel// nad ces bya ba mngon brjod shin tu don med chen po ste// nus kyang gang gis
16b5(skyes rabs): de ni rang dbang med par byas// rjes su brtse bcas mi ni de la gzigs bzhin du// rgyal po'i sras des slar ya'adi skad ces smras pa// skyes gyur skyon de so sor 'di nyid kho na'i 'am// nod kyi 'jigs la skye dgu rnams kyi ci la yin// de nas shing
16b6(skyes rabs): rta rab tu 'dren pa des smras pa// gzhon nu nyes pa de ni thun mong gyur pa ste// de ltar nang rnas dag ni yongasu gtser ba ni// nad thar phyin na 'jig rten dga' bar nye bar gshegs// de ltar don thos sems ni khong du chud pa ste// chu rlabs nang
17a1(skyes rabs): song ri bong can bzhin rab 'dar zhing // brtse ba thugs rje mnga' bas gsung ngag tshig 'di ni// cung zhig dngar ba'i dbyangs kyi rab tu smras pa'o// skye dgu rnams la rnam par zhen pa'i nad 'di ni// 'jig rten pa
17a2(skyes rabs): dag rang bzhin gnas shing blo gtang byed// mi shes rnam par rgya chen e ma mi rnams kyi// gang zhig nad las rnam par grol rnams bzhad gdo byed// 'dren pa'i phyi rol rab tu 'gro las phyir log la// mi dbang pho brang nyid du shing rta
17a3(skyes rabs): rab tu song // bdag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa thos nas dga' ba las// sems ni 'khums pa bzhin du rab tu bcom par gyur// de ltar lan gnyis phyir log de ni rab gzigs nas// sa yi bdag po yis kyang yongasu gros byas so// de
17a4(skyes rabs): yi phyir log nges pa'i mtshan ma thos gyur nas// bdag cag rnams ni 'di yis yang dag 'dor snyam ste// lam rnams gtsang mar lhag par byed pa po rnaMs la// khros shing 'khrugs kyang chud pa drag pos gcod pa med// slar yang
17a5(skyes rabs): sras po de la khyad par 'phags pa dang // ldan pa'i yul la rab tu spyod pa rnams mdzad cing // dbang po g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir yang tshugs snyam ste// bdag cag rnam par mi 'dor zhes ni mgon bslang so// gang gi tshe na sgyu sogs
17a6(skyes rabs): dbang po'i don rnams kyis// sras po 'di la pho brang 'khor na dga' bo med// de nas ro gzhan ro la gyur cig ces sems shing // phyi rol ltad mo la ni rnam par bka' stsal to// brtse ba las ni sras po'i dgongs pa rtogs nasu// /
17b1(skyes rabs): de la chags pa'i skyon rnams 'ga' zhig ma bsam nas// sgyu rtsal rnams la mngon par shes zhes res ma'i gtso// 'dzangs ma rnams la des ni yang dag bka' stsal to// de nas khyad par du yang mi yi dbang po'i lam// legs
17b2(skyes rabs): par brgyan byas nyid dang yongasu brtags pa la// 'dren pa dang ni shing rta rjes nas rgyal po yis// gzhon nu phyi rol du ni rab tu gshegasu gzhug/ de nas de ltar rgyal po'i bu ni gshegs pa na// lha mchog de rnams nyid kyis rnam
17b3(skyes rabs): par sprul pa yi// srog song shi bu'i ro de lam du btegs pa ni// 'dren pa dang ni gzhon nus mthong ste gzhan gyis min// de nas 'dren la rgyal po'i sras po des smras pa// zhan zhang sdug pa'i mi rnams dag ni rjes 'breng zhing // rgyan gyis
17b4(skyes rabs): brgyan pa yin yang kun nas du ba ste// mi bzhi rnams kyis btegs pa pha gi su zhig yin// de nas gtsang ba'i bdag nyid gtsang mar gnas pa yi// lha rnams ngag gis sems ni zil non 'dren pa po// des ni brjod par bya ba min kyang
17b5(skyes rabs): don 'di ni// don ldan dbang phyug la ni rab tu rnam par gsol// blo dang dbang po sgrog gi ston dang bral zhing // gnyid log ming bral rtswa dang shing du gyur pa ste// brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed nas bsrungs nas kyang // sdug pa
17b6(skyes rabs): sdug pa rnams kyis spangs pa de ni su yin nam// de ltar tshig ni rab tu 'dren pa las thos nas// cung zhig kun nas bskyod nas de nyid la smras pa// chos 'di nyid ni skye ba 'di nyid kyang gi 'am// mthar gyur 'di 'dra skye dgu kun gyi yin nam ci//
18a1(skyes rabs): de nas rab tu 'dren pas 'di nyid la gsol pa// mthar gyur las 'di skye dgu rnams ni kun gyi ste// dman dang 'brong dang bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyi// 'jig rten dag ni nges par rnam par nyams par gyur/
18a2(skyes rabs): de nas mi dbang sras po de ni brtan na yang // 'chi ba thos nas de ma thag tu yi mug cing // dpung pas shing rta'i shing gi rtse la rab 'khyud nas// gdangs snyan dang ldan dbyangs kyis rab tu smras pa'o// 'di ni nges par skye dgu rnams kyi mthar thug ste// /
18a3(skyes rabs): 'jig rten pa dag 'jigs pa spangs shing bag med la// mi rnams dag gi sems rnams sra ba snyam pa ste// lam la gnas rnams de ltar rang bzhin nyid du gnas// de phyir 'dren pa shing rta'i kha ni phyir bzlog dang // bdag cags la rnam par rgyu ba'i
18a4(skyes rabs): yul dus ni// nyam thag dus su rnam par nyams pa shes nas ni// sems dang bcas pa gang 'dra 'di na bag med yin// mi bdag bdag skyes kyis ni de skad smras na yang // de yis shing rta de ni phyir la ma bzlog ste// khyab par ldan pa yin yang mi
18a5(skyes rabs): dbang brtan pa la// pad+ma'i tshogs bcas nag nyid du ni gshegs par gyur// de nas me tog rgyas ldan gzhon nu'i rkang 'thung zhing // yongs su bskor zhing rab dga' mos pa'i khu byug can// gzhal med khang ldan pad+ma dang bcas mdzes pa'i rdzing //
18a6(skyes rabs): dga' ba'i tshal 'dra dge ba'i nags te gzigs par gyur// lha mchog mas bskor grong khyer rgyan byed bdag po'i gzhar// brtul zhugs gsar ldan thub pa bgegs kyi 'jigs pa bzhin// yan lag mchog ma'i tshogs khyab mi skyong bdag
18b1(skyes rabs): skyes sras// de nas stobs las nags der shin tu spyan drangs so// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan ngag chen po las/ thugs skyo ba skyes pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas skyed mos tshal de nas// ya mtshan gyis
18b2(skyes rabs): ni mgri g.yos rnams// bud med rnams ni khyo thob bzhin// mi skyong sras la mdun du 'ongs// 'ongs nas de la de rnams kyis// ya mtshon rabo rgyus spyan ma rnams// pad+ma'i mdzod 'dra'i phyag rnams kyis// 'phrin las yang dag spyod pa byas//
18b3(skyes rabs): g.yo med dga' ba rnam gsal ba'i// spyan mig rnams kyis 'thung ba bzhin// yid dkrug 'dod pas sems g.yengs rnams// de la yongasu bskor nos gnas// lhan skyes rgyan rnams kyis bzhin du// mtshan ni mdzes rnams kyis brgyan pa//
18b4(skyes rabs): 'dod lha lus dang ldan no zhes// de la mi mo do rnams snyam// zhi ba nyid phyir bstan nyid phyir// gsang ba'i 'od zer zla ba ni// sa la dngos su bab pa bzhin// de la kho cig rnams kyi shes// de yi lus kyis g.yengs de rnams// nges bzung
18b5(skyes rabs): lus ni rnams 'gyur zhing // phan tshun mig rnams kyis bsnun nas// dal bus dbugs ni rnam par brgyus// de ltar mi mo de rnams kyis// de ni mig tsam gyis mthong nyid// smra ba med cing dga' med par// 'di yi mthu yi non par
18b6(skyes rabs): gyur// de ltar de rnams rtsom bral zhing // snying rjes rnam par 'khrugs mthong nas// bram ze mdun na 'don gyi sras// blo ldan 'char kas tshig smras so// kun gyi sgyu rtsal kun shos shing // dgongs pa len la mkhas pa rnams// gzugs
19a1(skyes rabs): dang 'jungs dang ldan pa ste// rang gi yon tan gtsor phyin no// lus ngan gyi yang skyed tshol dang // byang gi sgra mi snyan na ya // yon tan 'di rnams kyis mdzes to// nor 'dzin 'don sngon nyid do// chags bral rnam sna da
19a2(skyes rabs): drang srong yang // khyed cag rnams kyis g.yo nus shing // lha mo rnams kyis shes pa yis// lha rnams la yang len par ro// dgongs pa shes dang rtse 'jo dang // 'dzangs dang gzugs ni phun tshogs pas// bud med rnams kyi chags nus na// skyes
19a3(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyi smos ci dgos// rnam pa de ltar rab sbyar ba// de yi rang gi spyod yul las// rnam pa de ltar spyod pa 'di// khyod kyi drang po'i tshig ma gyur// khyod kyi 'di ni ngo tsha bas// mig 'khums bag ma gsar pa yi// spyod pa dang mtshungs
19a4(skyes rabs): yang na ni// ba glang skyong gi chung ma'i 'os// gang yang 'di ni dpa' ba ste// dpal gyi mthu las chen po yon// bud med kyi yang gzi che ste// de phyir 'di yang nges par bya// sngon yang kA shi'i mdzes mA nI// smad 'tshod ma yis drang srong che// lha
19a5(skyes rabs): yis thub par dka' ba yang // drang srong rgyas pa rkang pas brdungs// mAn thal go ta ma dge slong ni// smad 'tshong gtso mo byin ma yis// dga' 'dod de yi don ched du// sngon gyi tshe na ro rnams bton// gau ta ma mun ring ming // drang srong chen po che
19a6(skyes rabs): ring po// kha dog dbyibs mchog ma yin pa'i// bud med kyis ni tshim par byas// drang srong rwa skyes thub pa mchog/ bud med yul la mi mkhas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs thabs rnams kyis// zhi mas de ltar blangs shing pham// sna tshogs bshes
19b1(skyes rabs): gnyen drang srong che// brtul zhug chen po bstan pa yang // lha mo mar bsrungs mas phrogs te// lo bcu rnams la nyi mar shes// drang srong de rnams de rnams sogs// bud med kyis bsgyur blangs gyur na// rol zhing lang tsho snga ma yis// mi bdag
19b2(skyes rabs): sras po smos ci dgos// de ltar gyur na yid ches shing // 'di ni mi skyong rigs kyi dpal// 'di las phyir phyogs ma yin pa// ji ltar de ltar nan tan mdzod// lang tsho ldan ma 'ga' zhig rnams// mtshungs pa'i skye bo 'phrig pa ste// mchog dang
19b3(skyes rabs): mchog min dag gi sems// len pa gang de bud med rnams// ngo ltar 'char ka'i tshig thos nas// bud med de rnams phug pa bzhin// gzhon nu len par rab mtshon te// bdag nyid yang dag kun nas 'dzegs// 'jigs las 'jigs
19b4(skyes rabs): bzhin yan lag ma// de rnams smin dang lha dang sgeg/ rgod dang rol dang 'gro ba yis// kun nas bskyod pa'i spyod pa byas// rgyu lnga po'i bka' lung sbyar phyir dang // gzhon nu nyid kyang 'jam phyir dang // rgyags pa yis ni myos pa'i phyir// yid
19b5(skyes rabs): mi ches la myur bar dor// glang mo'i tshogs dang thubs gcig tu// glang po gangs can nags na ltar// de nas maM mi'i skye bo yis// gzhon nu bskor zhing nags nA spyad// rnam par mdzes po'i skyed tshal na// lha mos bskor ba'i nyi ma bzhin//
19b6(skyes rabs): yid 'ong nags der gzhon nu de// bud med rnams kyi mdun 'gro 'bar// rnam par sgeg bcas gzhon nu ma// rgyags pas ma yangs de rnams dga'// sra zhing zlum rgyas lhan cig pa'i// nu ma rnams kyis de la dregs// dpung pa las brul
20a1(skyes rabs): 'jam ring gam+ba// lag pa'i ljon shrIng stobs meng ma// kha gcig bdun mon 'khrul pa ru// byas nas de la sto bas lus ltud // khyA tsog zangs mdzum mchungan// kha yi chung gi d+d+ho dag glos/
20a2(skyes rabs): gcig po dben par spyod cig ces// 'di yi rna bar shab shub byed// kha cig bka' lung stsol ba bzhin// byug pa gsher maso rab smras te// 'dir ni gus par gyis shig ces// rgod dang 'khyud dang 'dod pas so// kha cigs
20a3(skyes rabs): gser gyi ska rags kyi// cal col rnams kyi tsam tsom dang // phra mo'i dar gyis gos gyon zhing // 'di la ro smad ston cing bskor// yid dang yang du mos ma'i skyes// gzhan ma dar sngon nyil ba de// ska rags phan tshun sdud pa ni/
20a4(skyes rabs): mtshan mo glog phreng bzhin du mdzes// tsu ta'i yal ga me tog rgyas// bzung nas gzhan ni 'chang gyur la// gser gyi bum par mtshungs pa yi// 'o ma 'dzin pa ston par byed// kha cig pad+ma'i nags tshal nas// 'ongs nas pad
20a5(skyes rabs): bcas pad+ma'i spyan// pad+ma'i zhal gyi logs gnas shing // pad+ma'i dpal bzhin bsdad par gyur// rang gnas de la bskul ba bzhin// bslus par gyur ces mig rnams kyis// kha cig mngon par 'dren bcas lag/ don ldan
20a6(skyes rabs): dngar ba'i glu len no// dge ba'i gdong gis gzhan mas ni// smin ma'i gzhu ni rnam bkang ste// bskor gnas bstan dang rol pa yis// 'di yi spyod la rjes 'dod byas// rgyas zlum nu ldan kha cig ni// rgod pas rna lung g.yos gyur
20b1(skyes rabs): cing // khyod ni thob par gyur cig ces// mthon po rnams kyis bzhud cing smras// gzhan ni de bzhin 'gro 'dod pa// me tog phreng ba'i tsAr gyis bcings// kha cig cod bcas drangar mo yi// ngag gi zhags pa rnams kyis bzung //
20b2(skyes rabs): so sor 'bral ba don gnyer dga'// tsu ta'i snye ma bzung nas nI// me tog 'di ni gang gi zhes// rgyags par rnam par 'khrugs shing dris// kha cig 'gros dang cha lugs ni// skyes pa bzhin du byas nas ni// sa 'dir rgyal bar
20b3(skyes rabs): gyur cig kye// bud med kyis pham de la smras// de nas g.yo ba'i mig can 'gas// ut+pal sngon po snom byed cing // cung zhig rgyags skad tshig rnams kyis// mi skyong bdag skyes la smras so// gzigs shing jo bo tsU ta'i shing // me tog/
20b4(skyes rabs): sbrang rtsi'i dris khyab la// khu byug 'drir ni skad 'dron pa// gser gyi gur na bkag pa 'dra// mya ngan med pa'i shing 'di gzigs// 'dod pa can gyi mya ngan 'phel// bung pa 'dir ni sgra glegs pa// me yis tshig pa yin pa 'dra// tsu ta'i
20b5(skyes rabs): shing gis yang dag 'khyud// gzigs shing ti la ka yi shing // bud med lus ser chags pa yis// skyes pa gos dkar gon+da pa 'dra// rab rgyas sku ra ba ka gzigs// mA zos pa yi smug rtsi 'od// bud med rnams kyi sen 'od kyis//
20b6(skyes rabs): rma phab gyur te dud pa 'dra// gzhon nu mya ngan med 'di gzigs// 'dab ma rnams kyi spras pa gang // kho mo'i lag pa mdzes pa yis// ngo mtshar gyur te gnas pa 'dra// rdzing bu gzigs shing 'gram skyes pa'i// lcang ma rnams kyis
21a1(skyes rabs): rab tu bskor// dkar po'i dar gyi gos gyon pa'i// rab myos ma rnams nyal ba 'dra// bud med rnams la bdag nyid che// gzigs shig ngang pa chu 'di la// rgyab na bsgo bya'i bran bzhin du// dang mo rjes
21a2(skyes rabs): 'jug rjes su 'gro// rab tu ltos pa'i khu byug ni// skad grag sgra ni gson mdzod cig/ khu byug gzhan ni mngon sum du// kus 'debs brag ca'i sgra brnyan 'dra// mkha' la rgyud rnams kyi yang // rgyags pa dpyid kyis khyer te 'ongs//
21a3(skyes rabs): bsam bya min sems skye bo ni// shes rab can du rloms pa med// de ltar dar la bab pa rnams// yid dkrugs 'dod pas sems dregs shing // sna tshogs tshul ni de dang des// gzhon nu la ni nye bar brtsams// de ltar kun
21a4(skyes rabs): nas g.yengs na yang // bstan pas dbang po dkris pa de// 'chi bar bya zhes skyo byas shing // dga' dang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de rnams kyi ni gnas skabs de// gzigs nas skyes ma chog dam pa des// mnyam la skyo dang
21a5(skyes rabs): brtan pa yis// thugs kyi bsams par gyur pa'o// ci zhig bud med 'di rnams ni// lang tshe g.yo bar rtogs pa min// gang phyir gzugs kyi myos pa ni// gang zhig dga' bas nyams par 'gyur// gang gi nad du bying ba ru// nges
21a6(skyes rabs): par de rnams kyis mi mthong // 'gro ba nad kyi chos can la// 'jigs pa spangs te de ltar dga'// thams cad 'phrog byed 'chi ba yi// nges par mngon par shes min zhing // de ltar rang gnas skyo med par// rtsed mo dang ni bzhad gang byed//
21b1(skyes rabs): rga dang nA dang 'chi ba yang // shes ldan min na sems ldan su// rang gnas langs dang 'dug pa'am// nyal byed rgod pa smos ci dgos// nad dang 'chi ba nyid dang ni// mchog tu 'khogs gang de mthong nas// rang gnas gyur cing skyo med
21b2(skyes rabs): pa// ji ltar sems med de ltar de// me tog rnams dang 'bras bu yis// rnam par spangs par gyur pa'i shing // 'gyel lam yang na bcad pa ste// shing gzhan mdzes par byed ma yin// de ltar bsam gtan mchog mtho/
21b3(skyes rabs): nas// yul rnams la ni 'dod pa thal// 'char ka tshul lugs bstan bcos shes// mdza' bo nyid kyis de la smras// kho bo mi skyong gis byin te// khyod la glogasu nus pa lo// gang phyir khyod la smra 'dod pa// rab dga' ldan pa de
21b4(skyes rabs): phyir ro// phan pa min las rab 'gegs shing // phan pa la yang rjes rab 'jug/ sdug pa na yang yongs mi gtong // yongs rdzogs shes kyi mtshan nyid do// bdag med byams par dam bcas nas// skyes bu'i don la phyir
21b5(skyes rabs): phyogs pa// gal te khyod la btang snyoms byed// grogs po nyid kyang ma yin no// de phyir mdza' bor gyur nas smras// gzhon nu'i lus dang ldan pa ni// khyod kyi 'di 'dra bud med kyi// yul la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan min//
21b6(skyes rabs): de yi ngo tsha'i rgod don dang // bdag nyid dga' ba'i don nyid du// bden min gyis kyang mi mo yi// rje su 'jug pa rigs pa yin// yang dge 'dud dang rjes 'jug go/ bud med rnams kyi sems 'ching ste// brtse ba'i yon tan
22a1(skyes rabs): skye gnas phyir// yid la 'dod pa bud me yin// de phyir rnam par sbyangs pa'i spyan// snong la gzhan du byirar+ya bltas kyang // 'di yi tshul dang rjes mthun par// mkhas par rnam par dpyad par 'os//
22a2(skyes rabs): mkhas pa sman yin bud mod la// mkhas pa rab mchog rgyan yin no// mkhas pa dang bral gzugs dag ni// me tog med po'i nags dang 'dra// yang na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// bsam pa rang bzhin khas len
22a3(skyes rabs): mdzod// yul rnams rnyed par dka' thob nas// phyi shol byed pa 'os ma yin// sngon tshe lha yi dbang pos kyang // 'dod pa mchog ces shes byas nas// go ta ma thub pa'i bdag ldan ma// bshol med ma la 'dod pa byas/
22a4(skyes rabs): zla ba'i chung ma snar ma ni// drang srob ri byis don du gnyer// de nas de dang 'dra ba yi// bskam bya ma ni rnyed ces thos// u b+ha th+ya yi chung ma ni// rlung gi bu mo 'thun ma la// dka' thub chen po'i phur bu yis// b+ha ra d+ha dzi bskyed par
22a5(skyes rabs): gyur// drang srong phur bu'i chung ma ni// sbyin sreg ma la sbyin sreg mchog/ zla ba yis ni lag pa yau// lha yi las byed bskyed par gyur// sngon che bu mo nag mo ni// chur skyes pa las skyes ma la// rtsibs logs skyes ni chags skyes
22a6(skyes rabs): shing // ya mu na'i gling du phyin// gnod sbyin 'phreng ma rigs ngan ma// smod ma la ni dga' 'dod pas// gong ma srog ni za ba'i bu// thub pa gnas 'jog gis bskyed do// 'gro mogyogs rgyal po drang srong nyid// na tshong rnam par
22b1(skyes rabs): song ba yis// lha mo sna tshogs mchod mar bcas// sna tshogs shing rta'i nags su dga'// bud med 'grogs min zhi bA ni// skya bseng gis ni shes nas kyang // dga' ma'i gzugs yon gyis bkug ste// 'dod las skyes pa'i bde ba
22b2(skyes rabs): bsten// skyed mdzad rgyal po dmar ser yang // bram ze'i bu ma phrogs nas ni// na babs thob pa nyid yin kyang // yid dkrugs 'dod pa ma bsten min// de la sogs pa bdag nyid ches// yul rnams smad pa yin na yang // dag
22b3(skyes rabs): ba'i ched du longs spyad de// yon tan ldan la sngon nyid do// khyod kyang rigs pa lngas thob cing // stobs ldan gzugs ldan dar la bab// gang du skye 'gro 'di 'chags na// yul rnams la ni phyi shol byed// de ltar 'jam zhing lung
22b4(skyes rabs): dang bcas// de yis tshig ni gsan gyur nas// 'brug gi sgra skad dbyangs kyis ni// gzhon nu yis ni lan smras so// ngag tshig 'di ni 'thad pa ste// khyod la mdza' bo nyid du gsal// gang du bdag la ngan par sems// 'dir ni
22b5(skyes rabs): khyod la rjes zhi bgyi// yul rnams la ni phyi shol min// 'jig rten de'i bdag nyid du shes// 'gro ba mi rtag par shes nas// 'dir ni bdag yid dga' ba min// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum ma yin/
22b6(skyes rabs): no// yid du 'ong ba'i yul rnams la// kho bo yang ni dga' bar 'gyur// gal te bud med rnams kyi lus// de nyid rtag par 'gyur na ni// skyon ldan 'dod pa rnams la yang // kho bo'i sems ni 'dod la phyogs// gang tshe
23a1(skyes rabs): 'di dag rnams kyi gzugs// rgas pas 'thung ba 'byung 'gyur zhing // bdag nyid kyi yang 'dod med na// rmongs las der ni dga' bar 'gyur// rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i chos// rgan 'chi ba'i bdag nyid kyis// skyo ba med
23a2(skyes rabs): par rol pa ni// ri dgas dang ni bya dang mtshungs// bdag nyid chen po 'di rnams kyang // 'dod pa'i bdag nyid ces smras gang // rmongs las dor ni dga' bar 'gyur// rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i chos// 'dir ni skyo bar bya//
23a3(skyes rabs): bA ste// gang tshe de rnams kyi yang tshang // gang du tsI las zad pa ste// bdag nyid chen por mi sems te// yul rnams la ni chags pa'am// sbyor min bdag nyid ldan nyid kyis// mkhas pa yis kyang dpe brjod cing // bden
23a4(skyes rabs): min gyis kyang bud med kyi// skye la zhugs shes smras pa gang // de min bdag gis shes ma yin// gang du drung min rjes 'jug pa// de la bdag gi srid pa med// dngos po kun gyi tshogs pa de// gal te med na smod pa
23a5(skyes rabs): shog/ mi brtan pa yi dad pa dang // skyon du mthong ba'i nus pa yis// cha Da pa skyes par gyur pa'i seMs// bslu bar bya ba ci zhig yin// bu med skyes pa'i cha gaskyes shing / bud med skyes pa phan tshun du// gal te de ltar bslu na ni// lta bar nus pa nyid ma
23a6(skyes rabs): yin// de ltar gyur na sdug bsngal gyis// nyam thag rga 'chi'i skal ba can// bdag ni 'phags min 'dod pa la/ slu bar 'os pa ma yino// e ma shin tu brtan la stobs ldan khyod kyi sems// 'dod pa g.yo ba rnamasu snying po
23b1(skyes rabs): mthong gyur la// shin tu rno zhing 'jigs pa'i yul la zon mdzad cing // rga dang rgud pa nad kyi 'jigs pa rnam sems shing // 'gro ba rnams ni me yis tshig pa bzhin thos nas// zhi ba 'thob min brtan min dga' ba ga la zhig/
23b2(skyes rabs): the tshom med par 'chi zhes rab tu shes pa yi// mi rnams gang gi snying la chags pa rab bskyed pa// de yi sems ni lcags las gyur par shes pa ste// 'jigs pa che la chags pa gang zhig du ba med// de nas gzhon nu
23b3(skyes rabs): yis nI 'dod pa rnams kyi rten// 'joms byed gtam ni rnam par nges pa'i bdag nyid mdzad// skye bo rnams kyi mig gi 'gro bya gsal byed kyi// dkyil 'khor sa 'dzin ri bo la ni nub par gyur// de nas rgyas srog phreng ba 'bras
23b4(skyes rabs): med 'dzin// sgyu rtsal yon tan gyis dang rab dgas 'bras med rnams// rang gi sems la yid dkyog 'dod pa rnams smad nas// yid la re nyams bud med rnams ni grong du thal// de nas grong khyer skyed mos tshal song skye bo'i
23b5(skyes rabs): dpal// legs par brtags nas srong la so sor brtul te yang // thams cad mi rtag par gyur rnam par sems bzhin du// slar yang mi skyong bdag skyes grong du rnam par zhugs// de nas de yi yong ni yul la rnam par phyir
23b6(skyes rabs): phyogs rgyal pos thos gyur nas/ snying la song ba'i zug la glang chen bzhin du mtshan mo de la gnyid ma log/ de nas sngags mang rnam pa sna tshogs la mo rnams ngag gi thang chad blon por bcas// des ni 'dod pa las gzhan sras kyi bla yi
24a1(skyes rabs): nges pa gzigs ma gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas chen po las/ bud med kyis glegs byas pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de ltar yul rnams dam pa'i mchod
24a2(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyis ni// sred du bcug kyang shAkya'i rgyal po'i sras po de// dug bsgos mnga' yis snying la phug pa'i seng ge bzhin// bde ba rnyed pa ma yin brtan par gshegs ma gyur// de nas res 'ga' zhig nA blon po'i bu mkhas
24a3(skyes rabs): shing // grogs gyur sna tshogs gtam gyis rjes su 'brangs byas pa// nags kyi sa la 'gro 'dod lta bar 'dod bu yis// mi yi lha yis rjes snang phyi rol rab tu gshegs// gsar pa'i gser gyi srab dang dril bu chung ngu dang //
24a4(skyes rabs): rab tu g.yo ba'i rnga yab mdzes pa'i gser sgra dang // stan bcas dam pa'i rta lnga mngon par zhon nas ni// tog la ljon dang chu skyes tog can bzhin du gshegs// de ni mchog tu rnam par rgyang ring nags mtha'i sa// nags tshel 'dod dang
24a5(skyes rabs): sa yi yon tan las gshegs te// chu gnyer bzhin du rnam par bkram pa'i bshol lam can// nor 'dzin sa la zhing dag rmo ba gzigs par gyur// gshel gyis phya la zhang dag rma ba gzigs par gyur// gshol gyis phye las
24a6(skyes rabs): rnam bkram rtsa myug ku sha dang // sho gyur 'bu srin srog chags phra mos khyab pa ste// rnam par de 'dra'i sa de yang dag mngon gzigs nas// rang gi skye bo gsad pa la bzhin mya ngan gyur// zhing dag rmo ba'i skyes bu rnams ni rnam gzigs pa
24b1(skyes rabs): rlung gis gtor ba'i rdul gyis rnam 'gyur kha dog can// khur bas thang chang rnam par 'khrugs pa'i glang rnams la// 'phags pa mchog gi mchog tu brtse ba'i snying rje mdzad// de nas mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab nas dral bus babs nas
24b2(skyes rabs): ni// sa la rnam par rgyu zhing mya ngan dang ldan pa// skye bo dag gi skye dang 'god pa rnam sems shing // nges par bkren pa 'di ba zhes smras shing nyam thag gyur// bsam pa yis kyang rnam par dben pa mngon bzhed cing // rjes su 'ongs pa'i
24b3(skyes rabs): mdza' bshes de rnams phyir bzlog nas// kun nos mngon por g.yo zhing mdzes pa'i lo 'dabs can// 'dzam bu'i rtsa ba skye bo myed par de gshegs so// rin chen bai DUR+Sha dang mtshungs pa'i rtsa 'jam can// gtsang mar ldan pa'i
24b4(skyes rabs): sa gzhi der ni de zhugs te// 'gro ba'i skye ba dang ni 'god pa rnam sems shing // yi bA ni gnas shing brtan pa'i lam la dmigs pa'o// yul la 'dod sogs sems kyi nang las rnam grol ba'i// sems gnas pa ni de ma thag tu thob gyur
24b5(skyes rabs): la// bsam gtan dang po zag pa med pa'i rab skyong ba// rtog pa dpyod pa dang bcas zhi ba thob par gyur// rnam par dben pa las skyes thob nas de nas ni// mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba sems kyi ting nge 'dzin// yid kyis 'jig rten 'gro
24b6(skyes rabs): ba yang dag rab brtags nas// 'di nyid de nas gzhan ni rab tu rtogs par gyur// kye ma skye bo bkren pa gang zhig rang dbang ni// yod min rga dang na dang rnam par nyams pa'i chos// nad pa dang ni shi dang rga bas nyam thag gam// gzhan la
25a1(skyes rabs): rgyags pas long zhing shes pa med pas slod// 'dir ni gal te bdag gis rang dang mtshungs gyur pa// gzhan gyi rang bzhin dag la de ltar smod pa ni// mchog gi chos 'di rnam par rtog pa kho bo yi// mtshungs par gyur/
25a2(skyes rabs): pa ma yin nus pa'ang gzhan med do// 'gro ba'i rgyu dang na dang rgud pa'i nyes pa rnams// de ltar ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gzigs te yi// stobs dang lang tsho dang na srog la rab zhugs pa'i// bdag tu gyur pa'i rgyags pa skad cig gis med kyu/
25a3(skyes rabs): de ni dga' ba med cing rjes su gdung med la// the tshom som nyid ma gyur gnyid dang rmugs pa med// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yang dag ma chags shing // gzhan la rnam par sdang bar ma gyur phyi shol med// de ltar bdag nyid chen po
25a4(skyes rabs): de yi rdul med cing // rnam par dag pa'i blo glos 'di ni 'phel gyur la// skyes bu gzhan dag rnams kyis mthong bar ma gyur pa'i// dge slong cha lugs ldan pa'i skyes bu nye bar 'ongs// su zhig yin pa smos zhes mi yi lha sras kyis// de la
25a5(skyes rabs): mngon par dris gyur de la des smras pa// mi yi skyes mchog skye dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yis// thar pa'i phyir ni rab tu zhugs pa'i dge sbyong yin// bdag ni 'gro bzod pa'i chos ni thur 'dod cing // dge zhing 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas de tshol
25a6(skyes rabs): ba ste// yul rnams la ni chags pa'i nyes po phyir log pa'o// skye bo med pa'i gnas khang dang ni ri 'am nags// shing gi rtsa ba 'ga' zhig tu ni gnas pa yi// don dam phyir ni ji ltar nyer ldan slong mo ba// sred bral yongasu 'dzin pa
25b1(skyes rabs): med par rnam par rgyu// de ltar gzigs pa'i rgyal po'i sras po de nyid la// 'di skad smras nas na mkha' la ni gshegs par gyur// de ni de yi lus kyis sangs rgyas gzhan gzigs shing // lha na gnas pa de yi dran pa'i ched du
25b2(skyes rabs): 'ongs// mkha' la mkha 'gro bzhin du gshegs pa de la ni// mi mchog yang dag dga' bar gyur cing ya mtshan gyur// de nas chos kyi 'du shes nye bar thob gyur nas// mngon par nges 'byung cho ga la ni blo gros mdzad// de nas
25b3(skyes rabs): dbang po dang mnyam dbang po'i rta thul ba// grong la rab tu 'jug 'dod rta la rab 'jigs shing // 'khor gyi skye bo dag kyang mngon par 'dod pa ste// de nyid phyir na mngon 'dod nags ni ma bstan to// de ni rga dang 'chi ba zad par
25b4(skyes rabs): byed 'dod pa// nags su gnas phyir blo gros dran pa lnga bzung nas// gnyis 'thung dbang po nags kyis nas grong du ltar// 'dod pa las min grong la slar yang rab tu zhugs// de ni yang dag mthong nas shAkya'i bu mo zhog/ rab
25b5(skyes rabs): zhugs lam na thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas shing // kye ma spyan yangs gang gis bdag po 'di 'dra 'dir// mo daM bde ma mya ngan 'das ma zhes smras so// de nas dbyangs 'di sprin chen dbyangs dang ldan pa yi// yongasu thos
25b6(skyes rabs): nas mchog tu zhi ba rnyed gyur la// mya ngan 'das zhes sgra skad thos pa dang ldan des// yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba'i chos gar blo gros mdzad// de nas gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo'i sku mnga' zhing // glong chen phyag dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs
26a1(skyes rabs): khyu mchog spyan// seng ge'i stobs dang ri bong can gyi zhal mnga' bas// mi bzad chos la chags skyes pho brang rab tu thob// de nas mtho ris dag na lha yi mdun sa ru// lha dbang 'bar ba la ni kun
26a2(skyes rabs): 'gyed gzhon nu bzhin// blon po'i tshogs kyis nye bar bsnyen pa'i mi bdag la// ri dgas dbang po'i 'gros dang ldan pa mngon par gshegs// rab tu btud nas thal mo dang bcas smras gyur pa// mi dbang bdag la
26a3(skyes rabs): legs par rjes su gnang ba byin// nges par skye bo 'di ni rnam par 'bral ba ste// thar pa'i ched du yongasu rnam par gshegs par bgyi// de ltar de'i tshig nges par thos nas rgyal po ni// lag ldan gyis ni mngon bsnun
26a4(skyes rabs): ljon pa ltar g.yos shing // ka ma~M la dang rab mtshungs thal mo dag bzung nas// mchi ma dang ni gre ba kha zhing tshig 'di smras// brtse ba'i blo gros 'di ni rab tu thong mdzod cig/ khyed kyi chos la bsnyen pa'i dus ni ma yin
26a5(skyes rabs): te// na tshod dang po dang ni blo gros g.yo ba na// chos kyi spyod pa gsungs pa rnams ni skyon mang ngo // yul rnams su ni dbang po ya mtshan glo bur zhing // brtul zhugs g.yo ba rnamasu nges par nus med la// khyad par du ni
26a6(skyes rabs): dben par mngon par mi shes pa// dar la bab pa'i yid ni dgon pa nas g.yo'o// mtshon gyur khyod la phun sum tshogs pa gtad nas ni// kho bo yi yang chos dga' chos kyi dus yin te// rnam par gnon pa brtan pa rnam
26b1(skyes rabs): par gnon pa yis// bla ma spangs nas khyod kyi chos kyis chos ma yin// de phyir khyod kyis nan tan nges pa 'di dor la// khyod ni re zhig khyim gnas chos la dga' bar gyis// dar la bab pas bde ba rnams ni longs spyad nas//
26b2(skyes rabs): skyes bu'i dka' thub nags su 'jug pa nyams dga'o// de ltar rgyal po'i tshig 'di rnam par gsan nas ni// kA la ping ka'i dbyangs kyis lan ni smras pa ste// rgyal po gal te bdag gi khas len bzhi rnams// khyod kyis 'gyur na
26b3(skyes rabs): dka' thub nags ni mi bsnyen to// bdag gi srog ni 'chi ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhing // bdag gi rang gnas gyur 'di nad kyis mi 'phrog la// bdag gi lang tsho rgas pa yid ni mI g.yeng zhing // phun sum tshogs pa 'di ni rgud pas ma gtor
26b4(skyes rabs): nA'o// de ltar snyed par dka' ba'i don smras gyur pa yi// sras po la ni shAkya'i rgyal pos tshig smras pa// shin tu rab tu zhugs pa'i blo 'di thong mdzod cig/ shin tu yid la re ba 'phya zhing sha thang 'chad// de nas lhun po ltar
26b5(skyes rabs): lcis bla ma la smras pa// gal te rim pa de dag med de shol mi thebs// 'bar ba'i me yis tshig pa'i khang pa nas// phyi rol 'byung bar 'dod pa 'dzin par nus ma yin// gang gi tshe na 'gro ba nges par 'bral ba ste// chos phyir
26b6(skyes rabs): ma yin 'di ni rnam par 'bral bar mchog/ 'o na bdag la 'chi bas dbang med 'bral byed cing // rang gi don ma byas shing tshim pa ma yin nyid// de ltar mthar bzhed sras po de yis nges pa ni// sa yis bdag po yis ni nges par thos
27a1(skyes rabs): nas ni// 'gro bar mi bya zhes ni mngon par brjod nas su// slar yang bsrung ba dag ni 'dod pa mchog rnams mdzad// dga' zhing zhi ba sngon 'gro bkur sti mang po las// blon po rnams kyis ji lta
27a2(skyes rabs): ba bzhin dpe bskrun cing // bla mas mchi ma lhung ba rnams kyi shol btab sti// de nas de ni mya ngan bzhin du khyim la zhugs// nA lung 'khyil bu g.yo bas 'o byas gdong ldan ma// dbugs rlung stug pos rnam par bskyod pa'i nu ma tsan//
27a3(skyes rabs): brtan pa min pa'i mig ldan bud med rnams kyis ni// ri dwags mo rnams kyis bzhin mngon par gyen du lta// gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra dkar ser mdog de ni// yan lag mchog ma rnams kyi snying ni myos mdzad cing // ngag dang reg
27a4(skyes rabs): bya dang ni lus dang yon tan gyis// thos byed lus dang lta byed bdag gi dngos rnams phrog/ nyin mo rnam par thal tshe de nas khang bzangs la// lus kyis nyi ma bzhin du mngon par gsal ba ni// rab rib rnam par 'joms 'dod bdag
27a5(skyes rabs): nyid snang ba yis// nyi ma shar ba lhun po la bzhin kun nas 'dzegs// gser gyis 'bar zhing gsal ba'i sgron ma'i shing dang ni// a ka ru mchog nag po'i bdug pas gang ba'i ltor// mngon par 'dzegs nas rdo rjes spras
27a6(skyes rabs): shing sna tshogs pa// rab mchog gser gyi bzhugs gdan la ni bsnyen pa'o// zla ba ltar dkar gangs dang ldan pa'i rtse mo na// nor dbang bdag nyid skyes la lha mo'i tshogs 'dus bzhin// de nas lus mchog ma rnams
27b1(skyes rabs): dbang po dang mtshungs mchog/ de la mtshan mor sil snyan rnams kyi nye bar gnas// mchog rab lha yi sil snyan 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang // de yang de yis bskyed par ma gyur dga' ba med// dam pa'i don gyi bde phyir legs
27b2(skyes rabs): pa de yi ni// mngon par nges par 'byung 'dod gang la dga' ma gyur// de nas der ni brtul zhugs mchog gyur 'og min gyi// lha rnams kyis ni 'di yi nges po rtogs nas ni// lus kyi rnam 'gyur rnam par 'gyur byas dus
27b3(skyes rabs): gcig la// mos pa'i skye bo rnams ni gnyid du 'gro bar byas// dri la kha cig dga' ba yin yang 'khros pa bzhin// pang du son pa'i gser gyi snod na sna tshogs pa'i// pi wang rnam par spangs nas lag pa g.yo ba la// 'gram
27b4(skyes rabs): pa rnam par bkod nas nyul bar gyur pa'o// 'khyog min bum pa'i phreng ba sgra sgrogs pad+ma dang // chu bo'i dog na chu sbur rab tu rgod pa bzhin// gzhan rnams nu mar rnam nyil dkar po'i dar gon zhing // gling bu lag par 'byar zhing
27b5(skyes rabs): gnyid log rnam par mdzes// de bzhin gzhan rnams pad+ma gsar pa'i snying po ltar// 'jam zhing gdung byA g+haser gyis byabar ba'i dpung brgya nA ni// 'dus pa'i lag pa dag gis dga' ba bzhin du ni// rdzu rnga nyid ni yongasu 'khyud nas
27b6(skyes rabs): gnyid log gyur// de bzhin gzhan ni gsar po'i gser gyis rnam brgyan cing // bgo ba'i gos ni ser po mchog dag gon pa ste// kar ni ka ro'i yal ga glang pos bsgyel ba bzhin// dbang med par ni sdug ma gnyid kyis 'gyel
28a1(skyes rabs): bar gyur// de bzhin gzhan ni skur khung logs la sbas nas ni// nyal bar gyur pa'i lus kyi mchod sdong rnam 'khyog pa// rta babs la ni shA ya b+han dzA kra bzhin du// mdzes pa'i do shal rnam par
28a2(skyes rabs): 'phyang ba rnam par mdzes// de bzhin gzhan gyi zhal gyi pad+ma rnam rgyas shing // 'gram pa'i logs la nor bu'i rna lung gis dmugs pa// mdab ma brgya pa'i sdong bu'i phyed ni khyog pa la// gnas pa'i ka ri Na Da bas spyod
28a3(skyes rabs): bzhin g.yos par gyur// gzhan ni ji ltar rnam par zhugs bzhin gnyid log cing // nu ma'i khur gyis mngon par dud pa'i lus po rnams// lag po'i zhugs pa gser gyi gdu bu can rnams kyis// phan tshun nye bar
28a4(skyes rabs): 'khyud nas rnam par gnas te mdzes pa'o// rnam par g.yo zhing bskyod pa'i gser gyi skud pa can// rna ba'i shog dril kun nas 'khrugs pa'i gdong gis ni// yongs su smra ldan pi wang chen po 'khyud nas ni// bud kha cig grogs
28a5(skyes rabs): mo bzhin du gnyid log go// lang tsho ma gzhan lag pa'i dpung pa'i yul las ni// kun nas rnam 'phyang mdzes pa'i log can pa Na wa// sgeg bcas dga' ba'i mthar ni thang chad sdug pa bzhin// brla gnyis dag ni dbus su
28a6(skyes rabs): blangs nas nyal ba'o// rab tu yang dag 'khums gyur pad+ma dmar po'i mdzod// nyi ma nub par gyur tshe rdzing bu rnams ji ltar// rnam rgyas mig dang mdzes pa'i smin ma yod na yang // gzhan rnams mig rnams btsums
28b1(skyes rabs): shing mdzes par ma gyur to// de bzhin gzhan ni mgo skyes lhod pa las 'khrugs shing // rgyun dang dar rnams dpyi la rnam nyil de rnams ni// yan lag ma yi gzugs brnyan glang pos bcom pa bzhin// mgrin pa'i skud pa'i ngo
28b2(skyes rabs): shal rnam par bkram zhing nyal// brtan ldan lus ni ston rnams dang ldan na yang // gzhan rnams kyang ni dbang med ngo tshas rnam spangs shing // rnam par 'gyur zhing skyong pa'i yan lag gya gyu dang // dbugs ni rnam par rgyu zhing
28b3(skyes rabs): lus po gsal bar gnyid// gzhan ni rgyan dang me tog phyeng ba rnam brul zhing // mdud pa'i gos rnams rnam par nyil gyur 'du shes med// btsums pa ma yin dkor po g.yo ba dang bral mig/ srog song ro ltar nyal ba rnam
28b4(skyes rabs): par mdzes ma gyur// kha sbyar rnam par gdangs te lus po rA ba brkyang zhing // kha yi chu nI rab 'dzag gsang ba rnam rab gsal// gzhan ma dag ni chang gris 'khrul par gyur pa nyid// lus rgyas rnam par 'gyur bar gnyid log
28b5(skyes rabs): mdzes ma gyur// de ltar sems pa dang ni rigs kyi rjes 'gro'i gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rab myos skye bo de nyal ba// rlung gi kun nas bskyod gyur gser gyi pad+ma yi// rdzing bu dang ni mtshungs pa'i gzugs ni mdzes par gyur//
28b6(skyes rabs): de ltar rnam par 'gyur la brtan min spyod pa can// de ltar nyal ba'i lang tsho ldan ma de mthong nas// lus ni yon tan ldan zhing smra ba yid 'od yang // mi sbyong sras po des ni rnam par smad par gyur// mi gtsang rnam par 'gyur
29a1(skyes rabs): ba gson pa'i 'jig rten te// bud med rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo 'di 'dra ba// bgo ba rnams kyang brgyan rnams kyis kyang slu ba ste// bud med rnams kyis yul la skyes pa chags par 'gro// gal te skyes pas bud med
29a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// rmi lam rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin du rnam dpyad na// nges par 'di rI bag med 'phel ba ma yin lo// 'on kyang yon tan rtog pa bcom ste chags par 'gro// de ltar de yi go skabs rnam par rig nas ni// mtshan mor
29a3(skyes rabs): phyi ru 'gro 'dod yang dag skyes par gyur// 'di yis sems ni kun nas rtog nas de nas ni// lha rnams drag gis khang pa'i sgo ni phye bar gyur// de nas ljang tsho ldan ma nyal ba de rnams ni// smad cing de ni lding khang logs nas babyas pa ste// mngon
29a4(skyes rabs): por babs nas de nas som nyi rnam bral bar// khang pa'i rim pa dang por phyi ru rnam par gshags// de ni mgyogs 'gro bsrung la go bar byas nas ni// skyen par 'dun pa la ni 'di skad ces smos so// bsdigs ldan rta ni khyer shog myur ba dang
29a5(skyes rabs): ldan pas// bdud rtsi thob phyir 'di las di ring bdag skom mo// bdag gi snying la de ring tshim pa skyes gyur cing // nges pa yang ste tri ltar blo gros la zhugs la// skye bo med pa la yang mgon dang ldan pa ste// nges par 'dod pa'i don ni
29a6(skyes rabs): mngon du phyogs par 'du// ngo tsha nyid dang yang dag 'dud pa spangs nas ni// lang tsho ma rnams bdag gi gdong du ji bzhin nyal// sgo ni rang bzhin ji ltar rnam par bye ba la// nges par bdag ni 'di nas di ring 'gro ba'i dus// mi dbang bstan pa'i
29b1(skyes rabs): don ni rnam par rig na yang // jo bo bka' lung des ni de nas rab bzung nas// yid la pha rol po yis yang dag bskul ba bzhin// mgyogs 'gro khyer te 'ong ba la ni blo gros byas// de nas gdong gi gser gyi srab kyis gang ba/
29b2(skyes rabs): ste// rgyab na yang ba'i stan g.yogs dag gis nye bar g.yogs// stobs dang sems dpa' mgyogs dang rjes 'gro nyer ldan pa// de yis rta mchog de la dir ni nye bar 'ongs// snga mu'i rtsa ba rtsib log gsum ga rab rgyas shing // rgyab dang /
