29b3(skyes rabs): rna ba lus skyes spu ni thung zhing dul// rgyab kyi sgrib ma dag ni dud cing rnam rgyal lnga// mchu dang bral ba byung dang dbye ni rab rgyas pa'o// zhi zhing ka ma la dang mtshungs pa'i phyag gis kyang // sku stong rnam par spangs des de la nyeraro 'khyud nas// rgyal
29b4(skyes rabs): mtshan sde lnga dmag dpon rab tu 'jug pa bzhin// mngar mo'i yi ge'i tshig gis zhal tu mjed pa'o// g.yul du khyod la mngon par zhon nas sa skyong gis// dgra bo rnams ni lan grangs mang por nges par gtor// bdag kyang 'chi med glo 'phang
29b5(skyes rabs): ji lta ba bzhin du// mgyogs 'gro'i gtso bo nye bar thob pa de ltar mdzod// yul thob bde ba la dang nor bsgrub pa la rung // g.yul 'gyed pa na 'khor ni nges par rnyed bla ste// rgyud par lhung ba la dang chos la brten par rung // skyes bu yi yang
29b6(skyes rabs): 'khor ni rnyed par dka' ba'o// 'di nyid du yang gang zhig 'khor du gyur pa ni// sdig pa'i las la dang ni chos dang ldan la rung // ji ltar bdag gi nang gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa// mi de rnams kyang de yi cha shas skal ba yis// de phyir chos dang
30a1(skyes rabs): ldan pa 'di ni yongs shes nas// bdag ni 'di las nges 'byung 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// mgyogs 'gro mchog skye shugs dang rnam par gnon pa yis// bdag phan la dang 'gro bran la ni 'bad par gyis// de ltar
30a2(skyes rabs): mdza' shes bzhin du rjes su bslabs nas ni// mgyogs 'gro mchog la mi mchog 'gro 'dod de// dkar la dkar min 'gros kyi 'od zer lus ldan pa// nyi ma ston ka'i sprin la bzhin du yang dag 'dzegs// de nas 'khor gyi skye bos go
30a3(skyes rabs): bar byed pa'i skad// mtshan mor gtum pa dam pa'i rta des yongs bkag cing // 'gram pa'i sgra med 'tsher pa'i skad ni rab zhi bar// 'jigs pa'i sgre ni rab zha bor// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni dor ba'i gom pa'i 'gros kyis gshegs// gser
30a4(skyes rabs): gyi gdu bu'i rgyan ni lag pa'i 'khrig ma lA// ka ma la 'dras kla ma la rnams rnam byas nas// lus 'dud gnod sbyin rnams ni de nas 'di yis ni// tshim gyur lag pa'i rtse mos rmig pa rnam bzung ngo // lci mo'i sgo gtan sgo glegs yang dag
30a5(skyes rabs): bcas pa gang // bde bar gnyis mthung gis kyang phyed pa ma yin pa// mi skyong sras po gshegs che skad med grong khyer dang // sgo khang de rnams rang nyid rnam par bye bar gyur// mngon par gdong phyogs yab dang sras po byis pa dang // /
30a6(skyes rabs): skye bo rje su chags dang phun tshogs mchog dang ni// blo gros byas shing ltos pa med par dor nas ni// yab kyi grong nas de ni de nas rnam par gshegs// de nas de ni rnam rgyal 'dam skyes yangs po'i spyan// grong khyer kun nas gzigs
30b1(skyes rabs): nas seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa// skye dang 'chi ba dag gis pha rol ma mthong bar// grong khyer ser skya zhes bya rab tu mi 'jug go// de ltar de yi gsung 'di nges par thos nas ni// nor gyi bdag po'i 'khor rnams dag ni dga' bar/
30b2(skyes rabs): gyur// rab tu dga' ba'i yul can lha yi tshogs rnams ni// nan pha rol song ba de la bsngags po byas// me yi lus can mtho ris gnas pa gzhan rnams ni// 'di yi nges pa shin tu dka' ba rnam rig nas// sprin sdug gseb
30b3(skyes rabs): nas zla ba'i 'od zer 'thon pa bzhin// mtshan mo'i mun pa'i lam ni rab tu bsal bar byas// nyi ma'i mgyogs 'gro lta bu'i mgyogs 'gro de// yid kyis sprul pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu bzhin du// shing rta 'dren pas gzi nyam
30b4(skyes rabs): skar ldan par snang la// de ni shin tu mang po'i dpag tshad rnamasu gshegs// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las// phyi rol tu mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
30b5(skyes rabs): de nas 'gro mig nyi ma ni// sngon par shes pa'i yud tsam na// ngan spong bu yi dka' thub gnas// mi mchog dris ni gzigs par gyur// blo pab gnyid log ri dregs dang // rang gnas gnas par bya gang zhig/ gzigs nas ngal
30b6(skyes rabs): bsos bzhin du dang // don ni byas pa bzhin du gyur// de ni rgyags pa med don dang // dka' thub mchod pa'i don nyid dang // rang gi rjesu bsrung ba la// rta yi rgyab nas babs par gyur// mngon par babs nas kyang reg cing // dga' zhing mig
31a1(skyes rabs): gis 'khru ba bzhin// nges par 'khor zhes rta dang ni// 'dun pa la ni smras pa'o// 'di ni mkha' lding dper mgyogs la// mgyogs 'gro la ni rje su 'ongs// 'dis ni bdag gi stobs dang ni// zhi ba bdag la gus pa brtan//
31a2(skyes rabs): thams cad nas don gzhan yin kyang // khyod kyis snying la bzung ba ste// gang gi rdzi bo dag la dga'// 'di ni de 'dra ba dag la nyid// gus pa med la nus pa yod// nus pa med la gus pa ldan// gus pa ldan dang nus pa ste// khyod
31a3(skyes rabs): 'dra sA stengs rnyed par dka'// de phyir skal ba chen po'i las// khyod kyis 'dis ni bdag dga'o// gang zhig khyod kyi bsams pa 'di// 'bras bu las kyang gzhan du phyogs// skye bo 'bras bu la gnas pa'i// mthun phyogs skye bo
31a4(skyes rabs): gang gis min// zlog la rang gi skye bo yang // phal cher pha rol skye bor gyur// rigs kyi don du bu bzung zhing // gsos pa'i don du pa bskyed la// sred pa'i bsam pas chags skye ste// byed pa med par rang nyid med// mang po brjod cing
31a5(skyes rabs): mdor bsdus nas// bdag gi dga' chen legs byas te// rta blangs nas ni phyir log dang // bdag ni 'dod pa'i gnas rab thob// de skad smras nas phyag chen de// rje su bsngags pa byed 'dod pas// rgyan rnams kun nas btogs nas ni// /
31a6(skyes rabs): gdung sems ldan pa 'di la byin// dbu rgyan dag nas nor bu gsal// sgron ma'i las la blangs nas ni// nyi ma 'bigs byed la bzhin des// tshig 'di smras bzhin bzhugs par gyur// 'dun pa nor bu 'di long la// lan mang btud nas
31b1(skyes rabs): mi skyong ni// kun nas gdung ba bzlog pa'i phyir// blo 'phebs par ni gsol bar bya// skye dang 'chi ba nyams don du// dka' thub nags tshal rab thob ste// mtho ris sgom pas nges min zhing // brtse ba med min khros pa min// de phyir de ltar mngon
31b2(skyes rabs): byung ba// bdag la mya ngan 'os ma yin// yun rings 'dus par gyur nas kyang // dus kyis 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang phyir nges par 'bral ba ste// de phyir thar phyir bdag gi blo// slar yang rang gi skye bo las// rnam par 'brel ba gang las
31b3(skyes rabs): min// mya ngan spong phyir nges 'byung ba// bdag la mya ngan pos ma yin// mya ngan rgyud ni 'dod la chags// chags pa can la mya ngan bya// 'di yang snga ma rnams la grags// kho bo cag la nges par gnas// de ltar ster byar gyur pas na// mya ngan
31b4(skyes rabs): 'os min lam gyis 'gro// skyes bu rnams la phyin log tu// nor gyis gter byar gyur pa ste// sa la chos kyi bdag po yang // rnyed dka' yang ni ma yin no// gang yang 'di ni dus min par// nags su song ba yin zhe na// srog kyang
31b5(skyes rabs): g.yo bar gyur pa na// chos la dus yod ma yin no// de phyir da lta nyid du bdag/ dge ba bsag ces nges pa de// 'chi ba'i dgra ni gnas pa na// gson pa la ni blo gtad cing // zhi ba khyod kyis de la sogs// sa 'dzin bdag la zhu bya ste// /
31b6(skyes rabs): ji ltar bdag ni mi dran pa// de ltar nyid du 'bad pa gyis// gzhan yang bdag la yon tan med// khyod kyis mi bdag la smra bya// yon tan med las brtse bar 'dor// brtse ba dor las mya ngan med// de ltar tshig 'di thos gyur nas// 'dun
32a1(skyes rabs): ba kludung bas rnams 'jugs shog// bachomapa 'du na nyid rtsog// ma sbyar to lan gsas pa/ khyod thos dgangs pa no// gnyen la ngal basbyor ba 'das// chu bo'i 'gram na gnyis 'byung
32a2(skyes rabs): bzhin// bdag gi sems 'di 'gyur ba'o// khyod kyi nges pa 'di lta bus// su yis mchi ma 'byung ba med// lcags las gyur pa'i snying la'ang ste// brtse bas 'khrugs la smos ci dgos// gzhal med khang gi lam 'os pa'i// /
32a3(skyes rabs): shin tu gzhon nu 'di gang na// ku sha'i myu gu rno ba can// dka' thub nags kyi sku gung na// khyod kyi 'ab bzos nas kyang // rta gang bdag gis blangs pa 'di// mgon po de ni stobs kyis ni// lha yis byed du bcug pa 'dra// khyod kyi
32a4(skyes rabs): nan tan nges pa 'dra// rang dbang shes na gang gi phyir// nye bar len te mgyogs 'gro'i rta// ser skya'i gzhi yi mya ngan gnas// med pa po yis dam chos bzhin// rgyal po brtse ba bgyes pa dang // smras po sdug go 'dor ba ni// phyag
32a5(skyes rabs): chen de ni 'os ma yuna?// dam pa'i bya ba byed bcom bzhin// yang dag bskyed pas yongasu ni// thang chad gnyis pa'i ma de dang // lha mo brjod par 'os ma yin// ma ning gis ni dpal thob bzhin// sras po byis pa yon ldan
32a6(skyes rabs): rigs btsun bdag po'i brtul shugs ma// lha mo 'dor bar 'os ma yin// bsngags 'os sras po grags pa 'dzin// snyan grags chos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ zhen pa ldan pas grogs mchog bzhin// byis pa 'dor bar 'os ma yin
32b1(skyes rabs): ci ste gnyen dang rgyal skyid dag/ 'dor ba nyid du blo gros mdzad// bdag gi 'gros ni khyod zhabs na// khyab bdag bdag 'dor 'os ma yin// ra g+hu'i bu ni ba shes bzang bzhin// khyod ni dgon par dor nas su// me yis tshigs
32b2(skyes rabs): pa'i sems kyis ni// grong du 'gro bar nus pa med// khyod 'dor grong du 'gro ba na// rgyal pos bdag la ci zhig gsung // khyod kyi btsun mo'i 'khor du 'am// 'os pa mthong na ci zhig smra// gang yang yon tan med pa yang // mi
32b3(skyes rabs): bdag la spros gsung ba gang // skyon med thub pa'i bzhin khyod kyi// mya gyur pa de ci zhig smra// blo che dang bcas sems kyis ni// lce ni thigs par gyur pa yis// bdag ni gal te yang smra ba// de la dad par 'os pa su// gang zhig zla ba
32b4(skyes rabs): bo'orno bar// smra bar dad par 'dzin po 'am// khyed kyis skyon shes des skyon ni// smra ba dad par 'dzin pa 'am// rtag tu rjesu brje bcas dang // rtag par snying rje shes pa yi// brtse ba spong ba tshul min te// phyir log bdag la bka' drin
32b5(skyes rabs): mdzod// de ltar mya ngan gyis non pa'i// 'dun pa'i tshig 'dri gsan gyur nas// rang gnas mchog tu brtan pa yis// smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal to// 'dun pa bdag dang bral ba la// kun nas gdung bya 'di thong zhig/ lus can 'gro
32b6(skyes rabs): pa tha dad la// dgos pa sna tshogs nges pa yin// gang yang brtse las rang gi skye// bdag gis rang ni mi 'dor te// 'chi bas phan tshun dbang med par// bdag cag rnams ni 'dor bar 'gyur// srid pa chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi// mngal gang
33a1(skyes rabs): smyasan tu ga / ya 'a sa/ sa dag kyi sa // smra ng+gA sa smras / dusasu su ma byu ba // stsu ma 'dus pan/ 5
33a2(skyes rabs): 'phrul ba bshA yin no/ ji ltar snin rnams du nas ni// s+yAd srung rnam par 'byed pa'o// de ltar 'dra dang 'bral ba ni// bdag dang srog chags rnams kyi lugs// gling gis byi na 'jig rten 'dr-I// bas nus rnam pa
33a3(skyes rabs): s+t+wa~M// de bye dus gyur lo// bdag gi po nyid bze ma yin// shing rnams 'dab ma dmar po dang // lhun cig skyes te rnam par 'bral// gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'bral byor ni// 'gyur ba ma yin sbyis sti dgos// de
33a4(skyes rabs): gyu ni// nubs ma byung so// te spyang ni snru ba sa/ song nas pa ni sbya ba la sa byas pa na // so kyi mtha~M nig dang / 'a ma
33a5(skyes rabs): b+h+rUM nga gyi na no// yang na sgyur du 'ong ba gtus/ pa nyas da na sa ng+yam+b+ha/ na nyams par hU~M dz+dza ts+tsha/ pa smos na// sa ldan ma thogs 'gro mchog ga hU~M/
33a6(skyes rabs): drug // ma dri mi sbyang bar gyur// dra ba dang ni bkra shis chags// 'tsha lo dbus ldan phyag gis zhigazhan sa de la reg gyu cing // na tshad bzhin du rnam par smras// sngags ldam/
33b1(skyes rabs): 'don cig/ dam pa'i rta nyid 'di bstan to// sron mdzod khyod kyi ngal ba 'das// myur du 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur// de nas ral gri rnon po nor bu'i yu ba can// gser gyi phra ni sna tshogs dang ldan 'dun pa yi// lag na yang
33b2(skyes rabs): ngag gnas pa brtan pa des bsnams nA// khung bu dag nas sbrul bzhin 'uT nA rab tu dang // ut+pa la yi 'dab ma ston po de drangs nas// sna tshogs dbu rgyan dbu skar bcas pa rab bcad cing // rdzing bu dag ni ngang pa bzhin du rnam bkram pa//
33b3(skyes rabs): 'od zer dang ldan par snang dag la de gtor ro// mchod pa mngon par 'dod phyir rnam mang bkur sti'i phyir// lha ni gnas pas rab tu bkram pa de bzung ste// ji lta ba bzhin de ni lha ni lha tsho sde rnams// lha yi khyad par 'phags
33b4(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas// rgyan gyi bu smad ldan pa rnam par spangs nas kyang // dbu las dpal ni rnam par rgyang ring byas nas ni// nags su gser gyi ngang pa'i mtshan ma gos gzigs nas// brtan pa des ni gos dag mngon
33b5(skyes rabs): par 'dod par gyur// de nas lha ni gnas par ri dgas rngon pa'i lus// dgongs pa rnam dag 'di yi dgongs pa rnams rigs nas// kha bsgyur ngur smrig gos can nyer logs mngon par 'ongs// de la shAkya'i rgyal po skyes kyis
33b6(skyes rabs): mngon par smras// khyod kyi dge yi ngur smrig drang srong rgyal mtshan dang // 'tshe ba byed pa'i gzhung 'di rigs pa ma yin te// de phyir zhi ba gal te 'dir ni chags med na// bdag la rab tu byin la 'di dang 'di snoms mdzod//
34a1(skyes rabs): rngon pas smras pa 'dod sbyin 'dod pa snying po las// 'di yis blo ni phab nas ri dgas rnams gsod ngo // brgya byin mtshungs pa gang de 'dis ni don 'gyur na// e ma rab tu bzhes la dkar po de gsol mdzod// de nas de ni
34a2(skyes rabs): mchog tu rab tu dga' ba yis// nags su byung ba'i na bza' blangs shing gos dor la// rngon pa nyid kyang lha yi lus nyid rnam bzung ste// dkar po de nyid blangs nas lha ni gshegs par gyur// de nas gzhon nu dang ni rta mchog skyong ba
34a3(skyes rabs): des// de ltar gshegs pa de la ya mtshan skyes gyur te// nags nas byung ba'i na bza' nyid dang de la ni// slar yang ri mor bya ba mang po skyen par mdzad// de nas gdong ni mchi ma dang bcas 'dun pa rnams bzlog nas// bdag nyid
34a4(skyes rabs): chen po brtan dang grags pa 'chang ba ste// mtshams kyi sprin gyis g.yogs pa'i skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin// ngur smrig gyon zhing gdung gnas gang yin de nas gshegs// de nas de ltar jo bo rgyal srid mi bzhed par// dka' thub nag
34a5(skyes rabs): su gshegs pa mdog nyams snang ba na// mgyogs 'gro 'chang de phyag rgyas gyen du bskyod byas nas// shin tu rnam par ngu zhing sa la 'gyel gyur te// rnam par bltas nas slar yab sgra bcas par ngu zhing // bsngags ldan rta la lag pa
34a6(skyes rabs): ngag gis nyer 'khyud nas// de nas kho chad yang dang yang du zlos bzhin du// lus kyi song por gyur kyang sems kyis ma yi no// la la rab tu sems shing la lar rnam par du// la lar sa la rab tu 'brad cing la lar 'gyel// de nas
34b1(skyes rabs): 'gro bzhin gus pa'i dbang gi sdug bsngal zhing // dbang med lam na bya ba mang po byas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ sngags ldan phyir la ldog pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
34b2(skyes rabs): de nas 'dun pa ngu zhing gdong ni mtsho ma can// bzlog nas nags su 'dun pa'i dka' thub chags med pa// don kun grub pa'i lus kyis mngon par zil mnan nas// dka' thub gnas de grub pa bzhin du rab tu thob// de nas ri dgas
34b3(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i 'gros can rgyal po'i sras po de// ri dgas gnas der ri dgas bzhin du rab zhugs pa// phun tshogs rnams dang bral yang lus kyi phun tshogs kyis// dka' thub gnas ldan kun gyi mig dag phrogs par gyur// khur ldan
34b4(skyes rabs): rnams bzhin mgo bo rnams ni phyed dud pas// lag na gnya' shing bcas par 'gro gyur ya mtshan las// de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba chung ma dang bcas pa// dbang po dang mtshungs de mthong song bar ma gyur to// sbyin sreg bud
34b5(skyes rabs): shing phyir ni bram ze rnams phyin nas// me tog lo 'dab thob pa'i lag pa gtsang ma rnams// dka' thub gtso bo rnams ni blo rnams byas na yang // gshegs pa mthong ste klog grar song bar ma gyur to// chu gter sngon po bzhin du
34b6(skyes rabs): mthong nas rma bya rnams// dga' zhing gyen du dud cing skad dag 'don gyur la// rgya skyugs ri dgas spyod ldan rnams dang ri dgas rnams// 'bru rnams bor nas mngon par gdong phyogs gnas par gyur// 'od zer ldan pa shar ba lte
35a1(skyes rabs): bur 'bar ba yos// bu ram shing ba'i rigs kyi sgron ma de mthong nas// sbyin sreg 'jo rnams bzhos pa yin na yang // rab tu dga' ba skyes te rab tu 'jo gyur to// 'di ni nor sbyin rnams kyi brgyad pa yin/
35a2(skyes rabs): na ma tsi// tha skar dag gi nang nas gcig ni 'phos sam zhes// de mthong ba la ya mtshan skyes par gyur pa yi// thub pa rnams kyi tshig der mthon por sgrogs par gyur// lha yi khyu mchog gnyis pa'i lus po lta bu dang // 'jig rten rgyu
35a3(skyes rabs): dang mi rgyu'i snying po lta bu dang // gang 'dod pa yis nyi ma mngon par babs 'dra ba// des ni nags tshal mtha' dag rab tu snang bar mjid// de nas gdung gnas pa de rnams kyi ji lta bzhin// nye bar snyan gsan phab cing mngon par
35a4(skyes rabs): mchod gyur la// de ni chu bcas chu 'dzin lta bu'i dbyangs kyis ni// chos 'dzin rnams la slar yang rab tu mchod par gyur// de nas rnam par thar pa zhes brtan pa de yis ni// dka' thub sna tshogs rnams la nges par rnam gzigs shing //
35a5(skyes rabs): mtho ris mngon 'dod bsod nams byas pa'i skye ba yis// khyab pa'i dka' thub gnas der rjes su spyad par gyur// dka' thub nor can rnams kyi dka' thub nags tshal der// dka' thub rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni nges gsan nas// rjes su
35a6(skyes rabs): sheshegs pa'i dka' thub ldan pa kha cig la// zhi bas de nyid rnam par shes bzhed 'di gsung so// gong phyir chos kyi cho ga 'di ni mi shes pa// bdag gi dka' thub gnas mthong de ring snga ma'o// de phyir khyor kyis bdag la smra bar 'os min
35b1(skyes rabs): to// nges pa gang zhig gang la rab tu 'jug pa'o// de nas dka' thub rnam par rgyu ba'i gnyis skyes des// shAkya'i khyu mchog khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa po// de la rim gyis dka' thub 'bras bu dang bcas gtam ngag byas pa'o// grong
35b2(skyes rabs): byung bza' ba ma yin chu la rab skyes pa'i// 'dab ma rnams dang chu dang 'bras bu rtsa ba nyid// thub pa rnams kyi spyod pa 'di ni lung ji ltar// dka' thub rnams kyi rnam rtog tha dad de de'o// kha cig ri dgas bzhin du rtswa rnams la spyod de// gzhan
35b3(skyes rabs): rnams bor pa yis ni mkha' lo rgyu ba'i bya ltar 'tsho// kha cig lag 'gro rnams dang lhan cig 'tsho ba ste// grog mkhar gyur pa rnams ni nags na rlung gis so// rdo yis rab 'bad bsgrub pa'i spyod pa gzhan rnams te// kha cig rang gi sa/
35b4(skyes rabs): yis nye bar blangs shing za// de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyis don du bcos byas nas// gal te lhag ma yod na bya ba byed pa'o// chu yis gsher ba'i ral pa'i tshogs can kha cig ni// gsang sngags sngon 'gro lan gnyis me la sbyin sreg cing //
35b5(skyes rabs): kha cig nya dang mnyam par tshul rnams zhugs nas// rus sbrul bzhin du lus rnams rab tu bskum pa'o// de ltar dus su bsags pa'i dka' thub nags tshogs kyi// mchog gis lhar 'gro gzhan gyis mi yi 'jig rten to// sdug bsngal
35b6(skyes rabs): lam gyis bde ba nye bar thob phyir dang // chos kyi rtsa ba bde ba nyid du gsung phyir ro// de skad ces sogs rkang gnyis dbang po'i sras po yis// dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de yi tshig gsan nas// de nyid gzigs pa min yang ngoms par ma gyur
36a1(skyes rabs): la8/ bdag tu song ba 'di ni dal bus gsungs par gyur// sdug bsngal bdag nyid dka' thub rnam pa du ma ste// dka' thub dag gi 'bras bu mtho ris gtso bo'o// 'jig rten thams cad yongasu 'gyur ba
36a2(skyes rabs): dang ldan la// nyung ngu la ngal 'di ni gdung gnas rnams kyi'o// 'phangs pa rnams dang gnyen dang yul rnams bor nas ni// gang zhig mtho ris phyir ni rnam par spyod byed la// de rnams rnam par bral te nges par 'gro 'dod la//
36a3(skyes rabs): slar yang shin tu 'ching ba chen po nyid yin no// lus kyi ngal dub gdung ba'i bya ba rnams kyis ni// 'dod pa'i rgyu las rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i skyon rnams yongasu mi rtogs par// sdug bsngal gyis nges
36a4(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal kho na rjes su tshol// 'chi las skye dgu rnams kyi rtag par 'jigs pa ste// 'bad pa yis ni slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod// rab tu zhugs par gyur na nges par 'chi ba ste// 'di nyid du ni gang las 'jigs rnams lhung
36a5(skyes rabs): ngongo// 'di yi don du gcig rnams ngal bar rab 'jug cing // gzhan rnams mtho ris dron du ngal ba 'thob pa ste// bde ba'i don du sred pa'i bkren pa dron ma byas// gson pa'i 'jig rten nges par don med nyid du lhung // gang zhig
36a6(skyes rabs): dman pa dor nas khyad 'phags 'gro ba can// 'bad pa 'di ni nges par smad pa ma yin la// shes ldan rnams dang mnyam pa'i yongasu gdung ba yis// bya ba ma yin de 'dir slar yang byed pa'o// lus kyi gtsir bas gal te
36b1(skyes rabs): 'dir ni chos yin na// lus kyi bde ba chos ma yin par 'gyur ba ste// pha rol tu bde ba chos kyis kyang 'thob la// de'i phyir 'di yis chos kyis chos min 'bras bu'o// gang gis phyir na bsam pa'i dbang gis lus yin la// rab tu
36b2(skyes rabs): 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dag kyang ngo // de phyir sems kyi dul ba nyid ni rigs pa ste// sems las gzhan pa'i lus ni shing dang mnyam pa'o// bza' ba gtsang bas gal te bsod nams 'dod na ni// de phyir ri dgas rnams kyang
36b3(skyes rabs): bsod nams yod pa ste// phyi rol skyes bu gang dag rnams kyang 'bras bu las// bskal pa'i nyes pas don rnams gzhan du kha bltas so// bsod nams phyir ni sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor na// 'o na sdug la mngon
36b4(skyes rabs): par mtshams sbyor tshad ma min// de ltar gang dag las ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir// stegs shes rab tu zhugs te chu la reg par byed// der yang de yi snying la tshim pa ci ma yin te// chu yis sdig pa dag par byed pa ma yin/
36b5(skyes rabs): phyir/ yon tan ldan pas reg pa'i chu ni gang dang gang // de dang de ni sa la gal te stegs 'dod na// chu yang the tshom med par chu nyid kho na ste// de phyir yon tan ldan rnams kho na stegs su go// de ltar rig pa mang po ldan pa de
36b6(skyes rabs): dang de// smras te rnam par mdzes pa'i nyi ma nub par gyur// de nas sbyin sreg du bas kha dog 'gyur ba'i shing // dka' thub rab tu zhi ba'i khrus sar rnam par zhugs// mngon par bton pa'i rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis thab
37a1(skyes rabs): la ning / dbang bskur byas pa'i drang srong skye bos khyab pa ste// bzlas pa bya yi dbyangs kyis kun nas skad sgrog lha yi tshogs// chos kyi lam gyi las kyi mtha' bzhin rab tu zhugs pa'o// nga ni mtshan ma thang 'ag
37a2(skyes rabs): mtshan mor byed 'od kyi// dka' thub rnams la yongasu rtog cing zhugs gyur la// dka' thub thams cad yongasu brtags shing mkhyen gyur na// dka' thub zhing gi thang de las ni gshegs par gyur// de'i gzugs bdag nyid chen por song
37a3(skyes rabs): ba'i yid rnams kyis// dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni de nas de rjes gsheg/ 'phags min sdig pa rnams kyis zil non yul las ni// drang srong chen po rnams ni chos bzhin pha rol gshegs// de nas ral pa shing shun zur phud kyis
37a4(skyes rabs): rol pa'i// dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de rnams des gzigs shing // de dag rnams kyi dka' thub rnams la brjes brten te// dpal dang ldan la dge ba'i shing gi rtsu bar gnas// de nas dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas/
37a5(skyes rabs): me mchog de la yongasu bskor nas gnas gyur la// de dag rnams kyi rgyan pos mchod ma sngon btang ste// dus kyi zhi bas tshig 'di rab tu 'di smras so// khyod kyis byon tshe gdung gnas gang ba bzhin gyur la// rab tu gshegs tshe stong pa
37a6(skyes rabs): bzhin du rab tu thob// de phyir brtse ba 'di ni 'bor bar 'os min te// 'tsho bar 'dod pa'i phangs pa'i tshe yis lus bzhin no// lha yi drang srong tshangs pa'i drang srong rgyal po yis// drang srong gis bsnyen bsod nams nye bar gang ldan ri// dka'
37b1(skyes rabs): thub nor ldan rnams kyi dka' thub de rnams ni// gang gi nye logs dgra nas mang por 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin kun nas bsod nams dag gi stegs gyur la// na mkha'i 'og gi them skas dag tu gyur pa ste// lha yi drang srong rnams dang
37b2(skyes rabs): drang skyong chen po ni// chos kyi bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsnyen// 'di nas slar yang khyad 'phags chos kyi tshe las ni// byang gi phyogs nyid kho nar bsnyen par nus pa ste// blo dang ldan pas gom pa gcig tu gyur pa yang // lho
37b3(skyes rabs): yi phyogasu 'gro bar nus pa ma yin no// dka' thub nags 'dir ji ste bya ba ngan pa 'am// bsre ma'i chos bsam lhung ba min nam mi gtsang bar// khyed kyis mthong ste gang gis khyed 'di bzhugs 'dod min// de ni gsung la re zhig
37b4(skyes rabs): sred par bzhugs mdzod cig/ dka' thub gter dang rab tu mtshungs par gyur pa las// 'di rnams kyis ni dka' thub grogs su 'dod pa ste// dbang po dang mnyam khyed dang lhan cig gnas pa ni// pur bu yi yang mngon par
37b5(skyes rabs): mtho ba 'dren pa yin// dka' thub ldan pa'i gtso bos de skad ces smras te// srid par rab tu nyams phyir dam bca' byas pa yis// mkhas pa'i gtso bo des ni dka' thub ldan dbus su// nang du song ba'i rang bzhin smras par gyur
37b6(skyes rabs): pa'o// mgron la sag cing rang gi skye bo dang mtshungs pa'i// drang po'i bdag nyid chos 'dzin thub pa rnams kyi ni// bdag la rnam pa de ltar bsam pa skyes pa yis// bdag gis dga' ba mchog dang bkur sti skyes par gyur// mdo
38a1(skyes rabs): bsdus gyur na brtse zhing gnyen pa 'di rnams dag/ snying la song ba'i ngag rnams dag gis khrus byas bzhin// kun nas 'dzin med chos can bdag gi dga' ba ni// de ring slar yang cung zhig g.yos
38a2(skyes rabs): par gyur pa nyid// de ltar rab tu zhugs pa'i khyed cag skyabs 'os rnams// shin tu phyogs su ltung ba yang dag bstan pa rnams// bor nas 'gro zhes kho bo yi yang sdug bsngal te// ji ltar gnyen 'dun rnams ni spangs pa de
38a3(skyes rabs): ltaro// khyed cag rnams kyi chos 'di mtho ris ched du ste// 'drag gi mngon par mtho ba yang srid ma yin phyir// nags der gang gi bdag ni sdod 'dod ma yin te// chos las ldog pa rab tu 'jug pa tha dad phyir// de phyir nags
38a4(skyes rabs): 'di dag na gang gis yongs 'gro ba// bdag gI ma dga' ma yin pha rol spyod log min// sngon gyi dus na rjes mthun chos la gnas pa yi// drang srong chen po thams cad rnams dang mtshungs par gyur// de na don dang ldan la bde zhing
38a5(skyes rabs): yid du 'ong // legs mthun mdangs dang ldan la snying po dang ldan pa// gzhon nu'i tshig ni dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis// thos nas khyad 'phags dang ldan bkur sti mang pos gshegs// de nas gnyis skyes thal ba la nyal kha cig ni//
38a6(skyes rabs): lus ring gtsug tor dang ldan shing shun gos gon zhing // mig ni drung zad dkar ser sna ni phra la ring // la gcig spyi blugs ldan pas tshig 'di smras pa'o// khyod kyi nges pa nyid du rgya chen blo ldan zhing // gzhon nu khyed kyis skye ba la ni
38b1(skyes rabs): nyes pa gzigs// mtho ris dang thar pa yang dag rnam spyod phyir// thar pa gang gi blo gros yod pa de yin no// mchod sbyin dka' thub nges pa de rnams kyis// chags pa dang ldan mtho ris la ni 'gro bar 'dod// dgra bo bzhin du chags
38b2(skyes rabs): dang lhan cig g.yul spyad nas// sems pa rung ldan thar pa du ni 'gro bar 'dod// de phyir gal te khyod kyi blo gros 'dri ngos na// skyen par khyed nyid 'bigs byed phug par gshegs mdzod cig/ gang zhig mthar thug nges par legs
38b3(skyes rabs): pa thob pa'i mig/ thub pa 'di ni de ru mtshan mo min par gnas// de phyir khyod kyis de nyid lam ni thob gyur la// sred par gyur na yang dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// bdag gi mthong ba ji ltar blo gros de de ltar// de nyid kyi yang blo
38b4(skyes rabs): gros bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur// gsal zhing mtho ba'i shangs dang rnam rgyas yangs pa'i spyan// zangs mdog ya mchu ma mchu rno dkar mche ba can// ljags ni dmar zhing phra ba'i zhal dang ldan pa 'di// shes bya'i rgya mtsho
38b5(skyes rabs): mtha' dag la ni 'gro ba nyid// khyod kyi zab pa dang ni gting dpag dka' gang dang // gang zhig sgron ma nyid dang mtshan rnams gang yin pas// sngon gyi bsgril par drang srong gis gang ma mthong ba'i// slob dpon nyid de so la mdo
38b6(skyes rabs): dga' nas gshegs// dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis kyang de la yang // cho ga bzhin rjes byas nas dka' thub nags der gshegs// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ dka' thub kyi nagasu zhugs
39a1(skyes rabs): ba'i le ru skye bdun pa'o// / de nas mgyogs 'gro sbyong nga yid mi bde gyur te// de ltar jo bo nags sung med par gshegs la// lam du mya ngan med pa 'bad par bya gyus// de ltar
39a2(skyes rabs): na yang de'i mchi ma khrog ma gyur// gong la jo bo'i bka' la mtshan mo gcig gis ni// mgyogs 'gro de dang gshegs par gyur pa'i lam// lam de nyid la 'gro bzhag dag ni brgyad rnams kyis// jo bo nyid dang bral ba de yis sems
39a3(skyes rabs): zhing 'ong // 'thon pa med pas rgyags pa med par gyur pa yis// sngags ldan mgyogs 'gro nyid kyang mdangs med rgyu ba ste// de ltar rgyun de rnams kyis brgyan par byas na yang // de yis dor bas dpal ni song ba bzhin du gyur// phyir
39a4(skyes rabs): log nas kyang dka' thub nags su mngon phyogs te// sgying rje bar ni yang dang yang du brag tu 'char// lam na rtogs pa ldan pa yin yang 'brung chu// ji ltar ston bzhin mngon par ma dga' mya bslang so// de nas 'gro la pon pa'i
39a5(skyes rabs): bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po d+he// sner b+h+yo zhes bya'i grong khyer rnam par dmun pA la// nyin mor byed pas bor ba'i na mkhye' 'bras med bzhin// rim gyis de gnyis stong pa bzhin du nye bar song // ded+ma dkar po dang bcas chu yis/
39a6(skyes rabs): mdzes gyur cing // me tog 'dzin pa'i shing rnams kyis ni brgyan ni yang // grong khyer pa rnams rab tu dga' ba song gyur te// de yi nye ba'i nags de nags ltar mdzes ma gyur// de ltar lta byed mchi mas bcom pa'i mi rnams ni//
39b1(skyes rabs): rab tu 'angar min zhan pa'i yid kyis phyogs su skor// 'ong du mi ster ba bzhin gnyis po de grong du// dral bus log pa'i khrus bzhin mngon par song bar gyur// shAkya'i rigs kyi drang srong dang bral 'ongs pa yi// lus zags 'gros
39b2(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa de gnyis mthong nas kyang // sngon tshe shing rta bcu pa'i shing rta 'ongs pa bzhin// grong khyer skye bo rnams ni lam du mchi ma phyung // de nas mya ngan nye bar ldan pa'i skye bo dag/ mchi ma chung ba rnams kyis 'dun pa la smras pa// grong
39b3(skyes rabs): khyer yul 'khor dga' mdzad rgyal po'i sras po de// khyed kyis gang du bor zhes rgyab nas rjes su 'gro// de nas gus ldan skye bo de la des smras pa// mi dbang sras po bdag gis yongasu bor ba min// ngu bzhin skye bo rnyed pa'i nagasu kho bo
39b4(skyes rabs): dang / khyim gnas cha lugs ngag kyang de yis rnam par spangs// de yi tshig ni skye bo de rnams kyis thos nas// nges par shin tu dka' ba nyid ces nges par song gyur la// 'gyel zhing mig skyes chu ni rnam par mthor ba ste// yid la smod
39b5(skyes rabs): cing bdag nyid kyis ni 'bras bu long // de nas smras pa gnyis skyes rgyal po'i shugs mnga' ste// gang du gshegs pa'i nags der dI ring zhugs par bgyi// lus can dbang po ma tshang rnams kyi ji lta bar// de dag bral bas bdag cag
39b6(skyes rabs): 'tsho bar 'dod pa med// de dang bral ba'i grong khyer 'di ni nags yon la// de dang yang dag ldan pa'i nags de grong khyer yin// lha ni lha min gsod tshe brgya byin gyis ji ltar// de dang bral bas bdag gi grong khyer mdzes mar gyur// de nas
40a1(skyes rabs): slar yang gzhon nu phyir la log ces te// yan lag ma rnams skar khung phreng rnams rab thob ste// mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab ni rnam par dben pa mthong gyur nas// slar yang skar khung rnams ni rnam par
40a2(skyes rabs): bkag nas ngu// brtul zhugs dang ni mya ngan dag gis yid du bcing // brtul zhugs la rab zhugs pas sras po nyer thob phyir// bzlas byas shing gi lha yi khang par mi bdag gis// bsam pa ji ltar de dang de rnams byas// /
40a3(skyes rabs): de nas mig dag mchi mas rab tu gang ba des// mgyogs 'gro blangs nas mgyogs 'gro rjes su 'gro ba ste// g.yul 'gyed pa na dag pos jo bo khyer ba ltar// mya ngan dag gis mngon bcom mi skyong khang par zhugs// mi dbang
40a4(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i khab tu rnam par zhugs pa na// rnam par blta zhing mig dag mchi ma 'bab pa yis// skye bo la ni sdug bsngal rab tu rtogs 'jug bzhin// sngags ldan mgyogs 'gro bsal ba'i dbyangs kyis ngus par gyur// de nas
40a5(skyes rabs): khang pa'i dbus na spyod pa'i bya rnams dang // nye bar brtag pa'i mgyogs 'gro dam par byed rnams kyis// mi dbang sras po log par gshegs la the tshom ste// mgyogs 'gro de yi dbyangs la so sor ram 'degs byas// ji
40a6(skyes rabs): ltar sngags ldan mgyogs 'gro 'tsher bar byed pa ste// nges par gzhon nu khab tu rnam par zhugs snyam ste// dga' ba phul du byung pas bslus pa'i skye bo rnams// skye bo'i bdag po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logs song //
40b1(skyes rabs): shin tu dga' ba las ni mya ngan gyis brgyal rnams// gzhon nu blta ba la ni g.yo ba'i spyan ma rnams// ston ka'i chu gter sprin las glog ni g.yo ba bzhin// bud med rnams ni sred pas khyim nas phyir la 'thon// lan bu rnam
40b2(skyes rabs): par 'phyang zhing dar gos dri ma can// mig rtsi dang bral mchi mas mig bcom gdong rnams kyis// mtshan mo zad che skya reng gis mkhar skar ma bzhin// byi dor dang bral bud med rigs rnams mdzes mo gyur// rkang pa rkang gdung
40b3(skyes rabs): dang bral zangs mdog ma chags rnams// gdong pa rna lung dang bral mgrin pa drang po rnams// rang bzhin gyis rgyas borla ni 'og pab dang bral rnams// nu ma dor shal dang bral stod g.yogs chad rnamaso// rten dang bral ba'i 'dun bya
40b4(skyes rabs): dang ni mgyogs 'gro nyid// mig ni mchi ma dang ldan de rnams kyis mthong nas// nags mthar khyu mchog dang bral ba glang rnams bzhin du// sems khral gdong ldan yan lag mchog ma rnams ni dus// de nas rgyal ba'i btsun mo
40b5(skyes rabs): mchi ma dang bcas par// be'u nyams pa'i ma he mo ltar mnyes bshin ma// gser gyi chu shing lo 'dab rnam par gso ba bzhin// gau ta ma mus ni lag pa bzung nas 'gyel// dpung pa lag pa snyoms shing gzi brjid bcom
40b6(skyes rabs): pa yi// bud med gzhan rnams yid mi bde bas sems med bzhin// mchi ma ma bton 'o dod 'bod min dbugs med par// g.yo bral ri mo bris pa bzhin du gnas par gyur// brtan min bdag po'i mya ngan gyis brgyal bung
41a1(skyes rabs): med gzhan// rnam par lta byed nas 'bab rgyun gyi gdong rnams kyis// sa 'dzin ri bo nas 'bab rgyun gyi rdo ba ltar// tsan dan rab bskus nu ma rnams la rnam par 'thor// de rnams kyis ni mig chus
41a2(skyes rabs): btags pa'i gdong rnams kyis// rgyal po'i khab de de tshe mdzes par gyur pa ni// chu gsar dus na chu gter char gyis btags pa yi// chu 'dzin pad+ma rnams kyis rdzing bu ji ltar ro// rgyas shing bar med legs par zlum pa'i
41a3(skyes rabs): sor mo can// rgyan bral rtsa mi mngon po'i yan lag mchog ma rnams// rlung gis g.yos pa'i ljo ni shing rang gi 'dab mas ltar// pad+ma lta bu'i lag pa rnams kyis brang rnams brdungs// nags rlung gis bskul pad+ma lta bur
41a4(skyes rabs): g.yos pa yis// ngang pa rnams kyi 'khrigs pa rnams kyi chu klung ltar// brang brdungs rab bskyod 'brel mtho'i nu ma rnams kyis ni// de lta na yang mi mo de rnams mdzes par gyur// ji ltar brang rnams la ni lag pas zug byas
41a5(skyes rabs): pa// de ltar lag pa rnams la brang ni zug byed cing // le lo can me brtse med stobs med ma yis der// lag pa'i rtse dang brang rnams phan tshun zug byaso// de nas khros pas rab tu dmar ba'i spyan ldan ma// sems 'khral gyis sbrel
41a6(skyes rabs): mgrin pa kha zhing lngapa ldib dang // shugs rings phyung bas 'o ma 'dzin g.yo brtan pa yi// mya ngan mchi ma 'dzin pa'i grags 'dzin mas smras pa// mtshan mo gnyid log dbang med bdag ni rnam spangs nas// 'dun pa 'dod pa'i
41b1(skyes rabs): shing rta de ni gang du thal// gsum po mnyam du song la khyod dang sngags ldan ni// nye bar 'ongs pas kho mo'i yid ni g.yos par gyur// kho mo 'phags min brtse min bshes ma yin pa'i las// phul phyung de 'dir byas
41b2(skyes rabs): nas da ni ci la du// mchi ma ma 'don khyod kyi sems ni sim par 'gyur// khyod kyi mchi ma dang ni las de gtam ma yin// dga' dang song dang phan dang legs pa dang // ji lta ba bzhin don byed khyod nyid dang 'grogs shing // slar mi
41b3(skyes rabs): ldog pa'i ched du jo bo sras po thal// khyod kyi nga la 'bras bcas sems ni dga' bar gyis// mi yi dbang po'i dgra bo dag ni mchog yin la// sbyor min la mkhas shes rab med pa'i bshes mchog min// nges par mdza' bshe
41b4(skyes rabs): rnam par mi mkhas khyod kyis ni// 'di yi rigs kyi nye bar nub pa chen po byas// rab chags dri mas 'dres shing dmar ba'i mig can ma// kun nas rgyan dang bral ba 'di rnams mya ngan byed// gangs ldan ri bo dang mnyam bdag po gnas na
41b5(skyes rabs): yang // bud med rnams ni yugs sa mo bzhin mdzes pa nyams// 'di dag rnams kyang bya 'dab lag pa rnam bskyod cing // rtag par phug ron rnams kyi ring ba'i skad rnams dang // de dang bral bas 'bras med pho brang 'khor dang bcas//
41b6(skyes rabs): gzhal med khang pa'i gcer rnams shin tu ngu ba 'dra// skye bo 'di ni kun nas don med 'dod pa ste// bsngags ljon pa sogs 'gro de yang nges pa nyid du'o// mtshan mo skye bo gnyid tshe rkun pos rin chen bzhin// bdag gi 'di ltar 'di nas
42a1(skyes rabs): nor rdzas thams cu stod// mgyogs 'gro 'dis ni mda' yi rma srol byung rnams kyang // sron par nus shes grags na lcags rnams smos ci dgos// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i dpal ni blangs gyur nas// 'dzi
42a2(skyes rabs): ni lcags lhung 'jigs la song ba yin nam ci// mi dbang pho brang yongasu gang ba bzhin du ni// 'phags pa min las da lta drag tu 'tsher bar byed// gang gi tshe na mgyogs 'gro lkugs la thang chang gyur// gal te skye bo dag la go/
42a3(skyes rabs): bar 'tsher byed dam// yang na rmig pas sa la rmig pa'i sgra byed dam// yang na 'gram pa'i sgra ni mchog tu bskyod na ni// bdag la sdug bsngal 'di 'dra 'byung ba ma yino// de ltar 'dir ni lha mo'i smre sngags la brten cing // mchi mas
42a4(skyes rabs): mdud pa yi ge'i tshig dag thos gyur nas// 'og tu gdong phyogs mchi ma dang bcas thal sbyar te// 'dun pas lon 'di dal bur smras par gyur pa'o// lha mo bsngags ldan la ni smod par 'os mi ni zhing // kho bo la yang khro bar mdzad pa
42a5(skyes rabs): 'os ma yin// kho bo cag gi skyon mni lha mo mkhyen par mdzod // mi yi lha de lha bzhin bkra shis kun gyis gshegs// bdag gi rgyal po'i bstan pa shes pa yin na yang // lha nyid gang dag gis ni stobs las byas pa bzhin// bdag
42a6(skyes rabs): gis mgyogs 'gro 'di ni nye bar 'ongs pa ste// lam na dal ba med par de ltar rjesu song // mgyogs 'gro mchog 'di nyid kyang gshegs tshe sa la ni// bar snang dag na bzung bzhin rmigs pas ma reg cing // de bzhin lho yi ched du gdong ni
42b1(skyes rabs): sngogs byas bzhin// 'gram pa'i sgra ni byas min 'tsher ba dag kyang med// gang las sa skyong bdag nyid skyes pa gshegs na// de tshe sgo ni rang nyid bye bar gyur pa ste// mtshan mo'i mun pa nyi mas bzhin du bsal gyur te// de'i phyir yang
42b2(skyes rabs): lha yi cho gA de zung gi/ gang phyir mi dbang bka' las skye bo stong phrag dag/ khang pa dang ni grong khyer nyid du ba ga yod kyang // de tshe de ni gnyid kyi phrogs shing ma sad de// de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung zhig/ gang phyir nags na gnas la
42b3(skyes rabs): mthun pa'i gos dag ni// lha na gnas pas dus su 'di la byin gyur la// rgyun dag mkha' la rab tu gtor ba de khyer te// de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung gi/ de phyir de ltar lha mo ngeng gnyis la skyon du// ji ltar song ba de la rtog
42b4(skyes rabs): par 'os ma yin// mgyogs 'gro 'di dang bdag gi 'dod pa myi mdzad par// de ni lha rnams dag gis rjes 'gro byas shing gshegs// de ltar bdag nyid chen po de yi rab gshegs pa// lha yi mtshor mang bud med de rnams kyis
42b5(skyes rabs): thos nas// rab tu gshegs las yid la 'bar ba yang thob ste// mya ngan rab tu nyams bzhin ngo mtshar ldan par thal// de nus yid mi bde bas yongs lding mig can ma// phrug gu rab tu nyams pa'i 'ol ba sdug bsngal
42b6(skyes rabs): bzhin// rmongs gyur nyid kyang mchi ma dang ldan gdong gis smras// rlabs chen dang ldan 'jam zhing dkar min dge ba ste// so so so sor rtsa ba nas 'khrungs gyen du 'khyil// de yi dbu skyes sa la 'thor ba de rnams ni// mi dbang dbu
43a1(skyes rabs): rgyun la ni yongasu bak+ki bur 'os// phyag ni rab 'phyang ri dgas rgyal po'i stobs mnga' zhing // khyu mchog chen po'i spyan ldan gser 'bar 'od mnga' ba// 'brug dang rtswa yi sgra ldan sku stong rnam par yangs// de ltar
43a2(skyes rabs): gyur kyang dka' thub gnas su gnas par 'os// sor mo legs skyes 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel pa dang // long bu mi mngon pad ma'i rtsa ba ltar 'jom la// dbus na 'khor lo dang bcas zhabs ni de ngag gis// drang srong rnams kyi nags mtha'i
43a3(skyes rabs): sa la 'gro 'am ci// khang bzang logs na khri dang gdan la 'os pa ste// rin chen na bza' lci min can dan gyis spras shing // de yi lus ni mdangs dang ldan pa nags dag tu// grang dang dro dang chu 'obs rnams su skor ram ci// rigs dang gzugs
43a4(skyes rabs): dang stobs dang sems dpa' dag dang ni// thos dang pun sum tshogs dang na tshod kyis khengs shing // slong bar ma yin ster ba nyid du mngon 'ongs pa// de ni pha rol dag la slongs mo rgyu 'am ci// gser khri dang zhing gzims mal dag la gzims
43a5(skyes rabs): nas ni// mtshan mo sil snyan sgra rnams dag gis rab slong ba// gos kyi phyogs gcig par na sa yi logs la ni// bdag gi brtul zhugs ldan de de ring ji ltar gzims// snying rje'i smre sngags rab tu zlos pa 'di thos nas// bud med de rnams
43a6(skyes rabs): phan tshun lag pas yongs 'khyud de// ljon shing g.yos las me tog las ni sbrang rtsi bzhin// rnam par lta byed dag nas chu dag 'thor ba'o// de nas ngang pa med pa'i dang mo bzhin du ni// grags 'dzin ma ni nor 'dzin sa la 'gyel
43b1(skyes rabs): gyur la// rnam par 'khrugs shing yang dang yang du lnga pa ljib kyi// skad kyis de dang de dag rnam par smras pa'o// chos dang lhan cig spyod ma mgon med kho mo ni// de yis dor nas gal te chos mi byed 'dod cing / chos dang lhan cig spyod
43b2(skyes rabs): ma dang bral dka' thub gang // yongasu longs spyod 'dod 'di'i chos 'di ga la zhig/ sngon gyis skyong rnams des nges par ma thos te// logs mthong chen po la sogs mes po chen po rnams// bdag po ldan ma dang bcas na gsu gshegs
43b3(skyes rabs): gyur lnga// kho mo drang bral chos byed 'dod pa de lhor ltos// mchod sbyin du 'am rig byed cho gas 'dus byas shing // pho mo gnyis la dbang bskur de yi 'bras bu ni// gzhan du mnyam por longs spyod 'dod pa ma mthong ste// de nas bdag la
43b4(skyes rabs): 'di yi chos la ser sna skyes// bdag ni yid la sdug dang phan tshun phrag dog rnying // yang yang rtsod par chos dga' des ni nges par shes// khro ba kho mo spangs nas dbade chen 'jig rten du// 'jigs med lha mo las ni dga' ba len
43b5(skyes rabs): par 'dod// de la lus kyi yon tan bzung ba'i btsun mo de// ci 'dra zhig gam 'di ni bdag gi bsam mno ste// bdag gi gus pa nyid dang bud med bor nas nI// nags su gang phyir dka' thub rnams la gdung // nges par bdag gi 'dod 'di mtho
43b6(skyes rabs): ris bde phyir min// sems ldan skye bo'i de ni rnyed par dka' ba min// sdug pa des kyang bdag la 'di 'am gzhan du rung // gang gi ma spong zhes ni bdag gi yid la re// gal te bdag ni jo bo'i gzigs byed yangs pa'i zhal// gtsang zhing
44a1(skyes rabs): bzhad pa gyen du blta ba'i skal med na// skal ba dman par 'os min sgra gcan 'dzin 'di yang // pha'i pang na yongasu gnas par nam zhig 'gyur// e ma yid mnga' 'di yi lus ni shin tu
44a2(skyes rabs): gzhon// yid ni mi rnams kyis bsngags shim tu sra ba ste// ngag gi skad grag rab zlos dgra yang dga' ba yi// du ni byis pa 'di 'dra kye ma spong bar byed// bdag gi 'dod pa'i sems yang shin tu sra ba ste// rdo las gyur ram yang
44a3(skyes rabs): na lcags las byas pa'am// bder 'os jo bo dpal dor nags su song ba la// mgon med ldan pa gang zhig dum bur ma song ngo // de ltar lha mo bdag po'i mya ngan gyis brgyal te// sems shing rnam zlos lan NI sha ma yin 'dis
44a4(skyes rabs): dus la// rang bzhin brtan yang dam pa mo de mya ngan gyis// brtan pa dran pa ma yin ngo tsha ma byas so// de nas ngo ltar mya ngan gyis sgra rnam 'khrugs pa'i// grags 'dzin ma ni sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni// char gyis btags pas
44a5(skyes rabs): pad+ma chen po bzhin du ni// mchi byas gdong gi bud med rnams ni cho nge 'debs// bzlas brjod rdzogs shing sbyin bsregs bkra shis byas gyur te// mi skyong nyid kyang lha khang dag nas phyir gshegs pa// rdo rje sgra yis glang po ji bzhin
44a6(skyes rabs): skye ba yi// nyam thag sgra des kun nas bcom zhing g.yos par gyur// 'dun pa dang ni bsngags ldan gnyis po mthong nas kyang // sras kyi nges par brten pa yang dag gsan nas ni// bde sogs bdag po'i ltang mi zin pa'i rgyal mtshan
44b1(skyes rabs): bzhin// mya ngan gyis bcom sa yi bdag po 'gyel bar gyur// de nas sras po'i mya ngan gyis rmongs yud tsam zhig/ skye bo mtshungs mnyam mngon pa'i skye bos bzung gyur la// chub kyi gang ba'i spyan gyis mgyogs 'gro la gzigs nas/
44b2(skyes rabs): sa yi log nas sa skyong gis ni smre sngags bton// g.yul 'gyed pa na dga' chen mang po byas nA ni// bsngags lhun khyod kyis bdag gi dga' ba ma yin byas// bdag gi dga' ba yon tan dga' de gang gis ni// dga' ba
44b3(skyes rabs): yin yang dga' ba maud bzhin nags su bor// de phyir de nyid gang du gshegs pa der bdag khyer// yang na der ni slar yang sbyin par khyer la shog/ tsha bas cher nu ba'i sman dang bral bas de bzhin du// de dang bral bas bdag gi/
44b4(skyes rabs): 'tsho ba med pa'o// rgyal bu gser 'bab 'chi bas phrogs par gyur pa na// dka' thub gang las yang dag rgyal ba shi ma gyur// bdag kyang chos 'dzin sras po gshegs par gyur pa na// bdag nyid thar 'dod bdag nyid med pa lta bur gyur// rgyu
44b5(skyes rabs): bcu byas khyab bdag skye dgu'i bdag po ni// mchog dang mchog min shrI pa nyi ma'i sras po yi// bu ni 'phangs shing sdug bsngal dam pa dang bral la// yid mi bde byas yid kyi rmongs pa gang las man// rgyal po aM dza'i sras
44b6(skyes rabs): po blo dang ldan pa ni// mi bdag dbang po'i grogs la bdag gi 'dod pa ste// sras po nagasu song la gang zhig ltar song la// mchi ma don yod ma yin bkren pas 'chos so kye// khyod kyis bdag gi chu yi snyim pa de gang du// phrogs pa'i
45a1(skyes rabs): dka' rngub gnas der bzang po bdag la smos// de lta bdag gcom pa dun yongs 'dod de// 'du gi skyo na mi dgas 'gro ba dang // d+ma ltar sras dang sprul ba'i rgyug bsngal sa gyu /
45a2(skyes rabs): sa dang 'dra ba'i lhan skyes brtan pa rnam spangs nas// rA mA'i mya ngan dag gis shing rta bcu pa bzhin// mi skyong 'du shes bral bzhin mang po rnam par labs// de nas de la thos dang dul dang yon tan ldan// rab bgros mdun na
45a3(skyes rabs): 'don dang blon po blo gros kyis// mnyam par bzhag 'di d+hi lta ba bzhin spyas gyur to// yongs su gdung ba'i gdong min mya ngan med pa'ang mIm/ mi mchog brtan pa mya ngan mthong la brtan par gash+legs// mya ngan bzhin du ma
45a4(skyes rabs): ma 'don par 'os ma yin// me tog phreng ba rnying bzhin phun tshogs bor nas ni// sa na mi skyod mang po na gsu shin tu song // gzhan yang de yi dgongs pa nges pa 'di sngon tshe// drang srong dkar min de yi tshig ni dran par mdzod// mtho
45a5(skyes rabs): ris su dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la// skad cig kyang de gnas par bde bas nus ma yin// gal te yang de mAM mchog 'bad pas byas pa ste// myur bar bka' lung stsol mdzod rje skyed 'dir 'gro bab+hi/ Sh+Tha mo ts+tsha b+hi sras po de yi ni// sna na mang po
45a6(skyes rabs): 'thab mo de snyed der byed 'ashog/ de nas de gnyis la mi mi bdag gis bslabs la// de phyir nges par 'di nas khyed gnyis mngon par song // bu la lhag par chags pa'i nags kyi bya yi bzhin// bdag gi sems ni dga' bar rab tu song
45b1(skyes rabs): me yin// dam pa zhes ni mi dbang brtan las blon po dang // mdun na 'don pa de gnyis nags der song bar gyur// byas zhes mna' ma'i skye bo dang bcus btsun mor bcas// mi skyong gis kyang bya ba lhag ma rab tu mjed// sangs rgyas kyi spyod
45b2(skyes rabs): pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ btsun mo'i 'khor smre sngags bton pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe mdun na 'don dang blon po de// mi skyong mtsho mI lhag gis mngon par bsnun pa dag/ phug
45b3(skyes rabs): pa'i dam pa'i rta bzhi na 'bad pa thams cad las// bsam pa bzang pos sbyin par nags der song bar gyur// 'dra ba'i rjes 'brang dral ba skyes pa de gnyis ni// dka' thub nags der dus su nye bar phyin nas ni// rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul dor de
45b4(skyes rabs): dul ba'i spyod pa yis// drang srong shes ldan bu yi khab par nye bar song // de dag gis ni tshul bzhin bram ze de mchod nas// de ni de dag la yang rjes mthun mchod pa ste// gdan byas pa dag bdag tu lta ba bcas nas ni// shes ldan
45b5(skyes rabs): sras po gdon gnas pa la gtam smras so// mdangs gtsang gtsang zhing rnam par yangs pa'i grags pa mnga'// bu ram shing pa'i rigasu rab 'khrungs rgyal po yis// shru ka rab tu 'dzin dang gsang sngags yongs 'dzin la// nag por
45b6(skyes rabs): skye bo 'di ni khyod kyis rigs par mdzod// dbang po dang mtshungs de yi rgyal ba dang mtshungs sras// rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag ni sgrol 'dod de// 'di na mngon par nye bar 'ongs grag de yi phyir// bdag cag nye bar 'ongs par bcom
46a1(skyes rabs): ldan mkhyen par mdzod// de dag la nges smras pa phyag ring gyur pa ste// rab tu thob gyur gzhon nur shes pa min pa min// chos 'dri 'khor bar byed ces mngon par mkhyen nas ni// mngon par gdong phyogs ma
46a2(skyes rabs): yin thar bzhed sbyin par gshegs// de nas de las de nyid de dag nyar thob nas// bram ze de la snyan dngags phab nas dam thag/ dub kyang ma drub pa bzhin rgyal po lo gus pas// de nyid gong nas gshegs pa de nas rab tu 'ong // so
46a3(skyes rabs): ste de nas de dag gi ni rngon pa dang // rnam par bral ba'i sku lus rab tu 'bar ba de// nyi ma stug po'i longs spyod dag la zhugs pa ltar// lam ni shing gi rtsa bar nye bar zhugs pa mthong // de nas de la mdun na 'don dang sngags 'dzin bcas// theg
46a4(skyes rabs): rnam par sbyangs nas nye bar gshegs pa ste// slar gnas thub pa'i bu ni g.yon gyi lhar bcas pas// nags gnas lhag spyod blta bar 'dod pa ji ltar ro// lha ni pA ba sangs dang phur bus dbang chen bzhin// de dag gi ni de nyid bskyed
46a5(skyes rabs): cing mchod pa'o// lha ni pa sangs phur bu dag la dbang chen bzhin// mchod 'os des ni de gnyis dag la slar mchod do// sbyor bar song ba'i zla ba'i nye sar nabs so bzhin// de nas kun nas mngon par rjes gnang byas pa ni// de dag shAkya'i
46a6(skyes rabs): rigs kyi rgyal mtshan de yi ni// nye logs dag tu song ba rnam par mdzes par gyur// shing gi rtsa bar gnas pa mngon par 'bar ba yi// rgyal po'i sras po de la mdun na 'don gyis smras// lha ni yongs 'dus dag la brgya byin sras po ni//
46b1(skyes rabs): rgyu ba nye bar gnas la phur bus ji ltar ro// khyod kyis mya ngan zug rngu snying la brtags pa na// sa tsho logs la rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur pa ste// gzhon nu mig gi chu yi char ldan rgyal po yis// gang zhig khyod la smras pa 'di ni
46b2(skyes rabs): mkhyen par mdzod// khyod kyis chos la rabya dmigs nges par shes pa ste// khyod kyi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don ni shes pa'o// khyod kyi dus ma yin par nagasu bskyen las bdag/ me dang rab mtshungs mya ngan me yis tshig pa'o//
46b3(skyes rabs): de phyir tshur sgron chos dga' dag ni dga' ston du// chos kyi don du blo gros de nyid mthong mdzad dang // chu bo'i rishugs kyis 'gram ngogs mngon par bcom pa bzhin// bdag la mya ngan shugs 'di rab tu 'phel ba'o// rlung dang zhi
46b4(skyes rabs): mA me dang thog chen rnams kyi ni// 'jug pa gang zhig sprin dang chu me ri rnams// rnam par 'byer dang skams dang sreg dang 'byed rnams kyis// bdag cag rnams la mya ngan gyis 'jug pa de byed// de phyir re zhig nor 'dzin bdag
46b5(skyes rabs): nyid longs spyod la// dus su bstan bcos mthong ste nagasuM ga shegs gyur te// 'byung po thams cad la ni brtse ba chos yin phyir// mi 'dod gnyen 'dun kho bo la ni ltos par mdzod// chos de nogs nyid kho nar 'grub pa ma yin
46b6(skyes rabs): sdom brtson rnams kyi nges par phreng khyer na yang 'grug 'dir ni blo dang 'bang ba dag ni mtshan ma ste/ chags dang sbal ni 'jigs pa dag gi mtshan ma'i// ngabu rgyan 'dzin cing dpung bar na tshu shal dang // pung rgyan rnam pa
47a1(skyes rabs): phyag mnga' mi dbang rnams// phun tshogs yan lag dbus na yongasu gnas rnams kyis// khyim na gnas kyang thar pa'i lam ni rab tu 'thob// brtan pa'i nu bo stobs dang rdo rje'i lag pa dang // rnam mdzes bu dang chu
47a2(skyes rabs): stong de nas mthar gnas lha// lus 'phags rgyal po skyes byed dang ni de bzhin du// 'gro dang ljon shing can dang sde rgyal rgyal po rnams// nyes legs chos kyi cho ga la ni rnam dul ba'i// mi bdag khyim na gnas pa de rnams mkhyen mdzod
47a3(skyes rabs): la/ nor gyi bdag po dang ni mi skyong dpal dag ste// gnyis po dag kyang de phyir dus gcig mkhyen par mdzod// mngon par dbang bskur byas pa'i chu yis brlan ma nyid// gdung ba skyob pa'i gdugs bzung khyed la drag tu ni// nye bar
47a4(skyes rabs): 'byu nas kun nas gyen du blta ba ste// dga' pa des ni na gsu rab tu 'jug par 'dod// de ltar mchi mas 'dud pa'i yi ge'i tshig gis ni// khyed gnyis la ni sa yi bdag pos smras pa ste// thos nas de la brtse zhing de la dga' don du//
47a5(skyes rabs): khyed kyi brtse bas rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa'o// khyod las byung ba'i mya ngan chu ni gting med pa'i// sdug bsngal rgya tsher shAkya'i rgyal po nub gyur te// de phyir mgon po rgya mtshor bying la gru bzhin du// dman zhing brten dang bral ba de ni sgrol mdzad
47a6(skyes rabs): tsog/ chu bo gang+gA'i lho nas byung ba 'jigs byed dang // lhag spyod dang ni ngan slong sras po lhag spyod kyis// pa yi dga' ba'i don du las byas thos nas ni// khyed kyang yab kyi bzhed pa mdzad par 'os pa lags// gnyen ba shes bo'u nyams
47b1(skyes rabs): par 'gyur ba'i ba bzhin du// rgyun mi chad par nyam thag snying rjer du ba mo// drang srong ri byi bsnyen zhing phyogs su ma song ba// yang dag bskyed par byed pa'i lha mo mkhyen par mdzod// dang pa rnam par bral ba'i dang mo lta bu dang //
47b2(skyes rabs): nags na glang po dang bral glang mo lta bu ni// mgon dang bcas kyang mgon med dman zhing nyam thag pa'o// btsun mo gzigs pa yis ni skyob par 'os pa yin// sras gcig byis pa sdug bsngal 'os pa ma yin pa// kun nas gdung
47b3(skyes rabs): bA mthar gyur pa ni 'dren pa ste// gang ba'i zla ba sgra gcan nye bar bsgyur las bzhin// sgra gcan 'dzin de gnyen gyi mya ngan las thar mAdzod// pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor dang grong khyer mtha' dag ni// khyed dang bral ba'i bud shing can
47b4(skyes rabs): gyi mya ngan med// phyir 'byung dbugs ni du ba mun pa'i rtse mo yis// tshig pa dag ni khyed la lta ba'i chu 'dod do// mdun na 'don pa de yi cho ga dag gsan gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang ba'i sems dpa' nges// yon
47b5(skyes rabs): tan ldan zhing yon tan shes pa yung tsam zhig/ bsam gtan mdzad nas rigs pa'i lan 'di smras pa'o// pha rnams kyi ni bu la dgongs pa shes pa ste// gang zhig bdag la sa skyong gi ni khyad par du// shes pa yin yang na dang rga dang
47b6(skyes rabs): rgud pa las// 'jigs te nag su phyin nas rang gi skye bo dor// mthar ni gal te dga' ba dang bral ma yin na// rang gi skye bo dga' ba lha 'dod cis ma yin// gang tshe yun ring gyur kyang rnam par 'bral ste// de phyir bla ma brtse ba yin
48a1(skyes rabs): yang 'dor bar bgyi// gang yang bdag gi ched du mi yi bdag po yis// mya ngan khyod kyis smras nges bdag la dga' ba med// gang phyir rmi lam yang dag 'dus par gyur rnams// rnam par bral bar 'gyur la kun nas
48a2(skyes rabs): b.rung bar byed// 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni// de bzhin du yang khyod kyis blo gros nges par song // bu min gnyen man kun nas gdung ba'i rgyu yin bzhim/ 'ching ba de ni shes pa med pa'i mtshan ma nyid// lam du 'gro rnams
48a3(skyes rabs): 'dir ni 'dus pa ji lta ba'i// skye dgu rnams ni dus su nges par 'bral ba ste// gnyen 'dun dam 'cha' skye bos rnam par dman pa yi// shes rab ldan pa'i skye bos mya ngan bsnyen nam ci// gzhan du rang gi skye bo dor nas 'drir 'ongs la// 'dir yang
48a4(skyes rabs): rab tu bslus nas slar yang 'gro ba ste// der song nas kyang pha rol gzhan du 'gro 'gyur la// de ltar 'dor ldan sgro la rjesu brten rnam ci// gang tshe mengal nas bzung ste gnas skabs thams cad du// gsod pa'i phyir ni 'chi ba rab tu gnas pa ste//
48a5(skyes rabs): bu la dga' ba der ni khyed kyis smras pa yi// bdag gi nag su brten pa gang phyir dus ma yin// yul la mngon par lhung che dus ma yin pa ste// de bzhin nor gyi cho gar zhugs pa dus yin no// dus rnams kun tu dus kyi 'gro ba khyab pa ste// dge legs nges
48a6(skyes rabs): par thob la dus yod ma yino// gang yang rgyal pos bdag la rgyal srid 'dir bzhed pa// de yang yab kyi rgya chen mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sred pa las ni nad pa'i mi 'phrod zas bzhin du// bdag gi rab tu 'dzin par nus pa ma yin no// gauti mug rmongs pa'i
48b1(skyes rabs): gzhi ma mi skyong rgyal po nyid// rab tu 'thob par mi ni mkhas pas gang phyir nus// gang du skyo ba dang bcas rgyags dang lang du ba dang // pha rol log par spyod pas chos la gnod pa'o// 'dzam+bu chu gser bzhin du gsal ba'i lding khang ni// dug dang 'dres
48b2(skyes rabs): pa'i kha zas bzung po lta bu dang // gza' yi sna 'khrugs pa'i pad+ma dang bcas chu lta bu// rgyal srid dang ni gaster dag sdug bsngal dag gi rten// de ltar rgyal srid chos min bde ba ma yin pa// ji ltar mi gtsang skyes te mi dbang sde ma rnams// sdug bsngal
48b3(skyes rabs): yongasu spang bya na tshod rab mchog tsha// rgyal srid nges par dor nas nigasu song bar gyur// rin chen bzhin du tshim pa mchog ni nyer khyud nas// 'brog dgon dag na rtswa dag zos pa mchog yin la// sbrul nag bzhin du mthong ba ma yin nyes pa ni/
48b4(skyes rabs): rnyed bla'i dpal dang lhan cig nyal ba mchog ma yin// rgyal srid rnaM pa spangs pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos// mngon par 'dod pas na gsu rab 'jug bsngags pa ste// nags tshal yongasu dor nas khyim du rab 'jug pa// dam bca' nye bar bcom pa'i
48b5(skyes rabs): 'thad pa ma yin no// rigs su skyes shing sems pa dang bcas mi gang gis// chos ni mngon par 'dod pas nugasu rab zhugs la// ngur smrig rab tu dor nas ngo tsha rnam spangs pa// grong khyer 'joms pa yi yang grong la bsnyen ma yin// sred
48b6(skyes rabs): dang rnam par rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis// gang zhig bskyugs pa'i bza' ba slar yang len byed la// sred dang do ni rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis// 'dod pa rnams ni dor nas slar yang len par byed// gang zhig rab 'bar khang
49a1(skyes rabs): pa dag nas ci zhig ltar// byung nas slar yang de nyid kho nar rab 'jug la// nyes pa mthong de khyim na gnas pa dor nas ni// rmongs pas slar yang len par mngon par 'dod pa'o// gang yang mi skyong khyim na gnas
49a2(skyes rabs): pas thar pa ni// 'thob pa dang ldan zhes thos de ni med pa ste// zhi ba gtso bo'i thar pa'i chos ni gleng la'ang // chad pa gtso bo'i rgyal po'i chos ni gang du'o// zhi la dga' ba gal te rgyal srid dman pa ste// rgyal srid la blo gal te zhi ba rnam par
49a3(skyes rabs): nyams// grang dang dro dang me dang chu yi gcig nyid bzhin// zhi pa dang ni rno nyid 'thad pa ma yi no// me dang chu yi du ba yod pa ma yin la// khram dang drang po'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin zhing // 'phags dang sdig pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin te// /
49a4(skyes rabs): zhing dang chad pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yino// de phyir sa 'dzin bdag po de rnams nges pas sam// rgyal po'i sred rnams spangs te zhi ba thob pa can// rgyal srid dag la snyen nas dbang po sbas nyid las// mthar ma thug par thar par mngon pa'i
49a5(skyes rabs): nga rgyal byas// de dag rnams kyi rgyal srid la zhi ji lta bzhin// bdag ni nags tshal rab thob nges pas ma yin zhing // khyim dang gnyen gyi 'du shes zhags pa bcad nas ni// thar gyur slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod ma yin// de ltar bdag nyid
49a6(skyes rabs): rnam shes yon tan rjes mthun pa// re 'dod spangs shing gtan tshigs ldan pa sgrog pa ste// mi dbang bdag nyid skyes kyi smra ldan thos gyur nas// gsang sngags 'dzin pa yis kyang lan ni smras pa'o// gang zhig chos kyi cho gar nges pa khyod kyi
49b1(skyes rabs): 'di rig pa min pa ma yin 'di ni dus rigs min// na tshong la gnas yab ni mya ngan phyir byin nas// chos 'dod khyod kyi chos ma yin par gyur pa'o// nges par khyed kyi blo ni shin tu phra min zhing // yang na chos dang don dang 'dod par mkhas ma
49b2(skyes rabs): yin// gang zhig ma mthong 'bras bu'i don du khyed nyid kyis// mngon sum don ni yongasu brnyas par mdzad nas gshegs// yang srid yod ces kha cig dag ni smra ba ste// mid ces kha cig dag ni nges par dam 'cha'o// de ltar gang tshe dron 'di
49b3(skyes rabs): the tshom gyur pa ste// de phyir longs spyod bar nus dpal ni nye bar gnas// gal te slar yang rab tu 'jug pa gang yang yod// der ni ji ltar 'bad pa dag la dga' bar bgyi// ci ste gzhan du rab tu 'jug la gang yang med// 'gro ba 'di yi
49b4(skyes rabs): 'bad rtsol med las thar pa 'grub// kha cig 'jig rten pha rol yod ces smra ba ste// thar pa'i sbyor ba la ni bsngags pa byed ma yin// ji ltar me yi dro dang chu yi gsher ba nyid// de ltar rab tu 'jug par rang bzhin nyid du smra// dge dang mi dge
49b5(skyes rabs): nyid dang srid dang srid min la// kha cig rang bzhin las zhes bsngags pa byed pa ste// gang phyir 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin las yin te// de yi phyir yang rab tu 'bad pa don med 'gyur// gang zhig dbang po rnams kyis nges par rab spyod
49b6(skyes rabs): pa/ yul rnams la ni dga' ba dang ni mi dga' nyid// gang zhig dga' dang nad rnams ngag gis sbyor byed de// de la gang gis 'bad dam de ni rang bzhin no// chu rnams kyis ni me rnams zhi bar nye 'gro zhing // 'od zer rnams kyi chu ni skems par byed
50a1(skyes rabs): pa ste// lus la yang dag gnas pa'i 'byung ba tha dad rnams// gcig nyid gyur nas 'gro ba dag ni 'dren par byed// gang zhig lag pa rkang pa lto rgyab mgo rnams kyi// mngal du song ba'i ngo bo des par sgrub byed
50a2(skyes rabs): la// gang tshe bdag nyid de yi de yis sbyor ba ste// rang bzhin las byung be shes rnams kyis de smra'o// byA dang ri dgas rnams kyi sna tshogs ngo bo dang // tsher ma'i rnon po nyid du rab tu byed pa su// rab tu 'jug pa 'di kun rang bzhin las yin la//
50a3(skyes rabs): 'dod pa byed pa yod min 'bad pa gang las so// de bzhin gzhan rnams dbang phyug las skyes smra ba ste// der ni skyes bu'i rab tu 'jug pa la don ci// 'gro ba'i rab tu 'jug la gang nyid rgyu yin zhing // ldog pa la ni nges par de nyid rgyu yin no// kha cig
50a4(skyes rabs): bdag gi mtshan ma nyid du smra ba ste// rab tu skye ba nyid dang srid pa zad pa yang // 'bad pa med las rab tu skye bar smra ba ste// 'bad pa yis ni thur pa 'thob par smra ba'o// lha yi mchod sbyin drang srong rnams kyi rig byed dang // pha yi bu lon med pa bu
50a5(skyes rabs): rnams kyis te mi// gang gis grol ba yod pa ngo yi thar pa zhes// bu lon gsum po de dang lhan cig skyes pa'o// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni// 'bad rtsol bcas pa'i thar pa de shes rnam smra la// 'bad rtsol ldan pa yin yang rnam par
50a6(skyes rabs): rnon pa yis// thar pa 'dod pa rnams ni ngal ba thob par byed// de phyir zhi ba gal te thar la gus yod no// cho gar brjod pa ji ltar rigs pas bsnyen mdzod dang // 'di yi nye bar 'thad pa de ltar gyur pa ste// mi yi bdag po'i kun nas gdung ba nyams
50b1(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// dka' thub nags tshal dag nas khang par 'jug pa la// khyod kyi skyon gyi blo gros gang zhig rab zhugs te// ya ba gcig der yang khyod kyi bsam par ma gyur dang // snga ma rnams kyang nags nas rang gi khang par gshegs
50b2(skyes rabs): dka' thub nags na gnas pa bu rnams kyis bskor te// rgyal po a mA ri Sha grong du zhugs gyur la// de bzhin 'phags min rnams kyis sa ni rnam bcom pa// dka' thub nags nas 'ongs nas rangs byed kyis bsrung so// de bzhin
50b3(skyes rabs): do ba dang bcas bdag po'i ljon shing ming // nags gnas bu dang bcas pa grong du zhugs pa ste// tshangs pa'i drang srong gyur dang thub pa gnas 'jog las// sbyin bsreg dang bcas mtha' can lha yi dpal gzung ngo // rnam pa de ltar
50b4(skyes rabs): chos dang grags par rab zhugs pa// nags rnams bor nas khang khyim rnamasu song ba ste// de phyir dka' thub nags nas chos kyi ched du nyid// khyim na rab tu 'gro ba skyon yod ma yin no// de nas mi skyong rgyal po'i dga' dang phan
50b5(skyes rabs): pa nyid// byas pa'i blon po dri yi tshig dag gsan nas ni// dman min ma 'khrugs chags min brtan dang gnas pa lnga// myur min tshig ni rgyal po sras kyi smras pa'o// 'dir ni yod dang med ces the tshom gang de ni// gzhan gyi
50b6(skyes rabs): tshig gis bdag la 'di na nges pa med// dka' thub dang ni zhi bas de nyid rtogs gyur nas// gang 'dir nges par bdag nyid kyis ni bzung bar bgyi// phan tshun gnod cing mi gsal the tshom skye ba yi// lta ba dag ni len par bdag
51a1(skyes rabs): gis nus ma smin// mun par long bas yong ba'i lam mkhan byed pa bzhin// mkhas pa'i sgyebo su zhig gzhan gyi rgyun b+hu // de nyid ma mthong gyur kyang 'on kyang kho bo yi// dge dang mi dger the tshom
51a2(skyes rabs): na dge blo gros 'gyur// 'bras bu med phyir la yang dge ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ smod pa'i bdag nyid de nyid la yang bde ba med// rnam gzhag mong ba'i lung 'di yang nang ni mthong gyur nas// tshad ldan rnams kyi gang smras de ni legs/
51a3(skyes rabs): rtogs mdzod// nyes la rab dman tshad ldan nyid ni rtogs mdzod dang // nyes pa rab tu dman pas bdun min smra ba yin// khyim la 'jug par dmigs gang bdag la khyod kyis ni// smras shing rengs byed la sogs rnams ni dper
51a4(skyes rabs): bstan te// de rnams tshad min chos nges rnamasu nus med cing // tshad ma'i ched du brtul zhugs rnams ni yongasu zad// de lta na yang nyi ma sa la lhung gyur la// grangs dang ldan pa'i ri bos brtan nyid nor na yang // de nyid ma mthong yul la
51a5(skyes rabs): kha bltas dbang po ni// khyim rnams dag la so so skye bo mi bsnyen to// bdag ni 'bar gyur pa'i me la 'jug pa ste// don ma byas par khyim gyi gzhi la rab mi 'jug/ de ltar thugs rgyal ldan des dam bca' mdzad gyur cing // ji ltar
51a6(skyes rabs): 'dod bzhin bzhengs nas sngar 'dzin med par gshegs// de nas mchi ma dang bcas blon dang gnyis skyes gnyis// de yi brtan pa nyid dang nges pa thos gyur nas// yi mug gzhi ldan rje su song nas sdug bsngal ba// dal bus song nas grong
51b1(skyes rabs): khyer nyid du song bar gyur// de nas de la brtse dang mi skyong la gus las// de dag ltos bcas rab tu song zhing gnas gyur la// gsal zhing snang bas nyi ma blta bar dka' ba ltar// de ni lam du blta bar ma nus dor bar min// mchog
51b2(skyes rabs): tu gshegs te gshegs pa shes phyir de dag gis// so pa'i skyes bu gtsang ma sbas pa rnams byas nas// dga' zhing sras po 'dod pa'i rgyal po la song nas// ji ltar blta 'am zhes ni ji ltar yang song ngo // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa
51b3(skyes rabs): zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gras chen po las/ gzhon nu rjesu tshol ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / sku stong rgyas shing rgya chen rgyal po'i sras po ste// bsreg bya dang bsngags bdag po de dag rnams spangs te// dpa'
51b4(skyes rabs): rlabs g.yo ba'i chu bo gang+gA brgal nas ni// dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur// ri rnams dag gis legs par sbas dang brgyan pa dang // dge dang dka' thub gter bas gzung dang gtsang ba ste// zhi ba rang
51b5(skyes rabs): byung tshangs pa mtho ris logasu bzhin// rig sngags mtshan ma'i grong khyer rab tu thob par gyur// zab mor gyur pa'i mdangs drar dwe yi lugs gsal ba// skyes bu rnams ni shin tu gnon pa mthong gyur nas// khyu mchog rgyal mtshan de yi
51b6(skyes rabs): brtul zhugs brtan pa bzhin// der ni de tshe skye bo rnams ni ya mtshan gyur// de rab mthong nas gzhan gang ma song de gnas shing // der ni gang zhig lam na gnas de rjes 'gro zhing // gang zhig sgren por song gyur la// kha cig bsdad pa gang
52a1(skyes rabs): yin de ni lang pa'o// skye bo kha cig de la mchod pa'i lag pa yis// bsti stang byas nas kha cig mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing // kha cig mnyen pa'i tshig gis mngon par stong byed cing // kha cig de la
52a2(skyes rabs): rab tu mchod nas song bar gyur// de rab mthong nas sna tshogs cha lugs rnams ngo tsha// rab bkram tshigs ni lam du smra ba med par song // dngosu gzhan du chos rnams dag gi nye logasu// kha cig tshul ma yin pa'i blo gros ma gyur to//
52a3(skyes rabs): lha dang mtshungs pa'i mi dbang sras po de mthong nas// bya ba gzhan ma rnams kyang rgyal po'i lam du ni// mchod mang bkur sti sngon 'gro bud med rnams kyi 'am// skyes pa rnams kyi mig dang ngom par ma gyur to// dpral ba
52a4(skyes rabs): 'am smin ma dag dang zhal lam spyan dag dang // sku 'am phyag dag dang ni 'gros sam zhabs dag ni// gang gis de yi gang nyid der ni mthong gyur pa// de nyid kyis ni de yi mig dag bcings par gyur// smin ma mdzod spu
52a5(skyes rabs): dang bcas spyan dag yangs pa dang // sku lus mdzes shing dge ba'i dra ba dang ldan phyag/ sa skyong nyid du 'os pa'i dge slong cha lugs de// mthong nas rgyal po'i khab kyi phun tshogs g.yos par gyur// de nas khang pa'i phyi nas
52a6(skyes rabs): rnam rgyal skye bo'i tshogs// ma ga d+ha yi khyim gyi jo bo bzo sbyangs kyis// mthong bar gyur te de yi rgyu mtshan dris pa ste// de nas 'di la skyes bu rnams kyis de smraso// ye shes mchog gam yang na sa yi dpal dag ni// thob par 'gyur/
52b1(skyes rabs): zhes bram ze rnams kyis gang smras pa// rab tu gshegs par skye bos nges par mthong ba yi// shAkya'i bdag po'i sras po de ni 'di yin// de nas don thos yid kyi chags shing zhen gyur pa'i// rgyal ba'i sa ni skyes bu de nyid la
52b2(skyes rabs): smras pa// de ni gang du song zhes rnam par shes par mdzod// de nas de ltar bgyi zhes skyes bu rje su song // g.yo mi spyan ni gnya' shing gang tsam gzigs pa ste// gsung ni kun nas snyoms shing zab mo'i 'gros mnga' ba// g.yo ba'i sems
52b3(skyes rabs): dang lus rnams ngag ni nges bsdams na// dge slong mchog nyid de yang bsod snyoms la gsheg so// ji ltar nye bar 'thad pa'i bsod snyoms bsnams nas ni// rnam par dben zhing char rab 'bab par rab gshegs la// der ni
52b4(skyes rabs): tshul bzhin rigs pas mngon par gsol gyur nas// de ni sa 'dzin ri bo sgyu bsring la 'dzeg so// ro d+ha'i nags kyis nye bar sbas pa'i ri bo dor// rma byi'i skad kyis rab gang lo ma'i skyil po na// 'char ri'i steng na nyi ma gzhon nu ji lta bar
52b5(skyes rabs): ngur smrig gos kyis nyi ma'i nyi ma de mdzes so// der ni de nyid rgyal po'i 'khor de mthong gyur nas// bzo sbyangs rgyal po la ni gtam dag byas pa ste// thos nas rgyal po des kyang mchod pa mang po las// der ni sbas pa'i rje su 'bring bas
52b6(skyes rabs): rab tu song // sgyu bseng ri bo mchog la skya bseng na dang ni// brtson 'grus mnyam zhing ri bo dang mnyam sku lus can// mi yi seng ge'i 'gros can cod pan 'dzin po ste// ral pa g.yo ba'i seng ge bzhin du 'dzegs par gyur// de nas de yi steng
53a1(skyes rabs): na rtse mor gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' dbang po nye bar zhi ba ni// ri 'ong gis mtshan sprin gyi sbubs nas byung ba bzhin// skyil mo krung gis bzhugs nas rnam par mdzes pa mthong // gzugs dang phun
53a2(skyes rabs): sum tshogs dang nye bar zhi ba yis// chos kyi sprul pa bzhin du nye bar bzhugs de la// ya mtshan drang bcas rab tu gnyen ldan mi dbang po// rang byung la ni brgya byin gyis bzhin nye bar gnas// rigs pa yis ni rigs pa rig pa rnams
53a3(skyes rabs): kyi mchog/ khams mnyam gyur pa de la song nas dris pa ste// ngo nyid kyis kyang mtshungs shing zhi bas mi skyong la// yid ni rang bzhin gnas dang nad med smras par gyur// de nas gtsang la glang po'i rna ba ltar sngo ba'i// rdo ba'i logs la rgyal po
53a4(skyes rabs): yang dag nges gnas shing // nye sar nye bar bsdad nas rje su mthun pa yis// de yi dgongs pa rnam par shes 'dod 'di smra so// rim pas 'ongs pa nyid dang yongasu brtags pa ste// khyod kyi rigs kyis bdag gi dga' ba mchog yin la// gang
53a5(skyes rabs): phyir bdag la rang gi na tshod smra 'dod pa// skyes te de phyir brtse ba'i tshig 'di mkhyen par mdzod// khyod kyi rigs ni rnam rgyas sngon du nyi ma ste// lus kyang na tshod gsar pa gsal la mdzes pa 'di// gang phyi 'di ni khyod kyis blo glos rim
53a6(skyes rabs): meng pas// slong mo nyid la mngon dga' rgyal srid la ma yin// khyod kyi lus 'di tsan ngan dmar po 'os pa ste// ngur smrig gis dkris de ni 'os pa ma yin no// lag pa 'di ni skye dgu skyong bar 'os pa ste// gzhan gyis byin pa'i bza' ba za
53b1(skyes rabs): bar 'os ma yin// de phyir zhi ba gal te yab kyi rgyal srid la// khyod kyi yab kyi brtse las stobs kyis mi 'dod cing // khyod kyi blo gros rim par bzod par ma gyur na// sbyin par kho bo'i yul gyi phyed la longs spyod mdzod// de lta na ni
53b2(skyes rabs): rang gi skye la gnod min zhing // dus kyi rim pa yid kyang dpal gang bsngags pa ste// de phyir khyod kyis bdag la brtse ba mdzod cig dang // dam pa rnams dang bcas pas ngom pa'i dpal 'phe lo// ci ste da ni rigs kyi khengs pa nyid
53b3(skyes rabs): las ni// bdag cag rna la khyod la blo gtad yon tan med// sde rgyas rnams ni mnga' yis rnam par dkrugs byas nas// bdag dang bcas pas pha rol rnams ni pham par mdzod// de phyir 'dir ni gnyis dbus gcig blo tshol mdzod
53b4(skyes rabs): la|/ chos don 'dod pa rnams la cho ga bzhin bsnyen mdzod// 'di na sde mtshan gsum po chags las rnam bzlog nas// 'di dang gzhan du phyin nas lhung ba kun nas 'thob// gang zhig don dang chos la gnod nas 'dod pa dang //
53b5(skyes rabs): chos dang 'dod pa yongasu brnyas nas don dang ni// 'dod dang don dag nye bar zhi bas chos de ni// don byas gal te mtha' dag 'dod na ngon yin no// de phyir sde mtshan gsum la nges par bsnyen pa yis// khyod kyi gzugs 'di 'bras bu
53b6(skyes rabs): bcas pa nyid du mdzod// chos dang don dang 'dod pa dman min thob pa la// mi rnams ngag gi dman min skye ba'i don du smra// de phyir gzhu ni rnam par 'gengs 'os rgyas pa'i phyag/ 'di dag 'bras bu med par byed par 'os min te/
54a1(skyes rabs): nga la bzhin 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum rnams kyang // pham par 'os pa yin na sa 'dir smos ci dgos// brtse bas nges par de ni bdag gis smra ba ste// ya mtshan gyis min dbang phyug nyid kyi chags pas min//
54a2(skyes rabs): khyod kyi dge slong nyid kyi cha lugs 'di mthong nas// rjes su brtse ba skyes nas mchi ma yang byung ngo // de phyir rang rigs rab mtshungs khyod kyi gzugs ji srid// rga bas zil gyis mnan nas slar yang ma 'ongs par// slong mo'i gnas 'dod 'dod
54a3(skyes rabs): pa rnams la longs spyod la// dus su chos la dga' ba chos ni gyis mdzod cig/ khogs pas nges par chos ni 'thob par nus pa ste// 'dod pa nye bar spyod la rgas pa'i 'gro ba med// de phyir dar la bab pa'i 'dod pa rnams smra ste// bar ma'i
54a4(skyes rabs): nor yin rgan po rnams kyi chos yi mo// gson pa'i 'jig rten dgra na chos dang don dag ni// rnam par dgal bar gyur pa yin phyir lang tsho rnams// yang dag bsrung ba yin yang thub par dka' ba ste// gang phyir 'dod pas lam de las ni
54a5(skyes rabs): 'phrogs par byed// na chod 'khogs pa rnams ni rnam dpyod ldan pa ste// shin tu brtan pa'i gnas skabs mchog tu song ba rnams// ngo tsha ba nyid phyir dang song ba ma yin phyir// 'bad pa nyung ngus zhi ba'i bdag nyid gyur pa'o// de nyid phyir na g.yo
54a6(skyes rabs): zhing yul ni gtso bo dang // rab mos bzod pa ma yin ring por mthong min la// 'brog dgon dag la nges par thar nas dbugs phyung bzhin// g.yo sgyu mang po'i lang tsho shin tu 'das nas so// de phyir mi brtan g.yo la bag med ldan pa yi//
54b1(skyes rabs): mchod gsar pa 'di ni re zhig rnam par 'ong // 'dod pa'i lha yi sngon du na tshod 'ben yin la// dbang po rnams las bsrung bar nus pa ma yin no// ci ste khyed kyis chos nyid mdzad par 'dod pa ni// mchod sbyin gyis lha mchod mdzod
54b2(skyes rabs): 'di ni rigs kyi chos// mchod sbyin rnams kyis mtho ris logs ni byin rlabs nas// lha dbang nyid kyang mtho ris logasu gshegs par gyur// gser gyi dpung rgyan rnam par bcings pa'i phyag rnams dang // nor bu'i sgron mas 'bar ba'i
54b3(skyes rabs): dbu rgyan sna tshogs can// mi skyong drang srong rnams dang drang srong chen po rnams// ngal bas gur gshegs 'gros der mchod sbyin rnams kyis gshegs// de ltar ma ga d+ha yi bdag pos tshig smras pa// gang zhig dbang po'i bzhin du smra//
54b4(skyes rabs): pa yang dag mdzes// sna tshogs du ma'i sa phyogs ti si'i gangs ri ltar// rgyal po sras des de thos gyur nas rnam ma g.yos// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ bzo sbyangs sngon du song ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
54b5(skyes rabs): de nas bshes kyi sgo nas phan pa yin pa'i don// de ltar ma ga d+ha yi bdag po smras pa yis// rang gnas rnam par 'gyur min rigs gtsang gtsang ba'o// zas gtsang rgyal po'i sras kyi tshig 'di smras pa'o// seng ges mtshan pa'i yang
54b6(skyes rabs): pa'i rigs su rab skyes pa// khyed kyi cho ga de ni ngo mtshar che ma yin// gang phyir bshes gnyen phyogasu gshegs 'dod khyod kyi ni// yongasu dag pa'i spyod pas spyod pa de yin no// rang rigs rje su spyod pas dam pa min la byams// dbang po
55a1(skyes rabs): ma tshang ba la dpal bzhin gnas min la// sna mas byas pa'i dga' ba rims rnams kyis// de ni dam pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar byed// don ni dka' ba rnams su mi rnams gang zhig gis// mdza bo rnam
55a2(skyes rabs): kyi mnyam pa'i don gyur 'jig rten na// bshes gnyen de rnams blo yaM yongasu shes bgyi ste/ rang gnas dag ni 'phel bar gang gi phyir ma yin// de ltar gang gis rdzas ngag thob nas 'jig rten na// bshes rnams dang ni chos la nges
55a3(skyes rabs): bar sbyor byed pa// de rnams kyis ni nor gyi snying po thob pa ste// mthar ni nyams las gdung ba skyed par byed ma yin// rgyal po mdza' bo nyid dang 'phags pa nyid kyis kyang // khyod kyi nges pa gang zhig bdag la dmigs pa 'di// mdza' bo nyid
55a4(skyes rabs): kyi 'dir ni rjes su bsnyad bgyi ste// rgol ba gzhan min 'dir ni bdag gis smra bar bgyi// bdag gis rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams rigs nas// thar pa 'dod pas chos 'di rab tu thob pa ste// gnyen 'dun dga' ba mchi ma'i gdod
55a5(skyes rabs): ldan rnams spangs nas// mi dge'i rgyur gyur 'dod pa rnams ni sngon nyid do// bdag gi yul rnams ngag las ji ltar 'jigs pa nyid// de ltar sbrul gyi dug rnams la ni mi 'jigs shing // nam mkha' dag las 'phos pa'i thog rnams las min
55a6(skyes rabs): la// rlung dang bcas pa'i me rnams ngag las ma yin no// mi rtag 'dod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i nor rku zhing // stong pa rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'jig rten na// yid la smos pa yid kyang smos par byed pa ste// me yi sems ni bdag nyid gnas
55b1(skyes rabs): pa smos ci 'tshal// kye ma 'dod pas zil gyis non na mtho ris su// bde ba thob min 'chi ba'i 'jig rten na smos ci// rlung grogs ldan pa'i me yi byud shing gis ji ltar// sred dang bcas pa'i 'dod pa rnams kyis tshim pa med// 'gro na 'dod pa
55b2(skyes rabs): rnams dang mnyam pa'i don med med// rmongs las de rnams kho nar skye bo rab tu chags// de nyid shes nas de ltar don med 'jigs pa ste// shes ldan su zhig rang gis don med mngon par 'dod// rgya mtsho'i gos can sa ni kun nas kyang //
55b3(skyes rabs): rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol rgal bar 'dod pa ste// rgya mtsho'i chu bo rnams dang chu bran rnams kyis ltar// 'jig rten pa yi 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med// lha yis gser gyi char pa dag kyang phab gyur la// gling rnams bzhi po mtha' dag la yang
55b4(skyes rabs): longs spyad de// brgya byin gyis kyang gdan phyed dag kyang rab thob nas// nga la nu ni yul rnams dag la ngoms pa med// lha na lha rnams kyi yang rgyal srid longs spyad nas// mchod sbyin brgya pa lha min 'jigs las rab nyams tshe// rgyags las drang
55b5(skyes rabs): srong chen po rnams la'ang khur bcol nas// 'dod pa rnams la ngoms med sgra med lhung bar gyur// e la'i rgyal pos mtho ris rnams ni rnam dkrugs te// brla mdzes lha mo de nyid dbang du byas nas kyang // sred phyir drang srong rnams la gser dag
55b6(skyes rabs): phrog pa ste// yul rnams la ni ngoms med nyams par song bar gyur// lha min las ni dbang chen las dgra med// dgra med las slar dbang chen gang du nyer song ste// mtho ris dang ni sa 'am yul ni de rnamasu// bskal pa'i tshogs 'khrugs rnams
56a1(skyes rabs): la su zhig blo gtang byed// shing shun gos can rtsa ba 'bras bu chu za zhing // lag 'gro'i sbrul ltar ring ba'i ral pa'i khur rnams kyang // gang gis don gzhan ma yin thub pa yang nyams te// 'dod pa zhes bya'i
56a2(skyes rabs): dgra po rnams ni su yis tshol// rno ba'i mtshon tshe dang ni rno 'dzin mtshon cha yang // gang gi don du 'jigs te las ni 'chi thob la// de dag rnams kyi dge min sems kyang spyod rnams kyi// 'joms phyir de phyir brtul zhugs rnams
56a3(skyes rabs): kyis smos ci dgos// yul rnams su ni mya ngan nyung ngu ra shes gyur nas// kun nas sbyor zhing mchog tu ngoms pa med pa nyid// dam pa rnams kyis smod cing nges par sdig pa ste// 'dod pa'i ming can dug ni su yis len par byed// zhing
56a4(skyes rabs): gis las la sogs pa rnams kyis nyam thug cing // 'dod pa rnams la mi tshar rnams kyi rang gnas dang // 'dod pa'i bdag nyid rnams kyi rang gnas thob nas ni// 'dod pa rnams ni slong bar sems ldan rnams kyis nus// grub
56a5(skyes rabs): 'gyur 'dod pa rnams su rgyags pa nyer 'thob phyir// 'dod pa can la 'dod 'byor rgud pa shes bya ste// rgyags las bya ba min byed bya ba ma yin la// gang gis zad cing ngan 'gror nye ba 'gro ba 'gyur/ gang la 'bad pas thob cing yongasu
56a6(skyes rabs): bskyangs pa rnams// rnam par bslus nas slar yang so sor 'gro ba ste// bdag nyid ldan pas g.yar po dang mtshungs de rnam su// 'dod pa rnams la 'di na mkhas pa su zhig dga'// btsal nas dang ni blangs nas skom pa skyes pa yi//
56b1(skyes rabs): gang rnams mi 'dror sdug bsngal bar ni yongs 'gro la// 'jig rten dag na rtswa sgron dang mtshungs de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnam la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// bdag ldan min pa'i snying la gang gis rnam rmugs te// rnam par nyes
56b2(skyes rabs): par 'gro 'gyur bde bar 'gro min zhing // kun nas khros pa'i sbrul dang rab mtshungs de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// ltogs pas nyam thag khyi bzhin rus pa zos nas kyang // gang rnams la ni
56b3(skyes rabs): ngoms par 'gyur ba ma yin nyid// 'khogs pa'i rus pa'i keng rus dang mnyam de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// gang gi rgyal po rkun po chu dang me rnams las// thun mong gyur pa nyid phyir sdug
56b4(skyes rabs): bsngal bskyed byed de// rab tu gtor ba'i shA dang mtshungs pa de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// dgra bo dang ni gnyen 'dun 'brel pa rnams las kyang // gang la gnas pa rnams ni skyen par rgud
56b5(skyes rabs): pa ste// skye mched dang mtshungs nye bar 'tshe ba de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// ri dang nags dang chu dang rgya mtsho rnams su yang // gang la rnam par 'phyo ba rnams ni lhung gyur te// ljon shing rtse mo'i
