56b6(skyes rabs): 'bras bu dang mtshungs de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad pa drag po 'thob pa rnams// gang gi skad cig gis 'dir nyams par 'gyur ba ste// rmi lam nye bar long spyod dang mtshungs de rnamasu// /
57a1(skyes rabs): 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// gang rnams bsgrubs nas dang ni rnam par spel nas dang // yongasu bskyangs nas kyang ni bde bar 'gro min la// lci ba'i me ma mu ra dang rab mtshungs de rnam su//
57a2(skyes rabs): 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// gang gi don du sgra ngan rnams ni nyams gyur la// ro bsregs shing dang rab tu mtshungs pa de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la bdag ldan su yi dga' ba yin// lha min mdzes sbyin dang ni nye
57a3(skyes rabs): ba'i mdzes sbyin dag/ gang gi don du phan tshun dgrar song nyams gyur la// mdza' bshes gyur cing rnam par 'bral ba de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// gang dag rnams kyi don du chu dang me lo dang // sha
57a4(skyes rabs): za rnams la bdag nyid 'dir ni 'dor ba ste// dge ba ma yin dgra bor gyur pa de rnamasu// 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin// bshes med 'dod pa'i don du bkren por byed pa ste// gsod dang 'ching ba la sogs sdug
57a5(skyes rabs): sngal rab thob la// 'dod pa'i don du sems ni bkren pa'i dka' thub can// gson pa'i 'jig rten 'ching ba dang ni ngal bar 'gro// ri dgas rnams ni gsong phyir glu yis 'phrog byed la// gzugs kyi don du phye ma leb rnams mer mchong zhing //
57a6(skyes rabs): sha ngag don gnyer nya yis lcags ni za ba ste// de phyir yul rnams don med nyid du 'bras bu smin// 'dod pa'i longs spyod yin zhes gang gis blo yin la// kha cig long spyod rnams ni yongasu spyod pa ste// gos sogs rdzas kyi yon tan yin phyir 'jig
57b1(skyes rabs): rten na// sdug bsngal zhi bar byed ces rab tu gzung bar bya// skom pa rab tu zhi phyir chu dag 'dod pa ste// bkres pa rnam par nyams phyir bza' ba de bzhin du// rlung dang gdung ba sgrib pa'i ched du khang pa ste// 'doms dang grung ba sgrib pa'i phyir/
57b2(skyes rabs): ni bgo ba'o// de bzhin nyid ni rnam par 'joms phyir gnas yin la// de bzhin lam la ngal ba nyams phyir theg pa ste// de bzhin gnas ni rnam par sbyong phyir stan yin la// gtsang dang nad med stobs la brten phyir khrus yin no// sdug bsngal
57b3(skyes rabs): rab tu zhi ba'i ched du gyur pa ste// de bzhin skye dgu rnams kyi yul nas longs spyod min// rab tu zhi ba'i cho gar rab zhugs shes rab can// long spyod rnams ni bza' zhes su yis khas len byed// gang zhig 'gro ba'i gdung bas rnam par gdung
57b4(skyes rabs): pa yin// longs spyod yin zhes grang ba'i bya bar nan tan byed// sdug bsngal zhi ba'i bdag nyid la ni rab 'jug cing // des ni 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod 'dur shes byed// gang phyir 'dod pa rnams la mtha' gcig gyur min te// de phyir bdag
57b5(skyes rabs): gi de la ljongs spyod 'du shes med// dngos po gang nyid kyis ni bde ba ster byed pa// de nyid kyis ni slar yang sdug bsngal 'dren par byed// bgo ba lce mo dang ni lci ba ma yin nyid// grang dang dro ba'i tshe na bde dang bde min la// zla 'od rnams dang
57b6(skyes rabs): can ngan nyid kyang dri ba na// bde ba'i phyir dang sdug bsngal phyir yin grang ba na'o// gang phyir rnyed dang ma rnyed la sogs 'jig rten na// kun gyi gnyi su 'dzin pa rnams ni rab zhugs te// de phyir mtha' gcig bde ba yod pa ma yin zhing // sa na
58a1(skyes rabs): skyes bu kha cig mtha' cig sdug bsngal min// bde dang sdug bsngal nyid ni rnam par 'dres mthong nas// rgyal srid dang ni byan nyid mnyam pa bdag gi lugs// rgyal po nyid ni rtag par rgod pa ma yin zhing // dran ni kun
58a2(skyes rabs): nas gdung ba nyid kyang ma yin no// gdu phyir mi skyong nyid du bka' lung lhag par gyur// de phyir rgyal po'i sdug bsngal dag ni chen po nyid// kun nas brten pa'i shing dang rab mtshungs rgyal po ni// sred pa'i rgyu las yongasu ngal bar
58a3(skyes rabs): 'gro ba nyid// rgyal srid 'dor ldan pa shes min mang por mi sbyong gis// gal te blo gtad 'cha' bar gyur na rgud pa ste// ci ste yang nu blo gtad nye bar byed min na// 'dir ni 'jigs ldan rgyal po'i bde ba zhes bya ci// gang tshe sa ni mtha'
58a4(skyes rabs): drag rgyal bar gyur nas kyang // gnas pa'i ched du grong khyer gcig bu nyid mthong zhing // de nyid la yang pho brang gcig pu gnyen bya ste// rgyal por gyur pa pha rol don du ngal lam ci// rgyal po sdod pa'i gnas kyang gnya' shing gcig
58a5(skyes rabs): nyid do// de bzhin bkres pa 'gegs phyir bza' ba tsam yin la// de bzhin nyal lam gcig dang stan ni gcig nyid de// lhag dang lhag min mi skyong gis ni rgyags phyir ro// gal te tshim pa'i don du 'bras bu de 'dod na// rgyal srid rnams
58a6(skyes rabs): dang bral yang bdag ni tshim pa yod// tshim pa yod par gyur na skyes bu'i 'jig rten na// khyad par med pa ma yin thams cad khyad par ro// de phyir dge dang zhi ba'i lam ni rab thob pa// kho bo 'dod pa rnams la bslu bya ma yin la// mdza
58b1(skyes rabs): bshes nyid du dran par byas nas yang dang yang // dam bca' nges par skyong zhes bdag la smras pa'o// bdag ni nags su zhugs pa me bzod pas min la// dgra bo'i mnga' rnams kyis ni mgo bo 'dar ba min// 'bras bu lhag pa rnams
58b2(skyes rabs): las re ba byas min te// de phyir khyed kyi tshig de bzung ba ma yi no// gang zhig yang yang shin tu sos 'debs khros pa'i sbrul// spangs nas slar yang len pa la ni nan tan byed// yang na bsreg pa'i rang bzhin 'bar ba'i rtswa yi me// spangs
58b3(skyes rabs): nas 'dod pa rnams ni slar yang de yis brten// gang zhig ma long long ba'i phyir ni 'dod pa ste// grol ba 'ching ba'i phyir drang phyug po nor med phyir// rang bzhin gnas pa'i sems ni bsnyon pa'i sems phyir la// yul gyi bdag nyid phyir ni
58b4(skyes rabs): 'dod par de yis byed// gang zhig 'dir ni mchog tu zhi ba'i bde ba dang // gzhan du sdug bsngal rnams ni kun nas sgrib pa ste// byeng ldan rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs las sgrol 'dod pa// slongs mo nyo bar rgyu zhes rje su brtse bya min// gang zhig
58b5(skyes rabs): 'dir ni zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob min la// gzhan du sdug bsngal rnams kyis rab tu 'dzin byed cing // phun tshogs chen po'i bdag nyid la yang rnams gnas pa'i// sred pa zil gyis non la rjesu brtse bar bya// sems dpal yi dang spyod pa
58b6(skyes rabs): yi dang rigs nyid kyi// khyod kyis brjod pa la ni rjesu mthun pa ste// sems dpa' yi dang spyod pa yi dang rigs nyid kyis// kho bo yi yang ngam bca' 'dren par mtshungs pa'o// bdag kyang 'khor ba'i mda' yis rnam phug pa// zhi ba thob pas
59a1(skyes rabs): 'dod pas rnam par nges 'byung ste// nad med mtho ris na yang rgyal srid 'thob pa ru// 'dod pa med na kye ma mi rnams su smod ci// mi skyong gang yang sde gsum mtha' dag brten pa 'di// rab mchog mi ya don
59a2(skyes rabs): zhes khyed kyis bdag la smras// de ltar don med ces ni bdag gi brtan pa 'dir// mdzad ldan sde mtshan gsum ni tshim byed kyang ma yin// gang du dga' bar 'gro min 'jigs min nang ma yin// skyo min nye bar 'da' min sem
59a3(skyes rabs): kyi nang rnams ni// gang na yang dang yang du bya ba yod min pa// de nyid skyes bu'i don ni mchog tu shes pa'o// ji srid na tshong so ma rnam par 'gyur ba 'gro// de sring dga' ba yongasu sbyongs mdzod zhes smras pa// 'di ni nges pa ma
59a4(skyes rabs): yin g.yo bar mthong ba ste// rga ba brtan pa min dang lang tsho brtan ldan mthong // rang gi las mkhan mthar byed gang gi 'gro ba mi/ na tshong kun la dbang med rnam par 'gugs pa ste// rnam gzhag ma yin rnam par nyams tshe gang
59a5(skyes rabs): ltar ni// zhi 'dod mkhas pa dag gis dga' ba rtogs par byed// gang tshe rga ba'i gzhu dang nad rnams bkram pa'i mnga'// mthar byed dge ba ma yin rngon pa bzhin gnas pas// skye dgu'i ri dgas bskal pa'i nags rten rnams gtor
59a6(skyes rabs): te/ na tshad rab mchog la dmigs yid la re ba yi// de phyir gzhon nam rgan dang yang na byis pa ni// rab tu 'jug par 'dod dam rnam par ldog pa nyid// chos ldan bdag nyid byas pa ji lta bar gyur pa// de ltar myur ba ldan pas 'dir
59b1(skyes rabs): ni bya bar 'os// yang na 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rigasu bos pa rnams// chos phyir mchod sbyin bya ba gyi zhes gang smras pa// gang zhig gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bya bas 'dod pa ste// mchod sbyin rnams la phyag 'tshal bde ba 'dod pa
59b2(skyes rabs): med// 'bras bu 'dod pas dbang med pha rol gsod pa la// snying rje'i bdag nyid dam po rnams kyi rigs tshul min// gang yang mchod sbyin dag gi 'bras bu rtag gyur pa// snying rje'i bdag nyid gang gi de ltar byas nas ci// sems
59b3(skyes rabs): nI zhi ba yis sam tshul khrims brtul zhugs kyis// gul te chos tshul gzhan gyi cho ga ma yin la// de lta na yang mchod sbyin bsnyen par 'os yin te// gang du gzhan la 'tshes nas 'bras bur brjod pa'o// 'di nyid du yang
59b4(skyes rabs): zhig skyes bu gnas pa yi// bde ba gang zhig pha rol 'tshe bas rab zhugs grwa/ de yang brtse bcas blo dang ldan pa'i 'dod min te// gang zhig srid pa'i tha mar mI mthod kye ma ci// rgyal po 'khor bar bdag gi yid ni dga' med
59b5(skyes rabs): cing // 'bras bur rab tu 'jug phyir bdag ni bslu bya min// chu 'dzin char gyis brgyab pa'i ljon shing bzhin du nI// kun tu song ba'i rab tu 'jug pa rnams ni g.yo// rnam par thar pa smra ldan rtsibs phur thub pa ni// blta
59b6(skyes rabs): bar 'dod pas bdag ni 'dir yongs de yi phyir// mi skyong khyod la dge bar gyur cig da ni 'gro// bdag gi de nyid ltos med ngag ni bzod par mdzod// lha na dbang po bzhin bsrungs rtag par nyi bzhin bsrungs// yon tan
60a1(skyes rabs): gyis bsrungs su srungs 'dir ni dge legs bsrungs// tshe srungs 'phags pa yis srungs dam pa'i bu rnams dang // dpal srungs rgyal po'i bdag nyid kyis ni chos srungs shig/ kha ba'i dgra yi
60a2(skyes rabs): rtogs las skyes pa las skyes nas// ji ltar gnyis skyes gang zhig lus ni rnam thar 'gro// kha ba'i dgra yi dgra yis khyim gyi dgra 'joms nang // nang du de ltar gang zhig yid ni rnam par thar gshegs mdzod// thal
60a3(skyes rabs): mo sbyar bcas ro tho ba mi skyong gis smras pa// khyed kyis ji ltar 'dod pa gegs med thob par shog/ bya ba byas pa kun nas thob pa dus su 'dir// kho bo yi yang rje su 'dzin pa khyed kyis mdzad pa'o// de ltar gyur ces brtan pa'i
60a4(skyes rabs): dam bca' mdzad nas sa skyong la// de nas de ni thams cad sgrol gyi dka' thub gnas su gshegs// yongasu gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang ya mtshan gyur pa yi// mi skyong nyid kyang rI yi tshogs kyi grong khyer nyid du song //
60a5(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gras chen po las/ 'dod pa la rnam par smod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas lus kyi gang ba bzhin// bu ram shong po'i zla ba yis//
60a6(skyes rabs): bar gnas pa'i thub pa yis// rtsibs phur gyis ni gnasu bsnyen// sgyu rtsal shes kyi rigs de yis// rgyang nas gzigs nas mthon po yis// legs par 'ongs zhes smras pa ste// drung du nye bar gshegs pa'o// de gnyis phan
60b1(skyes rabs): tshun rigs par ni// khams ni snyoms par dris nas su// shing gtsang brtul zhugs gdan dgra la// sa phyogs gcing bar bzhugs pa'o// bkur mang rnam par yangs pa yi// lta byed dag gis 'thung ba bzhin// mi skyong
60b2(skyes rabs): sras po bzhugs de la// thub pa mchog des smras pa'o// zhi ba bdag gis shes pa ltar// khyim nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis 'thungs rgyags pas zhags pa ltar// brtse ba'i zhags pa bcad nas 'ongs//
60b3(skyes rabs): khyod kyi yid ni shes rab dang // kun nas brtan pa ldan pa nyid// dug gi ljon pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// gang khyod dpal dor nas 'ongaso// longs spyad lhag ma'i phreng ba bzhin// bu rnams ngag la dpal byin nas// sa skyong 'khog/
60b4(skyes rabs): pa'i na tshod rnams// gang zhig nags 'ongs ngo mtshar min// bdag gi lugs ni ngo mtshar te// so ma'i na tshod la khyod kyis// yul gyis spyod yul la gnas pa// dpal nyid longs ma spyad nas 'ongs// de phyir chos 'di
60b5(skyes rabs): shes pa la// khyod ni dam pa'i snod yin la// ye shes gru bo byin rlabs nas// sbyin par sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sgrol// gang yang slob mar shes pa na// dus kyis bstan bcos la 'jug ste// zab pa las dang nAn tan las// bdag gi
60b6(skyes rabs): yongs rtog khyod ma yin// de ltar rtsib 'phur nyid kyi tshig/ mi yi drang srong ngos gsan nas// mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa yis// lan gnyis rab tu smras pa'o// don ma byas kyang 'di yi ni// don byas bzhin du da lta nyid// chags
61a1(skyes rabs): dang bral ba 'di ni// dam pa khyed kyi mngon du gyur// blta bar 'dod pas 'od bzhin drang // sgrol bar 'dod pas gru bzhin dang // 'gro bar 'dod pas lam mkhan bzhin// khyed mthong ba la bdag gis
61a2(skyes rabs): shes// rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs rnams las// gal te gsung byar dgongs nAs mi/ de phyir gsung bar 'os pa'o// de ltar N+DI bas phur gyis gzhon nu'i// bdag nyid che las bskul ba nyid// rang nyid kyi ni bstan bcos kyi// nges par mdor
61a3(skyes rabs): bsdus gsungs pa'o// ji ltar 'khor ba yin pa la// ji ltar nges par ldog pa nyid// nyan po rnams kyi mchog grub mtha'// kho bo'i 'di ni gson mdzod cig/ rang bzhin dang ni rnam 'gyur dang // skye dang 'chi dang rga ba ste// re zhig sems dpa'
61a4(skyes rabs): zhes brjod pa// brtan pa'i sems dpa' de shes mdzod// de la rang bzhin shes bya ba// rang bzhin shes pa shes par mdzod// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid dang // blo dang mi gsal ba nyid do// rnam 'gyur zhes bya mkhyen par mdzod// yul rnam
61a5(skyes rabs): dang ni dbang po rnams// lag pa rkang pa ngag dang ni// 'phongs dang 'doms dang de bzhin yid// 'di yi zhing ni shre ba la// zhing shesa? zhes bya ba ste// zhing shes pa zhes bdag nyidadu// bdag tu bsam byed rnams kyi smras// slob ma dang bcas ser skya yis//
61a6(skyes rabs): 'dir ni rab tu rtogs zhes dran// bu dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa dang // skye dgu'i bdag por 'di brjod do// skye ba nyid dang rga ba dang // na ba dang ni 'chi ba gang // de ni gsal zhes rtogs bya ste// bzlog las mi gsal ba yang ngo // mi shes po dang las
61b1(skyes rabs): dang sred// 'khor ba'i rgyu rnams shes bya ste// gsum po 'dir gnas 'gro ba ni// snying stobs de ni 'dab pa med// log pa las dang ngar 'dzin las// the tshom las dang sngon 'phyo las// khyad par med las thabs min las// chags
61b2(skyes rabs): pa las dang mngon lhung las// de la log pa zhes bya ba// phyin ci log tu 'jug pa ste// bsam par bya ba gzhan sems zhing // bya ba gzhan ni byed pa'o// smra ba nga dang rig pa dang // 'gro ba dra dang gnas pa nga // de ltar 'di ni ngar 'dzin
61b3(skyes rabs): pa// ngar 'dzin med kyi 'jug pa'o// gang zhig the tshom maung dngos rnams// gcig tu gyur pas mthong ba ste// the tshom med pas 'dzi mo gong ltar// de 'dir the tshom du brjod do// gang zhig nga nyid de nyid 'di// yin dang blo dang las yin
61b4(skyes rabs): la/ gang zhig drangs te de nyid deng // zhes gang de ni mngon par 'phyo// rab rgyas rab rgyas ma yin pa'i// khyad par med pa'i khyad shes kye// rang bzhin rnams kyi gang shes pa// de ni khyad par med ces dran// phyag 'tshal ba dang gzhi mi
61b5(skyes rabs): 'grib// gsang gtor dang ni mngon mthor sogs// thabs min zhes ni shes ldan gyis// rab tu rtogs bya thabs shes kye// chags la mi skye yul rnams la// yi ngag blo dang las rnams kyis// blo ngan gang gis tshogs byed pa// de ni mngon par
61b6(skyes rabs): chags zhes dran// bdag gi 'di dang 'di bdag ces// gang zhig sdug bsngal mngon snyam ste// gang zhig 'khor bar ltung zhes bya// de ltar mkhas kye ma rig pa// gnas skabs lnga ni rab thob ste// mun pa rmongs pa rmongs pa che// mun las gyur
62a1(skyes rabs): pa gnyis nyid do// de la mun pa le lo dang // rmongs pa skye 'chir rtogs par mdzod// rmongs pa chen po 'dod pa zhes// kun nas rmongs med mkhyen par mdzod// gang phyir 'di na 'byung rnams kyi// chen por yang
62a2(skyes rabs): ni rab rmongs byed// de phyir phyag chen 'di dag ni// rmongs pa chen po zhes dran no// mun las gyur pa khro nyid du// lhag par byed pa'o khro med kyi// mi shes mun las gyur pa ni// skyo bar rab bshad skyo med kye// ma rig pa 'dis byis pa ni// gan+da
62a3(skyes rabs): skabs lnga drang ldan pa ste// 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyur pa yi// skye ba rnams su bab par byed// lta po nyan po shes pa / bya ba dang ni rgyu nyid dag/ nga zhes de ltar 'ongs nas ni// 'khor bar yongasu 'khor bar byed// blo ldan rgyu 'di rnams
62a4(skyes rabs): kyis 'di// skye ba'i rgyun la rab tu 'jug/ rgyu med pa las 'bras bu med// de ltar rnam par shes par 'os// de la rab rgyas rab rgyas mig/ gsal ba dang ni mi gsal nyid// thar pa 'dod pa bzhin rnams te// yang dag 'gro ba rigs pa
62a5(skyes rabs): mdzod// bzhi po de dag ji lta bzhin// 'gyur ming go ba phangs 'thob par byed// de phyir 'jig rten na tshangs pa// mchog tu tshangs par sma tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyod byed 'dir// tshangs pa rnams kyi gnas par byed// mi skyong sras kyis
62a6(skyes rabs): thub pa de'i// tshig 'di de ltar gsan nas ni// mthar thug go 'phang nyid dang ni// thabs mngon pa dag dran pa'o// ji ltar ji srid gang du ni// tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di spyad cing // chos 'di yis ni mthar thug pa// khyod kyis rnam par bshad
62b1(skyes rabs): par 'os// de ltar thub pas bstan bcos ltar// rnam gsal don ni mdor bsdus pas// cho ga'i rtog pa gzhan nyid kyis// chos de de la smras pa'o// 'dis ni dang por khyim spangs nas// slongs mo'i rtags ni brten pa ste//
62b2(skyes rabs): phrin las rnam par rgyas pa yi// tshul khrims blangs nas 'jug par byed// byed ldan rtsod med bstan bcos rig/ mchog tu tshim pa la gnas nas// gang dang de yis gang dang der// rnam dben gnas ni brten pa'o// de nas
62b3(skyes rabs): chags las 'jigs mthong nas// chags pa med las mchog zhi yang // dbang po'i grong ni nges bzung ste// yid la ni ni 'bad pa byed// de nas 'dod pa rnams las dang // gnod sems sogs las rnam dben nyid// bsam
62b4(skyes rabs): gtan dang po rnam dpyod ldan// rnam par dben pa las skyes thob// bsam gtan bde ba de thob nas// de dang de nyid rnam dpyod cing // sngar med bde ba thob pa yis// byis pa'i skye bo 'phrog par byed// 'dod dang sdang ba rnam smad pa'i
62b5(skyes rabs): zhi ba'i cho ga de 'dra 'dis// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob pa ste// yongasu tshim pas gnas pa'o// rnam dpyod yid ni smyo byed rnams// mkhas par rnam par shes nas kyang // de las rnam par grol ba ni// bsam gtan dga'
62b6(skyes rabs): ba'i bde ldan thob// gang zhig khyad par ma mthong zhing // dga' ba de yis phrogs pa de// 'od gsal ba yi lha rnamasu// 'od gsal ba yi gnas 'thob bo// gang yang dga' ba'i bde de las// yid ni rnam par dben byed pa// /
63a1(skyes rabs): dga' ba'i bde ba dang bral ba// bsam gtan gsum pa thob par byed// de 'dra'i bde ba 'dir thob nas// gang zhig chags min btang snyoms shing // bde dang sdug bsngal rnam spangs pa'o// bsam gtan
63a2(skyes rabs): bzhi pa thob par byed// bde dang sdug bsngal zhi phyir dang // sems kyi bya ba med pa'i phyir// thar zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis// der yang kha cig 'bad pa byed// bsam gtan de yi 'bras bu ni// 'bras bu che bas lhas mnyam par// yongs
63a3(skyes rabs): spyod shes rab tshe rnams kyis// chen po'i dus su smra bu'o// ting 'dzin de las rnam langs shing // lus skyes skyon rnams mthong nas ni// lus las rnam par ldog pa'i phyir/ shes ldan bsam gtan la 'jog go// de nas bsam
63a4(skyes rabs): gautan de bor nas// khyad par la ni nges byas pa'i// shes rab ldan de 'dod las bzhin// gzugs rnams lngas kyang chags pa med// lus 'di la ni kha gang du// de la yongasu rtog pa ste// de nas rdzas sdug rnams la yang // na mkhar
63a5(skyes rabs): lhag par mos par byed// nu mkhar song ba'i bdag nyid du// bsdus nas gzhan du blo ldan gyis// de nyid mtha' med par mthong zhing // khyad par 'phags pa lhag par 'thob// nang la mkhas pa gzhan dag ni// bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis
63a6(skyes rabs): bzlog nas// ci yang med ces mthong ba ni// ci yang med pa zhes dran no// de nas gyur nas bya bzhin dang // lgang bu dag nas srin bal bzhin// zhing zhes lus las 'thon pa las// thar pa zhes ni mngon par brjod// de nyid shes pa'i mkhas
63b1(skyes rabs): pa yis// gang zhig thar pa zhes brjod pa// 'di de tshang smra dam pa ste// rdugs med rtag cing 'gyur ba med// de ltar thabs dang thur pa dag/ bdag gis khyod la brtan pa ste// gal te shes shing gal te skyed// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs par
63b2(skyes rabs): mdzod// rgyu la 'dod bu dang skyed byed dang // gzhan mi 'byung ba rgan po dang // thar pa 'dod pa gzhan rnams kyang // lam 'di thob nas grol bar 'gyur// de yi dam pa'i tshig 'di dang // rnam par dpyod pa yang bzung nas// sngon du rgyu yi
63b3(skyes rabs): stobs thob pas// lan ni smras par gyur pa'o// gong nus gong du zhi ba yi// ye shes phra mo 'di thos shing // zhing shes yongasu ma btang phyir// de ni mthar thug min par go// rnam 'gyur dang ni rang bzhin las// zhib shes grol
63b4(skyes rabs): yang kho bo yis// rab tu skye bo'i chos su dang // sa bon tshan chos su snyam pa'o// gang yang rnam dag bdag nyid ni// nges par thar zhes rtogs pa ste// slar yang rkyen dag yod pa las// de ni grol bar mi 'gyuraro// ji ltar dus sbyor sa dang chu
63b5(skyes rabs): me lA se bon skye ma yin// de bzhin rkyen ni de rnams kyis// smra ba de yang bdag gi lugs// gang zhig mi shes lus sred rnams// spangs las thar pa rtogs byed pa// de ni mchog tu yongs spong ba// bdag yod gyur na yod ma yin// spangs
63b6(skyes rabs): nas spangs nas gsum po 'di// khyad par du yang nyer 'thob cing // gang du bdag ni gnas gyur pa// der ni gsum po 'di phra'o// skyon rnams phra ba nyid las dang // sems kyi bya ba med las dang // tshe ni ring ba nyid las kyang // thar pa/
64a1(skyes rabs): kyang ni yongasu rtogs// ngar 'dzin par ni yongs spong bar// gang de yongasu rtog byed la// bdag spyod gyur nas ngar 'dzin pa// yongasu spong ba yod ma yin// drang srong rnams kyis ma sbyangs pa// 'di ni yon tan med/
64a2(skyes rabs): yin// de phyir yon tan med gyur na// 'di yi thar pa mi brjod do// yon tan can gyi yon tan gyi// ldog pa yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang dro ba dang bral ba'i// me ni nye bar 'thob ma yin// lus las sngon lus can dang ni// yon tan
64a3(skyes rabs): las sngar yon tan can// ma yin de phyir dang por grol// lus bzhin slar yang 'ching bar byed// zhing shes lus drang rnam bral ba// shes pa yin nam shes min nyid// gal te shes 'di shes bya yod// shes bya yod na mi grol lo// /
64a4(skyes rabs): ci ste khyod la shes mi 'grub// bdag tu rtog pas ci zhig bya// bdag dang bral yang shes pa ni// rab grub shing dang rtsig pa bzhin// gang phyir gong nas gong du ni// de ltar rtsibs 'phur gyi ni chos// mkhyen nas de ni mtshim zhing // mtha' dag
64a5(skyes rabs): min zhes shes nas su// de nas so sor gshegs pa'o// de nas khyad par chos 'dod pa// lhag spyod kyi ni gnas su gshegs// de yi ba dag tu 'dzin las kyang // des ni lta bar sred ma gyur// 'du shes 'du shes med pa'i skyon// thub
64a6(skyes rabs): pa lhag spyod kyis shes nas// 'du shes 'du shes med bdag min// cung zad med las gzhan 'gro thob// gang phyir dmigs pa phra mo ni// 'du shes 'du shes med las gzhan// 'du shes med man 'du shes min// de phyir dor ni re/
64b1(skyes rabs): 'dod med// gang phyir der ni bla gnas shing // gzhan du rab tu rgyu ba med// phra zhing rno ldan de phyir der// 'du shes med min 'du shes med// de phyir de yang rab thob nas// slar yang 'gro ba 'khor ba ste// byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dod
64b2(skyes rabs): pas// de phyir lhag spyod dor ba'o// de nus de yi gnas thob nas// dge legs don gnyer nges byas nas// grang yang rgyal ba'i drang srong gi/ grong khyer zhes bya'i gnas bsnyen no// de nas nai rany+dza na'i 'gram// gtsang mar gtsang zhing pha rol
64b3(skyes rabs): gnon// dben pa'i gnas ni mngon 'dod pa'i// thub pa yis ni gnas mjed do// de nas de ni sngar brten zhing // dbang po lnga yi dbang las khengs// mun pas bsnyen pa'i brtul zhugs cani// dge slong lnga rnams nges gzigs so//
64b4(skyes rabs): bsod nams kyis bsgrubs nor nad med// dbang don rnams kyis dbang phyug bzhin// dge slong de rnams kyis kyang 'dir// de mthong gyur nas nye bar gnas// de'i dbang gis gnas slob ma rnams// dbang po g.yos pas yid bzhin du// rab tu de rnam
64b5(skyes rabs): kyis mchod cing // rnam par dul las rje su 'jug/ 'chi dang skye ba mthar byed la// de nas thabs ni 'di yis zhes// bza' ba med par de yis ni// dka' thub gdung ba rnams brtsamaso// bsnyun gnas cho gra du ma rnams// mi yis spyod dka' rnams
64b6(skyes rabs): mdzad cing // las ni thob bzhed lo drug tu// bdag gis sku lus rid pa mdzad// a mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba yi// pha rol thob par 'dod pa des// bza' ba'i dus su til dang 'bru// rab sha rnams ni re re gsol// dka' thub gdung ba des de yi//
65a1(skyes rabs): sku las bri bar byas pa gang // slar yang de yi gaN+DI brjid kyis// sku lus nye bar 'phel byas gyur// ston ka'i dkar phyogs dang po yi// zla bas ku mu da rnams bzhin// ring kyang dpal grags ris min zhing // gzhu
65a2(skyes rabs): gyi mig rnams tshim par mdzad// rus lcogs lhag ma lhag med par// tshol dang sha dang khrag rnams kyis// zad kyang zab mo ma zad par// rgya mtsho bzhin du de mdzes// de nas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pas// ngal dub gdung bas don ming
65a3(skyes rabs): bAbasal// nyon mongs lus can thub pa ni// srid las 'jigs pa blo mdzad do// chos 'di chags bral phyir min zhing // rtogs phyir ma yin thar phyi ru min// de tshe 'dzam bu'i rtsa bar grang // bdug gis thos te nges pa yin// 'di ni stobs chung
65a4(skyes rabs): gris thob par// nus pa med phyir gus 'ongs shing // sku yi stobs ni 'phel don du// slar yang 'di ni rjes su bsam// bkres dang skom pas yongs btser zhing // ngal las rang gnas med pa'i sems// yid kyis thob bya'i 'bras bu ni// ldog pa
65a5(skyes rabs): med pa gang gis 'thob// rtag par dbang po'i tshim pa laM// sa dag gnapa yo skye po yang na ma / sde ni rang bzhin par sna mog shrI nga po myos// ting 'dzin nye bar skye ba ste// ting 'dzin gyis sbyar sems kyi mI/ bsam gtan sbyor ba rab tu 'jug/ bsam
65a6(skyes rabs): gtan rab tu zhugs pa las// rnyed dka' zhi zhing dga' med mchog/ 'chi med go 'phang de chos rnams// gang gis thob pa rab thob bo// de phyir bza' ba rtsa ba ste/ 'di ni thabs shes nges pa yin// bza' ba byed la brtan pa ni// dpag med blo
65b1(skyes rabs): yis blo mdzad nas// khrus byas nai rany+dza 'gram nas// lags byin 'gram gyi ljon shing ni// gud pa yid dung yal ga'i rtses// sku lus rid pa dral bus drangs// de nas lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i// ba glang skyong ba bdag mo ni// snying la dga'
65b2(skyes rabs): skyes 'gyur ba yi// dga' stobs ma ni der 'ong so// dung dkar gyis 'bar lag pa can// lwa ba sngon po kon pa mo// lbu ba dang bcas chu sngon 'phreng // chu mchog ya mu nA bzhin no// spyan mig ut+pal rab rgyas shing // dad pas 'phel ba'i
65b3(skyes rabs): dga' ma dris// de la mgo yis rab btud nas// 'o ma drangs par gyur pa'o// des de gsol nas de la ni// skye ba'i 'bras bu thob byas nas// yang dag dbang po drug tshim ste// byang chub 'thob par nus par gyur// phul byung rgyas pa'i
65b4(skyes rabs): sku mnga' zhing // rang gi grags bcas thub pa ni// nus gyur rgya mtsho gnyis dag gi/ mdzes dang brtan pa gcig pos bzung // bdag ni nges par grol ba la// blo ldan khams lnga rnams kyis ltar// kun nas 'jug ces rnam shes nas/
65b5(skyes rabs): dge slong lnga rnams kyis de dor// de nas 'bad rtsol gnyis pa ni// byang chub ched du nges mdzad de// rtsa 'jam bkram pa'i sa gzhi la// a shwad+tha yi rtsa bar gshegs// de tshe glang po'i 'gros mnga' ba'i// dpe med zhabs kyi sgra yis sad par byas
65b6(skyes rabs): pa ni// thub pa chen po'i byang chub nges par rtogs pa yis// grub mchog nag po zhes byas stong pa smras par gyur// ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi zhabs kyis brdzis pa ni// yang nas yang du sa ni sgra skad sgrogs pa 'dra// ji ltar khyod kyi 'od ni nyi
66a1(skyes rabs): ltar snang ba ste// khyod kyis nges par 'dod pa'i go 'phang mkhyen pa nyid// ji ltar mkha' la khug rta'i phreng ba rnam bskor zhing // pad+ma'i spyan mnga' khyed la skor ba byed pa nyid// ji ltar mkha' la rlung rnams zhi bar
66a2(skyes rabs): 'gro ba ste// khyod kyis nges par de ring sangs rgyas 'gyur ba nyid// de nas klu mchog gis ni yang dag bskyod pa ni// lto ga las ni gtsang ma'i rtswa rnams nyer blangs nas// byang chub shing tshon rtsa ba dge la rab brten cing // byang chub ched du
66a3(skyes rabs): dam btsa' mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o// de nas gnyid log lto 'phye'i gdengs skad bsdus pa la// des ni rdo rje'i skyil krung g.yo med mchog bcings te// ji srid bya ba byas pa nyid ni ma thob par// de srid sa la gdan de 'byed par mi bgyi
66a4(skyes rabs): de nas nges pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan gang na mdzad tshe// lha na gnas rnams mnyam med dga' ba thob gyur la// ri dag sna tshogs rnams gnas par ma gyur bya rnams dang // rlung gis bsnun pa'i nags kyi ljon shing sgra med gyur// spangs
66a5(skyes rabs): rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang gis chen po las/ ring phur dang lhag spyod kyi drung du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // der ni rnam par mthar phyir dam bca' mdzad pa na// rgyal po'i rigs
66a6(skyes rabs): las rab 'khrungs drang srong chen po ni// der ni nye bar zhugs tshe 'jig rten rab dga' zhing // der ni bdud kyang dam pa'i chos kyi dgrar gyur to// gang la 'dod pa'i lhar ni 'jig rten na smra ba// sna tshogs mtshon cha me tog mda' can de
66b1(skyes rabs): bzhin du// 'dod pa rab tu spyod pa'i bdag blo de nyid la// thar pa'i dgra bo bdud du dab brjod byed pa'o// de yi bu ni rol pa dga' ba rgyags pa dang // bu mo dga' ma dges ma sred ma gsum rnams kyi// de la sems kyi rnam par
66b2(skyes rabs): 'gyur ba dris pa ste// des ni de rnams la tshig mngon par smras// thub pa 'dis ni nges pa'i gau cha rnam gzung zhing // sems dpa'i mtshon cha blo yi mda' ni bsdogs byas nas// bdag cag yul rnams la ni rgyal 'dod bsdad pa ste// ga
66b3(skyes rabs): phyir 'dis ni bdag gi yid ni rnam par 'gyur// gal te 'dis bdag zil gyis mnan nas 'gro ba ste// 'jig pa la yang thar pa'i lam dag 'chad byed cing // lus 'phags jo bo spyod las lhung ba'i bzhin du ni// de phyir 'di yis bdag
66b4(skyes rabs): gis yul ni de ring stongs// de phyir ji srid 'dis ni spyan mig ma thob cing // ji srid bdag gi spyod yul dag na gnas pa nyid// chu bo shin tu 'phel ba'i shugs kyis zam pa bzhin// de srid 'di yi brtul zhugs 'jom su 'gro ba'o// de nas me tog
66b5(skyes rabs): las byas gzhu ni bzung nas dang // kun tu rmongs par byed pa'i mda' lnga rnams bzung nas// skye dgu rnams kyi rang gnas mi byed pa// de ni bur bcas a shwad+tha yi rtsa bar song // de nas srid pa 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pa'i// thub pa rag tu zhi
66b6(skyes rabs): bar gdan la bzhugs pa la// lag pa g.yas pa mtshon cha'i rtse mor brdungs nas ni// mda' yis rol zhing bdud kyis 'di ni smras pa'o// kye ho rgyal rigs 'chi bas 'jigs pa longs mdzod cig/ thar pa'i chos ni spongs la 'jig rten mdzod//
67a1(skyes rabs): mda' dang mchod sbyin rnams kyis 'jig rten pham byas nas// 'jig rten dag nas dbang po'i go 'phang thob par mdzod// gang zhig mi dbang snga ma rnams kyis 'drims pa ste// nges par 'byung la 'di ni grags
67a2(skyes rabs): pa'i lam yin zhing // rgyal po'i drang srong rnams yangs rigs su skyes pa yis// slong mo rab thob la ni 'di ni bsngags ma yin// ji srid nges pa'i bdag nyid de ring mi ldang ma// dam bca' rnam par ma dor brtan par gyur cig dang // gang
67a3(skyes rabs): zhig nya dgra sUrba ka la rnam spangs pa'i// de nyid bdag gi mnga' 'di 'bar bar byas pa'o// 'dis ni cung zhig reg pa tsam gyis e la de// zla ba'i tsha bo yin yang sems med gyur pa ste// zhi ba'i lus zhes bya ba de yang der 'gyur nas// /
67a4(skyes rabs): zad pa'i dus su kye ma mi gzhan smos ci dgos// de phyir skyen par longs la 'du shes thob kyis dang // yang yang shin tu ro myang mnga' ni mnan pa ste// dga' ma'i byar 'os dga' zhing dges pa rnams la ni// gang zhig dang pa
67a5(skyes rabs): rnams la bzhin du mi 'phen no// gang tshe de skad brjod kyang tshogs pa dang bral ba'i// shAkya thub pas gdan ni bshig pa ma yin nyid// de nas 'di la bdud kyi mda' ni 'phangs pa ste// bu mo rnams dang bu rnams mdun nas byas naso//
67a6(skyes rabs): deder ni de yi mnga' na rab tu 'phangs na yang // chags par byas pa med cing brtan las g.yos pa med// de ltar de mthong gyur nas bdud ni yi mug cing // bsam mno yongasu ldan pa dal bu smras par gyur// ri dbang bu mo la
67b1(skyes rabs): dmigs gang gis bug pa yis// bde 'byung lha yang yongasu g.yos par gyur pa ste// 'dis ni mda' de nyid la sems par mi byed pa// sems me dra yin nam mda' 'di de ma ljin nam ci// de phyir me tog mnga' 'di 'os pa ma yin zhing //
67b2(skyes rabs): dka' ba ma yin sbyor ba 'os ma yin// 'di ni zhi ba ma yin 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis// 'jigs dang bsdigs dang rdeg pa rnams ni 'os pa'o// de nas bdud kyis rang gi sde ni dran pa ste/ shAkya thub pa'i bgegs ni mnyam por byed 'dod pa/
67b3(skyes rabs): la l+r-i rbe dz+dza nAHb+h+yon shing rtse gsum mdung lag rnams// sna tshogs bsam pa dang ldan rjesu 'brangs rnams 'os// phyag dang nya dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong can rnams// sdug dang dom dang seng ge gnyis 'thung gdong can rnams// mig gcig kha
67b4(skyes rabs): ni du ma mgo bo gsum ldan rnams// gsus pa 'phyang ba rnams dang gsus pa che ba rnams// brla rnams pus mo'i bar du bum pa'i pus mo rnams// mche ba'i mtshon cha rnams dang sen mo'i mtshon cha rnams// keng rus gdong can rnams
67b5(skyes rabs): dang gzugs ni mang po rnams// gdang phyed zhom pa rnams dang gdong ni chen po rnams// thal skya rnams dang thig le dmar po sna tshogs rnams// kha T+wAM ga rnams dang ni spre'u ltar dung sgra rnams// 'phongs 'phyang rnams dang glang po'i rna ba'i
67b6(skyes rabs): rna ba rnams// pags pa'i gos can rnams dang gos dang bral ba rnams// gdong phyed dkar po rnams dang lus phyed ljang khu rnams// zings mdog dud mdog rnams dang ljang gu dkor po rnams// sbrul gyi sham thabA dz+nyA dang de bzhin lag pa rnams
68a1(skyes rabs): rab tu sgra sgrogs dril bu 'khrugs pa'i ska rags rnams// ta la'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mdung rnams bzung ba rnams// byis pa'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mche ba gtsigs pa rnams// lug gi gdong can
68a2(skyes rabs): rnams dang bya yi mig can rnams// byi la'i gdong can rnams dang mi yi lus can rnams// skra bkram rnams dang ral pa can dang byi bo rnams// gos dmar rnams dang rnam par 'khrug pas dkris pa rnams// rab dga'i gdong
68a3(skyes rabs): can rnams dang gnyer ma'i gdong can rnaMs// gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang yid ni 'phrog pa rnams// khA cig dag ni 'bo zhing drag tu phan tshun du// mchan khung 'khyud cing de bzhin gzhan rnams mchongs// mkha' la 'gro ba
68a4(skyes rabs): rnams ni kha cig rtse ba ste// kha cig shing gi rtse mo rnams la zhon pa'o// kha cig rtse gsum skor zhing ga ra ni byed pa ste// kha cig dbyug pa gi dengs shing thog sgra sgrogs pa'o// kha cig dga' bas khyu mchog bzhin du skad 'don zhing //
68a5(skyes rabs): kha cig lus 'phos rnams las rab tu 'bar bar gyur// 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams dang 'joms par 'dod pa rnams// jo bo'i bka' ni rab tu skyong bar byed pa ste// rnam pa de ltar 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nas ni// byang chub
68a6(skyes rabs): sems dpa' de la yongasu bskor nas gnas// mtshon mo snga ma la ni shAkya'i khyu mchog dang // bdud kyi 'thab mo dus de rab tu mthong nas ni// nam mkha' gsal ba ma yin sa ni g.yos gyur la// phyogs rnams sgra dang bcas pa
68b1(skyes rabs): rab tu 'bar bar gyur// drag po'i shugs can rlung ni kun tu g.yos gyur la// skar ma rnams ni mi snang zla ba gsal ma gyur// slar yang mtshan mor mun pa rnam par rgyas gyur la// rgya mtsho rnams ni thams cad kun tu g.yos par
68b2(skyes rabs): gyur// sa gzhi 'dzin cing chos dag 'dzin pa'i klu rnams ni// thub pa chen po'i bgegs la bzod pa ma yin zhing // bdud las khros pas rnam par ldog pa'i mig can rnams// rngam pa bton zhing lus ni rnam par 'gyur ba'o// gtsang
68b3(skyes rabs): mar lhag par gnas pa'i lha yi drang srong ni// dmi chos bsgrub pa'i don du mngon par zhugs pa rnams// bdud las yid kyi rjes su brtse ba byas pa ste// chags dang bral ba las kyang khros par ma gyur to// 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid bdud
68b4(skyes rabs): kyi dpung ni de yis ni// byang chub rtsa ba de ni khyab pa mthong nas ni// chos kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thar pa 'dod rnams kyis// nam mkha' dag la ha ha'i sgra dag byas par gyur// chos kyi cho ga de ni nye bar nyams byed pa// bdud dpung gnas
68b5(skyes rabs): ba drang srong chen pos gzig sa ni// ba lang rnams kyi dbus su seng ge gnas pa bzhin// g.yo 'gul med cing rnam par 'gyur bar yang ma gyur// de nas de yi 'jigs pa'i ched du bdud kyi ste// 'byung po'i sngo ni drang po rnams la bkA stsa tI/
68b6(skyes rabs): de nas 'di yi sde des rang rang mthu rnams kyis// de yi brtan pa dbye phyir blo gros byas pa'o// kha cig lce rnams g.yo zhing du mas rnam 'chang zhing // mche ba'i rtse mo rnams rno mig rnams ljang ser zlum// kha rnams gdangs shing bur
69a1(skyes rabs): bu'i rna ba rnams brtan cing // kun nas skrag par byed pa snyam du gnas zhes grag/ des ni gzugs dang bsam pa dag gis mi zad pa// rnam pa de lta nyid du gnas pa de rnams las// rtsed mo byed pa'i byis
69a2(skyes rabs): pa rgyags pa rnams las ni// drang srong chen po zug med skyo bar ma gyur to// de nas kha cig khros pas lta byed rnam 'gyur zhing // 'di la dbyug pa brdeg par 'bad pa bya ba ste// sngon tshe grong khyer 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang bcas
69a3(skyes rabs): ltar// de nas 'di yi dbyug pa dang bcas lag pa rengs// kha cig rdo dang shing rnams gyen du 'phyar ba ni// thub pa la ni rnam par 'phen par ma nus te// 'bigs byed ri brag rnams ni rdo rjes bcom pa bzhin// shing rnams dang
69a4(skyes rabs): bcas rdo rnams bcas pa de bzhin lhung // kha cig mkha' lnga gyen du 'phur bas rdo rnams dang // dgra sta rnams dang shing rnams rnam par 'phang ba rnams// kha dog gcig min mtshams sprin rkang pa rnams bzhin du// mngon
69a5(skyes rabs): par lhung ba ma yin nA mkhar gnas par gyur// gzhan ni de yi steng du 'bar ba'i khyu mchog gis// glang bu ri bo tsam pa'i rwa can 'phangs pa ste// de ni 'phangs pa tsam nA na mkhar gnas pa nyid// de yi mthu las rnam pa brgyar
69a6(skyes rabs): nigs par gyur// 'jig rten 'jig tshe lhun po rab tu 'bar ba yis// gser gyi bya skyibs rnams kyi phye ma rnam bzhin du// kha cig nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'bar ba yis me mngags char pa chen po mkha' las phab par
69b1(skyes rabs): gyur// byang chub shing gi rtswa bar rab tu rnam 'phangs pa'i// me stag 'phro ba drang bcas me mu dag char ba ste// drang srong dam pa mchog gi byams pa'i gnas pa lnga// ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i char par gyur pa'o// lus dang sem la
69b2(skyes rabs): rnam par gnod par bya ba'i phyir// rnam pa de ltar phab pa de dang de rnams kyis// rang gi nges pa'i gnyen 'dun nye bar 'khyud nas bzhin// shAkya thub pa gdan las g.yos par ma gyur to// de nas gzhan rnams 'khogs
69b3(skyes rabs): pa'i ljon shing rnam nas ltar// kha nAs las ni sbrul rnams rnam par skyugs pa ste// sngags kyis bcings bzhin dri rnams de yi drung du mi// song ba ma yin dbugs minA g.yos par ma gyur to// gzhan rnams glog dang brgya shing thog da
69b4(skyes rabs): pa yis// chu 'dzin chen po gtum pa'i dbyangs ldan rnams gyur nas// ljon shing de la rdo ba'i char pa phab pa ste// de ni me tog char pa mdzes par gyur pa'o// dbang phyug ma yin sron par dka' ba'i mi yi ni// snying la yongasu g.yos
69b5(skyes rabs): papa'i khro ba bzhin du ni// de nas gzhan gyi gzhu la mda' dag bkod pa ni// de nyid du ni 'bar zhing lhung bar ma gyur to// yul la rab tu 'jug la 'khor ba la 'jigs pa// yongasu rtog pa po yi dbang po lnga rnams bzhin// gzhan rnams
69b6(skyes rabs): ngag gis mda' lnga rab tu 'phangs pa rnams// na mkhar gnas shing thub pa la ni ma lhung ngo // gzhan ni rdeg par 'dod pas khros shing rab bskor zhing // dbyug pa bzung nas drang srong chen po'i mngon du phyogs// don med byed pa'i
70a1(skyes rabs): nyes pa rnams la 'jig rten bzhin// des ni 'dod pa ma thob dbang med 'gyel bar gyur// bud med sbyin pa nag mo lag nA thod pa can// drang srong chen po'i thugs ni rmongs par byed ces grag/ g.yo ba'i
70a2(skyes rabs): bdag nyid can gyi blo ni lung la bzhin// der ni nges pa med par skor zhing gnas mA yin// kha cig mig ni rab tu 'drar bar byas nas ni// mig gi me yi sbrul gyi dug bzhin bsreg 'dod pas// 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis nyer gan
70a3(skyes rabs): pal bzhin du// der ni drang srong bzhugs pa mthong bar ma gyur to// ye shes ting 'dzin dag gis 'gro bya nyes legs chos// lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis 'thob par 'dod pa bzhin// de bzhin gzhan ni rdo ba lci mo bteg pa ni// rab
70a4(skyes rabs): tu 'bad pa rnam bcom don med ngal bar gyur// de bzhin gzhan rnams dred dang seng ge'i rnam pa yi// chen po'i sgra rnams mthon por rab tu sgrog pa ste// rdo rjes bsnun pa'i na mkha' 'gas pa zhes snyam nas// sems can rnams
70a5(skyes rabs): ni gang gis kun nas 'khums par gyur// ri dgas glang po rnams ni nyam thag skud 'don zhing // rnam par 'bros shing thig pa nyid du gyur pa ste// de yi mtshan mo phyogs rnams las ni nyin mo bzhin// nyam thag bya rnams skad do//
70a6(skyes rabs): yongasu babs par gyur// rnam pa de ltar de rnams kyi sgra de rnams kyis// 'byung po thams cad rnamasu g.yos pa yin na yang // khab rnams ngag gi sgra rnams ngag gis mkha' lding ltar// thub pa 'jigs pa ma yin 'khums par
70b1(skyes rabs): ma gyur to// 'jigs pa 'dron pa yongasu bskor ba'i tshogs rnams las// ji ltar ji ltar thub pa'i 'jigs pa ma yin pa// de lta de ltar chos 'dzin rnams kyi dgra bo yi// bdud rnams mya ngan las dang khros nas byed ba'o// de nas
70b2(skyes rabs): byung po cung zhig gzugs ni mtho ba ma yin zhing // khyad par 'a/ sa par gyur pa nA mkhar gnas nyid kyis// drang srong la gnod dgra ma yin la khros mthong nas// bdud rgya chen po'i dbyangs kyis smras par gyur pa'o// don med
70b3(skyes rabs): bab 'ar byed par thos pa ma yin badrung // 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid spong la bde bar song mdzod dang // ri bo chen po lhun po rlung rnams kyis bzhin du// khyod kyis bskyod cing bskul bar nus pa ma yin no// sa yi brtan pa nyid chu yis
70b4(skyes rabs): ga/ pa da// me yis dro ba nyid ni rab tu 'dor ba yang // bskal pa du mar bsgrub pa'i bsod nams las 'da' ba// 'dis ni nan tan nges par 'dor ba ma yino// 'di yi nges pa gang dang pha rol gnon pa dang // gzi brjid gang
70b5(skyes rabs): dra badz+rI ba skye dgu rnams la ste// 'od zer steng gis mun rnams ma 'tshom gnas bzhin du// 'di ni de nyid ma thob nas ni ldang ma yin// shing la bsrubs me ni rnyed par 'gyur ba ste// sa pa brkos nu chu yang 'thob par 'gyur ba
70b6(skyes rabs): nyidan rigs pa dang ni ldan pa'i thams cad byas pa ste// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsgrub bya ma yin ci yang med// de phyir chags sogs nang rnams dag la gnas pa yi// 'jig rten 'am thag pa la thugs rje ma ba ni// ye shes
71a1(skyes rabs): dman gyi don du yongasu dral ba bo// sman pa chen po 'di la bgegs 'os ma yin no// lam ngan mang po rnams kyis 'jig rten stor ba la// gang zhig zhi bas dam pa'i lam ni rjes tshol ba// chud zos pa la
71a2(skyes rabs): legs par ston byed ded dpo bzhin ston mdzad de ni bskyod par rigs pa ma yin no// mun pa chen po sems can chud zos rnams la ni// ye shes sgron ma rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa 'di// mun pa la ni rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron
71a3(skyes rabs): ma bzhin// 'phags pa'i mya ngan 'da' bar byed par 'os ma yin// 'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur chu bo chen por 'gro ba ni// pha rol ma thob par ni gzigs nas ni// gang gis de ni sgrol bar byed la rab zhugs te// de la sdig
71a4(skyes rabs): ba 'phags pa su yi sems par byed// bzod pa'i rgyus brtan pa'i rtsa ba brtan pa ste// spyod pa'i me tog b+h+yo dang dran pa'i yal ga can// ye shes ljon shing chos kyi 'bras bu ster ba bo// 'phel bzhin pa ni zlog par 'a
71a5(skyes rabs): pa ma yin no// gang gi snying la rmongs po'i zhags pa sra rnams kyis// btsongs pa'i skye dgu rnams kyis grol phyir blo mnga' zhing // 'gro ba bcings pa thar pa'i cheng du'o rgyal ba// de la brdeg pa khyod kyi 'thad pa ma yin no// byang
71a6(skyes rabs): chub ched du las gang dag ni mdzad pa rnams// de rnams kyi ni nges par de ring dus yin lo// ji ltar thub pa snga mam+b+ha ni de bzhin du// gnas der de bzhin 'di ni nye bar bzhugs pa'o// dbyig 'dzin pa ga ni yin lte ba 'di yin ni
71b1(skyes rabs): snying po dam pa mtha' dag dang ni ldan pa nyid// gang zhig 'di yI ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs bzod pa'i// sa yi phyogs de 'di las gzhan pa yod ma yin// de phyir khro bar ma byed zhi bar nyer song la// bdud ni khyod kyi dregs pas
71b2(skyes rabs): nga rgyal ma gyur cig/ dpal ni mi brtan blo gtad par ni nus min zhing // go 'phang g.yo la rgyags par mngon par nyer 'gro zhing // de nas de yi tshig de yang dag thos nas kyang // thub pa chen po'i g.yo ba med pa nyid mthong nas//
71b3(skyes rabs): gang gi mda' yi 'gro ba'i snying la rdeg byed pa'i// bdud ni 'bad ba bcom zhing yid mi bde bar song // dga' ba med cing 'bras med ngal ba byas pa rnams// pha 'ongad rnams ni khyu mchog ldom shing rnams gtor to// dgrar gyur dgra
71b4(skyes rabs): bo'i dpung ni gtso bo bsang pa ltar// de nas 'di yi dpung ni phyogs phyogs bros pa'o// me tog tog can 'khor dang bcas pa bros shing nges par 'pham pa nA/ drang srong chen po mun pa 'ab zhing rdul dang bral ba rgyal ba na/ rgod pa dang cwa bam
71b5(skyes rabs): rang bcas mkha' gsal zhing // chu yi snying po can gyi dri zhim me tog char pa bab par gyur pa'o// de ltar sdig pa can ni nges par pham pa na// de tshe phyogs ni rab snang mtshan mor byed pa mdzes// mkha' la me tog char rnams
71b6(skyes rabs): sa la bab pa ste/ lang tsho ma bzhini ngal ba med par mtshan mo gsal// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'o snyan dngags chen po las/ bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
72a1(skyes rabs): de nas brtan dang zhi ba yi// bdud kyi stobs ni pham mdzad nas// don dam rnam par mkhyen bzhed pa// bsam gtan mkhas te bsam gtan mdzad// bsam gtan cho ga thams cad la// dbang phyug dam
72a2(skyes rabs): pa rab brnyes nas// sngon gyi skye ba rim pa ni// dang po'i thun la dran pa'o// che ge mo bdag ming 'di ni// de nas 'phos te 'dir 'ongs pa'o// zhes ni skye ba stong phrag rnams// rjes su myong ba bzhin du dran// 'thad pa de dang de rnams
72a3(skyes rabs): skye bar 'chi ba dran nas ni// de nas sems can la thugs rje// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mdzad// rang gi skye bo bor nas ni// slar yang gzhan du bya ba rnams// nges par 'jig rten mgon med 'di// 'khor lo bzhin du yod
72a4(skyes rabs): su 'khor/ de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid ni// de yi dran par gyur pa ste// chu shing snying po snying po med// 'khor ba de ltar nges par ro// thu ni gnyis pa byung ba na// gnyis med pha rol gnon pa de// mig dang ldan pa kun gyi mchog/
72a5(skyes rabs): lha yi spyan ni thob par gyur// de nas des ni lha yi spyan// yongasu dag pa de yis ni// me long dri ma med pa ltar// 'jig rten mtha' dag la gzig so// mchog dang mchog min las rnams kyis// sems can rnams kyi 'chi
72a6(skyes rabs): 'pho dang // skye ba gzigs pa de yi ni// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phel bar 'gyur// 'di rnams sdig pa'i las can rnams// srog chags rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro// 'di gzhan dge ba'i las can rnams// mtho risu ni
72b1(skyes rabs): rab gnas// shin tu mi zad dmyal ba ru// rab tu 'jigs par gyur pa rnams// 'di rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi// kye ma bkren par bcor bar byed// kha cig me yi kha dog gi/ lcags khu khol ma 'thung bar byed// lhar
72b2(skyes rabs): kyik+Shi ka pa chen mo lA// gzhan rnams cho nges 'debs shing 'dzegs// lcags zangs rnamasu khAs bu pa rnams// kha cig thug pa bzhin du 'tshed// me mdag dung po'i bar rnam su la cig snying rjes ze'o// khwa cig lcags kyi mche rno can// mi bzang khyi rnams
72b3(skyes rabs): kyis za zhing // kha cig ma rungs lcags mchu can// lcags 'dra'i bya rog rnams kyi za// kha cig gdung bas yongs ngal rnams// bsil ba'i grib ma mngon 'dod pas// ral gra'i lo ma'i nags sngon por// 'di rnams bcings pa
72b4(skyes rabs): bzhin du zhugs// kha cig sta re rnams kyis ni// lag pa bteg rnams shing ltar 'gems// las rnams kyis bzung srog rnams ni// sdug bsngal na yang rnams mi smin// sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i don ched du// bde ba yin zhes las
72b5(skyes rabs): gang byas// de yi 'bras de dbang med kyis// sdug bsngal kho na nyer longs spyod// bde don mi dge ba byas nas// gang de shin tu sdug bsngal rnams// de dag rnams kyi ro myang nges// bde ba phra mo yang byed dam// sdig pa'i bdag nyid rgod
72b6(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// sdig pa'i las ni byas pa gang // de na sngon du gyur pa'i tshe// cho de rnams kyis rje su myong // gal te de ltar sdog las can// las kyi 'bras bu mthong ba ste// dmigasu mngon par bsnun pa bzhin// skyen par khrag ni
73a1(skyes rabs): skyug pa nyid// lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams las dang // dmyal ba'i rnams las sems ldan gyi// 'phags min rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs// ngal ba mchog ni bdag gi lugs// gzhan 'di sems kyi rnam
73a2(skyes rabs): g.yo las// byung ba'i las rnams sna tshogs kyis// byol song skye gnas sna tshogs su// nye bar skyes rnams gdung ba can// sha lpags spu dang so yi phyir// chags pa las sam rgyags pa las// gnyen 'dun rnams kyis mthong
73a3(skyes rabs): nga // gang du snying rje bar bsong ngo // nus mang ldan yang ngabang med rnams// bkres skom ngal bas cer ba rnams// lcags kyis bsnun pa'i dbyibs can rnams// rta dang ba lang gyur rnams 'khol// stobs can rnams kyang stobs chung
73a4(skyes rabs): gi/ glang por gyur pa rnam 'khom te// lcags kyus nyon mongs mgo bo rnams// rkang pa'i rting pa rnams kyis btags// phan tshun rnam par rtsod las dang // gzhan gyi dbang du gyur nyid kyis// sdug bsngal gzhan rnams la spyod kyang //
73a5(skyes rabs): gang la sdug bsngal khyad par ldan// ban tshun du ni rab phrang nas// ma gunas skam gnas rnams kyis dang // chur gnas chur gnas rnams kyis dang // mkhar gnas mkhar gnas rnams kyis 'joms// ser snas non pa'i sems ldan rnam
73a6(skyes rabs): yi dgas 'jig rten snang med du// skyes pa 'di rnams de bzhin du// bkren pa 'bras bu la long spyod// khab mig lta bu'i kha rnams dang // ri bo lta bu'i lto ba rnams// bkres sgom gyis bskyed sdug bsngal gyis// sdug bsngal skal can rnams
73b1(skyes rabs): btsir to// ser sna'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba// skyes bus gal te shes na ni// lus kyi chu shas rnams kyang ni// zhi ba bzhin du kun nus gtong // rlung gi las rnams kyis bzung zhing // sred pas shin tu non pa rnams// bor ba'i mi gtsang ba rnams
73b2(skyes rabs): kyang // ljongs spyod par ni 'dis mi rnyed// 'di gzhan dmyal ba dang mtshungs pa'i// myung la min mr-i gtsang khu ba ru// nye bar skyes rnams mi rnam su// gro ba rnams ni sdug bsngal 'tho// de sngon skye ba tsaman yang // lag pa rnon po smra brdung pa rnams/
73b3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis gshegs pa ltar// gang du snying rje bar ni du// byams dang bsrung drang skyong rnams kyis// gnyen 'dun rnams kyis 'bad nas song // sdug bsngal lis slar sdug bsngal drag/ rang rang las kyis nyon mongs// bya ba 'di
73b4(skyes rabs): dung bya ba 'di// zhes ni gang du lhag par la// sred dang yongs ldan byis rnams kyis// rgyun chad med par rje su myong // 'di gzhan bsod nams las rnams kyis// mtho ris su ni skyes pa rnams// 'dod chags me yis drag tu ni//
73b5(skyes rabs): me ltar rab tu sreg par byed// yul rnams kyis ni ngoms med rnams// gang las 'di rnams gzi bcom ste// phreng ba yongs rnyings zhan pa rnams// gyen du mig phyogs rnam lhung ngo // gang du lha mo rnams kyis ni// sdug pa dbang
73b6(skyes rabs): med ldang ba la// sgying la brtsub ltos rnams kyis// lag pa rnams kyis gos rnams 'dzin// gang zhig sa la lhung ba bzhin// lung 'dod do shal g.yo rnams kyis// sdug rnams gzhal med khang rnams nas// snying brje dang bces lhung la
74a1(skyes rabs): lta// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan phreng can// gzhan 'dis sdug bsngal lhung rnams la// gdung rnams brtse dang g.yo ba yi// lta byed rnams kyis rjes su 'gro// 'dod pa can rnams lhung ba la// lag pa rnams
74a2(skyes rabs): kyis brang brdung zhing // 'khrugs chen gyi ltar nyam thag pa// lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis brten to// kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs rdzing // kyi hud sdug pa gang na zhes// nyam thag pa rnams rnam zlos shing // lha la gnas rnams pa
74a3(skyes rabs): la lhung // las mang rnams kyis thob pa yis// mtho ris mi brtan g.yo ba la// 'bral bas byas pa'i sdug bsngal ni// gang du 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur// kye ma nges las khyad par du// 'jig rten mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// 'dod chags
74a4(skyes rabs): bral ba thob nas kyang gzhan rnams lha nas nges par lhung // 'di ni rtag par gnas pa ste// zhes ni nges pa'i sems ldan rnams// 'jig rten 'di yi rang bzhin ni// 'di lta bur ni mthong ma yin// da myal ba rnamasu sdug bsngal drag/ dud
74a5(skyes rabs): 'gro rnamasu phan tshun za// bkres skom sdug bsngal yi dgas su// mi la tshol ba'i sdug bsngal lo// lha na sdug pa dang bral ba// bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal phul phyung ste// skor ba gson pa'i 'dzag/ rten gyis// gang na zhi ba nges par
74a6(skyes rabs): med/ 'khor ba'i chu bo rten med du// 'di ni 'chi bas bskor ba ste// tsam tsom du ni bskor ba yi// 'gro bas gnas ni thob ma yin// de ltar des ni 'gro ba lnga// lha yi sman gyis gzigs pa ste// chu shing bshags pa bzhin du ni/
74b1(skyes rabs): srid par snying po rnyed ma yin// de nas de yi mtshan mo'i mthun// gsum pa nye bar gnas pa na// 'jig rten 'di yi rang bzhin ni// bsam gtan rig pa mchog gis bsgom// kye ma 'jig rten ngal thob gang // yang dang yang du skye ba
74b2(skyes rabs): dang // 'khogs dang ni 'chi ba dang // 'pho pa dang ni skye ba nyid// yang na sdug bsngal che 'di las// chags pas longs min gyis bsgribs pa// skyes long shin tu dogs sa nas// phyi rol 'gro ba shes ma yin// de ltar bsam pa
74b3(skyes rabs): de yis ni// thugs kyi rnam dpyod gyur pa ste// gang du gyur na nges sam zhes// rmya bas 'chi ba mngon par song // skye gnas nas de nyid bsgoms pa// de yis mngon par rtogs par gyur// chu dang 'chi ba dag gis ni// skye ba yod
74b4(skyes rabs): na rdzogs pa'o// mgo bo yod na mgo bo yi// nad 'di 'byung ba mthong ba ste// shing gi skye ba yod gyur ma// 'gyel pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// de nas de yi slar gyur pa// skye ba 'di slar gang la zhes// de nas las srid las skye bar//
74b5(skyes rabs): skyesmra bar// skye ba yang dag mkhyen pa'o// des ni lha'i spyan gyis ni// las las 'jug par mkhyen pa ste// dbang phyug las min rang bzhin mina?// bdag las ma yin rgyu med mini// ji ltar rigs pa las gling bu// dang po'i tshig ni
74b6(skyes rabs): bcad pa ni// cho ga bzhin du kun myur 'gro// de ltar ye shes go rim so// de nas srid pa'i skye ba ni// mkhyen phyir thub pas blo gros mdzad// de nas srid pa'i skye ba des// nye bar len las byung bar mkhyen// tshul khrims brtul
75a1(skyes rabs): zhugs mchog 'dzin dang // 'dod blo bdag tu lha rnams kyis// bud shing rnams kyis me bzhin du// 'dri yi lus ni nye bar lem// gadra gis rgyu lngas len pa zhes// de nas de yi gyur pa ste// de nas nye bar len
75a2(skyes rabs): pa'i rkyem// sred par des ni mkhyen pa'o// chung ngu'i me yis nags kyi me// rlung gis bus te bskyed pa bzhin// 'dod sogs nyon mongs rgya chen rnams// sred pa yis ni skyed par byed// de nas de yi bsam pa yi// sred pa gang
75a3(skyes rabs): las byung zhes so// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes// de nas zlum par nges pa mdzad// tshor bas mngon bcom skye dgu rnams// gnyen por byed la sred pa ste// skom pa med ni chu la ni// kha cig mngon par dga' ba yin// de nas
75a4(skyes rabs): slar yang tshor ba yi// skye ba'i gnas ni gang zhes bsams// tshor ba tshor ba mthar byed kyis// reg pa'i rgyu can nyid du mkhyen// yul drang dbang po blo rnams kyis// 'dus pa reg par brjod bya ste// gtsubs shing las ni ma bzhin
75a5(skyes rabs): du// gang las tshor ba skye ba'o// de nas reg pa rgyu yin zhes// de yis bsam par gyur pa'o// de nas skye mched drug gi ni// rgyu can nyid du de mkhyen to// long bas gzugs ni mi rigs cing // mig ni blo yis mi sbyor phyir// mig yod/
75a6(skyes rabs): gyur na des sbyor te// de phyir dbang po yod na reg/ de nas skye mched drug gi ni// skye ba mkhyen phyir blo gros mdzad// de nas de'i rgyu ming dang gzugs// rgyu la mkhas pas mkhyen pa'o// ji ltar myu gu yod pa las// lo ma sdong bu yod
75b1(skyes rabs): par dran// de ltar ming dang gzugs yod na// skye mched drug ni 'byung ba'o// ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu gang zhes// de yi de nas gyur de nas// de yi skye ba rnam shesu// ye shes pha rol son pas mkhyen// rnam par shes pas mkhyen
75b2(skyes rabs): pa na// rnam par shes pa 'das pa na// ming dang gzugs ni reg gnas te// sa bon bskrun pa rdzogs pa na// myu gu rnar 'dzin pa'o// de nas rnam par shes pa ni// gang las yin zhi bas ba gyur// ming dang gzugs la brten nus de// de nas de yi skye
75b3(skyes rabs): ba mkhyen// de nas rgyu yi go rims ni// mkhyen nas dri yi blor gyur te// sems ni lugs 'byung bskor ba ste// gzhan du lugs las bzlog par min// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ni// ming dang gzugs te skye ba ste// ming dang
75b4(skyes rabs): gzugs la brten nas ni// slar yang rnam par shes bya ste// ji ltar glu yis mi 'dren zhing // de bzhin rnam par shes pa dang // ming gzugs pan sbyin gyi rgyu'o// ji lhur lkugs ni 'bar ba yis// rna rnams 'a bar bar byed na ya
75b5(skyes rabs): bad yis de gdung sgra// dri bzhin phan tshun rgyu nyid do// dri ltar rnas pUr shes bya sa sa// ming gzugs 'jud pa mkhyen gyur pa/ de nas dbang pa'i rgyung 'a ring // dbang po las byung reg pa'o// rig pa las skyes
75b6(skyes rabs): tshor ba las skyes sred pa'o// srid pa las skyes yin pa'o// len pa las ni de bzhin srid / srid pa las ni skye ba dag/ skye las rgo shi 'byung bar mkhyen/ 'gro ba dag ni rkyen rnam pa las// skyes pa shes yang dag mkhyen pa'o// nas 'di ma
76a1(skyes rabs): gros nges par song ba ni// skye ba zad las 'chi dang rga ba 'gag pa ste// srid pa nyams pa las kyang skye ba nyams pa nyid// len pa 'gag pa las ni srid pa rnams ldog cing // de nas srid 'gags
76a2(skyes rabs): pa las de ni 'gag pa ste// tshor ba yod pa min na srid pa yod ma yin// reg las chud zos gyur na tshor ba yod min zhing // skye mched 'jug pa med las reg pa zad pa'o// de bzhin ming dang gzugs ni yang dag 'ag
76a3(skyes rabs): pa las// skye mched drug po thams cad rnam par nyams pa nyid// rnam par shes pa 'gags las de dgra 'gag pa ste// 'du byed 'gags pa las kyang de ni 'gag pa'o// ma rig pa ni mtha' dag med las de
76a4(skyes rabs): bzhin du// 'du byed 'gag par drang srong chen pos mkhyen pa ste// 'di las mkhyen bya 'di ni yang dag mkhyen mdzad nas// sangs rgyas zhes ni 'jig rten na rab gnas par gyur// yan la ga brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu shar
76a5(skyes rabs): ba yi// rtse mor myur 'gro dam pa'i lta ba'i lam gyis ni// srid rtse'i bar du las mchog gyur bdag med rnam gzigs nas// bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin zhi bar gshegs par gyur// de nas bdag nyid mdzad pa de yi gyur
76a6(skyes rabs): pa ni// mchog gi drang srong mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa'i tshogs// mna' ma rnams kyi don dam rgyud las gshegs pa yi// snying po'i lam 'di bdag gis lhag par thob par gyur// thun ni bzhi pa'i skya rengs shar
76b1(skyes rabs): ba'i yud tsam na// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'byung po rnams ni zhi ba na// drang srong mchog gis 'gyur ba med pa'i go 'phang dang // kun gyi mgon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so// de nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen
76b2(skyes rabs): pa na// bud med chang gis myos pa zhin sa ni g.yos gyur la// grub pa rnams kyis mngon gang phyogs ni rab snang ste// mkha' la rnga bo che rnams rab tu grag par gyur// dge ba'i rlung rnams rab tu zhi bar g.yos gyur cing // sbyin
76b3(skyes rabs): med 'o ma rnams ni lha yis char phab ste// ljon shing rnams las dus min me tog 'bras bu rnams// mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i ched bzhin brul bar gyur// man+ta ra ba'i me tog rnams dang pad+ma dang // gser dang bain+duR+Sha yi rang bzhin pad+ma
76b4(skyes rabs): ni/ mkha' las bab pa rnams kyis shAkya thub pa'i sra// de tshe mtho ris bzhin du kun nas bkram par gyur// yud tsam de ni kha cig khro ba med gyur la// nad med gyur cing mi dga' bar yang ma song ste// sdig pa bsnyen pa ma yin rgya gri
76b5(skyes rabs): par ma byas shing // grub pa brnyes pa bzhin du 'jig rten zhi bar gyur// thar pa 'dod pa'i lha yi tshogs rnams dga' ba ste// sems can 'og tu song ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur// yon tan phyogs kyis 'phel bas chos ni rgyas
76b6(skyes rabs): pa ste// rdul dang mun pa dag las 'gro ba gyen du byung // de yi las kyis ya mtshan dga' bas gang ba yi// bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi mi skyong drang srong rnams// rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang drang srong che rnams kyis// yang dag
77a1(skyes rabs): mchod rnams mkha' la gzhal med rnams su gnas// mthong min 'byung po'i tshogs kyi drang srong chen po yi// bstod pa rnams ni mthon por mthon zhing sgrogs pa sde// ba gson pa'i 'phel ba bzhin du dga'
77a2(skyes rabs): gyur zhing // ltung ba mchog la bzhin du bdud ni yi mug gyur// de nas nad mi mnga' ba zhag bdun bdag nyid kyi// sems la gzigs shing spyan mi 'dzum par bzhugs pa ste// kho bos 'dor ni rnam par thar pa brnyes so zhes thung
77a3(skyes rabs): pa yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par gyur// de nas rkyen nyid thob pa nyid// bdag med cho gar rnam par bzhag pas gsan nas ni// zhi phyir 'jig rten dag la mchog tu brtse bso// sangs rgyas spyan gyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa'o// /
77a4(skyes rabs): lta ba ngan pas chud zos 'bad la 'khrugs pa yi// 'gro ba rdul ni rgya chen dang ldan gzigs nas dang // rnam thar chos ni mchog tu phra ba nyid gzigs nas// g.yo ba med pa nyid phyir thugs ni ma dzad par gyur// de nas smon gyi dam bca'
77a5(skyes rabs): yang dag mkhyen gyur nas// zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni so sor nges par gshegs// de nas chen po'i rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid dang // ldan pa'i skye bor yid ni rnam par dpyad pa'o// de nas zhi ba'i don du gdams pa'i ched du nges par ni/
77a6(skyes rabs): gzung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ni shes gyur nas// mngon par snang zhing 'gro la phan par 'dod pa can// mtho ris gnas pa'i gtso bo gnyis ni nye bar 'ongs// sdig pa spangs shing don mdzad gdan la bzhugs pa'o// /
77b1(skyes rabs): mchog gi chos ni gzigs pa de la mchog gnyis so// mchog tu zhi bas rab tu bstod nas de gnyis kyis// 'jig rten pa'i don du tshig 'di gsol ba'o// e ma 'gro ba 'di gang nor 'os 'di lta bu// skye dgu rnams la rjesu brtse
77b2(skyes rabs): mdzad khyod kyi thugs// 'jig rten na yod skye bo rnam par bsre ma'i rgyu// chen po'i rdul drang chung ngu'i rdul nyid ldan pa'o// thub pa srid pa'i mtsho las rang nyid rab brgal nas// 'gro ba sdug bsngal bying ba rab tu drongs mdzod cig/ legs
77b3(skyes rabs): pa'i dbang phyug gis ni phun sum tshogs pa thob nas bzhin// gzhan rnams la yang rang gi yon tan gyis sbyor mdzod// don chen 'di na'i don drang pha rol du'am gang // skye bo kha cig 'di na bdag gi phan pa byed// gang zhig 'jig rten dge
77b4(skyes rabs): ba'i ched du rab zhugs te// mi yi 'jig rten dang ni mtho ris su brnyed dka'// de ltar drang srong che la tshig 'di gsol nas ni// lha na gnas pa de nyid ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs// thub pa yid kyang de yis tshig de rab mnod nas/
77b5(skyes rabs): 'gro ba rnam par thar phyir nges par rgyas par mdzad// de nas bsod snyoms dus su phyogs bzhir drang srong la// lha na gnas pas lhung bzed rnams ni phul ba ste/ gau ta mas bzhi po de rnams rab bzhes nas// de yi chos kyi ched du
77b6(skyes rabs): gcig nyid mdzad pa'o// de nas de tshe don bcas rab song tshong dpon gnyis// mdza' bshes nyid kyis lha yis rab tu bskul ba dag/ rgya chen thugs mnga' drang srong tshe la thog ma ru// dga' ba dang ldan phyag byas nas ni bsod snyoms
78a1(skyes rabs): yul// rtsibs phur dang ni rangs byed bu ste de gnyis ni// chos 'dzin nus pa'i blo gros thub pas gzigs pa ste// de gnyis lha na gshegs par thugs kyis mngon gzigs nas// dge slong lnga po
78a2(skyes rabs): rnams la thugs kyis grar shigs pa'o// de nus zhi ba'i gdams pa las ni gau ta mas// nyi ma shar bas mun bzhin mun pa rnam 'joms phyir// ba rA Na ses brgyan pa'i sna tshogs nags tshal can// 'jigs byed shr-ing rtas
78a3(skyes rabs): bsnyen pa'i grong khyer dge bar gshegs// de nas khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' glang chen myos pa'i 'gros ldan pa// 'gro ba mngon par rnam par 'dus phyir kA shi si la gshegs bzhed pa// glang chen bzhin du rang gi
78a4(skyes rabs): sku lus ma lus phyir la rab log nas// thub pas spyan mig mi 'dzum par ni byang chub shing gi rtsa bar gzigs// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u
78a5(skyes rabs): ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // zhi zhing mngangs ldan mdzad pa kun nas brnyes pa de// gcig pur ra ba gshegs mang po dang ni thabs cig bzhin// lam na dge slong chos ldan kha cig gis mthong nas// ya mtshan
78a6(skyes rabs): dang bcas thal mor bcas pas 'di skad gsol// dbang po'i rta ni g.yo bar dbang po'i rta thul zhing // sems can chags rnams ji ltar chags ma gyur// shin tu ro ldan gsar ba'i shes rab ro yis ni// ri bong gis
78b1(skyes rabs): mtshan dang mtshungs tshim par gyur pa rnams// brtan pa khyod kyi zhal ni rab rgyas shing // 'dir ni dbang po rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa ste// khyu mchog chen po'i spyan mnga' nges par don mdzad cing // khyod kyi bla ma su lags
78b2(skyes rabs): gang las grub pa gsungs// de rnams las des smras pa bdag la ston pa med// bdag la mchod bya med cing su yang smad bya med// mya ngan 'das pa thob cing gzhan rnams dang mi mnyam// bdag gi chos la rang byung du ni
78b3(skyes rabs): shes par mdzod// gang phyir gzhan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i rtogs bya ni// bdag gis mtha' dag rtogs pa de phyir sangs rgyas te// gang phyir bdag gi nyon mongs rnams ni dgra bzhin pham// de phyir zhi ba dag ni kun nas
78b4(skyes rabs): shes par mdzod// sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyam thag grogs la phan don du// zhi ba khro bo 'di yang bA rA nA ser 'gro// der nI 'chi med chos kyi rdo dag brdung ba ste// snyan grags bde ba'i phyir min nga rgyal phyir ma yin// rgal bas
78b5(skyes rabs): 'gro ba rnams ni rgal bar 'gyur bgyi zhing // grol bas sems can rnams ni yongasu thar bar bgyi// de ltar gson pa'i 'jig rten nyam thag par mthong nas// sngon du bdag gi dam bca' 'dri ni gyur pa'o// 'di ni kha
78b6(skyes rabs): cig nor ni thob nas bdag nyid ni// gcig pu nyid gang 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar cing // skye bo chen po ma btsum mig la gang gis kyang // khyad 'phags thob nas rnam par 'dzin pa de don yin// gang zhig skam la gnas pas mi
79a1(skyes rabs): ni chus khyer ba// 'dren par 'dod min de ni legs pa'i gzugs ma yin// gang zhig gter ni thob nas skye bo dbul po la// nor gyis sbyor ba med pa de ni spyang po min// rang bzhin gnas pas nad kyis mngon par
79a2(skyes rabs): bcom pa la// lag tu song ba'i sman gyis gso bar rigs pa ste// de ltar lam ngan song ba'i ched du lam ngag ni// nges par bya ba'i lam gyis bshad par 'thad pa yin// ji ltar sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste// de yi rgyu can
79a3(skyes rabs): dmar por 'gro ba ma yin nyid// de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyis ye shes rab gsal bar// mdzad de de phyir chags par 'gro ba ma yin no// ji ltar shing rnams la ni me dag nges pa dang // mkha' la rlung dang sa la chu ni nges pa ste//
79a4(skyes rabs): de bzhin gang yang rnams su thub pa rnams kyis ni// byang chub nges shing kA shi rnams dang chos smra ngos// de nas nye bar 'ongs las a la laM zhes pa// rnam par brjod nas ji ltar 'drod bzhin rab spangs nas// yang dang yang
79a5(skyes rabs): du ya mtshan mig mag ni g.yo ba yis// re 'dod skyes shing sangs rgyas la ni lha bzhin song // de nas thub pas rim gyis kA sa'i grong khyer ni// nor gnas snying po dang ni rab mtshungs gzigs pa ste// grogs mo bzhin du 'khyud
79a6(skyes rabs): nas yang dag 'dus pa 'di// skal ldan shing rta dang ni bo rA Na sa nyid// mthu dang gzi brjid dag gis mngon par mdzes pa nges// khu byug rnams kyis sgra sgrogs shing gi tshogs ldan zhing // drang srong chen pos bsnyen pa'i ri dgas
79b1(skyes rabs): nags nyid du// rnam par mdzes pas nyi ma bzhin du rab thob bo// kauN+Da Di n+ya'i rigs dang de nas ming chen dang // rlangs pa dang ni rta thul de bzhin bzang rgyal te// dge slong lnga yis de ni rgyang ring nas gzigs nas// phan tshun du ni
79b2(skyes rabs): tshig 'di smras par gyur pa'o// bde ba'i bdag nyid dge slong gau ta ma 'di// dka' thub de las phyir log mngon par 'ongs pa ste// mngon du 'gro bya ma yin nges par phyag 'os min// dam bca' bcom pa mchod par 'os pa ma yin//
79b3(skyes rabs): de ni brgya la gral te sdod par 'dod gyur na// de nyid la ni gtam ni rab tu gsol mdzod dang // 'gron po nye bar 'ongs pa gang dang su la ni// 'phags pa rnams kyis mi byed par ni 'os ma yin// de ltar bya ba byas nas dge slong
79b4(skyes rabs): de rnams ni// nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar sangs rgyas gshegs pa ste// ji lta ji ltar dri rnams lnga ni nye bar gshegs// de lta de ltar de rnams dam bca' nyams par gyur// de nas kha cig 'di yin bza' blangs pa ste// de bzhin
79b5(skyes rabs): gzhan ni phyag 'tshal nas ni lhung bzed bzung // kha cig 'di la 'os pa'i gadran ni phul ba ste// de bzhin gzhan gnyis zhabs bsil nye bar phul ba'o// de ltar rab byed mchod pa mang po ldan pa rnams// 'di la thams cad
79b6(skyes rabs): kyis ni bla mar spyod pa byas// rigasu mngon brjod de rnams kyis kyang ma spangs shing // de rnams la rjes brtse bcas bcom ldan gyis smras pa// mchod 'os dgra bcom la ni gus pa ma yin pas// sngar gyis spyod pas dge slong rnam
80a1(skyes rabs): kye ma smra zhig/ bstod dang smad pa nges par bdag gis mnyam pa ste// khyed rnams bsod nams min las rnam par zlog par bgyi// sangs rgyas 'phan pa'i cheng du sangs rgyas shing // 'byung po kun la
80a2(skyes rabs): phan pas rab tu zhugs pa la// bla ma nye bar 'joms las ming gis gang smra ste// ma rungs pa yi pha ma bzhin du chos 'chad do// de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// smra ba rnams kyis mchog gis de skad gsu
80a3(skyes rabs): pa ste// rmongs las snying po med pas chud zos de rnams kyis// gdong ni cung zing bzhad pa dang ldan rgol smras pa'o// gau tA ma re zhig dka' thub mchog dang ni// dam pa de yis de nyid rtogs pa ma yin te// don ni dka' bas
80a4(skyes rabs): bsgrub bya bde bas gnas pa'o// khyed kyis mthong zhes bya ba 'dir ni gtan tshigs gang // gang tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid la// de nas dge slong de rnams dad par gyur min te// byang chub pa yi lam ni de las
80a5(skyes rabs): gzhan du shes// de nas lam mkhyen pa yi lAm ni bka' stsal pa// byis pa'i skye bo bdag nyid ngal bar ldan pa dang // dbang po'i spyod yul rnams la de bzhin chags pa ste// 'chi ba med pa'i lung gi lam ma yin pa'i phyogs//
80a6(skyes rabs): skyon dang ldan pa gnyis po de la ltos mdzod cing // gdung bar mngon par brjod pa'i lus kyi ngal rnams kyis// yongasu 'khrugs ro shing rnam par gnon pa'i sems la ni// 'jig rten tha snyad kyang ni brgya la shes min na// dbang po
80b1(skyes rabs): lngas 'das de nyid lAm ni k+She ma ci// ji ltar sgron mas mtshan mo'i mun pa nyams pa ru// 'dir ni mngon par nyer 'gro chu rnams gtor bas min// de bzhin yis me yI mi shes mun pa ni// nyams par sngon 'gro lus kyi ngal ba rnams
80b2(skyes rabs): kyis mim// ji ltar me ni 'dod pas shing la 'bigs pa dang // rnam par 'gems pas ma ni thob pa ma yin la// de nyid mngon pa'i thabs las bsrubs pas thob pa ste// de bzhin sbyor las 'chi ba med thob ngal las min// de ltar
80b3(skyes rabs): don med 'dod pa rnams la chags pa ni// rdul dang mun pa dag gis zil non sems ldan rnams// bstan bcos don la nus kyang grub pa thob min na// chag bral 'gog pa'i cho ga la ni sngon nyid do// ji ltar nad kyis mngon par bcom
80b4(skyes rabs): pa'i srog chags kyis// mi phan bza' ba za ba'i gso ba 'dir yod min// de bzhin mi shes na kyis mngon par bcom pa yi// 'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i zhi ba gang las so// ji ltar skam po'i rten la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni// /
80b5(skyes rabs): bus pa'i me yi zhi ba yod pa ma yin no// de bzhin 'dod pa'i rten la gnas pa'i chags pa yis// rjesu song ba'i sems kyi zhi ba yod ma yin// mtha' 'di gnyis po dag kyang rnam par dor byas nas// bdag gis lam gzhan
80b6(skyes rabs): dbu mas lhag par rtog pa ste// shin tu sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i 'dren pa'o// bde ba dang ni dge ba nyid dang bral ba'o// yang dag lta ba'i nyi mas rab tu gsal byas shing // rnam dag yang dag rtogs pa'i shing rtas drangs pa
81a1(skyes rabs): ste/ yang dag brjod pa'i yang dag dag ni gtsug lag khang // dge ba'i bya ba'i skyed tshal brgya phrag mngon par dga'// smad pa med pa'i 'tsho ba lo legs chen po ste// yang dag rtsol bas stobs rab rjesu
81a2(skyes rabs): 'gro ba can// kun tu yang dag dran pa'i sbas pas sbas pa ste// ting 'dzin gzims mal dang ni gdan drang bzhugs pa yis// de ltar mchog gis yan lag brgyad 'dir 'di lam ste// 'chi dang rga dang na ba rnams las
81a3(skyes rabs): 'dren pa'o// gang la drangs nas bya ba thams cad byas pa ste// 'di dang che ge mor ni slan chad 'gro ba med// 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'di ni mtshan ma ste// 'di ni 'gog pa 'di yi lam ni 'di yin te// de ltar mthos chos kyi cho ga
81a4(skyes rabs): sngar med pa'i// rnam par thar phyir bdag gi spyan mig skyes pa'o// skye dang rga dang na dang na dang de nas rgud pa dang // sdug pa dang bral mi sdug pa dang sbyor ba dang // 'dod pa'i don ni rab tu thob pa med pa ste// rnam pa sna tshogs sdug
81a5(skyes rabs): bsngal 'di ni yongasu 'thob// 'dod pa'i bdag can gyi 'am bdag rgyal can gyi 'am// lus can gyi 'am yang na lus can ma yin pa'i// gang zhig yon tan med pa gang la rab zhugs kyang // mdor bsdus nas de sdug bsngal
81a6(skyes rabs): du ni shes par mdzod// de ltar 'bar ba zhi ba'i me ni chung na yang // lhan cig skyes pa dro ba'i ngo bo spong min nyid// de bzhin bdag tu 'du shes zhi sogs kyis phra yang // sdug bsngal bdag nyid can zhes bdag gi shin tu nges// /
81b1(skyes rabs): ji ltar sa chu sa bon dus rnams myu gu'i bzhin// 'dod chags la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs skyon rnams dang // skyon las rab tu skyes pa'i las rnams nyid dag ni// sdug bsngal dag gis rgyur ni nges par shes par mdzod//
81b2(skyes rabs): mtho ris su 'am 'og tu skying pa'i rgyun las ni// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyi tshogs rnam rgyu yin zhing // dman dang 'bying dang mchog ste sna tshogs nyid kyi ni// de dang der ni las ni las rnams ngag ni rtsa ba'o// nyes pa zang
81b3(skyes rabs): las 'khor ba'i rgyun ni yod min to// las zad pa las sdug bsngal de ni yod ma yin// gang phyir don gang yod pa las ni kun 'byung ste// dri phyir med pa las te slar yang 'byung ba med// gang du skye ba med cing rga med 'chi ba
81b4(skyes rabs): med// me med sa med chu med mkha' med rlung med la// thog ma bar dang mtha' med 'phags pa dbrog bya min// dge zhing 'gyur med 'gog pa de ni shes par mdzod// yan lag brgyad ldan gang zhig mngon brjod de lam ste//
81b5(skyes rabs): lhag par rtogs phyir 'di yi thabs de'i gzhan ma yin// lam 'di yi ni ma mthong ba las 'jig rten rnams// de nyid dang ni nye du rnams ni yongasu 'khor// sdug bsngal yong su shes par bya zhing rgyu 'di ni// spang bya 'gog
81b6(skyes rabs): pa yang ni dbang du bya ba'o// de bzhin lam 'di yang ni bsgom par bya ba ste// de ltar 'di ni bang gi blo gros rab zhug so// sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs shes rgyu ni spangs pa ste// de bzhin du ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa'o// de bzhin
82a1(skyes rabs): du ni 'di yi lam 'di bsgoms pa ste// de ltar 'dir ni bdag gi spyan mig rab zhugaso// ji srid du ni yang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa ni// bzhi pa'i rkang pa 'di rnams mthong ba ma yin pa// de srid bdag
82a2(skyes rabs): 'dir grol ba med par zhes brjod cing // bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang mya mthong // gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rtogs pa ste// rtogs nas kyang ni don byar 'os pa byas pa'o// de tshe bdag 'dir rnam par grol
82a3(skyes rabs): zhes brjod pa ste// bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang mthong ngo // de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje mnga' ba yi// 'dir ni chos dag de skad mngon pur gsungs pa na// kauN+Di n+ya'i rigs dang lha ni brgya phrag rnams// gtsang zhing
82a4(skyes rabs): rdul dang bral ba'i mig ni thob par gyur// bya ba thams cad nges par byas shing zhi ba de la ni// thams cad ma khyen pas khyu mchog bzhin du mthon po'i dbyangs kyis gsungs// khyod kyis ye shes bdag nyid chen pos des ni
82a5(skyes rabs): tshig gsol pa// legaso khyod kyis blo gros mchog ni bdag gis shes pa'o// legaso bdag gis shes shes de nas des ni 'jig rten ni// kauN+Da n+yas de'i go 'phang rigs ni bzung ba ste// bla ma dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa slob ma
82a6(skyes rabs): rnams kyis ni// gtso bo nyid du chos la yang dag lhag par gshegs pa'o// sgra de sa la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis thos nas ni// rnam par rgyas pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu gsol bar gyur pa ste// 'byung po rnams kyi 'chi med zhi ba'i
82b1(skyes rabs): ched du nges par ni// dam pa gzigs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de leg so// tshul khrims rtsibs dang zhi dang dul ba'i mu khyud blo rnams yangs// dran pas blo gros brtan pa brtson 'grus lte ba ngo tsha'i gzer// zab pa'i phyir
82b2(skyes rabs): dang brtan med phyir dang legs par bstan nyid phyir// 'jig rten gsum na bstan zhing bstan bcos gzhan rnams kyis mi ldog/ sa 'dzin gnod sbyin rnams las sgra ni nye bar thob byas nas// mkha' la lha yi tshogs rnams kyis ni
82b3(skyes rabs): dbyangs byas shing // de ltar thos nas mtho ris rim dang rim rnams kyis mthon por// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du sgra yis nye bar 'dzegs pa'o// mtho ri si dag na gnas pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa kha cig gis// drang srong che las 'jig
82b4(skyes rabs): rten gsum ni g.yos zhes thos nas ni// sna tshogs yul rnams la ni chags par gshegs pa ma yin zhing // yang dag skyo las srid pa gsum na zhi ba nyid du gshegs// de ltar 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog tu zhi ba'i ched du ni//
82b5(skyes rabs): mtho ris dang ni bla chos kyi 'khor lo bsko ri tsam na// sbyin bral mkha' las me tog dang bcas chu yi char bab cing // srid gsum gnas pa rnams kyis rnga bo che rnams mngon par brdungs// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang ga
82b6(skyes rabs): chen po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas thams cad mkhyen pa yis// rta thul la sogs dge slong rnams// rab snyoms sems ldan de rnams kun// thar pa'i chos la bkod
83a1(skyes rabs): nyi ma drang ldan skar ma lngas// na mkhar zla ba ldan pa bzhin// lnga sde pham pa'i lnga sde yis// kun nas bskor ba de mdzes so// de nas de tshe kha cig ni// mo rnams blo phab nyal mthong nas// grags pa zhes
83a2(skyes rabs): bya chen po'i bu// yang dag skyo bar nye bar song // 'di kun nye bar brtse ba ste// zhus ni tshig dang brjod bzhin du// dpal ldan mchog gi rgyan ldan pa// sangs rgyas ga lA bu der song // sems dang nyon mongs mkhyen pas nges//
83a3(skyes rabs): gas nas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// mya ngan 'das la nyer tshe med// tshur shog dge ba thob par gyis// de ltar rnam rgyas grags pa'i gsung // 'di ni thos nas chel ba yis// nyam thag chu la 'dzul nas dang //
83a4(skyes rabs): mchog tu tshim pa nye bar song // sngon gyi rgyu yi stobs brten nas// de nas lus de nyid bzung ste// lus kyis dang ni sems kyis ni// dgra bcom nyid ni nye bar thob// ston kwa'i chu yis bkrus pa yis// gos la tshon ni bkod pa
83a5(skyes rabs): bzhin// dkar po'i blo yi dam pa'i chos// thos nas rab tu rtogs pa nyid// cha lugs de yi ngo tsha bzhin// gnas pa de ni gzigs gyur ni// don mdzad dam pa'i don mkhyen pa// smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis smras// rtags ni chos
83a6(skyes rabs): kyi rgyu min zhing // 'byung po rnams la snyoms pa ste// zhi zhing dul la dbang po dul// brgyan pa yin yang chos la spyod// gang zhig lus ni mthon po ste// sems kyis 'thon pa ma yin pa// nags na gnas kyang chags pa can// khyim na
83b1(skyes rabs): gnas shes de shes bya// gang zhig sems ni mthon po ste// lus kyis mthon pa ma yin pa// khyim na gan+da kyang nga med pa// nags na gan shes de shes bya// khyim na gan+da pa gyur pa'i 'am// rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i yang // gang gis bsgrub pa yod na ni// /
83b2(skyes rabs): de yi thar pa mngon par brjod// ji ltar rgyal 'dod dgra de la// rgyal phyir go cha 'dzin pa ste// de bzhin nyon mongs dgra de la// rgyal phyir brtags ni 'dren pa'o// de nas dge slong tshur shog ces// de bzhin gshegs pas de la
83b3(skyes rabs): gsungs// des ni dge slong rtags bzung ste// skad cig de nyid kyis grol to// de nas de yi rjes chags pas// de yi 'khor ni lnga bcu dang // gsum rnams nyid dang gcig nyid dang // chos de rab tu thob par 'gyur// 'dag tshal gyis
83b4(skyes rabs): bsgos gos rnams ni// chu yi yang dag reg pa bzhin// sngon tshe bsgoms pa'i las can rnams// de rnams myur du dag par gyur// de nas de tshe dgra bcom slob ma yis// dang po don bcas drug cu thams cad la// dgra bcom rnams kyis
83b5(skyes rabs): mngon mchod dgra bcom pas// ji ltar 'os par yang dag bka' stsal to// dge slong rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgal// rang gi bya ba legs chen byas// pha rol sdug bsngal rnams la yang // rjes su 'dzin pa byed pa'i rigs// de phyir re re
83b6(skyes rabs): thams cad kyis// sa 'dir yongasu gshegs mdzod la// nyam thag 'jig rten ched du chos// rjes su brtse bas bstan par bya// grub phyir rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i spun// 'od srung drang srong rnams 'dul phyir// rgyal po'i drang srong gis bsnyen
84a1(skyes rabs): pa'i// ga yar kho bo 'di yang 'gro// de nas de nyid mthong de rnams// de yi bka' las phyogasu song // rtsod bral bde bar gshegs pa ni// drang srong che yang ga yar gshegs// de nas dus su der
84a2(skyes rabs): gshegs nas// chos kyi dgon pa nye bar gshegs// dka' thub dngos su gnas pa bzhin// der ni 'od srung gzigs pa'o// ri rnams dang ni nags rnam su// gnas rnams yod pa na yang de// rnam par 'dul bzhed stobs
84a3(skyes rabs): bcu pas// rab tu brten nas blangs pa'o// de nas grub pa nyams tshad phyir// me khang lto 'phye ches bsnyen par// ma rungs gnas des 'di la byin// der gzigs mtshan mor rang gnas shing // ltos bral thub pa chen po la// mthong
84a4(skyes rabs): ba'i dug can khros pa yi// sbrul des mthong nas dbugs phyung ngo // de yi khro bas 'bar ba yi// me yi khang par gyur pa des// drang srong chen po'i sku lus la// 'jigs pa bzhin du mes ma rAg/ dus mtha'i me nyer zhi ba na// tshang
