84a5(skyes rabs): pa bzhugs pa mdzes pa ltar// me yi khang par bsregs na yang // gau ta ma rnams 'gyur med// gang tshe sangs rgyas der bzhugs tshe// gnod sde g.yo ba med pa ste// de tshe klu de ya mtshan zhing // drang srong mchog la phyag 'tsha'o//
84a6(skyes rabs): ri dgas nags der skye bo yi// thub pa der bzhugs shes gyur nas// sdug pa 'o rgyal 'di 'dra ba'i// dge slong tshig ces rjesu brtse// de nas mtshan mo 'das pa na// rnam par 'dren pas 'od srung la// sbrul ni zhi bas lhung bzed kyis//
84b1(skyes rabs): blangs nas de la bstan pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas che bdag nyid// thos nas dwe ni ya mtshan gyur// de lta na yang bdag nyid kyis// che zhing gong na med pa snyam// de nas dus su rab sbyar ba'i// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul gzugs rnams kyis//
84b2(skyes rabs): de yi sems de mkhyen nyid la// zhi ldan thub pas thugs dgongs mdzad// ji ltar bdag las rdzu 'phrul gyis// sangs rgyas khyad pA ba ga pa ste// de yi tshe sna rab bsgrub phyir/ de tshe des ni ngos pa byos/ kun nas slar log gnas pa yis// lteng rgyus
84b3(skyes rabs): 'od srung mthong nas ni// slob ma rnams kyis tshogs rnams kyang // lnga brgyas de yi chos la bsnyen// drir ni spun zla slob mar bcas// mthar phyin shun lpags spangs pa na// ga ya chu klung zhes byas kyang // der song lam la bsnyen pa'o// de
84b4(skyes rabs): nas thub pas slob mar bcas// 'od srung gsum po de rnams la// sau 'dzin gA ya'i rtse mor ni// nges par mthar phyin gtam mdzad do// rnam par rtogs pa'i skye gnas dang // gti mug rnam bkram du ba can// chags sdang me yi
84b5(skyes rabs): 'gro ba ni// thams cad dbang med par bsreg go// de ltar nyon mongs mes tshig cing // rab tu ma zhi mgon med can// rga dang 'chi ba'i me rnams kyis// slar yang rgyun mi chad par sreg/ rnam pa sna tshogs mes tshig pa'i
84b6(skyes rabs): 'gro ba skyabs med 'di mthong nas// yid bcas dbang po dang bcas pa'i// gzugs la blo ldan skyo ba ste// skyo ba las ni chags bral 'gro// chags bral las ni rnam gro la zhing // rnam grol de nas thams cad na// rnam par grol
85a1(skyes rabs): zhes shes pa'o skye ba'i rgyun ni yongs mdzad cing // tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'dir gnas la// byed pa thams cad byas pa ste// sred bu gzhan ni yod ma yin// bcom ldan gyi gsung 'di thos nas// dge slong stong
85a2(skyes rabs): phrag dag gi sems// len pa med nas thog pa lus// daM ma thag tu rnam par grol// sbyin pa tshul khrims dul rnams kyis// chos ni dngosu yongs bskor bzhin// de nas shes rab rgya che ba'i// 'od srung gsum gyis sangs rgyas mdzes// chos
85a3(skyes rabs): don 'dod pa dang bral ba'i// sems can na ba'i srog bzhin du// bgres mchog de rnams kyis bor ba'i// dka' thub nags de mdzes ma gyur// de nas de rnams kyis yongs bskor// thub pa rgyal po'i khab du gshegs// ma ga d+ha yi myi
85a4(skyes rabs): dbang phyir// sngon gyi dam bca' dran pa'o// de nas 'od ma'i tshal yul ni// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu thob// blon po rnams ni rjes 'gro bas// thos nas rgyal po mngon du song // de nas rang gri skal mtshungs pa'i// rkang pa bzhon
85a5(skyes rabs): pas skye bo ni// ya mtshan gyis ni rnam yangs mig/ ri yi lam nas phyi rol byung // mA ga d+ha yi mi dbang gis// thub mchog rgyang ma nas mthong nas// sbyin pa dang bcas mchod pa'i phyir// shing rta lus ni sa la babs// des ni rnga
85a6(skyes rabs): yab rlung yab dang // rje su 'brang ba rnams spangs nas// tshangs pa la ni dbang pos bzhin// thub la rgyal po sngon du song // cod pan rab g.yo mgon po yiso// drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal nas// sa yaM logs la rtswa 'jam la// mngon
85b1(skyes rabs): par rjes gnang bsdang ba'o// der mi rnams kyis bsam par gyur// e mA shAkya thub pa'i stobs// 'od srung bcom ldan drang srong ni// 'di yi slob ma nyid du gyur// de nas de'i sems sangs rgyas kyis// mkhyen nas 'od srung lA sbru
85b2(skyes rabs): pa/ 'od srung yon tan gang mthong nas// khyed kyi me ni spangs pa'o// chu sbyin chen po'i dbyangs kyis ni// bla mas de ltar de bskul te// mthon pos skye bo kun khyab par// thal mo sbyar zhing rnam par gsol// glang phyir mchod dang sbyin
85b3(skyes rabs): sreg gis// 'bras bu yongasu 'khor ba ste// sems nang sna tshogs dang ljon te// de phyir mi rnams bdag gis spangs// gang phyir yul la sgom pa yis// bzlas drang sbyin sreg l-i so 'jug/ yul rnams ngag gis skom pa med// de
85b4(skyes rabs): phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs// grang phyir bzlas nas sreg nas kyang // skye ba l-i ni thar min zhing // skye ba yi ni sdug bsngal che// de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs// gdwa phyar mchod sbyin draka' thub kyis// dge leg
85b5(skyes rabs): yaun zhes yid gyur pa// dwe ni brdzun pa nyid yin te// de phyir me rnams bdago gis spangs// gang phyir sgyu 'chi las grol ba// 'gyur med go 'phang dge bar ni// brjod pa bdag gis shes pa ste// de phyir me rnams bdag
85b6(skyes rabs): gis spangs// de ltar de'i cho ga dang spyod cing // don dang ldan pas gsan gyur gyur nas// 'dul ba'i slob dpon gau ta mas// dul ba'i 'od srung la gsung so// skal chen khyod ni legs par 'ongs// 'di ni legs byas byas min min//
86a1(skyes rabs): gang khyod tha dad chos rnams su// dge legs gang de nye bar thob// de phyir re zhig 'khor rnams ni// rnam rgyas yang dag 'brel ba bzhin// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul ston bzhin du// yid ni yang dag skyo bar gyis//
86a2(skyes rabs): de nas mchog ces smras nas ni// bdag la bdag ni yongs bsdus nas// mkha' 'gro'i bya ltar 'od srung ni// klung gi lam la 'phur pa'o// de mkhar sdong dum bzhin gnas shing // sa la bzhin du rnam par rgyu// khri la bzhin du
86a3(skyes rabs): bzhugs pa dang // rdzu 'phrul mkhas pa gzims pa'o// slar yang mi bzhin 'bar ba dang // slar yang sprin bzhin char 'bab ste// slar yang cig car shin tu ni// 'bar ba dang ni 'bab pa'o// glog gi snang ba'i 'od ldan pa'i// rab 'bab chu
86a4(skyes rabs): gter sprin bzhin du// 'bar ba dang ni 'bab pa yis// rgya cher rnam par gnon te mdzes// der ni mig rnams chags byas nas// ya mtshan gyen phyogs skye bo rnams// mchod mang po las phyag 'tshal zhing // seng ge'i sgra ni
86a5(skyes rabs): sgrogs pa'o// de nas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas nges// bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni// bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan zhes// thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong mchog la de bzhin du// phyag 'tshal 'od srung rab mthong nas// bde bar
86a6(skyes rabs): gshegs la kun mkhyen zhes// ma ga d+ha pa rnam nges so// de nas zhing byas mkhyen nas ni// dge phyir dge legs la gnas pas// chos thos par ni 'dod pa yi/ bzo sbyangs la ni bka' stsal pa// gzi chen ldan pa yid bcas shing // /
86b1(skyes rabs): dbang po thul ba dbang por bcas// sa yi bdag po gzugs nyid ni// skye ba dang ni rnam par nyams// yon tan 'phel phyir 'di yi ni// skye dang 'gag pa shes bya ste// shes nas de gnyis yang dag par// lus ni yang dag rig par
86b2(skyes rabs): mdzod// skye dang 'grag pa'i chos can du// dbang po dang bcas lus shos nas// bdag ldan bdag ces cung zhig ni// nye bar len mu ni nyer 'gro mAni// lus dang dbang po blo rnams las// gzhan ni dmigs pa ma yin te// sdug
86b3(skyes rabs): bsngal nyid ni skye ba ste// sdug bsngal nyid ni 'gag pa'o// gang tshe 'di kun mngon par 'gro// bdag med bdag gi ba yang med// de tshe mchog tu mi g.yo ba'i// mya ngan 'das pa thob pa'o// ngar 'dzin la sogs nyon mongs kyis//
86b4(skyes rabs): bdag tu 'dzin las 'ching ba ste// 'jig rten bdag med par mthong na// chags pa rnams las rnam par grol// mi bden par mthong 'ching ba ste// bden par mthong pa rnam par grol// bdag yod ces ni 'jig rten 'dir// rab
86b5(skyes rabs): tu 'jug 'di bden mI 'dzim// gal te bdag yod gyur na de// rtag gam yang na mi rtag nyid// phyogs ni gnyis po 'di dag la// nyes pa chen po rab tu chags// gal te re zhig mi rtags gyur// las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur// yang
86b6(skyes rabs): srid yod pa ma yin zhing // thad pa 'bad pa med par 'gyur// ci ste rtag cing khyab par 'gyur// skye ba med dang skye ba min// nam mkha' khyab cing rtag pa ni// 'god pa med cing skye ba med// gal te bdag 'di khyab bdag 'gyur// gang du mi gan
87a1(skyes rabs): pA ma yin// 'di dang song nas dang thar par// thams cad du ni cig car 'gyur// khyab bdag nyid phyir bya med 'di'o// las kyi bya ba med par 'gyur// las rnams ma byas pa las ni// 'bras bur sbyor bar gang
87a2(skyes rabs): gis 'gyur// gal te 'di yi byed par 'gyur// bdag gi sdug bsngal byed ma yin// rang dbang gyur na sdug bsngal ni// bdag gis bdag gi byed pa su// bdag ni rtag pa nyid las ni// rnam par 'gyur pa skye min zhing // bde
87a3(skyes rabs): dang sdug bsngal thob pa las// do yi rnam par 'gyur ba mthong // ye shes thob pas dang nyon mongs// spangs las thar pa yod pa ste// bya med khyab bdag 'di yi ni// de phyir thar pa yod ma yin// yod min gyurarA las de nyid kyis
87a4(skyes rabs): bdag ste 'di ni brjod min la// rgyur gyur pas kyang ma yin zhing // 'di ni cung zad byed pa yin// bya ba las kyang gsal min zhing // gang rnams kyis 'di byas min la// rnam pa de ltar gyur min smra// de phyir bdag gi yod ma yin// /
87a5(skyes rabs): byed pa po med 'dir ni rig pa po yang med// bdag po med pa'i lus po 'di ni 'dren par byed// ji ltar 'khor ba'i chu bo rab tu bskor ba ste// smra ba de ni nyon mdzod nyan pa rnams kyi mchog/ dbang po drug dang dbang po'i spyod yul
87a6(skyes rabs): drug rnams la// brten nas rnam par shes pa rnam drug char pa ste// gsum po so sor rig pa'i tshi ga rab bskor zhing // gang las dran dang blo dang las kyi 'jug par yin// nor bu bud shing nyi ma yang dag phrad pa las// ji ltar
87b1(skyes rabs): me ni sbyar ba'i dbang gis skye ba ste// de bzhin blo dang dbang don dbang po la brten nas// skyes bu la brten bya ba rnams ni thams cad 'gyur// ji ltar sa bon las ni myu gu skye ba ste// myu gu des ni sa bon de ni shes min zhing // gzhan las gzhan
87b2(skyes rabs): du ma yin de las dri ma yino// de bzhin lus dang dbang po blo yI rim pa'o// de ltar thub pa mchog gi gsung ni mchog tu dge/ dam pa'i don du bsngags pa yang dag thos nas ni// dri ma med pa'i rdul med gzhal du med pa'o// mu ga d+ha
87b3(skyes rabs): yi bdag po chos mig skyes par gyur// 'khor der ma ga d+ha yi grong na gnas pa ya// mi ni du ma rnams dang lha na gnas pa rnams// thub pa'i gsung thob pa la rnam dag bsam ldan rnams// 'gyur sde 'chi ba med pa'i go 'phang thob par
87b4(skyes rabs): gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ slob ma mang po dang ldan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po des ni thubs rnam granas phyir// dpal ldan nags tshal 'od ma'i
87b5(skyes rabs): tshel ni rab phul nas// de nyid khong du chud phyir kun nas gnyis pa ni// mngon par rjes gnang byas pa grong khyer la zhugs so// de nas gtsug lag khang der 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// ye shes los gyur dge ba'i sgron ma bsnams
87b6(skyes rabs): pa ste// tshangs dang lha dang de bzhin 'phags pa rnams kyi ni// gnas pa de dang de yis sangs rgyas rnam par gnas// de nas rta thul dbang po'i rta ni kun bsdams shing // bsod snyoms 'dod pas rgyal po'i khab ni rab 'thob ste// gzugs
88a1(skyes rabs): kyi dang ni zhi ba yis dang rnam 'gyur gyis// skye bo chen po rnams kyi mig rnams phrogs par gyur// ser skya'i rigs kyi dge slong slob ma du ma can// sha ra dwa ti'i bu zhes rab tu grags pa yis// dbang /
88a2(skyes rabs): po zhi bar 'ongs pa de ni mthong ba ste// lam na rjesu gnas nas tshigs ni mngon par smras// khyod kyi gsar pa'i rtags dang mtshan dang ni zhi ba nyid// mthong nas kho bo'i blo gros yA mtshan mchog gyur te// de phyir re zhig gal
88a3(skyes rabs): te de nyid rig pa dang // khyod kyi ston pa'i mtshan ci smra ba gang yin smos// de ltar mchod mang sngon 'gro bram ze de yis ni// de skad brjod cing rta thul gyis kyang smras pa ste// bu ram shing pa'i rigasu rab 'khrungs thams cad
88a4(skyes rabs): mkhyen// bdag gi ston pa bla na med pa shes par mdzod// byis pa gsar bu chos las skyes par gyur pa yis// khyod la ston pa brjod par nus pa ma yin no// smras pa mkhyen pa'i mchog gyur thub pa chen po'i gsungs
88a5(skyes rabs): nyung ngu cung zad tsam zhig nges par rtogs par mdzod// gang zhig chos rnams mtshan mo las ni byung ba ste// de dag rnams kyi mtshan ma bcom ldan gyis gsungs shing // gang zhig de dag rnams kyis nges par 'gog pa
88a6(skyes rabs): dang // yang dag 'gog pa de yi thabs gang gsungs pa'o// de ltar rta thul gyis ni chog 'di thos nas ni// gnyis skyes nyer rgyal zhes bya'i ming can de yi ni// skyen par chos la mig ni rdul dang bral ba ni// dge zhing rnam pa
88b1(skyes rabs): dag par nges par gyur pa'o// rgyu med pa dang bya ba med dang dbang phyug ste// zhing shes pa ni nges par de yis sngon rig cing // rgyu las 'di rnams rab tu 'jug par thos nas ni// bdag med gyur pa mthong nas dam pa'i bden pa
88b2(skyes rabs): gzigs// sbom po'i nyon mongs tshogs kyi rnam par nyams pa ni// grangs can lus las tshwa shas dang bces mthong ba ste// sbom po dang ni phra mo de yis nyams pa ni// sangs rgyas pa yi bstan las 'gyur zhes snyam par gyur//
88b3(skyes rabs): bdag tu 'du shes skyes pa nye bar mkhyud nas ni// ngar 'dzin spong ba ma yin de nas dra yi nyid// sgron ma dang ni nyin mor byed pa yod pa na// 'od kyi rnam par nyams par gtan tshigs shes bya ci// ji ltar pad+ma'i chub che bar gyur/
88b4(skyes rabs): pa yi// snal ma phra mo nyid ni gzhan dang brel pa ste// thar pa'i cho ga thar thug min par de snyam zhing // sangs rgyas pa yi rdo ba phye dang mnyam par rtogs// de nas bram zes rta thul de la mngon mchod nas// tshim zhing rang nyid kyis
88b5(skyes rabs): ni khang par rnams song zhing // bsod snyoms rim bzhin rta thul gyis kyang rab thob nas// rang bzhin gnas shing mkhas pa 'od ma'i tshal du ni// de bzhin rab tu ngang bas mchog dang ldan pa yi// nye rgyal kyang ni mngon du zhugs
88b6(skyes rabs): pa mthong nas ni// thos pa dang ni bsam pas bya ba snyam pa yi// maung+gal rigasu rab tu skyes pas smras pa'o// dge slong de nyid gang gis gzhan bzhin gyur pa ste// brtan yin yang dag dga' zhing nye bar song // khyed kyis 'chi med
89a1(skyes rabs): ci zhig de ring thob pa ste// bzhin ni rab tu dang 'di gtan tshigs med ma yin// de nas 'di ltar bgyi zhes 'di la nges bden smras// de nas des ni bdag la smyos pa shes des smras// de nas tshig de nyid ni de
89a2(skyes rabs): yis smras pa ste// thos nas nyid kyi yang dag mig ni skyes par gyur// las dang bsam pa rnam ngag blo ldan de gnyis ni// lag gnas sgron mu bzhin du de nyid mthong ba ste// shes pas ston la rnam par g.yo min bsam ldan dag/ de
89a3(skyes rabs): ni blta ba'i don du dA lta nyid du gshegs// slob mo'i sder bcas de nyid rgyang ma nas gzigs nas// bcom ldan drang srong chen pos dge slong rnams la gsungs// shes rab can dang rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyi gtso// kho bo'i mchog gi
89a4(skyes rabs): slob mi 'di gnyis 'dir 'ongs so// de nas zab dang brtan pa'i gsung na zhi bo yi// thub pas de gnyis la ni gtam dag mdzad pa ste// dge slong 'dir ni mngon par nyer 'ongs ra bzhi'i phyir// chos 'di ji lta ba bzhin yang dag thob par
89a5(skyes rabs): gyis// myu gu gsum lag gtsug phud dang ldan gnyis skyes te// gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs te// sangs rgyas mthu yis ngur smrig gos dang ldan pa yi// dge slong nyid du skad cig gis ni gyur pa'o// /
89a6(skyes rabs): slob ma'i sder bcas cha lugs de yis de gnyis kyis// mgo bo dag gis thams cad mkhyen la mchod pa ste// de nas sangs rgyas kyis chos de gnyis la gsungs shing // dus kyi de gnyis kyis ni nges legs thob par gyur//
89b1(skyes rabs): de nas 'od srungs rigs kyi sgron ma gnyis skyes ni// kha dog drang ni gzugs dang nor dang nyer ldan pas// rdzu 'phrul dang ni bdag ldan bzang mo rnam spangs nas// thar pa'i ched du nguru smrig bzung zhing gshegs pa'o// mdog bzangs
89b2(skyes rabs): gser gyi mchod sdong dang mtshungs 'bar ba ni// bu mang ming bcus mchod rten du ni des mthong nas// dngos po tham cad spangs shing ya mAtshun dang bcas pas// thams cad mkhyen la thal mo rab sbyar mngon par song // thub pa
89b3(skyes rabs): lngal ni rgyangs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing // phyag 'tshal nas ni ji lta ba bzhin mthon por gsol// bdag ni slob ma bcom ldan bdag gi ston pa lags// mun pa rnamasu bstan pa bdag gi sgron mar gyur// gnyis skyes skom pa
89b4(skyes rabs): skyes shing nye bar 'ongs par ni// mkhyen nas bsam pa rnam dag thur 'dod de la ni// sems la gsung gi chab kyis rab tu tshim mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pas legs par 'ongs zhes bka' stsal to// gsu 'di yis ni
89b5(skyes rabs): ngol ba rnam par so sa bzhin te// nges par legs par rtogs pa'i ched du gnas pa ste// de nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'di la thugs rje can// thub pas chos ni mdor bsdus pa yis gsungs pa'o// gang phyir thub pas chos ni phra mor
89b6(skyes rabs): gsungs tsam na// de yis don ni mtha' dag yang dag thob gyur te// de phyir yang dag rig dang na tshong che nyid las// dgra bcom 'od srungs chen po nyid du mtshan gyur to// gang gis lus las gzhan dang yang na lus su naM// bdag
90a1(skyes rabs): dang bdag gi ba zhes bdag tu rtog pa ste// de yis bdag tu lta ba de ni nges spungs shing // nyi tshe ba min sdug bsngal 'di ni mthong bar gyur// tshul khrims brtul zhugs dag gis drug par byed ces
90a2(skyes rabs): gang // rgyu med pa dang rgyu las de yis rtogs pa ste// sdug bsngal nyid dang lam nI yang dag thob nas te// tshul khrims dang nri brtul zhugs mchog tu ma bzung ngo // phyin ci log tu gyur par song ba gang gi ni// mngon du
90a3(skyes rabs): bskor zhing mchog ni rab tu thob ma yin// bden pa bzhi po'i go 'phang rnams ni mthong gyur nas// the tshom som nyir gyur te yang dag mchod par gyur// 'dod pa gang rnams su ni yang dag brgyar nyid dang // brgyal
90a4(skyes rabs): bar gyur dang brgyal bar 'gyur nyid 'jig rten gami gtsang bden pa ma yin de rnams des shes nas// 'dod chags shes bya'i yul de spangs par gyur pa'o// de bzhin du ni byams par gyur pa'i sems kyis des// /
90a5(skyes rabs): bshes dang bshis min rnamasu khyad par med pa ste// 'byung po kun la rjesu gtse ba byas pa yis// nang du song ba'i gnod sems yang bar gyur pa'o// gzugs la brten pa rnams dang grong khyer brten pa rnams// sna
90a6(skyes rabs): tshogs nyid dang ldan pa'i 'du shes rnams spangs nas// des ni gzugs kyi khams su chags pa rnams bcom ste// gzugs la 'jug pa'i nyes pa rnams ni rtogs nas so// rmongs las snyoms 'jug rnamasu thar pa'i
90b1(skyes rabs): 'du shes dang // gzugs med lha rnams mdzad pa can du rtogs nas ni// zhi zhing mtshan ma med pa'i sems ni gzung nasu// gzugs med sred pa las ni chags dang bral bar song // chu bo sin+d+hu'i shugs chen rab tu
90b2(skyes rabs): 'jug pa bzhin// sems ni g.yo zhing bskyod par byed pa shes nas ni// brtan pa'i rten las rgod pa rnam par spangs pa ste// zhi zhing rdzing bu gang bya bzhin du gnas par gyur// snying po u ba'i phyir ba'i nad sde chos nyid phyis/ bdag med phyir
90b3(skyes rabs): dngos rnams yang dag rab mthong nas// khyad 'phags nyid dang mnyam dang mchog nyid mthong ba ste// nga rgyal rnam par spangs nas yod ma yin zhes rtogs// ye shes me yis mi shes mun pa rnams bcom nas// zad pa can dang
90b4(skyes rabs): zad pa med par sna tshogs mthong // rnal 'byor gyis ni rig pa nyid ni yongs bsgoms nas// ma rig pa ni mtha' dag ji lta ba bzhin spangs// mthong dang bsgom pa dag gi kun tu sbyor ba ni// bcu po 'di dag rnams kyis rnam
90b5(skyes rabs): par grol gyur cing // thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas nyid la lta bzhin du// bya ba kun byas rang bzhin gnas te gnas par gyur// skar ma gsum gyi gnas skabs gsum skyong rjes skyes lha dang ni// ldan pa'i lnga gsum
90b6(skyes rabs): tshechos kyi dus su skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin// gsum ni chud zos gyur cing gsum ni lhag par thob pa yi// gsum rig slob ma gsum gyis bde bar gshegs pa rnam par mdze so// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags
91a1(skyes rabs): chen po las/ nyan thos chen po rab tu gshegs par mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas 'ga' zhig tshe na nor ldan khyim bdag ni// skal ba med pa rnams la
91a2(skyes rabs): nor ni rab sbyin pa// bzang sbyin zhes ni rab tu grags pa'i ming ldan pa// byang phyogs yul ko sa la rnams nas der song gyur// de yis der ni thub pa bzhugs pa thos pa ste// thos nas blta bar 'dod pas mtshan mo rab
91a3(skyes rabs): tu song // rnam dug sems dpa' des ni rab sleb rlab mkhyen nas// rag tu phyag byas pa la bde bar gshegs pa bstan// gang phyir chos la bsgoms pas nyid ni rnam spangs nas// blo ldan mtshan mor bdag la
91a4(skyes rabs): lta 'dod rab slebs te// de lta nyid du 'ongs pa de yi de ma thog/ nges par legs pa'i 'gron 'di rab tu ldong mdzod cig/ grang zhig khyod kyi lhag bsam gang zhig bstan pa dang // bdag gis grags pa nyid las gang
91a5(skyes rabs): zhig dang ba dang // gang zhig sngon gyi rgyu las blo gros rab zhugs te// des ni yon tana? chen po rnams kyi snod yin no// de phyir 'jig rten dag na grags dang gzhan du ni// 'bras bu sbyin pa mchog las byung bar rig
91a6(skyes rabs): nas ni// bkur sti byas nas dus su snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis// chos las thob pa'i nor ni sbyin par bya ba'i// tshul khrims yang dag blangs nas spyad par bya ba ste// tshul khrims nyid ni bsrung ba dang ni rgyan yin zhing // 'og
91b1(skyes rabs): tu song ba rnams kyi rnam par ldog byed do// nam mkha'i steng gi nges par rdzogs pa po nyid yin// 'dod pa rnamasu gcig min zhen pas rjes bcings pa'i// yongasu tshol ba la sogs skyon rnams thos nas ni// nges par 'byung
91b2(skyes rabs): pa'i cho gar yon tan rnams de shes nas// rnam dben las skyes shi ba'i badren pa bsnyen par mdzod// 'chi bas nye bar gzir zhing rga bas zil non pa'i// 'jig rten rab tu bskor ba ro yang dag yongs shes nas// zhi ba skye
91b3(skyes rabs): ba med phyir 'bad pa mdzod cig dang // skye ba bden pa med no rga med 'chi ba med// ji ltar mi rnams la ni mi rtag bdag nyid kyis// rab chags sdug bsngal mngon sum du ni rigs mdzod la// de bzhin lha rnams la yang
91b4(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal rig mdzod dang // 'jug po rtag pa nyid ni su yang yod ma yin// gang du mi rtag pa nyid der ni sdug bsngal zhing // gang du rung nyid med par deraru yang sdug bsngal te// gang du bdag ces pa dang bdag gi
91b5(skyes rabs): baM zhes pa// de tshe mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag meng gang la yan// de phyir sdug bsngal las ni sdug bsngal 'di dang ni// mtshan mA las nI 'di yi mtshan ma ltos mdzod lA// rnam par+ya nye bar zhi las sdug bsngal zhi ba dang //
91b6(skyes rabs): lam las khyod kyis lam ni dge ba shes par gyis// 'gro ba g.yo ba sdug bsngal 'di ni shes nas su// me dang rab mtshungs dus kyi me yis 'jig rten ni// mtha' dag rab tu tshig par yongasu rtog bzhin du// srid dang srid min rnams
92a1(skyes rabs): smon pa med par gyis// stong pa nyid dang bdag med bdag gi ba med pa// sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'jig rten 'di ni shes byas nas// 'du byed tsam zhig rab tu yongasu rtogs bzhin du// lus 'di la na
92a2(skyes rabs): khams kyi 'du shes nyid du gyis// sems ni sred pa g.yos lus yang dag g.yos nas dang // 'khor ba'i 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni// rtogs pa med cing zhi la bde ni zhang chags med par// sems ni/
92a3(skyes rabs): snyoms zhing mtshan ma med pa bsnyen par gyis// de nas drang srong chen po'i chos de thos pa las// chos kyi cho ga'i sngon gyi 'bras bu thob gyur cing // gang zhig thob nas 'di yi sdug bsngal las lhag ma// rgya mtsho chen po
92a4(skyes rabs): las ni theg pa gcig bzhin gyur// chags bral rnams kyi dgon par yang dag gnas kyang ngam// lus med rnams kyi srid rtser yang dag gnas na yang // nags sam lha na de nyid mthong min ma yin la// khyim na gnas
92a5(skyes rabs): pa yin yang lta bas dge legs gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs lta ba'i dra ba rnams kyis dang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyi de rnams rnam mi grol// de phyir rab tu nyams shing de nyid ma mthong bar// chags pa rnam par
92a6(skyes rabs): bsal nas khyad par 'phags par gshegs// lta ba legs skyes des ni lta ba ngan de rnams// ston ka'i sprin gyis rdo yi char bzhin spangs pa ste// dbang phyug la sogs mi mthun rgyu las ma yin zhing // de ni
92b1(skyes rabs): 'jig rten rgyu med par minu zhes rtog so// de phyir mi mnyam rgyurwa ni 'thud pa ma yin zhing // rgyu med par ni 'gral ba chen po yod pa nyid// 'di yang rig pas shes pas so sor mthong bas te// the tshom med pas de nyid mthong ba kye ma
92b2(skyes rabs): ci// gal te dbang phyug gis ni 'gro ba skyed gyur na// 'gro ba rim gyis rab tu 'jug pa ma yin la// skye dgu rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma yin zhing // gang du gang zhig bskyed nas de dang de nyid 'gyur// lus can rnams
92b3(skyes rabs): kyi mi 'dod 'thob pa ma yin zhing // de yi bdag nyid rnams kyi 'dod pa'i spyod pa med// gang zhig lus can rnams kyi dge dang mi dger gyur// de ni dbang phyug nyid phyir dbang phyug la yino// de yi dbang phyug nyid la the tshom 'gyur min zhing // de
92b4(skyes rabs): ni mi rnams dag gis byams pa pa bzhin 'gyur// de la nyam thag pas ni spyi sgra sgyu min zhing // lha rnams de dang de la 'jig rten mchod ma yin// gal tI 'di mI skyed la dgongs par gyur na ni// bya lhun nyid phyir deng 'dir dbang phyug
92b5(skyes rabs): ma yin zhing // gal te 'di yi 'jug la 'dod par gyur nA nI// de nyid dbang phyug yod pa nyid la byed par 'gyur// ci ste de yi skye la nus pa cung zhig med// byis pa bzhon du 'di yis spyod rnams rgyu med do// gal te dbang phyug gi ni bdag la
92b6(skyes rabs): mnga' nyid med// 'jig rten bskyed la 'di yi stobs de ci zhig yod// ji ltar 'dod la gal te bde sdug las bsnyen na// 'obyung po rnams ni 'jig rten na des byas pa nyid// gang phyir 'dod la chags pa khong khro la 'jug ste// de phyir de
93a1(skyes rabs): yi dbang nyid yod pa ma yin no// de'i rten nyid la sems med rnams kyis gnas bya ste// skyes bu'i 'bad rtsol tshang mar gyur pa nyid yin no// las 'bras med par 'gyur zhing lus ni byas min la// las
93a2(skyes rabs): kyi sbyor ba rnams ni de yi rten yin na// gral te dbang phyug rang gi las kyis 'gyur na ni// thun mong gyur pa'i las la dbang phyug gyur ma yin// ci ste de yi khyab bdag rgyu med gyur na ni// 'gro ba kun gyi dbang phyug nyid ni rab tu grub// ci
93a3(skyes rabs): ste ngo yi dbang phyug nyid gzhan las yin zhing // de nyid kyi yang byed pa po yi dbang phyug gzhan yin la// de yis gzhan zhes de ltar 'dir ni rnam gzhag med// de phyir 'gro ba bskyed pa yod pa ma yin nyid// dbang phyug skyed
93a4(skyes rabs): por gyur na rigs pas tha dad du// rnam par 'gal ba rnam po du ma mthong ba ste// de yi phyir yang rang bzhin lnga nI nyes pa de// slar yang rab tu chags par 'gyur ba nyid yino// rgyu shes rnams kyi rten ni cung zad rnams
93a5(skyes rabs): log pa'o// rgyu ni bya ba'i cho grar smra ba me yin zhing // bya ba'i cho gar sa bon la sngogs de dang de// ltos pa yin te de phyir rang bzhin rgyu ma yin// 'bras mi rdzogs par byed pa po ni gcig pa nyid// 'ga' zhig gi yang rgyu ni cung
93a6(skyes rabs): zad yod ma yin// gcig gi bdag nyid can gyi rang bzhin rab bstan te// de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin// gang gi rang bzhin gyis ni khyab pa nyid 'dod pa// de yi bya ba med pa nyid kyang rab chags shing // bya ba
93b1(skyes rabs): ma gtogs 'bras bu'i cho ga mthong min te// dza ya~M hU~Mr yang bskyed la rang bzhin rgyu ma yim+ba// de yi khyab pa po nyid la ni rgyu nyid phyir// thams cad las ni thams cad rgyun ma chad par 'gyur// 'bras bu'i rab tu 'jug la ngas/
93b2(skyes rabs): pa mthong ba ste// de phyir skyed pa la ni rang bzhin rgyu ma yin// ji ltor 'di yi yon tan med nyid grub pa ste// de ltar 'bras bu la ni yon tan can rnams 'jig rten na mthong ste// de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin// /
93b3(skyes rabs): rtag pa'i rgyu las khyad par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing // rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan nyid ma yin// rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan zhugs pa ste// de phyir rang bzhin las ni skyed pa rigs ma yin// rang bzhin gyi ni bskyed
93b4(skyes rabs): pa'i bdag nyid can nyid la// 'bras bu rnamasu nyams pa'i rgyu ni grub ma yin// gang phyir rnam 'gyur gyis ni nyams pa mthong ba ste// de phyir rtog par bya ba rgyu ni gzhan nyid do// nus par gyur pa'i sbyor la shin tu mthar thug
93b5(skyes rabs): pa'i// thar pa 'dod pa'i sdom brtson rnams kyi ma yin zhing // skye dgu rnams kyi rang bzhin rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir// gang las thar pa'i ched dang pha rol gnon par gyur// skyed pa'i bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis ni nges nyid phyir
93b6(skyes rabs): de yi bdag nyid rnams 'gyur la ni nges nyid yin// 'jig rten dog na rnam 'gyur la ni brtan nyid med// de phyi ro rang bzhin gyis ni skyed par rig ma yin// sems kyi spyod pa mo bsal rang bzhin zhes bya zhing // rnam 'gyur gsal
94a1(skyes rabs): ba 'di ni de nas grags pa ste// de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu min zhing // gsal ba'i rgyu la 'dir ni 'bras bu grub pa nyid// sems med rang bzhin las ni sems dang bcas pa yi// rta glang
94a2(skyes rabs): bong bu la sogs 'bras bu rigs pa ma yin zhing // sems dang rnam par bral ba'i rgyu rnams ngag las ni// sems dang ldan pa cung zad zhig ni 'jug ma yin// gal te 'gro ba skyed phyir dus ni nges pa ste// de phyir yongasu rtog byed rnams kyi ther pa n+de/
94a3(skyes rabs): gang phyir skye dgu rnams kyi mtha' ni byas min te// de phyir 'jig rten rgyun chad med par skye bar 'gyur// gang zhig yon tan rnams kyi gcig dang du mas byas// rjes rnams su ni rang nyid nges pa mthong ba ste// gal te
94a4(skyes rabs): rgyu gcig nyid du gnas par gyur pa na// de yang tha dad khyad par gyur pa nyid// gang zhig smin pa las skyes rdzas kyi cho gar sar// yon tan shes pas yon tan tha dad nyid du mthong // gang phyir rgyu ni khyad par min pa 'dod/
94a5(skyes rabs): pa ste// stong pa'i rdzas rnamasu yang nges par gyur pa nyid// gang gi mi gsal ba las rdzas ni 'char pa ste// de yi rjes su dpag pa nges par grub ma yin// 'bras bu bsal ba yI ni yang dag rab 'jug pa// mi gsal
94a6(skyes rabs): ba las gang gis mngon du mthong ma yin// gsal ba gnyis pa dag las rab tu 'jug pa bzhin// mi gsal ba las gang gi 'bras bu dang por gyur// de yi 'dod pa las 'dir mi 'dod chen po'o// rang bzhin nyid kyis
94b1(skyes rabs): nyes pa gnyis ni rab tu chags// ji ltar gser gyi phreng ba khyad par 'phags pa ste// de ltar rang bzhin gyi ni rnam 'gyur khyad par 'phags// 'bras bu khyad par yin zhing rgyu yi ma yin te// de phyir bskyed la rang bzhin rigs pa ma
94b2(skyes rabs): yin no// galA te bya bar skyes bu de ni rgyu yin na// gang gis nges par gang 'dod dros de 'thob par 'gyur// 'dod kyang kha cig don ni 'thob pa ma yin la// mi 'dod na yang dbang med 'dir ni 'thob par 'gyur// gang gris pa lang
94b3(skyes rabs): rta bong rnga mo'i skye gnas 'gro// mnga' bdag nyid du gyur na de ni bsnyen min zhing // de ru 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i las ni byed pa dang // sdug bsngal myi 'dod su yis sdug bsngal byed par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rten dag na skyes bu
94b4(skyes rabs): byed par gyur// sdug bsngal byed pa ma yin bde ba kho na byed// 'dod pa byed par 'dod kyang ma 'dod byed pa ste// dbang phyug chen por gyur na mi 'dod su yis spyod// gang tshe mi ni chos min pa las rnam 'jigs shing // 'bad pas chos ni
94b5(skyes rabs): rab tu son par byed pa nyid// sna tshogs nyon mongs rnams kyi dbang med 'phrog pa ste// de phyir 'dun mi ni pha rol rgyud du gyur// grang dang dang char dang thog dang glog sogs kyi// bya ba rnams ni mi la bzlog nas mthong ba ste// gang phyir
94b6(skyes rabs): rang dbang ma yin mi ni gzhan ldan te// de phyir bya ba rnam su skyes bu dbang phyug min// gang tshe sa bon las dang sa chu'i rten las ni// dus sbyor rab tu 'jug la lo tog phun tshogs shing // mar mi dag las rab gsal shing
95a1(skyes rabs): las me yin te// rgyu med las yin zhes pa rgyu med ma yin no// rgyu med pa las gal te 'gro ba'i rab 'jug na// mi yi byed pa yis ni med par 'gyur ba ste// thams cad kyis ni thams cad nges/
95a2(skyes rabs): par 'thob byed cing // rtag na 'di ni thams cad du ni song bar grub// de dang sdug bsngal gal te rgyu med las yin na// gang cher kun gyi bde dang sdug bsngal skal min zhing // rgyu med las kyang bde dang sdug bsngal rtogs min
95a3(skyes rabs): te/ de phyir rgyu med las shes 'di ni rgyu ma yin// de skad ces pa la sogs mi mnyam rgyu rnams des// 'jig rten rab tu 'jug la rgyu rnams shes ma yin// rgyu med pari ni 'jig rten mthong ba ma yin zhing // nyes pa 'di
95a4(skyes rabs): rnams rgyu med las ni yang dag rtogs// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i 'byung po rnamasu yang // de dang de la brten nas de dang de 'byung ste// 'jig rten dag nu rgyu med tso yang yod min zhing // kun gyi rgyu ni 'jig rten pa yis/
95a5(skyes rabs): shes ma yin// de nas sbyin pa bzang por byin pa'i bzang byin des// rgya che'i chos kyi dam pa'i chos ni rnams shes nas// g.yo ba med pa'i blo gros nges par rab dang bas// drang srong chen po la ni tshig 'di gsol
95a6(skyes rabs): ba'o// mnyan yang rta ljang rta rid kyis bsnyen grong khyer ni// bdag gi gnas kyi gnas ni bsod nams grags pa can// der ni bdag gis khyed kyi gnas ni byed 'dod de// sdig med gnas mchog dam pa de ni bsnyen par
95b1(skyes rabs): mdzod// gang blta na yang thub pa khyed kyis gnas su snyoms pa ni// gzhal yas khang gi logs sam rnam dben nags su ni// bdag la rje su brtse phyir gnas kyi ched du ni// dgra bcom rab tu gzhes par mdzad par 'os pa
95b2(skyes rabs): lags// de nas gtong bar lhag par mos pa 'di yis ni// rnam par grol ba'i sems ni rnam par mkhyen nas ni// chags pa med pa'i blo mnga' blo gros mkhyen pa yis// mchog tu zhi bas blo gros yang dag bka' stsal to// /
95b3(skyes rabs): sems dpa' brtan kye gang zhig rdzas glog g.yo rnams su// khyod kyi sems dpa' gtong la lhag par mos pa ste// rang bzhin gyis ni sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dgyes// de nyid mthong ba khyod la de ni ngo mtshar min// gang zhig
95b4(skyes rabs): khyim ni tshig las phyi rol 'thon byed pa// de yi don de 'tshig par byed pa ma yin te// de bzhin dus kyi me yis 'gro ba tshig pa na// gang gis gang zhig sbyin pa de yis de nyer 'thob// de phyir rnam spangs sems dpa' rnams
95b5(skyes rabs): kyis sbyin par dang // yul rnams yang dag longs spyod par ni shes pa nyid// bkren pa 'jig rten dag nA zad pa'i skyon mthong bas// nye bar longs spyod ma yin 'jig las sbyin ma yin// dus su smod la don ni rnam par gtong ba dang
95b6(skyes rabs): dpa' dang nga rgyal las ni de bzhin g.yul 'gyed por// sems dpa' lhag pa nyid kyis shes te gzhan gyis min// soms dpa' yis ni sbyin pa nyid dang g.yul 'gyed do// sbyin byed dga' ba nyid du 'gro la 'gro ba ste// snyan pa
96a1(skyes rabs): dang ni dam par grags pa rab tu 'thob// sbyin pa po yod gang zhes dam pa rnams sbyin nas// yang dag bkur ba dang ni mngon du 'gro bar byed// de bzhin 'jig rten dag na blo gtad nyid 'gyur zhing // mi bzad pa rnams
96a2(skyes rabs): las kyang nyes pa 'thob ma yin// bsod nams rnams ni bdag gis byas zhes tshim pa ste// 'chi ba'i dus su skrag par mngon par 'gro ma yin// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dir ni me tog tsam zhig ste// sbyin pa po yi 'bras bu gzhan nyid
96a3(skyes rabs): rab tu 'thob/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la ni 'khor ba'i skye bo yi// gtong ba dang mnyam gnyen ni yod pa ma yin no// mi yi 'jig rten nA dang lha na skyes po rnams// gtong ba las dang mnyam pa rnams las lhag par gyur// rta dang glang po'i
96a4(skyes rabs): skye gnas su yang gnas pa rnams// 'bras bu de ni gtso bo thob par 'gyur ba'o// sbyin pas longs spyod rnams kyis yongasu 'dzin pa ste// tshul khrims kyis bsrungs mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur// ye shes sngon du 'gro ba can gyi
96a5(skyes rabs): zho ba yis kyang ni// rten dang bral ba gang na grangasu 'gro ba 'gro ma yin// 'chi med bdud rtsi de yis 'thob pa'i tshod du yang // sdom par gyur pa rab tu sbyin pa yin pa nyid// sbyin pa dran nas rab tu dga' bar gyur pa ste// yid ni rig tu dga'
96a6(skyes rabs): las nges par ting 'dzin yin// mnyam par bzhag na yang dag mtho ba 'di ru ni// skye dang 'god pa shes par rim gyis 'gyur ba ste// gzhan lo sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sbyin pa po yis ni// snying la gnas pa'i nyon mongs rnams ni bsrab
96b1(skyes rabs): par gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa sbyin byed de yi don rnamasu// chags par grags pa de ni dang por tshod pa nyid// gang la rab tu byams pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa ste// de phyir zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyu la sbyangs par gyur// rab tu len pa po
96b2(skyes rabs): ni bde ldan rnams mthong nas// glang zhig dga' ste des na ser sna yod ma yin// sbyin pa pos ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu mngon rtogs nas// med pa nyid dang mi shes mun pa 'joms pa po// de phyir zhi ba 'phags min gyis bsnyen
96b3(skyes rabs): ser sna dang // sred pa gang las sbyin pa byed pas bcom pa ste// des na thar pa'i yan log gyur pa sbyin pa ni// yin zhing nyes pa rab tu nyams phyir thar pa'o// ji ltar gzhan rnams grib ma'i don du shing 'dod cing // kha cig 'bras bu'i don
96b4(skyes rabs): du gzhin rnams me tog phyir// de ltar sbyin pa yongasu sgyur bar byed pa ste// khwa cig zhi ba'i don du gzhan rnams nor gyi phyir// de phyir khyad por du ni khyim na gnas rnams kyis// sbyin pa ji ltar nus pa mchog ni gter yin zhing // sbyin pa
96b5(skyes rabs): snying po med pa'i nor gyi snying po ste// dam po rnams kyi rjes su song ba lam 'di yin// bza' ba rab tu sbyin par stobs ni rab stor zhing // bgo ba sbyin byed la yang lus ni ster po'o// gang gis dam pa rnams la gnas ni sbyin byed pa//
96b6(skyes rabs): des kyang 'jig rten dag na thams cad sbyin pa yin// theg pa sbyin byed la yang bde ba sbyin pa ste// mar mo sbyin byed la ni spyan mig sbyin pa nyid// de nas dbrog bya ma yin 'chi med rab sbyin zhing // gang gis mthar thug gyur pa'i chos
97a1(skyes rabs): kyis ston pa nyid// kha cig 'dod pa'i ched du sbyin pa gtong ba ste// gzhan ni don gyi don du gcig ni grags pa'i phyir// kha gcig mtho ris don du gzhan ni brtse ba'i phyir// khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni chags pa med/
97a2(skyes rabs): pa yin// de phyir legs so khyod ni sred pa de ltar gyur// gang zhig yong dag bsgrungs mdzod 'dod pa tshim par shog/ rdul bcas mun pa dang ldan gang khyed 'ongs nas ni// ye shes rnam dge blo ni rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de nyid de
97a3(skyes rabs): ni gshegs pas lam gyis yang dag par/ dga' ba byas pa dang yang gzhug pa byas pa ni// gtsug lag khang de snying la rnam par byas nas ni// nye rgyal dang ni lhan cig dus su song bar gyur// song nas de na kau sham rgyal po'i
97a4(skyes rabs): khab drang ni// gtsug lag khang gi sa la so sor yang dag rgyus// dpal ldan mnyam zhing mdzes la yid 'ong shing ldan pa// der ni de yis rgyal byed kyi ni tshal mthong ngo // de nas de yi don du rgyal byed la zhugs te// de yis chags pa
97a5(skyes rabs): las ni de la ma byin no// khyod kyi gal te don gyis kun nas bkram na yang // sa ni bdag gis sbyin pa ma yin zhes smras so// de nas der ni bzang sbyin gyis de la smras pa// tshal de la ni rimo byas shes ni mngon 'dod do// de nas des
97a6(skyes rabs): ni nor gyis ni yongs g.yogs nas// chos kyi tha snyad mthong zhing nyos par gyur pa'o// de yis gtong ba des ni mthong nas rgyal byed kyis// sangs rgyas la ni mchog tu rab tu dang ba byas// nags tshal de yi lhag ma dag ni kun nas
97b1(skyes rabs): ni// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni phul bar gyur pa'o// de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis ni drang srong chen po yis// nye rgyal gyis ni nges par gzigs par bya ba'i don ldan par// myur ba'i blo gros dang / ma chags grol ba'i sems kyis ni
97b2(skyes rabs): mdzes shing dge ba mchog gi gtsug lag khang na byed du bcug/ nor gyi dbang phyug nyid kyi gnas ni 'phos pa lta bu dang / byang phyogs ko shu la yi khang pa'i bde ba lta bu dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi gzhi ni mtshungs pa lta bu dang /
97b3(skyes rabs): rang gi nor dang stobs kyi dang ni lta ba yin yang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ mgon med zas sbyin la rjesu ston pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas thub pa sna tshogs tha dad blo
97b4(skyes rabs): can gyi// ston pas thams cad ye shes kyis ni zil mnan nas// bcu phyed phrag ri nA dang grong khyer nas rim gyis// rgyal po bum pas bsnyen pa'i grong khyer du gshegaso// de nas slob ma stong phrag tsam ni dul ba na// gshegaso des ni
97b5(skyes rabs): yab kyi yul ni rab tu thob// de nas de la rjes su 'dzin pa mdzad bzhed pa// rang gi glog gi gnas la mtha' ru bsnyen pa'o// de nas mdun na 'don dang blon po blo gros can// dga' ba'i gtam la dam pa rgyu ba de rnams kyis// yongasu rdzogs pa'i
97b6(skyes rabs): rab rnyed 'phags pa ste// sa skyong rgyal po de la zhus shing gsol ba'o// de nas de ni 'ongs pa thos nas sa skyong ni// dga' ba yongs ldan sems kyis lta bar 'dod pa yis// grong khyer pa ni kun gyi rjesu 'gro byas pa// myur bas bstan pa
98a1(skyes rabs): spangs shing bsu ba la gshegs so// drang srong dbus su tshangs pa bzhin du ni// slob mas bskor ba de ni rgyud ring nas gzigs nas// drang srong chen pa chos la rjesu 'gro bas ni// shing rta spangs nas rkang pa
98a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyis nye bar gshegs// myur bar de yi nye log su ni yongs phyin nas// thub pa mthong ba nyid de des ni ma smras so// de lta bu zhes smra bar nus pa ma yin zhing // de bzhin dge slong zhes ni nus pa ma yin no// de nas deg yi dge
98a3(skyes rabs): slong cha lugs de mthong zhing // bdag tu song ba'i sna tshogs dpal la brtags nas ni// dbugs rings rgyus nas 'chi ma rnam par bton pa ste// drag tu min par gyur cing rnam par zlos pa nyid// lam 'gro sgom par gyur pa mngon pa so
98a4(skyes rabs): ba yi// rgyang ring dag nas rdzing bu rkam po mthong nas ltar// rang gnas rnam pa dang bral nye bar nyer bzhugs ba// mthong nas bdag gi nyam thag stobs ldan mchog tu gyur// 'jig rteni mtha' ru gnas pa'i sems gyur thim pa na// sdug
98a5(skyes rabs): pa'i rnam 'gyur ri mor song ba ji lta bar// gzugs de nyid ni mthong ba na ni bdag la ni// dga' bu yod pa ma yin 'di la dga' ba thal// gang gi mtha' dag ri yis bzlum pas sa gzhi ni// dang po'i dusu nga la nu ni gnas pa bzhin
98a6(skyes rabs): gang zhig dbang po la yang slong bar 'os min pa// bdag gi de ni pha rol rnams la slong mos mtsho// gangs 'di snying po lhun po la ni khyad 'phags shing // gsal bas nyi ma lang mdzes pas zla ba la// 'gros kyis glang po che la
98b1(skyes rabs): dbyangs kyis khyu mchog la// des ni slong mo za zhing sa ni rdzogs la min// de nas bu yi 'du shes kyis ni 'phyo ba nyid// rgyal po'i bsam pa 'di ni rnam par mkhyen nas dang // 'jig rten lhag ma lha yang rje su brtsu ba ste// de yi don du
98b2(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas mkha' la 'phur bar gyur// nyi ma'i shing rta phyag gis reg par mdzad nas ni// rlung gis bsnyen pa'i lam la zhabs dag gis gshegs shing // sku la gcig tu gyur cing du mar 'gyur pa dang // mang po nyid du gyur nas
98b3(skyes rabs): gcig/ tu gyur pa'o// sa la chu bzhin du yang zhugs shing thogs med la// chu yi log la sa la bzhin du spyod pa dang // ra ba dang ni ri la thang dkar mdzad pa dang // thogs pa med cing mkha' la bzhin du rab tu bzhugs// lus kyi phyed
98b4(skyes rabs): kyis chu yi char pa 'beb pa dang // phyed kyi me bzhin du ni 'bar bar gyur pa ste// ri bos 'bar ba'i sman dang rab tu 'bar ba bzhin// mkha' la gang zhig 'bar dang 'bar bas mdzes par gyur// dbang phyug mngon par 'dod pa'i skye bo
98b5(skyes rabs): de yi ni// sems kyi rab tu dga' ba de ltar bskyed nas ni// nyi ma gnyis pa bzhin du mkha' la bzhugs nas su// mi skyong la ni chos dag bgro bar mdzad pa'o// mi skyong khyed kyi bdag la gang zhig ltos pa dang // mya ngan rjesu zhugs pa
98b6(skyes rabs): snying rje'i bdag nyid shes// bu la dga' ba de ni tshod mdzod zhi bar gshegs// bdag las bu yi gsar pa bsnoms mdzod cig/ gang zhig sngon chad bu yis pa la mi byin zhing // sngon ni pha yis bu las rab tu ma thob pa// rgyal
99a1(skyes rabs): srid las khyad 'phagasnga shing mtho ris las khyud 'phags// rgyal po mchog gi bdud rtsi de ni bzhes mdzod cig/ sa skyong lngas kyi bdag nyid las kyi skye gnas dang // las kyi rten dang las kyi rnam smin skal
99a2(skyes rabs): ba dang // las kyi dbang gis gnas par 'gro ba shes nas ni// phan pa'i ched du las gang gyur pa de bsnyen mdzod// 'jig rten de nyid rtogs nas dang ni btsal nas su// dam pa'i las ni mi yi bshes yin gzhan ma yin// thams cad
99a3(skyes rabs): bor nas las dang lhan cig khyod kyi ni// rten dang bral zhing gcig pur 'gro bar bya ba'o// lha 'am dmyal ba dud 'gro mi yi 'jig rten du// las kyi rten las son pa'i 'jig rten 'gro ba ste// srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gsum dang skye gnas
99a4(skyes rabs): gsum// sna tshogs las ni 'jig rten pa yis rab tu byed// de phyir sde mtshan gnyis ni yang dag 'jug par dang // lus dang dag gi las 'di rnam par dag pa dang // yid kyi rab tu zhi la 'bad par bya ba ste// de ni bdag gi don yin
99a5(skyes rabs): gzhan don mi yin no// 'gro ba chu yi dpa' rlabs g.yo bar shes nas ni// brtags nas khyod kyi srid pa rnams su dga' mi bya// las ni yongs su zad phyir dam pa'i las gang des// mchog tu bde ba'i don du gang gyur bsnyen par bya// /
99a6(skyes rabs): rgyu skar 'khor lo mkha' la bzhin du rtag par ni// 'jig rten yongasu 'khor bar shes par byas nas ni// rtse mo 'das nas lha nas lha yang ltung ba ste// kye ma mir gyur smos ci blo gtang byed pa su// bde ba rnams las mchog tu thar pa'i
99b1(skyes rabs): bde ba dang // dga' ba rnams las las bdag tu dga' bas gtsor shes nas// lag 'gro rnams kyi brang la bzhin du bdag ldan ni// su zhig 'jigs pa du ma'i dpal gyi bde la dga'// de phyir rten pa khyim na me bzhin
99b2(skyes rabs): 'jig rten ni// 'jigs pa chen po dang ni yongs ldan mthong nas ni// gang zhig skye 'chi ngal pa mya ngan dang bral ba// zhi zhing brten pa'i go 'phang de ni slongs mdzod cig/ don gyis ma yin yul gyis ma yin mtshon gyis min//
99b3(skyes rabs): gang la rta dang glang pos don ni yod ma yin// skyon ni dgra bo rnams kyi sde de tshems mdzod dang // de lngas rgyal na rnam par rgyal ba gzhal du med// sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhi ba dang // zhi ba yi yang mngon pa'i
99b4(skyes rabs): thabs ni shes par mdzod// bzhi po 'di yi kun nas khong du chud pa las// 'jigs pa chen po dang ni ngan 'gro rnams 'gog go// de nas bde bar gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyis sngon du// zhing du byas pa'i sems la dga' ba
99b5(skyes rabs): skyes pa ste// thos nas mi skyong de yis chos ni rab thob cing // dga' bzhin thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// blo ldan dang bcas 'bras bu dang bcas khyed dgyes shing // sdug bsngal chen po las ni rnam grol khyed dgyeso// /
99b6(skyes rabs): mya ngan ched du don mengs sbyin bdag dga' la// bu yis 'bras bu dang ldan bdag ni dga' bar gyur// phun tshogs spangs nas gshegs pa khyed ni gnas su gyur// ngal ba chen pos dub pas khyed ni gnasu gyur// dga' ba'i gnyen
100a1(skyes rabs): 'dun dga' ba khyod kyis bor ba rnams// bdag cag rnams ni snying rje bar du gnas su gyur// lha yi drang srong rnams sam rgyal po'i drang srong rnams// de rnams sngon dus na yang gang la ma gshegs pa//
100a2(skyes rabs): nyam thag 'jig rten dag gi dge' ba'i ched du lam+ba// nges par legs pa 'di dang khyed kyis lhag par thob// khyod ni 'khor los sgyur bar gal te gyur na mi/ bdag gi dga' ba de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin zhing // rnam pa de ltar rdzu 'phrul
100a3(skyes rabs): 'di dang khyod kyis chos// mthong nas ji ltar bdag gi bstan pa dga' bar 'gyur// 'dir ni yang srid nyid du sbyor ba'i chos la ni// 'khor los sgyur bas skye dgu rnams ni skyong ba ste// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po rnams na
100a4(skyes rabs): 'joms pa la// 'jig rten ched du chos kyang thub pa khyod kyis gsungs// gang gi rdzu 'phrul 'di dang rnam rgyas blo gros dang // 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' dag nges par log pa ni// dpal dang bral yang 'jig rten na khyod dbang
100a5(skyes rabs): phyug ste// dpal ni 'phel yang dbang med sred bcas ma yin no// brtse ba'i chos kyi bstan pa'i 'os gyur pa// shAkya'i rgyal po mang por skad smras rbas ni// rgyal po nyid dang las nyid du ni gnas nas/ sras la de nyid khong du chud phyir phyag byaso// thub pa'i mthu ni lhag
100a6(skyes rabs): bar thob pa mthong nas dang // de nyid rab tu 'bigs pa'i bstan bcos mthong nas dang / bla ma rgyal pos sbyar ba'i mchod pa mthong nas ni// du ma rnams kyis rab tu 'byung phyir re 'dod byas// de nas gzhon nu mang po 'bras bu la gnas
100b1(skyes rabs): rnams// chos kyi cho ga de nyid rab tu thob gyur te// sngags dang 'dod pa chen po rnams la bltos med nas// byams pa'i gnyen 'dun du ba rnams ni spangs naso// kun dga' mdzes dga' kra mi la dang ma 'gags pa// dga' bo
100b2(skyes rabs): nye dga' dug dang de nas 'khyil ba 'dzin// slob ma'i lkog tu ston pa yis ni lhas byin te// thub pas rjesu bslabs pa de rnams byung bar gyur// de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu ni bdag nyid che// 'char kas lam de nyid la rab tu
100b3(skyes rabs): song ba ste// de yis nges pa rab tu mthong nas de bzhin du// nye bar 'khor dang rgyun shes bu yis blo byas so// rgyal po yis kyang sras kyi mthu ni mthong nas dang // mchog gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu thob byas nas// chags pa med par rgyal
100b4(skyes rabs): srid spun zla la byin zhing // rgyal po'i drang srong spyod pas khyim rnams la bsnyen to// de skad ces po la sogaso legs pa'i gnyen rnams dang // 'khor dang gnyen rnams rjesu brtul nas sangs rgyas ni// mchi ma dang bcas grong khyer pa yi
100b5(skyes rabs): mngon dga' ba// rang gnas grong khyer la ni dus su rab zhugs pa// dron kun grub pa zhes pa rgyal po'i sras po ni// don mdzad grub pa grong khyer du ni rab zhugs pa// zhes ni don thos khang pa rnamasu mi mo rnams// sgo rnams dang ni skar khung
100b6(skyes rabs): rnams la mnyam par brten// mtshams kyi sprin gyis phyed bkag 'od zer ldan pa bzhin// ngur smrig bsnams shing mdzes pa de ni rab mthong nas// bud med de rnams mig nas mchi ma phyung ba ste// pad+ma dang mtshungs thal mo rnams kyis
101a1(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi dag gzugs kyi gsal bar gyur pa ni// 'og tu zhal gzigs gshegs pa de ni mthong gyur nas// brtse ba dang ni gus pa rnam par ston pa ste// mchi mas rnyogs pa'i mig can rab
101a2(skyes rabs): myos ma rnams zlos// legs skyes dbu ni bzhar bar rnam par mdzad nas dang // na bza' rnying pa yongs su gsol nas dang // sku las gser gyi kha dog rab tu g.yogs nas dang // des ni spyan mig rab tu bkod nas gshegs//
101a3(skyes rabs): gang zhig gdung ba skyob pa'i gdugs dkar bsnyen phyir dang // sras po rnam par dul ba blta ba'i phyir 'ong zhing // kun nas gnas phyir 'os shing rgyal ba'i phyir 'os pa// des ni lhung bzod yang dag yongasu bzung nas gshegs//
101a4(skyes rabs): 'gram par ta ma la yi lo ma rnam bkod pa'i// mdzes ma'i gdong dang gdung pa skyob pa'i gdugs dkar ni// gang gis bsnyen par 'os zhing mgyogs 'gro 'os pa ste// des ni lhung bzed yongasu bzung nas rkang pas gshegs//
101a5(skyes rabs): sa skyong bdag skyes rnams kyi dgra rnams zad pa dang // dga' ba rnams kyi chags dang 'gro ba'i rjes chags par// blta bar 'os shing sna tshogs dbu rgyan bsnams pa gang // des ni sa yi gnya' shing gang tsam gzigs shing ga/
101a6(skyes rabs): 'di yi lta ba ci zhig mtshan nyid de ni ci// don gnyer ci zhig rol pas dgra bor gyur pa ci// gang 'di brtul zhugs dang lhan cig rol pa ste// bu byis rnams dang mo btsun 'dzangs ma rnams dang min// rgyal po'i mna' ma nges par
101b1(skyes rabs): mya ngan 'dzin ma'o// grags 'dzin ma de shin tu dka' thub byed pa ste// gang gis rdo bo'i rab tu spyod pa 'di thos shing // thos nas kyang ni gnas shing nyams par 'gro ba med // 'di yi gzugs ni nges par rjesu mthun pa dang //
101b2(skyes rabs): kha dog dran+da pa'i gzugs 'di snang ba mthong nus kyang // sras 'dod mi dbang rgyal po ji lta bur gyur cing // 'tshe ba'i dgra bo la yang ji lta bur byed dam// mchi mas gang ba'i sras po sgra gcan 'dzin mthong nas// gal te de lta
101b3(skyes rabs): nyid du 'di ni chags ma yin// byims pa'i gnyen rnams kyang gzhan du kha bltas pa// 'di 'dra nges pa'i brtul zhugs la ni dge legs shog/ gzi mdangs dang ni lus kyi dbyibs dang 'gros sam ste// bde ba'i rab tu
101b4(skyes rabs): 'jug la nges par tshad ma yin// yon tan de rnams ngag gis 'di ni mdzes pa ste// zhi bas ldan zhing yul rnams kyis ni rnam par bral// sna tshogs ston ni rab mtshungs bsam pa yang dag yongs bzung nas// de skad ces
101b5(skyes rabs): sogs rab myos ma rnams mang po rnam par labs// sangs rgyas ma char sa kyang rang gi grong khyer la gshegs nas// bsod snyoms brnyes shing mya gro d+ha yi mtshan ma'i nagasu gshegs// nyung ngu nyung ngu'i bsod snyoms
101b6(skyes rabs): sbyin pa rnams kyis nor rdzas phra zhing dge ba ma byas skye bo sgrol bar mdzad bzhed pa// spyod pa 'di yis yang dag tshim pa ma yin dge ba sbyong skye bo bsam pa ma thul ba la brten pa mdzad bzhed la// 'jig rten dag na sgyid de
102a1(skyes rabs): ba zhes rgol ba nub par mdzad bzhed de bzhin yongasu bris nyid ston par mdzad bzhed pa// rtag par mnyam pa bsod snyoms phyir ni yab kyi grong khyer la ni skyed med thugs mnga' de bzhin ga
102a2(skyes rabs): pa bzhugs par gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ yab dang sras 'jal ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // nga rgyal nyid kyis skye bo dam pa ma rmod cig/ bshes
102a3(skyes rabs): gnyen 'du shes dka' thub rnams 'joms shig// nyon mongs dbang gis dam pa'i brtul zhugs ma byed cig/ dam pa min pa'i lta ba cung zad ma bsnyen cig/ mtshar lo ma 'gro mi dgo'i lngas la ma gnas shig/
102a4(skyes rabs): rgyags par ma 'gro dga' min ma bzod ma nyan cig/ snyan grags mi bzang brdzun la blo gros ma 'dzin cig/ bstan bcos mthong la lhags par gtor ma ma 'phrog cig/ blo ni mnyam par zhog cing chos ni gyis mdzod cig/
102a5(skyes rabs): dram pa rnams dang sbrel mdzod ri mo khong mdzod cig/ ji ltar phul byung 'di ni thob nas slar yang ni// rgya cher mngon par 'gro ba de ltar gyis mdzod cig/ brtson 'grus brtsams nas dang ni bstan pa yongs bzung nas// /
102a6(skyes rabs): rig pa rnams ni bskyod nas skyon rnams zil mnan nas// 'chi ba yang dag dran nas 'phags pa'i bya ba gyis// che ba'i bdag nyid thob nas zhi lam thob par gyis// gang gi 'bras bu 'di ni zhi ba skyong ba ni// las de nyid
102b1(skyes rabs): ni slar yang byed pa 'os pa ste// yid gzhungs ldan pa 'di dang byed pa byas pa nyid// 'bras bu gang zhig mthong bas sa bon bskrun par byed// 'di na mchog gyur gang zhig sdig pa byed pa ste// snang ba de ni mun pA gan+ta/
102b2(skyes rabs): pa padagi lugs// tshwas nI gtso bo skyes bu gtso bo ma yin pa// mun po snang ba la ni gnas pa bdag gi lugs// khyad 'phags gang zhig chos kyi cho gar 'jug pa ste// dkar po dkar por mchog tu 'gro ba bdag gri lugs
102b3(skyes rabs): dman pa gang zhig sdig pa'i las ni byed pa ste// de yang mun pa mun pa'i mtha' ru 'gro ba lugs// de phyir phung po bzhi po de rnams shes byas nas// rgyal po 'bad pa gyis shig de ltar ji ltar 'dir// de nas bde bar
102b4(skyes rabs): gal te 'gro bar 'dod na ni// phyogs ni gsum bsnyen zhing snga ma ma yin no// gzhan gyi gzhan la dge blo byed pa ma yin zhing // ci ste byed na dri la rjesu 'gro ma yin// byis pa'i nyams pa yod min rang la thob pa ste// ma
102b5(skyes rabs): byas pa yi 'ong ba 'grub pa yod ma yin// ma byas pa yang brgya la byed pa ma yin zhing // ma byas pa ni gzhan du dge ldegs 'gyur ma yin// der ni 'gro ba la yang nor ni yod min te// de phyir dge ba'i lus kyi tsho gar
102b6(skyes rabs): 'bad pa gyis// gang zhig sdig pa lhag par spyod pa legs min zhing // gson pa'i 'jig rten ni de'i bdag la dga' ma yin// bdag gi ched du bdag gi sdig pa byas nas ni// gzhan du 'bras bu bdag nyid kho nas long spyodado// /
103a1(skyes rabs): rgyal po chen po ri bo chen po bzhi rnams ni// 'ongs pa rnams su 'gro ba kun nas srub pa ste// chos kyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsten las ni// ji ltar 'thad pas gzhan na bya ba ci zhig yod//
103a2(skyes rabs): dang rgud pa nad dang de nas 'chi ba ste// bzhi po 'di rnams de bzhin du ni 'ongs pa ste// ri ba po rnams kyi kun nas bskor ba bzhin du ni// 'jig rten mtha' dag dbang med 'khol bar byed pa'o// de nas 'ongs pa rnams su
103a3(skyes rabs): dbang med sdug bsngal te// rten ni yang min mngon du 'thab min+da bsrung ba med// dwer ni byed pa'i ched du nor med chad pa med// chos lus ma gtogs sman gzhan yod min no// de ltar mI rtag gyur pa gson pa'i 'jig
103a4(skyes rabs): rten na// glog ni g.yo pa'i yul la rab tu zhugs pa na// 'chi ba'i lag pa'i rtse la yongasu gnas pa ste// chos ma yin pas 'bras bu longs spyod par 'os min// dbang chen dang mtshungs mi dbang de dang de rnams ni//
103a5(skyes rabs): g.yul du lha yi mngon par 'thab la byin nas kyang // rab tu rgyas pa rnams dang nges par zum pa rnams// dus kyi dus su de dang sdug bsngal skal blo// 'byung po 'dzin pa'i sa yang zad par 'gro ba ste// 'jigs pa'i mes ni/
103a6(skyes rabs): lhun po de bzhin bsreg par byed// rgya mtsho chen po yongasu bskams par 'gro ba ste// lbu ba dang mtshungs mi yi 'jig rten kye ma tsa// shugs byas nas kyang rlung ni zhi bar 'gro ba ste// 'jig rten gdungs nas kyang ni nyi ma nub
103b1(skyes rabs): par 'gro// bsregs nas kyang ni me nyid 'da' bar nyer 'gro ste// gang de ltar gnas par 'gyur ba yin snyam mam// lus po 'di ni yun ring dus su bsrungs kyang ngam// sna tshogs longs spyod rnams kyis nye bar bskyangs kyang ni// /
103b2(skyes rabs): de yis 'dir ni nyin zhag 'ga' zhig bzhugs nas su// skye bo chen po'i rje su brtse ba mdzad nas ni// sde rab 'pham byed kyis ni phyag gis mngon bsrungs pa'i// grong khyer la ni chen po'i tshogs kyi rab tu dpags// me tog rab rgyas
103b3(skyes rabs): mya ngan med pas gsal byas shing // yan lag dmar por gyur cing khu byug skad sgrogs pa// ti si'i gangs ltar mtho ba'i lding khang phreng ba can// dpal ldan rgyal byed tshal ni de nas rab tu thob// des ni gcing ma'i chus grang
103b4(skyes rabs): phreng ba dkar po can// gser gyi bum pa dang bcas bum pa blangs nas ni// de nas dus su rgyal byed tshal ni bzang sbyin gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab tu phul bar gyur// de nas shAkya thub pa lta 'dod rgyal po ni// sde rab
103b5(skyes rabs): 'pham byed rgyal byed tshul du song ba ste// sdong nas de nas bkur sti byas te thub pa la// rab tu btud cing gdan byos tshig 'di gsol pa'o// thub pa grong khyer 'dir ni khyed kyi gnas bzhed pa// nges par dang nr-i ko sa la rnams
103b6(skyes rabs): kyi dge ba'o// de nyid gzigs pa 'di 'dra brten pa med pa ni// nye bar 'tsho byas yul ni skal ba med pa'am// khyed mthong ba 'am yang na mngon par phyag 'tshal ba// yang dag thob po bdag cag rnams kyi rjes bzung phyir// /
104a1(skyes rabs): dam pa rnams kyi 'dus pa thob nas 'jig rten na// tshim pa med kyang ji ltar tshim pa nyid yin no// gang gi rten can rlung ni rab tu g.yos pa ste// de yi bdag nyid las ni nye ba lngas 'gro ste// mkha' 'gro'i
104a2(skyes rabs): bya rnams lhun po'i 'dus pa nyer thob nas// rang bzhin rnam par spangs nas gser du 'gyur ba'o// de phyir 'di dang che gre mor ni mgon gyur cing // skye bo legs pa'i rten las gzhan min bdag gi nags// gA d+hi'i sras po
104a3(skyes rabs): thob pa chen po rab thob nas// phur bu gsum pa'i khyim ltar lta na mdzes par gyur// 'jig rten dag na rnyed pa rab brnyed sna tshogs pa// tshad dang ldan pa dag ni mdzad pa can yin la// khyed kyi nye ba las ni don gang yin pa
104a4(skyes rabs): rnams// de dag rnam sde grangs myed nyams pa yod ma yin// legs pa khyed kyi nges pa'i lta ba'i lta ba las// 'di las gzhan du rnyed pa shes pa ma yin zhing // khyab ba dgra bdag ni gnod pa rnyed la sdug bsngal ba// chags
104a5(skyes rabs): pa dang ldan rgyal po'i chos la spyod par gyur// de ltar dbang po dang mtshungs rgyal po dro yis ni// rnam pa de ltar mngon du gyur te gsan nas ni// don dang 'dod pa dag gi chags pa mkhyen nas su// de yi bsam pa yang
104a6(skyes rabs): ngag bskul po thub pas gsungs// mi dbang khyod kyi tshig 'di ngo mtshar che ma yin// khyod kyi spyod pa 'di ni legs pa rnams la min// logs nas 'phos pa 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams kyis ni// phan pa 'dod pa'i dam pa'i skyes bu
104b1(skyes rabs): rnams la ni// gang phyir sa sbyong khyed kyi dgongs pa de nyid ni// des nu khyod la 'dir ni cung zad smra 'dod te// de ni shes par gyis shig bdag gi lta ba ni// 'bras bcas ji ltar gyur pa khyed kyi de ltar gyis// mi skyong rgyal po'i dus kyis
104b2(skyes rabs): bcings nas bkug pa na// mdzo' bau shos ma yin gnyen min phun tshogs rjes 'gro min// thams cad kyis ni dman zhing dbang med 'gro ba ni// grib ma bzhin du las cig rjes su 'gro ba nyid// de phyir mtho ris dang ni grags pa dam pa ni//
104b3(skyes rabs): mngon par 'dod bzhin chos kyi rgyal srid rjesu skyongs// rmongs pa las ni chos la 'khrul pa'i rgyal po yi// rgyal srid de nyid mtho ris na yang ma yin no// 'dir ni rgyal srid yang dag yongasu bskyangs nas ni// chos las rin min d+ha ring
104b4(skyes rabs): mtho ris rab thob nas// 'dir ni rmongs las mi yi bdag po ni kum b+ha// chos las 'phos shing kA shi rnamasu sa la zhugs// 'phags pa yi dang sdig pa yi ni las kyi ni// khyod la dper bstani zhi ba bdag gis de smras te// rang gis skye
104b5(skyes rabs): dgu rnams ni rtag tu legs bsrung zhing // dpyad nas de phyir brtan pa dge la 'bad ba gyis// ji ltar srog chags rnams ni gtse bar ma byed cig/ rtag par dbang po rnams ni rol par ma byed cig/ 'phags min gyis bsnyen khro ba 'dzin par ma
104b6(skyes rabs): byed cig/ mchog min bya bar sems ni g.yo bar mi byed cig/ nga rgyal dang ni rgyags pa khur nas dus su ni// rab tu mthor zhing shing du gyur pa nyid log gyur// rnam pa de ltar 'jig rten 'gro ba shes nas su// de la ma nyal dge ba la
105a1(skyes rabs): ni gnyid mA log/ 'khor ba'i phyogs ni g.yo bar 'dzegs nas su// nges par lhung na sa gzhi brag med 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig bde lnga 'drel min+ma de ni bsten bya min// gang gis 'bras bu legs min gang
105a2(skyes rabs): de bya ba min// gang zhig dge la sbyor min de ni bshes mau yin// sdug bsal rnam par 'joms min ga nga de ye shes min// glal te ye shes min na yang srid ma yin zhing // srid par gyur na lus med nyid la yin pa ste// lus su
105a3(skyes rabs): gyur na yul las thar pa ma yin zhing // nyi tshe ma yin 'dod pa'i snying po don med // gang phyir lha na gnas rnams dus kyi dbang gis ni// gzugs med rnams kyang mdzad pa can phyir mi rtag ste// de bzhin 'jug pa min la blo gros
105a4(skyes rabs): zhugs bya zhing // gal te 'jug pa med na sdug bsngal yod ma yin// gang phyir lus ni 'gro dang gnas pa la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rten gyi sdug bsngal dag gi rtsa ba ste// de phyir lus meng dus ni ye shes nus pa gang // de yod
105a5(skyes rabs): lus kyi bu lon yod pa ma yin no// gang las 'gro bas 'dod pa'i ched du bskyed pa yis// sdug bsngal chen po du ma rnams la nye ra 'gro ste// 'di las 'dod pa'i sred pas rnam par dben nus shing // sdug bsngal chags med nyam thag
105a6(skyes rabs): yod ma yin// de phyir gzugs dang bral ba'i lha rnams na yang ngam// 'dod pa rnams dang ldan pa'i gzugs ldan rnams na yang // skor ba nyid phyir 'jug pa zhi ba ma yin na// 'dod par spyod pa drug po rnamasu sngon nyid do// rnam pa de
105b1(skyes rabs): ltar mi rtag sdug bsngal de med cing // rtag par 'bar ba'i 'jig rten gsum po nyid mthong nas// bya tshang shing la sgong skyes rnams kyi gdung ba ltar// gang du 'jug la smon lam rigs pa ma yin no// mchog de rig par bya
105b2(skyes rabs): zhing gzhan ni reg bya min// mchog de blo gros yin zhing gzhan ni blo gros min// mchog de bya ba yin zhing gzhan ni grub pa min// chos 'di khyim dang ldan pa'i skye bo rnams kyis te// yod pa min zhes de ltar nges par rig bya min
105b3(skyes rabs): gas sam khyim na gnas pa dag gi zhi ba ni// gang gis sgrub pa yod pa de yi yod pa'o// tshod pas mngon par gdungs pa chu la rnam zhugs te// sprin las thams cad tshim pa nye bar 'gro ba nyid// sgron ma dang ldan mun pa ru ni
105b4(skyes rabs): mthong ba ste// rnal 'byor tshad ma'o na tshod ma yin rigs mA yin// kha cig nags na gnas kyang na tshod la mi sbyor// brtul ru zad cing ngan 'gro la ni bsnyen pa nyid// kha cig khyim na gnas kyang rnam dag las can+da no// bag dang
105b5(skyes rabs): ldan pa des legs la ni bsnyen pa'o// mun pa'i rgya mtsho la ni lta ngan dba' rlabs can// sred pa'i chu la srog chags rnam par 'phyo rnamasu// shes rab gru bo dran dang brtson 'grus skya ba ni// gang gis yod pa de ni de la sgrol ba
105b6(skyes rabs): yod// de ltar yul la mchog tu song ba'i rgyal po de yis ni// thams cad mkhyen las chos kyi de nyid 'di ni nyer thob nas// rgyal srid ngan pa mi rtag g.yo zhes nyer skyes blo can no// myos pa dang bral gnyis 'thung bzhin du
106a1(skyes rabs): mnyan yod nyid du zhugs// sa dbang btud pa de ni shes nas mu stegs can gzhan rnams// der ni stobs bcu pa la rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gran btsug gyur// sa skyong las ni rnam par gsol las de
106a2(skyes rabs): nas bdag pham pa'i// drang srong gis ni rdzu 'phrul ched du sdug pas gnas pa byas// de nas gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas dkyil 'khor can// skar ma rnams ni 'bar bar gyur pa'i nyi ma shar ba bzhin// yang dag dga'
106a3(skyes rabs): ma pa sna tshogs blo can ston pa rnams// der ni thub pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang pos phram pa mdzad// de nas mnyan yod kyispyi de las skyes pa'i grags pa dang // bkur sI nges pa mchog gi dpal gyis yong su spangs par gyur//
106a4(skyes rabs): de nyid kyis ni srid pa gsum las gyen du 'dzegs pa ste// de phyir chos dag bsrung bar bzhed cing yum la phan phyir ro// de nas thub pa mtho ris gnas pa'i yum ni ye shes kyis// rnam par brtul nas mtho ris gshegs pa la
106a5(skyes rabs): ni rnam phul des// mkha' la lha yi rgyal po'i bsod snyoms tsho gra bzhin bzhes nas// lha yi 'jig rten dag nas swaM ka sar ni yang dag babs// de la gzhal med gnam sa'i lcogs la babs pa yi// zhi ba thob cing ltos pa dang
106a6(skyes rabs): bcas lha rnams rje su 'ongs// sar gnas na mkha'i logs la gyen du gdong phyogs rgyal po ni// de dang de rnams mgo bo rnams kyis btud cing rab tu bzung // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/
106b1(skyes rabs): rgyal byed kyi tshul rab tu bzhes pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// / thar 'dod lha na gnas rnams dang // skyed ma mtho ris su btul nas// thub pas gdul bya rnams 'dul zhing // de nas de ni 'jig rten rgyus// ri lnga'i
106b2(skyes rabs): dbus kyi grong khyer du// 'od ldan 'tsho byed dbang po dang // gro bzhin skyes dang yan lag sbyin// rnam par 'dren pas de nas btul// rgyal po'i bu ni 'jigs med dang // dpal sngas dang nI nye bar 'khor// n+ya gro d+ha sogs mthar ldan
106b3(skyes rabs): rnams// snga ma'i lta ba las bzlog go// chos kyi thos pa nyid las ni// mi skyong dpal ni spangs pa can// spos 'dzin gyis ni dbang phyug 'dir// pad+ma zhes bya rnam par btul// de nas gnod sbyin gangs ldan dang // rtse mo rgyas pa de nas ni//
106b4(skyes rabs): rnam rgyas pha rol gnon pa yis// rnam rgyas ri bor btul ba'o// yon+da tani gzigs pas mi skyong ni// lha byed btsun mo'i 'khor bcas la// 'tsho byed oM mu'i nags tshal du// mtshan mo dad par sbyar bar mdzad// de nas pha rol 'gro
106b5(skyes rabs): ba can// bram ze zhi bar 'gro rnams des// rdo ba'i ri blor phra mo yi// tshigs bcad don rnams klog tu bcug/ de nas dam pa dran mdzad pas// dngos su nor sbyin mthong ba mo// dga' ba'i skyed ma legs ldan ma// 'od ma'i tsher ma can
106b6(skyes rabs): du btul// de nas brtan ldan grong khyer du// rtsegs sbyin gnyis skyes dam pa ni// mchod sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mchod 'dod thar pa'i chos la btsud// de nas lus 'phags ri bo ru// bcu phyed rtse mo nyid dang ni// lha min skyes ma dang lha
107a1(skyes rabs): rnams// nges par 'dzin du btsud par gyur// de nus ang+ga'i grong khyer du// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang // mchog dang dbyug pa dkar dmar dang // gtum po lto 'phye che rnams btul// a pa NA yi
107a2(skyes rabs): grong khyer du// bram ze ke bya she la dag/ dka' thub thob pa thar par sbyar// 'tshe byed sor mo'i phreng mo tsan+da// bran bzangs dang mtshungs gnyis skyes ni// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs kyis// phra mo rnams su btul bar mdzad//
107a3(skyes rabs): gang ba bzang po dang mtshungs rdzas// lug ces bya ba bzang pos 'tsho// nor sbyin bzang dang bzang po'i bu// bzang por yang dag rtogs par mdzod// de nas tshangs pa'i tshe ldan ming // rnam rgyal tshangs pas tshe ldan pa// rang gi
107a4(skyes rabs): smra bar smra mchog gis// lus 'phags po yi mdun du pham// yangs pa can gyi rdzing bu ru// srin+da bu sha za dang seng ge/ la sogs lits+tsha bi rnams dang // mchog dang bden byed nyid btul to// de nas las bzang pos
107a5(skyes rabs): gnod sbyin// bzang po bzang po'i sems ldan pas// rgyan byed dang mtshungs grong khyer du// chos kyi lam la btsud pa'o// de nas blo dang ldan pa yis// shin tu mi bzang 'brog tu ni// gnod sbyin 'brog gnas zhes bya dang // gzhon
107a6(skyes rabs): nu legs 'ongs la bstan to// de nas gnod sbyin sdig med la// gnod sbyin bdag pos phyag byas pas// bde dga'i grong du thar pa ni// thar pa gzigs pas gdams pa mdzad// thub pa dregs pa yangs rnams dang // gnod
107b1(skyes rabs): sbyin drag po'i las can dang // kha spu ldan pa gnyis lnga ni// ga yar drang srong kyi stan to// de nas drang srong dkar min gyi// tsha bo ka t+yA ya nri na// ba ra tA se'i grong du mngon// / gnyis skyes stobs bcu ldan pas btul// mtsho 'obs
107b2(skyes rabs): bebod par pha rol 'gro'i// grong la rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs nas// dus su tshong pa sna stod la// de nas des ni rje su bstan// rjesu bsten de rab dang bas// drang srong mchog gi gtsug lag khang // rtag par dri ldan mkha' la reg/
107b3(skyes rabs): tsan+da dan+da rang bzhin byed du bcug/ de nus gang du thub pa'i zhabs// rdo las 'khor lo'i mtshan mthong bar// ser sgra dka' thub ldan pa ni// 'od zer ldan pa des btul lo// de nas gnod sbyin glang po la// glang po ldan par bstan
107b4(skyes rabs): pa ni// de bzhin drag po bong bu ni// bcom rlag tu ni btul ba'o// yul 'khor skyong dang rdzas mnyam pa// yul 'khor skyong zhes dran pa ni// grong rdal rags pa'i mdzod ldan du// ston pas de nas rnam par btul// tshangs pa dang 'dra
107b5(skyes rabs): skye bo mchog/ dgra can du ni btul ba ste// mkhas pa rgya chen skyes bu can// nyon mongs dul bar de bzhin no// 'jigs bcas kyi deng mtshams bzangs kyi// bu'i bu mos 'jug bu dag dang // mu stegs gzhan rnams kyis mun pa//
107b6(skyes rabs): monyan yod nyid du thub pas bcom// 'dir ni bram ze mchog skyon can// dge sogs rnams dang rigs gtsang dang // ko sa la yi dbang phyug ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dad pas sbyar// de nas bram ze su ka sA ri la// she ta bi ke'i
108a1(skyes rabs): 'brog zhi bar// bstan pa mchog gis bstan pa'o// de nas thob pa'i grong khyer du// grong khyer gtso dang dus byed dang // 'jigs pa'i las can chu srin klu// rab tu ma zhi zhi bar mdzad// de nas
108a2(skyes rabs): b+ha ra gas rnams su nges// gnod sbyin 'jigs byed btul mdzad cing // rigs med kyi ni bla ma gnyis// rgan po dri bzhin rjes su bzung // nor ldan gyi mchog dbyangs ldan dang // bud med sgyur mchog sogs
108a3(skyes rabs): rnams dang // skyes chen de rnams dri rnams ni// kau shrIM bI ra nI rjes su bzung // de nas spos 'dzin yul nyid dang // klu chen sogs ma med pa ni// dul ba'i bdag nyid dul ba la// nang gi pha rol son pa gshegs// /
108a4(skyes rabs): 'bar zhing 'jigs pa'i las can ni// mthar byed bzhin du srog 'dod pa// rnam par btul nas mkhas pa des// dus su de nas gdams ngag bstan// de la sogs pa'i 'byung po rnams// sa pa rnams dang mkha'
108a5(skyes rabs): 'gro rnams// brtul nas tshigasu rgya mtsho bzhin// sangs rgyas grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur// che ba'i bdag nyid de mthong nas// lhas byin rlom sems byas pa ste// bsam gtan rnams las 'khrul thob cing //
108a6(skyes rabs): 'dra ba min pa mang po byas// nye bar bcom pa'i sems ldan des// thub pa dge 'dun dben byas shing // phye las 'dod pa ma byas te// de la gnod pa'i phyir brtsam so// de nas bya rgod phung po'i rir// rdo ba'i 'khrul 'khor/
108b1(skyes rabs): byas pa ste// thub pa'i steng du gang 'phangs pa// ltung ba ma yin gnyis su gyur// 'jig rten dus su chu 'dzin sngon po sgra sgrogs pa// zla ba 'gogs pa la ni ma khA la rlung bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni
108b2(skyes rabs): mngon du gdong phyogs par// glang po'i rgyal po'i lam la gtad pa'o// lus kyis bsnun pas yan lag mchog ni nyer blangs shing // mchi bas phug pas sgyu ma'i dra ba rab bkram pa'i// lus po rnams kyis rgyal po'i
108b3(skyes rabs): khab kyi lam rnams ni// rgyu bar dka' bar byed la mngon par rab tu zhugs// shi ni 'dod pas mi yi baR+Ya la dmugs pa ste// mche ba'i rtse mo reg cing g.yo ba'i rgyu ma'i phreng // khrag gis gsher ba'i mgo bo sna
108b4(skyes rabs): ljags drag po yis// 'phen pa'i don du rdo rnams bzhin du gyen du 'phen// gsum du rab dga'i chang gis mthor ma'i dri ldan zhing // rul pa'i khrag dang zhag gi dri yis bsgos rnams kyis// de tshe bskor zhing mtha'i
108b5(skyes rabs): med khro ba dang ldan pa// grong khyer skye bo de la skyo bas 'jigs par byed// gnyis mthung myos pa dus kyi dbyug pa 'jigs 'dra ba// khyeng sA las gdong ni bcos shing sgra skad 'thon pa ste// khros pas rnam par log pa'i
108b6(skyes rabs): mig can de mthong nas// ha ha zhes po rgyal po'i khab nas byung bar gyur// kha cig yid mi bde bas phyogasu bros pa ste// gzhan ni mthong ba min pa'i yul rnams la thim zhing // de bzhin 'jigs pa las gzhan 'jigs
109a1(skyes rabs): pa ma bzung nas// gzhan rnams gzhan rnams ngag gi khyim rnams la zhugaso// kha cig rna bar 'dug pa'i seng ge'i sgra rnams ni// rang gi srog la the tshom yang dag ma bsams shing // sangs rgyas
109a2(skyes rabs): la ni mngon par 'tshe ba ma byed ces// rab tu bzung nas gnyis 'thung de la rgyab nas 'bod// de bzhin gzhan rnams glang po skyong la 'bod pa ste// gzhan rnams 'di la thal mo dag gis phyag 'tshalo// de nas de la gzhan
109a3(skyes rabs): rnams de la bsdigs par byed pa ste// kha cig nor gyi sred cing 'dod par byed pa'o// rlung 'gros skar khung dag nas rnam par lci bzhin du// lang tsho ma rnams lag pa g.yo zhing du ba ste// 'jigs ma gzhan rnams gser gyi
109a4(skyes rabs): gdu bu dag dang ldan pa yis// zangs mdog lag pa rnams kyis mig rnams 'gebs pa'o// yongs su ro myong glang pos 'joms par 'dod pa na// gyen du lag bteg skye bo du bar gyur na yang // gshegs pa med cing gnod
109a5(skyes rabs): pa mi mnga' bar// bde bar gshegs pa rang gnas rnam 'gyur med par gshegs// byams pas 'byung po rnams la rjesu brtse ba ni// gus pas lha rnams kyis ni rjesu 'gro ba ste// de la dbang po ches kyang reg pa ru// nus
109a6(skyes rabs): pa ma yin gang phyir thub pa brtan par gshegs// gang zhig sangs rgyas la ni rjes 'gro dge slong ste// des ni rgyang nas glang chen mthong nas bros pa ste// sna tshogs bdag nyid 'jig rten rang nyid kyis bzhin du// kun dga'
109b1(skyes rabs): bopo gcig sangs rgyas la ni rje su song // de nas glang chen khros pa de ni nyer 'ongs nas// thub pa'i mthu las 'du shes nye bar thob pa ste// mig sman ri bo rdo rjes phye mar bcom pa bzhin// lus po rab tu zags shing spyi bos
109b2(skyes rabs): 'gyel bar gyur// de la shin tu mdzes shing 'jam skyes 'jam po yis// leg skye sor mo'i dra ba'i phyag gi mgo bo la// zla ba chu 'dzin la ni 'od zer gyis bzhin du// gnyis 'thung dbang po la ni thub pas reg par gyur// chu
109b3(skyes rabs): yi shin tu khur las dus kyi sprin bzhin du// zhabs kyi rtsa bar gnyis 'thung de ni bsdad pa ste// thub pas rna ba'i tA la g.yo med la gzigs shing // de la sems can+da la 'os zhi bas bstan pa'o// sdig med dang bcas rnam par
109b4(skyes rabs): 'joms pa sdug bsngal te// sdig med nyid la glang chen gnod pa ma byed cig/ srid pa srid par sdig med bcom pa'i srog chags kyis// bde 'gro brgyad la glang chen 'gyur pa ma yin no// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang de
109b5(skyes rabs): bzhin gti mug ste// glang chen gsum po bzod par dka' ba'i chang yin la// chang gsum rnams dang thub pa rnams ni bral ba ste// rims nad med cing mya ngan 'das pa mngon par brnyes// de phyir mun par 'dod pa 'di ni spong
109b6(skyes rabs): 'dod pa// chang ni spong la rang bzhin 'du shes thob par gyis// 'kho bI rgya mtsho'i 'dam ni rgyas par chags pa ste// slar yang de ltar gnyis 'thung dbang po ma ltung zhig/ de nas glang po des ni gsung 'di thos nas su// chang ni spangs
110a1(skyes rabs): shing yang dag rig par spyod pa ste// bdud rtsi 'thungs nas nang rnams dag las grol ba bzhin// nang du song ba'i bde ba dam bya tho par gyur// slob ma bzhin du rtsub la rab btud de ma thag/ chang ni yod
110a2(skyes rabs): spangs glang po'i dbang po de mthong nas// kha cig gos rnams bskor zhing g.yug par gyur pa des// gzhan rnams lag pa rnams ni rde bas shing de 'don to// gzhan rnams kyis ni thub pa phyag 'tshal zhing // de nas de la gzhun
110a3(skyes rabs): rnams bskor ba byas pa ste// gzhan rnams 'phags pa nyid las glang chen la bstod cing // ya mtshan dang bcas gzhan rnams reg pa'o// lding khang la gnas bud med gzhan rnams de la ni// gtsang zhing rin thang chen po'i rga
110a4(skyes rabs): rnams kyis mchod cing // gzhan rnams gsar ba'i phreng ba yon tan yid 'ong dang // rgyun ni de dang de drug rnams kyis mngon par 'thor// dus dang mtshungs pa'i glang po dul bar gnas pa na// skye blo dad pa med pa dbus nas
110a5(skyes rabs): song ba ste// dbus nas khyad par las ni dang bar rab song zhing // dad pa rnams kyang ga de brtan par nye bar song // dad pa la gnas mya skyes dgra ni thub pa yi// glang chen dbang po de ni btul ba mthong nas ni// ya mtshan gyur cing
110a6(skyes rabs): de nas dga' ba skyes pa ste// sangs rgyas la ni mchog tu dad pa byas pa'o// nyon mongs rtsod ldan dus ni 'ongs nas slar yang chos don bzhin// de ltar rdzu 'phrul dang ldan snyan grags mchog rnams kyis// rab tu gnas pa'i
110b1(skyes rabs): dka' ldan thub pa mchog 'phel to// mi dge ba dang yongasu ldan pa'i lhas byin ni// nyon mongs sdig pa'i las ni mang po byas nas ni// mi skyong ste na rku ba gnyis skyes drang srong gi/ dmod pa las bzhin pa yi 'og tu bying bar
110b2(skyes rabs): gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen pa las/ las kyi rgyun gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten rjes bzung nas// dus kyi smra bu rnams kyi mchog/ chos kyi swa ni
110b3(skyes rabs): khyab mdzad nas// mya ngan 'da' ba dang mtshungs dgongs// de nas dus su rgyal khob nas// pa TA li yi grong du gshegs// mchod rten pA Ta la mtshon pa// der ni 'phags pa de bzhugaso// dus ni de che grong khyer gyi// lits+tsha wi nI
110b4(skyes rabs): zhi ba'i phyir// ma gau d+ha yi rgyal po yi// blon po char dbyibs kyis byas skyo// lha rnams kyis der rang gi nor// nye bar len pa rab gzigs nas// grong de 'gro na phul byung du// de bzhin gshegs rnam par gsungs// de tshe char pa'i
110b5(skyes rabs): rnam pa yi// bkur byas byed pa rnams kyi mchog/ rgya mtsho'i chung ma go tso mo la// mngon phyogs slob ma dang bcas gshegs// gang+gA'i 'gram du de gshegs nas// ji ltar rnyed gru de dang des// skye bo rnams ni sgrol ba gzigs//
110b6(skyes rabs): de rnams gzigs nas thugs mdzad do// 'bad pas chu bo sgrol ba la// bdag gi de ltar 'dra ma yin// de phyir rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni// bdag gi gru med rab tu 'gro// de ltar der ni slob mar bcas// lha yi
111a1(skyes rabs): rnams la mi snang zhing // rlung gi 'gros kyang phan mdzad nas// skad cig gis ni pha rol 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtsho yis pha rol sngon// ye shes gru bos de mkhyen nas// slar yang gru 'di ma dmi
111a2(skyes rabs): nas// thub pas gang+gA bsgral ba'o// bcom ldan nyi ma mdzes pa ni// gang gi sgo las nges 'byung ba// de ni de tshe gau tam sbyor// de la mchod don nyid du byas// 'gram gang dag las rnam 'dren po// gang+gA'i pha rol tu gshegs pa// de ni
111a3(skyes rabs): stegs su 'gro la grags// de yi rigs kyi mngon par brjod// de nas sgrol 'dod mi rnams dang // rgal ba rnams dang sgrol ba rnams// ya mtshan rnams rgyas gdong rnams kyi// mig rnams de la ltung bar gyur// de nas gang+gA'i 'gro
111a4(skyes rabs): nas ni// sangs rgyas ku Di'i grong du gshegs// der ni chos bstan gtam mdzad nas// nA dA'i ka ra ni mngon par gshegs// dus ni de tshe de na ni// skye bo chen po rgud pa ste// gang gi gang du gang 'gro ba// de rnams
111a5(skyes rabs): lnga der thub pas gsungs// der ni mtshan mo gcig phul bas// yangs pa can gyi grong du gshegs// de nas a mA skyong ma'i sa// dpal ldan tshal du dpal sdug gshegs// a mra skyong ma re ma'i gtso// rnam par
111a6(skyes rabs): 'dren pa der thos nas// rnam dal theg pa la gnas nas// mchog tu dga' bas rab tu song // phra ba'i gos dkar 'dzin pa mo// phreng ba med cing byug bral ma// lha yi bya ba'i dus su ni// logs par rigs kyi mna' ma
111b1(skyes rabs): 'dra// rang gi gzugs kyis khengs pa yi// dam pa lits+tsha wi rnams kyi// sems rnams dang ni nor rnams dang // yon tan mtha' dag rnams kyi phrogs// dpal dang mdzes pa brtan pa yis// nags kyis lha mo'i gzugs 'dra ba//
111b2(skyes rabs): ni theg pa la babs nas// skyen par nags der rag tu zhugs// rigs kyi mo btsun gdung ba mo// mig rab g.yo ba de gzigs nas// bde bar gshegs pas rnga dbyangs kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// stobs
111b3(skyes rabs): chung rnams kyis yid kyi rim+bo// a mra skyong ma 'di sngon 'ongs// dran ldan bdud rtsi'i sems ldan rnams// ye shes kyis ni khyed rnams gnas// nye sar sbrul ni mchog yin zhing // ral gri gdengs pa'i dgra bo mchog/ dran
111b4(skyes rabs): dang ye shes rnam bral ba'i// nye sar bud med rnams ma yin// bsdad pa 'am ni nyal ba 'am// 'gro ba 'am yang na gnas pa 'am// bud med ri mor bris pas kyang // mi rnams kyi ni yid 'phrog go/ 'di rnams zhen bas
111b5(skyes rabs): nyam thag gam// gyen du lag bteg du nA yang // skra bkram rnams kyi bsreg pa ru// nus nu mo btsun rnams sngon nyid// pha rol po 'brel rnam mang po'i// da brog bya yon tan gyis bslus rnams// de yi rung bzhin ma mthong ste// /
111b6(skyes rabs): bud med rnams la byis rnams rmongs// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang // mi dge ba zhes mthong nas ni// lta zhing bsgom pa po rnams kyi// sems ni zil gyis non ma yin// gnas de rnams su legs goms blo// spyod yul
112a1(skyes rabs): du / nasas sa su smra/ na/ smra smra / sa rna/
112a2(skyes rabs): shi // snrub kyi 'du shes na dum s+ho// lcags ma ts+tsha mi yis// TIg la rnyog pa mchog yin ni // g.yo ba'i spyan bung skyed la// rtswa ru sa dran pas me// N+Di rgyags sa
