112a3(skyes rabs): dus byed na// du 'gro'am ni 'og nyi du// dbang stong bcings rgyas 'khrid par byed// de phyir 'jigs pa 'di dbyesmra nus// mtshan me slong sa d+ha mi byA zhing // lus pa lan+d+ha gzugs tsam du// glang gis mthong ba de mthong ngo //
112a4(skyes rabs): pos 'jig rten na yul rnams// 'chi med dbang po rnams nges min/ gang zhig du rnams la tshugs gyur// de ni de rnams las 'ching ngo // ba long gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i phyir// sbyor ba la gcig ji ltar 'gyur// yul dang dbang po
112a5(skyes rabs): de dag ni// rmugs pa pan tshun de ltar min// mig gis gzugs ni 'dzin pa ste// sems kyi rnam par rtogs byar byed// rnas par rtogs las der smra zhing // chags dang rgyags bral nyid myed ngo // rnam par ma brtags
112a6(skyes rabs): dbang po'i don// gal te don med cher gyur na// dbang po'i spyod yul la spyod pa// thams cad don med kyis sbyor to// de phyir ma dor dran pas dang // bag yod mchog tu 'gro bas dang // rang don rje su mthong bas dang // gdung
112b1(skyes rabs): med sems kyis bsgom par bya// de ltar don mthar ma gyur pa'i// dge slong rnams la de rjes bstan// ltos byas a mra skyong ma ni// thal mo sbyar byas nye bar 'ongs// des ni thugs zhi drang srong ma// shing drung gnas pa mthong
112b2(skyes rabs): nas ni// nags kyi yongs su longs spyod kyis// mchog tu rjes su 'dzin pa snyam// de nas bkur sti mang po las// g.yo yang lta byed rabu bkod nas// me tog tsam pa ka rgyas ltar// mgo bos thub pa la phyag 'tshal// kun mkhyen
112b3(skyes rabs): gyis kyang rjes gnas ma// dri nas sa l-i bsdad pa ste// de yis blo la bzod gsung gis// thub pas de la bka' stsal to// bsam pa 'di ni yon tan ldan// rnam dag sems pa nyid bstan to// bud med byis pa bul gnas pa// chos la
112b4(skyes rabs): 'dod pa rnyed pa dka'// gal te chos kyi bdag nyid gyur// zhen pas bcom pa'i sems ldan pa'i// na ra ba mi mo rnams kyi dang // blo lhun mi rnams kyi mtshar ci// rang bzhin gyis ni blo chung zhing // g.yo ba'i sems ldan lang tsho ma// yul gaN+DIg
112b5(skyes rabs): ro yis 'jig rten na// chos shes shes pa ya mtshan no// khyod kyi chos la yid gyur pa// de ni khyod kyi bdag nyid don// mi rtag gson pa'i 'jig rten na// chos las gzhan na nor yod min// nad kyi nad med 'joms pa ste// rga bas lang tsho
112b6(skyes rabs): gcod pa nyid// 'chi bas srog ni len pa ste// chos kyis rgud pa yod ma yin// gang phyir dga' ba rnams dang bral// mi dga' ba rnams dang sbyor zhing // mngon par 'dod pa thob pa na// de phyir chos ni mchog tu 'gro// gzhan dbang sdug bsngal
113a1(skyes rabs): chen po ste// rang dbang mchog tu bde ba nyid// ma nu'i rigasu skyes na yang // bud med thams cad gzhan dbang ngo // gang phyir gzhan dbang nyid phyir dang // de bzhin phru gu 'dzin pa'i phyir// bud med rnams kyi
113a2(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal lhag/ de phyir yang dag nges par 'os// de ltar thub pa chen po'i gsung // rang bzhin gyis dang mkhas las dang // brtan las byis kyang byis min bzhin thos shing mngon par dga' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
113a3(skyes rabs): po'i chos kyi smra ba yi// 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi sems la brabs pa ni// bud med nyid ni smad cing yul las log pa ste// rang gi skye bo'i rten la brtsog par byas pa'o// de nas me tog khur las tsu ta'i mchod sdong bzhin// yang
113a4(skyes rabs): dag kun nas dud pa'i lus kyi mchod sdong can// thub pa chen po la ni gus pas mig zhugs shing // yang yang chos ni rnam par dag pa'i lta bas gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni ngo tsha dang ldan bud med de// chos ni mngon par 'dod pa
113a5(skyes rabs): yang yang bskul ba ni// 'dam skyes mdzod dang 'dra bas thal mo sbyar nas ni// ngal bus smra ba'i skad kyis gdangs kyi gsol ba'o// bcom ldan don mdzad bdag la rje su gsung don du// nang par bsod snyoms dus su dge slong
113a6(skyes rabs): sder bcas pa// sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i mdzad po 'jig rten no// 'bras bur gyur pa'i bdag la 'bras bur mdzad du gsol// de nas de yi gus pa de ltar gzigs nas dang // sems can rnams ni bza' ba'i dbang nyid mkhyen
113b1(skyes rabs): nas ni// gsung ma phye nas bde bar gshegs pas de ltar zhes// de la nges pa rnam 'gyur brda yis mdzad pa'o// skad cig mdzad pa dang ldan spyan yang mchog gi chos mnga' zhing // chos kyi snod la des ni dga' zhing mgu la rangs pa ste//
113b2(skyes rabs): gus pas rnyed pa mchog ni rnam par nges shing bstod par gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ a mra skyong ma'i nags gzigs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
113b3(skyes rabs): de nas thub pa'i thugs rigs nas// phyag 'tshal nas kyang grong du song // de ni lits+tsha ba~Ms thos nas// lta 'dod sangs rgyas la song ngo // dkar po'i rta dang shing rta gdugs// phreng ba rgyan dang bgo ba rnams// kha cig kha cig de rnams dang //
113b4(skyes rabs): dmar ser rnams dang de bzhin gzhan// kha cig bai DUr+yA ljang dang // gzhan rnams rma bya'i mjug ma ste// de ltar cha lugs rgya chen po// bdag gi dga' byed rnams dang song // ri bo rnams rgyas ro stod can// gser gyi gnya' shing lag pa
113b5(skyes rabs): rnams// dpal ldan pong ring dngos su ni// de rnams mtho ris bzhin du mdzes// mtshams sprin rkang la sna tshogs rnams// glog ni rab tu snang ba bzhin// shing rta rnams las babs 'dod pas// de rnams gnas pa rnam par mdzes
113b6(skyes rabs): dbu rgyan rnam g.yo rnam btud pa'i// brtan rnams thub la phyag 'tshal nas// nga rgyal ldan rnams rgyags med bzhin// chos la dga' bas de rnams gnas// nyi ma sprin dang bral ba yis// log su khyer 'jigs gzhu bzhin du// thub
114a1(skyes rabs): pa'i drun de rnams kyi// chags bral dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o// sa la seng ge gnas pa rnams// gser gyis spras pa'i steng ge'i gdan// seng ge la sogs de rnams la// mi yi seng ges de nas
114a2(skyes rabs): gsungs// gzugs dang dpal dang stobs la sogs// bkur mdo rnams dang ldan pa ni// khyed kyi chos la gus 'di gang // de las lhag par mdzes pa nyid// tshul khrims la sogs yon tan gyis// ji ltar 'jig rten mdzes de
114a3(skyes rabs): ltar// lus ni sna tshogs gos sam rgyan// phreng ba rnams kyi ma yin no// gang du khyed cag bdag po rnams// / chos shes 'dul ba 'dod pa rnams// spong byed pa rnams rjes bzung zhing // skal ba bcas rnams bdag gi lugs// /
114a4(skyes rabs): 'phags kyi rnyed par dka' dus su// chos la gnas rnams srung byed gyur// phyis 'byung ma yin yul rnams kyi// skal ba dmun pa rnams kyi min// dpal ldan skal ba chen po rnams// chos shes srung bar byed rnams kyi// bsrung ba
114a5(skyes rabs): nyid kyi yul 'di ni// chos kyis kyang ni rje su 'dzin// klung rnams rgal 'dod pa la rnams// khyu mchog rgyal ba rnams kyi bzhin// rgyal po rnams kyis gang bzung ba'i// yul la de nas skye dgu 'gro// khyed cag rnams la tshul khrims
114a6(skyes rabs): rme/ rtag par 'gyur bar thos pa ste// bdag gi don na'i ring rnams kyi// 'dir dang song nas dbyig bya ma no// yid ni tshim zhing bku ri mang dang // rnyeng dang grags dang yod chos nyid// dga'i pa nyid dang song nas 'di// tshul khrim byin
114b1(skyes rabs): 'bras bu che// 'byung po rgyu dang mi rgyu yi// rten ni ji ltar sa yin pa// de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi// rten ni tshul khrims dam pa'o// 'bur 'dod gshog pa med pa dang // rgal 'dod gru med ji lta bar// mi ni tshul khrims rnam
114b2(skyes rabs): spangs par// dge legs 'dod pa de ltar shes// me tog 'bras bus khyab pa'i shing // tsher ma can gyur ji lta bar// thos dang gzugs don phun tshogs pa// tshul khrims 'chal pa de ltar ro// sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan
114b3(skyes rabs): khang bzangs rnams su gnas na yang // tshul khrims dang ldan ske bo gang // de yi drang srong dang monyam 'gros// ngur smab/ shing shun zur phud dang // gtsug bud sgri bo ral pa rnams// tshul khrims nyams pa kun
114b4(skyes rabs): rnams kyi// bcos ma nyid du shes par bya// stegs las dus gsum khrus byas nas/ me la lan gnyis bsregs nas dang // gIdung ba drag por gdungs nas kyang // tshul khrims med na bdag ma yin/ sha Ta ts+tsha la lus byin na// ri ya 'o zhwa ho/
114b5(skyes rabs): nas sam// me 'am tshur ni bdug mchongs na// tshul khrims med na bdug mo yin// 'bras bu rtswa bya chud za zhing // rI dgas bzhin du rtsa za 'am// rlung gi bza' bA 'dod pa yang // tshul khrims med na dag mo 'gyur// myi gang
114b6(skyes rabs): tshul khrims kyis dman pa// de ni bya dang ri dgas tshungs// rdol ba'i snod ni chu yi bzhin// de ni chos kyi snod ma yin// 'jigs pa dang ni gtam ngan dang // yid mi ches dang me dga'i nyid// mngon sum 'dir ni 'thob pa ste//
115a1(skyes rabs): song nas don med za bar 'gyur// de phyir tshul khrims gzhom mi bya// 'brog dgon dag na lam mkhan bzhin// rang dbang dag ni rnyed dka' ba'i// tshul khrims mtho ris dag na gru// skyon rnams kyis
115a2(skyes rabs): bcom sems kyis ni// thams cad bcom nas 'jug pa ste// tshul khrims rab tu gnas byas nas// nyon mongs 'joms la dad pa gyis// de phyir dang por nga snyam pa// brgyan par 'dod pas spang bar bya// bsreg bya za ba'i du
115a3(skyes rabs): ba bzhin// yon tan rnams kyi nga snyoms nyid// skar ma nyi ma zla ba rnams// sprin gyi dra ba chen pos bzhin// nga rgyal gyis bcom yon tan rnams// yod par gyur kyang mdzes ma yin// dregs pa ngo tsha 'joms pa ste// mya ngan gyis
115a4(skyes rabs): gtan dga' bas lus// yon tan rnams kyi rtsa ba nas// 'joms phyir nga'o snyam pa skye// 'gran pa dang ldan nga rgyal las// lha min lha rnams kyis bcom zhing // mi skyong tA la'i byin pa dang // dong gsum pa rnams zad par gyur//
115a5(skyes rabs): gang zhig mi rtag dngos rnams su// mchog nI nga yin snyam pa dang // mi dman pa ni nga zhes snyam// de ni mkhas pa min par rtogs// gzugs ni brtan pa ma yin zhing // 'dzegs pa'i chos can g.yo ba yis// dra zhes grang
115a6(skyes rabs): zhig nga rgyal te// yongs su rtog pa min gzhan ci// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags stobs ldan pa// rab gaM pa lhan skyes dgra po ste// bshes min ngan na spyod pa bzhin// gang gis bshes kyi sgo nas 'joms// 'dod chags me dang me
115b1(skyes rabs): nyid ni// sgeg pa'i bdag nyid kyis mnyam ste// 'dod chags me ni 'bar ba na// mtshan mo de nyid ring bar 'gyur// 'dod chags me'i stobs ji 'dra ba// me yi 'obs ni de 'drar smin// me ni chu rnams kyis shes te// 'dod
115b2(skyes rabs): chags me ni mtshos kyang min// dus su na gsu mes tshig rnams// nags kyi shing rnams skye ba ste// 'dod chags mes tshig blo me rnams// chos la skye ba ma yin no// chags las bde ba tshol ba ste// bde phyir mi dge ba byed cing //
115b3(skyes rabs): mi dge ba las dmyal bar 'gro// chags pa dang mnyam dgra po med// chags las srad pa sred pa skye ba ste// sred las 'dod pa rnams la chags// 'dod pa rnams las sdug bsngal 'thob// chags pa dang mnyam yul medo
115b4(skyes rabs): chags pa zhes bya'i nad chen po// de ni byis pas rtogs ma yin// mi rtag nyid las mi gtsang las// sdug bsngal nyid las bdag med las// gal te mthong na mi chags te// log pa'i blo yis chags pa'o// de phyir dngos po
115b5(skyes rabs): la chags pa// gong du nye bar skye ba ni// dor ni ji ltar 'gyur brtag ste// gyur pa mthong ba zhes brjod do// yon tan yongasu rtog pa na// ji ltar chags par nye bar 'gro// yon tan med na yongs rtog na// de bzhin khro ba 'gugs/
115b6(skyes rabs): par byed// de phyir khro ba spong 'dod pas// zhe sdang yongasu brtag mi bya// dkar min 'gros las du ba bzhin// khro ba las ni zhe sdang 'dzag/ khro ba gzugs ldan rnams kyi rga// mig ldan rnams kyi mun pa yang // chos don 'dod pa/
116a1(skyes rabs): rnams shed// thos bya ma mthung ba da pa ba rgyus sun pa pan+dog/ sUT+Ta h+lA shas gyur ba dag bu mchog/ shA kAr sti snang ba glun dA b+ha ga/ zal gyis gnan pa byud/
116a2(skyes rabs): pa'o// de bzhin tho ba mi bya zhing // byas nas myed ni dor bar bya// de sa smras kyi 'ang byishin ste bzhin// khro ba'i rjes su g+h+ra s+t+wa~M b+h+ya// sbyor ba rje bzhin gang gis// zlo ba brtan pas phrag pas b+ha zla
116a3(skyes rabs): de bdag kha lo sgyur snum ste// TIg shos skye bo thug pa 'adz+rI ma~M// gang zhig khro ba 'dod pa ste// skye ba 'gog par 'dod ma yin// phyis de khro ba med pa na// me la reg pa bzhin du bsreg/ khro ba skyes pas sngon rol du
116a4(skyes rabs): bdag nyid sems smrig ste// rnam par 'phel zhing phyi nas ni// gzhan gyi bsreg nas mi ga gam+ba// nad sogs nye bar 'chi rnams kyis// glang tshe 'jig rten btsir ba ni// lus can pa sa ma yin rnams /
116a5(skyes rabs): gnong sems byasan su yon tan no// de byar 'dzag rten sdug pasngal pa/ shes nas khrob padag pa'i phyi/ byung ba kun sa byams pa dang // rje na bstim par+yAH// de stir nyon mongs lhag pagi /
116a6(skyes rabs): yi de che gzugs pa ste// de lo brtse bas sangs rgyas kyis// de rnams la gsungs smad pa'o// sems can nyams zag rnams lo ni// ji ltar rang bzhin gyis mkhas pa'o// sman pas sman ni gsungs pa ste// nad rnam/
116b1(skyes rabs): nye bar zhi phyir ro// de bzhin chags dang rga sogs kyi// nad kyis 'byung po nyam thag la// thub pas bsam pa mkhyen nas ni// de nyid shes pa'i sman byin to// de ltar thub pa'i gsung la ni// lits+tsha bi rnams mngon dga' ste// /
116b2(skyes rabs): rab 'phyang gtsug gi nor bu can// mgo bo rnams kyis phyag 'tshalo// de nas thal mo rnam sbyar nas// cung zhig dud pa'i lus rnams kyis// phur bu l-i ni lha rnams bzhin// sangs rgyas la ni byon par zhus// dang po a
116b3(skyes rabs): mra skyong ma'i rigs// thub pas de ltar rnams la gsungs shing // dam pa rnams kyi thog mar ni// snyan mnan 'dor bya min par gsungs// de rnams bud med de yis ni// bdag la bslus par shes pa ste// de bzhin gshegs
116b4(skyes rabs): la mchod mang po// nyid 'gyur nyid du byas pa'o// legs brjod drang srong snga ga rnaMs kyis// sbrul rnams kyi nr-i dug bzhin du// kun mkhyen gyis bstan de rnams ni// rab tu zhi ba'i yid rnams song // de yi mtshan mo 'das nas ni// a
116b5(skyes rabs): mra skyong mas bkur byas te// 'o ma ldan po'i grong du ni// dbyar rnams rnam par 'das pa na// yangs pa can nyid du gshegs shing // spre'u rdzing gi 'gram du ni// thub pa chen po bzhugs pa'o// shing gi rtsa bar de bzhugaso// de
116b6(skyes rabs): bzhin du ni 'bar ba la// nags tshal de ni snang byas shing // nye bar 'ongs nas bdud kyis smras// ne rany+dza na'i 'gram du sngon// thub pa khyod la bdag gis smras// bya ba byas pa mya ngan zlos// zhes 'dir khyod kyis lan smraso//
117a1(skyes rabs): nyam thag pa rnams 'jigs med cing // nyon mongs rnamasI don byas par// bdag gis ji srid ma gyur pa// de srid mya ngan mi mnga' zhes// de 'di mang po rnam grol zhing // de bzhin grol bar
117a2(skyes rabs): 'dod rnams dang // grol bar 'gyur ba rnams nyid de// de phyir mya ngan 'da' bar 'os// de nas tshig 'di gsan gyur nas// zla ba gsum na mya ngan 'da'// mi brtan pa ni dor cig ces// dgra bcom rnams kyi mchog gi gsung
117a3(skyes rabs): de nas dam bca' 'di shes nas// yid la re ba gang ba ste// rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba ni// de nyid du ni mi snang gyur// de nas drang srong chen po'i thugs kyi ting 'dzin// rnam pa de ltar rnal 'byor stobs las mdzad pa nyid// sku
117a4(skyes rabs): tshe ji ltar gyur pa sngon du btang ba ste// rdzu 'phrul mthu las mtshungs pa med pa 'tsho bar 'gyur// des ni sku tshe btang ba'i yud tsam de la ni// bud med myos pa bzhin du sa ni g.yos gyur la// me yis tshos pa'i lhun po'i rdo ba
117a5(skyes rabs): ba rim bzhin du// phyogs rnams dag las sgron ma chen po rnams lhung ngo // de bzhin du kun nas dbang po'i rdo rje mi zad rnams// glog dang bcas shing me yis snying po can g.yos shing // bskal pa 'jigs tshe 'jig rten bsreg
117a6(skyes rabs): par 'dod pa bzhin// phyogs rnams thams cad rnamasu me dag 'bar bar gyur// shing rnams kyi ni phung po 'khogs pa rnams bor zhing // ri rnams kyis ni rtse mo rnams ni dor ba ste// rlung gis mngon par gang ba'i rdo ba'i
117b1(skyes rabs): phug bzhin du// mkha' la rnga rnams kyi ma rungs sgra rnams bsgrags// de nas de ltar kun tu bskyod tshe yud tsam la// mi yi 'jig rten na dang lha dang na mkha' lA// ting 'dzin chen po de las rnam par bzhengs mdzad/
117b2(skyes rabs): nas/ ma pa chen pos gsung ni 'di nyid gsungs pa'o// shing rta srog shing rnam par nyams pa dang 'dra ba'i// tshe btang lus po na gi stobs las 'dren bgyi zhing // sgo nga'i skye gnas pa rnams sgo nga phye nas bzhin//
117b3(skyes rabs): srid pa'i 'ching las tshe dang lhan cig 'grol bar bgyi// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ sku tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// /
117b4(skyes rabs): de nas spyod pa de mthong nas// kun dga' bo ni sgra langs shing // ci zhig gyur zhes shugs 'ongs te// 'dar bar gyur tsang dga' ma gyur// kun mkhyen gtan tshig mkhas pa la// des der gtan tshigs dris pa
117b5(skyes rabs): ste// de nas de la thub pas ni// khyu mchog mos pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs// rgyu mtshan gang gis g.yos pa 'di// bdag gi tshe 'di btang ba la// zla ba gsum ni yongs bgrangs par// byin gyis brlabs nas da ni 'tsho//
117b6(skyes rabs): de ltar thos nas kun dga' bo// can dan ljon pa'i thang chu ni// glang po che yi brabs pa bzhin// mchi ma phyung zhing g.yos par gyur// des gnyen nyid phyir bla ma'i phyir// chags bral min phyir sdug bsngal zhing // snying rje rab
118a1(skyes rabs): ni rnam zlog ste// yongasu dga' ba med par dus// mgon gyi nges pa thos gyur nas// bdag gi lus ni ltung ba bzhin// bdag gi phyogs rnams spobs pa med// bdag gi chos rnams thos pa rmongs//
118a2(skyes rabs): gangs kyis btser rnams lam me bzhin// rga ba rnyings pa'i gos rnams su// kyi hud mis bsngags sbyin par ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'da'// nyon mongs 'brog dgon chen po ru// chud zos lus dang ldan rnam ste/
118a3(skyes rabs): la// lam mkhyen shin tu sbyin bA ru// lam mkhan nges par nyams par 'gyur// thag rings la mau la rab zhugs pa'i// sred pa yongs ldan bdag rnams kyi// lam ni rdzing bu bsil ba'i chu// shin tu myur bar skam
118a4(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// blo ni rdzi ma zhi ba bzhin// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gzigs// ye shes rnam spangs 'jig rten gyi// mig ni nges par zum par 'gyur// nges par lo tog skyes rnams su// chu ni dron gnyer nyal rnams
118a5(skyes rabs): la/ char phab gyur nas sbyin pa ru// chu sbyin sbyin ni nub par 'gyur// mi shes mun pas phyogs rnams// sems can lam gol ba la rnams// rab tu gsal ba'i sgron ma ni/ shin tu sbyin par zhi bar 'gyur// de nas de
118a6(skyes rabs): ltar mya ngan gyis// sems gzir kun dga' bo gzigs nas// zhi byed mgon pos de nyid ni// de nyid rigs pa'i mchog gi gsungs// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin shes nas ni// mya ngan mo byed kun dga' bo// 'dus byas ngo bo
118b1(skyes rabs): mi rtag cing // 'gro ba 'di kun mdzad pa nyid// lus can brtsod pa'i skyed tshul du// sdug pa kun dang 'bral ba ste// brtse ba kun nas thong zhig ces// sngon du bdag gis smras pa nyid// 'dus byas g.yo ba skyes pa gang // rten nas
118b2(skyes rabs): 'byung ba dbang med de// baidag gis rtag pAr gyur cig ces// 'di ni rnyed par mi nus// sde sbyong 'byung po rtag gyur na// 'jug pa g.yo ba ma yin zhing // thar pas bya ba su yos 'gyur// de phyir mthar thug gdod do//
118b3(skyes rabs): ci ste khyod dam skye bo gzhan// bdag la khyod kyi sred pa ci// gang phyir ngal ba skyes pa 'dri// khyod kyis bdag dang bral bas byas// lam ni mtha' dag khyed cag la// bdag gis brtan cing bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams
118b4(skyes rabs): la slob dpon gyis// dpe mkhyud med ces bzung mdzod cig/ bdog gis gnas sam nyer zhe na// don ni de tsam nyid yin te// de bzhin gshegs rnams chos kyi sku// lus kyis khyed cag la don ci// de phyir dod dam
118b5(skyes rabs): bdag 'das tshe// skyo ba yis dang bag yod dang // bdag gi sgron mas gsal byas te// chos kyi sgron ma rtag par ro// der zhugs brtson 'grus brtan pa dang // rgyud med bdag gi don la mkhas// blo ni gzhan dbang ma yin
118b6(skyes rabs): pa// bdag gi sgron ma zhes shes bya// rig pa dang ldan mkhas pa ni// rang gis sgron mas mun pa bzhin// shes rab sgron mes 'joms pa ni// chos kyi sgron mar shes par bya// dge legs nye bar thob bya'i phyir//
119a1(skyes rabs): de dag rnams kyi spyod zhi// lus dang tshor ba nyid dang ni// sems dang bdag med pa nyid do// rus lpags khrag dang rgyus pa dang / sha dang spu sogs rnams kyis dkris// mi gtsang lus su mthong bas ni//
119a2(skyes rabs): lus la chags pa ma yin no// de lta de ltar rkyen rnams kyis// 'jug pa'i tshor ba rnams su ni// sdug bsngal zhes de ltar mthong ba'i// ba~M de ba'i shes rab rab tu 'joms// skye ba dang ni gnas pa dang // chos kyi bgod pa nyid
119a3(skyes rabs): dag nI// zhi ba'i sems kyis mthong ba yi// rtag par 'dzin pa ldog pa'o// rkyen rnams las ni skyes pa rnams// phung po rnams ni mthong ba yi// ngar 'dzin gyis ni skyed pa po// bdag tu 'dzin pa 'jug ma yin// sdug bsngal nye bar ni
119a4(skyes rabs): ba'i phyir// bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam 'di ni// lam ni bzhi po de rnam su// de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag/ de ltar rAm ni bdag 'das tshe// gang rnams 'di la gnas 'gyur ba// de rnams 'god med go 'phang mchog/ nges par
119a5(skyes rabs): legs pa 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar kun dga' bo la gtams// de rnams rnam par 'dren pas mdzad// l-i tsa bI rnams kyis thos nas// de la gus phyir skyen par song // thub la brtse dang gus bu'i phyir// gdung bas phrog
119a6(skyes rabs): papa'i sems can rnams// spyod mtha' bkod pa'i don rnams kun// myur las rdzu 'phrul don rnamaso// ston pa la ni smre 'dod pa// de rnams btud nas nye bar gnas// smra bar 'dod rnams ston po yis// mkhyen nas thub pas
119b1(skyes rabs): tshig gsung so// gang 'di bdag la slong ba'i sems// khyed cag rnams kyi de kun shes// de nyid gzhan bzhin mya ngan gyis// de ring khyed kyis spobs par gyur// dpal gyi sde rnams la gnas kyang // khyed cag rnams kyis thad nas//
119b2(skyes rabs): mngon par bzhugs pa 'di yis ni// gsal ba nyid dang chos mkhas nyid// gal te yang shes bdag las kyang // cung zhig thos shing shes pa na// bdag gi zhing pa rab dmigs te// gdung ba ma byed brtan por song // mi rtag
119b3(skyes rabs): 'dus byas dngos po rnams// g.yo zhing yongasu 'gyur pa can// snying po dang bral blo gtad min// cung zhig brtan par gnas pa med// gnas 'jog rgyun shes la sogs dang // gang gzhan thig le gyen rnams dang // dus kyi dbang
119b4(skyes rabs): du song ba ste// srid pa 'di ni ma rung nyid// sa 'dzin nga la nu dang ni// brgya byin dang mtshungs dbyigs nor dang // bskal pa che dang skal med min// 'byung por mnyes gshin 'byung ba'o// 'gro mgyogs de nas 'gro byar 'gro// skal
119b5(skyes rabs): ldan shing rta shing rta bzang // sgra ngan gyis smad sgra ngan rdzogs// rangs byed ri mo rdul ma skyes// mi skyong drang spong bdag nyid che// de rnams dang gzhan mang po rnam// dbang chen dang mtshungs nyams pa ste// mi nyams pa ni yod ma yin//
119b6(skyes rabs): nyi ma gnas las 'phos pa ste// nor lha rnams ni sa la song // dbang po brgya rnams 'das pa ste// rtag pa ci yang yod ma yin// gang gzhan yang dag sangs rgyas rnams// 'gro ba'i snang ba mdzad nas su// mar me snam zad bzhin du ni// /
120a1(skyes rabs): de rnams mya ngan 'das par gyur// gang gzhan bdag nyid chen po rnams// 'byung 'gyur de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang // bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin du// de rnams mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// thar 'dod
120a2(skyes rabs): dka' thub nagasu bzhin// de phyir bdag kyang 'gro bar bgyi// bdag gi don med lus ming ni// 'dren pa la ni rgyu mtshan med// gang du gdul bya 'ga' zhig yod// gang phyir 'di nas 'gro bar blo// nyams dga' yangs pa can la ni//
120a3(skyes rabs): khyed cag blo gzhan ma gyur cig/ de phyir 'jig rten skyabs med cing // dbang med g.yo bar shes nasu// chags bral la ni 'gro bar dang // skyo ba 'thob par 'os pa'o// de ltar gtams bcas nas dus su// ltos med de bzhin
120a4(skyes rabs): gshegs pa ni// snron gyi zla bar snod byed bzhin// lus ngan phyogasu rab tu gshegs// de la mchi mas yongs gang mig/ li tsa bI rnams rjes song zhing // rgyan bcas lag pa rgyas rnams kyis// thal mo sbyar nas rnam par
120a5(skyes rabs): smras// kyi hud 'o rgyal gser mtshungs shing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// ston pa'i sku lus 'bye 'gyur zhing // thugs rje mnga' ba mi rtag nyid// srid cing 'o ma med pa yi// sems ma thob pa'i be'u ni// bkren
120a6(skyes rabs): rnams ye shes 'jo ba'i bas// kye ma shin tu sbyin par 'bor// 'gro na mi ldan mi rnams kyis/ rmongs po'i mun pa btsam mdzad nas// ye shes 'od zer smin pa ru// thub pa nyi ma nub par 'gyur// mi shes rgyun gyi dzin
120b1(skyes rabs): rten na// de las de las khyer ba la// rnams yangs chos kyi zum pa ni// shin tu myur bar 'chag par 'gyur// brtse ldan sman pa chen po ni// ye shes mchog gi sman mnga' bas// sems nad kyis na 'jig rten ni// bor nas
120b2(skyes rabs): nges par gshegs par 'gyur// sems kyis gzer bu'i yo byad dang // shes rab rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// ltad mo la ni snyoms rnams kyis// dbang po'i tog ni 'gyel bar 'gyur// 'gro ba sdug bsngal skal pa can// 'khor ba'i
120b3(skyes rabs): 'ching bas bcings pa la// gal te thar pa'i sgo 'di ni// dus kyis sdom par 'gyur pa'o// de ltar rnam zlog lits+tsha bI// mig rnams 'chi mas rnam 'khrugs pa// rje su 'ongs pa de rnams ni// thub pas slar la bzlog par mdzad// de nas
120b4(skyes rabs): thub pas bcad shes nas// bstan pa rab tu bzung nas su// phyir le ldog phyir nges pa ni// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal gyis byaso// rlung gis bskyod pa'i me tog rnams// kar ni kA ra'i ljon shing bzhin// gser gyi ri ltar dkaR+Sha rnams//
120b5(skyes rabs): thub pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal to// de la sems rnams kyis chags shing // rkang pa rnams kyang 'khyur ba ste// gnyen po'i klung la chu gnyer bzhini// 'gro ba med par de rnams log/ zhe sa yin zhing dga' ma yin// dga' ba yin zhing zhe
120b6(skyes rabs): sa min// thub pa la ni de dag gis// dga' dang zhes g.yo ba med// 'brog mtha' nas 'thon khyu mchog che// khyu mchog chen po rnams kyis bzhin// gnas na gnas nas de rnams kyis// yang yang stobs bcu ldan la lta// de bzhin
121a1(skyes rabs): gshegs par sems 'ong ba// lus dang ldan yang 'od med rnams// rkang pas de nas mya ngan 'das// log pa'i khrus bzhin rjes su 'ongs// rnam par ma 'khrugs mda' gzhu rnams kyis dgra rnamas+t+waM/
121a2(skyes rabs): zil mnan nas// de rnams nga rgyal ldan yang stobs dang ldan yang 'gugs ldan yang // 'gro na dpal 'dod lits+tsha bI ni 'dod pa chen po rnams// mya ngan gyis 'khrugs gdong rnams rang gi khang pa rnamasu 'ongs// sangs rgyas kyi
121a3(skyes rabs): spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dadwags chen po las/ li tsa bI rnams la thugs brtse ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / snang byed 'dzin par gyur pa na// mun bcas kyis 'khrugs na mkha' bzhin// thub pa 'da'
121a4(skyes rabs): phyir gshegs pa ni// de phyir yangs pa can ma mdzes// dpal ldan dregs pa mi ldan zhing // thams cad du ni nyams dga' yang // bdag po nyams las bud med bzhin// kun nas gdungs pas mdzes ma gyur// thos pa'i dman
121a5(skyes rabs): po'i gzugs bzhin dang // yon tan dang bral rig pa bzhin// ngag gis dman pa'i blo bzhin dang // 'du byed dang bral dag bzhin no// spyod pas dman pa'i dpal bzhin dang // dang po dang bral byams pa bzhin// rnam
121a6(skyes rabs): gnon phun sum tshogs pa bzhin// chos kyi dman pa'i bya ba bzhin// ston kar char ni log pa na// shA la'i bskams pa nor 'dzin bzhin// de che mya ngan las ma dzes// gang du de ni ma bcos shing // zos pa ma yin mya ngan des//
121b1(skyes rabs): kun tu ngu zhing thams cad kyis// grags ldan thub pa grags pa byas// gzhan ni ma gtam ma byas shing // sus kyang bsams pa ma yin la// mya ngan dang ni ngu ba ste// grong khyer pa kun bya ba gcig/ de nas dga' 'dun
121b2(skyes rabs): gtso bo la// brtan kyang mya ngan gyis nyam thag/ bde chen bdag po song ge ni// bsams shing rnam par zlos pa'o// lam log mu stegs rnams pha mau na// 'di 'dra'i lam la gshegs na su// gang gis dam pa'i lam brtan
121b3(skyes rabs): te/ slar mi ldog phyir gshegs pa nyid// nyam thag nyams par gyur pa yi// snang med 'jig rten bor nas su// skye dgu mgon med mdzad nas ni// mgon po de ni zhi phyir gshegs// rnal 'byor gtso bo bla ma mchog/
121b4(skyes rabs): mthar thug zhi la mngon phyogs nas// tshe zad pa las gzi mdangs bzhin// badrig gi brtan pa nyams par 'gyur// mi skyong sgra ngan mtho ris las// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan lhung ba bzhin// de dang bral ba rtse byar gyurare// sa la mi
121b5(skyes rabs): shes bya ba ci// tsha bas dub pa chur bzhin dang // grang bas nyam thag me la bzhin// the tshom gcod lnga skye bo rnams// dA ni su la brten par 'gyur// mau ni 'phel phyir spyod pa bzhin// gang gis sdud pa dge legs phyir//
121b6(skyes rabs): 'jig rten slob dpon thub pa der// nyams tshe chos ni nyams par 'gyur// tshul med tshul ngan gyis bcingaso pa'i// rga shi dbang bdag rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor chen po yis// gshig byed de 'dra su zhig yod/
122a1(skyes rabs): sin+d+hu shing ni bskams pa rnams// dpyid mthar chu gter gyis bzhin du// chags skyes rgod pa'i mi rnams ni// gsung gis tshim mdzad su dag lags// gang du bla ma lhun po'i snying // kun mkhyen nyid kyang
122a2(skyes rabs): rgud 'gyur na// blo gros ldan ba 'jig rten na// blo gtad la 'gro 'os pa su// ji ltar gsad bya sbyang byas nus// 'chi ba'i ched du 'khrid par byed// de bzhin gson pa'i 'jig rten sdug/ 'chi ba'i ched du skye bar byed// ji ltar
122a3(skyes rabs): shing ni rno ba yi// sog lce yis ni gshegs par byed// de bzhin 'gro 'di nyams pa yiso// sog le yis ni gshegs par byed// nyon mongs mtha' dag bsregs nas kyang // ye shes kyi ni stobs ldan kyang // 'gro
122a4(skyes rabs): bu'i mchog gi slob dpon+da ni// rab tu nyams phyir grwa shigs par 'gyur// lha dran sgrog chags ngan bra chu// srid pa'i da zlas rdul nI 'o// ye shes gru bo chen po yis/ gang gis srid pa'i mtsho las rgal// rga ba'i yel gnang
122a5(skyes rabs): me tog/ 'chi ba'i rtsa ba sring myu gu/ ye shes mtshon cha chen po yis// gang gis srid pa'i ljon shing btsas// ma rig bcu bi shing las skyes shIng // 'dod chags me skye yul bud shing // gang gi ye shes bsil
122a6(skyes rabs): chus// skyon gyi me ni zhi bar mdzad// gang gi zhi ba'i lam la gshegs// gang gis mun pa chen po spangs// gang gis dge legs mchog mokhyen zhe// mkhyen nas byams pa yis bstan to// des kyang nyon mongs kun mthar
122b1(skyes rabs): phyin// kum tu zhi ba gzigs pa ste// kun mkhyen kun la phan pa mdzad// kun spangs ched du gshegs pa nyid// mnyen zhing rnam yangs dbyangs mnga' ba'i// phyag ring thub pa chen po de'i// gal te mtha' na su yi mtha'//
122b2(skyes rabs): 'byung 'gyur ma yin 'byung 'gyur min// 'grog dgon dag na chu mthong nas// lam 'gro don bcas 'khrul pa bzhin// myur ba dang ldan mkhas pas ni// dri phyir chos la bsnyen par 'os// nyams phyir khyad par med
122b3(skyes rabs): pa yi// sdig pa mi rtag nyid shes nas// gang zhig chos la gnyid ma log/ de ni nyal yu gnyid ma log// de nas mi yi seng+ge yi/ yAM za pos seng gi des// skye ba'i nyes pa rnams smad cing // srid pa zad pa'i bstod pa nyid// srid pa'i rtsa ba 'dor
122b4(skyes rabs): cing // brtul zhugs ngam pa len 'dod la// g.yo ba'i sems ni thul 'dod de// dge ba'i lam la gnas par 'dod// zhi ba'i lami la 'gro 'dod cing // srid pa'i mtsho las rgal 'dod la// rtag par sbyin pa gtong
122b5(skyes rabs): 'dod de// yang srid gcod par 'dod pa'o// sbyin pa byin zhing nga rgyal spangs// chos ni bsams shing zhi bar song // thub pa mya ngan 'da' bzhed tshe// de yis sa ni stong par go// de nas sku lus thams cad kyis//
122b6(skyes rabs): gnyis 'thung rgyal po bzhin bzlog nas// grong khyer la ni gzigs shin tu// thub pas 'di skad bka' stsal to// yangs pa can gyi bdag po 'di// khyod la lta ba'i phyi ma yin// gyad gnas kyi tshe tshong dus su// mya
123a1(skyes rabs): ngan 'drar phyir 'gro bar gyis// de nas gus ldan chos 'dod pa// nye bar 'ongs pa rnams gzugs nas// de yi rab spyod las rnams la// thub pas mngon par rjes gnang mdzad// de nas rim
123a2(skyes rabs): gyis rnam 'dren pa// longs spyod grong lo bsnyen pa ste// der zhugs thams cad mkhyen pa yis// dge slong rnams la mngon par gsungs// da ltar ram ni bdag 'das nas// chos lnga mchog tu gzhol bar bya// de ni khyed
123a3(skyes rabs): kyis don mchog ste// gang gzhon de ni ngal bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sder ma zhugs shing // 'dul ba nu yang mi snang la// rigs par so sor gnod pa ste// de ni cis kyang bzung mi bya// de ni chos min 'dul ba min// de ni/
123a4(skyes rabs): bdag gi tshig ma yin// mang po rnams kyi tshig yin kyang // nag po'i gdems pa de dor byas// dag pa'i gdams pi bzung bya zhing // gang la yod min bzlog pa ste// de ni chos yin 'dul ba ste// de ni bdag gi tshig
123a5(skyes rabs): yin no// de phyir bdag gi mdor bsdus nas// tshad ma 'di rnams bshad pa ste// gang zhig byed de tshad ma yin// 'di las gzhan du tshad ma min// bdag gi dgongs pa phra mo de/ rnam par ma bzhag ma shes nas// rmongs
123a6(skyes rabs): nas chos ma yin pa la// chos kyi blo rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// mun pa dang bcas blta bas som// khyad par rnams ni shes min las// gser dang rab tu mtshungs pa yi// ji ltar zangs kyi slu bar byed// shes rab
123b1(skyes rabs): khyab pa med pas sam+ba// de nyid 'dzin pa ma yin pas// dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyi// de ltar chos ma yin pa sku// brdar las bcad las bsregs pa las// mkhas pa rnams kyi gser bzhin du// 'dul ba mdo las
123b2(skyes rabs): rigs pa las// de phyir yongasu rtogs par rigs// bstan bcos rnam par mi shes pas// mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin zhing // tshul min la tshul blo gros dang // tshul la tshul min mthong ba nyid// de phyi don dang tshig gis ni//
123b3(skyes rabs): yang dag thos pas bzung bya ste// bstan bcos log par bzung ba yis// mtshon bya bzhin du rnam par 'joms// sngar med ldan pas 'khyogs mang po'i// mtshan mo'i 'od byed khyim la bzhin// tshi ga nI log par brjod pa yi//
123b4(skyes rabs): don la sdug bsngal gyis 'jug go// don nyams pa las chos nyams shing // chos nyams pa las nus pa ste// de phyir me log don la ni// gang gi blo de blo ldan no// dge mangs de skad gsungs nas ni// dus su sdig pa'i grong la ga
123b5(skyes rabs): der ni 'di la khyed rnams kyis// bsnyen bkur dam pa byed pa'o// de nas der ni gus ldan pa// skul byed legs pa'i khyim nyid du// bcom ldan 'das kyis zas mdzad de// de yi phyir yin rgyas phyir mni// de nas nyan thos tshogs
123b6(skyes rabs): bcas te// de bzhin gshegs pas zas mdzad nas// skul byed la ni chos gsungs te// ku sha ldan pa'i grong du gshegs// de bzhin nor ldan zhes bya'i klung // skul byed bcas pa dau brgal nas// grong khyer de ni zhi ba yi/
124a1(skyes rabs): pad+ma'i gnas bcas nags su bsnyen// gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od mda' des// gser ldan la ni khrus mdzad nas// kun dga' bo ni dga' med la// 'jig rten dga' la bka' stsal to// kun dga' gshin
124a2(skyes rabs): rje'i ra ba yi// dbus su dag gi khri ba shom zhig/ de ring nam gyi cha smad la// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'da'// zhes gsungs kun dga' bos thos nas// mchi mas zhag na mig ldan pas// thub pa'i gzims mal bsham
124a3(skyes rabs): pa ste// bshams nas bstod cing kyi hud do// de nas gzims mal stabs pa la// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog byon te// yang yang sad pa med phyir dang // sdug bsngal thams cad zad phyir ro// de ni rtsibs logs g.yas
124a4(skyes rabs): kyi ni// phyag la dbu ni rnam bzhag nas// zhabs la zhabs ni bkod nas su// slob mas mdun bdar gzims pa'o// de nas yud tsam de na der// bya rnams skad ni mi sgrogs te// zags shing snyoms pa'i lus rnams kyis// bas
124a5(skyes rabs): gtan l-i ni gzhol bzhin gnas// de tshe 'dab ma g.yos rnams las// rlung rnams kyis kyang ma g.yos pa'i// ljon shing rnams kyis mchi ma bzhin// mdog ngan me togra rnams gtor to// nub ri'i rtse la nyin mor byed// /
124a6(skyes rabs): gnas la lam 'gro rnam pa bzhin// khri la thub pa lta bzhin du// don dam mthong rnams skyen par gyur// de nas mthar thug gzims mal la// thams cad mkhyen pa gzims pa yis// mchi mas rnam 'khrugs kun
124b1(skyes rabs): dga' la// rjes su brtse bas bka' stsal to// bdag gi mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus// gyad rnams la smos kun dga' bo// mya ngan 'da' ba ma mthong na// phyis na bdag la gdung bar 'gyur// de nas
124b2(skyes rabs): gsung ni rab bzung nas// mchi mas brgyal ba'i kun dga' bos// thub pa'i gzums mal mthar thug pa// gyang rnams l-i ni smras pa'o// de nas de tshe kun dga' bo yi tshig thos nas// mig nus chu yi char ldan de rnams ngu
124b3(skyes rabs): bzhin du// seng ge'i 'jigs las sa 'dzin dag nas khyu mchog ltar// brtan min rnam par gnon rnams grong khyer nas thon to// zhen pa med pas gos rnams g.yengs shing rnam bkram ste// 'gros kyis kun nas bskyod
124b4(skyes rabs): pas cod pan g.yo ba rnams// lha na gnas rnams bstod nams yongs su zad las bzhin// de nas nyam thag 'ongs pa rnams ni nags der song // de ltar 'ongs pa rnams kyis thub pa mthong ba ste// mthong nas mchi ma'i gdod
124b5(skyes rabs): ldan rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing // phyag 'tshal nas ni yongs gdung sems rnams gnas pa ste// gnas pa de rnams la ni thub pas bka' sprul to// dga' ba'i dus su mya ngan byed pa rigs min zhing // yid mi bde bas don med brtan
124b6(skyes rabs): pa bsnyen par gyis// bskal pa du mi rnamasu bdag gis 'dod pa gang // shin tu rnyed dka'i don de bdag la nye bar gnas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mkha' med pa'i// dge zhing 'gyur med dbang po'i dbang don las
125a1(skyes rabs): 'das pa// gzhing dbrog d+ha ma yin+da mA cho gu glang po nas// skye ba med cing 'pho ba med la m+b+ha dran rnyed // g+ha sa rnams byung chu rten bdag gas stom// dag ldan sring ba d+hArnams sprul bzhin dror ba ste// dz+nyAn+da
125a2(skyes rabs): bsags pa'i las kyi rnam par gnas bya 'di// lus 'di nyid ni de ring nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyi ni gter chen phung po song ba nA// 'jigs pa chen po yang srid nye bar zhi ba ma// gang tshe smrig bsngal chen po lngas ni byung ba
125a3(skyes rabs): ste// gang gis dru ba byadag la mya ngan 'os ci yod// rab tu zhi ba'i dus yin na yang 'brug gi dbyangs// shAkya thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams kyis thos nas// de nas kha rnams bye zhing sgyu 'dod gyur pa ste// de dag rnams kyis tshig de gnas
125a4(skyes rabs): brtan gyis gsol to// gang gi ngu ba khyod kyi mya ngan 'os ci yod// me ni khang pa 'bar las rnam par mthon pa ltar// de ltar thub pa des ni lha gtso rnams kyis kyang // nges par bsnyen bya yin na mi rnams kyis smos ci// khyab bdag
125a5(skyes rabs): skye bo gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa ni// mya ngan 'das 'di mngon min des na mya ngan byed// 'brog dgon dag na song bya'i lam mkhan bzang po ni// rnam par nyams tshe kun+da nas 'khrul par cis mi 'gyur// bla ma drang srong chen po
125a6(skyes rabs): thams cad gzigs pa ni// dngos su mthong nas gal te khyad par ma thob na// gser gyi 'byung gnas dag nas dbul po song rnams bzhin// de tshe 'di ni gzhad gang nyid du 'gro ba nyid// de ltar don ldan mang po de de smra ba rnams// bu rnams
125b1(skyes rabs): la bzhin gus ldan pal mo sbyar ba rnams// druge zhing zhal dam pa don ni bsngags pa yis// rgyud rnams dag lha mchog bdag rnams kyi mchog gis gsungs// de ltar ngos pa rmA ba mthong ba las/ tshul 'byor tsho gapa rtsol slodu/
125b2(skyes rabs): par grol min te// bdag gis chos 'di gang zhig rje su rtog byed pa// sdug bsngal dra ba las de ma mthong na yang grol// ji ltar sman ni bsnyen par mi byed skyes bu yis// smin pa mthong ba las kyang nad ni 'joms yin te// de bzhin bdag gi ye
125b3(skyes rabs): shes 'di ni ma bsgoms na// bdag ni mthong ba las kyang sdug bsngal 'joms ma yin// 'di ni bdag ldan gang zhig bdag gi chos mthong bo// rgyang ring dag na gnas kyang des ni bdag mthong ste// gang zhig dge legs la ni gzhol
125b4(skyes rabs): zhing mi 'jug pa// bdag gi nye bar gnas kyang de ni rgyud rang nyid// de phyir brtson 'grus ma spangs bsdams pa'i sems rnams kyis// dge ba'i las rnams la ni bag dang ldan par gyis// sdug bsngal du ma nye bar 'dus shing
125b5(skyes rabs): g.yo ba ste// srog ni mtho rangs mar me dang dang ni mtshungs pa nyid// de ltar thub pa'i skyes mchog gis brtan de rnams ni// mig nas chu ni rnam byung nyam thag yid rnams kyis// chu bo'i gzhung ni so sor sgrol bar byed pa bzhin// ku sha zhes
125b6(skyes rabs): bya'i grong la dal bus dbang med zhugs// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gos chen po las/ mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bzang pos yang dag
126a1(skyes rabs): nyer ldan legs bzungs ni// dbyu gu gsum 'dzin 'byung po'i tshogs su mi mchod pa// bde bar gshegs pa lta 'dod dge slong thar 'dod pas// kun dga' byed pa'i kun dga' bo la smras pa'o// thub pa'i mya ngan
126a2(skyes rabs): 'da' ba'i dus ni bdag gis thos// gang gi ched du bdag gis lta 'dod skyes pa ste// 'jig rten dag na mchog gi chos kyi rtog pa'o// zla ba gnam stong la bzhin mthong bar bla ba min// sdug bsngal mtha' dag rnams kyi tha mar
126a3(skyes rabs): gshegs bzhed pa// khyod kyis 'dren pa de ni ltar bar 'dod pa ste// sprin gyi mngon par bkag pa'i mkha' la nyi ma bzhin// bdag gis ma mthong bar de nub par 'gro ma yin// de nas yongasu 'gro ba po'i 'ongs pa ste// smra bar 'dod cing
126a4(skyes rabs): chos 'dod pa ni des shes nas// la ba dang ldan pa'i sems ldan kun dga' bos// dus ma yin zhes mchi ma'i gdong gis smras pa'o// de ni zla ba'i 'od mnga' bsam pa mkhyen pa'o// 'dab ma rgyas pa ni spyan yang rnam par mkhyen
126a5(skyes rabs): nas su// gung phyir kho bo 'jig rten phan phyir skyes pa ste// kun dga' bo skyes gnyis skyes ma 'gogs zhes gsung so// de las legs bzang mchog tu dga' zhing yid ches shing // dpal sdug dge logs mdzod la mngon
126a6(skyes rabs): du song ba ste// de nas dus kyi rje su mthun pas zhi ba yis// gsung ni mngon par gsungs nas slar yang de gsol to// kho bo lta bu'i yongasu rtog pa po rnams las// thar pa'i lam gzhan lhag par thob ces grag/ de phyir bdag la
126b1(skyes rabs): gsungs mdzod bdag la 'dzin 'dod yod// bdag gi lta 'dod brtse bar rtsod par phyir ma yin// de nas gnyis skyes mngon par 'ongs pa de la ni// yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs shing // rab tu chud zos
126b2(skyes rabs): lam ni yang dag dran pa bzhin// thos nas gang gis yang dag rtogs// des ni sngon du mthong bar gyur pa'i lam gzhan la// des ni mthar thug dam pa nye bar ma thob ste// sngon du ma mthong lam ni lhag par thob nas su// snying
126b3(skyes rabs): la mun pa dang bcas lam de dor bar gyur// rdul dang lhan cig mun pa rab tu thob pa ste// de dag rnams kyi mi dge'i las ni sog ces grag/ snying stobs dang bcas rdul ni rab tu 'phel ba ste// de dag rnams kyi dge ba'i las
126b4(skyes rabs): ni rgyas zhes grag/ thos dang blo dang 'bad pas snying stobs 'phel ba na// rdul dang mun pa dag ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir// las nyams pa las las ni zad par 'gro ba ste// de dag rnams kyi las de 'thad pa min zhes grag/ yid ni
126b5(skyes rabs): rmongs par byed pa rdul dang mun pa dag/ rang bzhin par ni 'jig rten dag na smra ba ste// de phyir de gnyis zad pa yod min brtan nyid phyir// rang bzhin par ni brtan pa nyid du rab tu grub// snying stobs sbyor las de dag de bar gyur nas/
126b6(skyes rabs): dus kyi dbang gis slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// bsil ba'i chu ni mtshan mo bzhin du rim gyis ni// dus kyi rim las rang bzhin du ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rtag pa'i bdag nyid snying stobs de ltar 'phel ba ru// thos pa blo dang
127a1(skyes rabs): 'bad pa rnams kyi mi nus te// de ma 'phel na de dag nyams pa yod min zhing // de dag ma nyams pa las zhi ba yod ma yin// ston du des ni rang bzhin lngas ni ste skye ste// des kyang der ni thar pa mthong ba
127a2(skyes rabs): ma yin zhing // me yi 'bar ba'i 'od kyi nyams pa ji lta bar// rang bzhin las ni gnas na mthar thug gang las yin// sangs rgyas pa yi lam gyis de nyid mthong ba ste// srid pa la ni brten nas 'jig rten des rtogs
127a3(skyes rabs): shing // de yis rnam par nyams zhi ba rig pa ste// rgyun ni rab tu nyams phyir 'bras bu nyams pa'o// gsal ba 'di yin rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i ba dag/ lus las gzhan ni de yis sngon du rtogs pa ste// thub
127a4(skyes rabs): pa'i gsung ni yongasu thob nas 'jig rten ni// bdag mau da pa dang bdag tu bya ba med par shes// chos ni du ma so sor brten nas skyes pa ste// rang nyid dbang med yong su shes nas ni// des ni rab tu 'jug pa sdug bsngal nyid
127a5(skyes rabs): du dang // nges par ldog ste sdug bsngal nyid du kye ma mthong // ji ltar 'jig rten ngag ni skye ba rtogs nas su// des ni chad pa'i lta ba rnam par spangs pa ste// 'jig rten dag gi nub par 'gro ba shes nas su// rtag pa'i lta ba brtan
127a6(skyes rabs): po sbyin par spangs pa'o// drang srong chen po'i gsung ni thos nas bzung ba ste// de ltar 'di ni des ni sngon gyi lta ba btang // de yi sngon du yongasu las ni byas pas te// gang gos sbyin par dam pa'i chos la rjesu song // yid ni rab tu
127b1(skyes rabs): dang pas mchog dang ldan pa des// zhi zhing 'gyur med go 'phang de ni rab thob nas// thub pa gzims pa la ni bsngags pa byas pa ste// lta bzhin 'di las blo 'di rnams ni byas pa'o// mchod 'os dam pa mya ngan 'da' ba
127b2(skyes rabs): 'os pa yis// mgon po mthong nas bdag ni gnas par 'os ma yin// ston pa thugs rje ldan pa mya ngan 'da' ba yi// sngon du re zhig bdug ni mthar thug la 'gro'o// de nas des ni thub pa la ni phyag 'tshal nas// sprul
127b3(skyes rabs): bzhin g.yo ba med pa'i gdan ni bcings nas su// sprin rlung gis ni phra mor byed pa bzhin// de ma thag tu zhi ba mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs// de nas de phyir gdung gi 'du byed cho gA ni// cho ga mkhyen pa'i thub pas
127b4(skyes rabs): bka' stsal pa// mthar gyur de ni skye ba mthar mdzod drang srong che// rgya chen slob ma mnga' ba'i slob mar gyur pa'o// de nas nam gyi thun ni 'das pa na// zla basmai skar ma rnams kyi 'od ni phrogs pa na// nags rnams nyal
127b5(skyes rabs): nyal ba bzhin du sgra med gyur pa na// dge slong rnams la thugs rje chen po mnga' bas bstan// slob dpon bzhin du sgron ma bzhin/ du don bzhin du// bdag 'das che n+ya sor thar pa bsten byu ste// khyed kyi ston pa de yin de'i dbang gis
127b6(skyes rabs): 'gyur bya// kho bo gnas pa na yang de tsam nyid nying smra'o// lus dang ngag gi las ni rnam par dag 'dod pas// de bzhin 'jig rten tha snyad thams cad 'dor ba dang // sa dang srog chags sa bon rdzas la sogs rnams
128a1(skyes rabs): kyi// rab tu 'dzin pa las ni me bzhin ldog pa'o// sa la skye ba gcod dang 'byed pa dag las dang // sa yI logs la rko dang rmo ba dag las dang gso ba dang ni skar rtsis mtshan nyid rnams las ni// nges par
128a2(skyes rabs): ldog pa bza' ba'i cho ga dus yin no// pho nya'i rig pa sman dang sngags ni bsnyen rnams la// sbyor min nyid dang khyab pa nyid ni med pa nyid// chos las ma bkag pa yi sgrub pa rnams la ni// tshod shes nyid dang tshi mu dang
128a3(skyes rabs): srog pa ma yino// rnam pa de ltar tshul khrims yA ga bsdus pa 'di// thar pa'i rtsa ba so sor thar pa ste// 'di las ting nge 'dzin rnams rab tu skye ba ste// ye shes thams cad rnams dang mthar thug rnams 'di'o// de
128a4(skyes rabs): phyir ma ral ma nyams dbrog bya ma yin pa'i// rang gi tshul khrims gtsang ma yod pa de yi chos// de med gal te 'di yi thams cad med pa ste// tshul khrims yon tan dam pa rnams kyi rten yin no// tshul khrims
128a5(skyes rabs): ma nyams rnam par dag pa gnas pa na// dbang po spyod yul rnams la 'jug pa ma yin zhing // dbyug pas pa glang tshogs rnams lo tog las bzhin du// brtan las dbang po drug rnams sgrib par bya ba'o// dang po'i rta
128a6(skyes rabs): rnams yul rnams la grol gang zhig gzhan// len zhing de rnams las ni de tsam nyid ma yin// g.yo ba'i rta rnams kyis phrogs lam ngan la bzhin du// des ni de yi ched du don med thob par 'gyur// dgra bo chen po rnams
128b1(skyes rabs): kyi dbang du song ba rnams 'drin kha cig sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ba ste// rmongs pas yul rnams dag gi dbang du song nas ni// song nas deng 'dir dbang med rnams ni sdug bsngal ngos// de phyir dgra bom kyang dbang po rnams
128b2(skyes rabs): kyi bzhin// dbang po rnams kyi 'gro ba 'gro bya ma yin zhing // dbang po rnams kyi dga' ba 'jig rten na byas nas// dbang po rnams kyi gshed ma 'jig rten na mthong ngo // rang gi g.yo ba'i sems las 'jig pa ji lta bar// rtag rnams
128b3(skyes rabs): las dang sbrul dang 'bar ba'i me las dang // dgra bo las ni de ltar 'jigs par mi bya ste// gang gi sbrang rtsi dang nI yang dag rtog pa med// lcags kyu med pa'i gnyis 'thung myos lta bu dang // yal ga'i ri dgas shing la rab tu ma zhi
128b4(skyes rabs): ltar// sems ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin phyogasu bskor ba ste// g.yo zhing bskyod pa de la go skabs sbyin mi bya// de ni rang dbang yin na zhi ba yod min zhing // de yi gnas par yin na byed pa byas pa nyid// de phyir sems 'di ji ltar rnam par mi
128b5(skyes rabs): g.yo ba// de ltar rab tu 'bad pa yis ni gyis mdzod cig/ bza' btsom ni sman bzhin nges par bsten bya ste// 'dir ni khong khro bya ba ma yin chags pa min// ji srid bkrus pa nyid ni ldog pa'i tshod du dang / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis
128b6(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa yi ched du'o// ji ltar nags su bung ba rnams kyis me tog ro// 'thung ste me tog rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin// de bzhin dus kyi dbang las bsod snyoms rgya ba ste// pha rol dad pa rnams ni nyams par byed
129a1(skyes rabs): ma yin// drang pos rtag par khung bar byed ces khur bya dang // skye bo sbyin pa po yang yod pa ma yin te// 'di na sbyor ba min las khur ba ltung ba ste// ji ltar khur bu de ltar sbyin pa po yin no// rnal 'byor rim las
129a2(skyes rabs): nyin mo mtha' dag phul nas dang // mtshan mo'i dang po'i thun dang cig shos la nyol lo// gnyid kyi tshe ni don med byed pa ma yin// dus kyi me yis 'di na 'gro ba sreg pa na// mtshan mo mtha' dag la ni gnyid par 'os pa su// nyon mongs
129a3(skyes rabs): dgra bo dang mtshungs 'joms pa po rnams ni// snying la gnas pa yin na su yi gnyid log 'gyur// de phyir khyim nA nag po'i sbrul rnams nyal ba ltar// yid la nyes skyon sbrul rnams rab tu nyal ba rnams// rigasma dang ni rkang pa
129a4(skyes rabs): smin gyis ston nas su// gnyid log par 'os 'di las gzhan du ngo tsha'o// ngo tsha rgyun nyid dang ni mchog gi gos yin zhing // ngo che lam las 'khyogs pa rnams kyi lcags kyus te// ngo tsha ldan pas de ltar gyur na 'jug bya zhing //
129a5(skyes rabs): de tshis rnam par spangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi spangs// ji skyid pa la skyes bu ngo tshwa dang bcas pa// de srid de yi ngo bo nyid yin te// don dang don mina? rnams la rnam dpyod med pa ni// ngo tshwas rnam par dmanu pa phyug dang mnyam
129a6(skyes rabs): pa'o// gang yang yan lag nyid lag rnams ni ral gris gcod// der yang yid kyi nyes pa bya ba ma yin zhing // zhi ba ma yin ngag ni brjod par mi bya ste// bdag gi de yau khyed cag rnams kyi bar chod yin// bzod pa dang mnyam
129b1(skyes rabs): dka' thub yod pa ma yin zhing // gang gi bzod pa de yi stobs dang brtan pa ste// gang rnams pha rol rnams las rtsub mo mi bzod pa// de rnams chos byed rnams kyi lugs min grol ba min// chos kyi 'byed pa po dang
129b2(skyes rabs): grags pa'i 'joms pa po// gzugs kyi dgra bo dang ni snying gi me yin te// khro bi de yi go skabs rab 'byams mi sbyin zhing // yon tan rnams kyi dgra bau de 'dra gzhan ma yin// yongasu bsil ba'i chu lasau glog gi me
129b3(skyes rabs): bzhin du// ji ltar rab byung las ni khro ba 'gal ba ste// de ltar khyim pa rnams kyi skyes pa mi 'gal te// chags ldan de rnams de la dam bca' ma yin no// mdzes pa'i sgra ni rgyang ring mgo la reg nas dang // rnam par 'gyur/
129b4(skyes rabs): ba'i gos dang lhung bzed mthong nas dang // gzhan las mthar gyur spyod pa rnam par bsams nas su// snying la skyes pa'i nga rgyal rab tu spang bar bya// khyim la brten pa khengs pa rnams kyi yang // nga rgyal rnam par 'joms
129b5(skyes rabs): pa'i phyir yin na// slong mo za bas bdag nyid yongasu rtogs pa po// thar pa la demigs skra bzhar rnams kyi sngon nyid do// ngan g.yo dang ni chos kyi mchims sbyor yod min te// gang phyir 'di las 'khyog po nyid ni bsnyen mi bya//
129b6(skyes rabs): nag yo nyid dang sgyu ni slu ba'i don du ni// chos kyi bdag nyid rnams kyi bslu bya yod ma yin// gang zhig rgya chen rnams las sdug bsngal 'ong ba ste// nyung ngu 'dod la 'ong ba ma yin de dang bral// de yi phyir yang nyung ngu 'dod nyid bsnyen/
130a1(skyes rabs): bya ste// gang zhig yon tan rnams kyi rdzogs byed kye ma ci// de ni bkren pa'i lta ba rnams la mi 'jigs shing // dbang po rnams las gang zhig cung zad 'jigs min la// gang zhig thos nas med ces
130a2(skyes rabs): mya ngan med pa ste// gang gi nyung ngu 'dod de de yi thar pa min// gal te grol ba 'dod na tshim pa bsnyen mdzod dang // tshim pa na ni 'dir bde de 'di chos yin zhing // tshim pa rnams ni sar yang bde bar gnyid log ste// tshim
130a3(skyes rabs): rnams ni mtho ris na yang nye bar sreg/ phyag kyang tshim pa med pa rtag tu dbul po ste// dbul yang tshim pa dang ldan rtag tu phyug po nyid// tshim pa med pa sdug pa'i yul rnams dang 'bye zhing // tshim par 'gro ba ngal ba
130a4(skyes rabs): ldan la mya ngan byed// zhi ba'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'dod rnams kyis// de ltar tshogs la dga' ba rnamasu 'gyur mi bya// zhi ba'i bdag nyid gcig tu rgyu phyir 'jig rten na// brgya byin la sogs lha rnams kyis kyang re 'dod/
130a5(skyes rabs): byid// chags po sdug bsngal gyi ni gnas pa'i shing yin te// rang gi skye bo la 'am skye la chags pa spangs// chags pa rnam rgyas sdug bsngalnga ni 'jig rten na// gnyis 'thung 'khogs pa 'dam la bzhin du 'chags par
130a6(skyes rabs): 'gyur// rtag par rab tu zhugs chu yi rgyun ni mnyen na yang // rdo ba'i logs la dus su rnam par 'bigs pa ste// brtson 'grus kyis ni rnyed par dka' ba ci yang med// de phyir khur rnams mi 'bor bar ni bzo bgyis dang //
130b1(skyes rabs): gang zhig yang yang ngal gso nas ni srub byed pa// de yis shing la me ni rnyed par sla min zhing // brtson 'grus brtsams pas rnyed par smra bar 'gyur ba ste// de phyir sbyor ba yod na bya ba grub pa nyid// dran pa yod na skyon rnams
130b2(skyes rabs): 'jug pa mu yin te// dran pa dang mnyam mdza' bo med cing bsrung ba med// dran pa nyams las nges par thams cad nyams pa ste// de phyir lus la song ba'i dran pa spang mi bya// ji ltar dpa' bo rnams ni go cha bzung nas su// /
130b3(skyes rabs): dgra bo'i sde la 'jigs pa med rnams 'jug pa ste// de bzhin lus la dran pa'i go cha bgos nas su// brtan pa rnams ni yul gyi g.yul rnams la spyod do// mnyam par bzhag pa blo dang sems ni yongs bsdams shing // /
130b4(skyes rabs): 'jig rten dag gi skye dang 'gog pa shes pa ste// de phyir tingange 'dzin la yong su 'jug bya ste// ting 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i sems nad yod ma yin// rnam par 'thor ba'i chu ni rnam par 'dzin don du// ji ltar 'bad pas dong
130b5(skyes rabs): dang 'obs ni byed pa ste// yis chu ni gnas pa'i don du tinge 'dzin// de ltar dong dang 'obs dang mtshungs par rab tu bstan// shes rab ldan pa yongasu 'dzin pa btang ba yi// chos 'di nang la mchog tu gzhol ba dag gi
130b6(skyes rabs): te// de ltar gnas pa'i grol ba yod cing 'di yi ni// phyin ci log ni khyim pa ma yin dge slong min// shes rab rga dang shi ba'i mtsho chen dag la gru// rmongs pa'i mun pa rnams la ji ltar sgron ma ste// nad rnams tha~Mng 'jon
131a1(skyes rabs): pa dag gis sman yin zhing // nyon mongs ljon shing 'joms byed mtshon cha rnon po yin// de phyir thos pa bsam pa bsgom pa rnams kyi ni// shes rab rnam par 'phel la rab tu 'jug byar bya// glang
131a2(skyes rabs): gis shes rab rang bzhin rang bzhin lta byed mig yod pa// de ni mig dang bral yang mi go dang ldan pa nyid// sems la rgyu ba'i spros pa de dang de rnams kyis// khyim na gnas pa spangs nas kyang ni grol min nyid// mchog tu zhi
131a3(skyes rabs): ba thob par 'dod pa rnams kyi 'di// shes nas spros pa med pa rnamasu 'gyur bar bya// de phyir bag yod bla ma bzhin du bsnyen mdzod la// bag med dgra bo bzhin du rnam par spongs mdzod dang // bag yod pa las brgya byon
131a4(skyes rabs): gyis ni dpal thob cing // bag med pa las lha min khengs rnams rnam par nyams// phan pa dang ldan rjes su brtse ba mnga' pa yi// ston pa thugs rje mnga' bas mdzad bya gang yin pa// de ni bdag gis byas shing dang ni rab bsdams
131a5(skyes rabs): pa|/ khyed cag rnams kyi sems ni zhi bas byas pa'o// ci ste ri rnams dang ni khang pa stong pa rnams// dgon pa de ni glang dang der ni yod pa na// rab tu sbyor la rtag tu 'bod pa bya ba ste// phyi nas yongasu gdung ba ldan par ma gyur
131a6(skyes rabs): cig/ sman pa rang bzhin yang dag legaso bar shes nas na// nad pa rnams la dam pa'i sman ni brjod bya ste// de yi dus kyis sbyar bar nges par bstan pa la// nad pa gang de bdag po yin te sman pa min// dpal ldan drang zhing
131b1(skyes rabs): mnyam la 'jigs pa med pa yi// lam ni lam mkhan gyis ni rnam par bstan pa na// thos nas gang zhig mi 'gro nga yi nyams bya ste// bstan pas 'dren pa po ni bu lon yod ma yin// sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa
131b2(skyes rabs): bzhi po kho bo yis// bstan pa rnams la 'di ni gang gis 'dod pa yod// de ni myur zhing spobs par bdag la smros shig dang // the tshom shin tu rnam par dpyad bya bcad par bgyi// de ltar mthon por gsung ba'i drang srong
131b3(skyes rabs): chen po la// the tshom med pa de rnams ci yang ma gsol to// sems kyi de dag rnams kyi sems kyi gting dpag nas// byed ldan ma 'gags pas kyang tshig 'di smras pa'o// rlung ni g.yo ba ma yin nyi ma bsil pa dang //
131b4(skyes rabs): ri bong mtshan ma can ni dro ba nyid na yang // 'jig rten dag na rkang pa bzhi po rnams la ni// bden pa min par byed par nus pa ma yin no// gang zhig sdugs yod pa do ni bde ba min// 'di yi rgyu gang rab tu skye bo de gzhan min// /
131b5(skyes rabs): rgyu ni 'gags pa las ni nges par thar pa ste// gang zhig 'di yi lam ni thabs ma yin bya min// de phyir bdag nyid chen po bden pa bzhi rnams la// dge slong skye bo nges 'di gtam ci yod ma yin// ston pa mya ngan 'da' ba brnyes
131b6(skyes rabs): par 'gyur zhes te// gang zhig don ni rdzogs pa ma yin sdug bsngal te// gang zhig tshogs pa 'di ni brtul zhugs gzhon nyid las// sngon du don ni mthong bar gyur pa ma yin pa// de yang khyod kyi gsung 'dis da ni de maM
132a1(skyes rabs): thag/ glog gi 'od kyi lam bzhin yang dag mthong bar gyur// gang gi don gyi lhag ma yod pa ma yin zhing // gang yang sbrid pa'i mtsho yi pha rol phyin pa ste// mgon po shin tu brgyan pa nges
132a2(skyes rabs): par gshegs thos te// de dag gi yang snying la bsam par gyur pa nyid// de ltar 'phags pa ma 'gags pa yi tshig de yis// don ni rnam par shes kyang shes nas slar yang ni// gus ldan rnams kyi blo
132a3(skyes rabs): gros brtan po mdzad bzhed pa// byams pas slar yang sangs rgyas kyis ni bka' stsal to// gang phyir bskal par gnas kyang de na nyams pa ste// phan tshun du ni 'du ba nges par yongs ma yin// bdag nyid kyi
132a4(skyes rabs): dang gzhan gyi don ni byas nas ni// kho bo'i gnas pa la ni dgos pa yod ma yin// gang rnams mkhar drang sa na bdag gi gdul bya rnams// de rnams thar par byas shing rgyun la bcug pa ste// 'di las
132a5(skyes rabs): gzhan bu slob ma rimo dang rim rnams kyis// nga yi chos 'di skye dgu rnams la gnas par 'gyur// de phyir 'gro ba'i rang bzhin rnam par shes byas nas// bsam mno ma byed nges par rje 'bral ba ste// rnam
132a6(skyes rabs): pa de ltar 'gro bar shes nas su// ji ltar 'di ltar ma yin de ltar gyis mdzod cig dang // ye shes sgron mas mun pa rnam par bsal byas nas// srid pa rnams la snying po med par mthong nas su// ji ltar
132b1(skyes rabs): nad ni nye bar zhi ba de ltar ni/ tshe na rnam par 'gags na tshim pa nyid yin no// dor bar bya zhing rtsod ldan lus zhes bya ba ni// srid pa'i mtsho yi rgyun ni rnam par 'gags pa na// don med byed pa'i dgra bo'i rnam par nyams las bzhin
132b2(skyes rabs): tshe ni nye bar zhi bas tshim pa ma yin su// rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad rnam par 'god pa ste// de phyir khyed cag rnams ni legs par bag yod kyi// mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus ni yongasu gyur pa ste// khyed cag ma smra 'di ni bdag gi phyi ma'i tshig/
132b3(skyes rabs): de nas bsam gtan rig pa rnams kyi mchog gis ni// yud tsam de la bsam gtan dang po thob mdzad nas// de las rnam par bzhengs nas gnyis par gshegs pa ste// rim gyis ma tshang med par thams cad la gsheg so// de nas
132b4(skyes rabs): rjes su rim pas rab tu byed pa dgu// snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs ni mtha' dag bsam gtan mdzad// de nas drang srong chen pos slar yang rim gyis ni// bsam gtan dang po de nyid la ni babs pa'o// de las rnam par bzhengs
132b5(skyes rabs): nas kyang ni rim gyis ni// bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni slar yang 'dzegs pa ste// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i cho ga las de rnams bzhengs shing // mngon sum nyid du nye bar zhi ba la gsheg so// de nas thub pa mya ngan 'dra' bar gshegs
132b6(skyes rabs): pa na// char gyis bsnun pa'i ba lang bzhin du sa g.yos shing // phyogs kyi glang po rnams kyi sbyang ba bzhin du ni// na mkha' las kyang sgron ma rnams ni lhung bar gyur// lha yi nags tshal sna tshogs shing rta sreg 'dod pa'i//
133a1(skyes rabs): nags kyi me ni bar snang dag la byung ba bzhin// bud shing med cing rlung med du ba med pa'i me// phyogs ni sreg par byed pa byung bar gyur pa nyid// lha min 'joms par 'dod pa g.yul du 'jug
133a2(skyes rabs): pa na// khro ba brgya pas khro ba rnam par gtong bzhin// dri bzhin me stag brgya pa'i me ni skyug pa yi// dbang po'i rdo rje ma bzad pa rnams ltung bar gyur// 'jig pa'i rlung rnams dag gis btags pa rnams kyis bzhin// /
133a3(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rtse mo rnams lgang bzhin// 2rmi shing shing rnams dag ni zug rngu byed pa yi// phyag dar/ khur ba'i rlung ni drag tu g.yos par gyur// 'dam gyis chus bsgos sdong bu gzhon nu rnams kyis ni//
133a4(skyes rabs): lus ni yongasu dkris pa'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// cung zhig 'od zer kha dog ngan pa de rnams kyis// 'odi ni bcom ste zla ba mngon pa gsal bar gyur// sprin dang bral yang mkha' la zla ba gnas na yang // mun pa mi
133a5(skyes rabs): bzang rnams kyi phyogs rnams rgyas pa ste// yud tsam de la mya ngan gyis ni zil non zhing // chu bo rnams ni de ma thag tu chu dron 'bab// de nas nyes sare skyes pa'i shU li'i shing dag gis// rang gi me tog mdzes pa
133a6(skyes rabs): 'jug pa dus min la// rnam par btud nas drang srong chen po'i sku lus ni// gser gyi steg bu'i gzugs brnyan la ni yang dag gtor// mekha' la mgo bo lnga rnams mi g.yo klu rnams ni// mya ngan gyis slar so sor dmar
133b1(skyes rabs): bla'i mig can rnams// rab tu gnyid log gdengs ka bstod pa'i lus rnams kyis// thub pa la ni gus pas lha bzhin gnas par gyur// nang du song ba'i kun nas gdung ba rnams// de rnams shin tu dron mo'i dbugs
133b2(skyes rabs): ni rgyas pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mi rtag pa ni rtogs nas su// mya ngan 'ongs pa min rnams mya ngan smad par gyur// nges par legs pa'i chos kyi cho gar rab zhugs pa// rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi 'dus pa dam pa ste// chos la mngon
133b3(skyes rabs): dar chags pas mya ngan ma byas shing // lha yi rten la mchi ma chung bar ma gyur to// gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i byed ldan lha rnams kyang // drang srong chen po'i yang dag shin tu gus ldan rnams// rang gnas gyur cing rnam par smad
133b4(skyes rabs): 'gyur ba ma song ste// 'jig rten dag ni rang bzhin na smad pa'o// dri za'i rgyal po rnams de nas klu yi rgyal po rnams// gnod sbyin rnams dang dam chos la dga' lha rnams ni// mya ngan byed cing mya ngan mchog la gzhol rnams
133b5(skyes rabs): kyis// rigs chen po yi nyam thag bzhin du mkha' la gyur// yid la re ba thob pa'i bdud kyi sde rnam sI// rab tu dga' bas skad ni 'thon zhing rgod pa ste// 'phyo zhing glu dbyangs gar byas dga' bar gyur pa rnams// rnga bo che dang rdza
133b6(skyes rabs): pa Ta ha rnams brdungs// de nas rdo rje rtse mo bcom pa'i ri bo bzhin// chang dang bral ba'i gnyis 'thung dga' ba med pa bzhin// nog gri rnar dman pa'i dbyibs can khyu mchog bzhin// thub bI khyu mchog nub pa na ni 'dzin gyur// nyin mor byed pas rab tu dmA sI na ma'//
134a1(skyes rabs): bzhin// ba mos bsregs pa'i pad+ma dang ldan rdzing bu bzhin// nor dang bral zhing bya ba med pa'i rigs bzhin du// srid pa nyams mdzad rab tu nyams las 'gro bar gyur// sangs rgyas kyi spyod
134a2(skyes rabs): ba zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas chen po las/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas ngang pa stong dang ldan pa'i lha yi ni// gzhal med khong nas
134a3(skyes rabs): gdong ni cung zhig rab btud nas// yud tsam thams cad mkhyen pa la ni bltas nas su// lha na gnas pa chen po gzhan zhig gis smras so// kye ma 'gro na dngos po thams cad mi rtag cing // skye ba'i chos can dang ni
134a4(skyes rabs): 'dzad pa'i chos can la// skye ba rnams ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa ste// de dag rnams kyi lhag med zhi bas zhi ba nyid// skye ba'i bud shing tshad ma min pa bsreg mdzad nas// ye shes me lce grags pas rnam khyab du ba
134a5(skyes rabs): can// chu yA me bzhin du ni dus kyi chu yis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i me de mya ngan 'da' bar bya// de nas mchog gi drang srong dang mtshungs drang srong gzhan// mtho ris gnas kyang 'bras bu rnams la ma chags pas//
134a6(skyes rabs): rab tu zhi ba'i dgra bcom drang srong mthong nasu// ri dbang brtan pas tshig ni rnam par smras pa'o// 'jig rten dag na 'ga' zhig nyams par mi 'gro med// de ltar 'gro ba med cing song ba med pa ste// mchog dang mchog
134b1(skyes rabs): mkhyen mchog gi don rig pa// ston pa mtshungs med gang du rab tu zhi bar gyur// shes rab rnam par dag cing mchog gi spyan mnga' ba// yongs su 'dren pa po nyid 'di yis dman pa ni// rmongs pa nges par mig long
134b2(skyes rabs): gson pa'i 'jig rten ni// 'du shes nyams shing lam ngan la ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas 'gro ba'i 'gal ba ma yin ma 'gags pa// rjes su chags pa nyams shing skye ba 'gags byas pas// 'jig rten
134b3(skyes rabs): snang bas dman pa mthong nas su// thub pa'i zhi ba na ni zhi ba'i yid kyis smras// shes rab ldan pa 'du byed cho ga la gnas pa// dus 'dir nges par blo gtad bya ba ma yin zhing // mi rtag nyid kyi rdo rje nges par ltung ba yi//
134b4(skyes rabs): gling du thub pa ri bo chen po bcom par gyur// snying po med cing nga med rnam par nyams pa'i chos// 'jig rten son pa'i 'jig rten kye ma smod par bshog/ gang du thub dka' drang srong chen po seng gi yang // nyes
134b5(skyes rabs): pa'i gnyis 'thung rnams ni nyams par mdzad nas nyams// 'dod chags bral ba min pa'i 'gro ba 'jug pa la// da ni 'jigs pa chen po ma yin su yi lags// thun myong las ni gang du de bzhin gshegs
134b6(skyes rabs): pa yang // gser gyi ka ba lta bu kun nas chags par gyur// sa bon drug dang myu gu gcig dang gtor ma gcig/ rtsa ba drug dang 'bras bu lnga dang yal ga gnyis// phung po gsum dang bdag nyid gcig la nyon
135a1(skyes rabs): mongs kyis// sdong po 'di ni bcag nas thub pa gnyis 'thungs gzims// 'gro rgyal mda' bzhin dgra bo rnams ni bcom nas su// chu med par na rma bya bzhin du chags bral zhing // mgyogs 'gro rta bzhin du ni rnam
135a2(skyes rabs): rgyal lamra song ba// me bzhin thub pa skye ba med cing zhi bar gyur// tho reste dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa mig 'phel na// rab tu tshim byed rgyun bzhin gsung rnams btang nas su// 'od kyi nyam thag pa lang bzhin sar rnam rgyus nas// glags pas
135a3(skyes rabs): phyogs ni mngon par bkang nus bla ma gzims// snyan grags ldan pa nyid dang 'od zer ldan pa ste// chu bo sinA d+hu bzhin du gser skyugri shugs ldan pa// rnam thos bu yi rdzu 'phrul mi skyong sder bcas pa// lam la bcug nas mi yi nyi ma
135a4(skyes rabs): nub par gyur// rmugs pa'i do shal gyis ni phyogs dag dkris pa bzhin// rgya chen sprin rnams kyis dkris nyi ma'i 'od rnams bzhin// mchod sbyin rdzogs tshi mar gyi sman po'i me bzhin du// thub bzhi tshe de ring 'jig rten gasngal ma gyur/
135a5(skyes rabs): mdud pa med pa bden pa'i lam ni bsnyen nas so// mdud pa med pa zhi ba'i chos ni brnyes nas ni// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni sku lus 'dren par nus na yang // sdug bsngal dag gi gter ni lus yin zhes spangs so// mun pa mun pa nyi mas bzhin
135a6(skyes rabs): du zil mnan nas// rdul ni rdul ni char ba bzhin du mngon bcom nas// slar yang slar yang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor mi len te// thub pa thub pa skar rgyal bzhin du mngon par gshegs// gang zhig skye bas sdug bsngal 'joms phyir
135b1(skyes rabs): skyes pa skyes pa ste// gang la 'jig rten pas ni zhi ba'i ched du bstan// gang zhig 'od zer mchog gi rnam par gsal ba dang // khyad par 'phags pa'i blo yis rnam par bsal bar gyur// gang gis skye dgu rnams ni dge legs
135b2(skyes rabs): lho bcug ste// yon tan rgya chen rnams kyi sa la rgyas pa nyid// 'dod pa'i snyan grags gsal ba rnams kyis 'phel ba ste// khyim na gnas pa yin kyang grags pas 'phel ba nyid// gang gis mkhyen zhing smod pas 'o dod ma bos shing/
135b3(skyes rabs): mI ni nyam thag rnams la brtse bas bos pa ste// bza' ba ngan byar rab tu 'joms shing ma gsol lo// bza' ba legs pa rjesu 'gro zhing ma gsol to// mi gnas dbang po zhi ba gang zhig yul rnams la// stobs rab dbang po
135b4(skyes rabs): nyid las yang dag mi gnas shing // gzhan rnams kyis ma thob pa'i lam bzangs thob pa ste// ro mkhyen pas ni nges par 'byung ba'i ro gsol to// gang gis sngar ma byin pa'i sbyin pa ste// 'bras bu 'dod pas cung zad zhig
135b5(skyes rabs): ni ma byin la// mnyam nyid rjes mthun phun sum tshogs pa dor ba ste// dam pa rnams kyi yid rnams yon tan rnams kyis 'phrogs// brtan pa rnams kyis g.yo ba'i spyan ni bsrungs pa ste// brtan par gshegs shing sems ni bsrung
135b6(skyes rabs): du bcug gyur la// dge legs rnams la ni bsrungs shig 'phel bar mdzad pa ste// chos skyes pa ni cung zhig 'dod par ma mdzad do// brtan pas mi dge ba las mi dge rnams spangs nas// dge legs kyis ni dgra bo skyon rnams
136a1(skyes rabs): sbyangs bya ste// grang zhig blo yis nyes pa rnams ni kun spangs la// de ni 'phags min mi rtag nyid kyis nub byar gyur// gang la chos ni yang dag rjes song zhing // dga' bas mchog tu nges pa rnam
136a2(skyes rabs): par bzung ba ste// me yis nor ni zos pa ji lta ba bzhin du// khyab bdag ye shes nor can de yang srog song ngo // brgyad po rnams la mchog tu sde mtshan lnga thul zhing // gsum gzigs spyod pa gsum ni zad byed spyan gsum
136a3(skyes rabs): pa// gcig ni bsrungs nas gcig ni thob nas gcig rtogs nas// lci ba bdun rnams spangs nas bla ma gzims par gyur// gang gis zhi ba'i ched du lam ni gsal mdzad de// legs pa'i skye bo zhi bas rab tu dang mdzod cing //
136a4(skyes rabs): nyon mongs ljon shing rab tu chags pa bcad pa ste// srid pa rnams las gus pa ldan pa rnams bsgral to// gsung gi bdud rtsis 'jig rten shin tu tshim mdzad cing // bzod pa yis ni khro bo yongasu bzung ba ste// slob ma'i sde
136a5(skyes rabs): ni dge legs la ni rol mdzad la// dge legs don du gnyer rnams phra mo rtog su bcug/ legs pa rnams la chos kyi sa byon skyed mdzud cing // rgyu yi bdag nyid 'phags pa'i lam ni thob mdzod la// 'jig rten 'das pas
136a6(skyes rabs): 'phags pa min pa ma bstan cing // chos las ma gtogs gzhan la sbyar ba ma yin no// kA shi gan su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// blo dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'jig rten tshom mdzad cing // gdul bya rnams ni chos kyi cho gar spyad
136b1(skyes rabs): mdzad la// bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i ched du dge ba mdzad// gzhan rnams ma mthong ba yi de nyid mthong mdzad cing // yon tan rnams kyis chos byed rnams la sbyar ba ste// gzhan gyi lugs rnams tshar bcad nas
136b2(skyes rabs): ni bskul gyur la// rtogs par dka' ba'i don ni rnam par shes par mdzad// thams cad myi rtag pa dang bdag med par gsungs shing // srid pa rnams su bde ba cung zad ma gsungs la// snyan pa'i ba dan gyen du rnam par
136b3(skyes rabs): bsgreng ba ste// nga rgyal ka ba mthon po rnam par bsgyel bar mdzad// smad kyang rang gi thugs ni bskyod pa ma yin zhing // thams cad la ni 'jug pa rnams la sred ma mjed// rang nyid rgal zhing bying ba bsgral bar mdzad pa ste// zhi zhing pha
136b4(skyes rabs): rol 'khrul pa zhi bar mdzad gyur la// grol zhing pha rol bcing ba grol bar mdzad pa ste// rtogs shing pha rol rmongs pas rtogs par mdzad pa'o// thub pas thub pas tshul drang tshul min mkhyen 'od des// sems can rnams ni yang
136b5(skyes rabs): dag gtam gyis rjes bzung nas// tshul min la dga' tshul min+da 'byung po rnams la ni// bskal pa 'jigs pa'i tshe na chos bzhin rab tu gzims// chu ldan sprin bzhin sa 'dzin ri bo nags tshal re ba nags tshal bzhin//
136b6(skyes rabs): 'od ldan rgan po bzhin du 'ong ldan gzhon nu bzhin// 'jig rten dag gi lto byed bcom nas 'jig rten gyis// lta byed nye bar phrogs nas 'gros su 'di gshegs so// dbang phyug dam pa gang la ltung bas me reg cing // gang gi mchog
137a1(skyes rabs): tu zhi ba'i lam ni rnyed pa ste// zhi ba brnyes pa de ni gus pas mthong nas su// de ring 'jig rten gnyen 'dun med cing gus pa 'dra// 'joms par 'dod cing stobs ni rab zhugs bdud kyang ni// sde dang bcas byas
137a2(skyes rabs): gang ni thub par mi nus pa// 'joms par 'dod cing stobs zhugs bdud kyis de ring ni// de ni bdud kyis sbyor las 'joms par nus par gyur// 'byung po rnams ni thams cad rnams ni 'dus pa rnams// sdug bsngal rnams kyis
137a3(skyes rabs): zil non lha dang bcas pa rnams// 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa gang rnams zad pa ma yin zhing // de ltar mchog tu mya ngan 'das pa thob ma yin// skye dgu'i rnams kyi snang mdzad gang gis 'jig rten ni// nye bar skye ba me
137a4(skyes rabs): long bzhin du gzigs pa ste// rgyang ring du 'am nye bar mtho ris su 'am mthar// lha yi rna bas sgra ni rnam par thos pa'o// bar snang dag la skar ma'i khang par 'dzegs pa ste// si la rab tu zhugs kyang thig pa ma yin zhing // tshu la rab tu
137a5(skyes rabs): gshegs kyang nub pa ma yin lo// sku yis rnam par 'gyur ba mang po rnam mdzad do// de rnams de rnams gnas rnams lam 'gros lam na bzhin// gang gis skye ba du ma rnams kyang dran pa ste// yid kyi pha rol rnams kyi yid kyi
137a6(skyes rabs): spyod pa rnams// dbang po las 'das sna tshogs rnams kyang mkhyen pa'o// thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs thams cad mkhyen pa des// zag pa thas cad bcad cing bya ba thams cad mdzad// ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs thams cad
137b1(skyes rabs): rnam spangs nas// ye shes de nyid kun nas brnyes nas gzims par gyur// skyes bu rnams ni rno ba'i sems rnams btul ba ste// rno ba ma yin blo rnams rim gyis drag par mdzad// rigs las chos kyi nyes pa spang bar
137b2(skyes rabs): mdzad pa ste// 'chi med ched du chos ni su yis ston par 'gyur// steng dang bral ba'i 'jig rten nyam thag pa la ni// zhi ba'i ched du chos kyi 'thor ma su yis ster// thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan las rang gi don mdzad
137b3(skyes rabs): nas// gzhan gyi nyon mongs dra ba su yis byed par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gzhol ba'i 'jig rten dag gi ni// zhi ba'i ched du ye shes dam pa su yis smra// shes pa med par gzhol ba'i 'jig rten dag gi ni// dge
137b4(skyes rabs): ba'i ched du ye shes dam pa su yis smra// ji ltar nyin mor byed pa 'od zer med pa dang // ji ltar chu bo sin d+hu 'babs pa med pa dang // sa bdag rgyal srid dang ni rnam par 'bral ba'o// de ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten mkhyen
137b5(skyes rabs): pas rnam par dman// blo yis rig pa bzhin du bde bas dbyings bzhin du// dpal gyis mi skyong bzhin du bzod pas chos bzhin du// de bzhin skyes bu mchog gis rnam par dman pa ni// 'gro ba de ni yod pa dang nI
137b6(skyes rabs): med pa nyid// ji ltar kha lo sgyur bas shing rta bor ba dang // skye ba 'dzin pas gru dang tshul gyis sde dang ni// tshong dpon gyi ni tshong pa sman pas nad pa ste// de bzhin 'jig rten bde bar gshegs pa rnam par dman// dbyar tha dad ni
138a1(skyes rabs): ston dang mkha' la sprin med na// rlung gis kyang ni mkha' la bsnyen pa med pan 'tsho bar 'dod pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ji lta ba// de ltar thar 'dod rnams kyi nga ni nyam thag 'di// de ltar dam pa'i don mdzad dgra bcom yin na yang //
138a2(skyes rabs): byed pa shes pa nyid kyi bla ma la zhugs pa// de ni chags bral yin kyang srid pa'i skyon rnams dang // ston pas yon rnams la ni mang po rnams smras so// de nas chags bral mi rnams mchi ma 'thon pa ste// ston pa btang nas dge slong tshogs//
138a3(skyes rabs): no mya ngan dang // 'jig rten 'god pa'i bdag nyid can zhes rab bzung nas// bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams ni brtan las ma g.yos so// de nas dus kyi dbang gis gyang rnams kyis thos nas// gud pa'i dbang gis skyen par 'thon zhing
138a4(skyes rabs): song ba ste// khra yis stobs kyi zil mAnan khrung khrung rnams bzhin du// kyai hud 'o rgyal zhes ni nyam thag 'thon pa'o// mun pa rab tu rgyas phyir thub pa rab gzims pa// nyi ma 'od med bzhin du de rnams kyis mthong nas// seng ge khyu
138a5(skyes rabs): mchog dmugs tshe ba lang rnams bzhin du// gus pas drag tu cho nges btab cing dus pa'o// chos dga' chos kyi bla ma rab tu zhi ba ni// gus pa ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji lta bar// 'o dong 'bod cing mchi mas mig bcom de rnams
138a6(skyes rabs): kyis// dpal ldan dam pa 'ga' zhig 'di ni smras pa'o// gang zhig son pa'i 'jig rten gnyid tshe rab sad pa// 'di de mthar thug gzam mal la ni gzims pa ste// chos ni rnam par 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di de ni// mchod
138b1(skyes rabs): sbyin mtha' na dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bzhin du brtul// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma nges par blo gsal zhing // brtson 'grus tshad gdungs ye shes 'od zer stong ldan pa// nub par gyur tshe mi shes mun pa rnam bcom nas//
138b2(skyes rabs): 'jig rten dag na slar yang mun pa 'di mdzad do// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gzigs na su// da ni nges par 'jig rten migri ni bsgribs pa ste// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho chen po rgod pa'i dba' rlabs las// 'dren mdzad
138b3(skyes rabs): zam pa 'di ni nges par de ni rgud// de ltar 'di na kha cig snying rje bar zlas shing // gzhan rnams shing rta'i rta rnams dud pa bzhin du sems// gzhan rnams skad bton gzhan rnams swa la 'gyel ba ste// bya ba de rnams de rnam
138b4(skyes rabs): sems can dbang gi byas// de nas dus su gser gyis spras shing sna tshogs pa// mche ba rin thang chen po longs ma spyad pa'i khyogs// gyad rnams du bzhin drang srong la ni glang chen gyi// lag pa dang mtshungs lag pa rnams
138b5(skyes rabs): ni bcug pa'o// de nas dus dang mthun pa'i cho ga byas nas su// de la phreng ba yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs dang // che ba dri mchog nga ba rnam kyis de sgra kyis mchod cing // de nas dga' dang gus pas mtha' dag bzung ba'o// de nas
138b6(skyes rabs): shing bzhon lus can gzhon nu ma rnams kyis// gdu bu rab 'khrol zangs mdog lag pa rnams kyis ni// glog gi 'phan rnams ngag gas sprin ni dkar po bzhin// 'di la rin thang mchog gi bla bre bzung ba'o// de bzhin
139a1(skyes rabs): mi rnams kha cig dag gis gdugs rnams ni// phreng ba dkar po ldan rnams kun nas bzung ba ste// kha cig dag gis gser gyi yo byad dang ldan pa'i// rnga yab dkar po rnams ni rnam par g.yab pa'o//
139a2(skyes rabs): de nas khyu mchog rnams kyis bzhin du ngal ba yis// mig dmar gyud rnams ngag gis khyogs ni bzung ba ste// sil snyan rnams ni rna ba'i yid du 'ong ba rnams// dbyar dus chu gter bzhin du mkha' la rab tu grags//
139a3(skyes rabs): phyogs kyi glang po'i dbang po rnams kyi bskul ba yi// mdzes pa dang ni rtsub gyur shing rnams las bzhin du// me tog pad+ma la sogs de rnams de rnams ni// lha yi me tog rnams ni lha nas lhung bar 'gyur// dbang po'i
139a4(skyes rabs): glang po las skyes glang po che rnams kyis// nor gnas snying po'i chu skyes pad+ma rnams dang ni// man dA ra yi me tog 'bab bcas chags pa rnams// chu thigs zer mas 'thor ba rnams kyis mngon par 'thor// de nas dga'
139a5(skyes rabs): ba'i tshal skyes lus mchog ldan pa yi// n+dan dmar po'i ro ni rnam par dul ba dang // 'bad pas ma bsgrubs bgro ba rnams ni dkar po rnams// dri za'i bu mo rnams kyis yang dag 'thor ba'o// rab tu g.yo ba'i ba dan
139a6(skyes rabs): rnams ni bzung ba ste// phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bkram pa ste// sil snyan rgya chen rnams kyis rjes su 'gro ba ste// zhi ba'i ched du zhi ba'i lam nas khyogs te drangs// gus pa dang ldan gyang rnams kyis te yongs bzung
139b1(skyes rabs): nas// thub pa'i mthu las lan brgyar mngon par phyag 'tshal zhing de yi rnam par nyams la kun nas ngu ba ste// grong khyer gyis ni dbus nas yongasu drangs pa'o// klu yi sgo nas zhugs te phyi rol byung nas ni// chu bo gser ldan zhes pa
139b2(skyes rabs): yang dag rgal nas su// cod pan zhes bya'i mchod rten gyi ni rtsa ba ru// grags pas bsags pa de rnams kyis byas so// de nas shun pa 'dab ma dri bzangs a ka ru// tsan dan e la klu rnams kyis bsags bsags pa ru// mya
139b3(skyes rabs): ngan las ni sbrul bzhin dbugs rgyu de rnams ni// brtan min mig can rnams kyis thub pa'i sku bzhugaso// de nas lan gsum bkod kyang se yi sgron ma yis// dri tshe drang srong chen po'i bsags pa ma 'bar te// bab med ldan
139b4(skyes rabs): pa gzhu ni rnam par 'khrugs pa yoM// me ning rang bzhin sa yi bdag po'i dpal bzhin no// lam dag tu ni rnam par 'ong ba'i 'od bsrung ni// rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis sems ni gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
139b5(skyes rabs): gdungs tshangs pa lta 'dod de// gang gi mthu las me yis 'bar ba ma yin no// de nas de tshe bla ma blta ba'i don du ni// der ni dge slong sbyin par nye bar song ba na// thub pa mchog la rab tu btud pa byas pa ni// de ma thag tu e ni
139b6(skyes rabs): rang nyid 'bar bar gyur// nyon mongs rnams kyis ma tshig thub pa'i sku gdung la// lpags pa sha dang spu dang cha shas rnam tshig nas// mar dang rlum dang bud shing yongasu rgyas na yang // me yis rul ba tshig par nus pa ma yin no//
140a1(skyes rabs): spyan/ de nas padrug byed chen po 'das pa'i di rnams / d+hum rmugs ni dang byur+ya byas nas dus su sa/ na bar bsnang rlung byu nums drug slong Sh+Te bu/ gsar gyi zlum pa rnams kyis rab tu spyan tham// du
140a2(skyes rabs): ri bo chen po'i rin chen khams bzhin du// dge legs gang po chen po rnams ni 'dzin pa ste// mtho ris dag na la lha yi gtso bo'i khams bzhin du// khams ni me yis log par sbyor ba ma yin nyid// byams pas yong su rnam par bsgoms
140a3(skyes rabs): papa 'di rnams ni// 'dod chags me yis tshig pas rnam par spangs pa ste// de yi gus pa'i dbang gis bzung ba'i gdung rus rnams// bsil ba yin kyang bdag cag rnams kyi yod rnams sregs// sred pa 'joms mdzad gang gi mthu
140a4(skyes rabs): las khyab 'jug gi/ mkha' lding gis kyang khur bar nus pa ma yin pa// 'jig rten dag na mtshungs med de yi rus pa rnams// mi ru gyur pa kho bo cag gis khur bar bgyi// e ma 'jig rten chos ni nges par stobs ldan te// chos la
