258a4(skyes rabs): rnam par 'joms pa dang / nyon mongs pas nga ro 'don cing mya ngan 'dun cang mya ngan byed cing ngu bu dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs du mas sdug bsngal brgya stong phrag mang po myong ngo // de dag ga du ji lta bar
258a5(skyes rabs): 'gyur zhes kyang gsung so// kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / snying rje rje skad zer ba dang / ral gri rnon po thogs pa'i gshin+da rje gtum pos rdeg cing gtub pa dang / mnar med par skyes nas 'bar ba'i mos bsreg
258a6(skyes rabs): pad+mo de dag rab tu sangs nas chos kyi 'du shes ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ de bas na chos mnyan par bya ste/ phyis rjes su rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// yang gang dag 'di ltar phan tshun za ba dang / ded pa dang / skrag par byed
258b1(skyes rabs): ba dang / 'joms pa dang bcas shing za ba dang / ma la 'khrig pa spyod pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sre mo dang / ku ra dang / yi dgas dang / bag dang / ru ru dang / smr-i shi ta dang / gnag dang / spre'u dang / srin bu dang / phye ma lag
258b2(skyes rabs): dang / chu srin dang / ma he dang / glang po dang / glang dang / bug pa dang / byo rog dang / khrung khrung dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa dang / ce spyang dang / rnga me dang / bong bu la sogs par skyes nas/ ban 'dogs pa dang / blo
258b3(skyes rabs): gros dang / rtogs pa dang / dran pa med cing blun por spyod pa dang / bgrod par bya ba dang / bgrod par mi bya ba la bltos pa med cing dgra dang / dgra ma yin pa mi shes shing smra ba dang bral zhing rigs pa mi byed gdabal
258b4(skyes rabs): dang bral ba'i lus dang ldan pa de bas na/ de dag la yod chos kyi 'du shes ji lta skye bar 'gyur/ mgo dong mgrin pa dang kha dang rgyab la lcags kyu dang / rdo ba dang / dbyig pa dang / gnya'i shing la sogs pasgo nye bar sdug
258b5(skyes rabs): bsngal zhing / skrag cing 'bros pa dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / T+wAMg 'chos dang / 'greng pa dang / rnam pa sna tshog pa'i do du ma sdug bsngal brgya brag du ma nyisu myong ga/ dri dag gang du ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so// dgun gyi
258b6(skyes rabs): dus su rlung drag po dang / ba mo mi zad pas 'joms shing dbyar gyi dus su nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas gdungs par byed pa dang / phan tshun bsnams shing 'chi ba yis 'jigs pas 'jig rten rnams la rtag par skrag
259a1(skyes rabs): ba'i dud 'gro log par lhung ba'i srog chags la/ 'di ji ltar chos kyi 'du shes skye/ de bas na gus par chos mnyan par bya ste/ phyis rjes su red par mi 'gyur zhes bya'o// yang gang gi tshe bkres
259a2(skyes rabs): pa dang / skom pas gdungs shing lus bsregs pa'i rnam pa lta bu dang / mgrin pa dang / rkan dang / lce dang / mchu skams shing / snying dang / mrig dang / log pa dang / rkang pa dang / khrag dang / sha dang / rus pa dang /
259a3(skyes rabs): gzhung pa dang / rgyu ma dang / nang grol rnams chung ba lta bur skams pa dang / mchil ma dang skyugs pa zas su za ba mas bsregs pa lta bu'i lus kyi rnam pa dang ldan pa/ snang ba med pa'i mun par gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba
259a4(skyes rabs): zos pas gos shing pags pa lo brgya phrag du mar zas skom dang bral ba nyon mongs pa rab tu 'bar zhing gcig gnod pas skrag cing sdug bsngal ba/ shing dang bong ba dang dbyug pos rdeg pas skom bzhin du srung
259a5(skyes rabs): pas/ rim par dpung med par skom pas sdug bsngal ba/ bsod nams dman pa/ gdong rang gis sgras g.yogs pa/ dur khrod mi bzang par gnas pa/ lo brgya stong phrag du mar sdug bsngal brgya stong phrag
259a6(skyes rabs): du mar nyams su myong ba/ de dag dus gang du ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur zhes kyang gsungs so// bkres pa dang skom pas skams shing / lus me 'bar ba drag po'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ sgal bu rnams ni nga grol gyis
259b1(skyes rabs): stong pas ri'i khrod du lta bu/ nang khrol nyams pas g.yo ba dang bral ba/ kha khab kyi mig ltar phra ba/ sgra'i tshogs chen po rtsub cing gyen du brdzes pa/ dge ba cung zad kyang med pas/ mi dge bas yi dgas kyi 'jig
259b2(skyes rabs): rten du skye ste/ de bas nu gus par chos mnyan par bya ste/ phyis rje su rnyed par mi 'gyuraro zhes bya'o// yang gang gi tshe mtha' 'khob tu skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang / rab tu dran pa dang / bcugs pa dang / blo gros dang //
259b3(skyes rabs): rtogs po dang bral bas spyod cing lo brgyar bltos pa med do// de dag dus gang gi tshe zhi bar 'gyur zhes kyang gsungs so// yang gang gi che mtha' na gnas pa dang / glen gnas pa dang / ri khrod dang / shul pa dang /
259b4(skyes rabs): bar sig pa dang / rta ka bo dang / mu kha 'jam pa dang / kur ba pa dang / kha sha bA dang / ra ma tha ba dang / bug na ba dang / tsa ra tha ba dang / tanga? ka na pa dang / lwa sha na ba dang / hor dang / ha dAs ga pa dang / gnas ldan pa dang /
259b5(skyes rabs): ya man pa dang / a tra ba dang / dri ci la ba dang / rna can pa dang / cin pa dang / mi tshangs pa la sogs pa'i yul du skyes pas/ gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dus thams cad du mi rgyu bar 'di ltar de dge ni skyes
259b6(skyes rabs): bu'i gzugs tsam rten pa yin te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba ltar bya ba yin pa ni mi shes so// khyi lta bur za bo dang / skrag pa dang / 'dod pa spyod pa mkhas pa'i 'du shes tsam mo// gzhan yang spo ba'i rtog pacom
260a1(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa dang / rkyen gyi khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang phrag dog dang ldan par spyod pa de dag dus gang gi che zhi bar 'gyur zhes gsung so// mtha' 'khob pa'i yul na gnas pa gang yin pa mtha' 'thob tu
260a2(skyes rabs): skyes pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems mi shes pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa/ mtha' 'khob pa'i yul na gnas pa gang yin pa/ thos pa dang dul ba dang / dka' thub dang / shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med
260a3(skyes rabs): bos/ dud 'gro rnams dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// 'di ltar 'di lta bu dang bral zhing mi'i gzugs tsam du zad de chos mnyan par ji ltar nus/ legs pa'i blo gros dang bral zhing / mi bzod pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa yin// /
260a4(skyes rabs): de bas na chos mnyan pa la gus par bya ste/ phyis rje su rnyed par mi 'gyuraro zhes bya'o// yang gang gi tshe 'di ltar ma da ra'i rtse mo gnas shing / lus rgyas shing / dga' ba dang mdzes shing / gsal ba 'dod pa grub cing phun
260a5(skyes rabs): sum tshogs pa bsdus pa mchog tu gyur pa/ pad+ma dang / ut+pa la sna tshogs pa'i mchog dang / shing sna tshogs pa'i grib ma bsil ba sna tshogs pa'i bya dang / ngur pa'i skad snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / chu'i rgyun drag tu 'bya ba//
260a6(skyes rabs): skyed mos tshal du nyams dga' bas brgyan pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa 'dod pa rtse gcig tu byed pa'i bya bas rtag tu g.yengs pas phyag 'tshal zhing rab tu 'khod pa ni rol zhing rtse mos bskyod pa sna tshog
260b1(skyes rabs): ba byed cing / lta bu'i bde ba du ma nyams su myong bu de dag dus gung gi tshe zhi bar 'gyur zhes kyang gsung so// mtho ros bud myed dang dga' bas mtshams sbyor zhing / g.yengs nas de dang de dag gi rtsa zhing / mnA da ra'i/
260b2(skyes rabs): lha mo dang rol cing glang po dang dpa' bo'i pad+ma'i rten pa la gzhon nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po dang skyed mos tshal du dga' bas bag mo de bas chags pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bdud rtsil
260b3(skyes rabs): myang bar ji ltar byed de bas na chos nyan pa la gus par bya ste/ phyis rjesu rnyed par mi 'gyuraro zhes bya'o// de yul dbus su skyes kyang blta ba dang mnyan pa dang / myang ba dang / dbang po ma tshang bas/ glang po lta bur brda
260b4(skyes rabs): mtshon pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams las yang bya ba'i blo dang bral ba/ gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhi bar dus gong gi tshe yang 'gyur zhes kyang gsung so// thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung ji ltar dbang po dang bral
260b5(skyes rabs): bas mnyan par nus/ thos pa'i sgo med pas byams pa dang / snying rje don du gnyer ba las log par gyur ga mi'i brjod pa dang bral ba gyur pa/ rang nyid kyis nyes pa skyod dru ba sugs kyi glang po lcags kyu med pas dregs pa mthul bas yan
260b6(skyes rabs): pa yin te/ de bas na chos gus par mnyan por bya ste phyis rjes su rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes bya'o// gal te yul dbus su skye su zin kyang / yang dag po'i lta ba'i mig log par lta bas g.yogs pa'i blos sangs rgyas
261a1(skyes rabs): yongs su sbyangs shing // rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad la skur pa 'debs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad mngon par dga' ba dang bral ba/ nyes pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi nang la gso ba mi byed pa lta
261a2(skyes rabs): bu'i bsam pa phyin ci log gis bya ba byed pa'i dumyal ba nyid do// de dug dus gang gi tshe nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhes kyang gsung so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma yis// 'gro ba mthar pa smin mdzad pa// gang dag yod kyi bu ga
261a3(skyes rabs): gnas pa'i// rmongs pa'i mun chen mi sel ba// mau khyer dang 'dra'i mu stegs rnams// log lha'i yid ldan de dag gis// sel bar nus pa ma yin de// nyi bdun gyis kyang sel mi 'gyur// de bas nA gus par chos mnyan
261a4(skyes rabs): par bya ste/ phyis rjesu rnyed par mi 'gyu ro zhes bya'o// bcom ldan thug ni rnam rgyas pa'i// sangs rgyas nyi ma ma byung bar// nyi ma med par pad+ma bzhin// zla ba ma shur bar du ni// ku s+yA ta yi nags bzhin du// gdul bya yi ni/
261a5(skyes rabs): pad+ma rnams// rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ma yin// mun pa yis ni mig bsgribs pas// rgyal po yi ni lam bzhin dang // gru skye med pa'i gru bzhin dang // tshong dpon spangs pa'i zong thogs bzhin// byang chu'i phyogs kyi
261a6(skyes rabs): chos rnams kyi// gru la kun nas ma zhol par// de ni rtse gcig sems kyis su// rnam par grol ba'i dga' mi myong // khro bral bla ma thar la mos// 'chi med grong khyer mchog tu lta ba// nyon mongs kun gyi gnyen po ni// skad cig
261b1(skyes rabs): gcig la dmigs pa yis// zhi ba'i bde ba'i lam la sbyor// 'gro ba'i na mkha'i tshe dkyil du// sangs rgyas nyi ma ma shar bar// bsgom spangs gdul bya'i pad+ma la// ye shes nyi mas rgyas ma yin// ngan 'gro'i dus ni thaMd du/
261b2(skyes rabs): chos smra ba yis gsal byas pas// gang zhig 'di la brten pa yi// 'gro de dge ba'i bshes kyi thul// mi rnams thob par gyur pa ni// ri rtse glog 'gyu lha g.yo zhing // khyon lta bur ni g.yo ba dang // mi bzang mi khom brgyad kyi rtser// rab tu
261b3(skyes rabs): 'jigs pa'i gza' yis ni// ming pa las ni mthar gyur cing // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa yis// sangs rgyas gsung gi rlung bzhin gyi// dam chos gru la ma zhon par// gang zhig pha rol 'gro 'dod pa// blo
261b4(skyes rabs): gros shin tu dman pa yin// mi yis skye ba 'bras bu med// mi khom pa brgyad kyi gtam/ slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgyu gar gyi mkhan po shrI a dza~M te b+ha dra dang /
261b5(skyes rabs): zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur// @# shad rin chen pa me tog slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ su b+hU ShaM ta rat+na ka ra raN+Da ka ka b+h+rUM/ bod skad du/ leg
261b6(skyes rabs): par bshad pa rin po che za ma tog lta bu'i ga tam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang gis glang chen mchog 'dra'i sems kyi lcags kyus ma yin ye shes lcags kyus btab nas thul// 'dod
262a1(skyes rabs): chags srun pa'i dmag tshogs ma yis ma yin ye shes ste yis ma lus skyegs// bdud kyi stobs rnams mnAd+has ma yin blo gyis rab ni bzong ba'i mtshan gyis bzlog/ gus la bsnams
262a2(skyes rabs): snang smra m+b+ha d+ha mam+b+ha nanu nga de la phyug / // rnams thub pa kham pa d+ma // rlo pa skyeng 'i d+ma/ d+hag tu snadun no ga /
262a3(skyes rabs): gang gis dul sbyin yang dge sdom// rgyags tshigs mang po ma bsdogs pa// mi bzang 'khor ba'i mya ngan du// 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal thob// mi rnams thob pa rnyed dka' ba// bar snang glog 'gyu lta bu yin// srid
262a4(skyes rabs): pa zad byed mkhas pa yin// srid pa rnam su phyin pa byas// yang dge mi nyid thob pa ni// glog dang rba ltar mi brtan pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yis// bsod nams rje su skyes bus brten// da ltar mi rnams thob pa
262a5(skyes rabs): ltar// gang gis mthu yis phyis kyang thob// bsod nams mchog ni gang yin pa// de ni bde ba'i rgyu yin te/ gzugs dang gtong ba rigs mtho sogs// yon tan sna tshogs ldan par 'gyur// bsod nams de nyid
262a6(skyes rabs): mdza' bo gcig/ 'khor ba kun tu 'gro ba gnyen// de ltar 'dir ni bsod nams kyis// phyi phyir yon tan phun sum tshogs// gang tshe dpal gnas thob bsten pas// de bsdigs 'jig rten bdag po nyid// phan pa'i/
262b1(skyes rabs): phyogs su 'dren byed pa// bsod nams de nyid spel bar gyis// bsod nams che gyis sdig dga' spongs// yul la g.yo ba nyid kyi rta// rtag tu phyin ci log zhi gyis// dug stobs mi bzad 'chi sbrul gyis// sos
262b2(skyes rabs): mo bzung ba'i ba'i bar du ni// rtag tu khyed kyis thub dbyung bzhin// gzhan pan+da la ni mngon dga' gyis// bsod nams la spro ba bskyed pa'i gtam ste dang po'o// // rgya mtsho gnye' shing bu ga
262b3(skyes rabs): ru// rul sbal mgrin pa chud pa bzhin// yud tsam 'dzom pa ngo mtshar che// mi brtan 'di la yang dag sems// rab tu zhi ba'i grong khyer lam// ngan song 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa// de ni thub pa'i dbang pos
262b4(skyes rabs): gsungs// skad cig tsam yang thob par dka'// mi khom brgyad kyi nyes pa spangs mi// gang zhig dkon la bskal pa brgyus// da ltar bode thob mkhas pa yis// dam chos mnyan lo 'dir 'bad bya// dmyal bya yi
262b5(skyes rabs): dgas 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro dbang po ma tshang ba// 'chi med bla ma mtha' 'khob skyes// log par lta ba sel ba dang // thub dbang gsung rab bdud rtsi ni// skyes bu mkhas pas 'thung nus pa// shes rab 'od
262b6(skyes rabs): mnga' thub dbang ni// ma shar bar du yod ma yin// de phyir bya min spangs nas ni// bodag gi bya ba kun shes pas// 'phags mchog dam chos mnyan par byo// chos 'di la ni gang 'bad pa// de la yon tan
263a1(skyes rabs): kun yod 'gyur// thub dbang gsung las rin chen 'byung // mkhas pa 'di yis thog mar dga'// de ni gang gis thos pa kyang // rtag tu stobs ldan rnying ba yis// mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms par
263a2(skyes rabs): byed// bsams shing bsgoms na mthar thugs gsal// 'jigs bcas skye ba 'khor ba'i rgyun// nyon mongs ma lus rim gyis spongs// thams cad phun tshogs rtag pa'i gter// mi bzang 'khor ba'i rgyun 'joms
263a3(skyes rabs): shing // dz+nyA na med pa'i dga' byede thob// thos pas 'dir yid dri ma med// da ltas thub dbang gsung 'di soms// chos nyan pa la spro bskyed pa'i gtam te gnyis pa'o// / gang zhig thob nas
263a4(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yis// pha rol phyin pa'i sa bon bskrun// byang chub dpal gyi sa bon mchog/ yid bzhin nor bu las lhag pa'i// yon tan rgyun gyi mi rnams ni// su zhig 'dir de 'bras med byed// gang zhig
263a5(skyes rabs): dge bas phyug pa'i mi// bskal pa grangs med kyis thob nas// 'dir ni rmongs pas bsod nams gter// cung zad tsam yang mi gsog pa// de dag 'jig rten pha rol tu// mi bzang mya ngan khang par 'jug/
263a6(skyes rabs): rin chen gling phyin tshong pa ni// lag pa stong par rang khyim bzhin// dge bcu las kyi lam med par// phyi nas yang ni thob ma yin// mi ma thob par de bar ni// ci ltar de bde sdug bsngal nyid// de los pha rol slus yod min
263b1(skyes rabs): de ltas mchog tu rmongs pa med// 'di 'bru khom pa thob nas ni// bsod nams tshogs mi gsog pa// skad cig gtsug las sdig spyad nas// munar med par ni bskal par gnas// skye ba du mar sdig spyad pas// ba/
263b2(skyes rabs): 'gro dka' lta ci zhig smos// rgya mtsho cher g.yengs gnya' shing gi/ bu gar rus sbal mgrin chung ltar/ mi ni shin tu thob dka' bar// de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// mi'i skye bo dkon bI ga taM ste gsum pa'o//
263b3(skyes rabs): zas skoms mal stan gos mchog dang // phreng ba gnas dang rgyan rnams dang // grags pa yon tan khyad 'phags pa// de kun sprin las byung bar gsungs// dgra snyan mdzes dang longs spyod ldan// khyad par
263b4(skyes rabs): 'phags ldan gzugs yangs pa dang // tshog snyan gzi ldan yid 'ong dag/ grags dang nad med che dag ste// yid 'ong sdug pa de dang ngo de// sbyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ste// rta dang dar dang glang po dang // rnga yab gdugs
263b5(skyes rabs): dang me tog tshogs// khang bzang mdzes dang rol mor bcas// sgra snyan rol mo dang ldan zhing // me tog phyeng ldan bud med dang // zas dang rin chen phreng ba gnas// gur gum grong yul lha yi gnas// rdzogs sangs nyid
263b6(skyes rabs): dang sangs rgyas te// sbyin pa dpag bsam ljon shing gi/ 'di dang 'bras bu yin par gsungs// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'jam// sgyus ring dri ma med pa dang / bud med gang zhig mig 'grub cing // sked pa 'og bag gas
264a1(skyes rabs): bar ldan// dmar zhing mdzes pa'i gos ldan zhing // nu 'bur rgyas par rnam par g.yo// smin ma mdzes ldan da de dag/ de dag sor sna'i sgo phye nas// smyon pa btang la rgyas par 'gyur// mgul pa/
264a2(skyes rabs): rnga mas brgyan pa'i rta// bzhon pa kha lo srab kyis skyogs// mi dbang glang chen+da dregs zhon nas// gags bsgrengs rgyan ldan 'khor bcas dang // 'gro ba thal mo sbyar byas nas// rtag tu mchod cing gsol 'debs pa// snga
264a3(skyes rabs): mar 'di 'dra sbyin pa yis// 'bras bu yin par thu bo pas gsungs// gser gyi gdu bu rdo rjes spras// dpung rgyan cod pan rin chen bkod// sa bdag mu tig phreng bas brgyan// rtag tu seng ge'i khri la gnas// 'ab sa sogs
264a4(skyes rabs): btsun mo'i 'khor brtson cing // rtse dra mo rtse bas rnam rol pa// seng ge lta bu'i rnam rol de// sbyin 'bras yin par thub pas gsungs// khang bzangs gser dang rin chen spros// gdugs drang rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas brgyan//
264a5(skyes rabs): pi waM rdza rngu rig byed sgrogs// rin chen rnams kyi 'od 'bar ba// brgya byin pade sogs dgu' spyod cing // lha mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor ldan de// snga mar 'di 'dra byin pa yi// 'bras bu yin par thub pas gsungs// sbyin
264a6(skyes rabs): pa'i skye bo'i yid du 'ong // mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu bsten// phyogs rnams dri med phreng bas khyab// snyan pa'i gnas ni de dang der// 'dir ni dri med nye bar gnas// lus dang bral nas lha rnams su// sgog bral sna
264b1(skyes rabs): tshogs btung ba bsil// me tog sna tshogs mgo lcogs rgyas// dpag bsam gyi ni shing rnams skyes// tsan ngan la sogs kyis gang ba'i// skyed mos tshul dang ni mchog rnamasu// yun ring du nI bde spyod cing // lbu
264b2(skyes rabs): mo gzugs mchog ldan pa yis// bsnyen bkur mchog tu byed par thob// sbyin pa zhes bya gter tshon te// rkun sogs mi khyor rjesu 'dred// smyon pas sems kyi ser sna dang // chags pa'i rul gyi dri ma 'khru// 'khor
264b3(skyes rabs): ba'i lam ni dub pa se la// sbyin pa gzhon pa du ma ste/ sbyin pa bde ba du ma'i rten// yang dag grogs mchog bde ba'i sgo// rked pa glaser gyi ska rigs ldan// ngag 'jam zur mig bzhin skyob mdzes// mig gis skyes
264b4(skyes rabs): ring sna drung gsan// me tog phreng bsdu skra bcings mdzes// gang zhig rang 'khor yan lag dang // rkang gnyis 'gro ba mdzes pa yi// zas gtsang gi ni phun sum tshogs// de drag sbyin pa'i 'bras yin zhes// bdag nyi
264b5(skyes rabs): chen pos bka' stsal te// ha sa ka ri'i dum+b+ha bu dAng // ut+pal gyis bsgos dri zhim la// bkris gser gyi snod du blugs// ban du ka dang zangs mdog dang // btung ba chung ma mna' skyel dro zhing // chung mA dang bcas yang yang
264b6(skyes rabs): 'thung // dga' ba'i bsam pas smra ba de'i// rgyu ni sbyin mchog bkra shis yin// zhi ba'ang sbyin pa'i yon tan te// mdzes pa 'dod pa bdag cag gis// sbyin pa 'di la 'bad par gyis// srid gsum mi bzad 'jigs chen la//
265a1(skyes rabs): sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog med// sbyin pa'i gtam ste bzhi pa'o// // 'gro ba gang zhig mdzes yid 'ong // gzugs dang rig dang gnyen dang stobs// bde bar mthong ba gang yin pa// bsod nam
265a2(skyes rabs): bzo bos de byas par// 'di skad mkhas pa rnams kyis bsha // gzhan phan byed pa'i skyes bu yis// bsod nams dang mnyam yod ma yin// rim pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i// rgyal mtshan dkar po mngon mtho btsu
265a3(skyes rabs): rtaglang rkang thang shing rta yi// dpung gi tshogs kyis nges 'khrug cing // yu ba sna tshogaso mdzes pa yi// rnga yab rnams kyis g.yo ba byed la// bsod nams lhag pa dbang sgyur zhing // sa rnams la ni spyod byed de// dar
265a4(skyes rabs): drang ka shi du ku la// sna tshogs gos dang mu tig phreng // gser dang nor dus ya ni lag brgyan// gang dag lnga 'dre'i skyes bu dpal// bsod nams bzhon pa la zhon pa// de bas yin par shes par gyis// shin tu tshe ring
265a5(skyes rabs): rigs btsun zhing // lus mdzes nad kyi 'jigs pa med// nor mang g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs// bsod nams rnam smin chen po yin// gang yang 'khor los sgyur ba mchog/ bu ni dpa' bo stong dang ldan// rgya
265a6(skyes rabs): mtsho'i mtshams kyi sa la dbang // de dag bsod nams rin po che'i// 'bras bu yang pa chen po yin// sna tshogs pad+ma'i stan la 'dug/ lha dang lha dbang rtag phyag 'tshal// brjid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis gnon//
265b1(skyes rabs): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten snang byed pa// de dag nyid dang bsod nams las// gang la lha klu lha min grub// dri za gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// mchog tu gyur pa'i tshogs rnams ni// rtag tu lta dbang mchod byed pa// de ni bsod nams rin po
265b2(skyes rabs): che'i// 'bras bu yangs pa chen po yin// gzugs dang brtson 'grus bzo rnams ni// dbang med yang nas mi rnams ni// las kyi rlung gis mngags nas ni// 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba na// bsod nams gcig pu mchog
265b3(skyes rabs): yin te// rje su 'gro zhing bde ba 'char// bsod nams gzhan gyi 'phrog mi nus// de phyir bsod nams gter gyi mchog/ gang gi stobs kyi ri rab kyang // phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba'i// 'jigs pa'i bskal pa'i rlung
265b4(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// des kyang bsod nams 'jigs mi nus// 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i chu yis ni// lcags kyang dbang med 'jig byed pa// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu rnams kyis// bsod nams gzhu bar nus ma yin// 'od zer rab tsha gsal
265b5(skyes rabs): yi// nyi ma bdun shar me rnams kyis// sa rnams sreg par byed mod kyi// bsod nams gcig pu sreg ma yin// bsod nams kyi gtam ste lnga po'o// / sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhengs gsol ba// dang
265b6(skyes rabs): por mya ngan sel bar byed// rtsod pa kun spangs mthong na dga'o// skal ldan gter tshogs dpal dang ldan// lus stobs ldan zhing snyan pa dang // gzi brjid ldan zhing gzugs mdzes la// gsung rab kun la mkhas gyur cing //
266a1(skyes rabs): dbang po'i rta ni thams cad thul// blo ldan gtong dang ldan par 'gyur// bcom ldan sku gzugs mchod rten la// phra rab rdul ni ji snyed song // de skyed sa 'og sa steng 'dir// de snyed rgyal por nges
266a2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// gzugs dang gzugs med ting 'dzin 'grub// thams cad bde bar ma lus spyod// tha mar skye rga'i rgud spangs nas// de dag byang chub go 'phangs thob// bde gshegs sku gzugs bzhengs gasnol pa// mtshan
266a3(skyes rabs): bzang gis mtshan 'khor los sgyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan lus mdzes thob// nyes pa'i dgro 'joms rgyal bar 'gyur// dbang po rnams ni ma tshang med// dpal ldan ngan 'gro rnams las ring // mi yi rigasu skye 'gyur/
266a4(skyes rabs): zhing // ngag ni brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// skye bar thos dang dran ldan brtanA// mngon par 'dod par 'byung 'gyur zhing // gnas la mngon par dad pa dang // 'dod chags sogs kyis gnod pa med// 'di rgyu la rdzogs//
266a5(skyes rabs): ba'i byang chub kyi// khyad 'phags legs pa'i gzhung la brta na// gang 'di rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bzhengs// sangs rgyas su 'am mchod rten nAm// bzhengs byed srog dang ldan pa de// bran dang dbul por mi skyo zhing //
266a6(skyes rabs): mngag gzhug par min rigs dmar min// dbang po rnams ni tshang bar 'gyuraro// sku gzugs kyi gtam ste drug pa'o// / dri zhim sna tshogs kyis bsgos pas// bde bar gshegs la 'khrus gsol
266b1(skyes rabs): ba/ me tog d+ho yos yan lag mdzes// rab tu dga' ba'i yod kyis su// rol mo'i sgra ni snyan pa yis// ngal gyis 'bab dang stegs 'grun brjod// gser gyi rang bzhin pad+ma yi// ge sar rdul gyis khyab pa ru// khrus
266b2(skyes rabs): gsol gang zhig mchod byed pa// de dag rnyog pa thams cad kyis// dri ma bkrus nas thar pa thob// lha yi bu mo nu 'bur rgyas mthong zhing // skeng pa la 'bab g.yo ba dang // 'dzam bu'i chu 'dra'i pad+ma'i ge sngar gyi// rdul
266b3(skyes rabs): rnams gtor ba yis ni dri zhim la// dal gyis 'bab pa'i nang du lha yi tshogs// rgyun tu chu rnams la ni rtse byed pa// gong zhig dga' ba sna tshogs dri zhim chus// rje btsun khrus gsol ba yi 'bros de yin// gla rtsig
266b4(skyes rabs): pur tsan dan gur gum bsgos// dri zhim chu ni yid 'ong ba// kha dog dka res bye brag gis// yid 'ong thub pa khrus gsol 'dir// sems kyi dri ma spangs nas ni// de ni 'gro ba'i bla mar 'gyur// khrus kyi gtam ste bdun blo//

267a2(skyes rabs): brgyud pa'o// / rta glang rkang thang shing rta dang // rin chen sna bdun rnams dang ni// dpa' blo bu stong dang bcas par// mkha' la 'khor los sgyur 'gro zhing // zla ba lta bu'i gdugs kyis ni// nyi ma'i 'od zer
267a3(skyes rabs): sgrib byed cing // 'bras bu mang la rgya che ba/ gdugs phul ba las byung ba yin// bung ba yid 'ong sgra yis bskyod// me tog g.yo ba 'khor bar bkod// kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim pa'o// me tog tshogs kyis ri mor

272a6(skyes rabs): rnams nang du rtag par ni// dri med mig ldan ro stong yangs// dga' zhing stan dang mal cha dang // zas dang snod du ldan pa yi// mi rnams sbyin pos yang dag 'thob// mi mchog gis ni nad pa dang // dman pa dang ni
272b1(skyes rabs): dbul ba rnams// snying rje can gyis sbyin btang bas// dpal ldan yang dag khyad 'phags 'gro// mi dbang brgya byin dang mnyam rtse// dga' zhing bu dang bran g.yogs bcas// zla ba dang 'dra bzhin gyi mchog/ mig
272b2(skyes rabs): yangs lus ni nyi ma bzhin// grags po snyan pa dgra dang ldan// mi dbang dgra yi stobs 'joms shing // bde ba thams cad thob pa ni// de yis rang gi bla ma dang // pha ma rnams la sbyin las byung // gang zhig rta dang shri
272b3(skyes rabs): rta glang // zhon la skye bo'i tshogs phyag 'tshal// gser gyi yu ba dang ldan pa// zla ba'i dbyingabasna dang ldan pa yis// nyi ma'i 'od zer zlog byed thogs// mi dbang mchog tu gyur pa ste/ 'khor los sgyur byed rgyal po
272b4(skyes rabs): yin// sa rnams dbang phyug dang bcas pa'i// gang zhig rgyal por gyur pa nAM// yang dag zhing la de dag gis// sbyin pa'i sa bon sgyings pa yi// yon tan mchog gi 'bras de yin// dman pa'i spyo lho sbyin pa yin/
272b5(skyes rabs): ma du byin yang 'bras bu nyung // yur ma tsher ma'i sgron bcus dang // rdo bA'i steng gri zhing rnams la// sa bon mang po btab pa bzhin// 'dod chags zhe stang gti mug spangs// yon tan gyis brgyan zhing la spyi / nyung
272b6(skyes rabs): du byin yod mang du 'byung // n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon bzhin// zhing gi gtam ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / gang gis chos kyi sbyin byin zhing // bri ba dang ni nyan pa dang // rtag tu de dag sems nyid dang /
273a1(skyes rabs): gal te yang drag sgom byed nA// skye ba dran pa rtag tu 'thob// gang zhig lha yi 'jig rten na// dpag bsam gyi ni shing gi mchog/ don rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa// lha tshogs bde ba'i
273a2(skyes rabs): mchog gyur pa// de ni ba mchog sbyin pa yin// rgya tsho ba yi 'bras bu yin// gang zhig l-I mngal du rdzogs par ni// gtsang zhing yid 'ong ro myong la// mar dang sbrang rtsi stobs dang ni// grang zhig 'o ma 'thung tshe yang // pad+ma'i
273a3(skyes rabs): ge sar mdungs ldan pa// khu lce'i dus gang yon par 'thung // skyes rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin te// bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang 'thung byed pa// de ni pa mchog btang las byung // seng ge'i khri ni rab dga' zhing // mdzes pa
273a4(skyes rabs): gus pas chos la ni// rim pa bzhin du des phul bas// gzhig par mi nus rdo rje'i gdan// rab mchog seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs// lha klu grub pa phyag 'tshal 'gyur// gser gyi snod du rtag tu der// ro ldan 'o ma blugs
273a5(skyes rabs): nas ni// mi yi mchog ni 'thung byed cing // dpal ldan phun sum tshogs pa dang / pad+ma'i mdog ldan bud med snyed// de ni ma he mchog btang yi nau// rtag tu nad pa nyam chung la// bzhon pa mchog ni sbyin pa dang // bla mra
273a6(skyes rabs): rnams ni mnyes byas nas// btsun zhing mi rnams kyis bstod 'gyur// gser gyi chas kyi brgyan pa yi// rta ni yid du 'ong ba la// mi mchog rtag tu zhon nas rgyu// shin tu ring ba'i yul rnams su// rdzu 'phrul gyis/
273b1(skyes rabs): ni 'gro byed pa// bzhon pa mchog ni byin pa yis// de lta bu yi mi ru 'gyur// do shal dang ni do shal phyed// 'og bag dang ni ldan pa yis// yid 'ong lha mo rnams la rtse// sum cu gsum bdag dang 'gran pa// ltos pa med
273b2(skyes rabs): par byin pa las// byung bar mkhas rnams rab tu bshad// bdud kyis zil gyis mi non cing // legs par gsungs pa rtag tu ni// bdud rtsi lta bur mnyan par gyis// sa gzhi lta bur chos kyi yum// nyon mongs dgra ni
273b3(skyes rabs): spong bar byed// 'khor ba'i bde ba nyams myong zhing // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi// rab mchog nyid ni thob par 'gyur// dub pa'i dus ni thams cad du// mkhas pa rnams ni phul ba yi// mtho ris phyin nas rtag tu dga'
273b4(skyes rabs): brgya byin dang ni lhan cig tu// rtag tu dga' ba myong bar byed// 'dir ni skyed mos tshal phul bas// sa tshogs pa yi shing rnams la// me tog dri zhim dang ldan zhing // mngon par mtho ba'i mi thob nas// skyed mos tshal rnams
273b5(skyes rabs): longs spyod ldan// chu bo rgal bar dka' ba yi// gnas su zam pa 'dzugs byed pa// mi de longs spyod dang ldan pa'o// mtho ris gnasu 'gro bar 'gyur// gser mdog lta bu'i lus dang ldan// nyams dga' rje do bu byed pa'i mi//
273b6(skyes rabs): mtho ris gnas ni thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di ru mir gyur na// rgyal po yi ni dga' bde thob/ khron pa dang ni bu nyen khang // sems can rnams ni brten pa dang // than pa grang ba skyob gyur pa// byed pa'i mi mchog gang
274a1(skyes rabs): yin pa// lha yi bde ba myong bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha ba yi// shin tu sdug bsngal ldan pa la// gang zhig gdugs nI sbyin byed pa// gdugs dang 'dra bar de dag ni// dgra tshogs las
274a2(skyes rabs): rgyal 'gyur zhing // rtag tu bde ba mchog dang ldan// mchil lham rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// sems can thams cad dag la ni// gus pa yas ni spyin byed pa// de dag bzhon pa mchog rnams la// lha dang mi yi 'jig
274a3(skyes rabs): rten du// yun ring zhon par skye bar 'gyur// yon tan rnams dang ni sgrogs pa yi// rgyal ba mchog gis bstod byed pa// thams cad dag ni bstod pa yis// lus kyis phyag ni 'tshal byed pa// b+h+ra mar bsten pa'i rig
274a4(skyes rabs): skye zhing // de dag so sor rigs pa 'thob// rdza rnga pi wang pya Ta has+dza// bde bar gshegs mchog mchod byed // mir gyur nAs ni dbyangs smyan laM// sgra ni shin tu spyan por 'os// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang lhan//
274a5(skyes rabs): bode bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// dga' bas srog shing 'dzugs byed cing // gdugs dang dril bu rnams dang ni// gdugs kyi phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de dag mir ni rgya che zhing // dpal ni phun sum tshogs
274a6(skyes rabs): pa 'thog/ mir gyur pa ni ma lus pa'i// bdag po nyid ni stobs dang ldan// dpung rgyan mu tig brgyan ldan pa// sa rnams sbyin par btang ba las// yin pa ru ni mkhas pa 'chad// mchod rten dang ni rgyal ba yi/
274b1(skyes rabs): sku mchog rnams ni bzhengs byed pa// gdugs lhun sku gdung 'jug byed pa// mtho ris yung dag 'dir thob nas// mi rnams kyis ni bstod par 'gyur// gang zhig dang por sangs rgyas la// sa dang lci bas byugs nas
274b2(skyes rabs): ni// me tog 'bras bu zas skom phul// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// rgyu lnga po'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rgyal chen mar me sna tshogs dang // dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang // bu ram la sogs btung ba rnams//
274b3(skyes rabs): dge 'dun la ni 'bul byed pa// de yang nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing // lho mo'i bde ba dag dang ldan// mchod rten gdung bcas gtsugi lag khang // mi gang 'bad pas nyen 'khor 'chug/ kun nas dri ma med byed pa// gser
274b4(skyes rabs): gyi kha dge 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag tu snang bya 'bul byed cing // grang dus gos dang khAng pa dang // rgyun dang bu mo tung ba byin// skye gnas rnam su bde ldan 'gyur// sa stengs du nI tshe ring zhing // thams cad nod las grol
274b5(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// mnyam pa med pa'i bde ba thob// de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan// lnga yi bde ba sna tshogs pa// nyam su myong zhing 'byung 'gyur ba// srog gcod spangs pa las yin par// nges par mkhas pa rnams kyi
274b6(skyes rabs): bstan// gzhan mthong brnab sems mi byed pa// chom rkun las ni dben gyur cing // rdzas ni yongasu slang bar byed// gser dang dpag med phun tshogs thob// rkun ma brgya phrag dag gis ni// mi dbang las ni dpral
275a1(skyes rabs): mi nus// chung ma gzhan la mi 'phyo zhing // legs bsrungasna chung ma nyams med rnyed// skye bar dgrar gyur cung zad med// 'dir ni 'jig rten yid ston cing // de la yid mi ches yod min// de dang der ni
275a2(skyes rabs): skye ba na// ut+pal sngon po lta bur nI// dri ldan yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs// de ni mi 'gyur kha dri zhim// rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ma yin// dam pa yi nI grogs ldan zhing // mi dbang gis ni gus pas mchod// bu dang chung ma byin
275a3(skyes rabs): dong ni// long spyod rgyun chen po yis// dbeg tu med pa'i bde 'thob pas// rtag tu phra ma spangs pas yon// yid du 'dri zhing sgra sbyin lnga// ngag ni snyan par 'osdu pa dang // rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang // mi rnams dang ni lce
275a4(skyes rabs): rnams su// de rgyal tshig ni rtsub mo dag/ mi de yis ni spangs pas yin// chos don dben pa dga' ba yin// smra ba de yi 'jig rten gyi// rtag tu mchog tu yid 'od 'gyur// yang yang mchod pa de yis 'thob// rin chen
275a5(skyes rabs): mang dang bzhon pas byug/ mngon mtho 'jig rten sna tshogs pa'i// bde ba mtha' yas myong bar 'gyur// bdag gzhan chags pa spangs pa yis// de 'dir 'dod chags chung 'gyur zhing // rtag tu longs spyod rgya chen ldan/
275a6(skyes rabs): ngag la dbang zhing grags ldan 'gyur// rab tu mdzes pa nyid thob cing // de ni rtag tu phyug cing bde// rgyal srid kyis mtho 'jig rten gyi// tshangs pa nyid ni 'thob 'gyur zhing // yang dag byams pa'i sems ljon po// dbang
275b1(skyes rabs): po yod pa'i mi ru skye// mtho ris thar 'bras bde ba thog/ yang dag rdzogs dang mi de ldan// glang phyir 'di dag thams cad ni// yang dag lta ba mchog tu ni// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu yin// dad dang blo gros dang ldan pa'i//
275b2(skyes rabs): bsod nams kyi no zhing mchog las// sa gsum bde ba rgya chen skye// de lta'i khyad par mi shos nas// yon tan rin chen thams cad kyi// gter du gyur pa'i dad pa ni// rtag tu de yis bsten par bya// dad pa yis
275b3(skyes rabs): ni ma bzhin du// dge ba rnams ni bskyed par bya// de bas thog ma ro skyes bu yis// yid kyis legs par bsten par bya// 'byung gnas dad pa spangs pa yis// dam chos rin chen byang chub phyogs// nges par bzung
275b4(skyes rabs): bar nus ma yin// rgyal po lus ni nyams pa yis// longs spyod 'bros las nyams pa ltar// dad pa'i dbang po las nyams na// de bzhin 'bras rnams thob ma yin// de phyir skyes bu mkhas pa ni// 'jig rten bde/
275b5(skyes rabs): gshegs byed 'dod pos// yid ni rab tu dang ba yis// rtag tu phan pa nyid du gyis// lhag mas nyes pa zhi ma yin// gzhan du dad pa dang ldan pa'i// nyes pa'i tshogs ni thams cad sreg/ dman zhing gos mong rmongs
275b6(skyes rabs): pa dang // lag pa na ni thod pa thogs// 'jig rten 'di na slong ba snang // sbyin pa med pa'i 'bras la ltos// tha dad khyim du slong zhing rgyu// rtag tu bkres par kun tu 'khor// gang zhig lus la lag rkyong la// khyi dang 'dra bar ring
276a1(skyes rabs): na gnas// kun tu 'jug cing slong ba la// phyir zlog nyung shas cha gcig kyang kwa gang zhig kha zla mi ster ba/ kha ni khab tsam sto ba rI// lus s+t+waM sgra yi go skyes ni// nyi ma'i 'od zer snang myin la// yi dwags skom
276a2(skyes rabs): gyis gdungs pa snang // 'bras de lag gis ma byin cing // dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bur gsungs// sna tshogs bsdus pa'i gtam ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // bsod nams spro ba bskyed pa mnyan par
276a3(skyes rabs): gyis// gtong dang bsod nams dkon pa ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la// sku gdung rnams ni bcug byas na// khrus gsol gdugs ni 'degs pa dang // man+dal zas dang skom rnams dang // gos
276a4(skyes rabs): dang me tog la sogs dang // snang ba dang ni mar me dang // gtsug lag khang du mal stan dang // zhing dang sna tshogs phul nas ni// bstod cing phyag ni 'tshal byed pa// 'di 'dra du ma phun sum tshogs// gtam ni nyi shu rtsa
276a5(skyes rabs): gnyis kyis// yang yang sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod// mtsho ni sbrul gyis gang bzhin du// me tog lo ma rgyas pa yis// ljon shing tsher mo dang bcas bzhin// thos dang dpyod dang rigs ldan zhing // de lta bu yi bye
276a6(skyes rabs): brag can// tshul khrims lo ni rgyab phyogs yin// dbul yang khrims ldan mchog yin gyi// yon tan rgyan dang bral ba yi// nor ldan rnams dang mtshungs ma yin// dbul yang skyes bu dam pa rnams// da
276b1(skyes rabs): yon tan ro myang bas// bdud rtsi lta bur khyad par 'phags// yang dag dran bya bla ma bzhin// yon tan ldan 'phags gzi brjid ldan// nor rnams dang ni rgyan dang ni// de dag rgyal po nas kyi ni// drung du nye bar mchod 'dod d+ha// chu khyim
276b2(skyes rabs): nyid ni bskyang bar gyis// 'jig rten bde ba rnam rgyal ba'i// 'jigs dang zhe sdang bcas pa la// chos kyi bdag nyid blo byas te// bde mchog phyir ni skyes bu yis// bde ba rgya chen mi 'phrogs pa// thob par 'dod pa de
276b3(skyes rabs): yis ni// tshul khrims nyid ni bsrung bar gyis// tshul khrims las nyams 'dul zhing 'che// de yis 'jigs bcas nyam su myong // tshul khrims ldan la de dag med// de nas 'jig rten pha rol tu// mtha' yis gtugs
276b4(skyes rabs): shing 'gro ba na// bde ba'i yul rnams 'dod pa yis// de yis tshul khrims 'di nyid bsrungs// tshul khrims brtan dang nges ldan na// bde 'gro nyon mongs bdag nyid min// log par lta bas lam gol phyir// de phyir
276b5(skyes rabs): thar pa rab byung zhing // rtags ldan mtho ris 'dod pa yis// de yis tshul khrims 'di nyid bsrungs// mi 'jigs dbrog tu med pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims 'di yin bsrung bar gyis// tshul khrims nor gyis mchog
276b6(skyes rabs): yin te// gzhan gyi dbrog cing rkur mi tshugs// tshul khrims bstan te 'chi bo na// gzhan du rjes 'brang lus ma yin// tshul khrims rjesu 'brang ba'i grogs// tshul khrims rgyan gyis mchog yin te// rgyan de la ni stor
277a1(skyes rabs): bA med// yid btsug sa pa yi grogs po yin// tshul khrims lta bu'i phan byed myed// tshul khrims yang dag nges pa'i gnyen// pha dang ma dang pu yin te// 'dod pa ster ba tshul khrims te// mthu yis 'bras
277a2(skyes rabs): bu 'di sbyin byed// tshul khrims kyi gtam ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / bsgral po stong du bsags pa yi// sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sngogs// legs spyang grang yin de kun yang // khong khro gcig
277a3(skyes rabs): gis 'joms par byed// zhe sdang dang mnyam sdig pa med// bzod dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub med// de phyir 'bad pas bzod pa bsgoms// sna tshogs pa yi tshul gyis ni// zhi ba'i yi da kyis ma bzung na// dga' dang bde ba myong
277a4(skyes rabs): mamA yin// sdang ba'i zug rngu yid gnas la// kanyid med brtan pa yod ma yin// zhe sdang bral bar ma gyur na// ji srid 'tsho bar gnod dang bcas// khri ba gcig pu bcom pa yis// rnam par sdang ba thams cad bcom// rtog pa'i bud
277a5(skyes rabs): shing la mjed pa'o// khro ba'i me yis 'gro ba skyeg/ dang por bdag nyid sreg byed le// gzhan dag sreg pa 'am yang nu min// rgas pa yis ni gzugs bzhin dang // khros dang mun pas mig dang ni// blo dang bral bas 'dod don
277a6(skyes rabs): ldan// de bas khro ba 'joms par byed// dge ba'i las la 'di sbyar bya// bdag la gnod byed 'byung ba dang // de las bzlog par bya snyam na// sdig ldan sems yin khror ci yod// mtshon sogs byed pa spangs nas ni// 'phen pa
277b1(skyes rabs): ci zhig khyo ru yod// rjod byed zhe sdang yin pas na// de b+hair hUM sdud la snang bsngags// bzod pa'i gtam ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / yon tan rin chen thams cad kyis// gtar du gyur pa brtson 'grus te// rgyun mongs
277b2(skyes rabs): rgya mtsho kun sgrol ba'i// rgyo chen mchog ni brtson 'grus yin// brtson 'grus shing rta gang zhon pa// dngos po bsam pasna mi 'thob pa// de 'dra 'gro na yong ma yin// glang po r+N+Na dang rkang thang dang // mnga' dang 'da' chen
277b3(skyes rabs): dogro s+t+wa dang // mtshon tshwa yos ni g.yul 'gyed cing // dgra bgegs mthar ni rgyul byed pa// 'adz+ra ste stobs dang ldan pa yi// brtson 'grus dpa' bo chen po yin// rgya mtsho chu sbyin tshogs gnas shing // chu rlabs mthon
277b4(skyes rabs): bor rim rgyu ba// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i dpa' byo yis// bla klung rjes bzhin 'go mo par byed// rin thaM med pa'i rin chen gyis// g+hA ter n+do len par byed pa yim+b+ha/ 'dod chags la sngags sbrul gdugs rnams// lus la
277b5(skyes rabs): brtson 'grus can gyis spong // khrims ldan skye bo dam pa ni// sems ni dri med khyad 'phags pas// mir ni yang dag mnyam zhig 'dzimA/ ri rab mdzes pa'i rtse mo ru// blta na sdug pa'i lha mo la// phang du lag pas 'khyud
277b6(skyes rabs): pa yis// bde dang ldan zhing dga' bar byed// mkha' gnas lha ni gang yin paso// gnyis gnyis ldan pa nges spangs nas// yang dag nyid kyi bde ba myong // shin tu 'bras bu rgya che ba'i// bskyed pa'i rgyu ni brtson 'grus te/
278a1(skyes rabs): bstan pa la sbyor de sbyor byed// brtson 'grus kyi gtam ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // nyon mongs dgra yi sde mtshan rnams// bsam gtan ldan pas zil mnan nas// yang dag byang chub
278a2(skyes rabs): dpal rnams 'thob// byang chub yan log rab sbyin zhing // 'chi med skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyes par thams cad sel ba yin// rgyu ni bsam gtan yin pa ru// blo ldan de yis rab tu gsung
278a3(skyes rabs): na mkha' dang ni sems mnyam la// gser dang bong bAr mnyam pa yis// bsam gtan sgom byed skyes bu yi// yon tan rnams kyi rgyu ru gsungs// nyon mongs dgra tshogs las rgyal ba'i// dge ba'i stobs kyis
278a4(skyes rabs): bsgrubs pa las// mtshan ni thams cad ldan pa yis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpa'o// yon tan rab mchodag nyid can// dkon pa'i rig pa thob par 'gyur// sems la ye shes bdag po yis// dgra yi 'jigs
278a5(skyes rabs): pa rnam spangs nas// gang gis mi yi dbang po bskyed// bsam gtan gcig pu de rgyu ste// yon tan kun gyi gter yin pas// 'phags pa'i yon tan gyis phyug gsungs// rmongs pa'i mun pa sel mdzad cing // rgyun gyi
278a6(skyes rabs): rtag pa'i ye shes kyis// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi nyi mo dang // mi rnams dang ni lha rnams kyi// bde rgyu bsam gtan rab gtan rab mchog yin// bsam gtan gyi gtam ste nyi shu drug pa'o// /
278b1(skyes rabs): shes rab stobs dang bral na yang // skyes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'ba' zhig ste// snying po yangs pa'i mthar thug par// ri mo bris+t+ra pa'i gzugs dang mtshungs// blo ldan brtson 'grus yang ldan pa'i// blo ldan de lU 'bras
278b2(skyes rabs): 'dod 'byung // bla med bdag gsod pa yi dgra// skye ba du mAs gang chod dang // bdag nyid skye bar 'gyur pa yis// rigs dang ming dang dus rnams dang // dbus bzhin du ni mtha' bzung la// rnal 'byir ba yi zhes
278b3(skyes rabs): pa 'jug/ shes rab stobs kyis de shes gsungs// 'jig rten rnams ni dri ma yi// rab rib tshogs ni sel byed pas// bde bas blo de ches mchog yin// ye shes snang ba bskyed pa yis// mi rnams ni nyes pa'i tshogs//
278b4(skyes rabs): rtag tu stongs par byed pa yin// dang por dbang po 'di bsgrub bya// yid kyi phra rab rnam shes shing // rig po thams cad gsal byed yin// shes rab de yang rtag par ni// stobs kyi dge ba skyed byed pa'i// rgyu yin pa
278b5(skyes rabs): ni rtag tu grag/ bya ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// gdon mi za bar nub pa dang // g.yul gyi nang du shes rab gtso'o// shwa rab stobs kyis rnam rgyal thob// thos pa'i shes rab gang yin de// dge ba rnams kyi rgyu ru 'gyur// de lta yon
278b6(skyes rabs): tan thams cad ni// sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir// gdon mi za ba re shes rab bsgrubs// shes rab med pa'i skyes bu ni// mi gsal tho rangs mar me bzhin/ shes rab kyi gtam ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//
279a1(skyes rabs): mtho ris thar pa'i yon tan ni// rin po che yi gter gyur pa// pha rol phyin pa drug 'di nyid// sa gzhi bzhin du shes pa'i mis// bdag phan bsgrubs pa de yis ni// gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir//
279a2(skyes rabs): myur bar rtag par rgyun tu 'bab// pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // legs par bshad pa rin po che'i za ma gtog lta bu'i gtam snyan dngagras chen po slob dpon dpa' bos
279a3(skyes rabs): mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgyu gar gyi mkhan pro ru tre dang / dge slongashAkya 'od kyis bsgyur// / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur bI par+ya ka thA/ bod skad du/ phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i gtam/ 'dza
279a4(skyes rabs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// skyes bu dam pa yid 'od yul rnams yongs smod smra bar gyur pa na// de la yid 'byung skyo bar byed na khyed yid skyo bar cis mi byed/ khyed kyi lus spyug de yang nyes mang
279a5(skyes rabs): de la smad par byas pa ni// yon tan mang yod de phyir bdag gi tshig ni cung zad mnyan par gyis// 'di ni rtag par gyur tam mi rtag gyur kyang ji srid gyur par 'di ni bde bo'i don gyur tam// der ma gyur kyang
279a6(skyes rabs): gtsang bar gyur tam de med gyur kyang dbang yod gyur// rtag min bde ba'i rgyu min gtsang ba ma yin rang dbang can min na// ci phyir blo gros rab nyams khyed lus nyes brgyar bcas la chags byed smos// ri bo
279b1(skyes rabs): mthon po'i rtse mo'i steng nas sa la lhung bar gyur pa yis// zhig par gyur che ci 'dri bar snang la nAM bde ba myong gyur tam// skyes nas brtsams te 'chi ba nyid phyir rtag tu rab tu rgyug pa na// sems can rnams ni ba
279b2(skyes rabs): skabs gang du bde ba ji ltar thob par 'gyur// gang gis sa 'og 'dzul te klu yi dbang po pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar 'byin byed// grong gis mtho ris 'dzegs te dbang por bcas pa'i lha tshogs med par byed pa dang // gang gis
279b3(skyes rabs): stengs 'phyan 'brun ni ga dang ni ra gu na lA btus 'gyur ba'i// 'chi bdag des ni tshugs par gang du gnas nas khyed ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// yun ring 'tsho yang lus ni rgyas pas rab tu brnyings po nyid du 'gyur// tshwa ni
279b4(skyes rabs): thung 'gyur tshen mos la 'chi bdag kher ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rga dang 'chi ba'i bar ni phongs par bcas par gnas par 'gyur ba'i mi// nyams par lhung bas 'di dang 'di las bde ba thob par yongs mi 'gyur// byis
279b5(skyes rabs): pa rnams la brtse med rgan la gus par gyur pa cung zad med// gzhon nu ma la ngor lta phra mo med cing nyams thag rnams la brtse med pa// de ltar gzhung lugs med pa'i 'chi bdag gang yin de ni bdag la ni// dus la
279b6(skyes rabs): sdod ces gzhon lus sha rgyas sra bar khyed yid ma sems shig khyim drung gnas pa'i nor ni cung zad rkus zhes thos par gyur pa ni// rang gi khyim dag bsrung bar bya snyam sems pa 'di ni rig pa yin//
280a1(skyes rabs): mi ni khyim khyim dag nas nyin re drangs te khyer bar byed pa nA// grwa shin rje la ci dogras med gyur tam 'gro ba mel tshe cis mi byed// ji ltar gsang bya'i me tog phreng btags sil dkrol mis bskor te/
280a2(skyes rabs): gsod sar khrid la gom pa r-i re bor bas 'chi nye'i sdug bsngal 'gyur// de bzhin long spyod la gnas nyin re 'chi bdag drung du 'gro byed kyis// kye khyod 'byor pa dag gis yid ni dregs pa dag tu ma byed cig/ 'di na mi rnam
280a3(skyes rabs): tshe ni mchog tu ring yang lo brgya kho nar zad// de las kyang ni dang po byas pa tha mar rgas pos don med mang byed// gnyid dang nad sogs ngag gis de dus med par kun nas re ba 'joms// bde bar gnas pa'i mi nung 'gro
280a4(skyes rabs): ba'i tshe yi lhag ma ji tsam yod// sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po'i g.yul nas rgyal ba'i rgyal po de rnams ni// shes pa'i snang bas mun pa zad byas drang srong de yang shrI bAr gyur// gshin rjes zin par gyur tshe long spyod
280a5(skyes rabs): kyis min pa shes pa dag gis min// skyes bu rtsol bas zlog mi byed na 'dir ni mau rnams su la ji ltar skyabasu 'gro// bstan bcos bklag dang btsos shing rig dang bzo yi bya ba dang bcas dang // yid rton glegs bcas
280a6(skyes rabs): sdug pa'i chung ma dang bcas drung nas 'khor bcas pa'i// mi rnams 'chi bdag snying rje med pas sa steng 'dir ni khyab gyur pas// med par byed na kun gyis ci bya ma yengs dge pa legs par gyis// e ma'o skyes bu rmongs
280b1(skyes rabs): rnams 'di na bde 'gror skyes pa bzang zhes grag/ rga dang 'chi dang nA rnams kyis kyang 'di la brtse ba med par grag// gzhan las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal brgya phyug 'di dag skyeng ba nyid byed de// rang gis bskyed nas su
280b2(skyes rabs): ni gsod pa'i don du de dag la gtod byed// sha ma'i rkyal par shin tu dbugs mi phyin par nyam ngar gnas// mi gtsang khron+do par lto ba'i me yi tsha ba mi zad pas bsregs nas// smra mi nus shing thos min
280b3(skyes rabs): bskyod pa'i dbang med nyal ba mA yin par// mi ni mngal du zla bcu nye ba'i bar du sdug bsngal nyams myong 'gyur// dka' ba dag gis byung nas nyi ma'i gzer rnos mod la bsregs pa dang // tshad pa'i rlung gis bud
280b4(skyes rabs): shing sbrang bu mchu sbrang dag gis gnod pa dang // nye du dgra bo dag gis lto ba btsos pas na tsha skyed byed pa// mngal na gnas kyang bla yi snang ba dag tu gnas pa 'di mi rung // lus kyi bya ba lag pa dag dang rkang pa
280b5(skyes rabs): bskyod pa tsam du zad// smra ba'i yul gyur thams cad la yang khyad par med par ngu bar byed// nyal ba'i tshe na gan rkyal gnas pas nyin dang mtshan mo 'da' bar byed// sa steng dag n+ya khu lto ba lhor sdug bsngal nyam thag ngas
280b6(skyes rabs): ma mthong // 'jug pa dag las ldang bar mi rus nyal dang 'grong dang 'gro bar bskyed mi nus// 'dug ste gnas dang lus mi brtan pas gos gcig 'gro bar nus ma yin// tshig gi rang don bsnyen par mi nus byed la
281a1(skyes rabs): lus dang ngag la ni// dbang byar med par srog 'dzin byed pas kyi hud na tshod 'das sdug bsngal// mngal na sdug bsngal mang po yun rings rjes myong gyur kyang mi mthong la// 'chi ba'i dus kyis gnas
281a2(skyes rabs): skabs skye bo 'dris pa'i mig gi yul ma yin// dregs ldan dga' bas bcom pa tshogs sar skyes pa bud med brgya phrag gi/ mig ni 'ben du gyur pa mnga' char 'bab pas nyam thag lta bu yin// skom pas kha bskams
281a3(skyes rabs): chu na bsil cing dri zhim chu ni 'thung ba dang // bkres pas nyam thag pa na 'bras chan sha dang bcas pa za ba dang // 'dod chags me 'bar gyis gdungs tshe na chung ma ngam du 'khyud nas byed pa yi// nad sel byed pa bde ba yin/
281a4(skyes rabs): zhes skye bo phyin ci log par gyur// skyes bu zas nyung dag gis ring gyur zas mang drug la mngon dga' bas// dbugasgra mi thon cing sdug bsngal gyur la mi mthun zas kyis 'tsho bar byed// zlas mi 'dzu bas+t+ra nad bskye
281a5(skyes rabs): 'gyur zhing zhu bas bkres pa nyid du 'gyur// kye ma zas zos gyur ni sdug bsngal mi bskyed skabs de yod ma yan// shing lag dag ni rab tu 'bar ba'i skabasu me las tha dad min// dro ni 'jig rten drug gris kyi hud
281a6(skyes rabs): mi zhes zer zhing yongasu spong // de bzhin lus la sdug bsngal shin tu chen po nyams myong gnas skabs// 'di ni sdug bsngal lus 'di yin zhes khyad par ming la 'jug mi byed// mi gtsang snom zhing srin bu'i
281b1(skyes rabs): tshogs ni brgya yis yongasu bskor gyur la// klad pa'i drod kyi gdugs kyis mtshungs pa med pa'i sdug bsngal nyams myong zhing // snang ba med pa'i btson ra'i khyim nang lta bu'i ma yi lto na gnas// de bskyed pa na
281b2(skyes rabs): de yang de ltar min nam ci phyir khyod rigs byed// ji ltar khyi dag rus skams sra la ro med pa la bsgom par 'cha'// rang gi kha chu khrig gis gos la rnyi zhing zhim pa yin snyam sems// de bzhin lus zhes bya 'o shin tu
281b3(skyes rabs): 'jig su rung ba'i tshogs de la// rmongs rnams rang gis rtog pas yon tan brgya yis sgro btags dga' byar byed// shA rgyus mtho zhing zlum la nu ma'i blo yis kun nas 'khyud pa dang // kha ni kha chus gang po chang bcas
281b4(skyes rabs): snod lhur 'thung bar byed pa dang // reg pa'i sregs pas gtsang brlan pa yi li la chags pas nA// 'gro ba rmongs pa chen po sna ljongs pa dag la yid du mi 'ong ci zhig yod// 'khru bas dri mas sngags dang dri zhim spyad
281b5(skyes rabs): bris mi roSh+Ti dr-i 'dra dang // so rtsi 'cha' la rtson par byed pas kha ni dri mi zhim pa nyid// gos kyis kun nas dkris pas shin tu mi sdug yin par 'di byed de// lus ni 'jig su rung bas bdag nyid gzhon nu mA li sgra
281b6(skyes rabs): zhing rton// yid brtan rung las nyan par mi byed bdag nyid kyis kyang rtogs med pas// khyed la rna ba dang ni snying me ba zhes bya bar shin tu rigs// zon byed 'jig su rung zhing mi sdug lus kyi dri ni ma tshor ba// khyed
282a1(skyes rabs): 'gro ba sna med yin zhes kyang ni ci yi phyir mI smra// shin tu gtsang ba'i dar dang dri zhim me tog sbrang rtsi gur kum+ba la// de dang de ni gang du reg nA skad cig gis ni mi gtsang 'gyur// rma yi sgo dgu
282a2(skyes rabs): dag nas mi gtsang dri nga'i ljon shing 'dzag 'gyur gang // de lnga khyod ni skal bzang yin zhes 'dir ni rlom sems ji ltar byed// phung po lnga po 'di la yul dang yul can nyid du brtags nas ni// bdag dang bdag gi med pa
282a3(skyes rabs): dag la nga dang nga yi nges byis pa// 'jig rten rmongs pa 'di ni 'jig rten skom gyis gdungs pa mya ngan du// smig rgyu'i chu yi chu bur la byung snod du 'thung snyam sems dang mtshungs// bdag ni rtag pa yin zhing bde dang sdug bsngal
282a4(skyes rabs): nyamasu myong 'gyur la// lus kyi yul ni gcig bu dag la bdag gi zhes blo skyed du zad// bu dang chung ma phyug rnams zhes bya 'di dag las gzhan gyis bskyed pa// de la ji ltar bdag gi zhes rtsi 'dir ni gAti mu ga stobs
282a5(skyes rabs): can yin// de ni rgyu las byung zhing gnas pa'ang rang gi rkyen gyi dbang la byung dus kyis rgas shing tshe dang bsod nams zas la sogs pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ skye la dbang byar ma yin rgyas las ma yin shI la dbang med//
282a6(skyes rabs): na// bdag gi chung ma zhes smra ngo mtsha bar ni ji ltar de ma gyur// gang zhig rtag tu rang dbang gyur dang gang zhig bde ba nyid gyur pa// gang zhig skad cig ci yang 'dor mi 'gyur po de ni bdag gir bshad// lus 'di dbang byar med/
282b1(skyes rabs): cing sdug bsngal dag kyang skyo bar 'dor gyur na// 'di la rim pa gang zhig mthong na 'di la gang zhig mngon zhen gyur// mi rtag pa la rtag snyam sems la sdug bsngal ba la bud mngon dga'// mi gtsang lus
282b2(skyes rabs): la gcing ba nyid du shwas che ro zhen par byed pa dang // bdag med pa la bdag ces 'dzin pa'i rdul rnas nur bsal nas ni// skye med 'gag med 'chi ts+tshe r+b+ha ga bI gnA ma du gyis// phyin ci log bzhi 'gag par byed pa'i gtam// 'di/
282b3(skyes rabs): byas pa las bdag gis dge bsags po// gang yod des ni 'gro gsum ma lus pa// phyin ci log bzhi las ni yid grol shog/ phyin ci log bzhi spong ba'i gtam smon dpon mA tri tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogaso// /
282b4(skyes rabs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud d+he b+ha drA dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#rkyod dus gtam mA to tse tras mdzad pa bzhug so//
282b5(skyes rabs): rgyo gar skAr du/ ke lI yuM kra pa rik+Sha b+hU/ bong+ga skad du/ rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam/ 'phags pa 'pho rngam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// tshul khrims las nyams thos pa'i nor bral 'dod pas 'di nyid
282b6(skyes rabs): cung zad mchod par byed// nyes med tshul khrims ldan la yon tan ro la rgyab phyogs zhe sdang cung zad nyes pa dgod// rab byung rnams la khyim pas las bsgo de nas rab byung des kyang khyim pa mgu bar byed// ci spyad
283a1(skyes rabs): 'gro ba 'dir ni 'gro ba'i khyim du ma lus dus kyi snyigs ma zhugs pa yin// da ltar legs spyod pa yi skye bo ngo tsha sdig pa can bsngags dga' bar 'gyur// slob dpon nor rnams mchog tu sems
283a2(skyes rabs): dpas 'joms phyir slob ma rnams ni zhum par gnas// 'di na byis pa'i nye du'i 'khrul 'khor gyis bcings pa ni sun 'byin byed po bzhin// de ltar rtsod pa'i dus na 'jig rten rnams la g.yo sgyu'i mtshon drag stobs dang ldan
283a3(skyes rabs): bcud rnams sas 'thung dngos rnams stobs chung lha rnams char ni 'bebs mi byed// rlung rnams rab tu grags ldang lo tog rnams ni mi smin skyes mi 'gyur// skyes la ser 'babs rnams rtsod pa'i dus kyi dbang sgyur
283a4(skyes rabs): 'bras bu med// dngos rnams mthu med dgos pa sgrub rnams nyams pa thob la brtog/ 'gro la nad 'phel sa ni de dang de dag skye bo rnams kyis btang // ljon pa'i ni gos tshal bskams pas yal ga'i lag pa gyen du'o greng
283a5(skyes rabs): byed de// rtsod pa'i dus kyi bcom byas bzang po'i dus nub ri bo che nges 'debs// yul bzung chags rnams spangs sa rnams su ni dus bzangs yongasu zad// yon tan mkhas la mi skur nor ldan rnaMs ni mchod bya min par
283a6(skyes rabs): mchod// skye rmongs mchod byed gshin rjes 'jig rten sdug bsngal nges khrid gang gis bzlog// tshul khrims 'chal pa stobs ldan tshul khrims ldan pa sdigs shing tshar gcod byed// sdig pa dga' ba'i stobs ldan
283b1(skyes rabs): g.yon can rnams kyis dam chos bsgrub par 'gyur// ga zhig sdom pa la gnas brtan pa'i mchog la 'jug par byed pa nyung // the tshom yod yonang srong bstan pa ring po mi thogs nub par 'gyur// g.yul 'gyed rtsod
283b2(skyes rabs): pa du mas gos lhur sa g.yogs lo tig skyes la 'dod mi 'byung // rlung rnams mi bzad ldan zhing de bzhin skye bo dom pa yang dag mchod mi byed// rgyal po dgra dang rkun ma'i 'jigs pas mi dag bgra phebs nor
283b3(skyes rabs): rnams longs mi spyod// da ltar skye bo sdug bsngal bcwa 'tsho 'gro ba rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung // gang zhig dus su tshwar med gang du lam zhugs ser ba mi mthun du ma 'bab// gang zhig pa rnams 'o ma mi 'byung dus rnams
283b4(skyes rabs): 'khrugs shing sa las 'bru mi skye// sman rnams gang yin nus med de bzhin khyad par rnams ni rab tu nyams// yid ni nges bcom chos min rtsod pas dngos po 'di kun nyes dang bcas// rtsod pa'i dus 'dir chos spangs
283b5(skyes rabs): mi bzad pa la yang dag zhugs pas ni// gang du dbang pos char phabs ljon shing yal ga dag las me tog 'bras bu cung zad snang // sa gzhi brlan pa dang bcas sa rnams gang yin pa las lo tog smin gyur pa// de/
283b6(skyes rabs): rkun tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag sdom ldan chos dang ldan pa'i mthu// dus rnams 'khrul zhing sa la bcud rnams nub gyur nyi zla log par rgyu// chung ma khyol bcug pas 'brel pa'i sems mod dman
284a1(skyes rabs): pa rnams ni mthon por 'gyur// rgyal po chos spangs nor rnams mchog tu don gnyer bu rnams pa la snang // kyi hud sdug bsngal rtsod pa'i dus ni nyer gnas bsod nams gnyer ba nag su song /
284a2(skyes rabs): chos dang rab byung dka' thub rnams 'bros bde ba rnams ni ring du song bar gyur// sa rnams 'bras bu nyung zhing rgyal po 'khrug byed mtshon gyi rgyal byed rnam par gan+thi ne// 'jig rten bud med la dang bud med kyang g.yom
284a3(skyes rabs): bram ze rnams ni 'dod chen ban+d+has// legs bu rnams nub skye ngan stobs ldan du ma rtsod pa'i dus su bzang po yi// dus song bde ba rnams 'ongs dus der sbyor ba'i skyes bu rnams kyang 'das// 'dir yang dus mtha'
284a4(skyes rabs): de rnams mun bcas phug bzhin shes ma yin// legs spyod rgyu drug dri yIs bsgos pa yi// skul wAnA nub cing dus ni 'das par gyur// pad gzhon rtsa ba'i skud pa bzhin// dkar po'i chos rnams phra byar 'gyur// blo
284a5(skyes rabs): ldan skyes bu gtam mkhas dri mas skrong // 'gro 'di dga' ston zin pa bzhin// bdag nyid chen po 'di ni ying dgra 'igags// gang na yon tanA la bdud 'bab pas gcod byed cing // skye bo smra ba la rten 'tsho bar byed// rtsod
284a6(skyes rabs): phyi kyi gi/ mo slob dpon mA~M dzi tso rjes mdzad pa rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po e dz+riM/ hrId+ha 'dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
284b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ bi bI ka ka thA/ bod skad du/ dben pa'i gtam+ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// dka' thub rnyed pa'i bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// 'chol
284b2(skyes rabs): pa spyod pa rnams ni mthong gyur nas// rab tu dben pa yang dag brten pa yi// dge slong 'di skad tshig tu brjod pas smra// phongs pa spang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yis// rab bsngags zhi ba'i dbang bskur nyer blangs nas
284b3(skyes rabs): dka' thub khyim dang 'dris pas rab 'chag pa'i// phongs nyid rgal dka' bying ba ji lta bur// 'phags pa 'gran mau de shing drung gnas nas ni// 'gro ba'i skye dang 'gag pa mthong bas na// zhi ba'i bde ba yongs smin tshe
284b4(skyes rabs): dge ba// mi las shin tu 'phags pa thob par 'gyur// sems kyi rnam par 'ching ba gnyen po yi// stobs kyis gsal bas skye bral nags dag tu// rnal 'byor nyer bzhi'i bdud rtsis tshim gyur pas// bde bar gnyid log
284b5(skyes rabs): pa dang sad par 'gyur// mtshan+da mo zla ba'i snang dang rab gsal ba'i// skar ma'i me tog bkram par nyer mchod nas// dgon por brten pa'i yid ni nges zhi ba'i// lhag par dga' ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// gang du
284b6(skyes rabs): dge slong dben pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis// kha na ma tho med pa zhi 'gyur bde// gang du yo byad yang dag brten chags pas// sems ni sna tshogs phongs pas gdungs par gyur// ji ltar chu shing smug ma 'o ma dag
285a1(skyes rabs): 'bras bu 'byin nas rang nyid 'jigs pa ston// de bzhin dka' thub khyim las rnam grol nus// bdag nyid zil gyis non la chags mthong 'gyur// sa yi rdul gyis gos pa'i ri dgas dag
285a2(skyes rabs): rtswartsa dang 'dab nas tsam zhig sgrub bying ltar// sems ni dben par gzhol bar 'dod 'gyur gyi/ gling bzhi'i phun tshogs rgya chen dag la'ang min// shing drung 'bab chu bsten pa'i dka' thub dag/ yongasu 'dzin
285a3(skyes rabs): pa dag ni rnam spangs nas// rang sems tsam dang rab tu 'brel pa yis// bde 'byung gang de rgyal po rnaMs la med// ljon shing sngon po'i rtse mo rlung dag gis// rnam g.yo phra la snyoms pa'i char bab pa'i// mi g.yo rnam
285a4(skyes rabs): bArtags rI yi sul gnas ni// dge slong mtshan mo dga' ba skyed par byed// rnyog can 'dod la 'dris pas thod pa yi// bdag bsnyen pa yi tshigs spangs ltos med cing // skye bral nags gung yin par dga' bya
285a5(skyes rabs): yi/ dge sbyong gyur nas don med 'gyur mi bya// dge slong rtags ni bdag nyid gnod med par// nyer blangs gang zhig sgrub par mi byed cing // dmanA la yongasu 'dzin pa'i 'dra mo bying ba// de ni 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten sgo
285a6(skyes rabs): byed yin// chu dang rdo khu rtsa ba med pa yi// sa dbang rdzogs nas mi bzad yang dag du// rtog dang ldan pas ni po bzod bya yis// bsgrub la yong su nyams pas 'jug mi bya// rgya mtsho rnam par 'khrugs pa
285b1(skyes rabs): rlabs tshogs su// rin chen khur gyis 'bru dag nub pa bzhin// khyim dang 'dris pa'i rnyed chags khur dag gis// gang dag mchog brtan rgya tshon+da snam par byed// nag s+t+ra brten pa'i zhi ba'i yid dag ni// gzhon nu ma yi
285b2(skyes rabs): 'gro bas dkrugs mtshon pa// mnyen po ji bzhin bdag nyid zhi 'dod rnams// sdom can rab tu dben nyid yang dag rtsom/ yul gyi ro yis dug gis nyer gdungs blo can dag/ chags pa'i nyung ngu dag gis gdungs 'gyur
285b3(skyes rabs): na/ de dag yongasu spong la brtson med pa'i// dka' thub kyi hud e ma'o rab nyams 'gyur// sdom nga rkang pas 'gro zhing 'jog pa ltar// de ltar 'dris pas 'dod pa 'phel 'gyur te// rang rlabs tshabs ngogs mngon
285b4(skyes rabs): brdabs 'jigs rung bas// sprin chen char gyis ya mun na bzhin no// dka' thub ji ltar dman pa dgra la yang // 'dod lha'i dbang gis rjes su zhugs gyur pa// de ltar rang lag gis drang phun sum tshogs//
285b5(skyes rabs): rgyal chen khyim la khyim pa chags pa med// rang gi khyim drang gdong dgra 'chi 'dzag d+ha rA// brlan pa'i gnye dag spangs par gyur nas ni// dman pa gzhan gyi khyim la chags pa yi// rab byung 'di la shin
285b6(skyes rabs): t+yo ngo tsha med// thar pa 'dod gang rang khyim spangs nas ni// mi shes gzhan gyi khyim dag 'dod byed pa// rgya mtsho rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rlabs tshogs las// bdag nyid rgyal nas glang rjes bying dang mtshungs// sdig pa
286a1(skyes rabs): spong byed de bzhin gshegs pa yi// gnang ba'i bsgrub pa dag gis 'di brtags gang // dman pa'i nor lnga 'dod pa'i sred pa yis// gzhan khyim la chags dri ma can du 'gyur// chu bo
286a2(skyes rabs): ni lus tsha yi me tog lhung ba'i dus bus mtha' mar bris// de mu dkar pi'i ngo gAs dang ngang pa ka dam pa dag gnas// nags kyi glang chen khyu dgra rtse bas tha dad 'thor rlabs can// dgon gnas brtul zhugs
286a3(skyes rabs): can la dga' ba rab tu bskyed par byed// skyed pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba'i yid dag rnam bsal nas// ma bsams yid 'ong bde ba brten pa rnams kyi gnas skabs ni// pad+ma kha phye bzhin du dka'
286a4(skyes rabs): thub rang gi grags pa yis// 'jig rten yongs su dga' bo rab bskyed kun tu dpe las 'das// dka' thub ri dang nye ba'i shing rtsa rab yangs dang 'brel par// gnas pa'i tshom bu mi snyoms lhod pa'i
286a5(skyes rabs): bslabs par la chags pa'i// ba mo'i dum bu gros pa tho rangs nyi mo'i 'od zer gyis// lag pa dag gis nyul ba bzhin du rnam par skems par byed// khong stong shing drung rlung ni rgyu gyur khu ba'i tshogs
286a6(skyes rabs): chen 'bab// mdangs zad rab rtsub lo ma dag gis gdu bu bzhin bskor ba'i// 'dod pa kun spangs shes rab rno ba'i brtul zhugs can dag la// mtshan mo rnam par skyo ba dag ni skyed par zad mi
286b1(skyes rabs): byed// shing gi lo ma'i tha mA lnga chags pa mo'i chu dag gis// dum bu nyi ma 'cha tshe mdog gyur nor bu dang 'dra ba'i// thig pa dag ni shing drung gnas pa'i dge slong la// 'gro ba'i skye dang 'jigs pa ji bzhin
286b2(skyes rabs): rab tu ston par byed// rabazhi'i bde ro shes pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal 'byor kyang // yongs su spyad pas rnyings pa'i me tog phreng bzhin rnam spangs nas// lang tsho rang bzhin gyis g.yo dang dag na shang drung
286b3(skyes rabs): tshul can dag yol byas te// dgon par ri dgas 'drar 'chi ba zhi ba'i sems ni bsten par bya// 'dod pa la 'dzin phyin ci log pa'i sems la ku mu tA'i// dum bu ltar dkar mi thod so dang 'brel pas
286b4(skyes rabs): nyer dgod dang // rlung gis bus pa'i ro sregs me yis nye 'khor shing bsregs pa'i// dur khrod dka' thub gcig pu la ni mtshan mo dga' bar skyed par byed// ljon shing tshogs dang rgya ches ri yi
286b5(skyes rabs): bsngor gyur cing // rdo bAs khyab dang bsil la rab dang ba yi chu 'dzag 'bab// rma bya rab dga' sgra yis khyab pa'i ri sul nang du ni// khyim du 'chi ba'i skyo bo'i sems ni rab tu dga' bur byed// 'gro
286b6(skyes rabs): ba'i don ma byas pa'i 'chi bar 'gyur ba khyim bdag la// dga' ba dag las dben pa mchog la slob byed sems can mchog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems ni rnyed gyur pha rol tshegs 'thob pa// srid
287a1(skyes rabs): pa'i dug gis sdong po'i rtsa ba brtan po 'byin par byed// nags tshogs pa yi bya dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal brgyu yi gzhir gyur pa'i// khyim gang yin pa yongasu spangs nas nugs su 'gro byed
287a2(skyes rabs): pud+ma/ des ni srid pa'i grwanyid rab bsal ba 'gro ba kun gyi mgon// sangs rgyas rab tu mnyes par byed pa yin zhes de skad grags// ma skad sngon po dang 'dra ne'u song tshogs dag ni/ shing rtsi nye bar bkod dang yal gau
287a3(skyes rabs): me tog gis bskor ba'i// zhi ba'i nags mtha' kye ma'o dge slong mchog gis spong byed pa// gsadri phyir rngon pa'i glu yis drangs par gyur pa'i ri dwags mtshungs// 'phags pa'i bzhed pa bde bar gshegs pa'i
287a4(skyes rabs): lam gyi rjes 'brangs nas// nags dang 'dra bar khyim na rang gi don dag sgrub byed kyang // rnam par 'tsho ba rang bzhin gyis med nags ni dben pa yis// sems ni 'ching ba dag ni 'bad pa med par gcod par byed// /
287a5(skyes rabs): 'dod chags gang dag de la dgos par 'gyur pos kun 'phel zhing // legaso spyad thub pa'i bstan pa dag kyang nyams byas nas// me dpung rab tu 'bar bla rgal dka'i khong ni mthar thug pa'i// ngan song dag tu dge
287a6(skyes rabs): slong bde chung la chags 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig nyes pa ma lus gdung bzod byed sangs rgyas pa'i// legs par bshad pa khas blangs nas ni ngan 'gror nges 'byin pa// ut+pal sngon po'i snying po'i dri
287b1(skyes rabs): mchog dag dang chu dum bu// sar la bsil ldan rlung gi de dag ji ltar tshom par 'gyur// su rA sa yi sgra ni rang bzhin snyan pa'i klu dbyangs dag/ ldog pa e stos par 'gyur pas phyogs rnams
287b2(skyes rabs): khyab gyur pas// brtul zhugs can gyi 'gro dang gnas pa dag lus dub skyes dang // lus lhod gyur pa'i mtshan gyi gung thun grinyid dog sad+ma par byed// da kyi dkyil 'khor gyis smras yongs su gnas
287b3(skyes rabs): pa yis// zla ba'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dpal 'joms shin tu zil gnon pos// dge ba'i rtsa ba nyer bsags bskal ldan 'jig rten la gzigs shing // ma byung 'phags pa mchog gi mgon po de yang
287b4(skyes rabs): brten par mdzad// ci ste gang zhig nang gi dgra la nges rgyal bya ba byas pa yi// ston pa 'jig rten mtha' gzigs de yang nags dag bsten mdzad na// yang dag rtogs med skye bo mi gtsang 'dam du bying
287b5(skyes rabs): gyur ba'i// sdom can+da zhi 'dod bde gshegs rjes su tsa phyir 'jug mi byed// bdag tu log par 'dzin par gyur pas nyin dang mtshan// srin bus ji bzhin rnam rtog sdig can dag gis zos pas ni// /
287b6(skyes rabs): nyon mongs rnag gis nyer gos zhi ba'i chu yi bum pa yis// bkrus pa bzhin du sems ni skye ba med nags sten par gyis// 'bras bu'i lcid kyis yal ga gug pa'i tha ma lo ma yis// gsal gyur lcug ma ma
288a1(skyes rabs): tog kha phye'i dga' byed rgyud ldan pa'i// nags kyi shing ni dge slong phongs bral brtan pa la// mdza' bo bzhin du shin tu dbugs ni 'byin par byed// zla ba shar ba kha pa babs pas bsgrib
288a2(skyes rabs): pas 'gog 'gyur ba'o// dgun gyi mtshan mo dag ni rab zhi bde ba 'dod rnams kyi// rnal 'byor rtswa yi stan la dga' ba dag la tho rangs dag/ nags kyi shing na yib pa'i bya ni 'dra bar byed// shing dang nye ba'i ri
288a3(skyes rabs): yi rked du mi g.yo skyil krung bcas// me tog gis bskor rab dga'i rlung gis g.yo bar byed pa na// 'gro bsnyen srid gsum rnam rgyal dus na byang chub snying po yi// gdan la bzhugs bzhin sdom can mtshan
288a4(skyes rabs): mo rje su sgrub par byed// dman pa'i 'gro ba'i sems kyis reg byas dregs pa'i chags pa dag/ 'dod bya don du gnyer ba rnams kyis khyad par spangs nas ni// 'phags pas rjes chags bstan pa mi snang 'ching
288a5(skyes rabs): ba 'dzegs pa yi// 'dod pa lhag ma med par dga' bzhin na gsu zhi bar bya// skye dang 'chi dang na ba'i sdug bsngal mthar ni ma byas par// srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag tu bying 'gyur bag med ma byed cig/ mthar
288a6(skyes rabs): byed kun gyi srog kyang 'phrog par byed pa gang 'di ni// rgyun mi chad par 'gro la sta ro'i so dag 'dar bar byed// sa 'dzin pa yi chu bo'i tshogs dag 'bab pa lta bu ni// chos kun gnas pa'i rang bzhin rjes su shes
288b1(skyes rabs): nas ni// ro la sems ldan gzhan las dam pas legs par grol ba yi// srid pa chags bral rab zhi dga' ba dag la sten par gyis// smra ba tsam ni nus su zin kyang tshig la gnas pa'ang grub med de// skyes bu/
288b2(skyes rabs): tshig dag snying por byed pa ston gyi chu bral sprin dang mtshungs// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la sgrub pa snying po nyid// de phyir de nyid la 'jug blo gros yin bzo'i tshig la mkhas// kun nas
288b3(skyes rabs): nyon mongs dgra 'di yi// bdag nyid bran du gyur pa ste// de bas bdug sems zhi byed cing // rang nyid yongasu smra bar byed// dben pa'i gtam slob dpon chen pos 'tsho byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogaso// /
288b4(skyes rabs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra dang / nu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// mang+ga laM/
289a1(skyes rabs): chos smra ba dam pa'i chos nyen pa la gus par bya ba'i gtam bzhug so//
289b1(skyes rabs): rgyu gar swA du/ sar+b+ba k+Sh+ma t+yA d+harmA bA tsa ni sad+d+har+dz+dza shrA ba kA ka thA/ bod skad du/ chos smra ba dam pa'i chos nyan pa la gus par bya ba'i gtam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo//
289b2(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gser po tso ma dang kaM ni ka dang nyi ma shUr ma thag gi 'od 'bar zhing gsal bar byed pa dang / rgya cher mi phyed pa'i 'od dang / bco lnga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thad du
289b3(skyes rabs): dri mA med cing rnam par dag pa dang / tsi pa kA dang / a shwa ka rab tu rgyas pu dang / bai DUn+yA dang in+d+ra nI la dang rdo rje dang / ljong raus dang pad+ma dang glog gi 'od pas lhag pa dang / gser bzang po'i 'od dang ldan
289b4(skyes rabs): pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma/ dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i gter bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mgon du gyur pa/ bla
289b5(skyes rabs): mumar gyur pa/ chos kyi rje/ spyod pa dang ldan pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis gnod pa med par kun tu spyod pa/ stobs bcu mnga' ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ khyu mchog gi mchog
289b6(skyes rabs): seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / drag po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus srul po dang / nyi ma dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
290a1(skyes rabs): chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byams pa dang snyid rje dang dga' ba dang btud snyoms kyi
290a2(skyes rabs): byabasam gtan mchog gi dran pa brnyes pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams la lhag par mos pa/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched dang
290a3(skyes rabs): stong pa nyid dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par ston pa dang / thugs rje chen pos yang dag par bskul pa/ gser dang dngul dang shel dang nor bu dang bai DUr+ya dang rdo rje in+do nI la dang zla ba'i 'od rnams las
290a4(skyes rabs): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ga rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor dang / thams ca skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shUkya
290a5(skyes rabs): thub pa la sogs pas gsungs shing rjesu bstan pa 'di la/ kye dge slong 'di lnga ste/ chos bshad pa dang chos kyi gtan la 'ga' zhig tu tshogs shing 'dug ste/ 'dug nas bya ba gnyis pa gang yang rung po gcig
290a6(skyes rabs): la rjesu gnas par bya ste/ chos kyi gtam bya ba 'am yang na 'phags pa'i mi smra bas rjesu gnas par bya'o// de la 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i gtam du gyur pa dang / 'phags pa'i mi smra bar gyur pa de gnyis
290b1(skyes rabs): ni nges par legs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin te/ phyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / the tshom gcod pa'i phyir nges par stobs kyis gzung ba'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal cing 'di skad du gsungaso// /
290b2(skyes rabs): dge slong dag gang zag gnyis po 'dis bsod nams mang po bskyod de sdig pa'i rtsa ba 'byin cing bdud dang g.yul 'gyod par byed/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol bar byed/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar byed/ de bzhin ni/ sh+ye d+hInI kyi 'khor
290b3(skyes rabs): lo bskor bar byed do// gnyis gang zhe na/ gang gus par byas te chos 'chad pa dang / gang 'di ni gus par byas te chos nyan pa'o// de bas na khyud kyis gus pos chos bshad par bya zhing blo ma rnams la gus par
290b4(skyes rabs): byas te chos nyan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'byung ba dkon no// mIr skye bu ni rab tu dkon+da no// dril 'byor phun sum tshogs pa nI dkon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa ni dkon no// dri bas na
290b5(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i nyes pa la kun tu brtag pa la gus par byas te chos mnyan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dir brjod par bya ste/ nges par dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur zhing chos kyi snang ba dang bral bar 'gyur/ ye shes kyi
290b6(skyes rabs): snang ba rab tu nub par 'gyur la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dus nye bar gnas shing / chos dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur
291a1(skyes rabs): bar shes par byas nas gus par byas te chos mnyan par bya'o// cung zad chos kyi gru ni zhig par 'gyur// ye shes kyi ri ni rdib par 'gyur/ chos kyi nyi ma ni nub par 'gyur/ chos kyi chu bo ni skams
291a2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur/ chos kyi gtam gyis ni dben par 'gyur/ dbango po'i rtod thag ni chad par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yar yug bdun gyi me tog ni skams par 'gyur// gsung rab kyi rgya mtsho ni bo bar 'gyur/ dran pa'i lhag na
291a3(skyes rabs): tshig par 'gyur/ dran pa'i lcags ni chag par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das/ nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur la/ ring por mi thogs par yang dag pa'i spang leg
291a4(skyes rabs): bshig pas bcos legs byas pa/ dran pa'i gru skyabs yongasu bsrung ba/ gdugs dang rgyal yA tshan dang pa dan legs par btsugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi zhal che ngas rtsod pa yongasu sbyong ba/ dad pa'i la rgyags
291a5(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa/ brtse ba'i btung chu'i tsheg dang bcas ga/ dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi rin po ches yongasu bskang ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i tshogs yongasu rgyu ba/ chos smra ba'i bag chags rab tu sad
291a6(skyes rabs): par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bad pas rab tu 'phel zhing spogs phyin pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis bcos pa'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs kyi shugs kyis bskyod pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi gru thams cad kyi thad nub pa
291b1(skyes rabs): 'gyur ro zhes shes par byas la/ sems can rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba la 'bad pas dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs nub pas phyis yid la gcags pa med par bya ste/ 'jig rten ma rig pas mig long pa/
291b2(skyes rabs): ser+ya sna'i 'gug pas g.yogs pa/ phyogs dang mtshams la rtag pa dang chad par rnam par lta ba/ skye ba dang rga bu dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu gsung sau paM/ 'chi ba'i g.yang sa ra lhung ba/
291b3(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i rtog thag gis kun tu brto pa/ gshin rje'i pho nyas skrag pa/ bya ba ngan pa la chags pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ phan tshun rtsod pas g.yeng sa can rnams phyin bcad yid la gcags
291b4(skyes rabs): par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na 'khor ba'i nyes pa spang bar 'dod pa dang / bdud kyi spyod yul spang bar 'dod pa dang / phung po'i khur dor bar 'dod pa dang / nyom sems shing bcad par 'dod pa dang / ye shes kyi
291b5(skyes rabs): rdo rje 'chang bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo phye mar brlag par 'dod po dang / ser sna'i rgya mtsho bskams par 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshur po'i bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi
291b6(skyes rabs): cher ma rim gyis shin tu dkrugs par 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gi tshogs thob par 'dod pa dang / ye shes kyi mig yongasu sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / mchod pa'i gnas
292a1(skyes rabs): su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog las rgal bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam nus 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa/
292a2(skyes rabs): dang du nyon mongs pa'i tshwa bas gdungs pa'i yid tshim par byed par 'dod pa rnams kyis gus par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi chus dbang bskur ba la 'bad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brjod par bya ste/ dam pa'i
292a3(skyes rabs): chos thos pas sor mo'i phreng ba ma gsod pa las logs par gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin 'brog gnas mI rnams gsod pa las log par gyur pa dang / klu'i rgyal po srog ma mod lo tog 'joms par byed pa
292a4(skyes rabs): dang / gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma srog chags brgya phrag du ma gsod pa las log par gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin pa spu khab dug gis rdeg par byed cing gsod pa dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i nya ti ming gI la tshong pa stong
292a5(skyes rabs): phrag du ma gsod par byed pa dang / sbal pa dud 'gro log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / zla ba sgra gcon gyi 'jigs pa dang / nyi ma lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa dang / brgya byin ngan song gis 'jigs pa dang /
292a6(skyes rabs): pa rtag pa lta ba lnga dang / rtag tu 'tsho ba bdag tu blta ba lnga kyang / gtse bu pa'i bu log pa'i bya ba la mngon par sbyor ba las dang / bram ze grags pa'i rigs mngon par zhen pa dam pa'i chos thos pas log go// de dag la sogs
292b1(skyes rabs): pa gzhan dag tu ma thar pa'i skom gyis gdungs shing srid pa'i yal ga gcod par 'dod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sbubs dral bar 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi snang bas blta bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor ba'i chu bo
292b2(skyes rabs): brgal bar 'dod pa dang / de dgra dam pa'i chos thos pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gus par byas te dam pa'i chos 'bad pas mnyan par bya'o// yang 'di skad du//
292b3(skyes rabs): mkhas pas nad la sman pa bzhin// thog mar dam pa bsten par bya// nad sos bya phyir 'bad pa yis// sman ni sman pa la nyan ltar// dam pa'i chos ni mnyan par bya// blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// sman
292b4(skyes rabs): de rnams ni thos nas// gus pas bsten par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byas pas 'chi med 'grub// bdud rtsi de nI 'thung ba yis// mchog ni thob par 'dod pa yino// chos smra ba dang dam po'i chos mnyan pa
292b5(skyes rabs): la gus par bya ba'i gtam slob dponi sa 'tsho sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gnas brtan A dzi ta shrI b+ha d+he dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
292b6(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ u da na ka thA/ bod skad du/ ched du brjod pa'i gtam/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar chu srin kha ru rgya mtsho'i gzings rgyags bzhin du mi 'dod kyang // / rmongs
293a1(skyes rabs): pa bdag 'dra las kyi dbang gis 'chi bdag kha ru rings par rgyug/ snying rje med pa'i 'chi bdag bdud kyis 'gro ba gzhan yang de bzhin med// de phyir cung zad skrag pa'i yid kyis dge ba'i
293a2(skyes rabs): bshes la 'dir phyag 'tshal// mkha' la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis zil pa bzhin du bdag gi tshe'i tshad// ring por gnas pa'i mthu med las dang 'bras bu grib ma bzhin du 'brang // sha kho na yod pa'i dgra bzhin gshin
293a3(skyes rabs): rje'i tshogs rnams dga' ba'i bzhin gyis blta// de tshe nye du rnams kyang bor zhing bdag nyid kho na skrag cing 'gro// sngan chad shi ba'ang ba shes dang 'grogs pa ma mthong rgan rabs ngag las yin// lung las
293a4(skyes rabs): ma gsungs phyis kyang mi 'byung da ltar bdag las gdeng ci yod// gson tshe 'di ni tshong khang chen por 'dus pa'i skye bo bzhin du 'gro// kwa'i sems khyod bag med ma byed glo bur ba des khyod ni bzung bar long
293a5(skyes rabs): dreng sang skye bo phal cher rnyed dang bkur stis 'chums shing bdud dbang song // ngan song rgya mtsho 'phel zhing dkaro po'i phyogs 'gribs lha rnams smre sngags 'don// sdom brtson can dag bslab las lhod/
293a6(skyes rabs): cing khyim pa dag gi pho nyar 'gro// lha min phyogs 'phel nag po klu yis nad rnams sna tshogs gtong bar 'gyur// de tsho 'gro ba bskyabs pa'i don brtson thugs rje can gyi bcom ldan 'das// bsnyel ba mi
