320a2(skyes rabs): med pa nyid de drug ni mal stan dang rab tu ldan pa yin no// phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang / chos gos gsum pa nyid dang / phying ba pa nyid de gsum ni chos gos dang rab tu ldan pa yin no// bsod snyoms pa nyid dang / stan cig pa nyid
320a3(skyes rabs): dang / zas phyis mi len pa nyid de gsum po nyid ni bsod snyoms dang rab tu ldan pa yin no// de dag las kyang bsod snyoms dang / chos gos dang / mal stan la sred pa nye bar skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phags
320a4(skyes rabs): pa'i rigs dang rje su mthun par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par thang bar bya ste/ de la gnas na spong ba la mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis srid par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu can gyi sred pa rnam par gcod pa yin pas bde ba dang ldan pa yin no//
320a5(skyes rabs): kha cig na re sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang po gsum ni gtso bor gyur pa yin la lhag ma rnams ni 'khor du gyur pa yin no zhes 'dod de/ 'phags pa mdzes dgra' la mngon par dgyes pa ston bya yin pa'i yin pa'i phyir ro// de yang bcom
320a6(skyes rabs): ldan 'das kyis dga' bo khyod nam ngas mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshigasu bcad pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o// la la na ra gang gis gnas bstan rnams mchog nyid du bstan cing grags pa'i lnga po 'di dag gi gtso bor gyur pa yin la// de
320b1(skyes rabs): la gzhan pa bdun ni 'khor du gyur pa yin no// 'di dag thams cad kyang dad pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / yon tan du mas phul du byung ba yin pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar smad par bya ba ma yin pa'i
320b2(skyes rabs): phyir dang / de rab tu zhi ba yin pa'i phyir dang / rab tu zhi ba 'phel bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bkra shis pa'i mchog yin no// legs pa'i lam bstan pa'i gtam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis mdzes pa zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs
320b3(skyes rabs): ba gnyis pa'o// sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag blangs// don dran pa la yang dgra gnas// shes bzhin ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// spyod pa thams cad don yod 'gyur// ji skad du bshad pa'i ldang ba dang 'dug pa na shes bzhin dang ldan
320b4(skyes rabs): pa kho na bya'o// de la lus dang / ngagA dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes bzhin nyid kyis so sor legs par brtags nas bya ste 'di ni 'di'i rgyur bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni 'di'i rgyur spyad par bya'o snyam pas don med pa ci yang sgrub par mi
320b5(skyes rabs): bya na dge ba rnams lta ci smos// 'di ni shes bzhin don dang ldan pa yin no// ji skad du 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin la gdams pa las/ sgra gcan 'dzin de bas na lus kyi las byed par 'dod pas lus 'di ni rus pa sum brgya 'dus pa//
320b6(skyes rabs): rgyus pas sbrel ba/ sha'i ris brgya phrag du mas zhal zhal byas pa// pags pa rul bas g.yogs par blta bar bya'o// sems kyi dbang gis 'jug par byed pa/ me dang rlung gis rgyu bar byed pa/ sa dang chu dag shas cher bar gyur pa na mal
321a1(skyes rabs): dang stan la sogs pa la 'jug pa/ rkyen las rag las pas mi brtan pa nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal ba de nyid kyi phyir bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa zhes gsungs pa dang / ji skad du dge slong dag lus 'di ni khyed cag
321a2(skyes rabs): gi yang ma yin/ gzhan gyi yang ma yin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / nges par bya ba yong su rdzogs nas kyang 'dug ste/ gang gi'i goms pa dang rjes su mthun par mngon par 'dod pa'i
321a3(skyes rabs): bya ba la 'jug par bya ba ni nges par 'byung ba yid la byed pa la mngon par phyogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / rjes su mthun pa la mngon par phyogs pa 'dis yid la bya ste/ 'di ni rang gi spyod yul shes pa nyid yin no// shes bzhin du bya ba
321a4(skyes rabs): 'di dag las gang zhig gi dus su bsgrub par bya ba de dus ji lta bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/ 'di ni ma rmongs pa'i yang dag pa shes pa nyid yin te/ ji skad du dge slong gis dus shes par 'gyur ba ji lta ba yin zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
321a5(skyes rabs): pa yin no// de ltar ying dag pa'i shes bzhin nyid la sogs lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las shin tu rnam par dag pa ni tidA nga 'dzin gyi sbyor ba tsam bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin no// lus dang ngag gi nyes pa 'bring dang ni// sems byung ba yi
321a6(skyes rabs): phra mo zhi gyur na// sa rdul bkrus pa'i gser ni phra mo bzhin// dge ba'i rnam rtog lhag ma lus par 'gyur// da ni ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'dus byas pa las thob pa sems bsdus nas/ 'jog pa zhes bya ba yin no// ji skad du phyag dar khrod par
321b1(skyes rabs): byed pa'i mdo las/ yang dag mtshan ma la ni legs gnas la// mnyam zhing rgod dang zhum pa'i sems nyid ni// btang snyoms zhi dang 'dzin par byed nyid du// sems de la ni mngon brtson mnyam par bzhag/ gser gyi phye ma sa rdul sbyangs
321b2(skyes rabs): pa ni// se'u'i khur bzhag 'ju bar 'dod pa ni// me stobs mnyam zhing rno dang chung ba ni// btang snyoms bzhag dang dpal bsad sbar dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnam g.yeng 'dis mnyam par bzhag pa'i phan yon la bsam par bya'o// la
321b3(skyes rabs): 'byor spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i ro sten par byed pa na mi las 'das pa'i dga' ba yid du 'ong ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ ji
321b4(skyes rabs): skad du dge slong khyim stong par zhugs pa ni mi'i las 'das pa'i dga' ba thob bo zhes gsungs pa yin no// de bzhin du lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems 'jam
321b5(skyes rabs): zhing las su rung ba sgrib pa'i rnyog pa dang bral ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin bde blag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shang tang du 'dzin bsgoms shing ting
321b6(skyes rabs): de 'dzin mang du bya zhing bag yod pa dang / sdig pa dang bral ba dang / nang du yang dag par 'jog pas rnal 'byor la mnyam par bzhag par bya zhing sems nang du zhi bar bya'o// ting nge 'dzin la brtan nas mngon par shes pa lnga dang / khyad par de
322a1(skyes rabs): dang de thob par 'gyur te/ ji skad du/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul gyi tsho gas mngon sum du bya bas sems la dbang sgyur zhing de rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba dpag tu med pa nyams su myong bar
322a2(skyes rabs): byed do zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa mi slob pa'i sa thob par ma nyams par dus byas na ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sumo tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// ji skad du skye ba rnam
322a3(skyes rabs): par 'byed pa las ting nge 'dzin gyi nye bar spyod pas nye bar bsags pa'i las kyi lha'i bdag po dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / ji skad du/ dge slong dag nga lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar
322a4(skyes rabs): du lha rnams kyi dbyung po brgya byin du gyur na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur pa lta zlos kyang ci dgos/ de lta na/ ting 'dzin grub phyir snyid ni brtson gyur pa// de yi yang dag yon tan la wA ga// yon tan la dwags bya'u 'grub
322a5(skyes rabs): pa dang // sems ni spro ba brtan po nyid du 'gyur// de la ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni bying ba dang / zhum pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa dang / mi mnyams pa spangs pa'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba dmigs pa gcig la gtod pas ting nge 'dzin ces
322a6(skyes rabs): bya ba'am/ sems dang sems las byung ba dmigs pa gcig yang dag par sdud pas na ti de bzhin yin pa'am/ phyin ci ma log pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gtod cing 'jog pa na phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par ye shes dang mthong ba de dang de bskyed
322b1(skyes rabs): pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin to// de yang gang rnam par dag pa'i sems dmigs pa gcig la nye bar zhi ba'i yon tan gyis yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus 'jug cing mi g.yeng bar gnas pa 'am/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rlung gis ma bskyod par khang
322b2(skyes rabs): pa'i nang gi mar me dang 'dra bar sems rtse gcig par 'jug pa ni ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ sems gnas pa dang yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o// yang na rnam pa gcig pa dang / sbyor ba gcig pa
322b3(skyes rabs): dang / sgo gcig pa dang / dmigs pa gcig pa la sems yang dag par 'jog pa'o// de yang sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid de/ nyon mongs pa'i yongasu gdung ba rab tu zhi ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ni 'gyod pa med pa dang / rab tu
322b4(skyes rabs): dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pas kun nas bslang bya'i gzhi'i gnas yin no// de ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam pa gcig yin no// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbye bas ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/
322b5(skyes rabs): byang chub kyi yan lag dang rab tu ldan pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de las gzhan pa ni 'jig rten pa rnam so// yang yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / log pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam pa gnyi ste/ dge ba la sems rtse gcig pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// mi
322b6(skyes rabs): dge ba la sems rtse gcig pa ni log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// gzhan yang lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa gnyis te/ lung du bstan pa ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dag go/ de gnyi ga las go bzlog pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzhan
323a1(skyes rabs): dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gnyis su 'chad de/ nye bar gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las snga ma'i cha dang nye ba ni nye bar gang Da ba'i ting 'dzin no//
323a2(skyes rabs): rigs su gyur pa'i chos kyi rjes thogs la ni gtod pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no// gzhan yang rnam pa gnyis te/ dga' ba dang bcas pa dang / dga' bu med pa'o// dga' ba dang bcas pa ni bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / de'i nyer
323a3(skyes rabs): bsdogs dang / de'i mthus gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// dga' ba med pa ni de yan chad kyi bsam gtan dang / nyer bsdogs dang / de'i mthus gnas pa rnamaso// yang gnyis te/ gzugs la spyod pa dang / gzugs
323a4(skyes rabs): med pa la spyod pa'o// gzugs la spyod pa ni slob pa dang / so so'i skye bo rnams bsam gtan bzhi dang / de'i nyer bsdogs dang / de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// gzugs med pa ni gzugs med pa la spyod pa rnamaso//
323a5(skyes rabs): gzhan yang rnam pa gnyis te/ smon pa drang bcas pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag can ma yin pa srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa ni smon pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dang bcas pa srid pa spong bar byed pa ni
323a6(skyes rabs): smon pa med pa'o// yang rnam pa gsum ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa tsam dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dang / rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'o// de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa ni bsam gtan dang po
323b1(skyes rabs): dang de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam ni bsam gtan dang po'i bsam gtan khyad par can dang de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rtog pa med la pyod pa med pa ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs
323b2(skyes rabs): pa dang / de'i nyer bsdogs dang / de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// ting 'dzin rnam pa bzhi ste/ nyams pa dang / gnas pa dang / khyad par dang / nges par 'byed pa'i skal ba can no// gzhan yang 'dun pa dang / brtson
323b3(skyes rabs): 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'i dbang du byas pa bzhi'o// de nyid dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i dbye bas ting 'dzin rnam pa mang po yod do// de yang shin tu bsdus pa dang / rgyas pa ma yin par
323b4(skyes rabs): rim pa bar ma la gnas nas 'di dag tsam zhig rnam par bzhag pa yin te/ 'di lta ste bsam gtan bzhi dang / de'i nyer bsdogs gsum dang / gzugs med pa rnam pa bzhi dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang / tshad med pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
323b5(skyes rabs): dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjesu dran pa dang / 'du shes bcu dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / yongs su chad pa bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / zil gyis gnon pa dang / 'du shes
323b6(skyes rabs): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rjesu mthun pa la rjes su mthun par 'du shes pa la sogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid gsum dang / yan
324a1(skyes rabs): lag lnga dang / shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnamaso// de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyis tshogs 'di dag rnal 'byor pas gzhung dang don gyi sgo nas yang dag par rtogs par byas nas kyang de rdzogs par bya ba'i don du gtam
324a2(skyes rabs): bcu bzhi'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i dge ba'i \u0f7fshes gnyen nam/ mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon nam/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de lta bu bsten par bya ba 'am/ gang zhig la brten na ma thos pa thos pa dang / thos pa rnams yongs su dag
324a3(skyes rabs): par byed pa dang / the tshom spong bar 'gyur ba dang / lta ba drang por byed pa dang / tshig zab mo'i don so sor shes rab kyis rtogs pa dang / gang zhig la bslabs pa na tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par
324a4(skyes rabs): 'phel ba 'gyur ba la brten par bya'o// gang yang sdug dang bla ma dang / dang bya smra mkhas tshig smra nus// zab mo'i gtam ni ston byed pa// gnas min pa ni mi sbyar ro// gal te rnyed na sdig med shes rab can// zhes bya ba la sogs dang / kun dga'
324a5(skyes rabs): bo 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa yongasu dag pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o// de la sdug pa ni tshul khrims dang thos pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byams pa'i lus dang yid kyis sam/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang /
324a6(skyes rabs): dang / don mthun pa dang / don spyod pas ni sdug par 'gyur ba yin no// nye bar zhi ba la goms pa dang / tshig ma 'chal ba dang / ldan pa nyid dang / chog shes pa nyid kyis na bla ma yin no// shes pa dang yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / khyad
324b1(skyes rabs): par rtogs par 'os pa'i spyod las dang ldan pa'i phyir dad par bya'o// chos la gus pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la brtson pa'i blo can nyid dang / yang dag pa dang / dus dang / 'jam pa dang / don dang ldan par tshig smra ba la mkhas pa dang /
324b2(skyes rabs): bdag nyid gzhal ba shes pos na smra ba la mkhas pa'o// rang bzhin bzang ba nyid dang / rang dang gzhan gyi gzhung lcags shes pa dang / gtam gyi bya ba la mkhas pas na tshig smra ba nus pa'o// 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i rim pa shes pa dang / nges
324b3(skyes rabs): bar 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas zab mo'i gtam ston par byed pa'o// legs par brtags nas byed pa dang / spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bslang ba dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes pas gnas ma yin par mi sbyor ba'o// yang na dge ba'i
324b4(skyes rabs): phyogs nyams par byed pa'i tshig drang las la mi sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro// sems can rnams ni phal cher nyes pa de la spyod pa yin pa dang / dad pa dang / blo dang / rtag pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i chags la spyod pa dang / zhe sdang la spyod
324b5(skyes rabs): pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa zhes de dang de ltar ston te/ dad pa la sogs pa la spyod pa yang gsum po 'di dag gi nang du 'dus pa yin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ni nyon mongs pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / dad pa
324b6(skyes rabs): dang / blo dang / rnam par rtog pa ni 'di'i rigs kyi bskal pa can yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags ni kun tu sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can te/ de ni de ltar byung ba'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin pas zhen pas na 'dod chags zhes bya la/ ma 'ongs pa'i
325a1(skyes rabs): nyon mongs pa can la don du gnyer ba'i sgo nas zhen pa la ni srid pa zhes bya bar bshad do// de'i bdag nyid can gyi gang zag ni dge bar 'gyur ba'i don la tshul bzhin sbyor bas na dad pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o// /
325a2(skyes rabs): de bas na 'dod chags dang / sred pa dang / dad pa la spyod pa gcig tu rab tu skye ba yin pa'i phyir dang / 'byar ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ces bya'o// de bzhin du bral ba'i bdag nyid can ni zhe sdang ste/ de zhe sdang
325a3(skyes rabs): pa'i sgo nas 'bral bar 'gyur pas na zhe sdang zhes bya'o// bdag la bstod pa'i sgo nas 'dral bar byed pas nga rgyal zhes bya'o// de'i bdag nyid can gyi gang zag ni skye ba mang pa yin/ khams gsum po dang 'bral bar byed pas na shes
325a4(skyes rabs): rab kyi sgo nas blo zhes bshad do// de bas na 'di dag kyang gcig pa nyid yin no// de bzhin du rtogs pa med pa'i bdag nyid can ni gti mug ste/ de ni rnam pa thams cad du rtog pa med pas na rmongs pa zhes bya la/ log par rtog pas na
325a5(skyes rabs): lta ba zhes bya'o// de'i bdag nyid can gyis gang zag ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'jug pa yin du zin kyang rnam par rtog pa mang bar 'gyur zhing ma nges pa blo can yin te/ de bas na 'di dag kyang gcig pa nyid yin no// yang na 'dod
325a6(skyes rabs): chags dang / sred pa dang / dad pa ni rtse zhing yon tan tshol la yongs su mi spong ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas 'dod pa la chags pa ni 'dod chags dang sred pa zhes bya la/ dge ba la dga' ba ni dad pa zhes bya'o// 'dod chags dang
325b1(skyes rabs): srid pa'i yon tan tshol ba'i bdag nyid can ni 'dod chags dang sred pa zhes bya lnga/ dge ba tshol ba'i bdag nyid can ni dad pa yin no// phan pa ma yin pa yongasu mi 'dor ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod chags dang sred pa yin la phan pa yongs su
325b2(skyes rabs): mi 'dor ba'i mtshan nyid ni dad pa yin te/ de ltar na 'di dag kyang gcig pa nyid yin no// 'di las go bzlog pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / blo'i spyod pa rnams kyang gcig pa nyid yin te/ brtse ba nyid dang / nyes
325b3(skyes rabs): pa tshol ba dang / yongasu 'dor ba'i rang bzhin can nyid yin pa'i phyir zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal can gyi gang zag brtse ba'i med pa'i rang bzhin can yin la 'dus byas shes pa ni blo yin te/ zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal ni gang zag nyes pa tshol
325b4(skyes rabs): ba'i bdag nyid can no// blo ni 'dus byas kyi nyes pa tshol ba'i bdag nyid can no// zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal ni gang zag yong su 'dor ba yin la/ blo ni 'dus byas yongs su 'dod pa shes pa'o// de bas na mtshan nyid mthun pas zhe sdang
325b5(skyes rabs): dang nga rgyal dang blo la spyod pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid yin no// de bzhin du gti mug dang / lta ba dang / rnam pAr rtog pa la spyod pa rnams ni mi brtan zhing rnam par g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir gti mug ni
325b6(skyes rabs): rnam par 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na mi bstan pa yin la/ lta ba ni log pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir mi brtan pa yin no// rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog par bya ba'i dngos po mang po la rgyugs pas na mi
326a1(skyes rabs): brtan pa yin no// gti mug ni chos kyi mtshan nyid ma rtogs pas g.yo ba yin la/ lta ba ni log pa'i chos la rnam par g.yengs pas g.yo ba yin zhing / rnam par rtog pa ni yang ba yin pas g.yo
326a2(skyes rabs): da yin no// de bas na mi brtan zhing g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir gti mug dang lta ba dang rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi gcig pa yin no// 'di dag ni las kyis phun tshun du tha dad par gyur pa yin te/ dge slong
326a3(skyes rabs): dag las kyi mtshan nyid kyis byis pa yin zhing las kyi mtshan nyid kyis mkhas pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/ des na tshul de ltar shes par bya'o// 'gro dang lta dang spyod dang smra ba dang // nyal dang zas dang gos gyon
326a4(skyes rabs): 'dod pa las// 'jam dang rtsub dang kun nas g.yo ba'i mi// 'dod dang khro dang gti mug la spyod bshad// nyes pa'i rang bzhin rjes 'jug byed pa rnams// 'di dang pha rol dag tu de'i dbang gis// spyod pa sna tshogs 'gyur pa de yis
326a5(skyes rabs): phyir// de las go bzlog tshul gyis 'di la sbyar// de ltar dpyod pa dang mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i mi mthu na pa'i phyogs shes pas gnas pa ma yin pa la sbyor bar mi byed do// gang gi phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa rang nyid 'phel
326a6(skyes rabs): bar 'dod pas 'di lta bu'i bla ma la yang dag par brten te gnas par bya ba'am/ slob dpon na mkhan po yon tan de lta bu dang mi ldan par gyur na gang na yon tan de lta bu'i bla ma yod pa der 'gro bar bya'o// dam pa rang gi yon tan
326b1(skyes rabs): gyis/ mtho ba ring po nas kyang snang / dri med sa phyogs mdzes pa yis// ston ka yi nI ring por mtshungs// der 'gro ba ni nyon mongs dang / bar chad mang bar 'gyur ba 'am// mi nus pa 'am de lta bu dang ldan pa gang na yang yod par thob
326b2(skyes rabs): par ma gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid slob dpon gyi mchog yin pa las brten par bya ste/ de'i dbang gis rang la phan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ mdo la sde las ji skad gsungs pa ston pa ni de
326b3(skyes rabs): skad gsungs pa yin la/ ji skad gsungs pa mdo sde las de skad ston pa yin te/ slob dpon yang rjes su ston pas 'di dag nyid rjes su ston pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / gal te sdig bral shes rab can lhan cig/
326b4(skyes rabs): spyod pa brtan pa'i legs gnas ma rnyed na// rgyal po rnam rgyal grong khyer spangs pa ltar// dgon pa'i glang chen lta bur gcig pur spyad// ces gsungs pa dang / de yang rang sangs rgyas kyis dam pa shes rab can la yang dag brten// grogs
326b5(skyes rabs): kyi phun tshogs rab tu bsngags yin gyis// gal te nyes med de ni ma rnyed na// bse ru lta bur gcig pu spyod par bya zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o// gcig pu gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba ji skad thos pa bag yod pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub
326b6(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshon ma'i nus pa la yid sbyar bar mi bya ste// de la brten pa'i sems ni legs pa yul du byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i phyir phul du byung ba'i chos la nges par sbyar bar bya'o// dal 'byor gyi mchog 'di ni lha'i bu
327a1(skyes rabs): 'gro ba'i snying po pas kyang shin tu mgyogs par 'gro ba yin no// de bas na yang dang yang du nyon mongs pa spong bar 'os pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang / nus pa che bas zag pa zad pa'i rten du gyur pa 'am/ de'i
327a2(skyes rabs): lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gcig gi dbang du byas nas de las gzhan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i nyes pa rnams zhi bar byed pa rnams kyang yid la bya'o// 'dod chags la spyod pa yin na yang zhe sdang gti mug gi nyon
327a3(skyes rabs): mongs pa rnams la kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba yin la/ zhe sdang la spyod pa la yang 'dod chags dang gti mug la sogs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing gti mug la spyod pa rnams la yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa 'byung
327a4(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur ro// de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gal te 'dod pa la 'dun pa skyes par gyur na mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa nges par gsungs pa yin no// dge slong dang dge
327a5(skyes rabs): slong ma lhag pa'i sems la mngon par brtson pas gnas lnga yang dang ya nga du yid la bya zhing mtshan ma gsum yang dang yang du yid la bya'o// thams cad bag yod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ de ltar na ting 'dzin yongasu rdzogs pa 'gyur ro// /
327a6(skyes rabs): ji skad du/ bag yod pa'i rgyu dang / brtson 'grus kyi rgyu dang / rtag tu bya ba'i rgyu dang / rjes su sbyor ba'i rgyu dang / yang dag par yid la byed pa'i rgyus de lta bu'i tingange 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / sems kyi yang snyoms par
327b1(skyes rabs): 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba la mkhas pa nyid du bya'o// gus par bya ba dang / rtag par bya ba dang / rjesu mthun par bya bas dmigs pa gang zhig gam/ rnam pa dang mtshan ma gang gis sems kyi nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de nyid
327b2(skyes rabs): yang dag par shes par bya'o// ji skad du/ g.yos mkhan lta bu'i mdo las/ mchin mu legs par bzung ba ni sems bskyed pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / yang ji skad du/ mtshan ma legs par bzung ba'i phyir gom pa 'dor
327b3(skyes rabs): pa yang tinge 'dzin la snyom par 'jug par byed do zhes 'dren pa'i tshig nyes par gzung ba'i rje su nyams par 'gyuraro zhes gnas brtan gyis bshad pa lta bu'o// mtshan ma ma brjod pas ni myur du snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par 'gyur te/
327b4(skyes rabs): mtshan ma legs par bzung ba yin pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa yin no// dran pa yang rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi nus pa che ba'i chos yin te/ 'di ni thams cad du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir de'i dbang gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
327b5(skyes rabs): dang / mtshan ma rnams las nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na thams cad du legs par smras pa'i dran pa dang ldan par bya'o// de ltar yang mdo las/ mnyam par bzhag pa 'di ni dran pa la nye bar gnas pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ chos 'di
327b6(skyes rabs): ni dran pa rnams pa rnams kyi ma yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las g.yeng ba'i nyes dmigs rnam pa du mas shin tu bsams par byazhing / snga ma bzhin du tingange 'dzin gyi yon tan mthong ba la 'bad par bya ste/ de ltar na ting nge
328a1(skyes rabs): 'dzin la sems yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ro// ji skad du/ khyim pa dag ga glon gyi dbang du mdzad de/ ting 'dzin thob nas de dbang du byas la drags par gyur pa med pa dang / mi smra bar de'i gong ma'i khyad par thob
328a2(skyes rabs): pa'i phyir sems rab tu gzhug par bya'o// ji skad du ri bo'i chung per mdzad/ rnal 'byor spyod pa la gtsos par byed pa'i chos smra ba nyung ba la sogs pa spang bar mi bya'o// dus su chos nyan pa la brten par bya'o// rang gi sems la so sor brtags pa mang du
328a3(skyes rabs): bya'o zhes ji skad bshad pa dang / de ltar ting 'dzin gyi yan lag rnam par drag pa dang ldan na yid gang la nye bar sbyar ba yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa de thogs pa med pa nyid du tIng 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i gter thob par 'gyur ro// bag
328a4(skyes rabs): med nyes dang yan lag nyams pa ni// sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// ting 'dzin de 'dras de phyir de rnams kyi// yan log la ni 'bad pa nyid du gyis// lags pa'i lam bstan po'i gtam las ting 'dzin gyi yan lag rnam par dag/
328a5(skyes rabs): pa zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs pa gsum pa'o// / slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa legs pa'i lam bstan pa'i gtam rtogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dI baM ka ra shI dz+nyA na dang
328a6(skyes rabs): lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po phye dang gsum mo// dge bar gyur cig/ mang+ga'aM/
329a1(skyes rabs): dge ba 'du'i las kyisam bstan pa
329b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ d+ha sha ku sh+tsa la kar mA pA phA nIr d+he sha/ bod skad du/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dge ba bcu po 'di dag ni mngon par mtho ba dang /
329b2(skyes rabs): nges par legs pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma dag gis 'di la bslab par bya'o// de la bcu gang zhe na/ lus kyi las rnam pa gsum ste/ srog mi gcod pa dang / ma byin par mi len pa dang / 'dod pas log par mi
329b3(skyes rabs): g.yem pa'o// ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi ste/ rdzun mi smra ba dang / phra ma mi smra ba dang / tshig rtsub po mi spro ba dang / tshig 'khyal par mi smra ba'o// yid kyi las rnam pa gsum ste/ brnab sems spangs pa dang / gnod sems spangs pa dang / log
329b4(skyes rabs): lta ba spangs pa'o// de yang mi dge ba bcu spangs pa ni/ dag pa bcu yin pas spang bar bya ba bcu brjod pa par bya ste/ de ni 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las ji skad du/ srog gcod pa'i sems can dang // gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa
329b5(skyes rabs): dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang // sems can dmyal ba'i bar du 'gro// dbyen byed pa dang tshig rtsub dang // rdzun du smra zhing mi sdom pa// byis pa 'khyalnga pAr smra ba rnams// so so'i skye bo bslus pa bcings// gzhan gyi spyod la brnab
329b6(skyes rabs): sems dang // gnod sems dag ni mang ba dang // mi gang lta ba log zhugs pa// ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// lus kyi sdig pa rnam gsum dang // ngag gi sdig pa rnam bzhi dang // yid kyi sdig pa rnam gsum ni// sdig byed pa dag rab
330a1(skyes rabs): tu byed/ sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas na// de phyir ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// ci nas ngan 'gror mi btang bar// bskyab pa'i phyir ni rab tu 'byung // zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dag go/ ji ltar na
330a2(skyes rabs): nyes pa de dag rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ srog gcod pa ni/ gzhi sems can yin pa dang / der 'du shes pa dang / gsad par bsas pa dang / sbyor ba byas pa dang / sbyor ba byas pa de nyid kyi tshe'am/ gzhan gyi tshe shi la zhes pa yan lag lngas rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
330a3(skyes rabs): ma shi bar 'gyod pa las shra ba ni na smad do// myos pa dang sems 'khrug pa dang / tshor bas gzir ba la nyes pa med par thams cad la sbyar ro// ma byin par len pa ni/ yan lag bzhis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ blang bar bya ba gzhan gyis
330a4(skyes rabs): yongs su bzung bar gyur pa yin pa dang / der 'du shes pa dang / brku bar bsams pa dang / gnas nas spos pa'o// 'dod pas log pa ro g.yam pa ni rnam pa bdun te/ bdag nyid las byung ba dang / rang gi chung ma las byung ba dang / chu
330a5(skyes rabs): mar mi rigs pa chung mar byas pa las byung ba dang / chung ma yin pa las byung ba dang / skyes pa las byung ba dang / dud 'gro las byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo las byung ba'o// de la bdag nyid las byung ba ni/ mi rigs pa'i yul dran pas dbang
330a6(skyes rabs): po las rang 'am/ gzhan gyis khu ba 'byin par byed pa'o// rang gi chung ma las byung ba ni/ dus ma yin par nyin par dang / bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / na ba dang / sbrum pa dang / mya ngan gyi gdungs pa dang / zla mchen dang
330b1(skyes rabs): ldan pa dang / bang ma sangs pa la sogs dag dang / gnas ma yin pa pha ma dang / bla ma dang / dkon mchog dang / mchod rten la sogs pa'i gnas dang / yan lag ma yin pa kha dang / bshad pa'i lam dang / lte ba la sogs te/ mdor na bud med kyi
330b2(skyes rabs): dbang po las gzhan pa thams cad do// de ltar dus dang / gnas dang / yan lag min pa dag tu rang gi chung ma la 'khrig pa spyod pa ni/ rang gi chung ma las byung ba'i 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'o// chung mar mi rigs pa chung mar byas pa la byung ba ni/ tshangs
330b3(skyes rabs): par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge slong ma 'am dge slob ma 'am/ dge tshul ma 'am bsnyen gnas la gnas pa'i bud med chung mar blangs te/ de dag mi dga' ba 'am/ dga' yang rung ste/ sdom pa gtong ba'i rkyen byas pa ste/ 'di ni chung mar mi rigs par
330b4(skyes rabs): chung mar byas pa las byung ba'o// chung ma ma yin pa las byung ba ni/ bud med gang khyim thab gzhan gyis bzung ba dang / rang gi bdun rgyud las ma 'das pa'i 'brel par gyur pa dang / chos kyi mtshan can dang / sdom pa can dang / pha ma dang / ming po dang / spun
330b5(skyes rabs): zla dang / rus chags dang / cho 'brang du smos pas bsrungs pa dang / gyos rgyug dang / srung po la sogs pa khyo'i phyogs smos pas bsrungs pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i rigs dang yon tan gyis bsrungs pa dang / smad 'tshong ma dag kyang skyes bu gzhan gyis rin
330b6(skyes rabs): sngar byin pas bzung ba dang / skyes bu gzhan gyis chung ma dang 'dra bar bdag gir byas pa rnams te/ de dag dang 'khrig pa spyod pa rnams ni gzhan gyis tshor na ches sdig pa che la/ ma tshor du zin kyang 'dod pas g.yem pa'i rnam par smin pa 'byung ngo // skyes
331a1(skyes rabs): pa las byung ba ni skyes bu gzhan gyi kha dang bshang ba'i lam la sogs par mtshon sbyor ba'o// dud 'gro las byung ba ni/ ba lang dang / ra lug dang / rna bong la sogs pa'i mtshan dang bshangad pa'i lam la sogs mtshan sbyor
331a2(skyes rabs): ba'o// khye'u dang bu mo las byung ba ni/ 'khrig pa spyad mi bzod pa'i khye'u dang bu mo'i kha dang mtshan dang / bshang ba'i lam du mtshon sbyor ba'o// de ltar 'dod pas log par g.yem pa de dag ni/ yan lag gsum gyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dus
331a3(skyes rabs): la sogs pa de dag la de dag tu 'du shes pa dang / sbyor ba byas pa dang / rje su mthun pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba'o// de ltar de dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum mo// rdzun du smra ba ni yan lag gsum gyi rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gzhi ma nor
331a4(skyes rabs): bar khong du chud pa dang / de la 'du shes bsgyur ba dang / log par smras pa'o// phra ma ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbye bar bya ba sems can nyid dang / dbyen gyi tshig smras pa'o// tshig rtsub mo ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs
331a5(skyes rabs): par 'gyur te/ gzhi sems can yin pa dang / tshig rtsub mo smras pa'o// rlig 'khrul pa ni/ yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ chos dang ldan pa der bsams pa dang / tshig 'khyal pa smras pa'o// de dag ni ngag gi nyes par
331a6(skyes rabs): spyod pa bzhi'o// brnab sems ni/ yan lag gnyis kyi rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gzhi gzhan gyi yin pa dang / de la brnab sems bskyed pa'o// gnod sems ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gzhi sems can yin pa dang /
331b1(skyes rabs): de la kun nas mnar sems par gyur pa'o// log par lta ba ni/ yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gzhi phyin ci ma log pa dang / de nyid la bsam pa phyin ci log pa skyed pa'o// de dag ni khyad par gyi yan lag go// thun mong
331b2(skyes rabs): gi yan lag ni/ sems gtso zhes bya ba'o// de dag ni yid kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum mo// de ltar na kun nas slong ba'i sems pa dang / rjes su spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i gzhi bsams pa de nyid dang / sbyor ba'i 'bras bu dngos gzhi nyid
331b3(skyes rabs): spyad pa dang / mjug rje su yi rang ba'o// yan lag lnga rdzogs na ni mi dge ba gang yang legs par rdzogs pa yin no// thams cad ma tshang na ni cung zad spyad pa ci rigs par sbyar ro// cung zad du na gzhi ma nor ba nyid ni kha cig tu ma nges pa
331b4(skyes rabs): srid do// de ltar mi dge ba bcu po de dag spyad pa'i 'bras bu rgya cher ni/ dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las shes par bya zhing / mdor bsdus pa ni ji skad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las gsungs
331b5(skyes rabs): pa/ srog gtsad pas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ tshe thung ba dang
331b6(skyes rabs): nad mang ba'o// ma byin par len pas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/
332a1(skyes rabs): longs spyod chung ba dang / thun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pas log par g.yem pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gA shin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do//
332a2(skyes rabs): de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ lhod pa dang bcas pa'i chung ma dang / g.yog 'khor ma bsrungs pa'o// rdzun du smra bas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas
332a3(skyes rabs): su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ skur pa mang ba dang / gzhan gyis bslu ba'o// phra mas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song
332a4(skyes rabs): gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ g.yog mi mthun pa dang g.yog ngan par 'gyur ba'o// tshig rtsub pos ni/ sems can
332a5(skyes rabs): dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos pa dang / 'thab mo'i tshig
332a6(skyes rabs): thos par 'gyur ba'o// ngag 'khyal pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'di lta
332b1(skyes rabs): ste/ tshig mi btsun pa dang / spobs pa mang ba'o// brnab sems kyis ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrod do// de nas ci sdo mor smyos na yang / rnam byar
332b2(skyes rabs): smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ chog mi shes pa dang / 'dod pa che ba'o// gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do//
332b3(skyes rabs): de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ gnod pas glags lta ba dang / pha rol gyis mnar ba'o// log par lta ba ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye
332b4(skyes rabs): gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ lta ba ngan pa ltung ba dang / g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur pa'o zhes gsungs te/ de dag
332b5(skyes rabs): kyang mtshon pa ste/ mi dge ba bcu po 'di dag ni/ re re la yang rnam par smin pa yang shin tu mang po yod par rig par bya'o// da ni 'di dag gi lci ba dang / yang ba nyid brjod par bya ste/ de ni 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
332b6(skyes rabs): mdzod kyi mdo las gsungs pa/ 'od srungs pha yang yin la/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yin pa gsod pa gang yin pa 'di ni srog gcod pa'i nang na ma rungs pa'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa 'di ni ma yin par len pa'i
333a1(skyes rabs): nang na ma rungs pa yin no// ma yang yin la dgra bcom ma yang yin pa las nyal po byas pa 'di ni 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa la
333a2(skyes rabs): la skur pa 'debs pa 'di ni/ rdzun du smra ba'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no// dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa 'di ni phra ma'i nang na ma rung ba yin no// 'phags pa rnams la mi snyan par brjod pa 'di ni/ ngag nub mo rnams kyi nang na ma rungs pa yin
333a3(skyes rabs): no// chos thos par 'dod pa rnams la rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa 'di ni tshig 'khyal ba'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no// yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi rnyed pa 'phrog par sems pa 'di ni/ brnab sems
333a4(skyes rabs): kyi nang na ma rungs pa yin no// mtshams med pa byed pa 'di ni/ gnod sems kyi nang na ma rungs pa yin no// lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'di ni/ log par lta ba'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// mdor bsdu
333a5(skyes rabs): na rgyun tu spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa drag pos spyod pa dang / rten gyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi brten cing / rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa la sogs pa med pa dang / yon tan dang gtso bo
333a6(skyes rabs): 'phags pa'i gzhi las byung ba ste/ de dag dang gang ldan pa'i mi dge ba bsu ni lci ba nyid do// de bas na 'phags pa nA gA rdzu nas kyang / rtag dang mngon par zhen dang gnyen po med// yon tan gtso ldan gzhi las byung ba'i las// dge
333b1(skyes rabs): dang mi dge rnam lnga chen po ste// de bas dge ba spyod la brtson par bgyi zhes bshad do// da ni de dag rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa gang gang gis rdzogs par byed pa bstan ce na/ de ni chos mngon pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las// gsod
333b2(skyes rabs): dang gnod sems tshig rtsub dag/ zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed// log g.yam brnab sems ma byin len// chags pa yis ni mthar phyin byed// log par lta ba gti mug gis// lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs
333b3(skyes rabs): par 'dod// ces bshad pa las shes par bya'o// da ni de dag gis gnang ba nyid brjod par bya ste// gang bdag gi don la rjes su lta ba cung zad tsam yang med la byed pa gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig 'dod
333b4(skyes rabs): cing thams cad du snying rje dang ldan pa dag la ni/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum ma gtogs pa 'am/ log par lta ba nyid gtogs pa dag la lam rjes su gnang ba ste/ de la byang chub sems
333b5(skyes rabs): dpa'i sdom pa gtan la phab pa'i gtsug lag dag la blta'o// de ltar blang bar bya ba dang // mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang yan lag dang / 'bras bu dang / lci yang dang rgyu dang / rjes su bstan pa dag
333b6(skyes rabs): gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa yin no// dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam// legs brjod bsod nams dri med gang // deng 'dir bdag gis bsgrub pa des// 'gro ba mi
334a1(skyes rabs): na du/ dag kya ngan mas na d+h+r-i/ na 'grom pa du// 'gro ma // gtananas
334a2(skyes rabs): da bye bar do// dge btsu smras rdzun pa sa rlob dpon bram ze btsun bachom ldan rang 'byor dbyangs kyin pa snun sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
334a3(skyes rabs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud d+ha ka ra bar ma dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
335a1(skyes rabs): rta byangs kyi mdzad pa'i mya ngan bas la ga/ mi dge ba bcu'i yang bstan pa// dran pa nyer gnag gcig le'u byas pa 'gro brgyan gci ga du bya la/ cha bcos ldad pa khyo rgyas kyi ma nga/ dod so pa'i mi srin byig gnyen gyi ya ga/ dge slong gargo babasas la khring brnas gnas/
335b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar spyad du/ sho ka b+hI no dA na/ bod skad du/ mya ngan bsal ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig dga' bral nyams thag te//
335b2(skyes rabs): tu mya ngan me 'bar ba// bsgrims nas shin tu spro snying zhing // rang gi sems nyid brjod par bya// las kyi lam zhugs thob pa yi// sgron ma med par skya bo yang // nyes pa ma byas song gyur pa// de la ci zhig yongs su gdung // ci ste de nyid 'chi bar
335b3(skyes rabs): 'gyur// gzhan ni su yang min nA go/ 'di ni zur chen non pa zhes// cho de chen po gdab par rigs// 'di ltar thams cad skye ba yi// mdun na gnas pa 'chi ba ste// kun kyang 'pho bar snang ba'i phyir// mya ngan bya bar 'os pa min// mdza' dang 'grogs
335b4(skyes rabs): pa brkam pa yi// skye bo mya ngan gyis gdung ba// rnga rtsing dag la chags pa'i 'bri// rngon pas nags kyi nang du bzhin// gang tshe kun gyis bgrod bya zhing // de dang der ni 'gro ba yi// snga nus dri der song ba la// ci yi phyir na mya ngan byed// mi bzad 'chi ba'i
335b5(skyes rabs): bdag po la// rab tu myos pa'i skye bo 'di// nags na gsod skyed se ng+ge yi// mdun nu ri dgas gnas pa bzhin// 'chi ba bzlog par bya ba yi// gang tshe thabs kun med pas na// sgo bsring ba dag mi bskyed par// mu lA nya bzhin ci zhig 'gye// sa 'am
335b6(skyes rabs): ci ste mtho ris na// skyes nas la la ma shi ba// 'ga' zhig khyod kyi mthong ba 'am// thos sam 'on te the tsom za// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad la// mi rtag ma yis bsreg gyur pa// dgon par me ni 'bar ba yis// dgon pa'i me tr-igra
336a1(skyes rabs): bzhin/ rtag par 'du shes rnam log na// srid rtse las kyang 'gro ba rnams// 'chi ba'i zhags pas grangs gyur pa// zhags pas glang po bzhin du'o// bsam gtan las skyes bde myong ba// tshangs pas tshangs pa'i gnas
336a2(skyes rabs): las kyang // mi rtag phyir ni lhung gyur pa// chu yis klung gis 'grams bzhin// brgya byin dag ni stong rnams kyang // 'khor los sgyur ba brgya dag dang // dus kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni// mar me 'bar la rlung gis bzhin// drang srong chen po lnga mngon shes
336a3(skyes rabs): 'a la rgyang ring 'gro ba yang // gang na spyod yul 'chi med pa// der ni 'gro bar nus pa med// gang du sa rnams bsregs 'gyur te// lhun po'ang thal bar 'jig pa dang // rgya mtsho'i chu yang skams gyur na// lus can de dag lta ci smos// ci ste sangs
336a4(skyes rabs): rgyas rnams kyi sku// mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa// rdo rje'i sku yang mi rtag na// chu shing snying po'ang med 'dra ba'i// lus can gzhan rnams smos ci dgos// gnyen gyi phang du blangs pa yi// skye bo rnams kyang 'chi bas phrogs// rgya mtsho'i nang
336a5(skyes rabs): na gnas pa yi// klu lA na mkha' lding gis bzhin// kyi hud mi srog kye gnyen zhes// shin tu sdug bsngal du 'bod pa// ji ltar sbrul gyis sbal pa bzhin// 'gro ba rnams ni 'chi bas ming// rab tu bgrod dka'i don gyi mthar// ma byin par ni
336a6(skyes rabs): 'jig rten 'di// rab tu 'chi ba'i khar bcug pa// chu srin gnas su chu 'bab bzhin// gang dus 'jig rten pha rol tu// 'gro ba'i rjes 'gro 'ga' med na// dgra 'am ci ste mdza' sdug rnams// 'di la bye brag med par 'gyur// skye bo gzhan la
336b1(skyes rabs): byams byed phyir// skye bo rang 'khor 'du shes pa// bsam pa'i 'dam du bying ba ni// glang po 'dam du bying ba bzhin// khyod kyi ji snyed bshes gnyen rnams// 'khor ba'i nang na blangs bor ba// gang+gA'i bye ma rnams la yang // de snyed tsam du
336b2(skyes rabs): yod ma yin// gang nyid khyod kyis rabs bsgrims te// brtse ba'i bu yi 'du shes pa// de nyid tshe rabs gzhan dus na// rdeg par byed cing dgrar 'du shes// rang gis bshes pa'i mu ma yang / khyod kyis 'thungs pa'i srid gzhan no// de yis
336b3(skyes rabs): khrag nyid 'thungs ba dang // rgyab nas sha yang zos pa yin// gang khyod 'di ltar 'khod gyur te// mgo la lan grangs brgyar brjed pa// de nyid bran gyur khyod yin te// rtog pas lan grangs brgyar yang btags// 'gro ba'i rgyu yi dngos po
336b4(skyes rabs): yis// sngon chad gzhan du snang gyur pa// gzhan na yongasu 'gyur ba ste// rmi bdun drang srong bdun tshogs bzhin// ji ltar na mkha'i char thigs ni// tshogs shing rnam par 'jig pa gyur pa// de bzhin 'khor ba'i srog chags kyang // tshogs shing
336b5(skyes rabs): rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// ldan pa dang ni bral ba yi// lus can rnams ni yud tsam ste// 'bab chu dba' klong 'khyil shugs la// shing dag ji ltar btsugs pa bzhin// ngo mtshar che'o ma rig mthu// gang gis 'gro ba rnam rmongs pa'i// bral
336b6(skyes rabs): ba'i sdug bsngal dran nyams shing // ldan pa rnams la sred par bya// gtsang ma'i gnas rnam ma gtogs par// sna tshogs las kyis chas nas su// bros sa gang du'ang mi ltung ba// sems can 'ga' yang yod ma yin// yang dang yang du dmyal
337a1(skyes rabs): ba na/ zangs bzhun bskol ba gang 'thungs pa// rgya mtsho nang gi chu la yang // de yi tshad cim yod ma yin// khyi dang phag tu gyur pa ni// mi gtsang ba ni gang zos pa// ri yi rgyal po lhun po yi// tshad las shin tu
337a2(skyes rabs): lhag par 'gyur// mdza' bshes rab tu bral ba yis// 'khor ba'i gnas su gang ngus pa// mig gi mchi ma'i thigs pa yi// snod du rgya mtsho 'ang rung ma yin// phan tshun dag rtsod pa'i phyir// mgo bo bcad pa gang yin pa// spungs na de ltar mtho
337a3(skyes rabs): ba ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las kyang thal// srin bur gyur cing rab bkres pa// sa lus zos pa gung yin pa// 'o ma'i rgya mtsho che nang du// de yis bkang na shin tu 'gang // yi dgas 'jig rten mi bzad par// bkres skom sdug bsngal gang myong ba//
337a4(skyes rabs): de ni dran phyir rang gi snying // rang gi sha yang 'dod mi 'gyur// mi la dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// tho btsems pa ni gang myong de// brjod pa bdag la mthu med pa// rang gi lce la ngo tsha zhing // ri bo'i ngos la yun rings dus// lha yi bde ba myong
337a5(skyes rabs): gyur pa// lha rdzas yul gyis mi ngoms te// shing skam po la me bzhin no// dge ba'i las rnams yongs zad pas// bde 'gro las kyang shi 'phos te// tshe zad sa la ltung ba ni// bdab chags bya ni mkha' la bzhin// las kyi shugs kyis 'gro
337a6(skyes rabs): ba 'di// gang phyir 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor// bde bas chags pa yongs spangs shing // thar pa la ni blo zhen bya// mya ngan bsal ba zhes bya ba// slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so//
337b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ da sha ku sha la karma pa thA nir de shA/ bod
337b2(skyes rabs): skad du/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mi dge las kyi lam bcu ni// rang bzhin kha na ma tho bcas// bde ba don du gnyer ba yis// 'bad pa yas ni spang bar bya// bcu po de dag
337b3(skyes rabs): gang zhe na/ lus kyi dbye ba rnam gsum ste// ngag gi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsum// mi dge bcu ru de dag 'dod// de rnams rab tu bshad par bya// de la re zhig lus kyi ni// srog gcod ma byin len log g.yem// ngag gi rdzun
337b4(skyes rabs): tshig phra ma dang / tshig rtsub dang ni 'khyal ba rnams// yid kyis log lta ba rnabs sems gnod// de la srog gcod gang zhe na// srog dang ldan par gyur pa la// srog dang ldan par 'du shes dang / gsod sems nye bar gnas pa dang //
337b5(skyes rabs): rim pa bzhin du byas ldan dang // srog ni gcad par gyur pa ste// yan lag lnga po de dag dang // ldan pa srog gcod yin par bshad// ma byin len pa gang zhe na// gzhan dag gi ni yin pa dang // gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa dang // gzhan gyi
337b6(skyes rabs): yin par 'du shes dang // rku sems nye bar gnas pa dang // rim pa bzhin du byas ldan dang // gnas nas spags par gyur pa ste// yan lag drug po de dag dang // ldan pa ma byin len par bshad// de la log g.yem gang zhe na// log par g.yem
338a1(skyes rabs): pa rnam bzhi ste// yul minA pa drang dus min dang // yan lag mi nA dang bgrod min pa'o// de la'ang yul min bya ba ni// pam chos mchod rten sku gzugs dang // byang chub sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas sogs// mkhan
338a2(skyes rabs): po dang ni slob dpon dang // pha ma drung na gnas pa ni// yul min de ru mi bya'o// de la dus min bya ba ni// zla mtshan 'jig na sbrum ma dang // bu chung dang bcas mi myos dang // sdug bsngal yid mi bde sogs dang // yan lag brgyad nas dus min yin//
338a3(skyes rabs): yan lag min pa gang zhe na// kha dang bshang lam byis pa dang // brla bsdams lag pas bskyod pa yin// bgrod par bya min zhes bya ste// gzhan bzung chos kyi rgyal mtshan ldan// rigs kyis bsrungs dang rgyal mor gnas// gzhan gyis
338a4(skyes rabs): blangs dang slad 'tshong dang // nye du dag dang 'brel pa ni// de dag bgrod bya min pa yin// rnam pa de dag rnams la ni// rang gi chung ma brten pa yang // 'dod log spyad par 'gyur ba yin// rdzun du smra ba gang zhe na// dngos po gnas par gyur pa
338a5(skyes rabs): dang / dngos po las ni nyams gyur dang // 'du shes gzhan du bsgyur ba dang // rdzun du smra bar gyur pa dang // rim pa bzhin du byas ldan dang // yan lag lnga po de dag dang // ldan pa rdzun du smra bar 'gyur// de la phra ma gang zhe na// gzhan dag
338a6(skyes rabs): dbye phyir phra ma yin// de la tshig rtsub gang zhe na// gzhan gyi gnad snun byed pa ni// yid du mi 'ong tshig smras yin// de la khyal pa gang zhe na// 'dod pas nye bar blang ba dang // chags pa yis ni nyer bskyed nas// 'brel med smra ba 'khyal pa
338b1(skyes rabs): yin na/ de la brnab sems gang zhe na// gzhan gyi nor dang longs spyod la// mchog tu mngon par chags pa yin// gnod seMs zhes bya gang zhe na// sems can rnams la sdang ba yi// rdeg dang 'ching dang gsod pa ste// de dag sems can la byed pa'o//
338b2(skyes rabs): log lta zhes bya gang zhe na// sbyin med mchod sbyin yod min dang // 'jig rten pha rol yod min zhing // dge sbyong bram ze lha rnams med// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom dang // rang sangs rgyas dang legs spyong dang // nyes par spyod pa yod min
338b3(skyes rabs): zhes// bya ba log par lta ba yin// 'phags pa dran pa nyer gzhag dang // theg pa chen po'i mdo rnams las// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas gsungs pa// 'di ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin// mi dge las kyi lam bcu ni// dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu ru
338b4(skyes rabs): bshad// dge bcu las kyi lam bsten pas// dmyal la sogs par ltung ma yin// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// skye zhing skye ba rnams su ni// gang zhig skye ba las rgyal ba'i// byang chub rang bzhin des 'grub shog/ mi dge
338b5(skyes rabs): bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pA zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhyen po a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
338b6(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ sad+d+ha rma s+thi ti u paM sha nA ka ri kA/ bod skad du/ dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan ldan zhing dbab bya phabs// yang dag ye shes
339a1(skyes rabs): snang ba ldan// rtag tu gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum gtso phyag 'tshal lo// gang la byed po gzhan med pa// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las// dge dang mi dge rang byas gang // de yi 'bras
339a2(skyes rabs): bu 'jig rten spyod// de ltar mkhyen nas thugs brtses non// 'jig rten gsum gtso gcig pa nyid// 'gro ba'i don du las gang dang // 'bras bu gang dag yin gsungs pa// de ni bdag gis mdor bshad kyis// khyod kyis nyon la dam
339a3(skyes rabs): pa dang // dam pa min pa'i rgyu yi las// bya ba dang ni spang ba'i rigs// chags dang gti mug 'jigs dang 'khro// mi gang mi ni gsod pa dang // gzhan yang bskyed nas gsod byed pa// de dag nges par yang sos 'gro// gang gi phyir
339a4(skyes rabs): na lo stong phrag/ mang por yang ni de dag tu// btags shing btags shing yang 'tsho bas// de phyir yang spos yin par bshad// pha ma dang ni grog dang gnyen// bshas gnyen la ni 'khu byed dang // phra ma rdzun ni smra ba'i mi// thig nag du ni
339a5(skyes rabs): 'gro bar 'gyur// gang phyir de la shing bzhin du// thig nag btab nas sog le dag/ 'bar ba yi ni shog byed de// de phyir thig nag yin par bshang// ra dang lug dang waM dag dang // ri bong byi ba ri dgas phag/ gzhan yang bskyed nas
339a6(skyes rabs): gsad byas na// lus can bsdus 'joms 'gro bar 'gyur// gang phyir bsdus nas der 'dor dang // yang dag sreg par byed pas na// de yi phyir ni bsdus 'joms te// de ltar ming ni don mthun grags// 'dir ni lus can gang dag
339b1(skyes rabs): lus dang ngag yid nyon mongs byed// gang dag lhang 'jug gzhan g.yo byed// mi de dag ni ngu 'bod 'gro// der ni drag po'i me dag gis// rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrags byas na// gang phyir skad ni drag 'byin pa// de phyir de dag du 'bod yin
339b2(skyes rabs): gang gis lha dang bram ze dang // blo ma'i rdzas phrogs sdug bsngal byas// gang dag gtams pa 'phrog byed pa// de dag ngu 'bod chen por 'gro// mes bsregs pa ni drag phyir dang // ngu 'bod pa yang me phyir dang // lci zhing che ba nyid kyi phyir// de
339b3(skyes rabs): ni ngu 'bod chen po yin// yon tan dag gis che ba la// gnod par drag po byas pa'am// phra ma bla mo bsad byas na// nges par bskal par myanar med 'tshed// me drag dar ni lus dag gis// rus pa dag kyang lhag par 'gyur// gang
339b4(skyes rabs): phyir bde ba'i skabs med pa// de phyir mnar med yin par bshad// lus can gang dag gcig la gcig/ gnod par dka' bas g.yul ngor gsod// sdig can de dag sdug bsngal dang // ldan pa'i ral gri sems can skye// gang phyir
339b5(skyes rabs): do yi sen mo ni// lcags byas 'bar rno de dag gis// gcig gis gcig gsod gang yin dAs// ral gri rtsa mo can du bshad// bya bo byed pa shal ma ri// lcags kyi rtse mo rtse mo 'bar// ser ni bcu drug yod pa la// ngu zhing stobs
339b6(skyes rabs): kyis 'dzeg par 'gyur// bud med shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta// mchu rno lus chen 'bar ba yis// gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog pa la// 'jus nas za ba kho nar 'gyur// bag phab pa la gnod byed mi// nags tshal ral gri 'dab can du//
340a1(skyes rabs): gtubs byas ngu zhing bya rgod khyi// 'ug pa bya rog za bar 'gyur// gang dag gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa// de dag lcags kyi tho lum ni// che ba dag kyang za ba dang // yang dang yang du zangs bskol 'thung //
340a2(skyes rabs): rtag tu mngon la dga' ba gang // lo ni bye bar ngu zhing yang // khyi ni lcags kyi mche ba can// mi bsrun shin tu dbang sred za// chu skyes nya la sogs bsad nas// chu bo rab med 'bar ba yi// zangs kyi khu ba'i chur 'gro zhing // mi de mes kyang
340a3(skyes rabs): sreg par 'gyur// gang zhig rang don tsam rmongs nas// chos dang mi ldan shags 'gyed na// sems can dmyal bar de ngu zhing // 'khor los mngon par gzir bar 'gyur// 'di la gang gis gzugs can la// gnod pa rnam pa mang
340a4(skyes rabs): byas pa// de dag yun rings 'khor lo dang // ri dang tho ba 'bar bas gzir// gang zhig chos kyi stegs 'jig cing // yang dag ma yin lam smra ba'i// mi de dag ni spu gri'i sos// gtams pa'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// sen mos
340a5(skyes rabs): shig la sogs bcom na// de dag lus ni cher 'gyur la// ston brgyar yang dang yang du ni// brag sgor po yis 'joms par 'gyur// gang zhig brtul zhugs bzang mnos nas// legs par srung bar mi byed na// de ni nges par shwa dang
340a6(skyes rabs): rus// 'jig pa'i me mar mur du bsregs// gang du 'tsho ba log pa ni// cung zad kyis kyang 'tsho byed pa// de ni skyugs 'jim nub gyur nas// srin bu rnams kyi za bar 'gyur// 'bru yi nang na 'khod pa yis// srog chags mthong nas 'joms pa
340b1(skyes rabs): gang // de ni lcags kyi gtun shing gi sa// yang dang yang du brdung bar 'gyur// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa dang // g.yo byad rdzun du smra ba dang // gzhan la gnod byed dga' ba ni// gshin rje'i srin por skye bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal kun gyi
340b2(skyes rabs): sa bon ni// chung ngu la sogs dbye ba yis// lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa ste// de ni phra yang spang bar bya// sems can dmyal ba'i rabs rdzogs so// / 'dod chags kyis ni rmongs pa dag/ dang pa phug
340b3(skyes rabs): ron la sogs dang // bong bu 'dod chags can rnams kyi// skyes nas srin sogs skye gnas skye// khong khro 'dzin pas sbrul du skyes// nga rgyal khengs sems seng+ger 'gyur// che ba yis ni nga rgyal gyis// khyi dang bong bu'i skye gnas skye// ser sna
340b4(skyes rabs): ga dog la sogs pa'i// skyon gyis lus can shi nas spre'u// mu chor smra dang spyi btol che// rang bzhin mi brtan khrar skye'o// gsod dang 'ching dang ser sna yis// lus can pa yang khyi la sogs// 'gyur ro mi bsrun las kyis ni// sdom dang
340b5(skyes rabs): sdig pa mi sdug skye// khro dang sor sna can gyi mi// shi nAs shA ni za byed pa// stug dang spre'u wa dang dom// bya rgod spyang ka la sogs skye// mi bstan khro gnyer sbyin byed mi// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klur skye'o// gtong zhing khro dang dregs pa yis// nam
340b6(skyes rabs): mkha' lding gi dbang phyug skye// rang gi lus dang ngag yid kyis// sdig pa'i las ni gang byas pa// de ni dud 'gro'i skye bas na// de ni chung yang ma byed cig/ dud 'gro'i rabs rdzogs so// /
341a1(skyes rabs): rtse log can gang sbyin pa spangs// bza' dang lta ba 'phrog byed pa// de dag yi dgas lus srul po// ro rnams za bar byed par skye// gang zhig byis pa rnams la 'tsho// sred pas 'drid par byed pa de// khong gi dri ma za
341a2(skyes rabs): byed pa'i// lus srul por ni skye bar 'gyur// mi gang spyod pa dman pa dang // shin tu zhum dang ser sna ldan// rtag tu 'dod byed de shi nas// yi dgas lba ba can du skye// gang zhig ci yang mi ster la// sbyin pa zlog par byed pa de// yi
341a3(skyes rabs): dgas bkres pas rnyongs pa yi// gsus che kha ni khab tsam 'gyur// gang zhig sbyong dang sbyin mi byed// rigs kyi don du nor bsrung na// da ni yi dgas mtshan gtor spyod// shin dus bsngos za der skye'o// gang zhig gzhan gyi nor
341a4(skyes rabs): 'phrog 'dod// byin nas 'gyod par byed pa de// shi nas mchil ma skyugs pa la// za bar byed pa'i yi dgas skye// gang zhig khros pas mi snyan smra// mtshang 'dru ba ni smra byed pa// las des shin tu yun ring bar// yi dgas kha 'bar
341a5(skyes rabs): skye bar 'gyur// gang zhig 'thab mo byed pa dang // ma chags sems ni khro byed pa// de ni yi dgas me 'bar ma// srin dang sdig sbrul phye leb za// gang zhig grong bca' 'beb shing ster// byin zhig gnod par byed pa de// grul bum
341a6(skyes rabs): byang ni mi thug pa// mchod par 'os par skye bar 'gyur// zas kyi ched du brtse med pas// srog chags bsad cing sbyin byed gang // de dag shi nas nges par ni// srin po'i bza' dang bca' bar 'gyur// rtag tu dri dang phreng la dga'//
341b1(skyes rabs): sbyin byed khro ba chung ba ni// lha rnams dga' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba// dri za rnams su skye bar 'gyur// gang dag kha cig phra ma tshe// khro zhing dgos pa'i ched sbyin na// de ni sha za ma rungs nyid// bzhin mi sdug par skye bar 'gyur// rtag tu
341b2(skyes rabs): rab sdang rtabs bag can// gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang // rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba ni// de dag shi nas 'byung por skye// ma rung khro zhing sbyin byed la// chang zhim dag la dga' ba'i mi// shaM nas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa// chang la dga'
341b3(skyes rabs): ba rnams su skye// gang dag pha ma bla ma rnams// ji ltar 'dod par bzhon pas 'dags// de dag gzhal med khang rgyu ba'i// gnod sbyin bde ba ldan par skye// sred dang ser sna'i skyon gyis ni// shi nas yi dgas skye bar 'gyur// de
341b4(skyes rabs): phyir de ni spang bar bya// yi dgas kyi rabs rdzogs so// // mi 'tshe ba yi lha dang mi// lha min rnams su tshe ring 'gyur// 'tshe bas thung ngur skye bar 'gyur// de phyir 'tshe ba rnams par spang //
341b5(skyes rabs): mdze dang smon pa zad byed rims// mi nad gzhan yang gang dag yin// 'byung po rnams la gsang dang bcing // brdeg par byas pa rnams kyis 'byung // gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog cing // ci yang sbyin par mi byed pa// de ni 'bad pa chen pos
341b6(skyes rabs): kyang / rdzas ni rnyed par mi nus so// gang zhig rdzas ni ma byin par// lan cing sbyin pa sbyin byed pa// de ni rdzas dang ldan gyur la// byis nas de ni med par 'gyur// mi gang mi 'phrog sbyin mi byed// ha cang 'jungs pa ma yin pa// de dag tshegs
342a1(skyes rabs): ni chen po yis// nges par rdzas ni brtan pa thob// gang zhig gzhan gyi nor mi 'phrog/ gtong dang ldan zhing ser sna spangs// mi de rdzas ni mi 'phrog pa// rgya chen yid du 'ong ba 'thob// gang zhig 'di la zas sbyin pa//
342a2(skyes rabs): tshe dang mdog dang stobs ldan zhing // dpal dang ldan zhing nad spangs pa// rtag par bde dang ldan par 'gyur// gang zhig gos ni sbyin byed pa// 'dzem bcas gzugs bzang longs spyod ldan// byin can srog chags rnams la sdug/
342a3(skyes rabs): gos rnams kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la rab dga' ba'i// sems kyi gnas ni sbyin par byed// lus can de la khang bzangs ni// 'dod pa kun dang ldan par 'gyur// mi gang lham dang zam pa la// sogs pa sbyin par
342a4(skyes rabs): byed pa de// rtag tu bde dang ldan pa dang / bzhon pa dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur// bsti sa khron pa mtshe'u la sogs// rten rnams byed du bcug na ni// de dag bde dang ldan pa dang // gdung bral skom nad med par 'gyur// gang zhig kun dga'
342a5(skyes rabs): 'bul// de ni dbus bkur dpal dang ldan// lus can kun gyi skabs su 'gyur// rtag par 'byor pa ldan par 'gyur// reg pa sprin dang shes rab la// gom pas mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur// sman dang mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis//
342a6(skyes rabs): nad med par ni skye bar 'gyur// mar me byin pas mig ldan 'gyur// sil snyan byin pas dbyangs snyan 'gyur// mal stan dag ni byon pa yis// mi de bde dang ldan par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la ba lang sogs// spyod bya'i 'o ma
342b1(skyes rabs): yon tan ldan// sbyin byed mi de stobs ldan zhing // mdog ldan tshe ring longs spyod ldan// bu mo byin pas 'dod rnams rnyed// 'khor rnams dang yang ldan par 'gyur// sa bzhi byin pas nor ldan zhing // 'bru rnams 'byor par skye bar
342b2(skyes rabs): 'gyur// lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // chu dang mi 'jigs tshig snyan dang // gang gang ji ltar 'dod pa de// de 'dod pa la gus pa sbyin// 'di la bskol nas sbyin byed dam// mtho ris ched du 'am 'jigs pas sam// snyan pa'i bde ba
342b3(skyes rabs): 'dod phyir na// de ni 'bras bu nyon mongs 'thob// rang gi don la mi bltos shing // snying rjes non pa'i sems kyis ni// gzhan gyi don du 'dir byin la// de yi 'bras bu mthar thugs yin// dus dang tshul ni ji bzhin du// gang ci gzhan
342b4(skyes rabs): la sbyin byed na// rnam pa de dang de lta bur// de kun nye bar gnas par 'gyur// gzhan la gnod pa med pa nyid// rang gi don du ci 'dod pa// chos dang mi 'gal gang phan pa// mi bskol bar ni sbyin par bya// de ltar sbyin pa sbyin byed na// de
342b5(skyes rabs): lta bu yi 'bras bu 'a byung // bde ba dag ni thams cad kyi// rgyu ba'i gtso bo sbyin pa nyid// gzhan gyi bud med rnams spongs na// bud med sdug gu rnyed par 'gyur// yul dang dus min rang gi yang // spong na skyes pa nyid thob 'gyur// gang
342b6(skyes rabs): zhig gzhan gyi chung ma la// chags pa'i sems ni mi sel dang // yan lag min la chags byed pa// skyes pa de ni bud med 'gyur// gang zhig bud med smong byed cing // khrims btsun 'dod chags chung byed la// rtag tu skyes par 'dod byed pa//
343a1(skyes rabs): ma ma deni skyes par 'gyur// gang shig yang dag skyon med par// mangs pa spyod lnga sbyin pa de// gaN+DI ldan spyad drug do/ dang ldan// dag bya rdzun sa rnams kyis kyang lan// rang 'thung ba na mi bsnyen pas/
343a2(skyes rabs): mi de dran pa brtan pa dang // rmongs med bden par smra ba dang // snun pa'i bde dang ldan par skye// gang zhig sems dang 'byed par yang // byed pa 'di ni ma byed par// de yi 'khor rnams mi phyed cing // brtan pa'i bde dang ldan par skye// gang zhig
343a3(skyes rabs): rtag pas yid dga' bas// phan dang mi phan ston pa'i mi// de yi tshig ni btsun par 'gyur// gzhan brnyas pa yis smad par 'gyur// zlog pa yis ni mthon por 'gyur// bde ba byin pas bde dang ldan// sdug bsngal byin pas sdug bsngal 'gyur// /
343a4(skyes rabs): gzhan la 'drid par dga' ba dang // g.yo byed rdzun ni smra ba dang // gang dag gzugs kyi nga rgyal can// skur la lus ni thung bar 'gyur// skye bo bshes gnyen sar sna byed// lcogs gyur kun la mi sdug 'gyur// rmongs pa'i rang bzhin phan
343a5(skyes rabs): pa'i tshig/ mi bzod pa ni 'on par 'gyur// sdig pa'i sdug bsngal bsod nams kyis// bda'o 'dren ma'i 'dren ma ste// las rnams kyis ni 'bras bu kun// 'dra ba rgyu mthun yin par brtag/ mi'i rab rdzogs so// /
343a6(skyes rabs): rtag tu g.yo dang rgyu spyod cing // sdig pa dag ni ma byas la// 'thab la dga' zhing sbyin byed pa// de ni lha min dbang phyug 'gyur// lha ma yin gyi rabs rdzogs so// // gang zhig bdag med mi
343b1(skyes rabs): 'dod cing // yongs su bzung la mi dga' ba// de ni gza' rnams dag gi mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi pa dag tu 'gyur// pha ma pha tshan gtso bo la// bkur byed stong ldan bzod par ldan// 'thab mo la ni dga' ba gang // da ni sum cu rtsa gsum
343b2(skyes rabs): skye// rtsod la mi dga' 'thab mo la// yid ni dga' bar mi byed la// gcig tu dge la brtson pa gang // de dga' 'thab bral nyid du 'gro// thos pa mang dang chos 'dzin dang // shes rab ldan zhing thar par 'dod// yon tan rnams la dga'
343b3(skyes rabs): ba'i mi// de dag dga' ldan nye bar 'gro// mi gang rang nyid dul ba la// zhugs shing tshul khrims 'bog pa la// spro ba che dang ldan pa ste// gdon mi zla bar 'phrul dgar 'gro// sems can gang zhig dman min mchog/ sbyin dang dul dang
343b4(skyes rabs): yang dag sdom// phul byeng yon tan lhag gyur te// nges par gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'gro// tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris thob// bsam gtan gyis ni khyad par 'gyur// yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes pas// mthor ni yang srid med
343b5(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// mi dge bas ni bde mi 'thob// dge ba yis ni bde ba 'thob// de ltar dge dang mi dge ba'i// las kyi 'bras bu gsal bar bstan// sdug pa dang ni bral ba dang // mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang // las rnams rang gi 'bras bur
343b6(skyes rabs): bcas// 'chi dang rga dang na ba nyid// gsum po 'di la bsam par bya// de lta na ni chags bral thob// chags dang bral na bsod nams 'dod// de bzhin sdig pa spong bar byed// de dag nyid kyang mdor nyon cig/ bdag dang gzhan gyi
344a1(skyes rabs): don byed dang // gzhan la gnod byed spong ba ni// bsod nams bzlog pa sdig yin par// bdag nyid chen pos de skad gsungs// lha'i rab rdzogs so// // dam pa'i
344a2(skyes rabs): chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'gro drug gi tshig le'ur byas pa/ slob dpon btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma ka ra dang / zhu
344a3(skyes rabs): chen gyi lo tsA ba rtsangs de ban tra rak+Sha tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / 'dod pa'i yo na tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ri dgas
344a4(skyes rabs): glang po che ma leb dang nya// sbrang ma lnga po de yang lnga yos+ya bcom 'gyur te/ gcig gi bcom na gang zhig lha rnams ni// rtag tu brtan pa'i ci phyir bcom mI 'gyur// rtswa yi myu gu gtsang mu za// shin tu ring du 'gro nus pa/
344a5(skyes rabs): ri dgas rngon pa'i glu dbyangs kyis// nges par gsod pa tshol bar 'gyur// sa srungs dang ni rab 'gran cing // ra yi rgyal po rgyun shes 'dra'i// khan glad mo yi nyo rig gis// nges par glang po gsad par song // 'bar ba
344a6(skyes rabs): chen po'i tshogs dag go/ mi chen dag ni mthong nas kyang // gzugs la chags pa chen po yis// phye leb me la 'jug par 'gyur// bkag pa med pa'i lam 'gro zhing // rtag tu rnam par rgyu ba yi// ro myag pa la
344b1(skyes rabs): chags pa yis// nya ni lcags kyus rlag par byed// rtag tu na mkha' la rgyu zhing // gzugs ni shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/ bung ba dri yi nyes pa yis// nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// ri dwags nyid ni sgra tsam gyis// reg pas glang po
344b2(skyes rabs): brlag par 'gyur// gzugs nyid kyis ni phye leb ste// ro yis nya ni rnam par brlag/ bung ba dri la chags pa ste// 'di dag rgyu ni re re yis// skyes bu dag ni re re yis// skyes bu dag ni gcig la yang // lnga po 'di dag rtag ldan
344b3(skyes rabs): zhing / nyin mtshan du ni rab 'joms na// bad gnas ji ltar thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa// slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po
344b4(skyes rabs): d+ham shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo sdeb dge slong rin chen bzang pos zhus te gtan la phab po// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa'i phrin yig/
344b5(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong rab gisal gzhon nu gnyis dang byor byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed de grogs por 'thams nas/
344b6(skyes rabs): gang gi lam sngon du grub pa des// cig shos la btang bar dam bcas pa las/ 'phag/ sa pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lamra sngon du grub ste/ dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la btang ba'i phyir 'phrin yig gis bzlugs
345a1(skyes rabs): pa/ grogs khyod ci bde 'am dam bcas brjed dam ci/ 'dod pa me mngadag dong rtse 'dra 'di la ci zhig chags// shin tu skyo ba'i yid kyis rab tu mi 'bad par// srid rgyu 'dod pa da dung gang bra ga la srid//
345a2(skyes rabs): theg pa mchog gi nges 'byung 'gro ba'i don byos la// rgyu dang kha gsag grags pa rnyed la mi gdung zhing // 'gro las rnam grol lam la myur du ma 'bad na// dus gsum rgyal bas bskyab bka' phan thag chad du 'ong // rtog med rtog bral
345a3(skyes rabs): dus gsum thub pa kun gshegs shul// phra zhing shes dka' tshig gi spyod yul ma yin yang // phyogs tsam rtogs pas sgro btags rgyal ba'i mthus brjod na// shin tu legs par rab nyon yid la gzung nus saM// dge slong rab gsal
345a4(skyes rabs): gzhon nus slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gsol pa/ mtho la mtho sems mi mdzad mnyam la 'gran mi mnga'// dma' la sngan can mi mdzad yongs la snyoms pa'i mgon// dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lam
345a5(skyes rabs): mer bzhugs pa yi// mdangs bzung thugs rje'i mnga' bdag da ltar gang na bzhugs// khri lan bdud ris 'pham mdzad thar pa'i lam ston gsol// nyes bcu tha ba'i rdul bral stobs bcu brtsal 'phags gson// 'jig rten gsum
345a6(skyes rabs): gyi gnyen gyur skyobs pa dam pa gson// dpa'i gtan bdud las shin tu mtshams med gcig tu brtan pa gson// bdag ni mun btsas bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa ste// thar pa'i lam stor 'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams lags na//
345b1(skyes rabs): rjes gdul gAr legs thabs kyis rgyun du mi stob par// dus rings bklungs kyi kur du mgon khyod ga zhes// nA dang mi sa chu mchog tshogs dbya mtha' las dgongs// mu stegs rgyu bam byas mdzad skyes bu se ge dgongs//
345b2(skyes rabs): yid bzhin dbyig gI tog ltar ra ba kun srong dgongs// thugs rje nu bo rgyun 'bebs rgyal sras bu bo dgongs// slad gsum rgyu mar chos bstan rdo bo med bzhin du// bden grangs log pa'i lam zhugs spring ba'i lal gyu
345b3(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i gdos can grangs med bsgrubs kyis mi long zhes/ dang mye rtsa yi thugs snang spro bar rung mod kyi// 'on byung legs rgya chos nyid gzod nas sbya na 'das don du// 'gro ba sangs kyi ched la
345b4(skyes rabs): gro bgos mdzad lags kyis/ mgon po rabu gsal gzhon nu rjes dgongs nyag sring zhing // thugs rje'i thugs kyis bzod ze banas te brgyab du gsastobs mchog dpal gyi mgur nas
345b5(skyes rabs): yi ge 'brus bskrad pa// mkha' la tshon bkye bzhin du spyod yul ma lags pas/ rgyal sras 'khor bcas+ya rnams kyis gsal bar ma bstan na/ bdag 'dra mtshan mar 'dzin pas gzung bar g+ha la

346a1(skyes rabs): par gzung mi bgyi// bla ma'i sar bzhugs che ba'i mthus kyang gtang du gsol/ 'jugs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gisadage slong rab gsal
346a2(skyes rabs): gdon nu la springs pa'i 'phrin yig rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang lo tsA ba ban+de dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / mang+ga laM/
347a1(skyes rabs): dmyal pa shes pa'i phrin yin bkrugs// rmo sa la spring bab snying mig slob pod can drag ma dzadag// sems rin po chernam snang ba zhes rgya snying yig dge slong dgon pa pas mdzad pa/
347b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ su trid le kha/ bod skad du/ bshes pa'i phrin yig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rang bzhin dge 'os bdag gis ni// bde bar gshegs
347b2(skyes rabs): pa'i gsung bsnyad las byung ba'i// bsod nams 'dun slad 'phags pa'i dbyangs 'di dag/ cung zad cig bsdebs khyod kyis gsan pa'i rigs// ji ltar bde gshegs sku gzugs shing las kyang // bgyis pa ci 'dra'ang rung ste mkhas pas
347b3(skyes rabs): mchod// de bzhin bdag gi stan ngag 'di ngan yang // dam chos brjod la brten slad slad mi bgyid// thub pa chen po'i bka' ni snyan dgu zhig/ khyod kyis thugs su lta yang chung mod kyi// rdo thal las bgyis dgung zla'i 'od kyis ni// ches
347b4(skyes rabs): dkar nyid du ci ste mi bgyis lags// rgyal bas sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // gtong dang tshul khrims lha rjes dran pa drug/ rab tu bka' stsal de dag so so yi// yon tan tshogs kyis rjes su dran par bgyi// dge ba'i las lam
347b5(skyes rabs): bcu po lus dang ni// ngag dang yid kyis rtag tu brten bgyi zhing // chang rnams lngas ldog de bzhin dge ba yi// 'tsho ba la yang mngon par dgyes par mdzod// longs spyod g.yo ba snying po med mkhyen nas// dge slong bram ze bkran dang bshes
347b6(skyes rabs): rnams la// sbyin pa tshul bzhin rtsal bgyi pha rol tu// sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so// khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams mong mi dma'// ma 'dres ma sngags pa dag bsten par mdzod// khrims ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sa
348a1(skyes rabs): bzhin du// ston kun gyi gzhi rten lags par gsungs// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson bsam gtan dang // de bzhin shes rab gzhal med pha rol phyin// 'di dag rgyas mdzod srid pa'i rgya mtsho yi// phra
348a2(skyes rabs): rol srin pa rgyal ba'i dbang po mdzod// gang la pha dang ma dag mchod byed pa'i// rigs de tshangs bcas slob dpon bcas pa'ang lags// de dag la mchod grags par 'gyur ba dang // slad ma la yang mtho ris 'gyur ba lags/ 2
348a3(skyes rabs): dang chom kun 'khrig pa rdzun dang ni// chang dang dus min zas pa chags pa dang // mal stan mtho la dga' dang klu drag dang // gar dang 'phreng ba'i khyad par rnams spong zhing // dgra btsem tshul khrims rje su byed pa yi// yan lag brgyad
348a4(skyes rabs): po 'di dag dang ldan na// gso sbyong 'dod spyod lha yul yid 'ong ba// skyes pa bud med dag la stsol bar bgyid// ser sna g.yo sgyu chags dang snyom las dang // mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // rigs dang gzugs dang /
348a5(skyes rabs): thos pa lang tsho dang // dbang thang che bas rgyags pa dgra bzhin gzigs// bag yod bdud rtsi'i gnas te bag med pa// 'chi ba 'i gnas su thub pas bka' stsal to// de ngas khyod kyis dge chos spel slad du// gus pas rtag tu
348a6(skyes rabs): bag dang bcas par mdzod// gang zhig sngon chad bag med gyur pa las// phyis nas bag dang ldan par gyur de yang // zla ba sprin bral lta bur rnam mdzes te// dga' bo sor 'phreng mthong ldan pang byed bzhin// 'di ltar bzod mtshungs dka'
348b1(skyes rabs): thub ma mchis pas// khyod kyis khro ba'i go skabs dbye mi bgyi// khro ba spangs pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid// thob par 'gyur bar sangs rgyas zhal gyi bzhes// bdag ni 'dis spyos 'dis btags pham par byas// 'di yis bdag gi
348b2(skyes rabs): nor phrogs gyur to zhes// 'khon du 'dzin pas 'khrug long rnams bskyed de// 'khon 'dzin rnam spangs bde bar gnyid kyis log/ sems ni se nu dang sa dang rdo ba la// ri mo bris pa de 'drar rig par gyis// de'i nang nyon mongs
348b3(skyes rabs): can la dang po ni// mchog ste chos 'dod rna la tha ma lags// rgyal bas snying la 'bab dang bden pa dang // log par smra ldan skyes bu rnams kyis ni// sbrang rtsi me tog mi gtsang lta bu'i tshig/ rnam gsum bka' stsal de las
348b4(skyes rabs): tha ma spangs// snang nas snang ba'i mthar thug mun pa nas// mun pa'i mthar thug snang nas mun mthar thug/ mun nas snang ba'i mthar thug gang zag ni// bzhi ste de dag rnams kyi dang po mdzod// mi ni a mri'i 'bras bzhin ma
348b5(skyes rabs): smin la// smin pa dang 'dra smin la ma smin 'dra// ma smin ma smin par snang smin la ni// smin par snang zhes bgyi ba 'drar rtogs mdzod// gzhan gyi chung ma mi lha mthong na yang // na tshod mthun pa ru ma dang bu mo dang // sring mo'i 'du
348b6(skyes rabs): shes bskyed bgyi chags gyur na// mi gtsang nyid du yang dag bsam par bgyi// g.yo ba'i sems ni thos mtshungs bu lta bur// gter bzhin srog dang 'dra bar bsrung bgyi ste// gdug pa gdug dang mtshon dang dgra bo dang // me bzhin
349a1(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i bde la yid 'byung mdzod// 'dod pa rnams ni phung khrol skyed pa ste// rgyal ba'i dbang pos kam pa'i 'bras 'drar gsungs// de dag spangs bgyi de yi lcags sgrogs gis// 'khor ba'i
349a2(skyes rabs): btson rar 'jig rten 'di dag bcings// gang dag dbang po drug yul rnams la ni// rtag tu mi brtan g.yo dang gang dag gcig/ g.yul ngor dgra tshogs las rgyal de dag las// mkhas rnams dang po dpa' rab lags par
349a3(skyes rabs): 'tshal/ bud med gzhon nu'i lus ni logs shig tu// dri nga pa dang sgo dgu dod pa dang // mi gtsang kun snod 'dra ba dgang dka' dang // pags pas g.yogs dang rgyan yang logs shig gzigs// ji ltar mdze can srin pus nyen pa
349a4(skyes rabs): ni/ bde ba'i don du me la kun bsten kyang // zhi bar mi 'gyur de dang 'dra bar ni// 'dod pa rnam sla chags pa'ang mkhyen par mdzod// don dam gzigs par bgyi slad dngos rnams la// tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de goms mdzod//
349a5(skyes rabs): de dang 'dra bar yon tan ldan pa yi// chos gzhan 'ga' yang mchis pa ma lags so// skyes bu rigs gzugs thos dang ldan rnams kyang // shes rab tshul khrims bral ba skur ma lags// de ltas gang la yon tan 'di gnyis
349a6(skyes rabs): ldan// de ni yon tan gzhan dang bral yang mchod// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnyed dang ma rnyed dang / pad dang mi bad snyan dang mi snyan dang // bstod smad ces bgyi 'jig rten chos brgyad po// bdag gi yid yul min par mgo snyoms
349b1(skyes rabs): mdzod// khyod kyi bram ze dge slong lha dang ni// mgon dang yab yum dag dang btsun mo dang // 'khor gyi slad du'ang sdig pa mi bgyi ste// dmyal ba'i rnam smin skal nod 'ga' ma mchis// sdig pa'i las rnams spyad pa 'ga' yang /
349b2(skyes rabs): nide yi mod la mtshon bzhin mi gcod kyang // 'chi ba'i dus la bab na sdig pa yi// las kyi 'bras bu gang lags mngon par 'gyur// dad dang tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang // dri med ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod dang // shes
349b3(skyes rabs): rab nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs// nor gzhan phal pa don ma mchis rtogs mdzod// rgyan po 'gyeng dang 'dus la blta ba dang // le lo sdig pa'i grogs la brten pa dang // chang dang mtshan mo rgyu ba ngan song ba// grags
349b4(skyes rabs): pa nyams par 'gyur ba de drug spongs// nor rnams kun gyi nang na chog shes pa// rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs// kun tu chog shes mdzod cig chog mkhyen na// nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor pa
349b5(skyes rabs): lags nges pa bdog mang ji ltar sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa chung rnams de lta ma lags te// klu mchog rnams la mgo bo ji snyed pa// de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal de snyed do// rang bzhin dgra 'brel gshed ma lta bu dang //
349b6(skyes rabs): khyim 'thab bsnyad bgying rje mo lta bu dang // chung ngu'ang brku ba chom kun lta bu yi// chung ma gsum po de dag rnam par spang // sring mo lta bur rjes mthun gang yin dang // mdza' mo bzhin du snying la 'bab pa dang // ma bzhin phan
350a1(skyes rabs): par 'dod dang bran mo bzhin// dbang gyur gang yin rigs kyis lha bzhin bkur// kha zas sman dang 'dra bar rig pa yis// 'dod chags zhe sdang med par brten bgyi ste// rgyags phyir ma lags bsnyem
350a2(skyes rabs): pa'i phyir ma lags// mtshar phyir ma lags lus gnas 'ba' zhig phyir// rigs pa'i bdag nyid nyin par mtha' dag dang // mtshan mo'i thun gyi stod smad bzlas nas ni// mnal tshe 'ang 'bras bu mod par mi 'gyur bar// dran dang ldan
350a3(skyes rabs): bar de dag bar du mnol// byams dang snying rje dag dang dga' ba dang // btang snyoms rtag tu yang dag sgoms mdzod cig/ gong ma brnyes par ma gyur de lta na'ang // tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bde ba thob par 'gyur// 'dod spyod dga' dang bde dang
350a4(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal dag/ rnam par spangs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi po yis// tshangs dang 'od gsal dag dang dge rgyas dang // 'bras bu che lha rnams dang skal mnyam 'thob// rtag dang mngon par zhen dang gnyen po med// yon tan gtso ldan gzhi
350a5(skyes rabs): las byung ba'i las// dge dang mi dge rnam lnga chen po ste// de bas dge ba spyod la brtson par bgyi// lan tshwa srad 'ga' chu ni nyung ngu zhig/ ro bsgyur bgyid kyi gang+gA'i klung min lngar// de bzhin sdig pa'i las ni chung ngu yang // dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs
350a6(skyes rabs): la mkhyen par bgyi// rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang // gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste// sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag da ge ba'i nor// 'phrog pa'i chom rkun lags par rigs par mdzod// dang dang brtson 'grus
350b1(skyes rabs): ngag dang dran pa dang // ting 'dzin shes rab chos mchog lnga nyid de// 'di la mngon brtson mdzod cig 'di dag ni// stobs dbang zhes bgyi rtse mor gyur pa'ang lags// nA rga 'chi sdug bral dang de bzhin du// las ni bdag gir byas las ma
350b2(skyes rabs): 'das zhes// de ltar yang dang yang du sems pa ni// de yi gnyen po'i sgo nas rgyags mi 'gyur// gal te mtho ris thar pa mngon bzhed na// yang dag lha la goms pa nyid du mdzod// gang zag log par lta bas legs spyod kyang // thams
350b3(skyes rabs): cad rnam par smin pa mi bzad ldan// mi ni yang dag nyid du mi bde zhing // mi rtag bdag med mi gtsang rig par bgyi// dran pa nye bar ma bzhag rnams kyis ni// phyin ci log bzhir lta ba 'phung bkrol ba// gzugs ni bdag ma yin zhes gsung
