350b4(skyes rabs): ste bdag/ gzugs dang ldan min gzugs la bdag gnas min// bdag la gzugs mi gnas te de bzhin du// phung po lhag ma bzhi yang stong rtogs bgyi// phung po 'dod rgyal las min dus las myin// rang bzhin las min ngo bo nyid las
350b5(skyes rabs): min// dbang phyug las min rgyu med can min te// mi shes las dang sred las byung rig mdzod// tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin rang lus la// phyin ci log par lta dang the tshom ste// kun tu sbyor ba 'di gsum thar pa yi// grong khyer
350b6(skyes rabs): sgo 'gegs lags par mkhyen par gyis// thar pa dag la rag las 'di la ni// gzhan gyis grogs bgyid ci yang ma mchis pas// thos dang tshul khrims bsam gtan ldan pa yi// bden pa rnam pa bzhi la 'bad par mdzod// lhag pa'i
351a1(skyes rabs): tshul khrims lhag pa'i shes rab dang // lhag pa'i sems la rtag tu bslab par bgyi// bslab pa brgya rtsa lnga bcu lhag gcig ni// gsum po 'di nang yang dag 'du bar 'gyur// dbang phyug lus gtogs dran pa
351a2(skyes rabs): bde gshegs kyis// bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam du nye bar bstan// de ni bsgrims nas mngon par bsrung bgyi ste// dran pa nyams pas chos kun 'jig par 'gyur// tshe ni gnod mang rlung gis btab pa yi// chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na//
351a3(skyes rabs): dbugs rngubs dbugs 'byung gnyid kyi log pasaM las// sod khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che// lus mtha' thal ba mthar skam mthar 'bru zhing // tha mar mi gtsang snying po ma mchis pa// rnam par 'jig dengs myags par 'gyur/
351a4(skyes rabs): ba ste// so sor 'gyes chos can du mkhyen par mdzod// sa dang lhun po rgya mtsho nyid ma bdun// 'bar bas sregs pa'i lus can 'di dag kyang // thal bar yang ni lus par mi 'gyur na// shin tu nyams chung mi lta smos ci 'tshal// de ltar 'di
351a5(skyes rabs): kun mi rtag bdag med de// skyabs med mgon med gnas med de slad du// 'khor ba chu shing snying po med pu la// mi mchog khyod kyis thugs ni dbyung bar mdzod// rgya mtsho gcig gnas gnya' shing bu ga dang // rus sbal phrad pa bas kyang
351a6(skyes rabs): dud 'gro las// mi nyid ches thob dka' bas mi dbang gis// dam chos spyad pas de 'bras mchis par mdzod// gang zhig gser snod rin chen spras pa yis// ngan skyugs 'chag par bgyid pa de bas ni// gang zhig mi ru skyes nas sdig pa
351b1(skyes rabs): dag/ bgyid pa de ni ches rab blun pa lags// mthun par gyur pa'i yul du gnas pa dang // skyes bu dam pa la ni brten pa dang // bdag gi legs smon sngon yang bsod nams bgyid// 'khor lo chen po bzhi ni khyod la mnga'// dge ba'i
351b2(skyes rabs): bshes gnyen brten pa tshangs par spyod// yongasu rdzogs par thub pas gsungs de'i phyir// skyes bu dam pa bsten bgyi rgyal ba la// brten nas rab tu mang pos zhi ba thob// log par lta ba 'dzin dang dud 'gro dang // yi dgas nyid dang dmyal
351b3(skyes rabs): bar skye ba dang // rgyal ba'i bka' med pa dang mtha' khob du// kla klor skye dang glen zhing lkugs pa nyid// tshe ring lha nyid gang yang rung ba ni// skye ba zhes bgyi mi khom skyon brgyad po// de dag dang bral khom pa rnyed nas ni// skye ba bzlog pa'i
351b4(skyes rabs): slad du 'bad par mdzod// nges pa 'dod pas phongs dang 'chi ba dang // na dang rga sogs sdug bsngal du ma yi// 'byung gnas 'khor ba la ni skyo mdzad cing // 'di yi nyes pa'i shas kyang gsan par mdzod// pha ni bu nyid ma ni chung ma nyid//
351b5(skyes rabs): skye bo dgrar gyur pa dag bshes nyid dang // bzlog pa nyid du mchis pas de slad du// 'khor ba dag na nges pa 'ga' ma mchis// re res rgya mtsho bzhi pas lhag pa yis// 'o ma 'thungs te da dung so so yi// skye bo'i rje su 'breng ba'i 'khor ba
351b6(skyes rabs): sa/ de bas ches mang nyid cig btung 'tshal lo// re reb bdag nyid rus pa'i phung po ni// lhun po mnyam pa snyed cig 'das gyur te// ma mi thug mtha' rgya shug tshig gu tsam// ri lus bgrangs kyang sa yis lang mi 'gyur// brgya byin
352a1(skyes rabs): 'jig rten mchod 'os gyur nas kyang // las kyi dbang gis phyir yA sa steng lhung // 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du byung nus kyang // 'khor ba dag tu yang bran nyid du 'gyur// mtho ris bu mo'i nu ma rked pa la// reg pa'i
352a2(skyes rabs): bde ba yun ring myong nas slar// dmyal bar 'thag gcod dbrad pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi// rig pa shin tu mi bzang bsten 'chil lo// rkang pa'i reg pas nems par bde bzod pa// lhun po 'i spo la yun rings gnas nas ni// slar yang
352a3(skyes rabs): me mur ro myags rgyu ba yi// sdug bsngal mi bzang phog snyam bgyid 'tshal lo// mtho ris bu mo 'brongs shing dga' ba dang // rnam par mdzes 'tshal son par rtses nas slar// 'dab ma ral gri 'dra tshul nags rnams kyis// rkang lag
352a4(skyes rabs): rna ba sna gcod 'thob par 'gyur// dal gyi 'bab pa lha yi bu mo ni// gdong mdzes gser gyi pad+ma ldan zhugs nas// slar yang dmyal ba'i chu bo rab med par// tsha sgro bzod brlag chu tshan 'jug 'tshal lo// lha yul 'dod bde shin tu
352a5(skyes rabs): chen po dang // tshangs nyid chags bral bde ba thob nas slar// mnar med me yi bud shing gyur pa yis// sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa bsten 'tshal lo// nyi ma zla ba nyid thob rang lus kyi// 'od kyis 'jig rten mtha' dag snang byas te//
352a6(skyes rabs): slar yang mun gnag smag tu phyin gyur nas// rang gi lag pa brkyang ba'ang mi mthong ba gyur// de ltar nongs par 'gyur 'tshal bsod nams ni// rnam gsum mar me'i snang ba rab bzhes shig/ gcig pu nyi ma zla bas mi rdzi
352b1(skyes rabs): ba'i// mun nag mtha' yas nang du 'jug 'tsha lo// sems can nyes par spyad pa spyod rnams la// yang sos thig nag rab tu che ba dang // bsdug 'joms du 'bod mnar med la sogs pa'i// dmyal ba rnams su rtag tu sdug bsngal
352b2(skyes rabs): 'gyur// kha cig til bzhin 'tshir te de bzhin gzhan// phye ma zhib mo bzhin du phye mor rlog/ kha cig sog les 'dra ste de bzhin gzhan// sta ra mi bzang so rnon rnams kyi gshags// de bzhin gzhan dag khro chu bzhus pa yi// khu ba
352b3(skyes rabs): 'bar ba 'khrigs pa ltung bar bgyid// kha cig lcags kyi gsal shing rab 'bar ba'i// tsher ma can la kun tu rgyud par bgyid// kha cig lcags kyi mche ba ldan pa'i khyi// gtum pos dbrad cing lag pa gnam du bsgreng // dbang
352b4(skyes rabs): med gzhan dag lpags sa chu rnon po dang // sen mo bzang snun pa li khyA rnams 'brog/ kha cig srin bu sbyar ba sna tshogs dang // sha sbrang sbrang ma nag po khri thAg dag/ reg+sa na mi bzad ma sol char 'byin pas// za bar bgyid ci
352b5(skyes rabs): 'gre ldog smre sngags 'don// kha cig mdag ma 'bar ba'i tshogs su ni// rgyun ma 'chad par rab sreg khaM yang dgrang // kha cig lcags las byas pa'i zangs chen du// spyi'u tshugs 'bras kyi cung pang bzhin du 'tshed// sdig can
352b6(skyes rabs): dbugs 'byung 'gags pa tsam zhig gi/ dus kyi rabar du chod rnams dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal gzhal yas thos nas rnam stong du// mi 'jigs gang lags rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// dmyal ba bris pa mthong dang thos pa dang // dran
353a1(skyes rabs): dang bklags dang gzugs su bgyis rnams kyang // 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur na mi bzad pa'i// rnam smin nyam su myong na smos ci 'tshal// bde ba kun gyi nang na sred zad pa'i// bde ba bdag por bgyid pa ji lta bar//
353a2(skyes rabs): de bzhin sdug bsngal kun gyi nang na ni// mnar med dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab mi bzod// 'di na nyin cig mdung thung sum brgya yis// rab tu drug btab sdug bsngal gang lags pa// de ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung ngu la'ang // 'ol
353a3(skyes rabs): yang mi bgyi cher yang mi ho// de ltar sdug bsngal shin tu mi zad lo// bye ba phrag brgyar nyams su myong na yang ni ji srid ma dge de zung ma gyur pa// de srid srog dang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// mi dge'i 'bras 'di rnams kyi sa bon ni// lus ngag
353a4(skyes rabs): yid kyis nyes spyad khyod kyis ni// ci nas de rdul tsam yang ma mchis pa// de ltar nyid kyi rtsal gyis 'bad par mdzod// dud 'gro'i skye gnas na yang gsod pa dang // bcings dang rdeg sogs sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa// zhi 'gyur dge ba
353a5(skyes rabs): spangs pa rnams la ni// gcig la gcig za shin tu mi bzad pa// kha cig mu tig bal dang rus pa khrag/ sha dang pags pa'i ched du 'chi bar 'gyur// dbang med gzhan dag zlog pa lag pa dang // lcags dang lcags kyu btab pas
353a6(skyes rabs): btab ste bkal// yi dgas na yang 'dod pas phongs pa yi// bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal rgyun chags mi 'chos pa// bkres skom grang dro ngal dang 'jigs pa yis// bskyed pa shin tu mi bzad bsten 'tshalo// kha cig kha ni khab kyi mig
353b1(skyes rabs): tsam la// lto ba ri yi gtos tsam bkres pas nyen// mi gtsang gyi nar bor ba cung zad kyang // 'tshal ba'i mthu dang ldan pa ma lagaso// kha cig pags rus lus shing gcer bu yi// ta la'i yang tog bskams pa lta bu lags// kha cig
353b2(skyes rabs): mtshan zhing kha na 'bar ba ste// zas su 'bar ba'i khar babs bye ma 'tshal// smad rigs 'ga' ni gnag dang phyis dang // khrag sogs mi gtsang ba yang mi rnyed de// phan tshun gdong du 'tshig cing mgrin pa nas// lba ba byung ba smin pa'i rnag 'tsho'o//
353b3(skyes rabs): yi dag rnams la sos ga'i dus su ni// zla ba'ang tsha la dgun ni nyi ma'ang grang // ljon shing 'bras bu med 'gyur 'di dag gis// bltas pa tsam gyis klung yang bskums par 'gyur// bar chad med par sdug bsngal rten gyur pa// nyes par
353b4(skyes rabs): spyad pa'i las kyi zhags pa ni// sra bas bcings pa'i lus can kha cig lo// lta stong dag dang khrir yang 'chi mi 'gyur// de ltar yi dgas rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i// sdug bsngal ro gcig thob pa gang lags pa// de yi rgyu ni skye
353b5(skyes rabs): bro 'jungs dga' ba// ser sna 'phags min lags par sad+ma rgyas gsung // mtho ris na yang bde chen de dag gi/ 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal nyid ni de bas che// de ltar bsams nas ya rabs rnams kyis ni// zad 'gyur mtho ris slad du
353b6(skyes rabs): sred mi bgyi// lus kyi kha dog mi sdug 'gyur ba dang // stan la mi dga' me tog phreng rnyings dang // gos la dri ma chags dang lus la ni// sngon chad med pa'i rdul 'byung zhes bya ba// mtho ris 'chi 'pho sbron byed snga ltas lnga// lha yul gna?
354a1(skyes rabs): pa'i lha rnams la 'byung ste// sa steng mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag/ sbron par byed pa'i 'chi ltas rnams dang 'dra// lha yi 'jig rten dag nus 'phos pa la// gal te dge ba'i lhag ma 'ga' med na// de nas dbang med
354a2(skyes rabs): dud 'gro yi dgas dang // da myal bar gnas pa gang yang rung bar 'gyur// lha min dag na'ang rang bzhin gyis lho yi// dpal la sdang phyir yid kyi sdug bsngal cha// de dag blo dang ldan yang 'gro ba yi// sgrib pas bden pa mthong ba ma mchiso// /
354a3(skyes rabs): 'khor ba de 'dra lags pas lha mi dang // dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas rnams dag tu// skye ba bzang po ma lags skye ba ni// gnod pa du ma'i snod gyur lags mkhyen mdzod// mgo 'am gos la glo bur me shor na// de dag phyir bzlog bgyi ba
354a4(skyes rabs): btang nas kyang // yang srid med par bgyi slad 'bad 'tshal te// 'di bas ches mchog dgos pa gzhan ma mchis// tshul khrims dag dang shes rab bsam gtan gyis// mya ngan 'das zhi dul ba dri med pa'i// go 'phang mi rgas mi 'chi zad mi
354a5(skyes rabs): 'tshal// sa mu me rlung nyi zla bral thob mdzod// dran dang chos rab 'byed dang brtson 'grus dang // dga' dang shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin dang // btang snyoms 'di bdun byang chub yan lag ste// mya ngan 'das thob bgyid pa'i dge tshogs lags//
354a6(skyes rabs): shes rab med par bsam gtan yod min te// bsam gtan med par yang ni shes rab med// gang la de gnyis yod pas srid pa yi// rgya mtsho gnag rjes lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi// lung ma bstan pa bcu bzhi 'jig rten ma// nyi ma'i ga rten
354b1(skyes rabs): gyis rab gsungs gang dag lags// de dag rnams la bsam par mi bgyi ste// de yi blo ni zhi bar bgyid ma lags// ma rig pa las las te de las ni// rnam shes de las ming dang gzugs rab 'byung // de las skye mched drug ste
354b2(skyes rabs): de dag las// reg pa kun tu 'byung bar thub byas gsungs// reg pa las ni tshor ba kun 'byung ste// tshor ba'i gzhi las sred pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sred pas len pa bskyed par 'gyur ba ste// de las srid pa srid las skye ba lags//
354b3(skyes rabs): skye ba yod na mya ngan na rga dang // 'dod pas phongs dang 'chi dang 'jig sogs kyi// sdug bsngal phung po shin tu che 'byung ste// skye ba 'gags pas 'di kun 'gag par 'gyur// rten cing 'brel par 'byung 'di rgyal ba yi// gsung gi/
354b4(skyes rabs): mdzod kyi ches pa zab mo ste// gang gis 'di ni yang dag mthong ba ste// sangs rgyas de nyid rig pa rnam mchog mthong // yang dog lha dang 'tsho dang rtsol ba dang // dran dang ting nge 'dzin dag las mtha' dang // yang dag rtog nyid lam gyi yan
354b5(skyes rabs): lag brgyad// 'di ni zhi bar bgyi spyad bsgom par bgyid// skye 'di sdug bsngal sred pa zhes bgyi ba// de ni 'di yi kun 'byung rgya chen te// 'di 'gog pa ni thar pa lags te lam// de thob 'phags lam yan lag de brgyad lags// de
354b6(skyes rabs): ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ mthong bar bgyi slad rtag tu brtson par bgyi// bang na dpal gnas khyim pa rnams kyis kyang // shes pas nyon mongs chu bo las rgal gyi// gang dag chos mngon bgyid pa de dag kyang // gnas las
355a1(skyes rabs): 'bas pa ma lags lo tog bzhin// sa ru me nas 'thon ma lags de dag sngon// nyon mongs rag las so so'i skye bor bas// bsnyengs dang bral la mang du gsol ci 'tshal// phan pa'i gdams ngag don po 'di lags te// khyod
355a2(skyes rabs): kyis thugs dul mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis// sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba lags par gsungs// khyod la de skad gdams pa gang lags de// bas par dge slong gis kyang bgyi bar dka'// 'di las gang zhig spyod pa'i ngo bo de'i// yon tan bsten
355a3(skyes rabs): pas sku tshe don snod mdzod// kun gyi dge ba kun la yi rang zhing // nyid kyis legs par spyad pa rnam gsum yang // sangs rgyas nyid thob bgyi slad yongs bsngos nas// de nas dge ba'i phung po 'di yis khyod// skye ba dpag tu med par lha mi yi// /
355a4(skyes rabs): 'jig rten kun gyi rnal 'byor dbang mdzad nas// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang spyod pa yis// 'gro ba nyam thag mang po rjes bzung ste// 'khrungs nas na rga 'dod chags zhe sdang rnams// bsal te sangs rgyas zhing du bcom ldan 'das// 'od
355a5(skyes rabs): dpag med dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi// mgon po sku tshe dpag tu med par mdzod// shes rab tshul khrims gtong 'byung grags chen dri ma med// lha yul na mkha' dang ni swa steng rgyas mdzad nas// sa la mi dang mtho ris lha ni nu chud mchog/ bad
355a6(skyes rabs): dga' dga' ba nges par rab tu zhi mdzad de// nyon mongs nyam thag sems can tshogs kyi 'jigs skye dang // 'chi ba zhi mdzad rgyal ba'i dbang po 'di brnyes nas// 'jig rten las 'das ming tsam zhi la mi bsnyengs pa// mi bgres nongs pa mi
355b1(skyes rabs): mnga'i gro 'phang brnyes par mdzod// bshes pa'i phrin yig slob dpon 'phag pa klu sgrub kyis// mdza' bo rgyal po bde spyod la bkur ba rdzogs// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+da
355b2(skyes rabs): dpal rtsigs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o//
356b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ shik+Sha le kha/ bod skad du/ slob ma la springs pa'i spring yig/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis mdzad pa shin tu dka' spyad mngon byung ba// mi 'am ci drang lha mo rnams
356b2(skyes rabs): kyi rab bsnyad na// bdud kyi bu mo bzhin ras pad+ma'i nags tshal dag/ da ltar zla ba'i zer gyis phog pa bzhin du zum// bkra shis yid 'ong shin tu rmad byung sku mnga' ba// bsod nams chung ngu'i skye bos rnyed dka' ba// 'jig rten mngon
356b3(skyes rabs): par 'dod pa'i re ba bsgrub pa gang // yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gzhan don ro tsagacig spyod// gang zhig rtag tu pha rol bde bas bde 'gyur zhing // gzhan dag sdug bsngal gyur pas mchog tu 'o brgyal ba// thugs rje chen pos
356b4(skyes rabs): yon tan shin tu bskrun pa gang // de nyid rang gi bde sdug spangs te bzhugs pa yin// gang zhig gzhon gyi don du dbu rnams gcod byed kyang // pad+ma lta bur dgyes pa'i spyan 'gyed gzigs mdzad cing // nyid kyi don du gdugs dkar
356b5(skyes rabs): gcig gis khebs pa lta'i// sa yang ral gri so bdar rnon po lta bur dgongs// zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar yon tan gsal ba rdzogs// nyes pa'i mun pa sel mdzad gcig po yid du 'ong // 'jig rten phan la brtson pa rab tu
356b6(skyes rabs): gsal ba byung // de shar zla ba bzhin du 'gro ba bsil bar mdzad// bstan pa rin chen mchog ltar bzang la 'phan med pa// rnam par dag tshul gang yin klu mgo gdengs ka can// chen po rnams kyis gtsug gi rgyan
357a1(skyes rabs): bzhin gus mnos nas// sa yi gting na gnas pa'i rwa rib sel bar mdzod// chos kyi sprin de phan pa mdzad pa'i don du g.yos// chos kyi bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa mchog gi rgyu// ro gcig gdung ba sel ba char chu bzhin du bab//
357a2(skyes rabs): de ni snod la brten nas ro rnams du mar gyur// snod yangs zab la dri ma med cing gsal ba yi// bsam pa dang ldan khur kun bzod pa gang dag la// skye bo kun gyis nyes par spyad bya de gnas pa// mtsho chen mi yi gzugs can de la phyag 'tshalo// /
357a3(skyes rabs): gang zhig skye nas rga shi sel ba'i bdud rtsi de// thob par mi byed mi spyod 'dzin par mi byed pa// de dag nyes mang gti mug thibs pos bslad pa ste// yun ring nad kyi thebs pa sman tshan mi bsten bzhin// 'gro ba kun gyis mig gcig dri ma med pa gang //
357a4(skyes rabs): de ni sa rnams gsu ma po 'i spyi mthun sgron ma ste// bstan pa legs par rnyed nas gang zhig 'dor ba de// gti mug shin tu rma byung dag gi gtses par mdzad// byang chub khang bzangs bgrod lam them skas lta bu yi// bslab gzhi bcas
357a5(skyes rabs): pa rnams la rkang tshugs ston pa rnams// rjesu sgrub pa go 'phang che 'thor phyin 'gyur te// ldog par byed pa'ang gis ni gnyung mar ltung // skye ba'i rgya mtsho shin tu rgal dka' rgal 'dod pa// su zhig tshul khrims gzings gyur lag tu 'ongs
357a6(skyes rabs): par spong // 'phags pa'i dad dpon dang bral lam rgyus ming shes pa// 'grog dgon 'khyams na ci ste yun ring gdung mi byed// 'khor ba'i ri sul khrod kyi g.yang sar lhung gyur pa// mun nag 'thibs po'i nang nas lgang bar brtson pa gang
357b1(skyes rabs): yon tan smyug ma'i phreng ba bar ma dor 'dor ba// de dag shugs drag nyams nga'i ltung bar 'og tu ltung // gang dag gcig pu yid kyi nges par brtags pa ste// yang dag lam dang lhan cig 'grogs par byed pa de// sa steng dkyil na
357b2(skyes rabs): gtso bor gyur pa dam pa ste// slob ma mchog des bla mar bkur ba nyid du gyur// ngo che yon tan tshogs bskyed ma gcig ya rabs mo// mchog tu g.yo med byams pa lta bu'i rjes 'brang ba// bden dang gzhungs la dga' ba'i gzi
357b3(skyes rabs): brjid ldan pa rnams// srog ni bde blag gtong bar byed kyi dam bcas min// re zhig skye bo kun gyi dpyad deng sdig pa yi// 'gro ba kun dang dmyal ba mi zad par zhog gi/ rang bzhin rnal ma bor nas smod pa sdug bsngal ba// mkhas
357b4(skyes rabs): la sa steng de las sdug bsngal gzhan ci yod// gang zhig thub pa rnams kyi srol bstod chos kyi lam// rgya chen gru dang 'dra ba rnyed nas slar 'dor ba// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong 'khyil gar mkhan 'dra rnams la// dga'
357b5(skyes rabs): bas nges par de yi sems bslus 'gyur ba snyam// gang zhig 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor gyur pa'i// nang du zhugs nas bstings tsam la bder sems pa// de ni nges par dbang med rim gyis brgya phrag tu// 'gro dang mnyam
357b6(skyes rabs): dang mi mnyam kun tu 'khyam par 'gyur// shin tu mi bzad dri nga mi gtsang bcer bas bags// rab tu dog pa mun nag 'thibs por 'dug pa'i mi// mngal gnas dmyal ba lta bu'i nang du de zhugs nas// lus yongs bskum la
358a1(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal chen po man ga dgos so// de ni rim gyis til mar btsir bcad sra ba yis// btsir ba ltar byas de nas ci zhig ltar de btsa'// 'on kyang mod la de srog mi 'dar gang yin pa// sdug bsngal nye
358a2(skyes rabs): bar spyad pa'i rnam par tho bcom mo// mi gtsang de nang gnas bcas 'phel ba'i lus de ni// mngal gnas rlon pas dkris shing dri nga mi bzang ldang // gzir bas gnod pa bod de rma rmen zhig pa ltar// gyur pa de yi skyon gyis
358a3(skyes rabs): dran pa spong // byis lus nye bar spyod pa kun la mi 'bongs pa// mi bstan 'khor ba spangs te mkhrangs pa'i dngos gyu ra nas// dar la bab pa'i ri dbang btsan po'i ri sul du// sbrul gdug gnas gyur mun la bag skyong spyod par byed//
358a4(skyes rabs): bsam rlag de ni de nas kyang lhung la// lhung zhing mi gtsigs spyod pa mi 'dor ba// byis pa bdag lus sdug pa rga ba dang // 'chi ba med pa nyid du sems pa lta// rmongs pa de ni thub dbang gis bstan pa'i// lam bzang rnam par spangs
358a5(skyes rabs): nas lam smin par// glang po myos pa lcags kyu med pas gzhan// bab dgu phye mar rlog pa bzhin du 'gro// de nas de ni mi 'dod bzhin du mgor// gtse med dga' bas rdog pas nan mnan nas// skra dkar lcags kyu bdar ba
358a6(skyes rabs): rnon po yis// glang chen rdzi bos glang chen bzhin du 'debs// 'on kyang de ni spyod la sbyor 'byin pas// dge ba'am 'jigs pa bzhin du spong bar 'gyur// rmongs pa bya min byed pa gang skyes pa// smyug ma 'bru chags lta bur brlag par
358b1(skyes rabs): zang/ de nas de ni 'chi bdag dka' ba'i spun// gzhil ba'i bcos thabs med pas bzung nas ni// rgas pa'i ngo bo 'chi bdag 'ongs nas ni// rgod pa bzhin du sbyin 'dzin par byed// de nas de ni lha tshigs rnams 'bye zhing // blo
358b2(skyes rabs): yang bslang 'gyur 'gro ba nyams par 'gyur// lus kyang dengs nas shig shig por 'gyur la// nges par sdig pa 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur// dbang po rnams kyang rim gyis zhum nas ni// yul la chags kyang nus pa nyams par
358b3(skyes rabs): 'gyur/ gnas skabs gang du 'di 'gro gyur pa de// gal te dmyal na yod na de nyid 'jigs// bdag gis ji ltar de bzhin 'dis ma byas// ci ste de ltar de byas 'gro ba nyams// bdag gis ci ste 'di ltar 'chi bdag 'di// mgo bor
358b4(skyes rabs): ldog pas gnon pa 'phrigs ma gyur// mya ngan rdo rje de lta de lta bur// sems la gnod pa rnams kyis de gtses nas// nye du'i skye bo dud mo'i mchi rgyun can// sdug bsngal snying ni snying rje lta bus bltas// gnad kyi gshis su
358b5(skyes rabs): 'jebs par gzir nas ni// shin tu mi bzad mun rum 'jug par 'gyur// 'bad pa lhur blangs bsrung ba byas pa'i lus// yid 'ong 'dris pa rnam par 'dor bar 'gyur// gu shin rje'i zhugs pas dam du btags pa ste// tso to 'bal
358b6(skyes rabs): zhing cho de 'debs byed kyang // de yis glengs pa nyid du skye bo yis// rang gi dus sgra ldir ba gzhan mi thos// bgrod dka' chu dang pha bong thag thug 'doms pa'i bar// tsher ma rnon pos 'dzings pa nyam nga'i lam dag tu// dus
359a1(skyes rabs): kyi zhugs pas ske nas btags te gshin rje'i mi// gtum po rnams kyis dbyug pas bda' zhing 'khyid par 'gyur// mi bzang skom pas rgyang nas chu rlung dri med pa// mthong nas btung bar 'dod de
359a2(skyes rabs): song na de nyid kyang // skra shang nya lcibs tshogs dang sna gsungs 'dres pa dang // 'dam rdzab khrag dang phyi sas grang ba'i chur 'gyur ro// dus rlabs rlung langs chu 'thor ri rtso bsil 'gyur zhing // tsan dran ljon pa sngo 'khrungs ma la
359a3(skyes rabs): yar song nas// de yang 'di la nags sreg me lce rnos 'khrigs shing // mgal dum 'gyel pa mang pos rang rod can du 'gyur// chu ltar rlabs 'jigs 'phang mtho gyes pa las byung ba'i// dbu ba mtsher me lhag ge stug por song
359a4(skyes rabs): na yang // de yang 'di la bye tshan khu ba dmar rtsub pa'i// rlung dmar 'jebs 'tshubs pa'i mya ngan nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni de gnas char sprin ldang bar 'dod na yang // sprin las lcags mda'i char pa dud 'thul mdag mar bcas// tsha
359a5(skyes rabs): cha rdo rje'i pha bong dmar 'phro gser mdog lta bu yi// glog phreng dmar sar 'gyu ba lus la tshor du bab// tsha bas nyen la bu yug kyang ni cher 'gyur la// lhags pa nyam thug pa la me yang grang byed do// shin tu mi bzang las yongs
359a6(skyes rabs): smin pas rnam rmongs pa// 'di la sna tshogs 'di kun phyin ci log tu snang // khab mig tsam gyi kha la dpag tshad mang 'jigs pa'i// lto can nyam thag rgya mtsho chen po'i chu 'thungs kyang // mgul phugs yangs pa nyid du phyin par ma
359b1(skyes rabs): gyur par// kha yi dug gyis chu yi thigs pa'ang bskams par 'gyur// ral pa'i tshogs mang spungs pas bsgyings pa'i khyi bdag gi/ mche ba bzangs ring rdo rje'i rtse mos lus dbang cing // chu bo rab med thal spyos me lces gang ba'i ngog/
359b2(skyes rabs): rdo ba zur rnon mi bzang rtse rnon can du bdas// spu gri rno gtams lcug tshal lo ma ral gri yis// nang du thang chad bskyugs na lus smad skyabs med pa// rtse gsum mdung thung dang ni ral gri rnos gang ba'i// khron pa gshin rje'i kha bas thu ba'i
359b3(skyes rabs): nang du lhung // nyi chen gyis gdungs bzod dka' rlag par dga' ba'i lus// ljon shing lo ma sngo stug mthong nas song ba dang // de yi lo mas mtshon brgya ltung byas lus dbad cing // de na yun ring bud mo las shes brlag par gnas// bud
359b4(skyes rabs): med kun nas me lce brgya phrag mthon pa'i me// me stag phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i rgyan gyi gzhigs gyur cing // sog le lta bu'i rtsub pa'i lus kyis zon med pa// shin tu sdug pa'i tshul du bcum nas 'khyud par byed// ri dang mnyam du lugs
359b5(skyes rabs): rings 'jigs su rung ba gnyis// 'dus pa'i phrag tu lus kun phye mar rlog cing 'joms// cung zad bsil ba'i rlung zhig langs pas rtas nas de// de bzhin phyir yang lan brgyar kun nas phye mar rlog/ bso khyi bong bu ce spyang stong phrag
359b6(skyes rabs): gis bred nas// shal ri mtho la mi bzad de la myur 'dzegs na// tsher ma'i tshogs kha thur du bltas pas thal 'byin cing // zug rngu tshabs po che dag khong rlag nub par 'gyur// gang shin rje'i lag na thogs pa dus kyi zhags pa lta'i// sbrul
360a1(skyes rabs): gdugs mgo 'phang bstod pas dam gzhag gzhungs nas ni// gson por kha dang byang kar kAng ka bya rgod kyis// de na gnas pa'i mig drag tsham tshom med par 'dra// de lus de dag gi mchu rdo rje rtse mo ltas//
360a2(skyes rabs): pa me dbang nyam thag nga ro 'byin byed cing // thar du bab na lcags tsher gyen du kha bltas pa// sbom la rno ba mang pos lus phug dran pa nyams// de nas kha cig mdung rtsa gsum pa 'bar ba dang // zug rngu rnon pos lus dbang thur
360a3(skyes rabs): du 'bab mi nus// de tshe mtshon cha bdar ba'i chu can kha rnams kyis// kun tu grangs pa rgyu lto brang breng nar zhing 'thor// kha cig ri bo'i g.yangs ya ngar g.yang du ltung // kha cig 'bru mar bskol ba zangs chen nang du ltung // gzhan dag bye ma
360a4(skyes rabs): bsregs pa ma stag 'phro ba yi// sa gzhi rkang pa bzhag pa'i gnas mi thod par lhung // kha cig 'bu sbrang phra mo lcig lcig 'dug pa yi// tshogs kyi lus rmugs bam zhing rnam par 'dul// las kyi rang bzhin snying la 'tsho ba thogs
360a5(skyes rabs): pa rnams// bskyod pa tsam yang bya bar mi nus bzhin du gson// lhags pa dpe med rus pa la yang thim pa yis// lus sbrebs 'dar zhing bskur nas gum gum por 'dug pa// chu bur brgya 'byung rdol ba las skyes srog chags kyi// ral gri
360a6(skyes rabs): dbang nas zhag dang chu ser rkang bcas 'dzag/ kos thag so 'thams sgra dang spu rnams g.yengs gyur pa// mi dang rna ba lkog ma gnod pas kun gzir zhing // lus dang sems kyi bar dag rab tu blong gyur nas// grang ba'i dmyal bar gnas
360b1(skyes rabs): shing shin tu 'o 'dod 'bod// dmyal med du ba che dkun mnam pa 'thul bas gnam mdog 'gyur// me lce'i lag mang rnam par 'phros nas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor khebs// rus gong dkar dum phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa spyi g.yab pa//
360b2(skyes rabs): glang chen pags gyon sdig thabs kye ma kying hud zer ba bzhin// la lar me stag che 'phro 'khrug pa 'ur sgra tog yar la// zhag gis bab na skad ngan bod pa'i rtse zhing tshil tshil 'bar// brang gi rus pa'i khong du thal la lhag lhag sgra grags pa//
360b3(skyes rabs): bskal pa'i dus kyi me yis bskyod du med pa'i nang du lhung // glo gnas rtswa skam snying la spar ba lta bur me tshogs 'bar// mgrin dang kha nas me lce 'bar ba dus bcas bsnyung mar 'byung // khong lto gas pa nas lug nang khrol nar
360b4(skyes rabs): bas kun bred cing // brda mi phrad pa'i skad chen tsam zhig 'don par byed par zad// sdug bsngal tsha las thar par 'dod pas de dag yang dang yang // sgo bye gseb gzhan mthong nas thag ring ci zhig ltar ste 'byer// gang tshe las kyi sgo
360b5(skyes rabs): 'phar dam pos de yang bcas gyur pa// de tshe yi mug bzod rlag sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur// mda' chen rno tshogs 'bar ba char bzhin 'bab pa'i rjes la yang // dmyal ba'i srung mas dbyug pas btab cing mchi ma
360b6(skyes rabs): 'dzag bzhin du// lcags bzhun khu ba me stag 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khregs pa ldung // kha sna rna ba'i bu ga dag nas dung 'thul gyen du 'byung // mig dang glang spris rdol gyi bar du kun sreg cing // glad pa'i rgyas la 'bar ba'i me lce smug
361a1(skyes rabs): nag tshogs// me de khros pa lta bur nga yaM lus phug la// bud shing skam po ltar la sbar ba bzhin du mchod// skye bo de srog re gzar klung gi chu ltar g.yo// dmyal ba'i me yang der zang che ba'ang der zad du//
361a2(skyes rabs): las rnams ji ltar thams cad shin tu mi bzad pa// snang bar 'gyur pa de ltar yongasu sgyur bar byed// skye bo rang gi las kyi dbang med 'tshal spyod pa// brgya la sdig gnas dmyal ba dag nas thar na yang // 'jig rten 'gro ba mtha'
361a3(skyes rabs): yas bye ba phyed rnams su// mi yis dngos po shin tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid// gal te kla klo dmyal ba'i srung dang spyod mtshungs sam// dud 'gro phan tshun za bar byed pa'i nang dag du// skye ba thob par 'gyur na gang gi phyir yang ni//
361a4(skyes rabs): g.yang du lhung bar 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul de nyid bsten// gang zhig thob nas skye ba'i rgya mtsho'i mthar 'byin cing // byang chub mchog gi sa bon dge ba'ang 'debs gyur pa// yid bzhin nor bu bas kyang yon tan lhag pa yi// mi nyid de ni
361a5(skyes rabs): su zhig 'bras bu med par byed// bde gshegs lam rten 'gro ba 'dren par chas gyur cing // sems kyi stobs chen mi yis rnyed pa gang yin pa'i// lam de lha dang klu yis mi rnyed lha min dang // mkha' lding rig 'dzin mi 'am ci dang
361a6(skyes rabs): lto 'phye min// mi yi dngos po shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed gyur nas// don du brnag pa gang yin de ni bstun te bsgrub// mar me'i me lce shugs drag rlung gi bskyod pa lha'i// tshe ni skad cig gnas pa'i gdengs yang yod ma yin// 'di ni
361b1(skyes rabs): sang bya 'di ni thang cig 'og tu bya// 'di ni de'u re bya zhes skye bo sems pa na// gshin rje be con nag thog zur gyi lta ba yi// mig rtsa du mar khros ma rangs gad mos re snyam 'debs// sos ka me tog rgyas pa'i dus 'di 'byung bar
361b2(skyes rabs): 'gyur// zla ba gsal bas mtshon pa'i don 'dus 'di byung zhes// skye bo thams cad dga' 'gyur bdag gi tshe 'di ni// zad par 'gyur zhes shin tu mi dgar 'gyur ba med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa nye bar brgyan byas shing // sked
361b3(skyes rabs): chings char chen sprin gyis 'khrigs pas 'khyud gyur pa// ri'i rtse'i nags kyi mthongs der chags pa med par ni// rlung ltar g.yo ba'i rang bzhin tshe gtugs skal ba che// nags mthongs ri dgas dkyu ba'i tshogs kyis rten byas pa/
361b4(skyes rabs): kun nas nyams dga' bzang po de ni skyid pa gang // de ci dgra' ba'i nags tshal lha mo'i nyam bag du// thel gyis 'bebs pa'i rdo leb can la yod gyur tam// nags klung chu gtsang ngogs kyi dben par skyid pa gang // de ci lha yi bu myo d+hi
361b5(skyes rabs): zhim byugs pa yi// lan bu'i rgyun du thogs pa'i rgyun ldan me tog tshogs// mdzes pa'i zil gnon lha yi chu la'ang yod 'gyur ram// rtsa ba 'bras bu shun pa lo ma phun sum tshogs pa'i ljon shing ldan// nags tshal ltos med ri bo'i
361b6(skyes rabs): chu rgyun bsil 'bab chags pa med pa'i gnas// chu klung yangs pa'i mtha' ru 'bras bu me tog lhung bas brgyan pa yi// nyams dga'i bas mthar ci zhig med de dmyal stong khyim gyis bslus te sdod // ri sul yangs par skye bo bun long
362a1(skyes rabs): med pas rab bde ba// nyer spyod rgya chen nags tshal sngo 'khrungs phreng bar sbrengs// chu ngogs bsnyen pa phu chu'i rgyun sgra rnga ltar snyan pa yis// bdag cag nyon mongs yul ma yin zhes 'don la sgrog pa
362a2(skyes rabs): bzhin// 'dod pa rnams dang 'byor dang srid gsum rgyal ba yis// sgyu ma smig rgyu nu zla rba rlabs 'dra bar gsungs// rmi lam lta bu'i ngan spyod 'khrul pas bslus pa yi// byis pa gang dag de la chags pa dmyal bar ltung // yul dang
362a3(skyes rabs): dug mtshungs dang po myong ba tsa mo na bde// yul dang dug mtshungs rnam smin rtsub pas mi bzad pa// yul dang dug mtshungs gti mug mun pas thibs por byed// yul dang dug mtshungs shugs bzlog dka' zhing g.yo ba yin// dug
362a4(skyes rabs): dang yul rnams blo yis nges par brtags byas na// nyis na dug bla mi bzad rang yul rnams la min// dug ni skye ba gcig la dug tu 'gyur bar zad// yul ni tshe rabs gzhan yang drug du 'gyur bar byed// dug ni dug dang bsres
362a5(skyes rabs): nas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// gsang sngags mchog dang dug sel sman gyis gso bar nus// dug ni thabs ldan spyad na mi la phaT 'gyur gyi// dug chen yul ni nam yang de lta ma yin no// ji ltar glang bu khron zab kha nas 'khrungs
362a6(skyes rabs): pa yi// rtsa lo kham 'ga' tsam la yid ni chags gyur pa// rnyed pa grub pa med par g.yang du ltung ba ltar// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten bde ldan 'dod pa'ang de dang 'dra// lha yi bu mo dgyis 'bab pa'i chu rgyun gyis// 'phrul thabs slongs
362b1(skyes rabs): papa rnams dang lhan cig rtse myong nus// phyir yang chu bo rab med rba drag 'bog pa yis// rmus pa'i sdug bsngal myi bzang bsten par bya dgos so// lha tshal dpag bsam shing lo'i gding bya kun bkram par// lha yi bu mo dang stan bde bar
362b2(skyes rabs): gnas nas kyang // phyir yang mtshon rnon mang po 'bab pas lus dbang pa// lo ma ral gyi lta bu'i nags tshal bgrod dgos so// rkang bzhag nems dang 'phar byed reg na bde ba yi// ri rab po yi dkyil du yun rings gnas nas kyang // phyir
362b3(skyes rabs): yang bye ma bsregs pa'i me a mur gyi tshogs// brla dang rkang lag kun tu zhig par khyam par 'gyur// dril bu mdzes 'khrol mu tig phreng tshogs lhag ge bo// gzhal med khang du zhugs te lha yul bgrod nas kyang // phyir yang mi bzang
362b4(skyes rabs): skyabs med mun nag thibs po dpag med pa// pha mtha' med pa'i nang du spyi tshugs ltung bar 'gyur// gang du lha klu mi 'am ci yi mgo brgyan gyi// 'od kyi tshogs kyis rkang bstan dmar ba'i brgya byin yang // las kyi rlung 'khrugs 'gro ba
362b5(skyes rabs): ngan par 'gro 'gyur ba// de la skyes bu su zhig 'jigs pa rten mi byed// me tog rab tu rnyings shing lus rdul 'thon pa dang // gos rnying sme zhing nye du rnams la lta ba yi// lha rnams 'chi ba'i rab tu sdug bsngal gang yin de// 'tsho ba chu bur lta
362b6(skyes rabs): bur g.yo ba mi la med// sdug bsngal me tshogs phungs pas 'jigs pa'i 'jig rten 'dir// skye bo bde snyam mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa gang // de ni gshin rje'i kha yang 'byed par byed pa skye// de ni skye ba phyi ma'i ljon shing sa bon
363a1(skyes rabs): yin/ da de ni gshin rje srid mtshor rgyu ba'i sems can la// log par smon pas 'jigs pa dbyug pa nag po'i rtser// srid pa'i tha gu ring pos dam bzhag btags pa yi// 'chil pas nya la bya ba bzhin du btab pa yin// dmyal ba
363a2(skyes rabs): rnams zangs chen lhag lhag bskol ba tsha ba'i shugs drag nas// skad cig tsam zhig mgo bstod dbugs 'byin 'gyur pa rnams// lcags kyi tho ba rab tu mang po khros te gzas pa yis// brgyapa na de nyid mchog tu bde ba yin par sems pa ltar//
363a3(skyes rabs): de bzhin sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yis dbang med rtag gzir cing // re zhig tsam zhig ji zhig ltar te skye shi'i 'khrug med nas// skad cig sdug bsngal gnyug mar bzod dka' me lce zhil gyur na// 'jig rten thams cad bde ba 'ga' la yang sred
363a4(skyes rabs): par byed// ji lta ji ltar 'gro ba kun la bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed// de lta de ltar gti mug mun bya shin tu stug por 'gyur// ji lta ji ltar 'gro ba kun la sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyed// de lta de ltar gti mug mun pa shin tu srab mor 'gyur//
363a5(skyes rabs): ji ltar sdug pa bsgom pa shin tu rnam 'phel ba// de lta de ltar 'dod chags me lce shin tu 'phro bar 'gyur// ji lta ji ltar mi sdug bsgom pa shin tu 'phel 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar 'dod chags me lce shin tu rtse zhil 'gyur// bud med yan lag
363a6(skyes rabs): dridring rul pa mi sdug dang // pad+ma zla ba ut+pal dag tu snyoms byed pa// snyan dang gas mkhan gyi rdzun de'i 'bras bu mi bzad pa// de dag de yi mngal gnas 'jug pa de yin no// 'gro bar lan brgyar ma son 'gro de gang zhig yod// sngon chad lan
363b1(skyes rabs): mang ma myong ba de gang zhig ni// rnga yab dkar mdzes lta bu'i dpal gang ma thob pa// de yang gang zhig yod na 'on kyang 'dod chags 'phel// gang gi gling bar ma gnas chu bo de yod min// yul phyogs gang du gang ma bcas pa'i gnas
363b2(skyes rabs): de med// gang du ma song na mkha'i phyogs de'ang yod min na// 'on kyang 'dod chags dgang dka' 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid// sngon chad lan mang ma myong sdug bsngal de yid mi 'gro bar// gang gis tshim gyur 'dod pa de dag med// gang
363b3(skyes rabs): gri ltor ma nyal ba'i sems can de med na// 'on kyang ji ltar 'khor ba can la chags bral med// skye ba yongasu 'dzin pa 'gro ba rgya chen 'dir// bde dang sdug bsngal dag du lan mang 'gre ldog pa// 'gro ba gnyen ma gyur pa'i skye bo de gang
363b4(skyes rabs): med// 'on kyang zhe sdang sbrul gyi rang bzhin 'jigs par gnas// gang dang lhan cig 'dus nas rgod cing rtses pa dang // glu blangs dga' mthun byas shing gcig tu zos 'thungs dang // dus kyi rim pas me tog sna rgyan dengs byas dang //
363b5(skyes rabs): gnas skabs ci zhig ltar mnyam mi mnya byas pa yi// nye du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i khongs su chud gyur pa// klong gi nang du lhung ba lta bu snang bzhin du// skye shi phos pas ngo ma shes pa de bor nas// gal te gcig thar byed naHde las khrel por
363b6(skyes rabs): med/ dbyis pa phang na bca' ba ci yang mi nus par// gang gi nu zho byams pa'i shugs kyis gzags 'thungs pa// ngal ba mang sten byams pa bstan pa de dag 'dir// shin tu ma rabs zhig na'ang spong bar su zhig spro// gang gi khong na
364a1(skyes rabs): 'di skabs rnyed nas gnas gnas shing // gang gis brtse bag sems kyis zin bcas 'di blangs pa// nyon mongs de dag sdug bsngal skyabs med 'dir bor nas// 'gro ba ma rabs tha shal zhig
364a2(skyes rabs): na'ang su zhig spro// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mi bzad mang bas dbang med skyabs med 'dir// gzhan gyi don du sdug bsngal gang de bde zhes skyes mchog gsung // skad cig gzhan bkres skom dang tsha ngal bral bas rangs byos pas//
364a3(skyes rabs): des dga' gang yin de dang 'dra ba 'di na'ang gang zhig yod// gzhan phan bde ba skyed par brtson pas dga' ba rnyed pa gang // de ni yul de'i longs spyod lhur len rnams kyis ji ltar yang // bzhon bdes mi thob mi dbang 'byor pa'i
364a4(skyes rabs): yo byad rnams kyis min// chung mas ma yin gzhan min lha gnas lha min 'gro bas min// shin tu rnyed sla rtswa kham 'ga' lha phyugs kyang drang nyid za// shin tu skom pas gdungs pa chu zhig rnyed na dga' mgur 'thung // 'di na skyes
364a5(skyes rabs): bu gzhan don byed par brtson pa gang yin pa// de 'di'i brjid bag yin te de bde skyes bu'i rtsal de 'phags// nyi ma rlabs chen rta zhon rgyu ba snang byed gang yin dang // khur la mi rtsegs sa yis 'jig rten 'degs pa gang yin de// rang don
364a6(skyes rabs): 'ga' med chen po rnams kyis rang bzhin de 'dra ste// de dag 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i ro la gcig tu gzhol// 'jig rten ma rig dung sprin 'khrigs pas 'gro ba 'khrugs gyur pa// sdug bsngal ma rab 'bar ba'i nang du dbang
364b1(skyes rabs): med lhung mthong nas// thod la me lce 'bar ba lta bur yid brel brtson pa gang // 'di na de dag skyes bu yin te mkhas pa'ang de dag yin// gzhan gyi don du me lces gang ba'i mnar med dmyal bar yang // gangs dang zla 'od bsil
364b2(skyes rabs): ba lta bur rab tu dga' bzhin 'jug/ nyid kyi don du pad+ma kha bye lhag ger 'dug pa yi// mtsho yang de la me lce'i tshogs bzhin rab tu gdung bar byed// gzhan la phan par byed par chas pa'i mkhas pa rnams// lo ma ral gri tshal na
364b3(skyes rabs): 'ang bde blag gnas byed kyi// skad cig tsam yang lha yi bu mau dang 'grogs nas// dga' ba'i tshal gyi nang du skyid par byed mi 'gyur// rgal bar gyur pa skyabs med skye bo bsgral ba'i phyir// phyir yang chu bo rab med nang du 'jug byed kyi//
364b4(skyes rabs): lha yi chu bo rba rlabs tshal tshi la 'dug pa yis// reg pa'i bde ba dag nyid sten par byed ma yin// de ltar rgyan gyi brgyan gyur legs spyang rin po che// gsal ba'i nang na gsal ba bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi yangs// dga' ba'i dga' ba byas
364b5(skyes rabs): pa mi gzos rnyed dka' ba// bkra shis rnams kyi bkra shIs zhi ba'i bde rgyud sten// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung gi me tog rtag bsten bya// ljon shing me tog dri la 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung // bde gshegs me tog gsung
364b6(skyes rabs): las don tshogs bsten bya ste// sbrang ma sbrang rtsi la mchog dga' bar byed la ltos// skad cig gcig la zad cing rtag tu 'khrugs pa'i yul rnams spong // zhi ba'i bde 'bras 'chi ba'i tsher med gcig pu dben pa bsten// rnam thar
365a1(skyes rabs): sgo yi gtan pas gti mug 'khrugs pa'i rab rib sol// rta mchog rte'u ni shin tu yun ring gnyid log 'gyur ba yin// khyod cig gdung pas nyam thag rnams la srid pa'i mya ngan du// shing chen
365a2(skyes rabs): sdong bstan rgya chen kun gel bzod dang dul ba'i lo ma can// zhi gnas me tog shes rab yal ga rab smin lo bran stug/ smon lam rtse mo tshul khrims grib ma rab zhi 'bras bcas kyis// khyod cig dungs pas nyam thag
365a3(skyes rabs): rnams la spyod pI mya ngan du// mtsho chen yangs gsal byin gzhol gting zab bsam pa rab tu dngas// rtag bsil sbrul gdug sti yis bag med 'jigs spang rang bzhin gyis// rab tu gtsang zhing sred pa gcod byed rtul ba'i
365a4(skyes rabs): khur bzod kyis// khyod cig gdung bas nyam thag rnams la srid pa'i mya ngan du// sprin chen skye bo mang phan mi 'jigs smra ba'i sgra chen+da sgrogs// grags pa rgya chen char gyi shugs dag snying rje'i rlung gis bskyod// rdul bral zhi
365a5(skyes rabs): bas tshul khrims grib mas sa stengs brgyan par gyis// bdag gis de skad brjed pas bsod nams cung zad bsgrubs pa gang // de yis skye bo ma lus bde gshegs spyod la dang byed cing // rtag bde longs spyod bzang ldan
365a6(skyes rabs): yid la rab 'byor pa dang // gzhan la phan dga' rim gyis kun mkhyen bgrod par shog/ dmyal ba lag mthil ltar mnyam snang gsal me rab zhi ba dang // skom 'khrungs pad+ma'i lo mas khebs shing rtsa ba'i lce
365b1(skyes rabs): song 'thon// gtsang zhing dri zhim pad+ma kha byes su rnams brgyan pa dang // rgyas shing bzang la ser bu'i ngad bcas char zim 'bab par shog/ bdud dpung pham pa cho nges 'debs pas mi snyengs sgrags pa po// lha bu'i rtsed mo bas
365b2(skyes rabs): kyang dga' mdzad lha dang mi 'dul ba// skye shi nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyun rnams 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas dag/ phyogs dang phyogasu brnag pa bzhin du nam zhar 'byung bar shog/ 'gro ba chos kyi kun dga' 'phel ba'i dga'
365b3(skyes rabs): ston che bar shog/ 'chi bdag rI ba shin+do yun ring goms pa don med shog/ thub pa'i skye bo gtam tshogs 'phel bar zhi ba bdud rtsi yi// char gyi zla ba'i snang ba rab bzangs bsil bas don byas shog/ slob ma la spring pa'i 'phrin
365b4(skyes rabs): yige slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba d+h+waM dwe ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal rtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
365b5(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza ka ni ka le kha/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po ka ni ka la springs pa'i 'phrin yig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bgrod par
365b6(skyes rabs): bgyi 'os khyod lags na// bkug kyang ma mchis gang lags de// ma gus ma lags brnyas ma lags// rga dang nad kyi bar chad bgyis// bdag ni sems can thams cad dang // 'dra bar khyod la brtse mod kyi// khyod kyi yon
366a1(skyes rabs): tan gyis khyod la// lhag par nye mgon khyad par bgyid// gdams kyi phal cher mchis mod kyi// thams cad gdams par su rngo thogs// khyod kyi yon tan gang lags des// bdag ni spyi brdol skyes
366a2(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// zlogs pa med pa'i yon tan gyis// phyogs rnams kun tu bsgos pas ni// mi mchog rnams kyang thugs thub par// mdza' bshes bzhin du 'dzem pa med// de ltas snyan gtod nyid kyi ched// bad gi gsol ba 'di gson
366a3(skyes rabs): te/ bsgrub dang btang ba yid gnyis las// gang rigs de ni nyam su bzhes// dga' bar bgyid pa'i yul rnams dang // rgyags par bgyid pa'i lang tsho dang // bdag nyid rang dgar spyod pa dang // kun tu don med bgyid pa'i sgo// phung bar
366a4(skyes rabs): byed pa de gsum spang // mkhas pas dam pa bsten pa dang // dbang po gdul dang shes rab kyi// stobs mthus nyams ni smad nas spyad// khyod kyis nyes pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i// cha ni gsum po de dag rnams// chos lugs dag dang 'dul ba yis//
366a5(skyes rabs): bcos nas yon tan nyid du mdzod// ci ste rgyal po blon po dag/ dkyil tshe snying rje'i bdag nyid ni// rtag tu nyon mongs med pa yi// las kyi rgyal srid bya bar rung // 'jig rten 'di na blo gros kyi// nyam chung gyur dang mgon med pa// bya ba ma yin byed
366a6(skyes rabs): pa la// gdon mi za bar 'jug par 'gyur// de bas ji srid sa de la// myur du ma skal par du ni// blo mthu bskyed phyir mkhas pa dag/ bsdu bar dgyes pa'i nan tan mdzod// chos kyi bstan bcos gdon bgyi zhing // de yi don gyi tshul gson
366b1(skyes rabs): la// gsan pa'i chos rnams rnam dpyad de// dpyad pa la ni mkhas par mdzod// mya ngan gyis ni ma gdungs shing // na gzhon nad med longs pa yi// dngos po da ltar byung ba yis// blo gros la ni mi nus med// 'dir ni skyes bu dam pa las//
366b2(skyes rabs): dus dus su yang nyung zad gson// nyung ngu bsags na'ang nges par ni// ring por mi thogs mang por 'gyur// rtag tu chu thigs re re'i rgyun// bar chad med par 'bab pa yis// gang zhig gang bar mi 'gyur ba'i// snod de ji lta bu zhog mchis// de ltar
366b3(skyes rabs): dpe gsal de lta bu// rgyal po tshad mar mdzad nas ni// dam pa'i chos ni gsan pa la// rtag tu dges pa nyid du mdzod// yon tan nor ni gnyer la gnyen// mkhas shing snying rje'i bdag nyid can// byas gzo bongs chos mi bgyid pa// bzang po khyod
366b4(skyes rabs): kyis slad du zhog/ khyod kyis blun dang 'phongs chos can// brkam zhing byas pa mi gzo dang // kha gsag gtum po mi bzang ba// yul na'ang gnas su ma stsal cig/ rtag tu so so'i skye bo yis// khyad par mkhyen par mdzod cig drang // de yi
366b5(skyes rabs): khyad par mkhyen tsam la// phun sum tshogs pa rag las so// mi gang dka' ba spyod byed dang // dor bar bya dka' dor ba dang // bzod par dka' ba bzod byed dang // bkur dka' nyams su len pa dang // gnas min las ni zlog byed dang //
366b6(skyes rabs): gnas su 'jog par brtson pa dang // de yi bsam pa mthun gus dang // bde bar 'dod cing 'o byams pa// de dag rnams ni mdzub shes te// gnyen 'dun grogs po'ang de dag lags// rang don tsam phyir 'brang ba'i mi// gzhan dag skye
367a1(skyes rabs): bo na phan pa bas// grogs po phan par 'dod pa'i tshig/ mi snyan yang ni phan pa dang // 'dzum dang bde ba lags pa dag/ thugs la bzhag par mdzad du gsol// tshig snyan phan pa ma lags dang // 'jam
367a2(skyes rabs): dbyangs bden pa ma lags pa// dam pa ma yin rnams kyi tshig/ khyod kyi thugs la ma bzung zhig/ phan par smra ba khro yang ni// khyod kyis gnang tshan dag tu mdzod// mi phan smra ba bstod bgyid kyang // dgyes pa dag tu ma mdzod cig/
367a3(skyes rabs): rab dang mtsho ya ngang pa yi// rgyal po dang ni chus 'jigs bzhin// dam pa rnams kyis bsnyen bla dang // dam pa min pas bsnyen dka' mdzod// khyod kyis mkhas rnams tshim bgyis pas// 'byor pa don du gnyer mi bgyid// yon tan dgyes
367a4(skyes rabs): phyir khyod kyis ni// yon tan rnams kyis mi ngoms mdzod// longs spyod byed dam bde ba dang // sdug bsngal phrad pa'am spyod pa 'am// spyod lam kun tu spyod pa ni// khyod kyis dam pa bsten pa dang // dran pa'i grogs kyis bskor ba na// bag
367a5(skyes rabs): yod par ni gnas 'gyur te// sA la'i shing la 'khri shing bzhin// bzang po dpal gyis 'khyud par 'gyur// khyod kyis bzhom pa bden pa dang // khyad par zhing la sbyin pa dang // dran dang bral bas 'dod pa dbye// chad pas gang du'ang
367a6(skyes rabs): gcad mi bgyi// log pas 'thab btsugs byed pa dang // bkren la dman par lta ba dang // tshul khrims ldan rnams mi dga' dang // dka' thub sdom pa 'khrul byed pa// bzhi po 'di dag 'dod min te// rtsa ba 'joms par bgyid pa lag
367b1(skyes rabs): rang brtson khyod kyi yul na ni// de dag gtan ma mchis par mdzod// stobs dang ldan pa stobs chung ba// gnang chen gyis ni mi gnang dang // mchod 'os rnams kyis mi mchod dang // smos 'dris kyis ni mi shes pa// gang yang rung ba gang gis
367b2(skyes rabs): kyang / brnyas pa med par khyod kyis mdzod// tha snyad rnams ni dag pa yis// kun la 'dri bar gzigasu gsol// kun gyis rang gi chos thob cing // chos kyis thams cad 'tsho bar mdzod// mi sdug kyang ni nyes med na// thams cad bde bar
367b3(skyes rabs): mdzad du gsol// pha yi bu la ji lta bar// khyod kyis 'khor la byams bgyis na// bu yis pha la ji lta bar// khyod la zha 'bring dga' bar bgyi// phal rnams rang bzhin bzang na ni// khyod kyis dgongs pa bzhin du 'gyur// phal rnams rang
367b4(skyes rabs): bzhin ngan na ni// khyod kyis dgongs pa bzhin mi 'gyur// gal te gzhung lugs bzang zhe na// gong nas gong du 'phang bar 'gyur// ci ste ngan pas spyod mdzad na// 'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur// dam pa'i las la gnas nas ni// khyu mchog/
367b5(skyes rabs): dang ni khyu lta bu// rjesu 'tsho ba'i skyes ngu'i tshogs// 'di kun rjesu 'byang bar 'gyur// khyod kyi gya gyu la zhugs na// g+hu gyu kho na'i rjes 'brangs pas// skye dgu khyod mdzad rjes 'brang ba'i// skye dgu de ni nyams par 'gyur// de bas bdag gzhan bsrung
367b6(skyes rabs): slad du// thugs kyis rab tu bsgrims nas ni// gna' rgyal drang srong rnams kyi lugs// nyams pa sar par bcos su gsol// gna' yi rgyal po'i spyod pa las// gang dag bzang ba de mdzod la// mi rigs pa ni gang lags de// smad par
368a1(skyes rabs): mdzod la spang du gsol// sngon gyi bka' khrims skyon chags pa// gna' nas mchis kyang rgyun chod la// rgyal po ka ni kasu mtshan pa'i// khrims su bca' ba gsar pa mdzod// lha khyod yon tan don gnyer bas// yon
368a2(skyes rabs): tan lha bzhin kho nar mdzod// lha khyod skyon rnams mkhyen pa yis// lha bzhin nyes med kho nar mdzod// zla ba me ra gyi ngo bzhin du// nyes pa'i tshogs rnams 'grib pa dang // zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du// rtag tu yon tan gyis brgyan mdzod//
368a3(skyes rabs): yab sems bzhin du bdag nyid kyis// chos kyis sa stengs bskyang ba dang // yab mes bzhin du lha gang gI/ dus ston 'phel bar mdzad du gsol// khyod kyis mtho ris byad grol gyis// tham skus mi mnyam mnyam pa'i phyir// bsod
368a4(skyes rabs): nams las byung bzo rig tshe// rtag tu lha khang dag tu sogs// rga dang 'chi bas bsnyengs mdzod de// chos bzhin rgyal srid dpal dpyad nas// bgres kar dgon par gshegs su gsol// dam chos ston pa'i 'bras mchis mdzod//
368a5(skyes rabs): rang byung rnams kyi rjesu bsgrub// ku sha'i rigasu 'khrungs khyod kyis// yab mes 'phags rigs nyi ma yi// gdung rgyud chos lugs ma nyams mdzod// skye ba can la nges par ni// rgas dang 'chi dang na mchis nA// ma bgres ma bsnyungs
368a6(skyes rabs): ma grangs zhes// legs smon gsol yang ci la sman// srid pa dag ni gang yang rung // de nyid rgas dang 'chi ba lags// yongasu bsgyur bas rga ba ste// skad cig 'jigs pas 'chi ba yi// ma rgas ma na mi 'chi zhes// smra ba dag ni/
368b1(skyes rabs): smra ba na// de ltar 'jig rten kun 'bar na// yang srid myed lngas gzhan ci yod// gang na mi mthun yod ma yin// gang du 'du byed 'jig mi 'gyur// gang na gcig tu bde bar gnas// gang du song na 'chi med 'gyur// srid pa kun nas
368b2(skyes rabs): nyon mongs dang // sdug bsngal 'gyur ba cir mi mkho// de slad nges pa srid pa rnams// med par bsgom pa rgyas par mdzod// 'dir ni bgyi ba 'di nyid de// de las gzhan pa'i bgyi mi 'tshal// bgyi ba de ni bgyis pa yis//
368b3(skyes rabs): mi bgyi ba yi tsher phyin to// baglang 'briphreng bzhin du 'khor ba ru// len mang yongs su 'khor ba ni// lan brgya 'am yang na stong dag du// 'jig rten dag tu ci ma bgyis// 'di ma bgyis smas byis pa yis// yang dang yang du bgyi
368b4(skyes rabs): 'tshal bas// thog ma med pa'i dus can 'dis// da dung bar du ma log go// 'chi bdag su dang mi shes bya// glo bur dag tu 'bab 'gyur bas// sang dag bya zhes ma bzhes par// dam pa'i chos la sbyar te mdzod// 'di sangs dang
368b5(skyes rabs): 'di mi bya zhes// bya ba myi la bzang po min// nam zhig khyod ni med 'gyur ba'i// sang de gdon mi za bar 'ong // 'chi bdag brtse ba med pa can// skyes rtsal don med gsod 'gyur ba// gsod pa mngon du 'ongs bzhin du// mkhas
368b6(skyes rabs): pa su zhig bag skyong spyod// de slad dpag tshan bzod med des// mda' ni mi bzad 'tshor med pa// de ni ji srid ma 'phangs pa// de srid rang gi don la 'bod// rnam smin 'byin pa sngon las kyis// khyod ni yongasu btang gyur pa//
369a1(skyes rabs): sar pa'i las dang rjes 'brel cing // 'chi bdag gis ni drangs pa na// dag dang sdig pa ma gtogs par// 'gro ba thams cad phyir log nas// 'ga' yang khyod rjes mi 'brang bar// mkhyen par
369a2(skyes rabs): mdzod la legs par spyod// bdag ni snying rjes zil non cing // yid mi dga' ba'i rlan gyis ni// shin tu brlan pa'i smre sngags 'di// re zhig gsan par mdzad du gsol// 'gro ba sman pa log ltung ba// mgon med nyes med phal
369a3(skyes rabs): checher ni// rtswa dang chu dang 'bros bu ni// phal pas 'tsho ba sgrub bgyis pa// bya dang ri dgas phyugs dag la// rgyal pos gsod dam gsod 'jug pa// cig rigs snam mi rigs pa// bde la gnas pa khyod nyid gsungs// khyod ni chen por mi
369a4(skyes rabs): khro zhing // gnod pa bgyid pa'ang bzod ces gda'// khyod kyi thugs rjes dud 'gro ba// kye ma su zhig dgag par bgyi// gnod pa bgyid la bzod mdzad pa// gnod mi bgyid pa 'gums mdzad pas// khyod la brtse dang mi brtsa bas// rgyu mthun pa ni
369a5(skyes rabs): gnyis ka gda'// sngon chad bgyis pa'i sug las kyis// 'di ltar 'ben du gyur pa la// khyod nyid gnod pa mdzod na go// su la skyabasu 'gro ba gsungs// gzhan gyis gnod pa bgyis na yang ka/ nyid kyis phyag gis bshugs 'tshal na// khyod
369a6(skyes rabs): bzhengs mngon du mnod mdzod na// phyogs kun mun par ma gyur gtam// kun la srog ni phangs pa ste// kun la gson pa sdug pa lags// thams cad 'chi ba'i chos can te// thams cad sdug bsngal rnams kyis gdung // 'di ltar gang zhig mi
369b1(skyes rabs): 'tshal ba// de nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal te// mkhas pa su zhig dga' ba ltar// tshig pa la ni yang sreg bzhin// khyod ni srog gcod mi dgyes shing // srog gcod dgyes las phyir log na// rgyal srid nyams par 'gyur ram ci// lugs 'di
369b2(skyes rabs): ci zhig lags pa gsungs// mtshon cha'i thabs la mkhas khyod kyis// g.yul ngor srol btong mthong lags na// gzhan du khyod la ri dgas la// ci slad gnod pa'i las rnams mdzad// ri dgas gzhon nu'i spyan lam khyod// spyan dang
369b3(skyes rabs): 'dra ba'i ri dgas rnams// rtabs nas rig rig lta ba la// ci yi slad du thugs mi D+h+we// khyod kyi spyan dang mig 'dra'i phyir// khyod la dga' ba gang lags te// ri dgas la yang dga' bgyid na// khyod ni ji ltar dgyes mi mdzad// log par lhung
369b4(skyes rabs): dang spyan 'dra dang // mgon med yul na gnas pa nyid// re re yang ni ri dgas dag/ mi 'gums pa yi rgyur rung ngo // mi rnams la ni mdzad pa bas// sdug bsngal lhag par brtags pa yi// dud 'gro rnams la ches lhag par// khyod kyis
369b5(skyes rabs): thugs rjes mdzad du gsol// khyod nyid srung ba'i don 'di la// bdag gis thal mo sbyar mi 'tshal// rgyud gzhan gsol bas gus bgyis par// legs par thugs tshod mang lags grang // tse nas bzung ste bslab sbyang ba// dam pa rnams kyi
369b6(skyes rabs): lugs su grags// de ltar lags pas rgyal po la// bu sdug bzhin du gsol ba logs// gal te bdag gis mi phan pa// gsol na bdag la chad pas khru ga// ci skye gcig tu phan gsol na// bdag gos bsol ba bzhin du mdzod// gal
370a1(skyes rabs): b+h+ya/ mi dgyes mdzad par ma gyur na// bdag gis yad dang yang du gsol bar 'tshal// ci ste bdag tshig khyad du 'gams mdzad na// bka' mchid 'di ni nges par gtang bar bgyi// dgyes par gyur na slar dgyes mi 'gums te/
370a2(skyes rabs): mi dgyes gyur na dog sa gzung bar 'tshal// gnod bgyid nyi ma ltar rdo mi thogs pas// sa bdag zla ba zla ba bzhin du mdzod// sa bdag tshar ma'i shing la sbrang rtsi ltar// dgra bo las kyang legs par smras pa gzung // gser gyi ri las dug rgyun ji
370a3(skyes rabs): bzhin du// yid 'ong skye bo'i tshig ngan spang 'tshal lo// mi mchog gal te legs par mdzad pa'i sbyor bas bsgrubs gyur te// pha rol gnod pa sel ba'i dpal 'di yon tan rgyan rnams kyis// phyug par bgyis na legs spyad brgyal chags
370a4(skyes rabs): phyir g.yo ba'i snying // mi brtan pa yang rang dbang med par yun ring khyod la chags// slob dpon mA tri tsi tras rgyal po chen po ka ni ka la springs pa'i 'phrin yig rdzogs so//
370a5(skyes rabs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+hA dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ a tsar+ya dpal rtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
371b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ tsit+tA radA na bi sho d+ha na kra ma nA ma le kha/ bod skad du/ sems rin po che rnam par sbyang ba'i rim pa bzhes bya ba'i snying yig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
371b2(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal lo// sa gsum dbang phyug skye dgu chos kyis skyong mdzad pa// lha mi'i bla ma 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi yab// rgol ba tshar gcod rang gi 'khor gyi dga' bskyed pa// chos kyi rgyal po gcig pu de ni rgyal gyur
371b3(skyes rabs): cig/ blo zhan bdag 'dras gzhan la bskul bar mi nus shing // bskul bas phan par 'gyur ba'ang deng srang nyung mod kyi// 'on kyang sa yi bdag po khyod kyis nongs pa yal bor no// 'gro mang de 'drar 'gyur 'di ma bzod khyod la
371b4(skyes rabs): bskul// mi skyong khyod kyi dbang phyug 'di ni sngon chad nyid kyi thugs// gdul dka' legs par btul las bsnyes kyi gzhan gyis byin pa dang // sa yi rum nas 'then dang gnam babs lta zhig ga la lags// sa bdag dpal 'di ma
371b5(skyes rabs): nyams bzhed na dA dung thugs thul 'tshal// gang zhig phan na de ni brtags te dka' yang mdzad rigs la// gang zhig mi phan de ni bsgrub par sla yang btang ba'i rigs// de phyir sngon tshe thub chen rgyal bu zla bar gyur pa yis//
371b6(skyes rabs): rgyal po su ta sa'i bu la gdams pa smras pa yang // rgyal po gcig pos g.yul ngor dmigs gi dpung wa rgyalasems tsam tshar gcad phyir ni sngar mA mdzad cig/ ma yi bdag po 'jig rten phyi ma'ang gzigs pa'i
372a1(skyes rabs): rigs// de bas dgyes kyang phan pa ma yin bstan mi rigs zhes so// de phyir gang gis dman pa'i rigs su ltung byed pa// nga rgyal dgra spangs bdag gi tshig 'di sad phyir yang // mi bdag khyod kyis gus
372a2(skyes rabs): pas gsan rigs te// legs smras byis las blang zhes thub chen gsal bar gsungs// sa bdag tsher ma'i shing las sbrang rtsi bzhin// dgra bo las kyang legs smras gzung bar bya// gser gyi ri las dug gi chu rgyan bzhin//
372a3(skyes rabs): yid 'ong skye bo'i tshig ngan spang 'tshal lo zhes so// gang zhig ma btul mnar med sogs// sdug bsngal bzod dka' skye byed cing // de nyid btul bas lha mi dang // 'jig rten min pa'i bde ba'ang 'thob// rab tu mthu ldan sems
372a4(skyes rabs): 'di ni// mkhas pa su zhig 'dul mi byed// 'dir sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal brtag tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin mod kyi// lus dang ngagra bran lta bu dang bcas pa glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa dang nye de'i nyon mongs
372a5(skyes rabs): pa dag gis dkrugs pa ste// de'i phyir 'di dag rnam par sbyangs te nor bu chu shel gyi 'od ltar rab tu 'od gsul ba'i rang bzhin dkrugs ma dang bral ba bskyed de// 'di tsam ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de la 'dir
372a6(skyes rabs): bsdus na sems te dkrugs pas rtog pa can du byed cing // lus dang ngag bran ltar 'khor ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ thams cad kyi rgyu rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shas che ba'o//
372b1(skyes rabs): de la gang rnam par rtog pa myang ba des ni rlung gi ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pas de spang bar bya ste/ bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang / rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang // yongs dag rnam pa drug du 'dod// de ni bgrang ba dang / rjesu 'gro ba
372b2(skyes rabs): dradrung / 'jog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / sbyor ba dang / yong su dag pa ste rgyu drug dang ldan na yong su rdzogs pa yin no// de la bgrang ba zhes bya ba ni dbug ces thub pa dang dbugs 'byung bya dag la sems gtad nas mngon par 'du byu
372b3(skyes rabs): med par lus dang sems rnal du bzhagasku dran pa tsam gyis gcig dang gnyis nas bcu'i bar du bgrang bar byed ba'o// sems mngon par bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yeng par dogs pas ha cang mang ba dang nyung ngur ni mi yon
372b4(skyes rabs): node la skyon ni gsum yod de// gal te gcig la gnyis su bcis na lhag par bgrangs pa'i skyon no// gal te gnyis la gcig tu 'dzin nam tshang bar bgrangs pa'i sgron no// gal ti gas rngub pa lta dbug sa 'byin par 'dzin
372b5(skyes rabs): tam dbu gros 'byin pa la rngub par 'dzin na 'chol bar 'dzin par skyon no// de las gzhan pa ni yang dag par bgrang ba yin no// bar skabasu sems rnam pa g.yeng na// yang mgo nas ji srid du ting 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du bgrang
372b6(skyes rabs): bar bya'o// rjesu 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'di dag ji srid gcig tu 'byung ngam 'jug/ ci 'di dag lus thams cad la khyab pa dag gcig gam phyogs 'ga' zhig nas rgyu ba dag yin zhes mngon par 'du bya ba med par dbugs rngub
373a1(skyes rabs): ba dang dbugs 'byung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ste// de 'jug pa na lkog ma dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa dang brla dang / byin par 'jug pa'i rim gyis rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du rje su 'gro la/ 'byung ba na
373a2(skyes rabs): mtho gang dang 'dom gang gi bar du 'byung ngo // gzhan dag na re rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'thor byed kyi rlung gi bar du'o// zhes zer te/ 'di ni de kho na yid la byed pa'i phyir rig pa ma yin no// 'jug pa zhes bya ba nor bu'i
373a3(skyes rabs): thag pa bzhin du sna'i rtse mo nas rkang po'i mthe bo'i bcu gnas par lta zhing ci ba'i dag phan 'dogs par byed pa zhig gam// gnod pa byed pa zhig gam// grang ngamo dro ba zhig ces rtog pa'o// nye bar rtog pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag
373a4(skyes rabs): gi rlung 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag dang 'byung ba dag las mngon par grub pa'i rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang // de dag la brten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang yod do// zhes phung po
373a5(skyes rabs): lnga nyi bar rtog pa'o// sgyur ba zhes bya ba ni rlung la dmigs pa'i blo bsgyur te chos kyi mchog gi bar du blo gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba'o// yong su dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa la
373a6(skyes rabs): 'jug pa'o// gzhan da ga na re sgyur ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi bar yin la// rnam par dag pa ni zad pa shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhes zer ro// 'di lta bu ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi zhal snga nas
373b1(skyes rabs): ji ltar bris pa kho bos 'dir yang bris par shes par bya'o// de ltar rim pa drug po de dag gis las ni ji skad du 'phags pa sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa'i mdo las gsungs pa bzhin te// de las ni ji ltar dran pa'i dbang gis yang
373b2(skyes rabs): drag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ce na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bgrang ba dang / rjes su 'gro ba dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / 'jug pa dang / yongs su dag pa la rtog go/ de la bgrang bas
373b3(skyes rabs): ni bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te// rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa thul pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa'o// rje su 'gro bas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos
373b4(skyes rabs): po rnam gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ yang dag par 'byung ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dang bral ba dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bo'i 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba'o// zhi gnas kyis ni bya ba'i
373b5(skyes rabs): las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'bri bar mngon du ston pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o// lhag mthong gis kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par
373b6(skyes rabs): 'gyur te/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos so so bar rtogs pa la gnas pa'o// 'jug pas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur to// nye bar len
374a1(skyes rabs): pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / 'phags pa'i sar 'jug pa la sbyor ba'o// yongasu dag pus kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba
374a2(skyes rabs): dang / lta ba yongasasu dag pa'o zhes so// de ltar dbugs thung ngu rngubs na yang dbugs thung ngu rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so snyam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcu drug kyang legs par rtog par 'gyur ro// /
374a3(skyes rabs): 'dir rnam par rtog pa med pa la bstan pa ni gtsor byas kyi yon tan ma lus pa 'di la brten pas na thar pa'i grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pa ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa yin te zhes gsungs so// ji ltar zhe na rab tu gdul dka'
374a4(skyes rabs): ba'i sems zhes brjod pa de ni rlung las gung du ma dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de bas na sems zhes bya ba de ni rlung du brjod do zhes gsung so// de ltar mi bdag khyod kyis rlung gi phywa dang zab mkhyen nas// yun ring dus nas rnam rtog dgra yis/
374a5(skyes rabs): rab tu gces pas shin tu yang // mnyel zhing skyo ba'i thugs ni dang nas ngal byasos rtog dgra bzlog pa dang // lo yis mA yAn gus par sbyor bas zhag gi rim pas rtog bral mdzod// de nas rim gyis yongasu dag pa'i mthar
374a6(skyes rabs): yang khyod kyi thugs gzhal na// sa bdag khyod kyis skye ba 'bras bcas de nas chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// de yi bar du lha mi'i bde ba tshad mod rnams la dgyes bzhin du// thugs btul mthu yis spyod par 'di la the tshom
374b1(skyes rabs): med par mngon sgyum gnas// m+b+ha par rtog pa'i gnyen po bshad zan te/ sems kyi rtog pa sbyang ba'i rim pa'o// me byung khyod kyi thugs ni gal te bud med kyis phyogs zla// 'du na sa yaM bdug po mthu rtsal rab tu dman pa
374b2(skyes rabs): ste/ gang gis g.yul chen 'jigs su rung ba gzhom pa'i thabs mkhyen na// mi gtsang kun snod mngon gyur bud mod mtshan nyid mi mkhyen 'di mtshar tshwa// shin tu yid 'ong tsher ma'i gnod pa'ang mi bzod lus 'di ni// bud
374b3(skyes rabs): med bstan pa'i rgyu las 'di dang slad ma mgo gcod sogs// rab tu bzod dka'i sdug bsngal 'byung 'di nyid kyi mngon sum na// 'on kyang bla ma bka' yis 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa mdor brjod bgyi// chags pa can
374b4(skyes rabs): rnams kyi gnyen po ni rus gong yid la bya ba yin te/ keng rus chags can thams cad le zhes bshad pas so// ji ltar zhe nA// rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du nI// spro zhing sdud pas las dang po// rkang rus dang ni thod phyed par//
374b5(skyes rabs): btang bas sbyang ba byas par bshad// smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas// yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin// zhes bshad pa'i rim pas so// gzhan yang byas pa rnams ni phal cher kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / reg pa
374b6(skyes rabs): 'jam pa dang / bsnyen bkur la chags te/ de dag gi bsnyen por ni rnam par bsngos pa dang / rnam par dmar ba dang / rnam par tshig pa dag yid la byed pas kha dog la chags pa dag sel to// rnam par rnag pa dang / rnam
375a1(skyes rabs): par zos pa dang / rnam par 'thor ba dag yid la byed pas ni dbyi bas la chags pas sel to// rnam par 'bus zhigs pa dang rus gong rgyus pas 'brel pa dag yid la byas pas ni reg bya
375a2(skyes rabs): 'jam pa la chags pa sel to// rnam par bam pa'i ro mi g.yo ba rgyal pa stong pa pus po lta bu/ rdo ltar bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral ba yid la byed pas ni rkang pa bkrub la sogs pa'i bsnyen bkur la chags pa sel
375a3(skyes rabs): bar byed do// gzhan yang rnam par phyi ste brjod na/ sngo bsangs la sogs pa'i kha dog la chags pa zhig na rnam par bsngos par yid la bya'o// tsan dan dang ga pur la sogs pa'i dris byugs pa'i lus la chags pa lta
375a4(skyes rabs): na rnam par rnags par yid la bya'o// mtshan spyad pa'i reg bya la chags pa zhig na rnam par 'bus zhig parwa yid la bya'o// dbyings phun sum tshogs pa lta na rnam par bam par yid la bya'o// rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i lus
375a5(skyes rabs): la chags pa zhig na rnam par dmar bar yid la bya'o// sha rgyas pa'i lus la chags pa zhig na rnam par zos par yid la bya'o// 'khyud pa dang 'o byas pa la sogs pa'i rtsed 'jo la chags pa'i dus na rnam par 'thor
375a6(skyes rabs): bar yid la bya'o// kha dag dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa la chags par gyur na rnam par tshig par yid la bya'o// sa rnams dkar ba li chags pa so zhi bar 'gyuraro// rab tu mi bzad nags bsreg mai lce'i tshigs// char
375b1(skyes rabs): rgyun drag pos skad nig zhi byed ltar// byismra pa'i nags tshal thal bar byed pa yi// 'dod chags me chen mi sdug char gyis 'joms// 'jig rten gnod pa'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa// kun gyis phul byung 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags
375b2(skyes rabs): te/ sa bdag 'di mkhyen 'dod las phyir ltos dang // rab tu dgyes pa byis pas ma myong ba// bsam gtan bde bas lus la phan 'dogs shing // kha na ma tho med pa myang ba'i rigs// 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i
375b3(skyes rabs): sems sbyang ba'i rim pa ste/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen po bshad zin to// lha mi'i bla mas gang du 'bad pas bkag/ de ni 'gro la byams dang snying rje med pa ste// de phyir mi dbang khyod kyis thub la gus pa dang // nyid kyi
375b4(skyes rabs): thugs kyang dam pa'i grangasu 'gyur pa'i phyir// gang la sku rtses gzung bya'i skye bo de la yang // nyid kyi sras bzhin gces shing byams pas bskyang ba'i rigs// bshes gnyen dam pa'i lung gis goms par byas pa las//
375b5(skyes rabs): srin po sha za seng+ge sogs kyang 'gro la byams// de phyir mI dbang khyod kyi thugs ni 'jam pa dang // 'gro ba bskyang las nam yang phyir ldog rlom mdzad cig/ legs pa'i lam ni ji snyed bstan pa dag las kyang // gtso
375b6(skyes rabs): bor gyur pa byams dang snying rjer dam pas gsungs// 'di ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/ dang por rang gi ma 'am pha 'am bu 'am bu mo 'am/ 'brel pa gnyis sam gang yang rung ba gcig la bde ba ma lus pa dang phrad
376a1(skyes rabs): par gyur cig snyam pa dang / byadag gis de dang phrad par bya'o/ zhes pa dang nus pa lta na dngos su de bsgrub pa dang / phrad pa la phrag dog mod pa nyi ma 'ga' zhig gus par bsgom mo// de nas ni de bas
376a2(skyes rabs): cung zad mi btsugs pa la'o// rim gyis par ma la'o// de nas dgra po dman pa la'o// de nas de ngar ma la'o// de nas de dgra po rab tu ma rungs pa le'o// de la mya la sogs pa dang mnyam pa thob pa na grong dang grong
376a3(skyes rabs): khyer pa la'o// de nas ni yul dang ljongs dang gling gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa nas stong spyi phud dang / stong gnyis bar ma dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
376a4(skyes rabs): go bye ma snyed la sogs par byams pas khyab par byas te/ de nas gzhung de bzhin du sdug bsngalo dang bral bar gyur cig ces pa dang / sdug bsngal dang bral ba lnga dga' ba dang / de dag 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam
376a5(skyes rabs): la dgod par bya'o// zhes po'i rim pas snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom mo// dang po nyid du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid can byams pa yid la ma byas par ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i snying rjegs
376a6(skyes rabs): la 'jug ste/ de ltar rim pa gzhan yang ngo // gnod par sems de'i yid tsam por bas kyang // 'khor los sgyur nyid thob par thub pas gsungs/ byams sogs goms las 'tshe med ma brnyes kyang / tshangs pa'i
376b1(skyes rabs): 'jig rten bde ba rgyu chen thod// de phyir ma khyed kyi ci spyod pas// tshangs pa'i gnas bani yis ni gnas par rigs// khyod kyis 'byor pa dug can zas bzhin du// bor nas gcig bu gzhan du gshegs 'tshal na//
376b2(skyes rabs): grogs bzang 'don med dge ba de bkri'i phyir// thugs ni rnam par sbyang bar cis mi mdzad// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems sbyang ba'i rim pa ste/ zhe sdang gi gnyen po bshad zin to// rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka
376b3(skyes rabs): las skye dang // rgyu med 'byung zhes smra ba gang lags pa// 'di dag log par smra ba phung khrol ba// legs par spyad kyang 'bras bu mi 'dod 'byin// de phyir khyod kyis rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// lha dran nges 'joms thub
376b4(skyes rabs): pa'i mon ngag mi cho ga/ bdud rtsi'i mchog 'di myur du gsol ba yis// dkar mchog ma lus rgyas shing brtan por mdzod// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta bu zha na/ 'di lta ste mi rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/
376b5(skyes rabs): 'du byed kyis rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ de'i rkyen gyis tshe reg pa/ de'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ de'i rkyen gyis srid pa/
376b6(skyes rabs): de'i rkyen gyis len pa/ de'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ de'i rkyen gyi skye ba/ de'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
377a1(skyes rabs): te de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'bra' zhig 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes/ shes rab kyi mig gis blta bar byas te rgyu med pa la sogs pa bsal lo// don 'di ni 'phags pa
377a2(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las/ gang du ma rig skye 'gyur ba// nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min// de yi rkyen nI 'du byed de// sdug bsngal ba ru du skye bar 'gyur zhes pa dang / gang gis sems can+da dag
377a3(skyes rabs): 'gyur ba// rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te// gzhan los rjesu mthun sgra dang // nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o// de bzhin rgyu ni zhi ga na s+ye te// lhag mthong yang ni rkyen yin no// zhes gsungs so// de ltar srid pa
377a4(skyes rabs): 'byung ba'i ri ma pA la yid ches par byas nas yang ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gegs pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la bya'o// de
377a5(skyes rabs): nas rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / 'pho bar ma yin pa dang / de dang 'dra ba'i rgyu 'jug pa dang / rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhes nges par gzung ste/ phyi rol yang snga bon las
377a6(skyes rabs): myu gu dang / de las 'dab ma dang / de las sdong bu dang / de las me tog dang / de las 'bras bu 'byung zhing / rgyu de dag dang rkyen dang 'brel par 'byung ba khams bzhi dang / na mkha' dus kyi khams
377b1(skyes rabs): te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag tsam mo zhes 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa la rgyu med pa dang / mi mthun pa'i rgyu spangs te/ 'di ni mdor bsdus nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la byas pas rig pa bskyed pa dang / ma rig pa'i ngo
377b2(skyes rabs): po 'am de las 'byung ba'i log par lta ba spang ba'o// gal te rgyas par yid la byed pa lta zhig na rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang / ming gi don dang / las tha dad pa dang / yan lag lngas yang dag par bsdus pa dang / yan lag gsum
377b3(skyes rabs): gyis yang dag par bsdus pa dang / gsum las gnyis 'byung ba dang / gnyis los bdun 'byung ba dang / bdun las gsum 'byung ba dang / dus gsum pa'i ngo bor bzhag pa dang / rkyen dang 'brel pa dag yid la bya'o// sa bdag rten
377b4(skyes rabs): cing 'brel 'byung mkhyen na snang bas mun pa bzhin// khyod kyi thugs la gnas pa'i gti mug go skabs ga la mchis// 'di mkhyen srid pa'i 'khor lo phra zhing zab pa gzigs pa'i phyir// shes rab ye shes spyan gnyis dri med lung gi
377b5(skyes rabs): sman byugs gzigs// ji skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung 'di rgyal ba yi// gsung gi mdzod kyi gces pa zab mo ste// gang gis 'di ni yang dag mthong ba des// sangs rgyas de nyid rig pa rnam
377b6(skyes rabs): mchog mthong zhes bstan to// gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems sbyang ba'i rim pa ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la byed pa bshad zin to// mi yi bdag po gal te phra ba'i thugs kyi go skabs su/ thog ma'i rtsom dus can sdig
378a1(skyes rabs): ba'i rtsa ba'i rtog dgra 'di/ zhen pa gnas snyam zhum pa'i rtog pa mi bzang zhugs gyur na// de yi gnyen por rten cing skyes pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gzigs// dri med me long ngos la skyes pa'i bzhin gyi
378a2(skyes rabs): gzugs brnyan gang // gal te yang dag gnas na rkyen la rag las mi 'gyur zhing // slar 'di rnam par 'jig 'gyur go skabs can du ga la 'gyur// de phyir dngos med rkyen la rag las gcig pu rnam par spangs// ji ltar gnas
378a3(skyes rabs): pa'i rang bzhin 'di yang legs par rnam dpyad na// rab tu phra rdul par du 'gyur zhes dam pas dang por gsungs// gal te dngos yod de dag shes rab cis mi 'bab// de phyir de yang phyogs cha'i bye brag dag gis ga la gnas// rin
378a4(skyes rabs): chen sems kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig sna tshogs snang zhe na// de bzhin 'di la'ang skad cig ces bya rab phra dam pas gsungs// skad cig skad cig ces bya'i gang dag phra la rnam par rmongs// de yang ji ltar thog ma dbus mtha'
378a5(skyes rabs): blta mi nus// de'i phyir rin po che yi phreng ba las/ skad cig ji ltar mtha' yod ltar// thog ma dang dbus de ltar brtag/ skad cig rang bzhin gsum gyi phyir// 'jig rten skad cig la mi gnas/ zhes bstan to// de ltar 'di dag phyi
378a6(skyes rabs): dang nang du bcas pa gcig min zhing // de nyid phyir na de yi rang bzhin rnam bsags du ma'ang min// 'di dag las dben dngos po shes rab mig gi 'ga' ma dmigs// des na 'di dag mtha' gnyis grol bar dam pas
378b1(skyes rabs): gsal bar gsungs// de bzhin gcig gis gcig nyid skyed pa mngon sum 'gal mthong ste// rab tu phra ba'i 'bras bu rgyu ni gcig min la bltos par// 'gro ba'i mngon sum nyid du ston pa bzhin du nges par gnas// de bzhin
378b2(skyes rabs): gcig gis gcig min bskyed sogs thams cad gnod par bcas// dngos rnams thug med ma lus slar skyed 'gyur 'di bzlog dka'i phyir// yod pa 'ga' zhig skye zhes 'di ni sus kyang sgra mi nus// gang med 'ga'
378b3(skyes rabs): zhig skye na med pa'i tha snyad su zhig 'jog/ de phyir bdag las skye sogs 'di dag mkhas pas rtsa nas bton// de ltar khyod kyis shes rang spyan gsal dri med rnam rgyan pas// rten cing 'brel 'byung mtshan nyid 'di la yun
378b4(skyes rabs): ring gzigs pa na// thog ming srid rgyud bsags pa'i bsnyengs gnas rab tu phra ba yang // gang na'ang gnas par 'gyur 'di gzigs minAM bdag gang gis zhum// de ltar ni 'phags pa mi pham pa'i zhal snga nas// 'di la
378b5(skyes rabs): bsal ba ci yang med// bsnan par bya ba cung zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// zhes gsungs shing / 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang / mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan
378b6(skyes rabs): 'das bya ba byas pa'ang de nyid yin/ zhes gsungs so// de nas gang la dga' ba'am// yang dag skrag nas 'di ci zhig/ bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs kyang gtan nAM de ni su yis nus// gang zhig rnam par gzhom zhes
379a1(skyes rabs): 'bad pa'ang blun te rnam par ngal// ci'i phyir zhe na gdod nas ma skyes de la su yis dgag/ de 'dra'i gnas med 'dir gnas ye shes can te rtag bde ldan// gang la rnam rtog med 'di bde zhes
379a2(skyes rabs): thub pas gsal bar gsungs// 'di spangs lha yul 'dod pa'i rab tu yid 'phrog byed pa dang // 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'byor pa'ang dam pas tsher ma'i gnod 'drar gsungs// sa bdug 'on kyang gnas 'dir shin tu dgyes par ma
379a3(skyes rabs): gyur cig/ ci phyir zhe na bdag gzhan phan pa mi bzod 'byor las khyod// rnam par ltung ba'i sgo mo mi mkhas rnams la 'di rab spangs// kha cig sgo 'dir rab dga' 'jug la snying brtse ring du spangs// gzhan dag gnas 'dir 'khrug
379a4(skyes rabs): phyir las 'bras thal ba bzhin du byed// gzhan dag shin tu med las sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas 'dod// 'di 'dra 'di dag sgo 'dir zhugs las rang gzhan de las nyams// de phyir 'di ni yan lag ldan par bags
379a5(skyes rabs): kyi bsten par bgyi// de ltar ni 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan// zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang / ming yang yod dang yod ma yin par tshig gis gsungs// rgyu las rten te byung ba'i chos ni 'di kun
379a6(skyes rabs): te/ 'di la bdag med tshor ba po dang byed mod kyang // dge dang mi dge'i las rnams cung zad med mi 'gyur zhes gsungs so// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid bsam gyis mi khyab par yid la bya'o// mi dbang
379b1(skyes rabs): yan lag bzhi po 'di tsam gyis// khyod kyi thugs kyi dri ma rags par rnams// nges par bsal 'gyur 'di la dgos ma mdzad// de las gong du khyad par rnam bzhed na// dkyil 'khor byug pa sngon du 'gro ba yis// skye ba gzhan
379b2(skyes rabs): du 'byor pa mi bzad pa// da lta'i bzhed pa nyid kyi phyag gnas ltar// slu ba med par bdag gis brjod par bgyi// oM badz+ra re kha hUM/ gtsang sbyong ba yi lci ba ni// chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar// thams cad de las byung ba dag/ snod
379b3(skyes rabs): gtsang bskol te chu rnams dgo// tshig ma dor te dbus kyi chas// dbyibs ci dga' ba'i maN+Dal ni// sa bdag khru gang yan chad ber// gsang sngags 'don la gzhol bar byug/ de nas de ni gus pa yis// rgyal ba sras gsu
379b4(skyes rabs): bcas la dbul// 'jug tu thub pas gsungs pa yis// tshigs bcad 'di dag brjod par bya// ba yi lci ba tshur bcas sbyin pa ste// legs par byugs par byed pa tshul khrims so// srin bu grog spur gsal ba bzod pa
379b5(skyes rabs): yin/ bya ba la ni nye zhugs brtson 'grus te// de yi skad cig sems ni gcig byed pa// bsdam gtan shes rab ro mo bsal ba'o// thub pa'i maN+Dal byas pa yis// pha rol phyin pa 'di drug 'thob// gser gyi
379b6(skyes rabs): mdog tu 'gyur ba ste// nad rnams kun dang bral bar 'gyur// zla ba ltar mdzes gsal ba yi// lha dang mi ni dmar par skye// nor dang gser ni 'byor pa yi// rgyal po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur// bde bar gshegs
380a1(skyes rabs): pa'i pho brang mchog/ maN+Dal gang zhig byed pa dang // sdig pa thams cad mi byed cing // dge ba phun sum tshogs pa dang // rang gi sems ni yongs 'dul ba// 'di dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis
380a2(skyes rabs): sngags/ zhes so// de nas dag pa de nyid rgyu mtshan du byas/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal zhing // dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// bdag ni khyed la rnam kun dbul// sdig pa thams cad bshags par
380a3(skyes rabs): bgyi// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // dam chos 'khor lho mchog bskor dang // yongasu mya ngan 'das spang phyir// bdag ni khyod la gsol ba 'debs// 'di sogs dge ba'i las rnams ni// byang chub bla na med par bsngo//
380a4(skyes rabs): 'gro ba sdug bsngal khur chen bor ba'i phyir// bdag gis sems ni byang chub phyir bskyed do// ma bsgral bsgral dang ma grol dgrol ba dang // dbugs ma phyin pa bdag gis dbugs dbyung ste// mya ngan ma 'das bdag
