487a6(skyes rabs): zad gnyid log nas rtsa chu la spyod// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi slob ma rnams kyang 'dod pa la yun ring po bsten par mi byed de/ cung zad bstan kyang des skyo bar byas nas dge ba spyong ngo do// de ltar skye dgu spyi la gdams
487b1(skyes rabs): nas/ slob ma l+ya bye brag tu 'doms pa ni shing chen po lta bur chos dgu dang ldan par gyis shig ces brjod pa ni/ khyod cigs ces tshigasu bcad pa gcig go/ dper nA shing chen po sdong po'i lta bu ni brtan pa'o// gal
487b2(skyes rabs): pa lta bu bzod pa'o// dul ba ni lo ma lta bu'o// zhi gan su nr-i me tog lta bu'o// shes rA ba ni yal ga lta bu'o// rgyu rab tu smin pA ni lho bran+da myu gu lta bu'o// smon lam ni rtse mo lta bu'o// tshul khrims ni grib ma lta bu'o//
487b3(skyes rabs): rang zhi ste mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'bras bu lta bu'o// mtsho chen po lta bur chos bcu gcig dang ldan par gyis zho sa brjod pa ni/ khyod cig ces tshigasu bcad pa gcig go/ dper na mtsho chen po yangs pa ltar
487b4(skyes rabs): shes rab rgya che ba dang / gsal ba ltar shes bya gsal ba dang / byin gyis gzhol ba ltar dge ba la gzhol ba dang / gting zab pa ltar chos zab mo rtogs pa dang / rab tu dang ba ltar dang pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa
487b5(skyes rabs): dang / rtag tu bsil ba ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba las bsil ba dang / sbrul gdug pa'i snying gi bag zhad med pa ltar dug gsum med pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa spangs pa ltar ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa spangs
487b6(skyes rabs): pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rab tu gtsang ba ltar tshul khrims kyis gtsang ba de nga / skem pa gcod pa ltar srid pa gcod pa dang / gru gzings 'degs pa'i khur bzod pa ltar gzhan don byed pa'i khur bzod
488a1(skyes rabs): pa'o// chur sprin chun po'i lta bur chos drug dang ldan par gyis shig ces brjod pa ni/ khyod cig ces tshigasu bcad pa gcig go// dper na char sprin chen po des me tog la sogs pa
488a2(skyes rabs): lA pha na 'dogs pa ltar skye bo mang po sdig pa las bzlog ste/ dge ba la bkod nas phan 'dogs pa dang / 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa lta bur 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa dam pa'i chos smra
488a3(skyes rabs): bya'i sgra chen sgrogus pa dang / char chen po 'bab pa ltar grags pa rgya chen pos khyab pa dang / char de rlung gi shugs drag pos bskyod pa ltar sems snying rje'i rlung gis bskyod pa drung / sa'i rdul ldang ba zhi ba ltar
488a4(skyes rabs): nyon mongs po'i rdul rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / grib mas sa steng brgyun pa ltar tshul khrims kyis sgo gsum brgyan po'o// de ltar gdams ngag brjod nas/ de las byung ba'i dge ba pa sto bye'i legs pa
488a5(skyes rabs): grub par bsngo ba ni/ bdag gis zhes tshig sme bcud pa gcig go/ bde gshegs spyod pa ni drang po sems bskyed pa nas tha ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar ro// rtag tu bde ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nang
488a6(skyes rabs): med pa'o// lo nges spyod bzang po ni log par 'tsho ba med pa'o// yid la re ba 'byor pa ni 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub pa'o// gzhan la phan par dga' ba ni/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las
488b1(skyes rabs): bsgral nas bde ba la 'god byar spro ba'o// kun mkhyen ni shes bya thams cad thugs su chud pa'o// bgrod par shog ces pa ni de thob par smon pa'o// nyes pa zhi bar bsngo ba ni dmyal ba zhes tshigs su bcad pa
488b2(skyes rabs): gcig go// dmyal ba'i ngam grogs dang g.yang sa lag mthil ltar mnyam mun nag snang gsal lus la me 'bar ba rab tu zhi ba dang / ro myags la sogs pa'i 'dam rjeb bsgoms nas drer 'khrungs shing skyes pa'i
488b3(skyes rabs): pad+ma'i lo mas khebs shing rtsa ba'i khye'u so then pa dang / ro myags kyi 'dam de gtsang zhing dri zhim gyur nas/ phyogs der pad+ma kha bye bas sa rnams rnam par brgyan pa dang / dmyal ba rnams bde ba rgyas shing bA sam
488b4(skyes rabs): pa bzang la rlung bser bu'i byad bcos chur zim 'bab pas tsha ba'i gdung ba zhi bar shog/ ston pa 'byung bar bsngo ba ni/ bdud dpung zhes tshig su bcud pa gcig go// sgrogs pa ni dam pa'i chos ston pa'o// lha'i chu ni
488b5(skyes rabs): mtshe'u dal gyis 'bab pa'o// rtse mo ni der lha dang lha mo rnams rtse bas nang phan tshun dga' ba byed pa pas kyang gdul bya rnams dga' byar mdzad pa'o// gdul bya de dag kyang gang zhe na/ lha dang mi 'dul ba zhes smos so//
488b6(skyes rabs): gang gi phyir gdul zhe na/ skye shi zhes rkang pa phyed do// gang gis 'dul zhe na/ sangs rgyas dag ces rkang pa phyed dang gnyis so// brnag pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni gdul bya rnams gang la mos pa'i skur ro// nam
489a1(skyes rabs): zhar zhes pa ni rtag tu'o// bstan pa rgyus par bsngo ba ni/ 'gro ba zhes rkang pa gcig go/ de'i 'gal rkyen med par bsngo ba ni// 'chi bdag ces rkang pa gcig go// mthun rkyen tshogs par
489a2(skyes rabs): bsngo ba ni 'phags pa'i zhes rkang pa gnyis so// 'phags pa'i skye bo ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams so// 'o na rang sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i skye bo ma yin namo zhe na/ yin
489a3(skyes rabs): mod kyi/ de ni lus kyi chos ston kyi ngagra gis mi ston pas gtamo tshogasna med do// gtom tshogs ni theg pa gsum mo// spel ba ni gong nas gong du rgyas pa'o// de l+ya phan yon ci yod ce na/ zhi ba'i bdud rtsi
489a4(skyes rabs): zhes so// zhi ba'i bdud rtsi'i char gyis bsil bas don byas shog/ zhi ba'i bdud rtsi'i zla ba'i snang ba rab bzang don byas shog/ ces tshig rnam par sbyar ro// bdag gi slob ma'i spring yig 'di/ rtogs shing cung
489a5(skyes rabs): za bshad pa lus/ dge ba dri med gang thob des/ 'gro kun rnam par grol bar shog/ skyob ma la springs pa'i 'grol pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros kyis rang gi slob ma rnams
489a6(skyes rabs): la phan pa'i don du mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan dra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
489b1(skyes rabs): 'phags pa 'dzum dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bod kyi spur rgyal mgo nag yongs kyi rje// khri srong lde btsun+da ag tshom mes kyi sras// rlung nam 'phrul gyi rgyal po'i dpon po yis// slong btson zlum po spyan
489b2(skyes rabs): rAs gzigs kyi sku// byang chub sems dpa'i sku rgyud gdung ma chad// 'gro drug nud na shes rig che ba'i mi// dug lnga sdong po rgyud drug kun gyi gzhi// khri rje thog btsan man chad rgyu ma yin// dge bcu tha
489b3(skyes rabs): khrims btsugs nas dul bar mdzad// rigs kyi sprul pa khri srong lde btsun+da gyis// 'gro ba'i mun pa'i skar khung dbye slad du/ rgya garaM yul gyi rdo rje gdan stengs su// sde snod gsum po shAkya thub pas
489b4(skyes rabs): gsungs// kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams smin// 'dzam bu'i gling gi snying po'i dbus su gyur// bsod nums che ba'i mkhas pa grangs kyi smin// de gsan thugs kyi rus pa bcas nas ni// bsod
489b5(skyes rabs): nums chung ba'i rgyalnga khams smin+da bya'i phyir// 'phags pa'i rigasA can ma lus kun btsal te// bai ro tsa na ska ba dpal brtsegs dang // klu yi rgyal mtshan ye shes snga dang ni// a ra a ro many+dzu la sogs la//
489b6(skyes rabs): nor gyi dam pa gser dngul dbyig bskor nas// rgya gar yul gyi dam chos lan du brdzangs// bod kyi mun ru ma nag po'i skar khung phye// srid kyi chab srid mnga' thang gung la reg/ bud d+ha gu h+ya bdag
490a1(skyes rabs): dngosde glo bA dga'// chab srid yo ba kun gyi gzhung srong zhing // sprul pa'i rgyun ma chad pa'i nang nA lnga// khri srong lde'u btsan mnga' bdag zhal snga nas// mi chos lha chos mnga' thung rtse ru
490a2(skyes rabs): chib// rin chen 'bar ba'i sku yi phung po lnga// rlung ma bris bad klan 'dus pa'i nad chen dang // stong phrag brgyad cu'i gegs kyis mA btsal bar// 'jam dpal deng ni mu ri ta la khums// yas kyi sa nas
490a3(skyes rabs): bdag 'dra spyan 'dren la// sku gnyer lags te bdag la dbang ma mchis// 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhal nas bod yul du// khyod kyi phyin na srog dung 'bral pa gsungs// bdag na dbang mad khri lan skyes lan
490a4(skyes rabs): du// man ngog yau ga a pa ta ra brdzangs// bang chen mi gnyis po yi rtsa dA lan du// mngon par byang chub pa yi tan+ta bshad// phyi nang gnyis kyi lag len meng po kun// gcig kyang ma lus dgos pa thams cad
490a5(skyes rabs): brdzangs// gzigs rtog mdzad la gzhan du shor ra re// bod kyi mi nI sprin la tshor sbyin te// mthong ba thams ca la 'ur byed par 'gyur// nyas dmigs cha med da mAM chos stong par byed// dmyal rgyu mang zhing
490a6(skyes rabs): 'bras bu brlag par mchi'o// phyi nang gnyis kyi lag lan sba bar mdzod// rtsed lo skyes lan gnyis kyi 'gro don mdzod// khri srong lnga btsan yas kyi yang dpon gyi// rakaM sha gnyis kyi bu gnyi sa phyogs
490b1(skyes rabs): rigs gcod/ bod kyi rgyal khams srid kyi mkhar bu yang // zhe dpon man chad srid mkhar zhig par mchi'o// zhabs 'degs nyung zhing dmangs mo chung mar len// mtha' yi kha bzhin kun tu grong slongs byed//
490b2(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i dbyar ni nus pa'i rtsa 'jo 'bul// du mangs mo tshul shing grong bzan slong bar mchi// yar 'gro mar 'gro mgron po mtha' dag dang // btsam pa 'jam yang rgyal khams mi bzhin du// ngo mtshar mi che zhes ni
490b3(skyes rabs): mi phyogs par// mgron po ji bzhin rgyu nyal byed par mchi'o// phyogs bzhir bsgyur ba'i mkhas pas bsgyur ba'i tshes// rgyal po smos shing yon tan brjod pa'i phyir// sde snod gsum po'i bka' brgyud ma lus pa//
490b4(skyes rabs): mnga' bdag phyir smos dpon sras drin du mchi'o// sku shugs chung la bka' rgyus rtso ma lus pa// lnga bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du bsgyur bar mdzod// drug cu na nI 'jig rten 'das nas ni// rgyal khams ga zhan du skye ba bzhes
490b5(skyes rabs): par mchi'o// 'gro ba rigs drug mthe dman gar skye ba// rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang che// rjes kyi shes pa shes pa'i nang na 'bul// sems kyi mtshan nyid shes pa phyug ces mchi'o// de'i phyir sems kyi
490b6(skyes rabs): mtshan nyid legs par rtogs// sems ni khang nang spre'u glog ste rigs drug rgya// mthon dman gang 'gro rang sems nyid dbang che// le lo ma mdzad rang sems ltas shes mchi'o// gros kyi gdams ngag man ngag
491a1(skyes rabs): bstan pa ni// rgyal po nyung na brin phyi ba gzhis bsnyungs// btsun mo gcig la dang du bzhes pa ni// 'phra myig g.yus sbru brgyun cing mdzes pa dang // gcig sems gcig la chags na /
491a2(skyes rabs): shA tsha mchi'o// sbyin po gdong dmar byed kyi rgyal khrim sa mi// dam tshigs nyams shing mna' la mi 'dzem la// shes pa rags shing khong na nung pa yis// sngar byas khyad du gsod par 'ong zhes mchi'o// yod che
491a3(skyes rabs): tsha // 'ad ni lu ba kyi 9/ shing bu d+hi la phyes mi skye ba 'khrungs// shing la gnod kyis 'chad pa shol tshig mchi'o// gtsug lag khang dong mchod rten khang bzangs rnams// sdig pa kun la gnod des lus nga
491a4(skyes rabs): yin// dum chos bsgyur ba zhu thug rtag tu mdzod// lan gcig dus su tshad mar byed par mchi'o// rgyal po'i rang bzhin gzhan dang sgra mi bya// zug thub gzebs la rab tu brtan par mdzod// thugs chen nang b+h+yon
491a5(skyes rabs): dpa' ba'i mi rnams sol// dgos don gces spras lhag par sros shes mchi'o// srid la gnod pa'i groswA da ni mi snyen por// khengs por mi bya zhi dul bsgyur zhing sgra// gcig dang bya dga' blon po rnams lA ni/
491a6(skyes rabs): tsang ma che ran tsam bya zhes mchi'o// blon po'i 'dod po chu bzhin mi zad pas// srid kyi mkhar ni 'jig pa'i nyen mchis te// srid kyi gal ba bab pa'i dus na ni// sras la mi phangs sdog la mi 'dzem mchi'o//
491b1(skyes rabs): g+hur bA m+b+hi thA spyan/ rlung ba skyed bya dang // phyung cu m+bu / khyud du khyum la rnal brjod// srad b+ha krI n+yA myang 'arjod cing zad mi shes// dkon marnyog gsum ni spyan lhung mdzod ces rgyana'o// theg pa kun la 'jug skur
491b2(skyes rabs): ku na gyi sgo nas 'bras bu thob mod kyi// gsang sngags rdo rje thug pa drang du bzhes// bkri ba'i don du kun la'ang spyad tshul bstan// rdo rje thug pa dang du zhes mchi'o// mtha' lto bal rigs shes pa yod pa la// yid
491b3(skyes rabs): tshe snga ma mdzad brang so bzhugs gnas rnams// kun tu mu spo phung bya'i gnyen mchis te// cal col ma mdzad tso ga bzhugs shes mchi'o// btsun mo rnams drang bud med gzhan dag la// 'dod chags rang bzhin
491b4(skyes rabs): phyi phyir 'dod pa'i phyir// thugs kyi khug la ha cang spyad mi bya// nga khyod bsro zhing mtho dman med par mchi'o// yid ches med par dgos don bsgrub mi bya// zas kyi sbyor sh+lomra zhim pos dgos mi bstan+da// zhesas
491b5(skyes rabs): phyogs pa'i 'phangs lha nye ring med// gzhan gyis mthong bor ma yin grang gzhan du// gnyen pos bdag kyang 'gro bar mi mchi'o// rgyal pos rang bzhin rgya mtsho yi lta bu// zha lag phyogs bzhir rgyas pas
491b6(skyes rabs): slor yang 'du// rgyal pos rang bzhin de bzhin yongs kyis bsgrubs// rgya mtshos kun spangs chos kyi 'gro drug spangs// zha lag phyogs bzhir don byed sku gdung rnyed// so so snang yang slar yang dus bzhin
492a1(skyes rabs): du// rlan gyis myu gu bskyed bzhin gros rgyu bskyud// chu yi 'bras bu bsgrub ltar dam chos bslab// rgya mtsho ma g.yos bzhin du g.yo bya// chu ni mnyen pa bzhin du khyod mnyen bya// rgya mtsho
492a2(skyes rabs): gting dpag dka' bzhin tshad mi bzung // chu chen bzlog thabs med bzhin srid la bya// rgya mtsho kun la khyab bzhin dang lag bskyed// chu 'thung ngoms pa bzhin du gzhan ngoms bya// rgya mtshos chu rnams sdud bzhin
492a3(skyes rabs): 'khor rnams bsdu// chur ni gzugs brnyan gsal bzhin gsal bar bya// rgya mtsho yon tan dzi ltar ldan pa bzhin// rgyal po gcig gi sku lu ldan gyur na// pu rgyal bod kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag rgyud// myugo
492a4(skyes rabs): nag yongs kyi rje ru bskos shes mchi'o// 'ol 'byung gdams ngag spyan sngar brdzangs pa 'di// mnga' bdag rgyal po'i mun pa'i skar khung mdzod// dus min rtag tu thugs la gdags par zhu/ blon po rnams
492a5(skyes rabs): la brdzangs pa// khong ngal smras pa btsan na blon po'i rab tu chud// bu srong khyi 'byin mi yis khrong brna yin// so nam brgya yis tshod na kun kyang drag par 'gyur// drang 'jam myig thag byed na srid mtha' yin//
492a6(skyes rabs): mkhas btsun bsngags pa khyad du mi gsod bu tsha'i gter// khong sdug kha 'jam byed pa'i blon po 'jigs// 'o byams ban+de 'khur ba'i blon po chos dang ldan// kun la snyoms par zas kyis bsten pa gzhan/
492b1(skyes rabs): ma byams// gdul zhing gtad pa thub pa'i mi ni grogs por bcoM la// 'phral du 'khros pa lan mi ljon pa dgrar mi bya// dgra thubs zab mo drag la byaslu pa rang la'o// nye dpung ma bshig gcig tu bsdus nA dgra yang
492b2(skyes rabs): 'jigs// blo gtad mi la bu bzhin brtan par byed pa'i mi ni ring po yin// kha tshags dam la zas sgo yangs nas yul mi rtsi// phur mi'i mi la spyi ched dang du blangs na smras pa nyan// yon tan can gyi mi la bkur
492b3(skyes rabs): bsti byas na bsod nams che// shes rab can gyi mi la bslab sbyang byas na mkhas par 'gyur// dga' ba'i mi la gtsam par phab nas smras na khong blo gtod// chung me ji ltar mdzangs kyang gros blo gting mi
492b4(skyes rabs): gtad/ skyes bu kun tu grags pa tha shal tshe na nyams// ci la'ang tshod zin sgrin khar myi 'dor rang lugs byed pa bzang // sngar byas 'gyod pa med par shes pa mi ya blon po yin// dgra thabs mkhas la ral ka
492b5(skyes rabs): byed pa blon po dpa' bo yin// khwa 'jam che la khong brna chung ba'i mi la blo mi gtad// skyon thos rna la gzon lo g.yos pa med na gaudeng po che// pha ma dkon mchog phud du 'khur na rang gi ltang// ngan pa rnams la
492b6(skyes rabs): zho sas phyogs na dman pa'i bzhi// dgra la sran du 'dzugs na phyis dgra 'jigs// khong parna chung ba'i mi la gnyer mi gtad// chung ma mdog sdug pho dad che ba blang mi bya// sgye'u srid gud du byed pa'i chung ma gshin
493a1(skyes rabs): pa'i rtags// drug 'jam khong yangs smras pa btsun tI zhi na mdzangs// dpya' zhing phyogs che blo gtang thub pa po zhes bya// tshig mkhas dgra la gnag nA gnyen gyi rag 'jigs che// ma
493a2(skyes rabs): don byed pa rang don bzhin du 'bad na g.yo sgyu rlung // rang dron bzhag nas mi don byed pa ngo mi rtag/ ngo dga' sgro zhing kha Ta ma do mI D+hag na khyo ga'i mi// 'jam la gos gal gcod zhi btsun na gros zla bya// dpa' la
493a3(skyes rabs): gad rlung leg pa gcong pas lam gro gas bya// nye ring gang du 'gro yang grogs dang 'grogs// skye rlung khri tshogs dam pa'i lta khor ni sgyid// pha khru bzang po'i bu ching nu pa pos tshig rje// 'phral du khyod gyong nga ro
493a4(skyes rabs): che ba'i myi drang 'grogs pa byung // pa tshan bzang po'i gsab du skyes pa'i ngan pa rang mthong che// khyu dman khyim tshes kun la sdang ba'i mi ni gling // mna' ma rnams dang mkhon par byed pa'i bA sha l+le thag yin// dran
493a5(skyes rabs): las bu phos byas na gros raM 'khrug pa re// phar dun bu ru ngan ni gros 'jug 'thab mos byed// sngon du dpa' byo thod rgyal byas na skyes bur 'gyur te dgra yang rtsi// mi btsan rdzun du spros pa'i tshig mi btsun// sgra mnyan
493a6(skyes rabs): pa'i ngag tu spro ba blun po yin// rang shes chung ba yon tan can la smod pa ngan pa yin// pha mes yon tan smos shing rang bu ngan pa la nyes yin// khong gyong gnyen la sdang ba bu lon byol song yin// byis pa
493b1(skyes rabs): myo pa rang mtho du che ba glon pa yin// bcol ba med pa'i lus la 'jug pa smyon pa yin// za ngor 'khrug dran byed pa phung ba yin// bsgom chen rnams la brdungs pa// tshul 'chos mi bya shes pa'i sa mi bzung
493b2(skyes rabs): sde snod gsum po kun la lta rtog bya// bltas pa'i tshig la mi rtag don la da byed// lung la mkhas pa'i slob dpon rnams la dang 'grogs// sgom tshun yin zhes phug tu yong mi 'dug/ yid ches med par
493b3(skyes rabs): per bsgom par tshul mi btsos// tho tshum bcad cing mkhas pa'i zhal yang blto// the tshomachod cing rgyo la snang ba dang // sgom pa'i grol sgrib chod cing dron shes shing // ru sbrul kho gro re nang na 'dug pa dang // rgya
493b4(skyes rabs): bskum 'dug 'gro gzhun gyis mo mthong ltar// 'khor gyis sleb ser ma yin dben par 'dug/ snying po don las nyin mtshan 'byung mI bya// chung ma gshin yang bsgom g.yog bya ba min// 'dra long de dran par 'khor
493b5(skyes rabs): du ts+tshin mi rung // rang sems dbang du btsugs la yengs mi bya// g+ha yang dang bying myigs yong zhig yod gyur na// tshul 'tsho sgyu mi b+h+yo bla ma rnams la dri// thams cad mAn+tam blo'i snying por gyur pa'i rtags/
493b6(skyes rabs): gcig la'ang chags thogs mi mnga' mnyam par 'gyur// de 'dra'i bsgom tshon sangs rgyas rnams dang mtshungs// dus min rtog tu sems la gdams ngag 'di// bsgom tshan rnams kyi sems la shar
494a1(skyes rabs): bar smon da spyi'i ban+de rnams la brdzangs pa// mi dge bcu spangs dge ba bcu las nI// lus drug yid gsum dus bzhir g.yo mi bya// dam chos zab mo'i phyir ni srog gi bor// mkhas su re zhes shes
494a2(skyes rabs): pa'i sa mi bzung // bdag gis shes kyang the tshom gzhan la dri// chos kyi sred pa sa gsum sems pa bzhin// ngoms par mi bya shes rab gsum gyis bslab// nges par rang lo med par gzhan mi bslab// bsrung ba rnam pa
494a3(skyes rabs): zhing tshigs bzhin du bsrung // rdo rje slob dpon yi dam lha ltar bkur// man ngagra zab mo myig gi 'bras ltar gces// theg pa kun la mkhas kyang gsang theg la// gzhan shes de la ma 'byor ban+de ni// theg gzhan shes
494a4(skyes rabs): kyang gsang theg ma 'byor na// gser 'dod bod pa brnyed pa ji bzhin no// nyon mongs lnga po skye rgyud me chod par// btsun par skye rgyud gcod pa snying re rje// nyon mongs ma spongs btsun pa gnyis mi 'phrugs// sa bon rul pa'i
494a5(skyes rabs): 'bras bu ji bzhin no// nyon mongs lnga po dug sdod ma bsgyel bar// skur nas lha phyag 'tshal ba snying re rje// dug sdong ma skyel ze bsrungs gnyis mi 'phrugs// skyer tshe dar gyis phur ba ji bzhin no// nyon mongs lnga po dbyingasu
494a6(skyes rabs): ma bskor bar// mchod rten bskor ba byed pa snying re rje// chos dbyings ma mthong bskor ba gnyis mi 'phrugs// mar 'dod lho khangab kyis bskor ji bzhin no// nyon mongs lnga po rnam par me dag par// gdong bkrus lag po bsnyal
494b1(skyes rabs): ba snying re rje// rnam par ma dag 'khu ba gnyis mi 'khrugs// pre ku nas kyi bcad pa ji bzhin no// nyon mongs lnga po zhi bar ma byas par// chos nyid zhi bar lta ba snying re rje// zhi bar ma byas lta bu gnyis mi 'phrugs// char
494b2(skyes rabs): mya gnam sdong ljang bu ji bzhin no// nyon mongs lnga po mgo bro ma bregs par// mgo zlum dpung zlum byed pab+h+ri ren+d+he// nyon mong so ma bregs m+b+ha god+hamA g+hanyis mi 'byugs// anA nA ga nang no ban+d+has tsholu ji bzhin no// nyon mongs
494b3(skyes rabs): po dul bar mi byas par// pha rol dag dpud 'joms pa snying re rje// dul bar ma byas dgra bcom gnyis mi 'phrugs// ri gzar rbab shor 'dzin pa ji bzhin no// chos nyid zab mo lte bas klong du bya// spyod pas 'gro don bsdam
494b4(skyes rabs): gtan rgyun mi gcang // ye shes ral gris skye rgyud bcad par rigs// nyon mongs lnga po ldang ba gnas su bstim// yang ldang yang ldang byed na chos nyid bsdam// mnyam pa'i don bsam pa'i gton la gzhugs/ rang dbang med par
494b5(skyes rabs): gzhan dbang bskur mi bya// dus gsum chos kyi mtshan nyid blo la bzhag/ gsang sdigs zab mo grong yul mi la ni// bstan par mi bye Ta dril yongs mi rung // yas ra mas lug mkhas shes bsad mi bya// pho mo mang po'i
494b6(skyes rabs): nang du bsgrub pa byed pa khril// zas nor gsang sngags zab mo yon du 'tshong ba spyos// gsang sngags bsam gtan yi dam nyid du nyo tshong ngo byed pa med// ban+de'i rang bzhin grong gi dbus mi 'dug/ tshong la mi bza' sdig pa'i rmang
495a1(skyes rabs): gnyir 'gro// pho bla mi bya chung ma'i dad kyang bskyung // be'u mang mo mi bsrel sdig pa'i rgyu// nyin mtshan med par 'gro don byed 'dod pas// rang sems dag na 'dod pa'i don la 'grub// mi nag skye bo
495a2(skyes rabs): mang po'i 'gro don yang // tshod yod mi bya bsam gtan nyid du bya// 'di rnams ma nor shes pa ban+de yin// nyin re bzlas pa mi bcad skyi dub kyang mi bya// rtse cig dang du blangs pa bya ba yin// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin don
495a3(skyes rabs): la mkhas pa yin// tshig la mkhas po ne tse tshig zlos mkhas// rtse gcig yang dag bden pa'i rlung la sA ni// rang sems dpang du btsugs la nyams mi bya// nyin mtshan med par chos kyi don la ni// dus gsum 'du
495a4(skyes rabs): 'bral med par ting 'dzin bya// shes pa che yang mkhas pa'i sa mi bzung // rdo rje slob dpon yi dam lha bzhin du// khur zhing rtse gcig yA dam nyid du bya// de dang mi 'bral rtse gdung tshe mar 'grogs// bden pa ston pa'i
495a5(skyes rabs): rdo rje slob dpon ni// mig gi 'bras ltar bkur ba'i rlung bzhin la// gAyog 'khor ngan pa slob dpon spong byed pa// nyan byed myi de thun po spre'u zhes bya// 'di rnams bdag gis mdo tsam bAstan+da pA 'di// bod kyi rgyal khams
495a6(skyes rabs): ban+de'i sems la ni// gdams ngag 'di ni shar bar smon// slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas bod kyi rgyal po khri srong lnga btsan rje 'bangs dang khong btsun rnams la brdzangs pa'i spring yig go//
495b1(skyes rabs): dang byang sdos zugs/ sems can dmA pa'i chos la dad pa skyed par mdzad pa'i// dad pa bskyed mdzad bla ma dam pa dang // mos pas yon tan 'byung ba'i dkon mchog la// bdag nyid gus pas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhe
495b2(skyes rabs): sdang me yis rang gi rgyud bsregs shing // gti mug mun pos shes rab dmigs bu ljongaso// 'khor ba'i g.yang skur lhung bas sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad// 'khor ba'i brtson rar bzung zhing lcags bcug pa'i// ma
495b3(skyes rabs): 'ongs skye bo'i don du ba dag gis brtsam par bya// bdag gi rgyud la legs par tshur bltas pas// mi lus 'di ni shin tu thob par dkag/ gyang ngos sran ma gtor ba gcig chags srid// thams cad sa la lhung
495b4(skyes rabs): nas song ba ltar// mi lus thob dka' sems can grangs la ltos// rgya mtsho gcig gnas gnya' shing bug pa dang // rus sbal phrad bya bas kyang dud 'gro nas// mi nyid ches thob dka' bus mi dbang gis// dam chos
495b5(skyes rabs): spyad pas de 'bras mchis par mdzod// sbyin nor 'dra bye'i mi lus 'di thob tshe// 'di la phan pa'i thar pa ma bsgrubs par// phyis ni dal 'byor phun sum tshigs pa 'di// thob par dka' ba'i tshe 'di chung ma gsan// 'jig
495b6(skyes rabs): rton spyod pa dag la phar bltas pas// thor la mi mos sdig la dga' ba skyed// mtho la phrag dog mnyam la 'gran sems byed// dma' la nga rgyal bstod na dregs pa skyed// mi snyan brjod na khong nas 'khrug
496a1(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// rang don thar pa rgyabA tu bor byas nas// 'khrul dron bu dang nor la bdag tu 'dzin// sgrub pa'i chos bzhag gyur pa'i lam sna bor// sdug pa'i mi chos glen pa'i bu nor gsogs/
496a2(skyes rabs): ji tsam sdig la bsngos nas nor bsags kyang // sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdug nyid 'khyer// bsags pa'i nor ni khro bdag bu tsha khyer// ro dadu mtshungs kyang bdag nyid bzang por 'dzin// 'khor ba'i brtson
496a3(skyes rabs): rar chud kyang 'bros bsam med// phyi na rten med zas nor bu la chags// dad ldan pa mra'i gdung sems rtsad nas bral// bdag ni stobs bzang gzhan ni dregs pa 'joms// gzhan gyi nor dang rdzas la chags pa skye// ma
496a4(skyes rabs): bcol gzhan la gnod pa'i kha grotigs zer// nyan bshad dus nas bsam pa log su spong // dkon mchog mthong na skyon med gshe tshig smra// sems can mthong na zhe sdang gsod sems skye// 'di la sgyid na phyi
496a5(skyes rabs): ma sdug mod zer// de dang ldan pa'i sems can b+h+yo bo de// mi luste chung gsan a tsa spring r-i rje// gling mchog bzhin 'dzum gling 'dir skye dkul/ 'di na sems can grangs med gnas pa lnga// mi lus 'od ni shin
496a6(skyes rabs): tuthob dka' na// 'on long zhi bor gyur kyang chos spyad dka'// sgro sgyur med pa'i lus thob gzhon pa'i tshe// dam chos mi spyang mi lus chung res na// gang zhig gser snong rin chen spras pa yis// ngan skyugs 'phya/
496b1(skyes rabs): bar byed pa de bas kyang // gang zhig mi ru skyes nas sdig pa dag/ byed pa de dag rab tu blun pa ljags// na dang rga dung 'chi ba'i dus byung na// mi lus chud san 'gyod kyang phan pa med// dper na zon med dgra phyogs
496b2(skyes rabs): phyin po'i tshe// dgra yi zin nas gyod pa'i 'bros sems bskyed// skyes kyang phan med bdag gis myi thar na// de 'dra de bas chos la 'bad par rigs// phyis 'dzugs dogs nas sngon du mkhar dpe brtsog
496b3(skyes rabs): phyi ma dran song 'jigs nas sngan du spyad// lho dus su ni dar tsog mi sdod na// nam la yod de tshe la long med do// l-I zla 'das shing 'chi dang phar phar nye// rong gi tshe ni glang kha'i shing bu 'dra// 'chi bdag bdud ni
496b4(skyes rabs): gong rtsa'i chu bo 'dra// skye rgas na 'chi reng 'thag re mos 'dra// mi rtag 'gyur ba dbyar dgun ston dpyid 'dra// snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang // rtag tu re zhing bu dang nor bsags kyang // bu nor phyir lus
496b5(skyes rabs): bdag lnga phan pa med// rang nyid dge sdig gnyis dang sprugs nas 'gro// nor dang rdzas ni shing kha'i bye chung 'dre// mi rtag nges kyis chags sems gnyen pos chod// sgyid sdug mi rtag kha sang di ring 'dra// chos
496b6(skyes rabs): la 'gro tshe gnyen 'dun pa ma tshogs// yon tan brjod cing mi chos bya dgos zer// nor gyis brid cing de yi bar du gcod// dug bum thogs nas steng du 'ong dang mtshungs// bdag la bya snyam gnyen 'dun smra
497a1(skyes rabs): ba nyan / bde ba bkag nas g.yang sar stong dang mtshungs// 'khor ba'i bu che dug gi me tog 'dra// mthong na dga' ste ngan song rgyu sogs yin// bdag nyid 'chi bdag bdud kyis bslus pa'i
497a2(skyes rabs): tshe/ mal gyi tha mar nyal nas lus gdungs tAM// zas kyi tha ma skyug kyang dUr rgyags bstod// pha ma gnyen 'dun rnams kyis mtha' bkor te// de tshe rang la ci yis phran soms dang // shags kyis ma lo dpa'
497a3(skyes rabs): pos 'thab du myed// mkhar gyis mi thub nor gyis bslu ru med// gnyen gyis mi phan sngar ma 'bros su med// zug zer che yang gnyen 'dun bskor mi btub// gson tshe byams kyang shi nas 'jigs nas 'bros//
497a4(skyes rabs): yul mkhar khor nas rang shong gcig trUM stu lu// gan+d+heni 'dun bor nas bdag rung gcig pu 'khyam// bdug lha byams kyang phyi nAs myong ba med// de 'dra gnyen rnang gos kyi rdul bzhin sbyongs// byung sems myu guste rlud
497a5(skyes rabs): nus ma bsregs par// byang chub mchog gi sems de rtag tu zung // byang chub sems bskyed gyur na skad cig giso// 'khor po'i btson ra ru bsdams pa'i nyam thag rnams// bde gshegs sras su dgongs te byin gyis
497a6(skyes rabs): rlob/ sems can mi 'do gsal bar 'dod pa dang // 'khor bar gnas dang bral ba 'dod pa rnams// byang chub mchog gi sems 'di rtag tu bskyed// 'phags pa'i gdams ngag don chen 'di lags te//
497b1(skyes rabs): khyod kyis thugs thub mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis// byang sems chos kyi rtsa ba lags par gsungs// khengs grags dge ba bsod nums 'bras bu bzhin// bden par spyad kyang zad par 'gyur ba yin// sems
497b2(skyes rabs): bskyed pa'i yon tAnra rtag par yang // 'bras bu 'byin cong mi zad 'phel ba yin// sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yod kyang // sems bskyed cem gyis de dag zhi nus na// de la bag can rnams kyis cis mi stan//
497b3(skyes rabs): des ni dus mthu'i me bzhin sdig chen rnams// skad cig gcig gis de dag bskyeg par nus// de phyir bdag gis sems bskyed g.yo ba dong // smon dang 'jug pa gnyis kyis sems bskyed de// myi ldog tse gcig
497b4(skyes rabs): pa yi dad pa yis// byang chub sems de rtag par gzung bar bya// de nus le l-i gnyid kyi dbang song bas// sems bskyed brjod kyang bsod nams shugs lngas 'phel// rgyun mi 'chung ba'i chu bo'i gzhung dang
497b5(skyes rabs): mtshungs/ nam yang 'byung ste yon tan brjod mi ltung // sems bskyed dad pas dam chos sgor zhugs pa'i// skyes bu dam pas man ngag 'dri ltar zung // mi khom gnas su skyes na chos spyad dka'// ring la
497b6(skyes rabs): dbang yod bzhin du dbang me de zer// bdud kyis mngon bslus rang nyid 'phung bar 'gyur// thar pa bdag la rag las 'di la ni// gzhan gyis ci yang grogs bgyir ma mchis kyis// mi lus thob tshe ngal
498a1(skyes rabs): gyis spyad par rigs// bde sdug zin pa med kyis dam chos spyod// 'ag rten longs spyod su za cha med kyis// sngon na sdod kyis so nA mra 'bad par rigs// gal te mi lus thob nas gzhon pa
498a2(skyes rabs): tshe/ 'jig rten dga' ba'i ca cos/ sa bor la// gzhon pa'i tshe ni dam chos dang du le// tsha snying sdug 'khor po'i brtad phur yin// bu che bden par 'dzin pa'i rmongs pa 'ga'// lus la shig za byar mig gis byas// sor
498a3(skyes rabs): mo'i rgyu ba bkye nas gshed mas bsang // rnam smin gdong nu sdod de phyi mar smin// ga pasnga myo 'i bu yis bdag mi phan// khyod kyis dge sbyong bram ze lha dang ni// mgron dang yab yum sras dang btsun mo dang // 'khor gyi
498a4(skyes rabs): slad du sdig pa mi bgyid de// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal skal 'dod 'ga' ma mchis// de phyir bu la ma chags chos la 'bod// gzhonu tshe dam pa'i chos la ma 'bad na// rgas nas nyan 'dod rna bas sgra mi thos// shes rab bying
498a5(skyes rabs): bAs blo la rtogs par dkra'// chos la 'gro 'dod lus la nus pa med// chos lnga dag po yang pa dag gis spyod mi nus// gzhon pa'i tshe na dam chos cis mi sbyang // dam pa'i chos la bden par ngo yis zung // 'jig rten bde
498a6(skyes rabs): sprin bzhin 'gyur ldog che// chos la spyod na phyug por mkhyen par mdzod// 'jig rten nor gyis phyug pas phung bar nges// sdig bcu spangs nas dge bcu dang len pa// 'dzangs pa lags te skyes bu phyi mar bde// mi 'khyags
498b1(skyes rabs): tsam du dag dug gon byas shing // mi ltogs tsam du zas ngan zos byas la// longs spyod bla med byang chub bsngo bar bya// nor rnams kun gyi nang na chog shes pa// rab mchog lags par lha'i mi'i ston pas gsungs kun tu
498b2(skyes rabs): chog shes mdzod cig chog shes nA// nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor pa lags// bdag ni khyod lnga byams pa'i zhal ta zer// bdagu la zas nor skyabs kyi re ba med// ngan song 'khor ba'i gnas dang bral phyir gdams//
498b3(skyes rabs): dka' ltar mi byed gti sug smad pa'i gnas// ga yang sar 'gro yang dogs zon bya dgos na// bskal pa'i gting lhung g.yang sa smos ci dgos// di ring song la 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhes// bde bar 'dug pa bdag gis ga la
498b4(skyes rabs): rigs 'chos spyod bde ba shi ba bde ba ste// zhing khams dag par 'gro zhing sdug bsngal med// chos med rgan rgon shi ba skyid ces sgra// shi sdug lags te ngan song gnas su 'gro// sgyi sdug gnyis kyi bye brag mkhyen par
498b5(skyes rabs): mdzod// chos dang ldan na dman yang bkur sti thob// chos kyi ngag byung mkhas pas bshad kyis nyon// 'jig rten nor dang ldan zhing dam chos rdzas kyi spyod// chos la ma thogs rdzas kyi mngon zhen gyis// longs spyod rnams ni
498b6(skyes rabs): skar mnga'i rang bzhin la// yongasu ma btang de dag nges par 'gyur// dgra dang chom kun dag dang rgyal pos 'joms// mi bsad stong du 'gro srid rkun pos rku yang srid// chos la btang ba'i brtson 'grus spyad par rigs// long
499a1(skyes rabs): spyod g.yo ba snying po med mkhyen nas// dge slong bram ze gnyen dang bshes rnams la// sbyin pa tshul bzhin stsal gyi pha rol tu// sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so// 'gron po yun
499a2(skyes rabs): rings rgyags su sbyin pa rma// rgyus rnams myur du thong cig dad pa can// byin rlabs 'dir 'byung phyi ma gdong na spyod// bde sgyid 'dod dang sdug bsngal spong 'dod dong // rigs mtho bzhin legs bde ba'i gnas thob dang // bde
499a3(skyes rabs): mthong mos shing sdug bsngal spong 'dod pas// dam chos 'di ni rtag tu spyod par bya// lha dang mi yau bde ba thob 'dod pas// dge bcu spyad de lus kha bsrung ba ni// 'dod 'gro/ g.yem dang srog gcod brku pa dang // brdzun drang phra
499a4(skyes rabs): mchog rtsub 'khyal pa dang // brnab sems gnod sems log phyar lto ba dang // rAng don lags kyis sdig bcu rgyab tu byor// rang la byams shing brtse bas 'bang par bya// lha rngon pa mi rgod rkun po rdeg pa sogs// sdig
499a5(skyes rabs): pa'i rkyen sogaso grogs po gdug pa spongs// kun tu dge ba'i slob dpon sman+da bzhin bstan// 'o na long zher skur lus thob rgud pa dang // dbul 'phongs bzhin ngan lus las nad yang rnams// rnam smin lcags kyis gzhan
499a6(skyes rabs): la yus ma che// mtho ris ngan song gnyis la gang mos pa// rang dbang yod kyis sgyid sdug khyad par nyon// gal te mtho ris thar pa mngon zhe na// yang dag lta ba goms pa dag tu mdzod// rnam rtog ri bos mnan pa'i
499b1(skyes rabs): sems can rnams// sdug bsngal 'di la bzod pa'i bdag med de// 'khor bas 'khor te zo rgyun khyud mo 'dra// rnam rtog rlung gis khyer te rtsi shing lo 'dab 'dra// rnam rtog rgyud la skyes twa rtswa la me mched 'dra// ye shes skad
499b2(skyes rabs): cig mi gnas dbyar khi'i shes mun 'dra// phyi yi sdug bsngal bzhi ni rang sems myong // yod nu mri thub med na brtsal mi rnyed// bya mos dang bral dogs sdung dang phrad kyi dgos// rnyong gi sdug bsngal bzhis ni rang lus 'jom
499b3(skyes rabs): mya lus 'byung tshe brog par btsir ba 'dra// ma yis mchongase tshe g.yang la phyin pa snyom// lhung tshe tsher ma'i dong du bsgyur bA ste mau// blangs ni bye chung khra yis khyer ba snyom// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rang lus rdul bzhin rlog
499b4(skyes rabs): lo zla 'das shing rgas pa shugs kyis 'ong // rgas tshe mgo la skra dkar sau yang med// rna bas mi thos mig gis rang mi mthong // 'dug ni rang lus sa rdo chad pa 'dra// langs na spang le phyur pa 'byin dang mtshungs//
499b5(skyes rabs): phyi rgod 'gro yang s+phu ru nas gog cing 'gro// zlas skom 'dod na gzhan la rag lngas slong // bu tshes mthong yang mi myos yid mi 'ong // dug po bskon zhing sgo rtsa srung du gtong // gzhan dag 'ong na ngo tsha phar zong zer// khyim tshe
499b6(skyes rabs): byis pa gshe zhing 'tshe ru 'ong // 'tshog ser phyin na skyug bro phar song zer// shi skal chad de rgan rgon yi dgas skye// ngo tsha khrel 'dzem shor de gzhan gyis skur// bu smad kun yang shi na rung zhes smras// rkang lag 'dar zhing kha
500a1(skyes rabs): mig chu yis khengs// lus kyi stobs shor bar ga grogs su tshol// legs par smras kyang gzhan gyi rnar mi snyan// bde bar nyal kyang lus tshigs khol cing na// gzhan la gtam smras rgas
500a2(skyes rabs): pa'i drag mi snyan// rgas pa'i sdug bsngal bshad na kun la 'ong // lus la nad med bde sdug rI ba rnams// nges pa 'dod pas nongs dang 'chi ba dang // na rgal sogs sdug bsngal du ma yis// 'byung gnas 'khor
500a3(skyes rabs): pab la ni skyo mdzod cig/ de yi nyes pa shes kyang mkhyen par mdzod// khams gsum 'khor ba'i lam la bde ba med// rigs drug sems can nad la grangs re mung // sdug lnga dug gsum nad kyi dpal ra che// thog
500a4(skyes rabs): mtha' med pa nad kyi yun re ring // de ltar lags te ma rigs bde ru re// 'chi bdag bdud kyi zhugs pas zin pa'i tshe// lus ngag yid gsum nad kyis thobs pa'i tshe// ngag gi sdug bsngal rnga mo bu stor 'dra// lhung
500a5(skyes rabs): ltalhang tser tser cis kyang nad kyi dbang // lus kyi sdug bsngal skam la nywa sgyur 'dra// rgal bu stong stong 'phar yang nyam stobs med// 'bros par bsams kyang thar pa'i dus mtha'i med// gzer gyis lus btab ngo
500a6(skyes rabs): tsha khrel 'joms shor// gnyen 'dun bskor yang sdug bsngal rang gi sa myong // zas skam kha ru bcug kyang bro brlag med// nye ba pos na kyang kha na skad mi thon// ji ltar nyal kyang bde ba'i bar skabs med//
500b1(skyes rabs): sdig la 'gyod pa skyes kyang bshugs long myed// na ba'i sdug bsngal lnga ste kun la 'ong // des na mi ni yang dag nyid du mi bde zhing // mi gtsang bdag med pa ru rig par bgyi// 'chi ba'i tshe na dge sdig las/
500b2(skyes rabs): kyis 'byed// dge bo can ni 'chi tshe bde ba mthong // mun pa'i khams nas bde ba byung ba dang // lus la chags pa med cing lus sems bral na dga'// bdu gshegs bskor ba byed cing chos bshad mthing // bde/
500b3(skyes rabs): ba'i zhing khams byung bas mos pa 'byung // gdugs dang rgyalnga mtshan mchod pa'i rdzas 'bul dang // 'gro drug gnas mthong snying rje'i sems 'byung ste// de dang ldan na bde ba'i gnas su skye// sdig can dag ni 'chi
500b4(skyes rabs): tshe nyes skyon mthong // snang ba'i khams ni mun pa'i rnam sros bzhin// mtho na spyi tshugs thur la song ba mthong // lag na 'dug pa gdug pa'i mtshon char mthong // sgra skad thams cad gdug rti gA s+thi ru thos// sdig pa/
500b5(skyes rabs): byas pa don song lam du ston// 'chi bdag gshin rjes rgyab nas phul nas zhing brdeg/ srog gcod bdud kyis gdong nas btson bzhin khrid // gcan zan gdug pa'i 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs// mtshon cha gdug pa'i
500b6(skyes rabs): dpal ni rtsang bzhin 'dzugs// 'khor ba'i g.yang ser ro gzar thab bzhin 'dril// yi dgas gnas na sdug bsngal dpag tu med// bkres skom grang dro ngal dang 'jigs pa yis// bskyed pa shin tu mi bzang bsten
501a1(skyes rabs): 'tshal lo// mgo lus skam par mi mthun rgya las byung // skom skyug bro zer sna yis rgyu las byung // sdug bsngal che ste lus la zad dus med// gal te tshe zad dmyal ba'i gnas 'gro
501a2(skyes rabs): ste/ skad cig yud kyis gnas der myur bar phyin// dmyal po 'i sdug bsngal rig na mchi ma 'ong // ba rtsong khu rgyal po 'phrang du bsdad nas ni// gson po pags pa bshus shing yan lag 'don// de ltar
501a3(skyes rabs): byas kyang rnam sman 'chir mi 'dod// bye ba phrag brgya nyams su myong yang ni// ji srid mi dge de zad ma gyur pa// de srong srog dang bral bur mi 'gyur ro// dmyal pa'i lcags khang mthong na dga' ste ma sems
501a4(skyes rabs): lasau kyi sgo phye nang du dbang med 'gro// l-is rlung phug nas sgo gcod mun pa 'thibs// phyogs mtshams kun nas mi 'byung 'bros sa med // ka rus tshig kyang 'chi ru las kyis 'tsho// rang nyid zangs su
501a5(skyes rabs): 'tshong cing shI ru sa bral// phur bzhi brgyangs shing steng 'og lcags kyis btab// lcag sngo gA Ter steng 'og lus+t+rai la gang bAr 'debs// gal te 'gul na lha tshigs rus pa 'bral// lcags kyi byA khwa mkha'
501a6(skyes rabs): la lding zhing 'debs// mtshon cha'i 'khor los lus la dum bur gcod// lcags kyi tho chen mkha' la lding zhing brdeg/ sog las spyi bo'i gtsug ni sa rkang thil gshig/ pu gri gtams pa'i ri la
501b1(skyes rabs): dbang med 'jog/ rnag khrag bA shul ba'i dri ma dpag tshad khyab// rang gi rang bsregs skye bo rang gis lan// mchod pa de ltar lags te lha mi dang // dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro rnams dag tu//
501b2(skyes rabs): skye ba bzang po ma lags skye ba ni// gnod pa du ma'i snod gyur lags mkhyen mdzod// de so na 'jig rten bde nus ci la phan// de phyir bdag gis byeshad pa'i mun ngag nyen// 'gro ba'i don mdzad b+h+ra ma
501b3(skyes rabs): dam pa yis// ma 'ongs sems can skye bo'i don dag tu// man ngago dang bskyed sgron ma 'di brtsams pas// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas thob par shog/ slob dpon ka ma la shA
501b4(skyes rabs): las mdzad pa dang skyed sgron ma rdzogs so// /
502a1(skyes rabs): depe'i phreng ba bzhugs/ mya ngan med pa'i sgonas gru brgyal ba'i le'u zhug so//
502b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ dr-iSh+TAn ta mA l+ya/ bod skad du/ dpe'i phreng ba/ 'dzum dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// drang por smra ba rnams kyi rab mchog ston pa dang // srid pa
502b2(skyes rabs): gsum gyi 'dod chags rnams 'joms tshod dang ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi'i snod gyur pa// gang zag mchog brgyad kyis brgyan dge 'dun rab brtul cing // bsam rdzogs rtsib lcogs 'tsher
502b3(skyes rabs): la sogs pa de dang de// thams cad yong sgra'i khyu mchog dad pas mchod byas te// dpe yi phreng ba 'di ni bdag gis bshad par bya// rab blo'i legs sbyar ma sbas 'di na de bstan gyis// yon tan dang skyon gyi mtshan
502b4(skyes rabs): nyid khong du chud pa las mchod par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba ma yin pa rtogs par 'gyur pas yon tan dang skyon gyi mched nyid khong du chud pa las rab tu 'bad par bya'o// de yang 'di ltar rje su thos te/ yul gan
502b5(skyes rabs): d+harA nas tshong pa kha cig bcom rlag tu stong pa dang / de de ni mchod rten rnams la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lci zhing dge sbyong rnam la yang bsnyen bkur dang bcas pos phyag byed par gyur pa dang / de la 'di ni dge
502b6(skyes rabs): bsnyen yin no snyam du shes nas bram ze rnams kyis bzhang gang byas par gyur to// zhes grag go/ de nas re zhig na de sos ka'i dus kyi phyi dro'i tshe bram ze zhig gi lam srong ni 'dug go/ der bram ze kha cig khrus
503a1(skyes rabs): byas shing dris byugs pa dang zas la spyad pas dbang po tshim pa drang khang pa sgo'i phyogs na lag na rnga lngab thogs shing mchod phyir dkar po thogs la// gcig tu shas cher brgad de gtam la
503a2(skyes rabs): rjesu chags shing dga' bas kun tu 'khod par gyur pa dang // de rnams kyis dge bsnyen de bltas nas rab tu brgad do// bram ze gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa// sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen khyod tshur shog/ stan yod par
503a3(skyes rabs): 'dug 'dug cig/ de der 'dug pa dang / bram ze zhig gis dris pa/ gang lha chen po dang / khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i lha rnams spangs nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa byed pa gan d+ha ra pa rnams kyi rang bzhin 'di ci zhig yin//
503a4(skyes rabs): des bgang de smras pa/ bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams kyi phyogs gcig shes kyi lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi yon tan mi shes te/ rgyu des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
503a5(skyes rabs): 'das la mchod pa byed pa yin no// des de'i tshig de thos pa dang / bram ze kha cig gis smras pa/ legs ldan lha chen po'i yon tan mi shes pa 'di ni/ khyod glen pa yin te/ gang gi phyir 'di na lha min grong khyer
503a6(skyes rabs): mkha' la rgyu// skyes pa bud med rgan dang gzhon bcas pa// gzhu tshon blangs nas 'bar ba'i mda' yis ni// me yi rtsa bzhin skad cig dag gis bsregs// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa// gang rang bzhin gyi 'chi ba'i chos
503b1(skyes rabs): can gyi srog chags rnams la gsad pa'i phyir 'bad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khyad par de 'dra ba la ni kho bo mi dga'o// su zhig zil pa'i thigs pa ni// rtswa yi rtse la chags pa dag/ ngang gis 'jigs pa'i chos
503b2(skyes rabs): can la// gzhig pa'i phyir ni 'bad par byed// re zhig gzhan thams cad lta zhog gi/ ci khyed rnams pha rol la gnod pa byed pa yon tan yin par shes sam// de nas bram ze de dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu
503b3(skyes rabs): smras pa// lha ma yin gsod pa ni yon tan yin par rab tu shes so// dge bsnyen gyis dbugs phyung ste smras pa/ las gang las ni dam pa rnams// ngo mtshar gyur pa de nyid la// dam pa min pa dregs gyur pa// kye ma
503b4(skyes rabs): 'jig rten ngo mtshar che// zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pas legs par smras pa yin no// mngor na yon tan skyon sogs brtags la bya ba dang // bya min sad pas rgyal ba'i yon tan ni// rgya chen rjes la yon tan nges
503b5(skyes rabs): dga' rnams// mchod pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rgya chen yin// skyon la yon tan dag tu 'du shes shing // skyon dang ldan pa dam par shes pas mdzod// 'bras bu rgya chen tho bo par mi 'gyur gyi// lta ba ngan pa dag
503b6(skyes rabs): kyang 'phel bar 'gyur// tshig de bram ze rgan po kha cig gis thos pa dang / khro bas 'bar ba'i mig gis dge bsnyen de la lta zhing brnyas pa dang bcas lag pa g.yon pas ston cing smras pa/ gan d+ha ra pa rmongs pa rnams
504a1(skyes rabs): de skad ma smra zhig/ gal te lha ma yin gsod par dgu' ba'i lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnaMs mchod par bya ba ma yin na mchod pa rgyas sa zhig 'gyur// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang ston yang dag pa dang
504a2(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur ba ste/ bram ze chen po ltos shig/ gang zhig stobs ldan 'tshe ba rnams// gal te mchod byar de 'gyur na// drang dang gzig dang stag la yang // 'gro ba rtag tu mchod par 'gyur// yon tan skyo
504a3(skyes rabs): dam pa ni// su la yang ni 'dod mi byed// dred la sogs pa'i gdugs pa rnams// yon tan med la mchod mi byed// mi 'tshe la sogs yon tan yin// 'tshe sogs skyon du shes par bya// yon tan skyon rnams
504a4(skyes rabs): mi shes pas// skyon ni yon tan dag tu shes// gang gis shin tu drag po'i las// 'jig rten byis pas mchod nas su// mchod pa'i yul las mi mkhas pas// de nyid la ni mchod byar shes// gran d+hir ba ni
504a5(skyes rabs): nges par yang // skyon dang yon tan rtog dang ldan// des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan la// dad kyi lha chen sogs man// bram zes smras pa/ kye ga nA d+ha ra pa re zhig sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di su zhig yin/
504a6(skyes rabs): dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rigs su legs 'khrungs pa/ kun mkhyen nyes pa kun las rgyal// sems can kun la phan bzhed pa// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yin// bram zes smras pa/ gal
504b1(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas drang srong chen po yin par shes na gzhan la gnod pa byed pa de mchod par bya ba mya yin par smra 'am/ 'di na 'pho bya dang / me 'bar ba dang / rgyas pa dang gnas 'jog dang / rgyun shes dang / phur bu
504b2(skyes rabs): gsum pa dang / rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyi dmod pa 'dobs so// zhes 'jig rten na glags so// gal te sangs rgyas de drang srong chen por gyur na nges par des kyang dmod pa 'debs
504b3(skyes rabs): par 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen gyis rna ba bkag nas smras pa/ sdigs par ma gyur cig/ sungs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dmod pa 'debs par mi mdzad do// brem zes smras pa/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig ces 'dir
504b4(skyes rabs): ci'i phyir smra/ gal te sangs rgyas dmod pa 'debs par mdzad na ni/ de yang dag par 'tshe ba can du 'gyur ro// 'on te su la yang dmod pa mi 'debs na sangs rgyas 'di la mthu ci yang med do// de nas bram ze de
504b5(skyes rabs): dag rnams kyis gnyi ka ltar 'galnga pa'i tshig gis gan d+ha ra pa khyad par du bsad nas gsang mthon pos brgyad par brtsams so// dge bsnyen dres ma 'khrul pa nyid du smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
504b6(skyes rabs): mthu chen po mi mnga' ba yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang dmod po'i rgyu dang bral bas gang la yang dmod pa mi mdzad do// bram ze chen po ltos shig/ chags can gang la kun tu chags// de dang bral na de khros
505a1(skyes rabs): te/ bya dang bya min nam rmongs pa// phyi nas dmod pa gtong bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags brag// rmongs pa dang bral khro las rgyul// sems can thams cad phan mdzad na//
505a2(skyes rabs): de nis dpyod pa ji ltar mdzad// de nas bram ze de rnams yid la bzung ba'i rgyu rnams rjesu dpog cing dge bya snyen de la smras pa/ kye gan d+ha ra pa gal te sangs rgyas dmod pa myi byed na/ nges par phan 'dogs par yang
505a3(skyes rabs): mi byed do// dmyong ba dang / phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dang bral na ni/ drang sring chen por yang mi 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dmod pa'i nus pa myi mnga' ba 'di ni de ltar
505a4(skyes rabs): byede na mod kyi/ 'on kyang phan 'dogs par spyod pa nyid yin te/ khyed rnams kyang ltos shig/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal la sngar bas// de ni dmod pa ma mdzad kyi// 'jig rten phan 'dogs brtson pas na// phan par yang
505a5(skyes rabs): ni mdzad pa yin// rga nad 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// drung gisde 'jig rten sdug bsngal na// rma la lin tshwa ji bzhin du// mkhas pa su zhig dmod pa 'debs// de yang byams pa la gnas shing // rtag tu snying
505a6(skyes rabs): rje'i bdag nyid can// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsil ba'i// chu yis 'jig rten tshim par mdzad// de nas bram ze de rnams yud tsam zhig mgo thur du smad nas bsams te/ dge basbyin de la rjes dang ba
505b1(skyes rabs): pa'i mig gdangs pas bltas te/ smras pa/ kye gan d+ha ru pA shin tu brtags pa'i gnas rnyed nas khyod kyis rab tu drud pas bdag cag ngo mtshar du byas so// mang du smras pas ci zhig bya ste/ gan d+hA ra zhes bya
505b2(skyes rabs): bA'i yi ge ni don phyin ci ma log par grags pA yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ go zhes bya ba sa ru bshad// sa de gang zhig yang dag 'dzin// skyes bu drim pa de rnams ni// dam pas 'dzin ces bshad do// ci dro'i
505b3(skyes rabs): phyir na sa 'di ni/ khyod cag rnams kyis 'dzin mi byed// gang phyir khyed kyi yon tan bsdogs// mgon po sangs rgyas la rten yin// de nas dge bsnyen des bram ze rnams kyi sems snong du rung bar byas par shes te//
505b4(skyes rabs): du ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bshad pa'i dus yin no// snyam nos/ yang dag par dge' ba'i bzhin gyis gzeng bstod de smras pa/ gang khyod rnams sangs rgya su bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes por gyur pas bdag
505b5(skyes rabs): ni mchog tu yang dga' ba skyes par gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dad pa 'di nyid 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir yon tan dang skyon gyi mtshan nyid rjesu dran par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang tshe 'gro ba yon tan rab rtog tshe// rgyal
505b6(skyes rabs): ba yon tan rgya mtsho gcig pur mthong // zhi dang dga' ba skyes par gyur mod kyi// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab kyis// sangs rgyas dang mnyam gang na'ang yod ma yin// dper na ri rab mnyam pa'i ri ni med//
506a1(skyes rabs): rgya mtsho mnyam pa'i mtsho ni yod ma yin// de bzhin sangs rgyas dang mnyam sa stengs sam// mkha' la lus can mchog de yod ma yin// shAkya'i khyu mchog des ni gang phyir
506a2(skyes rabs): ngal bas dka' bar ma zhugs ci zhig yod// thub pas phan pa'i don du lan mang dgongs te ma gzigs de ni gdu zhig yod// de la skyabs skyong drang srong des ni phran gdags mi byas de ni gang zhig yod//
506a3(skyes rabs): 'di na des gsungs lam la rab gnas nyon mongs dgras bcom de ni su zhig yod// mu stegs kun las rgyal te bde bar gshegaso shes yon tan rnam rgyas dri med grags pa'i kha che gzhan su yod// phug/
506a4(skyes rabs): na seng ge lta bur lha yul sa stengs dag na 'jigs med rang gis gsung mchog sgrogs pa gzhan su yod// rtag tu yid 'ong gsung gis las dang nyon mongs dag gi go nas skabs rjes su ston pa mdzad pa'ang
506a5(skyes rabs): gzhan su yod// gang gi mchod rten mkha' la sprin dkar lta bur 'gro ba yang dag brgyan pa 'ga' yang 'di na yod ma yin// de nas bram ze de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos
506a6(skyes rabs): pa dang / sangs rgyas la mngon par dad par gyur to// 'dis ci zhig ston pa ston pa yin zhe na/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par shes pas/ dad pa
506b1(skyes rabs): la ni gzhan rnams kyang yang dag par gzhugs par bya'o// zhes nye bar ston pa'i mdo brtsams pa yin no// de yang dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis rjesu brtse ba dang gang snying brtse bar bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs
506b2(skyes rabs): bya'i phyir te/ sangs rgyas mchog lnga gsungs pa'i phan yon gyi mdo sde dag la yang nye bar sbyar bar bya'o// gus par byas te chos nyan bya la yang brjod par bya'o// yang 'dis ci zhig ston ce na/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
506b3(skyes rabs): thos po don gzhan lo mngon par zhen pa'i bram ze rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pas rna dkrogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ khyed rnams sangs rgyas kyi snga yon
506b4(skyes rabs): tan thos pas dad pa rnams par 'phel bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur te/ de bas na sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' dag gi bsngags pa mnyan par shin tu 'dod pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang / rob tu byung ba khyed rnams kyis ma
506b5(skyes rabs): yengs par mnyan par bya'o zhes 'di ni yang dag par skul byar byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas mchog gi dpe de dang po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsA pau ban+de tshul khrims
506b6(skyes rabs): yon tan gyis bsgyur cing / dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos nas zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ a sho ka mu kha nA ga bi na ya pa rits+tshi daM/ bod skad du/ mya ngan med pa'i sgo
507a1(skyes rabs): nas klu btul ba'i le'u'o// 'di ltar rjesu thob te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon te ba na/ grong khyer pya ta lI pu tAr rgyal po mya ngan las 'das med ces bya ba 'khor
507a2(skyes rabs): lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhi cha la dbang byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// des nor gyi don du tshong pa lnga brgya bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed song la rgya mtsho chen po nas rin po che sna tshogs pa long la shog cig/ gang gi
507a3(skyes rabs): tshede dag rim gyis song ste rgya mtsho chen por phyin nas/ rin po che dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dad+ya/ shing ka shi lA dang / byi ru la sogs pa rin po che'i tshogs du ma sra de dag gis gru yongasu bkang
507a4(skyes rabs): ste 'dzam bu'i gling du phyogs te chas s+ho// de dag log nas 'ongs pa na rgya mtsho'i dkyil du klus gru bcom nas/ de nas tshong pa de dgra srog gi lhag mA 'ba' zhig dang grus 'ongs te/ gang gi tshe rim gyis grong khyer pa ta li
507a5(skyes rabs): pu trar phyin pa dang / rgyal po mya ngan med kyis tshong pa rnams 'ongs so zhes thos so// de skad ces bya ste/ rtsa yis me ni ngoms mi sreg/ rgya mtsho chu yis ngoms pa med// 'dir ni lha yul yid 'ong bas// 'gro rnams
507a6(skyes rabs): dbang drug ngoms pa med// ces bya ba yin pas de 'dod pa'i rgyus sems bskyed cing nor du ma dgram pa'i gnas bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de nas des rdzing bu dang bcas pa'i skyed mos tshal du gnas rgyan thams cad kyis
507b1(skyes rabs): brgyan pa/ ba dan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ bla bre dang / gos kyis spras par yid du 'ong ba'i spos rnams ni btul/ gangs ltar bsil ba'i chus gang ba'i rdzing bu nu shel lta bu'i phye ma dang ldan pa ut+pal dang / pad+ma
507b2(skyes rabs): dang / ku mu ta dang / puN+Da rI ka rnams kyis khebs pa/ ngang pa dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / ngur pa dang / kA la ding+ka dang / shang shAng tI'u dang / byA skrod snyan pa sgrogs pas nyams dga' bi/
507b3(skyes rabs): bi wa nga dang / gling bu dang / DA rnga dang / sgra bzangs dang / 'khar rnga dang / ba Ta ha dang / rnga bo che dang / dung rnams rgyun tu brdung bu/ blon po dang / grong mI dang / ljongs kyi mi dang / skye bo rnams ni 'dus/ dge sbyong dang bram
507b4(skyes rabs): TI dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu ba dang / kun tu 'tsho bA la sogs pa ngo mtshar gyis 'dus te/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / b+hu ru dang / mu tAMg dmar po dang / mu sa la gor ba dang /
507b5(skyes rabs): in+d+ra nI la dang / mthon ka chen po la sogs pa'i rin po che'i bye brag rnams blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po nor dgrams 'dug ste tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag kyang rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / thams cad stong
507b6(skyes rabs): gamigs gcig pu dang ldan zhing gcer bur gnas so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur/ tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ lha grubacom pas 'di ltar gyur to// rgyal pos smras pa/
508a1(skyes rabs): gang gis gru bcom par gyur// tshong ba rnams kyis smras pa/ ba tshwa can gyi rgya mtshon gnas pa'i klus bcom lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya// tshong pa
508a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha chen 'dri yongasu btsal du gsol// galA te tshol bar mi mdzad na/ phyis nas yang tshong pa 'ga' yang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor de na dge slong dbang po zhes bya ba
508a3(skyes rabs): bsod nams tsho ba zhig yod de/ de rgyal po dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig nu 'dug par gyur to// rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa dbang po la smras pa/ slob dpon bdag gis 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dbang
508a4(skyes rabs): pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po zangs ma'i byang bu la yi ge bris la rgya mtshor rdzongs shig/ ci tsam na rgyal pos zangs me la spring yig tu bris te smras pa/ sa 'di rgya mtshos gtugs pa skyo nga // rgyal po stobs ldan mya ngan
508a5(skyes rabs): med// rab tu drag cing btsan pa yis// nor khyer mtshor gnas gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni myur pa ru// nga yi drung du bskyal bar bgyi/ zhes yi ger bris te/ zangs ma'i byang bu rgya mtshor bsgyur ro// de nas klu me rangs
508a6(skyes rabs): nas/ rgya mtsho nas slar 'dzi m+bu'i gling du bsgyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i pho nyas zangs ma'i byang bus de blangs nas slar pa ta li pu trar 'ongs te/ rgyal po la skabs de bsnyad po dang / de nas rgyal po mya ngan med sems
508b1(skyes rabs): khong du chud nas mtshan mo stan gyi stengs su nyal te/ ji ltar 'di la bsgrub par bya snyam du sems so// de nas na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas rgyal po la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal ma byed cig/
508b2(skyes rabs): 'jig rten gsum mchog lha mis mchod// stobs phyug chu srin rgyal mtshan can// mthar byed bde gshegs sku gdung la// mchod pa rnams kyis rab mchod kyis// de rjes khyod kyi dgos 'grub 'gyur// lha
508b3(skyes rabs): gnyis pas smras pa/ gang zhig bya min rgyal chen mya ngan mi mdzad par// sngags dang rigasngo sngags sman sbyor ma bgyid par// mi dbang dbang du bya bar nus 'gyur ba// bde gshegs bstan la lhags par
508b4(skyes rabs): gus pa yis// de yis klu rgyal gong yin dbang du 'gyur// de nas zhag gnyis pa la rgyal po mya ngan med sgra dkrus te/ gos dkar po bgos nas dr-i dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams thogs nas
508b5(skyes rabs): tshig 'di skad ces smras so// phyogs mtshams mkha' bzhugs rdzu 'phrul ldan// shar gyi phyogs dang gzhin bzhugs la// bdag ni gsol 'debs spyan 'dren gyis// bdag la thugs rjes gzung du gsol//
508b6(skyes rabs): rgyal pos de skad ces smras ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs rnams nas dgra bcom pa stong phrag drug cu byon zhing 'dus par gyur to// rgyal pos me tog dang spos dang /
509a1(skyes rabs): dri dang / byug pa rnams thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pas byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nad pa dang ni rgyas dang sdug phongs
509a2(skyes rabs): gzhan yang 'chi gzigs nas// rgyal byas yul dang 'byor pa btsun mo'i 'khor dang nye du spangs// sa bdago zas gcing drung gshegs bskrad nas rgyal po'i dpal spangs pa// bcom lda na de la bdag/
509a3(skyes rabs): gus dang bas de yi sku gdung mchod// gong gi stobs kyis bdud ni shin tu stobs ldan blta bar dka' rnams bcom// gang gi bA ra Na ser 'khor lo legs bskor srid spang zhi bAr mdzad// gang gis lnga sde skye
509a4(skyes rabs): ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'chi ba bkrol// shAkya thub de'i sku gdung dpe med 'di la bdag gis yang dag mchod// gang zhig gang du mya ngan 'das gshegs 'dir ni mar me 'gags pa bzhin
509a5(skyes rabs): glang po stong stobs las lhag de ni mi rtag stobs kyis phyi mar brlag/ sa bdag mchog gis cha brgyad mnyam bgos sku gdung yang dag mchod gyur pa// de yi sku gdung dpe med 'di ni 'jig rten mkhas pas
509a6(skyes rabs): yang dag mchod// de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la gdugs tshod drangs nas mchod do// de nas rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa dbang po la smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig mchog tu bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan
509b1(skyes rabs): pa dbang pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po drang po ni khyod kyi gzugs gnyis pa klu'i gzugs te/ sku gzugs legs pa gnyis mdzod la gser gyi snod chen po byas pa'i nang du de gnyis stsol cig dang de las
509b2(skyes rabs): mngon sum du gzigs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byas te/ phyis rgyal pos bltas pa dang / klu'i gzugs 'dug pa la rgyal po'i gzugs phyag byed pa rgyal pos mthong ngo // rgyal po yid la gcags par
509b3(skyes rabs): gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dbang pos smras pa dang / rgyal po chen po dus 'drir yang dang yang du nyi ma re raM la khyad par gzigs par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mye tog dang /
509b4(skyes rabs): phreng ba dang / dri dang / spos dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang rang gi lagu nas bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams tshim par bstabs shing rgya cher mchod par byas te/ chos kyang gus
509b5(skyes rabs): par mnyan pa de lta de ltar rgyal po'i gzugs langs pa la klu'i gzugs phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// yang de'i rjes la klu'i gzugs de yan lag thams cad kyis rgyal po'i gzugs la phyog 'tshal bar gyur pa
509b6(skyes rabs): mthong bas de rgyal po yid rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa dbang po la smras pa/ kye ma dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i// 'bras bu ci 'dra 'di la gzigs// rgya mtsho'i nong na gnas pa'i klu/
510a1(skyes rabs): bdag gis btul zhing 'di dbang gyis// blo gros chung ba'i myi rnams kyang // su zhig sangs rgyas mchod mi bgyid// gang zhig 'bras bu phral bskyed la// su zhig yid kyis sems
510a2(skyes rabs): mi bgyid// bdag nyid che 'thob 'dod pa'i// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag mchod// skye ba zad cing yang srid med// slob dpon dbang pos skabs la bab par shes
510a3(skyes rabs): nus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po zangs ma'i yi ge yang dwa springs pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos yangs zangs ma'i yi ge de skur na so btang ngo // de rgya mtshor bsgyur ba dang / klu'i rgyal pos yi ge de spyi bos blangs
510a4(skyes rabs): s+ho// de nas rgyal po la lan mang du lha tshong pa de dag 'dir rdzongs shig/ so so'i rin po che glang lags pa bskur la slar bar+d+hang ngo zhes smras pa dang / de nas rgyal po 'o pho nya slar 'ongs nas rgyalnga pi la
510a5(skyes rabs): phyin de smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos chung pa bos nas smras pa/ khyed cag sngos so'i rin po che gang yin pa lo d+ya la skyer shog cig/ de nas gnas brtan dbang pos rgyal po la brgyad pa chos kyi rgyul
510a6(skyes rabs): po la sa rdul ngan pa 'bul bar byed pa yin mod/ de nas rgyal pos gnas brtan dbang po la smras pa/ slob dpon 'o na ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gnas brtan dbang pos smras pa/ khyod la chad po yin
510b1(skyes rabs): gyis rang gi phrag pa lnga khur la 'dir sgrol cig ces zangs ma la yi ge smar btang bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal pos snying yig du bris pa/ dzaMs+t+ra gling gi dbang phyug dam bya'i dka' bcug bya'i chad par rang gi
510b2(skyes rabs): phrag bar khu la sgrol cig ce sA yi ge btang ba dang / yI ge bklags ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po skrag par gyur nos smras pa/ lha de lta logs na gdug sa bdun na 'tshol mchi'o// de rgyal pos thos pa dang / pa ta li
510b3(skyes rabs): br-i tA'i grong khyer thams cad du dril bsgrags te// gang zhig grong khyer 'di na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang bud med bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'dod pa dag zhag bdun pa la rgyal
510b4(skyes rabs): po'i pho brang du shog cig/ de nas rgyal pos zhag bdun pa la gling khyor pa rnams dang / blon po dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs kyi mis yongasu gong bar bskor te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mthu chen po dang 'byor
510b5(skyes rabs): pa chen pos 'khor gyi khyams su song nas seng+ga'i khri la 'dug go/ de nas klu'i rgyal po klu du mus+ya yongasu bskor nas mi'i cha byad du sprul te/ rang rang gi phrag pa la rin po che'i khur thogs nas rgyal po chen po mya ngan mdog
510b6(skyes rabs): la ba der song ste phyin nas khur rnams phog nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas so// skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag ngo mtshor du gyur nas/ sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo zhes ca co'i sgra sgrogs te 'di skad ces kyang smraso//
511a1(skyes rabs): 'di 'dra'i bsod nams stobs kyis ni// rgyal po yongasu gzung bar gyur// skye bo rnams ni ngo mtshar skyes// lha rnams dang ni 'di ru yang // phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa yis// bsod nams
511a2(skyes rabs): gang yin zhes bya ba// 'di lta'i bye brag su mi bsgrub// byasam du myed pa'ang grang bsams pa// don de 'bad pa med paru// mi rnams la ni 'bras bur smin// rkang thang glang chen myos pa dang // rta dang shing rtas rgya mtsho na//
511a3(skyes rabs): gnas pa'i klu dong lhan cig g.yul// stobs tshe na sna tshogs mtshon chas min// sdug bsngal mgro bo'i gdengs ka can// bsod nams rang bzhin 'di 'dra ba'i// zhugs pa yi ni nges bcings nas// mya ngan med
511a4(skyes rabs): rgyal zhal mthong ba// bka' drin pasams pas rjes mthun 'jug/ des kyang de dag sna tshogs pa'i bka' bas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra'i yon tan rjesu brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
511a5(skyes rabs): 'di skad gsungs// bsod nams e yis mi tshig ste// rlung gi 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// na sachu kyi 'du'i 'gyur sa zhi na bye mi 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis// dbrog tu med par bsod nams gnas// skyes pa dang ni bud
511a6(skyes rabs): med kyis// dbrog par nus pa ma yin no// bsod nams bde ba skyed pa'i gter// 'dir ni lus par mi 'gyur te// gang dang gang du skyes pa ru// de dang der ni rjesu 'brang // de nas blon po gzhan zhig ngo mtshar skyes
511b1(skyes rabs): nas 'di skad ces smras so// yongasu bskor ba'i 'khor dbus na// bsod nams rgyan gyi rgyal po mdzes// skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i// ston ka yi ni zla ba bzhin// chu dang mkha' la 'gro ba'i rlung // bsod
511b2(skyes rabs): nams kyis ni nges pham byas// sa la gnas pa'i dgra yi tshogs// bsod nams kyis ni zad par byed// ji ltar yid la bsam pa yis// bde ba bsod nams kyis thob byed// bsod nams 'di ni bsags bA ru/
511b3(skyes rabs): sems drang ldan pa su mi byed// smras pas grub ces bya ba'i blon pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// bsod nams 'di ni dag byed yin// bsod nams nges par 'bab stegs te// mtho ris su
511b4(skyes rabs): ni 'gro ba'i lam// mi rnams bde rol bsod nams yin// bsod nams rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam// yang blon po gsum pa gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bsod nams kyis ni khyod kyi
511b5(skyes rabs): bzhin// zla ba dngas pa shar dang mtshungs// rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa yang // bsod nams kyis ni gtor ma mchis// yid du 'ong ba thob byed pas// bsod nams 'gro bas phyag byas 'os// bsod na myas yang dag
511b6(skyes rabs): bsags pa la// 'bad par mi rnams su byed pa// bsod nams kyis rgyal skyes bu ni// rta yis ma yin glang pos min// shing rtas bsod nams las rgyal min// mda' dong ral gris ma yin no// nor rnams dang
512a1(skyes rabs): ni yul dang ni// g.yul gyis bsod nams las rgyal min// bsod nams kyis ni rgyal ba la// rigs dang stobs dang gzugs kyis min// bsod nams kyis 'phags mi rnams kyi//
512a2(skyes rabs): snga rnams gsum gyi steng na gnas// bsod nams mi rnams gnas yin te// bsod nams thar pa thob byed mchog/ bsod nams 'jig rten grags byed yin// de phyir bla med bsod nams btsal// mtho ris thob
512a3(skyes rabs): byed ngan song spong // me yis rtag tu brten bya ste// mkhas pas bsod nams bya ba yin// de nas rgyal pos tshong pa de dag rnams lu smras pa/ khyed rang rang gi rin po che rnams khyer cig/ de nas de dag gis blangs
512a4(skyes rabs): nas rgyal po la rab tu bstabs te/ gzhan yang lha'i sbyor bas lags kyi// lho rnams 'di dag legs par snoms shig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag la chung zad kyang dgos pa med kyis khyer la song la the tshom
512a5(skyes rabs): med por longasra spyod cag/ de nas rgyal pos rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis dkon mchog la bstod pa 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// oM ma'o bstan pa phun sum tshogs// sa rdul snyim
512a6(skyes rabs): gang phul ba yis// rnam par smin po 'di 'dra thob// de nas rgyal pos yang smras pa// ding 'dir klu ni bdag dbang gyur// thub chen khyod kyis bka' drin las// legs spyod rgyal po bdag bgyid pa// bdag gis
512b1(skyes rabs): skye ba 'bras bcas lags// yon tan mchog ldan thub pa yis// bstan mchog 'di la su mi 'jug/ dper na sa bon rdul btab pas// 'bras bu chen po skyed byed na// rin chen phul ba smos ci 'tshal// de nas klu
512b2(skyes rabs): chos la sbyar nas slar song ngo // mya ngan med pa'i sgo nas klu btul ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / rgya ga ra skaM gyi mkhan po gnas brtan a dzI to shr-I b+ha dra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur bya//
512b3(skyes rabs): gnas brtan spyan drangs la bzhugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ s+tha bI ro ba ni man+ta na/ bod skad du/ gnas brtan spyan drangs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol// dgongs nas
512b4(skyes rabs): kyang shel dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / ku mu ta dang / kha ba'i phung po dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / ston gyi chu dang / na mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa la ga ltar dri ma med par mdzod la/ rlung gi stebs kyis shing gi lkugs
512b5(skyes rabs): phran bskyod pa dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / rmi lam+ba dang / glog dang / D+ha'i shing rta'i rdul dang / bA glang gi phru gu'i rna mchog dang / sbrul gyi lce dang / zil pa dang / rgya mtsho bskyed pa'i rlabs ltar g.yo ba'i yang /
512b6(skyes rabs): skad cig re re la yang mi sdo par 'gro ba/ rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yud cem zhig rgyu ba nang du bdagag tu gsol// smras pa/ ri gzar 'bab pa'i dba' rlabs gyur pas kyang // gang gis dpa'
513a1(skyes rabs): rlabs 'gyur la bskrun med par// 'jigs pa thogs med g.yo ba'i yid da ni// yud tsam rtse gcig mdzod cig btsun pa rnams// lha yi bu mo yi chang shugs phyung skad cig zim mor byas
513a2(skyes rabs): pa'i mig/ ring zhing gzir ldan bkra la 'od 'tsher mig chags lta ba g.yo ba yis// gang gi thugs ni skye ba rgyun gcod rgyu las 'khrugs par ma gyur pa// bdud kyang 'joms mkhas gcig pu thams cad mkhyen/
513a3(skyes rabs): pa de la phya/ ga mdzod cig/ skye ldan gang du brten nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can dmyal gzhi dang // yi dgas 'jig rten granas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur sdug bsngal 'jigs byed pa// 'khor ba gang na
513a4(skyes rabs): 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs gyur 'phags gcig po// zhi bang grong khyer sgor gzhol de la shin tu gus pas brten par mdzod// zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhig bdi gshegs gsung rob mthar phyin 'byung smra zhing /
513a5(skyes rabs): gang la gus par cung zad tsam zhig byin yang sbyin pa 'phel gyur la// ye shes snang bas mun pa zad byas dge slong dge 'dun de la ni// nyon mongs bcad pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang gus par phyag mdzod
513a6(skyes rabs): cig/ lcang lo chun po'i sgra mang mgo la thogs shing dpung mgo gnyis g.yogs la// rang gi 'od zer phyogs mthar 'phro ba rnams kyis 'jig rten kun 'gongs pa// lha dbang brgya byin cod pan btud du
513b1(skyes rabs): tshangs la phyag byas gang yin de// byin nas dga' byas sems kyi ting 'dzin shin tu chen po'i 'bras bu yin// rdo rje 'od 'phro phreng bas dpung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur cing // lha la bka' stsol dbang po
513b2(skyes rabs): mtho ris skyong po gang yin pa// de dag dge ba dag 'byung rnam smin 'gyur dus nyams dga' zhing // mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu rnams yin// kha nas rgyags 'gyur dri zhim 'byung/
513b3(skyes rabs): 'byung zhing mig gi mtha' dmar lwa// dbugs 'byung dro shal g.yos pas nu ma 'bur la 'drud byed pa// sdug bsngal gu lhan cig nor bdag dga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin po// de yang 'gro ba nyams
513b4(skyes rabs): dga' sbyin pa'i bdag nyid chen po yin// 'brug sgra sgrog cing sprin rnams chu ni kun tu len byed pa// rlobs 'byung dus ni nor bu byu ru dung dang nya phyis 'byung // rin chen gnas ni chu lha nyid kyi 'byor pas gang bsrung ba//
513b5(skyes rabs): der yang rgyu ni sbyin pa mchog ces thub pas bka' stsal to// gang yang 'od zer rnams kyis mkha' la skar ma'i 'khor lo zil mnan cing // ku mr-i ta yi rdzongs yangs rnams su dpal ni rab tu rnam phye nas// glang
513b6(skyes rabs): po'i mche bo'i dpal dang ldan zhing mtshan mo shin tu rab mdzes pa// de yang nges par sbyin pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ro bro mang po yin// ri rab rtse la shing ltas lam kha 'dug pa'i rin chen rdo gcog cing // rta yi rkang lag
514a1(skyes rabs): rnams kyis dgu tshigs chu bo rlabs ni gcod byed la// mun pa gsal phyir nyi mas skar ma zil mAnanA lha me gang yin pa// de rgyu yid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa'i sbyin par thub
514a2(skyes rabs): pas gsungs// rgyal mtshan rtse btags rin chen 'od zer snang bas na mkha' dmar gyur cing // rta maug 'dor bas ma khany+dza la sbyin gyi phreng ba dag kyang 'dral byed la// rnga yab dkar pos g.yabs shing 'khor los
514a3(skyes rabs): sgyur ba song ba gang yin pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs shes thub pas bka' stsal to// gser gyi pad+ma'i rdul gyi bye mas dmar bris tshon ni khrus byas te// de yi nags 'dab bung ba sgra 'byin
514a4(skyes rabs): rnams su nyal ba'i bde rnyed nas// rigs 'dzin chung ma lhan cig 'jigs med mkha' yas 'gro ba gang yin pa// de yang ser na 'jil zhing skyon med dga' bo'i sbyin pa'i gzi brjid yin// mA la ya yaM
514a5(skyes rabs): ri rtse tsan+dan grib ma su bsil bas yangs pa dang // 'bigs byed ri dang gangs dang lhun po'i ri rtswa dang man da ra yi ri bo la// grub pa'i tshogs cheni chung mA lhan cig 'dzugs bral dga' ba gang yin pa//
514a6(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di'i snying po 'byor pa de yang gtong bso yin// bud med rkang gdub 'khrol bas 'grogs nas 'phur ba'i phug ron gnas pa yi// khang pa mthon po rnams dang 'bigs byed ri rtse
514b1(skyes rabs): 'gron bya'i ban glang dang // gdugs dang rnga yab bud med g.yogs 'khor rin chen gser drang rta rnams dang // bzang mdzes de dag kun kyang sngon gyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rnam smin+da yin// ban+d+ha ka ltar rtsa dmar rgun chad
514b2(skyes rabs): glagaser snod bzang por legs blugs pa// yongasA dag a mra smin ltar dri zhim ut+pal 'gying zhing ldem// na chung zhim pra sna sgog dus kyis stobs shing yams grangs mang 'drim pa// mchog tu dge ba de rgyu sbyin pa
514b3(skyes rabs): yin pa zhes blo gros dag pas gsungs// gser gyi pag skas rkang bcings snyan sgra 'jam zhing smin ma ye gcig bskyong // myi shi yangs rnar thug dkar nag 'byes la skra bgrab me tog phreng dkrigs pa'i// na chung bzang mo brla
514b4(skyes rabs): rgyas bdag nyid legs byas rnams kyis bran ltar byed// tshogs bsags 'bras de sbyin pa'i che ba nyid ces zas gtsang sras pos gsungs// de lta lags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mtha' dag thugs su chud
514b5(skyes rabs): pa/ shin tu sbas pa'i chu lhor gyur pa/ snying dri ma med pa dang / lha'i skye bo dang klu'i gnas su gyur pa/ tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin zhing rgya che ba'i chu dang ldan pa/ dge ba la rnam par rtog pa'i zla ba shar ba'i dbang gis/ ting 'dzin
514b6(skyes rabs): sna tshogs rgyas pa'i dus kyi rlabs kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag la skyon med pa'i nor bu mang po kun tu g.yengs pa/ sems kyi 'og gzhi la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ri bo chen po brten pa/ 'bras bu'i
515a1(skyes rabs): bye bragu thob pa/ gang zag chen po'i chu srin rmya bya/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / yang dag byar spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
515a2(skyes rabs): drophyogs dang ldan pa/ sgri pa'i ro mi gnas pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan goms pa dag pa'i mu tig gi nya phyis kyi kha dog lus dang ldan pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gting mi dpogs shing zab pa/ rgyun mi 'chad par
515a3(skyes rabs): klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i sgra rgya cher 'byung po/ 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rgya mtsho chen po la bdag gsol ba 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste srid pa'i 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa du ma nas dge ba'i sa
515a4(skyes rabs): byin btab pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bsten pa/ gzhal med khyang gi sa gzhi gcig par gyur pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa dang byams pa dang tshul khrims drang thos pa dang zhi ba'i gnas bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung gi
515a5(skyes rabs): don gyi de kho na/ ma lus par rtogs pa/ yongs su shes pas bsgoms pas dran pa nye bar gnas pa yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong bas log par lta ba'i rab rib bsal ba/ legs par brjod cing shes lnga rgya che ba'i
515a6(skyes rabs): mig dang ldan pa/ skye bo bla ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sngon du smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i tshul bzang po dang ldan zhing / mdong sol che bas snyan pa rnams bskyed pa/ ston gyi zla ba nye ba'i 'od zer
515b1(skyes rabs): dag pa lta bu'i yid 'byung ba/ sbyin bdug chen po che ba'i bdag nyid can ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di ni/ khyim bdag legs sbyin dang / bzang ldan dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi bla dang / mu shil dang / tra pus dang / go shrI
515b2(skyes rabs): la dang / tra paM kar ni kA dang / mgon med zas sbyin dang / drag po drang / nag pa dang / nom gru la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la yid la mngon par dad pa/ gsal rgyal dang / tshangs pas sbyin
515b3(skyes rabs): drang / rgyal po shar bu'i bu dang / gtum po rab slong la sogs pa'i steng la dbang ba'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i legs pa spyad pa'i rjesu slob ste/ lus dang longs spyod srog la/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / dri zla'i grong

516a6(skyes rabs): kyis gsung dang dpa' ba/ mthu la mi gnod pa gtsang ma'i sras yul rnams kun la sred pa 'byung ba'i rgyun skams byed pa'i rgyu/ skye bo mkhas pa rnams ni sad par bya phyir shar gyur pa// bag la nyel gyi rab
516b1(skyes rabs): rib sel ba ye shes snang ba'i mchogs/ sa rnams mtha' drug snang ba phyogs rnams thams cad snang mdzad pa// phyag dang zhabs dang dbu ni rab tu byin zhing tshul khrims dang // smon lam dag gis byang chub lcam

522a2(skyes rabs): cig ro'i gnas mal dod nas ni// khrag dang sa chags dmare zhing rtsub pa'i skra 'khyil dang // bya yau mchu dang sder mos rmig sgrog brus pa yang // mI ro bor ba'i lus la gzigs par gyur pa dang // sgo dang srang
