522a4(skyes rabs): gang ba'i// sems can dmyal ba rnams su'ang srog chags 'don phyir gang dgra skad cig 'jug pa dang // gzhan ya shA ri'i bu mi'i dug mangs glang po che 'khrugs pa'i mdun log na yal ga bregs pa'i sdong bu
522a5(skyes rabs): yod pa/ phyogs kyi byur nas rlung chen po langs pas 'od ma'i tshul bskyong na 'khri shing gi dra ba dang 'dud pa las me byung ba'i me lces shing mchog sna tshogs tshig nas ri dwags dang / phag rgod mchog mgyogs pa brgyad
522a6(skyes rabs): dag skrag cing mgo rmongs pa yod pa shing lo mang po lhags shing rnyings pa can/ bsil ba'i grib ma sang seng med pa/ nyams dga' ba'i longs spyod yod pa/ nags kyi ma he dang phag rgod kyis me tog ud pa la dang
522b1(skyes rabs): pad+ma dang / ka la ra bskyod pas chu dri zhim por gyur pa'i mtshe'u 'gram na/ shing la spre'u khyu gnas pa nye 'khor gyi ri las chu rlabs mi grags par 'bab pas 'khor nas/ ne'u sing mod pa'i sa gzhi yod pa'i 'brog
522b2(skyes rabs): dag na/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can 'chag pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa/ gang dag bag med pa'i gnas/ ngar la bab pa sil bar mdzad pa rnams dang / ri bo rdo leb che zhing yang lA rab
522b3(skyes rabs): tu snun pa 'dra gyur cing // glog gi phreng bar me tog yod la 'ja' yis bkra ba'i bdag nyid can// chu bsil sprin chags rnams la chu 'bab zer phran chags pa'i gzi ldan can// ba ser bus na bza' g.yo ba gang dag nyi ma'i
522b4(skyes rabs): gung lnga bzhugs pa dang // de bzhin du rtag du goms pa'i lam nas 'dong ba'i glang po'i khyu'i rmig rjes yid la/ rgyags kyi ma he 'khrugs pa'i rwas grog ma khar chen byo bshig pa'i shol gyi khung bu nas/ sbrul gyi
522b5(skyes rabs): lus phyed byung ste/ nags kyi rlung 'gras pa yod pa/ spa tshal stug po dang / ldum bu dang / shing ka she stug po'i khyod na/ stag zung du gnas pa can/ phag rgod kyi skus rlogs pa'i gla rgang gi rtsa ba 'dzings pa rI la pA
522b6(skyes rabs): ltar 'dug pa yod pa shing ni rdu la'i me tog brul/ rdo ba tsa dmar bar gyur pa yod pa/ shong gi phyogs su ri dgas kyi khyu 'dam rdzob la thogs pa yod pa/ shing lo sngon po stug por skyes pa mang po yod pa'i// gsher
523a1(skyes rabs): ba'i chu rgyun drag mngon par dgyes shing dgye ba'i phyogs ston pa rnams dang / rin po che'i 'dod zer gyis chu rtsa dmar byar gyur la/ thugs bsam gtan la zhen pas dpagra bsam gyi shing gi
523a2(skyes rabs): mas rtse mor reg pa 'i ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi sul na rtsol ba med pa gang dag bzhugs pa dang / gang dag seng ge bsgyings pa yod pa/ ri dgas rgyu ba dang ldan ga klu 'dus te 'bab pa yod pa g.yos pas
523a3(skyes rabs): snying gi rtse mo ldem pa'i sbubs kyi sgra skar ma'i tshogs 'phangs pa/ s+ya steng na lci ba lhun po yang lkug phran la bya ba bzhin du sgrim mi dgos par/ zhab/ kye sror mos sa'i ste 'og gi rmang dang bcas par gsal
523a4(skyes rabs): bar 'phen pa dge dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa gang dag char pa'i chus rdol ba'i bu ga du ma nas nyi ma 'i 'od zer byung bya/ zla ba lta bu yod cing / rmang rdo dang / rtsig ngos shug shig tu gyur pa'i mtshams su ba brgya chags
523a5(skyes rabs): lu/ sbrul gso rlung gis gang ste sbrang der 'dug cing 'grel pa rtag tu yod cing / nags kyi ri dgas kyi lces tsha sgo rdul can rtsub po 'dug pas/ shing rtsa seng seng por 'gyur ba yod la/ rtsig rmad du srin bu go
523a6(skyes rabs): de'i tshogs ring nas gnas par gyur cing / sre mong mgo bstod ngo phyogs su blta bas byi ba skags pa yod la/ nang du rtswa sngon po stug po skyes pa'i 'jag ma'i drung gi gseb na phye ma leb rgyu ba yod cing // 'ug pa
523b1(skyes rabs): myang po sgra 'byin cing glu len pa lta bu yod pa'i grong stong sus kyang ting 'dzin ma byas pa rnams na/ ston pa'i bka' nan tan gyis bsgrub pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gang dag g.yag gis rmig pas rdo bcag
523b2(skyes rabs): yod cing sprin ldings ldan gyur la// mthu mar sa rI la dang thang shing skyes la chu bsaul mi khebs 'bab yod cing // bsam gtan zhen pa'i glos na khab bab pas chos gos lci zhing zag gyur kyang // gangs rI dag
523b3(skyes rabs): gi lcong na 'gro ba shing gi drung du bzhugs par dgyes pa dang // nang ni chu srin 'khrug te g.yas pas nya rnams kun 'byer zhing // skom pas gshong du 'khyil bar sbrul dbugs phyung bas rba rlabs rgyun chad pa'i//
523b4(skyes rabs): rgya mtsho la yang mtshan mo brtan pa gang dag 'chag mdzad pa// snod gyur dog nyid thugs ldan gtsang ma'i lhung bzed phyag bsnams shing // bsod nams ldan pa'i sku lus na bza' tshes gos rab tu ga yo// de dag
523b5(skyes rabs): sang gi gdugs ni nam gyi gung du phyin pa na// gaN+DI bsrungs pa'i sgra snyan skad gsang grags par gyur pa'i tshe// bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi de kho na goms pa'i chu blugs pas mi shes pa'i sems kyi dri ma dkrus
523b6(skyes rabs): pa'i mkhas pa'i tshogs 'dus pa/ nyi ma shin tu mang po nas 'dres pa'i spros pa bcas pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab rin po che'i sgrom du gyur pa/ dge ba'i tshogs bdud rtsi'i btung ba bzhi po// ye shes
524a1(skyes rabs): kyi glaser ma gtogs pa brdur ba'i brdar sngon por gyur pa/ legs pUrA spyad pa stong gi tshogs bsags pas grags pa rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid chen po can// skyon gyi
524a2(skyes rabs): nam thang ba lta bu'i yid dang ldan po/ ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di'i gan du/ ma he'i rA ltar sngo zhing dri med mkha' lus 'phur// gzi brjod kyis ni nyi ma'i 'od zer stong mthong zhing // mdo gas nas 'ong ba'i sprin ni
524a3(skyes rabs): dral nas su// skye bo phan phyir thub rnams sang 'drir gau shegs su gsol// rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin dang / klog pa dang / 'chag pa dang / skye bo bla ma la brten par mngon du dga' pa blo gros dang ldan pa/ mya ngan
524a4(skyes rabs): las 'das pa'i lam gyi rjesu mthun pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i reg pa gsumi rab tu sgrub pa/ nyon mongs pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gang dag 'di na gnas pa/ 'dul ba'i cho ga la goms pa/ lus dang /
524a5(skyes rabs): dudrug dang / yid kyi 'jug pa zhi ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang ma lus par ci bdar do mod kyi mtshan mo zad par mdzod la/ 'dri nyid du gnas mdzod cig/ thub pa'i sras mo shes rab zhi dang dul bas brgyan pa'i dge
524a6(skyes rabs): slong ma// tha dad gling dang klu dang nags dang ri rnams spros pa'i bsam bral zhe// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dri bral zhi 'os 'gro ba'i ma lta bu// de dag dgyes par mdzod la sbyin bdag phan por bzhed
524b1(skyes rabs): pabs sang 'dir spyon// phyag na rdo rje wa sogs sa la gnod sbyin gtso bo dang // grub pa rnams dang gang dag lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang // sangs rgyas la ni rab tu dad pa'i lha mchog gang yin pa// de dag
524b2(skyes rabs): rnams kyang sbyin bdag 'di la phan phyir sang 'dir spyon// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / rig sngags 'chang dang grub pa dang / mri 'am ci dang / na mkha' lding la sogs pa 'byung po chen po rnams dang / stobs bcu
524b3(skyes rabs): mnga' ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa dang ljon pa rnams kyis kyang / dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba dang / sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba 'di/ snod bzang po la sbyar ba dang / sbyin bdag chen po 'di la grogs bgyi bas
524b4(skyes rabs): nyid kyi dge ba'i yon tan skyed pa la nen tan mdzod cig/ rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang 'o bskyab prA dang / bskyang ba la brtson par mdzod cig/ yang dul ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pas shin tu che ba'i 'pha
524b5(skyes rabs): pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa la gasnol ba 'tshalo// lhun po las byung sbrul mgo lnga 'dra rdo rje kA na ka/ nya dang gdugs dang 'khor lo dag dang lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' ba// pad+ma gsar gyi dpal ldan phyag
524b6(skyes rabs): sor dra ba srab mos 'brel// sen mo'i 'od kyis khyab pa rgyal po'i phyag gis skyob par shog/ sred pa'i 'dod chags nyon mongs zhags pa bsal cing sred med la// chu yi chu gter lta bur yon tan rnams kyi
525a1(skyes rabs): gnas gcig po// thub bya'i sgras mchog dge 'dun bdag gis gus par spyan drangs pas// de ring dge ba gang bsags de ni byang chub thob gyur cig/ ji srid mkha' la bod drod kyis kwa
525a2(skyes rabs): ba rnam par snang byed cing / ri dwags rtags can 'od kyi ral pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan pa 'char ba dang // rgya mtsho rgyus par gnas pa de srid lha dang lha min phyag byas pa'o// bde bar gshegs kyi bskrun pa thogs
525a3(skyes rabs): pa med pas la glonus par shog/ gnas brtan spyan drang bslob dpon b+hu ba kan+da s+ye zhes bya byas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / U tsa ru dzi na mo tA dang / ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
525a4(skyes rabs): gtan la phub pa'o// / po na 'du// dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyeg 'a tshal lo// 'a
525a5(skyes rabs): skad bdag gis slob dpon gyis bshad pa thos pa na/ yul 'di'i gtsug lag khang bu nya zhes bya ba'i dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel zhes bya ba gsum rig pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rnam par thar
525a6(skyes rabs): pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa zhig tu gzhan zhig na/ slob ma zhig dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla gsum 'jig tshogs kyi ri zhes bya ba la bzhugs te/ slob ma ban de chos 'dul ba slob pa zhig lags na/
525b1(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas mya ngan+da las 'das nas+yA lau nyi sa stong lon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rgyu gar gyi yul kau sh+yA ma pa'i zhes bya bar nub par 'gyu ro zhes thos pa nas yul 'di snyam du/ rgya gar yul gyi
525b2(skyes rabs): chos dus de cim zhig na/ yul kau shA ma bI ra nub par 'gyur lta zhig na/ li yul la sogs pa gzhan gyi chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig rkyen ni gang gi sde 'jig par 'gyur
525b3(skyes rabs): snyam du the tshom skyes so// de na dgra bcom pa de phyi 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs pa dang / slob ma des mkhan po'i zhabs la yan lagrwa lngas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces the tshom
525b4(skyes rabs): zhus so// slob dpon ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkyo thub bya'i bstan pa lo nyis stong nas 'jig par lung bstan na/ li yul 'di la sogs pa yul gzhan gyi bstan ji srid du gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig/ rkyen
525b5(skyes rabs): glang gis 'jig par 'gyur ba lagras/ de nas mkhan pos bka' stsa lnga pa/ bu khyod kyis li yul la sogs pa'i skye bo mang po'i don dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ri nga du gnas par bya ba'i
525b6(skyes rabs): phyir the tshom dris pa legs kyis/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / lo yul la sogs pa'i bstan pa ji srid du gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig pa dang / rkyen gang gis 'jig par 'gyur po ngas
526a1(skyes rabs): so sor lcang bstan+da bAr bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lho stong lnga brgyu lon pa dang yul yul du dang phra med pa rnams 'byung zhing
526a2(skyes rabs): dam pa'i chos 'jig du rgol lo// de'i tshe li yul 'dir dadang phye med pa'i rgyal po yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / yul yang rgyal pos phan tshun rtod cing 'phrogs par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad ni yul yang nyin zhags cig
526a3(skyes rabs): bzhin du nyams par 'gyur/ grong dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yang phal cher stongs par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyang nyin cig bzhin du phyir yang dkon mchog gsum la dud pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// rgyu de snya na dkon mchog
526a4(skyes rabs): ku gsum dang / chos smra ba dang / bsam gtan pa kun kyang mchod gnas su mi byed cing / mu stegs kyi rgyal po dang / blon po dang / yul 'dzin pa dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang chos mi mthun pa po phyogs 'dzin cing dag pa
526a5(skyes rabs): bcu'i las kyi lam yal bar 'dod par 'gyur ro// chos dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / mu rtags pa dang / bab chel gyi longs spyod kyang sogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong dang / dge slong ma
526a6(skyes rabs): rnams 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi phyir g.yem spyo bar 'gyur te/ chos 'dul ba las 'byung ba dge sbyong gi tshul dang spyod pa zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / ngo tsho shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la sogs pa yal bar 'gyur
526b1(skyes rabs): zhing / zhing dang / ldu ma ra dang / nyo tshod dang / skyi ban+d+ha dang / slong mo pa rnams kyis 'tsho bar byed do// khyim pas bsgrub par bya ba'i bzo dang / khyim gyi so nA ma dang / 'thab rtsod dang / sgro gsol rngams po che yang byed
526b2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur ro// pho nyar yang 'gro bar byed/ los kyi go 'phang dang / rtsa 'jing yang tshol bar byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa la mi gnas shing bde bar gshegs pa'i gdam ngag yal por
526b3(skyes rabs): bor te/ yang dang yang du mkhar dang / grong dang / tshong dus dang / srang dang / sum mngon gnas par sems dga' bar bya gyur/ bran dang bran mo dang / rkung 'gros kyang tshol bar byed do// rgyu des khyim bdag dang / yul 'dzin
526b4(skyes rabs): pa dang / blon po la sogs pas kyang de dag la rim gro mi byed cing / dad pa phyir log nas/ dkon mchog dang dgra 'dun gyi dkor la ang 'phrog par byed do// khyim pa de dag gis kyang nor rjes de dag gis kyang nor la brten
526b5(skyes rabs): cing spyad pas bsod nams 'bri bar 'gyur ro// rgyu des na l-i yul la sogs par gnod pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing li re bzhin dma' bar 'gyur to/ rtso dro pa dang nad dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang rlung dang / dgra
526b6(skyes rabs): mang po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i sad dang / srin bu dang / bye ba dang / byi ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na sems can rnams mi mthun par 'gyur zhing dus tshigs kyang 'tshal bar 'gyur
527a1(skyes rabs): te/ de ltar na yul gang dang gang du chos lugs pa byed pa d+ya dang der ni gnod pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe li yul la sogs par rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs ya rabs las kyang
527a2(skyes rabs): dkon mchog la snying thag pa nas dad pa 'ga' las mi 'byung na/ phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rgyu de lta buswa li yul la sogs pa'i dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod gnas thams cad kyi thams cad du
527a3(skyes rabs): smesmig med par 'gyur ro// de nas li yul la sogs par dge slong gi gnas sngon rgyal po la sogs pa dang pa can gyis byas pa yang blon po la sogs pa drad pa med pa rnams kyis btsan phrog su phyogs nas bdag
527a4(skyes rabs): nyid gnas par byed do// dge slong rnams kyang 'khyams nas 'tsho ba dang / chos gos dang gnas kyis phrongs par 'gyur ro// blon po la sogs pa de dag gis dge slong gyi zhing chu dang / ldu mo re la sogs pa yo byad
527a5(skyes rabs): rnams kyang btson thabs su 'phrogs par byed/ lha 'bangs dang / nang gi g.yog rnams kyang dge slong gi ngag mi nyan cing gnya' rengs su byed par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang de lta bur shes naso yi
527a6(skyes rabs): mug ste/ li yul gyi dge slong rnams phan tshun du gcig 'di skad du yu bu cag rnams gtsug lag khang tshar ma zhes bya ba dang po chos 'byung ba'i gnas der 'dus te/ dpyid zla tha chung tshes bco lnga'i nub mo gso
527b1(skyes rabs): sbyong byas na sa gcig la gcig 'di skad du yu bu cag rnams sngon bag med par gyur nas mkhas pa chos dang mthun pa rnams lnga dbang zos pa'i rgyus da ltar khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rtsis med par byas te/ da ni
527b2(skyes rabs): 'o'ache bo yang mi 'byor na nga phyin chad gang du 'dong / thabs ni gang gis 'tsho bar bya zhing smra ste/ de tshe thams cad kyis cho nga chen po 'dabs par 'gyur te/ de nas de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan po srung ba'i lha//
527b3(skyes rabs): babacom ldan 'das kyis byas pa gzo ba thams cad kyang gtsug lag khang der 'dus te gcig la gcig blta zhing 'di skad du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni yun ring po mi gnas so// yul 'di yang stongs par
527b4(skyes rabs): 'gyur ro zhes mya ngan byed cing ngu bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe dge slong de dag 'di snyam du yul 'dir ni 'tsho ba mi sbyor na 'di bor te yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems mthun par gyur pa gang du 'dod par bya zhes gros bya ste/ yul
527b5(skyes rabs): nye ba gzhan dang gzhanya ni dad pa med pa dag gis gang / rgya gar yul du 'dod du ni lam mi thar pas bod kyi yul na dkon mchog gsum la mchod gnas su byed ces grags pas der 'gro bar byas nas/ nyi ma 'di
527b6(skyes rabs): la 'dong ngo zhes dus btab nas de'i nub mo gtsug lago khang tshar ma bzhag go/ nam langs pa dang / bud med dad pa can zhig gis gdan chung la spyan drangos te/ de nas gaN+DI brdungs nas dge 'dun spyis
528a1(skyes rabs): gtsug lag khang bskor te mchod pa byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi gdan khri zhig gas pa'i gseb nas sgrom bu tha rabs can zhig snang bar gyur te/ de nas sgrom bu de phye ba dang /
528a2(skyes rabs): de'i nang nas gser las byas pa'i kha zas kyi sder cha bdun byung ste/ dge slong kun gyis de blangs te/ 'brur bsgyur nas dge 'dun kun dbyar zla ba gsum gtsug lag khang tshar ming tshul du 'jog pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar nas zong
528a3(skyes rabs): lhag ma las yul nas byung ste 'gro ba'i lam rgyags dang khur kha la sbyar ro// dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas 'di skad du yu bu rnams byin gyis brlab brlab yul 'di bltas la 'gro bar bya'o zhes smras tAM song nas/
528a4(skyes rabs): 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i gnas gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya ba'i drung du phyin pa dang / de'i tshe de na brag la mchod rten gyi 'og gzhi rnying pa zhig rdibs pa'i nang nas/ gser phor chen po mu tig gis gang ba
528a5(skyes rabs): zhig byung dang / de yang blangs te 'brur bsgyur nas phyogs der chun zla ba gsum gnas pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar te/ de nas dpyid byung ste 'gro ba'i dus la bab nas song ste/ shel chu 'og ma rgal ba dang / yul mi stod pa rna
528a6(skyes rabs): kyis sa lam yogasu gdugs tshod sbyar nas/ nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang dag tu gdugaso tshos gsol bar 'gyuraro// de'i tshe yul mi rmad pa rnams kyis kyang dge slong rnams yul byung ste 'gro
528b1(skyes rabs): thos nas dge 'dun de dag gtsug lag khang cong zhes bya blar spyan drangs nas/ zhag bdun gyi bur du bshos sbyor bar 'gyuraro de'i tshe li yul na gnas bya'i klu thams cad 'di sgyum du bad+mo bar gu sh+lo gswA pa'i
528b2(skyes rabs): bstan pa ni smeg med par gyur lA thug go snyam du mya ngan byed cing bstan pa gnas par byas pa'i phyir char chen po phab ste/ tshor pa des gtsug lag khang tsong zhes bya ba'i rlung na mchod rten gyi gzhi zhig yod pa nus
528b3(skyes rabs): gser phor gser byas gang ba zhig byung ba dang / de yang dge 'dun gyis btsongs nas dpyid kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams sbyor bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang yul mi smad pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khad sa la'i tshal zhes
528b4(skyes rabs): bya bar dge 'dun rnams spyan drangus nas zhag bdun gyi bar gyi gdugs tshong gsol nas/ zhag bdun lon po'i nyin par yul stong smad kyi mi thams cad gtsug lag khang snga nu bar 'dus nas dge 'dun la rdzongs
528b5(skyes rabs): drang khur khal 'bul lo// de'i tshe mi rgan rgon rnams ni bslab pa 'dzin par byed/ gzhon pa rnams ni rgyang nas lta zhing gAng mos 'debs pa dang grogs byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe mkhar dge ba can gyi nang nas kyang
528b6(skyes rabs): mi rgan rgon kha gcig gos kha dog bsgyur ba dang / lam du 'jug pa'i yo byad so so nas thogs nas so so'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge 'dun du legs nas 'phags pa rnams bzod par bzhes smras
529a1(skyes rabs): shing mchis te/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe mchod pa de ni dper+ya na ku sha'i grong khyer gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar shes nas mya ngan byed pa bzhin du
529a2(skyes rabs): mchod pa byed pa dang 'dra byur li yul du dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i tha ma yin no// de'i 'og tu dge slong rnamos gtsug lag khang de na sna bod 'ayul ngos su chas pa dang / lham khro na mchod rten rnying
529a3(skyes rabs): zhig gi drung du dpal lha mo chen mos dge 'dun gyi ched du gser gyi dong rtse phu rung gang bzhag pa rnyed nas dge 'dun gyis bgos te lam gyi chas rdzas sbyor bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe li yul gyi mkhar gtsug
529a4(skyes rabs): lag khang kA sa ra zhes bya bar rgyal rigs las skyes pa'i yon bdag gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ yon bdag des dge 'dun rnams zhag bdun mchod ston gsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe mchod ston
529a5(skyes rabs): gsol ba de nI li yul du dge 'dun mchod ston gsol ba'i tha ma yin no// de nas dge slong rnams me skar gyi lam du zhugs te song ba dang / de'i tshe dge slong pho mo gsar bu las cher rang rang gi slob dpon
529a6(skyes rabs): dang / mkhan po la chos gos phul te bzod par gsol nas slar yul du ldog par 'gyur ro// dge slong pho mo gsar bu kha cig ni rab tu byung ba'i dngos po mi gtong zhing pha ma la sogs pa'i gnyen
529b1(skyes rabs): skyel du 'ongs pa rnams la mya ngan gyi tshig smra zhing drus nas gnyan rnams phyir bzlog ste/ dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu mi dga' ba'i yid kyis phyir byin gyi brlabs pa'i yul dang / gnyen gyi rjes bzhin du me skar
529b2(skyes rabs): gyi lam tu zhugs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ltar song ba dang de'i tshe rnams thos kyi bu dang / dpal lha mo gnyis mchog tu snying rje skyes te/ 'brog mi pho gnyis kyi lus su bsgyur nas dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs te//
529b3(skyes rabs): yul me skar du zla bo gsum gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol te lam du 'jug pa'i yo byad ci dgos pa yang song bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag mdo lo'i lamA du zhugs nas ra dang lung po'i sul
529b4(skyes rabs): gtugs te song ba dang / 'brog dgon par lam stor nas du zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang li yul gyi lha thams cad kyi ming nas 'bod par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu snying rje skyes nas 'bad
529b5(skyes rabs): g.yag dkar po skal pa dang snal chu can cig tu sprul na snga dge slong de dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyi de dag mthong nas g.yag 'di ni mi'i khalnga g.yag cig yin te/ 'di'i phyi bzhin song na
529b6(skyes rabs): gdon mi za bar mi rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba sa da ni mi 'chi'o snyam du yi sos te/ g.yag des kyang lam drangs nas gseb lam du byung ste/ tshal phyir bskyal nas g.yag nyid mi snang bar 'gyuraro//
530a1(skyes rabs): de'i tshe dge slong rgan rgon mang po zhig ni lam kar 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yul tshul byi'i bod rnams kyis dge slong de drag mthong nas bsu ste/ 'phrul du yo byad rnams sbyar nas bod yul
530a2(skyes rabs): 'dir li yul gyi dge slong mang po lcags na ji ltar bgyi zhes pho nyar gtong par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rmya DI'i bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gcig btsas pa bod kyi rgyal po'i khab tu lon cing btsun mo dam pa byed
530a3(skyes rabs): par 'gyur te/ de ni dad pa shin tu che ba/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ skad snyan pa dang / nges pa bslab pa'i yan lag lnga bzung ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun mo des nyi 'og gzhan nas dge slong mang po bod kyi yul du
530a4(skyes rabs): lhags par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni ring du gyi nas so snyam mo// mya ngan chen pos non nas rang gi 'khor bud med nyis brgya dang skyes pa sum brgya dang ru ru ma dang / bzo bo dang / gnang chen rnams drung du
530a5(skyes rabs): bos te dus nas 'di skad ces bde bar gshegs pa'i bston pa ni de'ur 'jig por 'gyur gyis khyed rnams myur du bsod nams ma byas/ tshul khrims ma bsungs na 'phyis par 'ong ngo zhes smras par 'gyur ro// de
530a6(skyes rabs): nas bcu n+do des rgyal po la 'di skad du dge 'dun de rnams bdag gis bzhon pa dang gos la sogs pa'i yo byad sbyar nas 'dir spyan drang bar ci gnang zhes gsol pas/ rgyal pos kyang gnang bar 'gyur
530b1(skyes rabs): te/ tshul de lta bus dge slong de dgu bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bod yul gyi rgyal po rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis dge slong de dgra mthong nas dad pa chen po skye zhing gtsug lag khang chen po bdun
530b2(skyes rabs): yang brtsigs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dge slong an tse pa dang / gus tig pa dang / bar mkhan pa dang / shu lig pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal chen pos non nas bru sha'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// b+ho dkar yul
530b3(skyes rabs): dang / kha che'i yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang dad pa med pa'i mi rnams kyis gtses te/ ma chags nus bru sha'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dge slong de dag thams cad kyis bru sha'i yul du phyin nas bod yul na
530b4(skyes rabs): gtsug lag mang po brtsigs pa dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zhig gnas pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang / ri myo cher byed pa thos nas yid dga' ste/ thams cad bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyur/
530b5(skyes rabs): ro// bod yul du lcags nas lo gsum gyi bar du ni mchod pa chen po la sogs pa skyid pa nyams su myong bar 'gyuraro// lo gsum lon pa dong bod kyi yul du bdud kyi res kyi lha dang / lha ma yan dang / klu dang /
530b6(skyes rabs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyi nad chen po 'bras dang / phol mig dang / 'brum bu gdug pa dag gtong bar 'gyur te/ nad des zhang blon dmag du ma 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rgyal mo de'i snying khar
531a1(skyes rabs): 'bras gsug pa byung ste shi nas lha yul du skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bod kyi zhang bron rnams khros 'khrugs te 'di skad ces bdag cag gi yul 'dri sngon gya nom pa las phyis mi bkra mi
531a2(skyes rabs): shis pa 'khyams pa sh+ya stag 'dir lhags nas/ da ni yul du yang 'di lta bu gnod pa rnams pa sna tshogs bya byung bar 'gyur gyis/ rdzas lhag ma 'di rnams kyang yul 'dir mi bzhag cing sa mtsho mas 'das te
531a3(skyes rabs): bskrad par bya'o// zhes gros byas nas dge slong gcig kyang bod yul du gnas su mi gnang ngo zhes glo bur du bsgo bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mo de nad kyis thebs pa'i tshe bdag nyid mi 'tsho bar tshor nas rgyal po la kha
531a4(skyes rabs): tshems su bdag gum na bdog gis nor rdzas ril gyis dge 'dun lu 'bul bar ci gnang zhes gsel nas rgyal pos kyang gnang ste/ btsun mo'i rdzas thams cad dge 'dun la 'bul zhing des rgya grar gyi yul
531a5(skyes rabs): gAna? d+hA ra zhes bya bar 'gro ba'i rdzas byas nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bod yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang yi chad nas nyi 'og gi dge slong rnams dang gros gcig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// skye bo dang rtsod pa'i dus
531a6(skyes rabs): de'i tshe rgyu yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang shin tu sdug bsngal bas gzir nas yul gan d+ha rar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ltar dong pa dang dge slong de dag thams cad yul gan d+ha rer 'gro ba'i lam kar phrad par 'gyuraro//
531b1(skyes rabs): dri'i tshe bod kyi dmag gis rjes bzhin bsnyags nas lam kAr bran g.yog dang nor phyugs drag phrogs te dge slong dag kyang gsod par 'gyur ro// de ltar dge slong de dag bod kyi dmag gis bdas nas klu'i rgyal po
531b2(skyes rabs): e la'i 'dab kyi gnas drung du phyin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po oM la'i 'dab kyi mi rgan zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te dge 'dun gyi mdun du 'ongs nas phyag btsal te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams gar gshegs zhes dris
531b3(skyes rabs): pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'di skod du bdag cag gi yul na dad pa med pa sha stag gis gang bas 'tshe ba 'i yo byad la sogs pas phongs te/ da yul gan d+hi rar 'tsho ba'i yo byad tsam zhig ci rnyed snyam nas
531b4(skyes rabs): lhags so zhes smras pa dang / de nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa'i mtshan rtogs nas mchi ma khrag tu 'jug cing ngus nas/ dge 'dun rnams la yung der gshegs nas shul
531b5(skyes rabs): rgyags ji tsamya mnga' zhes skyed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun kun gyis kyang zhib tu brtsis nas zhag bco lnga'i rgyagaso yod do zhes smras par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal pos 'di skad du 'di nas yul gan d+ha rar mtsho 'di yi g.ya
531b6(skyes rabs): g.yon du bskor na zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i shul mchis na/ dgung bco lnga'i rgyags kyis 'tshal lam/ gzhan yang yul ka na ka mthon po dang / nags tshal stug po dang / gcan zan gdug pa dang / sdig sbrul la
532a1(skyes rabs): sogs pa dang / chom rkun pa yang mchis pas/ phyin tshur yang dmag gis bskyegs pa dang / mtsho 'di'i nang na yang bdag gi 'khor gtum po dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig mchis
532a2(skyes rabs): pas bdag gis phyir bzlog par mi nus te/ bdag ni de'i shul du bzhud pa ro mi dga' zhing mchis so// de'i tshe dge slong pho mo mang po de dag thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag rnams 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa 'dra snyam
532a3(skyes rabs): nas ngu zhing mya ngan byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis dge 'dun rnams kyi mdun du pus mo btsugs nas dge 'dun ma bshums shig/ bdag gis dge 'dun rnams kyi slad du srog kyang
532a4(skyes rabs): yongasu btang zhing bdag nyid kyi lus mtsho 'di'o steng du zam par bgyid lags so// bdag gi sngon bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thog mar legs par ma bsrungs par chad par srog gis gadri pu zhig
532a5(skyes rabs): gcod par 'tshal lo// zhes smras par 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po des rang gi lus sbrul chen po zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ bod yul ngos kyi ri'i rtse mo la ni mgos 'khyud/ yul gran d+ha ri'i rtse mo la
532a6(skyes rabs): ni mjug mas 'khyud de lus kyi zheng du ni shing rta lnga'i khyod tsam gyi zam pa brtags so// de'i tshe dge slong de dag gi sbrul chen po de'i gzugs de mthong nas dngas skrag ste phyogasu 'byor bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i
532b1(skyes rabs): rgyal po des mi skad phyung ste/ dge 'dun dag mu dngangs shig/ bdag gis lus 'di khyed kyi slad du zam par btags pa lags kyis/ ma skyengs par rjes dgra choms su dogs pa ni 'brangs dang phyag
532b2(skyes rabs): rjed dang khur rnams sngon la dgyer du gsol/ de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gzhon rims gshegs su gsol/ bgros po rnams ni slad kyis gshegs su gsol zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de'i rgyab kyi lhogs
532b3(skyes rabs): be phyugs kyi rmeg pA dang mi'i rkang pas bshus te rmu chen po byung ste mtsho'i nang du rnag khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro// mi phyugs phral yang mtsho'i nang du ltung zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// tha mar dge 'dun rgan rabs rgal ba'i
532b4(skyes rabs): 'og tu klu'i rgyal po nyid kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mtsho de yang skems par 'gyur te/ mtshe skams pa'i nang du klu'i rgyal po shi ba'i rus pa ri lta bur 'dug par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor
532b5(skyes rabs): lnga brgya dang thobs cig tu klu'i rgyal po i la'i 'dab kyi rus pa'i drung du gsheg swA twe klu'i rgyal po e l+ya'i bdab kyi skyes pa'i rabs brjod pas byams pa'i 'khor dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras
532b6(skyes rabs): bu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag yul gan d+ha rar phyir nas lo gnyis kyi bar du gnas so// lo gsum pa'i tshe yul de'i rgyal po dad pa can zhig yod pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po de shi ba'i 'og
533a1(skyes rabs): tu rgyal po de'i bu dang pa can zhig dang / dad pa med pa zhig rgyal srid lnga bstod nas dmag gi g.yul bkye nas/ phyogs gnyis su chad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na dge slong de dag gis nang nas
533a2(skyes rabs): dge slong dpa' ba/ brtul phod pa tshem tshim med pa stong zhig yod pas rgyal bu dad pa med pa de dmag gis btab ste pham par byas nas rgyal bu dad pa can de la rgyal srid 'bul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal bu dad pa can des
533a3(skyes rabs): zla ba lta rgyal po byas nas dge slong stong po de dag gis gsad nas dge slong gcig rgyal po la bcug ste lo gnyis rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yul gan d+ha ra'i blon po dang yul mi thams cad 'dus te gsang
533a4(skyes rabs): nas ci'i phyir ny+tsi 'og gi mi bdag cag gi yul du byos pa/ dran pa 'dris bdag cag gi rgyal po bsad do zhes gros byas nas 'bral la dmyag drangs te rgyal po btub par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yulA gran d+ha rA ra na
533a5(skyes rabs): gnas pa'i dge slong thams cad mthong dgu bsad do/ dge sbyong grang zhig yul dbus su byos te thar pa de 'bra'o zhig gson par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu yul dbus ma gtogs par dzam bu'i gling 'di na dud pa
533a6(skyes rabs): med pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur te/ srig ni la sogs pa zhig gis rgyal po ni stag gzigs gis rgyal po byed par 'gyuraro// dru gu ru sa sna tshogs du ma'i rgyal po ni drug gus byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan mang po
533b1(skyes rabs): zhig gis rgyal po ni bod kyi rgyal pos byed par 'gyur te/ rgyal po de gsum gA nI yang sems mthun par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de gsum ga la dmag dpa' ba brtul phod pa sum 'bum zhig yod pas yul
533b2(skyes rabs): dbus ma gtogs pa/ gzhan yang dag po'i lta ba 'dzin pa'i yul thams cad bcom nas mi mang po khwa btag nas grong la sogs pa yang stongs par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po de gsum 'dus nas yul dbus su
533b3(skyes rabs): dmag drang sA zhes gros byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na yul dbus kau shAm pa'i zhes bya bar rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba zhig 'byung byar 'gyur te/ de btsas pa'i tshe khrag gi char pa 'bu'u/ lag pa gnyis kyang gre mo man
533b4(skyes rabs): chad khrag gis bsgres po lta bur+ya dmar ba zhig yin no// de'i blon po yan lcag mtshog dang ldan pa lnga brgya dang / dmog gi g.yul ngor dpa' ba nyis 'bum 'byung byer 'gyur ro// de'i tshe stag gzig gi rgyal po lnga
533b5(skyes rabs): sogs pa gsum yul dbus kau shA ma bI r+ya song nas rgyal po bzod dka' tshol bar byed do// de nas rgyal po bzod dkas thos nas dmag dang chas te rgyal po de dag gi mdun du bsgrags nas zla ba gsum gyi bar
533b6(skyes rabs): du rgyun du g.yul chen po sprad pa dang / rgyal po dad pa med pa de gsum dmag dang bcas te gtan med par brlag par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzod dka' dmag dang bcas pa slar yul du 'khor nas rgyal po de
534a1(skyes rabs): 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'di'i rabs bdun du yul khams gzhan dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod rten bzhugs pa la ngan sems dang gnod pa mi byed do// de'i dus na lI yul gyi dge 'dun
534a2(skyes rabs): yang tsan dra gar+b+ha'i lung bstan pur las 'byung ba bzhin du dad pa bri/ chos khrims dang mi ldan/ 'jig rten gyi kha dang glags pa tshol/ rgyal po dang blon po'i dkugatsang gyi nang du 'jug cing dam pa'i chos dman par byed pa
534a3(skyes rabs): dag kyang mAng du 'byung ste/ de'i tshe zhang blon dang / nyung thon gyi bu tsha yang dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi mnga' ris kyang ban+des spyad pa sA li yul gyi mchod rten dang / dam pa'i chos la sogs pa dkon mchog
534a4(skyes rabs): gsum gyi mnga'i ris kyang sngon pas 'drir 'ong ngo // rgyal po dang / blon po yang ban de la mi dga'o// de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' cig gi dong domar gyi rgyal po byas pa'i rgyud rabs bdun gyi tha mA la rgyal po de'i chung ma rmya
534a5(skyes rabs): yul nas rgya rje'i bu mo kong tso byang chub sems dpa' yin pa zhig 'khor drug brgya dang gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ongs sngo// klong co dr-i 'phags par chos lo dang / dbang thang che bas gdong dmar gyi rgyalnga po yang dad pa che
534a6(skyes rabs): ste/ sngon pas kyang dam pa'i chos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i dus na li yul gyi rgyal po gzhon zhing chos mi spyod pa zhig gis li yul gyi dge slong rnams la bsgo ba/ yang na ni skye bor ba bas shig/ yang na ni gang
534b1(skyes rabs): dga' byar dengs shi gu/ ces bskyed nas dge 'dun ril gyis tsar ma zhes bya ba'i lha khang du 'du su nas 'gros byed pa'i tshe/ lha khang gi nang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil nas gser gyi zan dang gser gyi 'khur ba cha bdun byung nas dge slong
534b2(skyes rabs): lnga stong rgyalnga pos 'tsho ba bcad de/ mi 'byor pa'i zla ba gsum du 'tsho ba'o zong du 'gyur// de'i tshe de'i dus na lo la skye bor babs// ma blabs pa gud du 'gro ba rnams kyang phra ma dang / gnyen 'dun dang / yul sa dang
534b3(skyes rabs): 'bral ba mi dga' ste/ dud mo chen po 'byung ngo // dge 'dun phal mang po lam du zhugs te/ song ba las bong zhes bya ba'i lha khang du phyin pa dang / de ni mchod rten chen po zhig bzhugs pa rlung gi rgyal po dad pa can
534b4(skyes rabs): gyis bral te/ nung nas gser gyi phor pa mu tIg bkang ba zhig byung nas dge 'dun s+thi lu phul lo// gzhan yon padagra dad pa can gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams phul lo// dri nas dge 'dun rnams mdo laM me skar gyi yul
534b5(skyes rabs): du phyin to// mu tig gi zla ba phyed kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad sbyar ro// mai s+ya skar nas song ste/ skong nya zhes bya ba'i lha khung na dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i tshe bai shra mi Na dang / dpal gyi lha mo mi khyA shug tu sbrul nus yul de na 'dug
534b6(skyes rabs): ste/ dge 'dun thams cad la bdag cag bsod nams bgyid do zhes gsol nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol nas dpal gyi lha mos phur rung gang gi gser gyi dong tshe dge 'dun sbyar
535a1(skyes rabs): 'di snyam du bdag gi mi mang po kha btag na/ bdag gi 'gro ba ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur// nam zhig dran song gsum las thar bar 'gyur snyam du 'gyod pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po de
535a2(skyes rabs): la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ ma stengs par dmar bu can gyi yul na dge slong shir ka zhes bgyi ba sde snod gsum la mkhas pa zhig bzhugs pas de spyan drongs dang / des lha khyod kyi la sgo ngan pa de bshags par 'gyur ro/
535a3(skyes rabs): zhes smras par 'gyur la/ rgyal pos kyang dge slong de spyan drangs nas de'i tshe mdun du las ngan pa 'di ltar byas pa thams cad lo rgyus smra bar 'gyur ro// dge slong des kyang 'di skad du rgyalnga po khyod kyis shin tu ma legs pa byas kyi tshe
535a4(skyes rabs): thang du 'gyod la/ dzam+bu'i gling gi dge slong thams cad 'dir spyan drongs la rtag tu yo byad lnga phul te/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang nyin cig bzhin du de mdun du sdig pa shogs shig/ khyod kyis myi mang po kha btag pa'i las po srabs
535a5(skyes rabs): par 'gyur ro zhes smra bIr 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po des yul yul gyi dge slong rnams spyan 'dren pa gtod par 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis kyang yul kau shI pI zhes bya ba na rgyal po bzod pa dka' zhes bya ba dge 'dun
535a6(skyes rabs): la yo byad lnga 'bul ba zhig yod do zhes thos nas yo rangs te/ yul ko shI bI zhes bye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yul ke shI bIr dge slong 'bum 'dus par 'gyur ro// dge slong de nas tshes bco lnga'i nub mo dge slong rnam
535b1(skyes rabs): gso sbyong la 'dus te dge slong shir sha kya bos nas khyed kyi so sor thar pa'i mdo thon cig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// dge slong shing sha kras kyang 'di skad du khyed rnams la so sor thar pas ci zhig bya/ mi sna dang rna ba bcad pa
535b2(skyes rabs): la me long gi ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe dge slong de dag gis nang nas dgra bcom pa su rata zhes bya ba langs nas seng ge lta bu'i skad ces khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ kho bo ni bde bar gshegs pas bka'
535b3(skyes rabs): stsal pA bzhin du bslab pa cig kyang ma nyams so zhes smras pa dang / dge slong shir sha ka shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong shrir sha ka'i slob ma a g+ho bI zhes bya bas dgra bcom pa de la 'di skad du khyod ci'i
535b4(skyes rabs): phyir nga'i slob dpon la mi mang sngar de skad sgra zhes khros nas lag pa gnyis kyis sgo gtan blangs nas dgra bcom pa de gsod par 'gyur ro// de nas dgra bcom pa de'i slob ma dge slong ka rat+na zhes bya bas kyang rong gi slob
535b5(skyes rabs): dpon bsad par mthong nus shin tu khros tri dbyug po blangs nas dge slong shir sha ka gastod par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe dge slong dag ril gyis khros nas phyogs gnyis su chud nas gcig gis gcig gsod par 'gyur ro// dri
535b6(skyes rabs): nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad der lhags te/ dge slong shi ba'i ro de dag mthong nas dung mos 'debs shing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong de dag gi gos kha dog bsgyur ba dang sgra dang sen mo yang lha'i
536a1(skyes rabs): gnas su khyer bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yul der rlung dmar nag po dang ser po dang 'dres pa ldang zhing dus dus su me'i char pa 'bab pa dang / sra g.yo ba dang / bur sgra dang / tu gcom dag kyang 'byung bar
536a2(skyes rabs): 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po des skya rengs shar ba'i tshe 'di ltar dge slong thams cad kha btag pa mthong nas/ mya ngan gyi gdungs pa'i rgyus mig res 'ga' ni mthong res 'ga' ni mi mthong bar 'gyur ba bzhin du myong lnga/ gtsug

536a6(skyes rabs): shing dang / rgyun dang sbrang rtsi thams cad kyang nub par 'gyur ro// bdud dbang sgyur zhes bya ba yang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ de nas na so dang gro dang 'bras thams cad nub par 'gyur te/ dza m+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi zas su sreng

537a1(skyes rabs): gsum na mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams dus ji tsam zhig na nub// sus ni bshig/ mthar ji ltar mchi ba bshad cing lung bstan

538a1(skyes rabs): phul te/ dge 'dun ril gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du khya bltas song ba las/ yul phu shran gyi rong du gcan pa dang phrad da mA bAkye'o// lam gzhan yod na song zhig ces zer tI/ de'i tshe bai shwa

539a1(skyes rabs): 'dus nas rgyal po la gsol te/ rgyal khams su ban de ril gyis mi gnas par gros chud nas kun bskrad pa las gdong dmar gyi dge slong khros te/ dge slong 'di rnamasu bskang na bdag cags

542a2(skyes rabs): bar du dgung lo gcig bzhin dpyid dang / dbyer dang / stone'u zin gyi dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal gyi dgung bdun bdun gyi bar gong du sros pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa klog cing thugs dam bskul bya dang / bsngo col rgya cher bgyid/
542a3(skyes rabs): mchod rten chen po brgyad la yul ser skya'i grong / khyer lum pa'i tshal du mchod rten chen po gcig yul ma ga d+ha rgyal po'i khab chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par byang chub pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig yul ma ga
