542a5(skyes rabs): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa'i sa mchod rten chen po gcig/ yul ka shrI ba ra NA swa'i grong khyer gyi drung gi'i dwags kyi tshal du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig/ yul ko sa la mnyan du
542a6(skyes rabs): yid pa'i grong khyer du sar bdud sde dgu bcu rtsa drug pham par mdzad nas cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig/ yul ba sa sang ga sha'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yul nas gshegs
542b1(skyes rabs): pa'i sar+ya mchod rten chen po gcig/ gyad yul rtswa mchog gi grong khyer shing sa zung gi 'og tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcis/ bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po brgyad la ra ma gra ma ka'i yul du
542b2(skyes rabs): rten chen po gcig/ pA ba'i yul du ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ kyang yul na ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ yangs pa'i yul na ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po ga TIgal pa'i yul ni
542b3(skyes rabs): bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ beny+tsa dA pa'i yul na ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ ser skya'i yul na ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ rgyal po nA ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen cika/ lI yul gyi
542b4(skyes rabs): rgyurgya sa dang / gdug lag khung dang / dge 'dun sde gnyis kyi gladus ni gnar thog ma sangs rgyas 'odod srungs 'jig rten na byung ba'i tshe li yul yang de tsam na yul du gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang ches bgyid/ slad kyi
542b5(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi chos bstan pa gzhag pa nub pa'i tshe/ li yul gyi mchos kyang zhig nas drang song kha ra shA dang / khA re'u steng zhes bgyi ba la sogs drang srong mang po sun mi ring ba zhig tu la yul phyogs kyi ri tsa
542b6(skyes rabs): dag na gnas te/ des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid bgyid pa las slad gyi drang srong de rnams la mi ngan kha cig gis gcis nas rngan chan bgyis bkur sti dang rim gro ma bgyis pas drang srong de rnams kyang mi dga'
543a1(skyes rabs): rgyu ldanamakha' ljong sa nas sprul gan du mchag rngan ca rna ma su bya ma rnams pa chos la ma dang de lta ba log pa sgyu / klu rnam smye ga smran rgyun cha
543a2(skyes rabs): yul yang mAd+mor gyur to// sman ring mo zhig tu mtsho mchis mchis pa la las skad kyi yang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rgya gar yul du byung ste/ sems can gyi don mdzad cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs bya
543a3(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa rnams mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa nye bar zhig gi dustu na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te zla ba'i snying po
543a4(skyes rabs): gsungs pa'i tshe yulA khama? srA so sde'i mgon po dang / wA k+Sha la sogs pa srung ma rnams la gtad pa'i dus na lI yul yang lung bstan te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /
543a5(skyes rabs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lho re bu mi blo rab brtan dang / lha mo 'phrog ma lnga sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la gtad nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang 'khor rnam bzhi 'bum
543a6(skyes rabs): phrag du ma dang na mkha' la ldings nas li yul du gshegs te/ de ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen po bzhugs pa'i thad kar mtsho'i steng du tal bdun srid tsam gyi gnam 'phang gi na mkha' la pad+ma'i gdan la
543b1(skyes rabs): bzhugs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sngo so'i nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis li yul byin gyigyi brlab pa'i slad du bskul ba'i 'od zer phyogs su khyab par gtang / phyogs btsu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin /
543b2(skyes rabs): gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lo yul byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas sangos rgyus shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dngo yul bsrung zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i
543b3(skyes rabs): sngags kyi snying po dang / 'od zer btang nas dus gcig tu sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug tu 'dus par byin gyis brlabs nas dgra'o zhes bya bo'i sgra chen po 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang
543b4(skyes rabs): li yul mtshor gyur pa 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad nas/ 'od zer de dag las chu'i kha ro pad+ma sum brgya drug cu rje gsum byung / pad+ma re re'i khar yang me mararu kha re re byung / de nas 'od zer de dag gcig tu 'dus nas chab kyi
543b5(skyes rabs): steng du g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor nAs chu'i dkyil du nub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi sras la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis mang sa ra Ne par pa ta zhes
543b6(skyes rabs): bya ba'i ri snag gi kha dog 'dra ba'i mtsho 'di drol zhig ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i gseg shang gi rtsa ba dang / rnam thos sras kyis mdung rtses mtsho dral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang glang mgo'i
544a1(skyes rabs): ri'i steng na sku gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i g.yon logs kyi lha khang gi nA na dA ltar mchod rten chung ngu zhig bzhugs pa'i sar sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i slad du dgung bdun de na bzhugs
544a2(skyes rabs): so// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer dang / pad+mo dang / me mar 'di dag snang bar 'gyur/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di rnams gcig/
544a3(skyes rabs): tu 'dus nas g.yas lcogs su lan gsum bskor nas/ chab kyi dkyil du nug dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ shA rI'i bu'i gseg shing gri rtsa ba dang / rnam thos sras kyis mdung rtses
544a4(skyes rabs): mtsho dral bas phyis mtsho bskams nas da mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yul khri yul zhes bya ba 'di 'byung ste/ 'od zer lan gsum 'khor ba'i sa re ni kho ra khor yug tu phyis bu then gyis khar lnga ldan gyi grong khyer chen
544a5(skyes rabs): po rtsig par 'gyur ro// chu'i dkyil du 'od zer nub pa'i sar ni yul byin gyis rlob cing sung ba'i rA gra ma'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ngas tsan dan gyi nang du su'i grib ma nub par byin gyis brlabs te byas pa zhig rgya
544a6(skyes rabs): gar yul nas na mkha' las gshegs te bzhugs par 'gyur ro// chu'i nang na pad+mo dang me mar byung ba'i sar ni phyis theg pa chen po spyod pa'i dge slong pho mo gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang sum brgya drug cu rtsa gsum
544b1(skyes rabs): rgyal po la sogaspu yon bdag dad pa can rnams kyis brtsigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge slong pho mo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu dang khyim pa
544b2(skyes rabs): skye bo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste lnga brgya rtag tu gnas so// gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i tshe sa la rgyas par spyod pa phal cher gnas te/
544b3(skyes rabs): ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khud pa yin no// zhes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang / rnam thos kyi
544b4(skyes rabs): sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dog shes dang / rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje lham dral dang / lha klu la sogs pa la dus thams cad du srungs shig par de bzhin gshegs pas
544b5(skyes rabs): gtad do// de nas po tsam ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpalnga dang / byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / namakha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mthu chen dang /
544b6(skyes rabs): sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang / rnam thos sras 'khor gnod sbyin sum stong dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes 'khor khri phrag bcu dang / lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor stong dang / nam mkha'i spyan
545a1(skyes rabs): 'khor brgyad stong drang / lha'i bu gser phyeng 'khor lnga brgya dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas dros po 'khor stong dang / lha mo lcags kyu can 'khor stong phrag bcu dang / lha mo gnas ldan ma 'khor
545a2(skyes rabs): lnga stong dang / rigs kyi bu o dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhonu rdo rje sde dang / lce'i bu blo rab brtan dang / lha mo 'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam tshig bcas nesA lci yul
545a3(skyes rabs): bsrung bar zhal gyu ba zhes te/ dang sangs gi bar du yang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di brgyad dang / rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa'i mgon po dang / lha dang / klu dang lha mo rnams thog ma sangs rgyas gau to shan du
545a4(skyes rabs): gshegs te 'khor mung 'os bskor nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams dang / mgon po dang lha klu rnams ga la bzhugs babyugs pa'i gnas dang / dam tshig blangs pa'i sar da dung yang yul srung
545a5(skyes rabs): zhing byin gyis rlob/ mngon rtaklas dang / mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / de namA sangs rgyu sna mya ngan 'das nas dgung lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu rgya gar gyi rgyal po d+harmA A sho ka zhes bgyi ba zhig sngon sems can mang
545a6(skyes rabs): po zhig bsum pa las slad kyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa ya sho zhes bgyi ba zhig gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ sngar sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags/ slad kyi mi bgyi bar yang yi
545b1(skyes rabs): dam bcas/ dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams su mchod pa bgyid cing / dogs byin can gnyen po byin gyis brlabs pa mchis su
545b2(skyes rabs): 'tshal du gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong rtsig tu mchis pa las mtsho bskams nas li yul yang stong du mchis pa'i tshe// da ltar bu then gyi sku mkhar mchis pa'i dog sngar kus po yon du shul
545b3(skyes rabs): phyungs nas rgongs gcig btab pa'i nub mo rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las khye'u mtshan dang ldan pa bzang po zhig btsas nas/ sngon rgyal po'i btsun mo de kun dga' ra ba'i skyed mos tshal du mchis pa las/ rdzing bu'i nang na
545b4(skyes rabs): khrus bgyid cing mchis pa'i dus na rnam thos spos 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha' la gshegs pas kyang yas gzigs/ rgyal po'i btsun mos kyang rnam thos kyi sras byang bzhin bzang po mthong bas sems kyi bur chags
545b5(skyes rabs): pis kuswA bu yin du btsas nas/ rgyal po d+har+m+ma a sho kas ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste/ bu tsha 'di'i tshe ring ngam thung dang / mtshan ma bzang ngan dang / dbang thang ci yod ces brtags na/ ltas mkhan rnams kyis mchid
545b6(skyes rabs): nas bu 'di mtshan ma yang bzang / dbang thang yang rab tu che ste/ mi tha mal pa ma lags pas rgyal po yab sku tshe ma 'phos par rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po d+har+m+ma a sho ka phrag dog skyes te
546a1(skyes rabs): khros nas/ kho de ltar dpung thang chen kho bdag 'tsho zhing srid 'dzin grang / 'di nga la mi dgros kyis bor cig ces mchis nas/ mas kyang bu 'di mi bor du ni rgyal po khro zhing drag shul che bas bu bkum
546a2(skyes rabs): du dogs nas mas bu de bor ba las/ slad k+Shi sa la nu ma byung nas de 'tshul pA las maM gum nas mi yang phyis sa nur btags so// de'i rjes lA r+m+ma r+N+Na byang chub sems dpa' chen po bu stong dbang ba cig byung ste/ de la bu dgu
546a3(skyes rabs): brgya dgu cu rtsa dgu ni mchis na/ stong du bu gcig gis ma tshang bas/ rnam thos kyi sras la gsol ba btab ste/ skangs po las rnam thos kyi sras kyi suM boltas pa na khye'u sa mu bsod nams can bor ba mthong nas blangs te rgya
546a4(skyes rabs): rnordo bu skol du stsal/ de nas rgyu rjes bu de bsos nas slad kyis khye'u chen por skyes nas rgyu'i bu spun dang byis pa rtsa rtse ba las 'thabs nas khyod kyi rje'i bu ma yin no zhes bgyis pa dang / khye'u de glog pa mi dga' nas
546a5(skyes rabs): maM gzhan dag la yang lo rgyu sa smras na yang de ltar gyur nas/ rgyu rjel bdag thog sa skyes pa'i yul tsho lA/ sa tshol du mchi bar ci gnang zhes gsol ba las/ rgyu rje'i zhal nas khyod do'i bu yin te/ yul sa yang
546a6(skyes rabs): 'di yin mi dga' ba ma byed cig ces lan du ma bsgo ba las mnyan nas rgya rje'i rgyal bu sa nu rgyal po'i thabs stsal te/ dmag stong phrag bcu dang bsgrags ti nub phyogs su yul tshol/ sa tshal du btang ba
546b1(skyes rabs): yas li yul gyi me skar du phyin tA/ de nas phyin pa las rgya gar yul nas kyang rgyal po d+har+m+ma a sh+lo ka'i blon po ya sha zhes bgyi ba la dku dUr nas/ blon po ya shwa spyad spyan rje khol 'khor yun chung rgyal po lA ma
546b2(skyes rabs): dga' ba bdun stong yul nas b+h+yong ste/ nub phyogs shAr phyogs su yul tshol/ sa tshol du mchis mchis pa las/ 'u then gyi shul chub gong skyo'i yul phyogs su mchis pa dang rgyal bu sa nu'i khor gyi tshod gler brgya
546b3(skyes rabs): pa dang / zang bgyi ba gnyis la ba sdum thun mong pa gcig mchis pa las/ pa bu nud langs nas me skar nas zhugs ngam thang kar rtol te to lar bros pa los/ mi de gnyis kyis rjes bzhin du 'das pa las te lar slebs
546b4(skyes rabs): t+ye/ pa be'u 'brangs pa lAs yul de'i mau yang bA be'u 'brangs pa'i sa 'bru so lo ny+ra zhes btags/ to la'i zhugs dmas kyi ming yAng yi skad du shes bzang zhes btags te de nas mig gnyis kyis ltas na/ yul
546b5(skyes rabs): ljongs stong phye bzang po zhig gda' nas 'di bdag cig rgyu le pus nu'i yul ser rung dro zhes mchi sna gros su 'tshal nas yul sa de lta zhing mchis mchis pa dang / 'u then gyi shel chab gong mar mchis pa dang / blon po
546b6(skyes rabs): yig shi'i 'khor dang mjal nas khyed su'i yi ga las mchis zhes smras pa dang / mi de gnyis kyis kyang rgyal bu sa nu'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang / ya shas kyang rgyal bu sa nu me skar na mchis pa'i steng du
547a1(skyes rabs): nyas phrin pa las/ khyod ni rgyal rigs bdag ni blon po'i rigs na chu srid cig tu 'tham ste/ khyod kyis ni rgyal po byas/ bdag gi blon po byas te/ 'u then gyi ljongs 'dir yul sngar btsugs
547a2(skyes rabs): na rung ngo zhes mchis nas/ de nas rgyal bu sa nu yang 'khor dang bcas t+ye'u then gyi shel chu gong mar mchis nas char 'di nya'i 'og yul hong gu dzo zhes bgyi bar mA tral te/ rgyal bu dang blon po ya shaM gnyis yul
547a3(skyes rabs): sa ma la dum ste/ dmag bkye ste 'thabs paM las na mkha' las rnam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo byung nas bshugs te/ 'thab tu ma stsal nas/ dog sa de nyid du rnam thos kyi sras dang dpal gyi lha mo bzhugs
547a4(skyes rabs): pa'i steng khang+ga ra re brtsegs pa yang dang snang gri byar du mchis te/ yul gyi srung myur gtso bo rnam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo mchod pa yang de lags/ de nas rgyal bu s+yA nu dang / blon po ya sha yang du ma
547a5(skyes rabs): nas saM nus ni rgyal bu bgyis/ ya shas ni blon po bgyis nas rgyal po sa nu'i 'khor brgya rnams ni'u then gyi shel chu 'og ma man chad mdo la skor dang / skam shing yan chang du bkod / blon po ya sha'i 'khor rgya gar
547a6(skyes rabs): rnams ni shal chu gong ma yan chad rgya dang / kong zheng man chad du bkod/ shel chu dbus ni rgya gar dang rgyu'i blon po dang / 'bangs stod rims 'dres par bkod nas yul btsugs mkhar brtsigs te/ rgya gar dang rgya
547b1(skyes rabs): phrad pa'i yul ni li lags te/ 'phral skad ni rgya gar dang rgyar mi mthun pa// yi ga ni rgya dang pags kyis mthun/ 'jig rten pa'i lugs ni rgya dang phal cher mthun/ chos kyi lugs dang chos skad ni rgya gar dang pal
547b2(skyes rabs): cher mthun/ li'i 'phral skad ni thog ma byang chub sems dpa'o 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi dge slong gi tshul du sprul nas/ mtshan bai ro tsa na zhes bgyi bas byis pa phyugs rdzi khye'u 'dzes dang / mu le 'dzi zhes bgyi ba
547b3(skyes rabs): gnyis la sogs pa la yul tsar ma zhes bgyi bar li skad phyung ste/ kun la bslabs nas khye'u de gnyis kyang gir mchis pa'i chas su la yang ma mchis te/ li skad kyang thig ma 'phags pa rnams kyis bstan cing
547b4(skyes rabs): bslabs pA las/ thog ma li yul byung nas dgung lo du ldan pa ni 'ge'u ton shan gyi mkhan po myo chu daM shi la sogs pa mkhan po bgros rim rnams kyis mkhan po snga rabus rnams bka' mchid thos pa dang / 'phags
547b5(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa dang / li rje'i rgyal rabs kyi yi ge dang zhib tu brtags nas/ gna' thog ma rgya gar yul du rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po bgyis pa nas brtsis ni rgyal po ma skyes dugras spyir dgung lo
547b6(skyes rabs): sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyal po bgyis pa las/ rgyal srid gzung ste dgung lo lnga lags pa las sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das/ de tshun chad dgung lo nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyal po bgyis te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra nas rgyal
548a1(skyes rabs): po d+harmA a sho ka'i bar du rgya gar gyi rgyal po rabs bcus rgyal srid gzung ste/ d+harmA a sho kras spyir rgyalnga po dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga bgyis pa las rgyal por zhugs nas dgung lo sum
548a2(skyes rabs): cu lags pa'i 'og tu rgyal bu sa~M nu btsas te/ sa nu dgung lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe rgyo rje'i rgyal thabs brtsal nas/ thog ma skyes pa'i yul tshal/ se tshol du mchis pa las/ rgyal po s+ya nu dgung lo bcu dgu lon
548a3(skyes rabs): paM'i tshe li yul btsugs te/ thog ma rA li rjer zhugs pa yan chad zhib tu brtsis nas sangs rgyas mya ngan lus 'das nas dgu lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lags nas li yul yang gdod byung byer 'gyur/ rgyal bu
548a4(skyes rabs): sa nu thog mar li rjer zhugs nas rgyal srid gzung ste yul tshun chad dang / li rje btsan bzang btsun la brtan thog mar li rjer bskos nas li DA'i rabs lnga bcu rtsa drug dang / phyag tshab cig byung ngo // gna' dang po
548a5(skyes rabs): mtsho bskams nas rgyal bu sa nu dang / blon po yA sha la sogs pas thog mar gzhi gzung ste yul btsugs rgyal bu s+ye nu'i bu rgyal po ye'u la zhes bgyi bas 'u thun gyi dngor ldan gyi grong khyer brtsigs te/ li yul
548a6(skyes rabs): byung nas dgung lo brgya drug cu rtsa lnga 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal bu ye'u la'i rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi bas rgyal por zhugs nas dgung lo lnga legs nas li yul du thog mar chos byung ste/ 'jam dpal
548b1(skyes rabs): dang byams pa gnyis kyis lI yul 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi khud pa lags par thugs su chud nas byams pa ni mir skye ba blangs te/ rgyal po bI dza ya swam b+ha zhes bya ba sprul/ 'jam dpral ni dge
548b2(skyes rabs): slong 'phags pa bai ro tsa na'i gzugs su sprul nas lus dang nyon mongs pa mthar phyin pa'i gnas yul tsaurar+ya la ts+tsha le'i tshal du gshegs te/ lnga yul na mchis pa'i sems can rnams kyi nga ge ba'i bshes gnyen
548b3(skyes rabs): mdzad cing li skad kyang byis pa phyugs rdzi rnams la bcos shing bstan/ li'i yi ge yang bslabs nas de'i 'og tu ches byung ngo // de nas rgyal po ye'u la'i rgyal po byi dza ya sam b+has yon tan bdag bgyis nAs dge
548b4(skyes rabs): ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa bai ro tsa nA'i slad du thog myur li yul du tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang chen po brtsegs par bgyid pa las li n+de bri dza yas ma b+ha ba'i blon po dang 'bangs 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis
548b5(skyes rabs): kyang tsA ra mAr gtsug lag khang re re brtsigs par gsol nas rtsig pa mang po zhig byung ba las rgyal pos bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang rtsig tu ma stsal na ni bdag la dngos sdig du 'gyur/ de snyed brtsigs na ni
548b6(skyes rabs): slad kyis zhig ral du gyur na yang mi slongs su glo ba chud nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa bai ro tsa na la zhus pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram su la bzhugs pa rnams kyis gtsug
549a1(skyes rabs): lag khang dang / mchod rten rtsigs shig ces bsgo na sdig tu mI 'gyur zhes byung nas/ rgyal pos kyang blon po dang 'bangs rnams la de bzhin du bsgo nas tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang chen po bi dza ya
549a2(skyes rabs): sam b+ha bas brtsigs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i 'kho dang blon po dang 'brangs rnams kyi tsar gtsug lag khang chung ngu dang / mchod rten brtsigs so 'tshal gyi nang na shA ri ra ma ma stsalA pa TIg kyang ma mchis te/ gtsug
549a3(skyes rabs): lag khang brtsigs pa lags na/ 'phags pa bai ro tsa nas rgyal po bi dza ya sa ma b+ha ba la rgyal pos gaN+DI brdung la 'phags pa rnams spyan drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang / rgyal po'i mchid nas de bzhin gshegs pa
549a4(skyes rabs): mngon sum du 'dir gshegs te bdag gi lag tu gaN+Di ma stsal gyi bar du bdag gaN+Di mi brdung ngo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge slong ba ro tsa nas na mkha' la de bzhin
549a5(skyes rabs): gshegs par sprul te/ nyan thos chen po bcu drug dang thabs cig tu cir mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas rgyal po bi dza sam b+ha ba'i lag tu gaN+DI stsal nas rgyal pos gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / dgung
549a6(skyes rabs): bdun gyi bar du gaN+DI de'i sgra ma chad par byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon sum du gshegs pa'i dam rtags su gor ma la zhabs kyis bcags pa'i rje sa da dung gi bar du tsar ma na mchis/ 'phags
549b1(skyes rabs): pa nyan thos chen po bcu drug la mchod pa rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i bshos cha bcu drug rgyal pos phul ba yang tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'phags pa rnams kyis gter du stsal te/ phyir dus
549b2(skyes rabs): dmas shing dge 'dun lnga yon bdag ma mchis te 'tsho ba'i sbyor ba'i dus na rin po che'i bshos cha de rnams de'i tshe sa'i 'og nas 'byung zhes 'phags pa dge 'dun 'phel gyi lung bstan pa dag las kyang 'byung / dge slong
549b3(skyes rabs): 'phags pa bai ro tsa na'i mchod pa'i rgyan du klu'i rgyal po tu lor zhes bgyi bas kha che'i yul nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gcig spyan drangs nas nA mkha' las gshegs pa
549b4(skyes rabs): da ltar cor ma na bzhugs ta/ mchod rten 'di dri gtsang khang gi nang na bzhugs te/ mchod rten rol tu gsal bar 'byung / rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi ba tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa
549b5(skyes rabs): las sku gzugs lngar so bgyis pa cig mchog cing gshegs par mthong nas mtshams med pa lnga byang ngo zhes mchi ba yang da ltar bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang de'i srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa yang / lha na mkha'i
549b6(skyes rabs): spyan dang / nor bu bzang po zhes bgyi ba lags te/ deng sang gi bar du mngon rtags dang / mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / 'phags pa'i lung bstan ngag kyang sbyar na yang thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams rtsigs pa yang
550a1(skyes rabs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon bdag 'phags pa sha stag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khyang dang / mchod rten bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung
550a2(skyes rabs): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas gnyen cing byin che rab ste/ thog ma li yul du gtsug lag khang byung ba yang 'di las snga pa ma mchis so// de nas tsar mAr
550a3(skyes rabs): 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge slong 'phags pa bai 'o tsa nas tshos phyung rgyal po bi dza ya s+ya ma b+ha bsdu gtsug lasarnga brtsig tshun chung rgyal po l-i rje rabs bdun g+hi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma rtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og
550a4(skyes rabs): tu rgya gar yul nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bud d+ha du ta dang / khA gr-i ta dang / kha ga drod dang bzhi byung ste/ 'ge'u to shan gyi Ar+ya sta nar bzhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang li rdzi bI dza ya bIR+ShA b+h+ya
550a5(skyes rabs): bar gyur te/ rgyal po de srog mkhar gyi steng nas bltas na mkhar gyi phyi rol nu gser dang / dngul lte bur snang ba zhig mthong nas bsgrags pa dang / da ltar 'gum ster gyi mchod rten chen po bzhugs pa sgrub nas lces
550a6(skyes rabs): na/ shi ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes su gyur to rgyal po kha smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa bzhin 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig cig pa'i rigs so zhes bgyi
550b1(skyes rabs): pa dang su'i phyir rtsig ces rgyal pos zhus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya zhes bgyi ba 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bud d+hA tA la sog sgra bzhi khyed kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'ongs pa 'di dag gi phyir brtsig
550b2(skyes rabs): ces bsgo ba dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag kyang rgyal po bi dza ya bIr+ya'i drung du byon nas chos bshad pas/ rgyal po yang tshe snga mu'i smon lam dran nas de ma thag tu dog sa brtag pa'i phur bu de ro btab ste/
550b3(skyes rabs): gtsug lag khang 'gum stir brtsigs so// de nas rgyal po bi dzA ya bIr+ya 'gume tir gyi gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa'i tshe bu chung ngu zhig ster nas rdzas bcas de btsal nus 'ge'u to shan gyi lung
550b4(skyes rabs): bu'i nang na sangs rgyas 'od srungs gyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung nus bu rnyed de/ de nas rgyal pos mchod rten 'di gang gis dus na sus brtsigs zhes smras pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags
550b5(skyes rabs): pa dang gri zhal na sngo mchod rten 'di sangs rgyas 'od srungs mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe ba rtsigs sangs rgya sa 'od srungs kyi sku gdung bzhugs so// li yul sngon mtshor gyur pa'i dus na mchod rten 'di ris g.yogs te
550b6(skyes rabs): tshus ma zhig la/ phyis kyang yul 'di mtshor 'gyur te/ yang mchod rten 'di ris g.yogs nas chus mi 'jig ste/ sangs rgyas byams pa byung ba'i tshe yang mtsho bskams nas yul du gyur pa'i dus na mchod rten
551a1(skyes rabs): 'di 'byung ste/ gnas 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa'i nang na yang 'ge'u to shan 'di pho brang gcig yin te/ dus gsum
551a2(skyes rabs): gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang kun 'dir gshegs shing lung ston/ sems can gyi don mdzad do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shu yang dus gsum du glang
551a3(skyes rabs): mgo ri 'di la mchod pa mdzad du byon nas slar gshegs so zhes bstan/ de nas rgyal po bi dza yaM bIr+ya dad pa'i shugs chen pos glang mgo ri'i steng du 'ge'u te shan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas bu
551a4(skyes rabs): chung ngu du yang thar par btang ste phyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas la yul du dgra bcom par gyur pa 'di las snga ba ma byung bas 'di ni lam ston pa'o// zhes mo chu bde shi bya bar btags te/ thog ma
551a5(skyes rabs): mo rku bde shi'i ming ni de nas byung ste/ dong sang gri bar du yang thub ldan dang / daklu' thub kyi mchog la su pad+ma sa te/ mo chu bde shir bsgo ba lags/ 'ge'u to shan drang 'bum tor gyi gtsug lag khang 'di
551a6(skyes rabs): gnyis bzhugs pa'i dog sa yang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rim gyis 'byung ngo 'tshal gyi zhabs kyis bcags byin gyis rlob pa'i steng du 'phag pa'i lung bston dag dang sbyar na yang thog mar
551b1(skyes rabs): gtsug lag khang 'di rnams rtsig pa yang dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang / yon bdag 'phags pa sha stag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhugs so// 'tshal gyi nang na de bzhin
551b2(skyes rabs): gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas gzhan zhing byin che rab ste/ gtsug lag khang gi srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa
551b3(skyes rabs): yang rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas dris po lags te deng sang gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma gang dag kyang 'byung ba'i phyir/ li yul
551b4(skyes rabs): gyi gtsug lag khang bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na gtso bor bgyi ba lags/ rgyal po bi dzA bIr+yA ste 'gum+b+ha tir gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun chung rgyal po rab gnyis kyi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan
551b5(skyes rabs): ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bI dza ya dza zhes bgyi bas rgya rje'i bu mo bu nye shwa ra zhes bgyi ba mchis brang du blangs nas rgya rje'i bu mo dwe sA lI yul du srin bu'i sa bon zhig 'tshal te 'chis nas
551b6(skyes rabs): yul ma zha bgyi bar srin bu gsos pa dang srin bu ma tshar ba'i skabs su blon po sgyus ma 'tshal pa kha cig gis rgyal po bi dza ya dzaM ya rgyal po'i btsun mo bgyid pa des sbrul gdug pa mang po ma zhar gso
552a1(skyes rabs): zhing mchis te chen por gyur pa dang / yul phyogs su gnod par glo ba chung na ji ltar bgyi zhes blon po dag gis zhus pa dang / sprul gso ba'i khang par me thong lnga kun bsregs shig
552a2(skyes rabs): ces bsgo ba dang rgyal mos de thos nas 'phral du ni rgyal po la rgyus kyis bshad pa'i rngo mi thog nas/ srin bu shas shig bkus te gsang thabs su bsos te/ slad kyi kha cher dar dang / srin bal phyung nas dar
552a3(skyes rabs): dang men 'dri gtugs te/ rgyal po la bsten rgyal po la bstan nas rgyus kyi zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po la 'gyod pa skyes twa/ rgya gar yul nas dge slong 'phags pa sang g+ha go Sha zhes bgyi ba li yul du
552a4(skyes rabs): byon+da nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen du spyan drangs te/ srin+d+ra bu phal cher bkum pa'i drangos sdig pu shogs sbyang bgyis nos po tar+ya dang / ma zhwa'i mchod rten dang / gtsug lcag khang chen po brtsigs te/ de
552a5(skyes rabs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shA ri ra mo mang po tsam zhig stsal te/ de'i slad du dpyid zla ra ba'i dro thog thag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan mo zho po tar+ya zhes bgyi ba'i gtsukA lcag
552a6(skyes rabs): khang na bzhugs so zhes 'phags pa dag gis lung bstan pa'i deng sang gi bar du yong la yul gyi dge 'dun sde gnyis dang / rgyal po dang blon po man chad 'bangs yan chad lo re zhing dpyid zla ra pa'i ngo la
552b1(skyes rabs): mchod par bgyid cing / ril gyis po tAR+Sha'i gtsug lag khang du mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyan zhing byin tshe rab ste/ wA rad+ha na b+hA ra dang rad na shwa rA gnyis srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa lags
552b2(skyes rabs): te/ de sang bar du dngos rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung ngo // de nas rgyal po bi dzA ya dzA ya nAs bgyi ba la bu stan+do gsum mchis te/ pho bo rab 'don 'das shes bgyi ba ni rgyal srid ma 'tshal te/ bsod nams
552b3(skyes rabs): bgyid cing rgya gar yul du mchis/ de'i nu bo bar ma yang rgyal srid ma tshal nas pan der zhugs so// mi d+har+m+ma n+dan de zhes btags nas rgya gar yul du chos slob tu mchis/ nu ba tha chung rgyal sar zhugs te/ ming
552b4(skyes rabs): bi dza ya d+har+m+ma ra btags rgyal po bi dza ya d+harmA de dpa' zhing rtsal che bas gsod rkyen dgra la dga' nas/ phro bo bin+d+he d+harmA nAn dA rgya gar yul na mchis pa chos mnyan bslabs bsgoms pas 'phags pa dgra bcom
552b5(skyes rabs): par gyur tAM/ 'phags pa d+harmA na na das rgya glar yul naswa bltas na/ nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya d+harmA gsong rkyen bgyid cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la zhen par mthong nas glo ba brjes te/ dgra ba'i bshos
552b6(skyes rabs): gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du rgya gar yul nas li yul du mchis te/ nyen bgyir gyi ri rtsa shel chab 'og ma dang nye ba zhig tu skyil bu bgyis te de na bsgom zhing bzhugs pa las/ nyin gcig cig 'phags pa
553a1(skyes rabs): de shrA bA gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba zhig tu sprul te/ 'u then gyi su mkhar gyi slad rol shar phyogs lcog sa na 'gus no zhes bgyi ba'i sbrang bu zhig mchis pa'i khar byung ba dang / rgyal ba
553a2(skyes rabs): bi dza ya d+har+m+ma sa srog mkhar gyi sbyang nas mthong nas mda' 'phangs po dang / sha ba'i boR+Ya ra phrog nas/ sha ba ni bros/ rgyal pos ni skad bzhin du bsnyegs pa dang / sha ba de 'phags pa d+harmA nAnA dA'i spyil bu'i
553a3(skyes rabs): nang du mchis// rgyal po slad bzhin du mchis pas bltas na skyil po'i nang nA sha ba ni cang ma mchis/ dge slong gcig brla la mangs phog pa 'byin cing mchis pa mthong nas/ pho bo lags par ni ngo ma 'tshal te/
553a4(skyes rabs): pho bo dge slong d+harmA nan+tus byin gyis brlabs nas pho bo lags par gnong ngo 'tshal te/ rgyal pos btsun pa ci nongs zhes bgyis pa dang / khyod kyis bdag la mda' 'phangs te ci bya zhes bgyis pa dang rgyal pos kyang
553a5(skyes rabs): sha ba ma lags par cher nos bdag gis nong sa na khri lan zhes bgyis pa dang / dge slong de'i mchid na sang khyod kyis po po yin/ gnyis su nang 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur pas rgyal po khyod kyi mtshar gyi
553a6(skyes rabs): sdig pa thob ste/ mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i las byas par 'gyur te/ bshags sbyangs dang bsod nams cher ma byas na mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po de yang 'gyod pa skyes te rab tu ma dga' nas
553b1(skyes rabs): 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i zhabs la 'jus te/ bzod pa gsol bshags sbyangs bgyis nas bdag gi sdig pa 'di ji ltar 'byung zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa d+harmA na na da'i zhal nas 'phrul gzhan byar med kyi
553b2(skyes rabs): yul 'dro tir zhes bya'i ba'i ltongs pa bi na sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe rgyal po zla 'od bgyid pa'i dus na bram zes mgro blangs te/ rgya lnga nyid kyis mgo bcang
553b3(skyes rabs): nas bram ze la stsalo ba'i phreng yig las dke'u ba rnam pa gcig mdzad pa'i sa 'di yin/ gnyis su nA bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khyab bya rgod phung po ni sa li yul byin gyis rlob cing / 'ge'u to shan du
553b4(skyes rabs): gshegs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang pos bskur nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dar+ye/ ri k+She ta oM sha~M ka zhes bya ba 'di byon gyis brlabs te 'di na bzhugs bzhugs/ deng sang gi bar
553b5(skyes rabs): yang gzugs brnyan 'od bzhugs/ rnam pa gsum du na 'bod b+ha long zhes bye ba'i tshal chung ngu pha bi na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis bcags nas phyis 'phags pa 'byung bla rnams kyi sgom par byin gyis brlab
553b6(skyes rabs): te/ gnas 'di rnams srung bar lha dzi na ri sha ba dang / lha mo a sho ka dang / klu'i rgyal po taMk+Sha ka dang gsum gyis dam tshigs blangs te/ deng sang gi bar du yang gnas 'di srung zhing rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag
554a1(skyes rabs): khang gcig brtsigs na snga phyi'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa 'byung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya d+harmA ngang pa skyes nus/ slan cad gaslong rgyan mi bgyid par dam bcas rgyal po zla
554a2(skyes rabs): 'od kyi bram ze la mgo sbyin gtong du bgyis bro'i ser de ma thag tu ngog sa brtags pa'i phur bu byAtab nas dge ba'i bshes grwanyen sa gas pa d+har+m+ma nAMn+d+ra'i sbrang du 'dro tir gyi mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khung chen po
554a3(skyes rabs): brtsigs/ sku mkhor gyi nang du yang lho sgo'i sge'u chung mchis pa'i nad logs na klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru Na'i gnas kyi steng na pa ri tha zhes bgyi ba'i mchod rten gnyen po bzhugs pa'i drung na nang gi gtsug
554a4(skyes rabs): lag khang ga cig dang / mchod rten chen po gcig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi nang du dezhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung stsal/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi thog ma'i sku gdung mang zhig pa nyid spyan drangs te/ de ltar
554a5(skyes rabs): gtsug lag khang 'di'i nang na bzhugs 'dro tir gyi gtsug lag khang 'di yong gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ dong sang gi bar du yang mngon rtogs dang mtshan ma 'byung ngo // li yul du thog ma ma hA sam g+hi ka'i sde yang
554a6(skyes rabs): dge slong 'phags pa d+harmA nan+da byung nas 'u thon na 'dro tor gtogs par gtsug lag khang brgyad dang / kam shing gtsug lag khang kha brgyad kyi dge 'dun yang ma hA sa ma g+hi ka'i sder gtogs// de nas de'i 'og
554b1(skyes rabs): tu rgyal po pi dzaM ya'i bu chen po rgyal bu 'don 'bros kyis sang tir gyi gtsug lcag khang rtsig par dog sa 'jal te brtsams pa las yo byad rgyu rkyen gyi ma 'tshal nas rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyis bsams pa gzhan nas mya
554b2(skyes rabs): phrogs pa/ ma brkus pa dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la ma 'bags par nor gtsang ma bdag nyid kyis rkang gi btsugs te btsal l-i gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyim ni thog ma rgya gar yul du mchis twa/ mkhan po
554b3(skyes rabs): 'phags pa sa man ta sid+d+hi mkhan por spyan drangasra/ stong phyogs thog thag tu yang mchis nas nor gtsang ma btsal/ de nas slar log nas rgya yul du mchis pa dang rje rgya rje'i blon po gcig gyad la chags te/ dgum par
554b4(skyes rabs): bgyis pa las/ 'don 'dres kyi rgya rje lnga blo na po 'di'i sbyin por bdag dgum par ci gnang gsol bya las rgyu rjes kyang gnang ste/ gshed mas rgyal bu la ral gris btab pA na bcad 'phro nAs 'o ma byung ste/ myu gum nas
554b5(skyes rabs): rgyuDI la sogs pa ngo tshar rmad du g+hur te mchod pa bgyis/ yon yang mang po tsam khrig pul blon po des kyang srog rin gyi yon+da phal cher phul ba blangs nas slar li yul gyi 'dab nye bar zhig tu 'khor mang po dang ldan
554b6(skyes rabs): cig tu mchis pa dang / rgyal po 'don 'dros kyi nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya d+harmA rgyal srid 'dzin cing mchis pa las/ blon po kha cig gi mchis nas rgyal bu'i gcen rgyal bu 'don 'dros rgya rjes yi yul gyi rgyal por
555a1(skyes rabs): bskos te/ rgyal po'i rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dz+nyA d+harmA yang pho bo bdon 'dros la mi dga' nas sku mkhrur gyi nang du yang btang phrad du yang ma btub nas/
555a2(skyes rabs): sang tir gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i sa gzhor mchis shig ces bskyo nas/ phu po rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyang sad tir du mchis te/ nu bos kyang chu dang rtswa shing la yang dbang ma bskur te/ kho bdag gi rin gyis
555a3(skyes rabs): 'jal te/ yo byad sbyor zhing mchis pa las/ thog ma rgya gar yul du mkhan po 'phags pa sa mun ta sing+ga d+hi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyogs bltas nas phyag 'tshal te mchod pa bgyis nas smon lam btag spyan
555a4(skyes rabs): drangs pa dang / mkhan po yang rgya gar yul nas na mkha' la ldings te/ li yul du rgyal 'don 'dros kyi drung du gshegs nas gtsugau lag khung ji ltar brtsigs pa'i bshes gnyen yang bgyis/ rgyal po spun gnyis
555a5(skyes rabs): bar du ma mjal ba'i sdums bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe lus kyi yan lag dang / bu smad la sogs bya'i
555a6(skyes rabs): sbyin gtong bgyis shing 'phrin las dka' bo ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du no laM zhes bgyi ba dang / zlos chos li yul du mi bgyi ro mi rung zhes lha rnams li yul sang tir bgyi bar gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom
555b1(skyes rabs): ldan 'das sngon phrin lngas dka' ba mdzad pa bzhin du lha rnam zlos chos bgyis pa'i tshe rgyalnga po rgyal pA bi dza yu d+har+m+ma sa blon po dang / 'phangs rnams la gcig kyang der mchir mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa las/ lha'i rol mo
555b2(skyes rabs): bzang po snga na me byung ba de thos nas mI gcig gis gcig spyan te ma bzod nas der mchis/ slad kyi rgyal po'i 'khyor kun gar mchis rgyal pos smras pa dang / blon po drug gis rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po
555b3(skyes rabs): bi dza ya d+harmA yang ma bzod de/ sang tir gyi gtsug lhag khang gro 'dabs mchis pa dang / phu bo rgyal po 'don 'dros kyi su nas spun dor mjal bi dang / nu ba rgyal pro bi sa d+harmA saM phu po la phyag bgyis nas/ pus mo sa
555b4(skyes rabs): la gtsugs thal mo sbyar te/ 'phags pa dag gris khyod kyi mthu stobs ma rig nas nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur nas bdag gis rab tu nongs pa bzod pa gsol zhing mchis na/ bdag la dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar
555b5(skyes rabs): bzod pa ba zhes par ci gonang zhes bgyis pa dang / des sbyor nu byo la bzod pa gsol nas lag sbrel te gtsug lag khang du mchis nas mchod pa bgyis/ khyA klus no le dgyis pa dang / gtsug lag khang rtsig pa las
555b6(skyes rabs): rjesu yi rang nas yon phul/ gtsug lag khang rtsig pa'i dan rogs bgyis te rkyen ris bkum ste phul/ thog ma spun ma mjal te/ bzod pa gsol ba'i sor 'ja' mo ka ka rai nga zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag
556a1(skyes rabs): khang gcig brtsigs nas/ thog ma li yul sarbA ti bAd kyi spu theg pa chung ngu pa yang mkhan po 'phags pA sa mna? ta sid+hi las byung / gtsug lag khang gI srung mu yang lha ka pri lA zhes bgyi byas
556a2(skyes rabs): zhal gyis bzhes bsrung / deng sang gi bar du lo gcig cing yang rtag tu ston zla ra ba tshes bdun dad brgyud kyi gdugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pAs 'phrin las dka' ba mdzad pa'i zlos chos no la bgyid de/ yul mA ril
556a3(skyes rabs): gyis chos nyan cing der mchis te/ gtsug ldeg khang 'di yang gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyid do// de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza y+ya d+harmA'i bu rgyal po bi dza yang sing has rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ ga 'dzag gi rgyal pos li
556a4(skyes rabs): yul du dmag drang sA te/ rgyal pa bi dzI y+ya sing ha drung 'thebs pa las go 'dzag gi drumag pham ste/ ga 'jug gi rgyal po yang li sa zhugs pas zin nas 'gum par bgyid pa las thar par gsol nas rgyal po
556a5(skyes rabs): bi dza yA sing ha'i mchid nas/ rgyal po khyod bdag gis mi dgum par thar par btang gis/ nam khyed dgra choms pa'i dus na bdag gri duge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing slar byin cig ces bgyis nas/ thar por stsal
556a6(skyes rabs): te/ ming yang A nan+da sai nar btogs te slar shu leg tu btang / de nas dge slong A nan+da se na slod kyis dgra choms nas thog ma le rje dang dam bcas pa bzhin na mkha' la ldings te/ li yul du gshegs nis
556b1(skyes rabs): rgyal po bi dzA ya sing ha'i dge bya'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du snying rje yang dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa a nan drA sa na'i slad du sum nya'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brtsigs te/ gtsug
556b2(skyes rabs): lcag khyung gi s+yAng m+b+ha rnams thos kyi srasa? dang / l+yA ka pi lA zhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gaN+DIn zhing byin che bar bgyid// de'i 'og tuM rgyal po br-i dza ya kIr tiswA 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sbrul ba kam
556b3(skyes rabs): sheng du chos spel ba'i dgra bcom pa s+ya br-i zhes bgyi bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis na sA dad pa skyes pa'i slad du pru nyo'i gtsug lug khang+ga brtsigs te/ thog ma ki nI ka'i rgyal po dang / gu zan gyi rgyal po dang /
556b4(skyes rabs): lci rje rgyal po bi dz+nye ya kIR+Sha ti la sogs pas rgya gar yul du dmag drangs nas so keng+ka ces bgyi ba'i grong khyer phab pa'i hU~M/ rgyal po bi dza yA kIr tis sh+tsa ri ram mang po zhig rnyed pa yang phru to'i mchod rten de'i nang du stsal
556b5(skyes rabs): thog mo drog sa rtog pa'i phur bu 'debs pa'i tsho/ rgyal po bo dza yA kI ra ti la dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa s+ya bri'i zhal nas phu bu 'di la rgyal pos lhag pa mas yArarA lan lngar byabs na sngon rtags 'byung
556b6(skyes rabs): ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang dog sa brtag pa'i shug pa'i phur bu lag pas lan lnga byabs pa dang / phur bu de la shug pa'i yal ga khru gang pa lnga de ma thag tu de'i nyin par skyes nas slad kyi shug pa'i
557a1(skyes rabs): drung du banA de dgra gi d+hArma klags pa dang shug pa dri las chos bshad pa'i sgra dag byung nas slad kyi ban du gzhon nu dag d+hArma thogs te chos nyan pa mchis na yang / de bzhin du 'chad pu skra dag
557a2(skyes rabs): byung ba las slad kyi ban de gcig gis d+harmA legs par klags nas de ltar ma yin no zhes lhas bsgo pa dang / gnyen nus de tshun chad chos bshad pa'o sgra yang ma byung / slad kyis gtsug lag khang 'di'i chab kyis
557a3(skyes rabs): 'tshal te chab ma byin nas gtsug lag khang zhig tu nye ba las/ dge slong btsun pa sum dpon zhes bgyi ba dgra tshams su nye ba zhig gis gtsug lag khang de mi zhig par bgyi ba'i slad du dgra bcom par 'grub pa'i dge
557a4(skyes rabs): pa'i rtsa ba des klur skye bar smon lam btab nas/ de mA tha ga tu lus las cheb byung nas mi'i lus ma 'phos par shal chu chung ngu'i klur gyur na dog sa'i 'og tu nub nas dang sang gi bar du gtsug lag khang de'i cha ba sh+yA ya chu chung ngu
557a5(skyes rabs): las drangs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang dang sang gi bar du zhig ste/ gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyid/ srung ma yang lha suM dza ya dang / phyag brnyan sing ha mu kha dang / shel chab chung ngu'i klu gsum pon gyis bsrung ngo // de nas
557a6(skyes rabs): de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya kIr ti bu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma zhes bgyi ba dpa' zhing rtsal che ba zhig byung nas/ phyi dgra mang po zhig la bsngos nas sems can phal cher bkum/ de'i 'og tu seng ge i la rgod pa zhig
557b1(skyes rabs): byung ste/ dmag gi btab na yang 'khums te rgyal po gcig pus+sa sang+ge de la brgal te zin nas bkum/ de nas rgyal po de'i ming yang seng+ger btags rgyal po de yang ri dgas shor du mchis pa las shel chab chung ngu'i
557b2(skyes rabs): 'gram du 'tshal zhig tu rgongs btab pa las/ de'i nub mo tshal de'i nang nas zhugs mar 'dra ba zhig rgyang nas bdas nas slad de nang par bltas na/ dge slong 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dz+nyA na ya sho de na bzhugs pa las
557b3(skyes rabs): byung bar mthong nas/ dad pa skyes te mchod pa bgyis nas 'phags pa 'di na ci mdzad ces zhus pa dang / dgra bcom pa dz+nyA na ya sho'i zhal nas sa 'di yang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa
557b4(skyes rabs): lags te/ rgyal bres 'dir gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig pa'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang 'phags pa de la dad pa skyes pa'i slad du bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan nas sdig bshagos/ gtsug lag khang
557b5(skyes rabs): gi dog sa brtag pa'i phur bu btab nas/ gser gyi gzhong pa gcig spyi bo la gzung ste/ de bdag gis brtsigs pa'i gtsug lag khang 'di yun du tshugs shing brtan par 'gyur na phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i 'phags
557b6(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bdag gi gzhong pa 'di'i nang du stsal bar cig nang zhes smon lam btab pa dang / na mkha' las shA ri ram mang po tsam zhig gzhong pa'i nang du
558a1(skyes rabs): gshegs nas rgyal po sngar bras lhag par dad pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ya sho'i slad du d+hArmA kI ra tis gtsug lag khang mchod rten chen po brtsigs te/ nang du shU ri ram
558a2(skyes rabs): mang po tsam zhig stsal bas gtsug lag khang 'di lang gAnyan zhing byin tsho bas srung ma rnam thos kyi sras drang / lha ke pa las srung // de nas rgyal po bI dzaM ya d+har+m+mas rgyal srid gzung ba man chad/ bau dzi ya
558a3(skyes rabs): kIr tis rgyal po bgyis pa yan tshed rgyal po rlabs bcu bzhi'i bar du res 'ga' ni yul du phye dgra gzhan gyis dmag drangs te gtses/ ras 'ga' ni lI rje dag gis yul gzhan du dam sa drangs nas 'bad
558a4(skyes rabs): kyi tshogs gyur/ do'i 'og tu d+yug+na ku A no shos kyi snA khyau yul du daM m+b+hagu drangs nas/ 'gai'u to sh+yena? man chad kyi gtsug lag khung phral cher myes basmai ga h+nu taM yul rma s+ya/ 'bangs 'gribs nas gtsug
558a5(skyes rabs): lag khang gsar pa rtsig pa'i rdzi ma thog/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza la kI ra ti'i bu rgyal po pi dza yaM sang gra ma zhes bgyi ba'i dgung lho bdun lon pa zhig rgyal por zhugs nas slad kyi mye seMn
558a6(skyes rabs): pa dang / yul 'di sus bshig/ ci'i slad du mis shes dge 'dun rgan rabs dang / blon po dag la smras pa las/ dge 'dun dang / blon po rnams kyang dru gu oM mo no shod la sogs pas sngon yul
558b1(skyes rabs): ji ltar bshig pa'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po pi dza ya sang gra mas blon po dag la dmag tshogs ci mchis pa sdus shig ces bsgo nas sngon gtses shing yul bshig pa'i rgyal po rnams yul
558b2(skyes rabs): du dmug drangs te/ lan glan nas yul bshig/ sems can phal cher bkum/ de nas slar log nas shel chab 'og ma'i 'gram du mchis pa dang / dge slong bdun zhig chab kyi nang du khrus bgyid cing rtsed
558b3(skyes rabs): mo sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin par byas pa dang / dge slong de bdun yang de dag ma thag tu namakha' la ljongs nas rgyal po de la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bcu drug bstan pa dang / rgyal
558b4(skyes rabs): po de'i yid la bdug gi sngar yang sems can mang po zhig srog bcod de bkum/ de yang 'phags pa dri rnams la ngan sems bskyed pa rab nyes so snyam pa'i 'gyod pa cher skyes/ 'phags pa de dag gi
558b5(skyes rabs): rdzu 'phrul rnam+b+ha sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas dad pa cher skyes nasna/ 'phags pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa'i drung du bsten nas mchod pa dang / bshags pa sbyangs bgyis bzod pa gsol nas/ 'phags pa
558b6(skyes rabs): dgra bcom po po nye na re ta la sogs pa 'phags pa bdun gyi phyir 'gu gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bdun gyis kyang dog sa de byin gyis brlabs nas zhi ba'i sa
559a1(skyes rabs): 'gu zhan ta zhes bgyi bar gtsug lag khang gi mtshan ma yang brtags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ lha dzo na ri sha ba dang / nor bu bzang po gnyis
559a2(skyes rabs): kyis bsrung ngo // de nus de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza yA sang gra mA'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi bas rgyal por zhugs nas dge ba'i bshos gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa d+har+m+ma ba la la 'phags
559a3(skyes rabs): pa khyod la rdzu 'phrul ci mnga' ba bdag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol pa las/ 'phags pa dro'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po bi dzA a sing ha dga' ldan du khrid de/ 'phags pa byams pa bzhugs pa'i
559a4(skyes rabs): gnos dang // zhal bstan nas slar mchis pa dang / rgyal pye bi dzA ya sing ha sa bzha' ser ma'i gaN+DIg lag khang brtsigs tAM/ dga' ldan+da na byams pa 'khor dang bcas po ji ltar bzhugs pa'i su
559a5(skyes rabs): gzugs bgyis/ slad gyi byams pa la mchod pa'i slad du mgon po dang / lha klu gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul ci 'dra ba mgon po'i rten khang gcig brtsigs nas mgon po dang / lha klu'i gzugs
559a6(skyes rabs): bgyis pa da dung bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ lha gangs can dang / 'brog gnas zhes bgyi bas bsrungs/ deng sang gi bar du mngon rtags dang mtshan ma
559b1(skyes rabs): dag kyang 'byung ngo // de nas de'i 'og tu yang rgyal po bi dzu ya man chad rgyal po rabs drug gi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs so// de nas de'i 'og tu yang rgyal po bI dza ya ba lA zhes bya ba'i bu
559b2(skyes rabs): rgyal po bi dzaM srang gra ma zhes bgyi ba rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ cu gu pan nas tshe'u pa na'i sku gzugs na mkha'u las ldings te li yul du gshegs pa rgyal pos mthong nas dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas
559b3(skyes rabs): bzhugs pa'i dri gtsang khang brtsigs/ de nas skad kyis rgyal po de'u then gyi su mkhar gyi steng gi byung sgo'i sgo kha na mchis pa zhig gi tshe na balkas nA sgo mkhar gyi slad rol na dge sbyong gcig khyim pa sgyo po
559b4(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal te bka' mching muchi ba mthong nas ngo mtshor du mthong ste/ rgyal po dris blon po gcig/ maung gas nas zhib tu rtog tu btang pa las/ blon po dri sde dge slong dang / skya bo la so sor rmad nas dge slong gi
559b5(skyes rabs): mchid nas khyim pa skya bo 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa lag shes mchi/ khyim pa skya bo de'i mchid nas dge slong 'di 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i sprul pa logs zhes mchi ba dang / blon po des
559b6(skyes rabs): kyang rgyal po sa de bzhin du slar gsol pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sau nga gram yang de ma thag tu 'phags pa de dag gi drung du bsnyen nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nas 'phags pa dag ga las
560a1(skyes rabs): gshegs zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa gnyis kyi zhal nas bdag cag nyis kyang shwar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sems can+da
560a2(skyes rabs): gyi don la 'dir ljongs so zhes 'byung ba dang / de nas rgyal po b+hi dza ya sang gra m+b+ha'i mchid nas 'phags pa thugs rje dang ldan pa gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobasdu de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs rtswa'i
560a3(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin du gnang nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i zhi la dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan pa dang / rgyal po des de bzhin
560a4(skyes rabs): gshegs pa'i sgra dang / stangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong / nA mkha' las shing rta'i steng nas sangs rgyas mang po zhig gshegs nas de dag gis 'od zer br-it+tad+ya ba rgyal po'i spyi bor reg par mthong ste/ dang
560a5(skyes rabs): pa'i shAgs kyi sangs rgyas kyis gzugs ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du gzugs su yang bgyis te/ shing rta'i nang du byung srung du yang drangs nus mchod pa chen po bgyis trA~M/ deng song gyi bar du yang dpyid zla ra ba
560a6(skyes rabs): yar gyi ngo la byang srang du sku gzugs chen po 'dren pa dang / dge 'dun sde gnyis spyan drangs nas byang chub 'byung gnas bkra shis bsil ba'i tshal du mchod ston gsol zhing / mo h+ya ri'i mchod po chen
560b1(skyes rabs): po bgyis pa yang rgyal po des bgyis nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa mo rgu de shi a ba ya thang gi slad du bzha' sang gre re ma'i gtsug lag khyang partsigs te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang / yang
560b2(skyes rabs): drag shes bgyi ba yang bsrung // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sha tra man chad rgyal po rlabs bzhi'i bar du gtsug lag khang gser pa gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po byi dza ya kIR+Ya ti zh-is bgyi ba 'gum
560b3(skyes rabs): tir du mchis pa las/ da ltar b+ha ba nya'i gtsug ldag khang bzhugs pa'i sur mchis pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zhig der byung nas rgyal po pri dza ya kIr ti la smras pa/ ston sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi tshe dog sA 'di byin gyis
560b4(skyes rabs): brlabas+t+ra nas gtsug lag khang rtsig pa'i sa 'di yin te/ da yang rgyal po khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig sa prA'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos skyon la mo btab pa/ da ltar dzamA bu'i gling ni 'phags
560b5(skyes rabs): ba dag gis byin gyis brlabs te 'drir gshegs par gnang na/ byadrag go gtsug lcag khang brtsig byar 'tshal lo zhes skyon+da lamu btab pa dang / de ma thag tu na mkhaT+wAM las 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bcu bdun
560b6(skyes rabs): gshegs nos rgyal po pi dza ya kI ra ti yang dad pa'i shugs chen po skyes nas/ rgyalo po dang btsun mo lag dar te/ b+ha ba nya'i bsgoms dang / gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang
561a1(skyes rabs): gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyid/ lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang nor bu bzang po bsrung / gtsug lag khang 'di yang gna' bod kyi mnga' ris su gtogs pa'i tshe 'gar blon btsun nyin
561a2(skyes rabs): gung ston li yul gyi dbang po bgyid pa'i brtsigs pa lags/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dz+yaM ya sad gra ma dang bu rgyal po bI dzA yang sang gA mA smad rgyurgya yul du mchis nas slar li yul du mchi ba'i bar du
561a3(skyes rabs): drudru gu'i dmag gis shul khum pa lngas pha ni rgya yul du gum/ bu chungs te slar mchi bo'i rngo ma thogs pa'i skabs su/ li yul blon po a ma che khe meg ces bgyi bas dgung lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rgyal tshab
561a4(skyes rabs): bgyis nas rgyal srid gzung ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge slong 'phags pa du na tsa zhes bgyi ba'i slad du ma na 'di'i mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shA ri
561a5(skyes rabs): ramA du btsalA ti/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di lha na mkha'i spyan dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes zhes bgyi bas bsrung ngo // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang grA ma'i bu rgyal po bi dzA ya bi kra mu zhes pa
561a6(skyes rabs): slar li yul du mchis nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa ngo bon dra chen gyi slad du gtsug lag khang byi zha gra ma brtsigs te/ da ltar lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / nor bu bzang pos
561b1(skyes rabs): bsrung ngo // de nas de'i 'og tu rgya'i blon po ser the shi dang / rgyal po bi dza yA d+harmA gnyis kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gum tir gyi bAr mog 'dzin srin zhes bgyi ba'i slad du grong mkhar gyi byams pA mai tI'i
561b2(skyes rabs): gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos sras kyis bsrung ngo // de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po'i blon po ka tha shi dang / rgyal po bi dzA ya sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi ba gnyis kyis dge ba'i bshes
561b3(skyes rabs): gnyenA u dren dra rod ci dang / d+har+m+ma nan+na ta gnyis kyi slad du khaM gan tse'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis bsrung ngo // thog ma dge slong 'phyags pa bai ro tsa na
561b4(skyes rabs): tsar ma'i tshal du gshegs pa phyugs rdzi la sogs pa mi 'og ma dag gis mthong nas rgyal po bi dza ya sam bla ba la bdag cig sngar ma mthong ba'i mi 'di lta bu zhig tsar ma'i tshal na mchis so gsol pa dang /
561b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha yang de ma thag tu tsar slar mchis nas 'phags pa bai ro tsa na mthong ba dang / drad pa skyes nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nus 'phags pa des kyang rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba'i dge ba'i
561b6(skyes rabs): bshes gnyen bgyis nas legs nyes gnyis kyi 'bras bu bstan to// chos bshad bshags sbyangs bgyid du stsal pa las/ rgyal po de yang chos kyi mig bye nas lhag par yang dang pa skyes nas rgyal po slar sku
562a1(skyes rabs): mkhar du mchis nas thog ma 'phags pa bai ro tsA nAs gshegs so zhes bka' mchid snyan pa thos pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig brtsigs te/ ming yang su stong nyar btags/ slad kyis
562a2(skyes rabs): mchod rten de yun rings pas zhig nas/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya bo ha na chen po dang / rgya yul nas mchis pa'i dge slong 'ba' la shi zhes bgyi ba mchis pas tsar ma'i dge bdun dge ba'i bshes
562a3(skyes rabs): gnyen du spyan drangs nas su stong nya'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras kyis bsrung // dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang rnams kyis gtan tshigs dang / snga phyi'i glo rim la rgyal po bi dza ya sing
562a4(skyes rabs): hA zhes bgyi ba zhig chung ngu nas rgyal por zhugs te/ chungs pa'i skabs su blon po kha cig gis rngan can bgyis te/ rgyal mo dang / mchis brang slas dang / nang 'khor ma rnams dag dong mi rigs pa bgyis nas slad
562a5(skyes rabs): kyis rgyal po de chen por myur naso/ sngar blon po de dag gis rngan chen bgyis shing bsnyad pa de dran nas/ kho na dran par gyur te/ slad kyi rgyal po des blon po rnams ri dgas shor bya ltar thabs kyis brid nas bu then gyi
562a6(skyes rabs): shel chab gong ma yul ba ro n+ya zhes bgyi bar blon po bdun cu rtsa lnga bkum nas/ slad kyi der gtsug lag khang gcig kyang brtsegs/ de nas sku mkhar du mchis nas rgyal po mchis pa'i gnas nas rgyal mo dang /
562b1(skyes rabs): slas dang nang 'khor ma mchis pa'i khang pa phyi sgo bskum nas 'grul bcad/ de bzhin du 'gum par bgyis pa las/ rgyal po de'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa phongs te/ nyam thag nas phyogs bcu'i sangs
562b2(skyes rabs): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nas brjod/ mchod pa bgyis te/ lha khang bskor d+har+m+ma bklags bsod nams cher bgyis pa'i mthus rgya gar yul nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa ma ya shI t+yA dz+nyA dang / sgyu shu ta
562b3(skyes rabs): dang / song ha na ta la la sogs pa na mkha' la ldings te/ bsad snyams len du gshegs pa/ rgyal mo ma sha ko sha dang / sa lu tsa la sogs pa 'khor mchis pa'i drung du gshegs nas rgyal mau de dag la chos
562b4(skyes rabs): bshad de rab tu byung ba las dad pa'i shugs kyi dri ma thag tu rgyal mo de dag gi 'khor las brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dgra bcom par gyur nas na mkha' la ldings te/ bsod snyoms len du gshegs pa rgyal pe bi dza
562b5(skyes rabs): la sing has mya thong nas/ de ma thag tu gnas der mchis tau lta na rgyal mo mog sha ko sha dang / sa lu tsa la sogs pa'i 'khor ril rab tu byung ste/ phel cher dgra bcom par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs
562b6(skyes rabs): bstan pa mthong nas rgyal po yang rab tu dga' nas dad pa'i shugs kyis gnas/ de nyid du gtsug log khang brtsigs te/ bran zhing dang / nor phyugs la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad mang mo tsam zhig

563a6(skyes rabs): dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal yang mngon sum du mthong nas dgra bcom pa ste ming yang bud d+ha na na btags/ de nas dgung bdun lags pa dang / rgyal pos bud med de
563b1(skyes rabs): 'gugs pa zhig btang bya de'i mching nas mo rab tu byung ste/ 'phags pa dgra bcom mar gyur nas da ltar 'od kyang 'byung zhing mchis so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po der mchis na sna 'phags a de la 'od kyang

563b3(skyes rabs): dbang phyug ces bya bas bsrung // de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza~M ya na na te zhes bgyi ba nam gyi rgyal po hu mar bya ba'i mchis brang dang mjal ba'i bu mo gcig cig mchis pa rab tu byung nas dgra bcom par gyur nas
563b4(skyes rabs): bltas na/ bdag ni li rje bI dz+ya ya ma ta'i bu mo lags par thugs su chud nas 'phags pa d+har+m+ma ba l+ya de dang / dge slong ma 'phags ma nyi shu/ shu lig nas na mkha' las ldi dus tA li yul du gshegs nas
563b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po yab la thog ma'i lo rgyus kyang bshad/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bstan pas rgyal po yang dad pa skyes nas bu mo 'phags ma dragra bcom ma d+har+m+ma pa la'i slad du po yin to'i gtsug lag khang
563b6(skyes rabs): brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras dang / klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi bas bsrung // daM na sa de'i 'og tu rgyal po pi dzi ya sang gra ma seng ge zhes bgyi ba'i ma rgyal po d+harmA zhes bgyi ba rab tu byung nas dgra bcom
564a1(skyes rabs): pa'i 'bras bu thob nas spyil bu'i nang du bsgom zhing mchis pa las/ nub mo 'od phyung ste/ rgyal po sna mtshan ma gzugs pa'i phyir mda' gcig 'phangs nang par mda' tshol du btang ba'i sa de
564a2(skyes rabs): na rgyal po'i ma d+har+m+ma de bzhu gyis pa mthong nas/ rgyal po yang dad pa skye te/ ma 'phags ma dgra bcom mu d+har+m+ma zhes bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal pos dri mo 'dza' zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsig ste/ da ltar lha ser
564a3(skyes rabs): skyas bsrung // de nas rgyal po bi dza yA sang gra ma'i nu'o pre sa ya stu log ces bgyi ba zhig gis rgyal mo drugu mo zhig rab tu byung nas ming yang e zhu ka sum zhes bgyi bar btags te/ dgra bcom pa'i slad du
564a4(skyes rabs): dad pa skyes na sA tra ko 'jo zhes byagyi ba'i gtsug lcag khyad brtsigs te/ da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis bsrung / de nas gtsug lag khang 'gu gzhan brtsigs pa'i rgyal po bi dzA ye
564a5(skyes rabs): spang dra ma 'i mchis brang rgyal po phrom ge sar gyi bu mo bu rong gra zhes bgyi ba'i bu mo gnyis rab tu byung nas dgra bcom ste 'ang glas ma de gnyis gcig gi mtshan ni shi la ma ta zhes bgyi/ gcig
564a6(skyes rabs): gi mtshan ni go'u sha re zhes bgyi ste/ 'phags ma de gnyis kha che yul nas na mkha' la ldings te/ ma rgyal mo'u rong gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gshegs te/ 'phags ma de gnyis kyi slad du

564b6(skyes rabs): gcig tu bkum nas/ ma yang thar par zhugs nas de nyid du a ma tsa kha mig gis gus sde ro ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha na mkha'i spyan dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag
565a1(skyes rabs): shes kyis bsrung // de nas rgyal po bi dz+ra yA dza ya zhes bgyi bas oM sku'i rgyal po'i bu mo mchis brang du rmyang sU te/ rgyal mo des dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma dgra bcom ma

565a5(skyes rabs): ha'i mchis byung gi 'dzag gi rgyal mo a lho 'ja' zhes bgyi ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shU lig nas dge slong mA 'phags ma dgra bcom ma bdun gshegs pa'i slad du rgyal po bi dza sing has khye sho nA'i gtsug
